bofm-title 0:
[center][font_size=26]Mormon Nwoma No[/font_size][/center]

Nsɛm A Mormon Dze Ne Nsa Kyerɛwee Wɔ Mprɛtse Do No Wɔfae Fii Nephi Ne Mprɛtse No Do

Dɛm ntsi wɔdze Nephi no nkorɔfo ho abakɔsɛm nye Lamanfo so dze abɔmu etwitwa no ntsiatsia akyerɛw—Wɔkyerɛwee dze kɛmaa Lamanfo a wɔyɛ Israelfifo nkaa; nye Jewfo na Amanamamfo no mu biara so—Wɔnam mbrasɛm na nkɔnhyɛ sunsum nye nyikyerɛ kwan do kyerɛwee—Wɔkyerɛwee na wɔsɔɔw ano na wɔdze siei maa Ewuradze amma wɔannsɛɛ no—Ama wɔnam Nyankopɔn n’akyɛdze na no tum do woeyi epue na wɔakyerɛ ase—Moroni dze ne nsa sɔɔw ano na ɔdze siei maa Ewuradze, ama wɔnam Amanamamfo do woeyi epue wɔ n’aber ano—Wɔnam Nyankopɔn no tum akyɛdze do bɛkyerɛ ase.

Ne fã bi so a woyii fii Ether Nwoma mu no so yɛ abakɔsɛm a ɔfa Jared no nkorɔfo a wɔbɔɔ hɔn petsee wɔ aber a nna worisi abantsentsen dze akɔ sor no na Ewuradze totõo hɔn kasaa no ho—Ama wɔdze aakyerɛ Israelfifo nkaa ma woehu ndzɛmba akɛse a Ewuradze yɛe maa hɔn egyanom; na woehu Ewuradze n’ahyɛmu no, dɛ wɔnntow hɔn nnkyenee afebɔɔ—Na afei so ama Jewfo na Amanamamfo no mu biara so aagye edzi dɛ Jesus nye Christ no, Onnyiewiei Nyankopɔn no, reda noho edzi akyerɛ aman nyinara—Na afei sɛ mfom bi wɔ mu a nna ofi nyimpa; dɛm ntsi mma hom nnkasa nntsia ndzɛmba a Nyame ayɛ, amma woeennya hom ho nkekaa wɔ Christ n’atsɛmbu egua no enyim.

Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na odzii kan kyerɛɛ ase fii mprɛtse no do kɔr Borɔfokasa mu
introduction 0:
[center][font_size=26]Mbueienyi[/font_size][/center]

Mormon Nwoma no yɛ kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn tse dɛ Bible so. Ɔyɛ kyerɛwsɛm a ɔfa mbrɛ Nyame sii nye tsetsemba a nna wɔtse America no nantsewee ho, daapem asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no na ɔwɔ mu.

Tsetse nkɔnhyɛfo pii na wɔnam nkɔnhyɛ sunsum na nyikyerɛ do kyerɛɛw nwoma yi. Nkɔnhyɛnyi-abakɔsɛmkyerɛwfo bi a wɔfrɛ no Mormon na ɔfaa hɔn nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw wɔ sika mprɛtse do no na otwitwaa do esinesin kyerɛwee. Nkyerɛwee no kã enyibue akɛse ebien bi ho asɛm. Kor fii Jerusalem wɔ mfe ahaesia a nna wonnyaa nnwoo Christ no mu na ɔno ekyir wɔkyɛɛ hɔn mu aman ebien a edzin a ɔdeda hɔn do nye Nephifo na Lamanfo. Dza ɔkã ho no dzii kan bae wɔ aber a Ewuradze daan hɔn kasaa wɔ aber a worisi Abantsentsen wɔ Babel no. Dɛm kuw yi na wɔfrɛ hɔn Jaredfo no. Mfe mpempem ekyir no wɔsɛɛ hɔn nyinara ma ɔkaa Lamanfo, na wɔkã America Indiafo no hɔn egyanom ho.

Dza ɔkrɔn a wɔkyerɛwee a ɔwɔ Mormon Nwoma no mu no nye Ewuradze Jesus Christ ne ɔsomdwuma wɔ maa Nephifo no wɔ mu No wusoɛr ekyir ara no. Ɔda asɛmpa no ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no edzi, ɔda nkwagye ho nhyehyɛɛ edzi na ɔkã dza sɛ nyimpa yɛ a ɔnam do benya asomdwee wɔ dɛm asetsena yi mu na oenya nkwagye a onnyiewiei wɔ asetsena a ɔreba no mu.

Mormon wiei no, ɔdze maa ne ba Moroni ma no so ɔdze noara ne nsɛm kakra kãa ho na ɔdze mprɛtse no kɛhyɛɛ Koko Cumorah mu. Fankwa 21, 1823 mu na dɛm Moroni no a aber no na ɔasoɛr efi ewufo mu na wɔahyɛ no enyimnyam no yii noho kyerɛɛ Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith na ɔkãa tsetse kyerɛwsɛm na mbrɛ wobesi akyerɛ ase akɔ borɔfokasa mu ho asɛm.

Ne ber sõe no woyii mprɛtse no maa Joseph Smith ma no so nam Nyankopɔn n’akyɛdze na no tum do kyerɛɛ ase. Seseiara woetsintsim kyerɛwee yi akɔ kasa horow mu dɛ wɔdze regye dase fofor bio dɛ Jesus Christ yɛ Tsease Nyankopɔn ne Ba na hɔn a wɔbɛba No hɔ na woedzi N’asɛmpa no ho mbra na ayɛdze do no wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa.

Dza Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith kãe wɔ dɛm kyerɛwee yi ho nye dɛ: “Mekãa kyerɛɛ enuanom no dɛ Mormon Nwoma no dzi mu kyɛn nwoma biara a ɔwɔ asaase do, na ɔyɛ hɛn asɔr yi no botantsim, na obiara a obedzi no mu nsɛm do no ɔbɛbɛn Nyankopɔn kyɛn dɛ obedzi nwoma biara no mu nsɛm do.”

Sɛ yeyi Joseph Smith si nkyɛn a, Ewuradze daa sika mprɛtse no edzi kyerɛɛ nyimpa dubiako so, ama wɔayɛ adasefo soronko wɔ nokwar no na Mormon Nwoma no krɔnkrɔnyɛɛ ho. Hɔn dasegye no na wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu dɛ “Nyimpa Baasa Hɔn Dasegye” na “Nyimpa Baawɔtwe Hɔn Dasegye” no.

Yɛto nsa frɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ mbea nyinara dɛ wɔnkenkan Mormon Nwoma no na wɔndwendwen no mu nsɛm no ho wɔ hɔn akoma mu, na wombisa Nyankopɔn, Onnyiewiei Egya, wɔ Christ ne dzin mu dɛ ana nwoma no yɛ nokwar. Hɔn a wɔfa dɛm kwan yi do na wobisa wɔ gyedzi mu no nam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum do benya no nokwar na no krɔnkrɔnyɛ ho dase (Hwɛ Moroni 10:3–5.)

Hɔn a wonya dɛm dasegye krɔnkrɔn a ofi Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no hɔ yi nam dɛm tum no ara so do bohu dɛ Jesus Christ nye wiadze Agyenkwa, na Joseph Smith yɛ oyikyerɛfo na nkɔnhyɛnyi wɔ dɛm nda a aka ekyir yi mu, na dɛ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo yɛ Ewuradze n’ahenman a wɔdze aba asaase do bio dze robɔbɔ kwan ato hɔ ama Messiah ne Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no.
three 0:
[center][font_size=26]Nyimpa Baasa hɔn Dasegye[/font_size][/center]

Aman, ebusuafo, kasa horow na nyimpa nyinara a dɛm nsɛm yi bɛba hɔn hɔ no nhu dɛ: Yɛnam Nyame Egya na hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Christ adom do ehu dɛm mprɛtse a kyerɛwsɛm yi wɔan do no. Kyerɛwsɛm a ɔfa Nephi no nkorɔfo, na Lamanfo so a wɔyɛ hɔn nuanom, na Jared no nkorɔfo so a wofii abantsentsen no do sianee a wɔakã ho asɛm no. Na yenyim so dɛ wɔnam Nyankopɔn n’akyɛdze na no tum do kyerɛɛ ase, osiandɛ ne ndze na ɔada no edzi akyerɛ hɛn, dɛm ntsi yenyim pefee dɛ dɛm nsɛm yi yɛ nokwar. Na hɛn so yɛgye ho dase dɛ yehun nkrukye no a ɔwɔ mprɛtse no do no; na wɔnam Nyankopɔn no tum do yii kyerɛɛ hɛn, na nnyɛ nyimpa no tum do bi. Na yɛkã no wɔ botooyɛ mu dɛ Nyame no sor bɔfo fi sor sianee dze boguu hɛn enyim, na yɛhwɛe na yehun mprɛtse no na nkrukye a ɔwɔ do no; na yenyim dɛ ɔnam Nyame Egya, na hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Christ, adom do na yehunii na yɛgye dase dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi yɛ nokwar. Na ɔyɛ nwanwa wɔ hɛn enyi do. Naaso Ewuradze ne ndze hyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛngye ho dase, dɛm ntsi ama yɛayɛ setsie ama Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm no, yɛgye dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho dase. Na yenyim dɛ sɛ yedzi nokwar wɔ Christ mu a, yebeyi hɛn ntar efi adasamba nyinara hɔn bɔgyaa mu, na woennhu nkekaaba wɔ hɛnho wɔ Christ n’atsɛmbu egua no enyim, na yɛnye no atsena ase onnyiewiei mu wɔ sor. Na enyimnyam nkã Nyame Egya, nye Ɔba, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a ɔyɛ Nyame kor no. Amen.

Oliver Cowdery

David Whitmer

Martin Harris
eight 0:
[center][font_size=26]Nyimpa Baawɔtwe hɔn Dasegye[/font_size][/center]

Aman, ebusuafo, kasa horow na nyimpa nyinara a dɛm nsɛm yi bɛba hɔn hɔ no nhu dɛ: Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nyia ɔkyerɛɛ nsɛm yi ase no dze mprɛtse a wɔakã ho asɛm no akyerɛ hɛn, na mprɛtse no su tse dɛ sika, na no mu dodowara a dɛm Smith no kyerɛɛ ase no yɛdze hɛn nsa susuoo mu, na yehun nkrukye no so a ɔwɔ do no, na no do ndzɛmba nyinara yɛ tsetse edwindze, na ɔyɛ edwindze soronko. Na yɛdze botooyɛ gye iyi ho dase dɛ dɛm Smith no dze kyerɛɛ hɛn, na yehunii, na yɛbɔɔ no adze hwɛɛ na yenyim pefee dɛ dɛm Smith no ne nsa kãa mprɛtse no a yɛakã ho asɛm no. Na yɛdze hɛn edzin ma dze gye dase kyerɛ wiadze wɔ dza yeehu ho. Na yenndzi ator, Nyame gye ho dase.

Christian Whitmer

Jacob Whitmer

Peter Whitmer, Kakraba

John Whitmer

Hiram Page

Joseph Smith, Panyin

Hyrum Smith

Samuel H. Smith
js 0:
[center][font_size=26]Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith ne Dasegye[/font_size][/center]

Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith nankasa n’anomusɛm a ɔfa mbrɛ Mormon Nwoma no sii bae ho:

“Fankwa ne da a otsĩa eduonu-biako [1823] n’ewimbir no … Morobɔ mpaa na morotɔtɔ serɛ Otumfo Nyankopɔn. …

“Aber a mugu do robɔ mpaa ma Nyame no, muhun kan bi dɛ orupue me dan no mu, na ɔkɔr do hyerɛnee araa kɛpeem dɛ dan no mu yɛɛ kann kyɛn ewiaber mpo. Annkyɛr na nyimpa-su bi puee me mpa ne nkyɛn, nna ɔsensɛn hɔ a ne nan nnkã famu.

“Ɔhyɛ bataker fufuw bi a ɔhoa kyɛn adzefufuw biara a mehu no wɔ asaase yi do pɛn; na menngye nndzi dɛ biribi wɔ asaase yi do a wobotum ayɛ ma ahoa na ahyerɛn dɛm. Ne nsaho na n’abasa, fitsi ne nsakɔn dze kɔ sor kakra no da hɔ kwa a biribiara nnkata ho. N’anamɔn na ne nanho so da hɔ kwa, n’anan pɔw dze kɔ sor kakra no so da hɔ kwa. Ne tsir na no kɔn ho so da hɔ kwa. Muhun dɛ ɔnnhyɛ atar biara bio ka bataker no ho osiandɛ nna no mu ebue ma mutumii hun n’akoko.

“Nnyɛ n’atar no nko na ɔhoa mbordo, mbom ɔnoara so mbrɛ noho si hyerɛn no ano nnkotum akyerɛkyerɛ mu, na no hwɛbea hyerɛn dɛ enyinam. Dan no mu hyerɛnee na mbom nna ɔnnto kan a etwa ne nyimpadua no ho ehyia no. Muhun no ahyɛse no suro kitsaa me, mbom annkyɛr na suro no fii hɔ ntsɛmara.

“Ɔdze me dzin frɛɛ me na ɔsee dɛ ɔyɛ ɔbɔfo a wɔsomaa no fii Nyame nkyɛn dɛ ɔmbra mo hɔ, na wɔfrɛ no Moroni; na Nyame wɔ dwumadzi bi dze ma me; na aman ebusuafo na kasa horow nyina mu no binom bɛkã dza oye wɔ me dzin ho na binom so akã dza omuo so. Dza ɔkyerɛ nye dɛ nyimpakuw ahorow nyina mu no binom bɔbɔ me dzin pa na binom so abɔ me dzin bɔn.

“Ɔsee me dɛ wɔdze nwoma bi a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ sika mprɛtse do esie. Na nwoma no kã tsetse nkorɔfo a wɔtsenaa asaase tɔw yi do na bea a wofi baa ho asɛm. Ɔsee bio dɛ Asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no a Agyenkwa no dze maa tsetsemba no wɔ nwoma no mu.

“Bio so dɛ, wɔdze abo ebien a ogu dwetɛ egyen mu akã mprɛtse no ho esie—na wɔdze afam akatabo ho, na wɔfrɛ hɔn Urim na Thummim—na dɛm abo yi na hɔn a wɔwɔ no ɔboaa wɔ tsetseberdo anaa nkaano no ma wɔyɛɛ ‘adzehufo’, na Nyankopɔn yɛɛ iyi kãa ho ama wɔdze aakyerɛ nwoma no ase. …

“Bio, ɔsee me dɛ, sɛ me nsa kã mprɛtse a ɔakã ho asɛm no a—na ber no nnyaa nnsõe a ɔdze bɛma me—mma memmfa nnkyerɛ obiara; ɔno nye akatabo nye Urim na Thummim no; kã nkorɔfo a ɔbɛhyɛ me dɛ memfa nkyerɛ hɔn no nko ho; sɛ meyɛ a wɔbɛsɛɛ me. Ber a ɔnye me rotwetwe mprɛtse no ho nkɔmbɔ no, wobuee enyido-adzehu no wɔ m’adwen mu ma muhun bea pɔkyee a mprɛtse no hyɛ, dɛm ntsi ber a mokɔr bea no do no muhunii.

“Ɔkãa dɛm ndzɛmba yinom kyerɛɛ me ekyir no, muhun dɛ kan a ɔwɔ dan no mu no rotwe bɛn ne nyimpadua no. Ɔkɔr do yɛɛ dɛmara kɛpeem aber a dan no mu yɛɛ sum dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse dada no kã dza oetwa ehyia noho no nko; nna awerɛfir mu ara muhun dɛ, ma ɔyɛ dɛ, kwan bi ebue wɔ sor, na ɔfaa mu kɔree a mennhu no bio. Iyi ekyir no, dan no mu yɛɛ sum dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ ber a kan a ofi sor no mmpuee hɔ no.

“Medaa hɔ komm dwendween anwanwadze kɛse a osii na nsɛm a ɔsomafo nwanwanyi no kãa kyerɛɛ me no ho; ber a mugu do rodwendwen no, awerɛfir mu ara muhun dɛ me dan no mu ahyɛ ase reyɛ kann bio. Annkyɛr koraa na muhun dɛ dɛm ɔsomafo a ofi sor no gyina me mpa ne nkyɛn bio.

“Ɔhyɛɛ ase bio kãa dɛm asɛm kor no ara a ɔkãa no ahyɛse no kyerɛɛ me, a ɔannsesã biribiara. Ɔno ekyir, ɔkãa atsɛmbu kɛse a ɔreba asaase yi do ɔnam ɔkɔm na akõkoekõ na ahokyer dze amamfoyɛ kɛse bɛba ho asɛm kyerɛɛ me; na dɛm atsɛmbu kɛse yi bɛba asaase yi do wɔ dɛm mbasantsen yi do. Ɔkãa iyinom kyerɛɛ me ekyir no, ɔfowee kɔr sor dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no ahyɛse no.

“Dɛm aber yi nsɛm no tɔɔ m’adwen do ara ma nda efi m’enyiwa mu. Dza mehu na matse no maa medaa hɔ ahobow mu. Na dza ɔyɛɛ me ahobow kɛse mpo nye dɛ muhun dɛ ɔsomafo kor no ara wɔ me mpa nkyɛn na metsee dɛ orisi nsɛm a ɔkãa kyerɛɛ me no do bio. Ɔbɔɔ me kɔkɔ dɛ Satan bɛpɛ dɛ ɔsɔ me hwɛ (ɔnam dɛ m’egya n’ebusua yɛ abɔbɔfo ntsi) ama maagye mprɛtse no dze enya mo ho. Ɔbɔɔ me kɔkɔ dɛ mma minnya adwen fofor biara wɔ mprɛtse no ho kã dɛ medze bɛhyɛ Nyame enyimnyam, na mma memmfa botae biara nnsi m’enyi do kã n’ahenman ne nkyekyeree ho, annyɛ dɛm a me nsa rennkã.

“Ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebiasa ekyir no, ɔfowee kɔr sor bio dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no ahyɛse no na ɔkaa monko a nna meda hɔ rodwendwen anwanwadze a mehu no seseiara no ho. Ɔsomafo no fowee fii me nkyɛn ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebiasa no annkyɛr koraa na akokɔ bɔnee na muhun dɛ adze akye, iyi kyerɛɛ dɛ hɛn kokoa mu mpɛnsampɛnsamu no gyee hɛn anafua no nyinara.

“Ɔyɛɛ kakra no, mosoɛree wɔ me mpa do, na, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse no, mokɔr me daadaa dwumadzi do; mbom ber a mobɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ mereyɛ edwuma dɛ mbrɛ meyɛ no dada no, muhun dɛ mayɛ mberɛw na dɛm ntsi menntum annyɛ hwee koraa. M’egya a menye no reyɛ edwuma no hun dɛ biribi rehaw me, na ɔsee me dɛ monkɔ fie. Mefaa kwan dɛ morokɔ fie; mbom aber a mehyɛɛ ase dɛ morofow ban a wɔdze agye haban a yɛwɔ mu no ho no, m’ahom nyina pae na mohwee famu a munntum nkekã moho na m’enyi do siiw me mber kakra.

“Adze a odzi kan a mekaa nye ndze a ɔrekasa kyerɛ me na ɔdze me dzin refrɛ me. Memaa m’enyi do wɔ sor na muhun ɔsomafo kor no ara dɛ ogyina m’etsifi na kan etwa noho ehyia dɛ mbrɛ muhun no ahyɛse no. Ɔsanee sii nsɛm a ɔkãa no anafua no nyinara do. Ɔhyɛɛ me dɛ monkɔ m’egya hɔ na menkɛkã enyido-adzehu na mbrasɛm no a menya no nkyerɛ no.

“Midzii do. Mesanee kɔr m’egya hɔ wɔ haban no mu kɛkãa dza ɔfa nyikyerɛ no ho nyinara kyerɛɛ no. Obuaa me dɛ ofi Nyame na ɔsee me dɛ monkɔ nkɛyɛ dza ɔsomafo no ahyɛ me dɛ menyɛ no. Mifii haban no mu na mokɔr bea no a ɔsomafo no akã akyerɛ me dɛ mprɛtse no hyɛ no. Ɔnam dɛ enyido-adzehu a menya no yɛ pefee ntsi, ber a mudur hɔ ara nna muhunii.

“Koko a ɔsõ ara yie bi si Manchester ekuroba a ɔwɔ Ontario mansin a ɔwɔ New York mu no nkyɛn. Ɔno nye koko a ɔwar kyɛn akoko a ɔwɔ bea no do nyina. Mprɛtse no wɔ ɔbo adaka mu hyɛ ɔbo kɛse bi ase wɔ dɛm koko yi n’anee afamu wɔ bea a odzi kɔ no sor no ne finimfin yɛ kɛse na no sor yɛ korkorba. Odzi kɔ ne nkyɛnkyɛn no yɛ tseatseaba na dɛtse akata do ma dɛm ntsi odzi kɔ ne finimfin no nko na opue sor.

“Modwurudwuruuw dɛtse no wiei no, mohwehwɛɛ poma bi dze hyɛɛ boba no ase. Medze ahoɔdzen kakra ara maa bobaa no do kɔr sor. Mohwɛɛ adaka no mu na nokwar muhun mprɛtse, Urim na Thummim no na akatabo no dɛ mbrɛ ɔsomafo no akã no ara pɛr. Adaka a ɔwɔ mu no wɔatow abo dze dza ɔfam ayɛ. Wɔdze abo ebien abeabea adaka no ase. Dɛm abo ebien yi do na mprɛtse no na ndzɛmba nkaa no gu.

“Mobɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ mibeyi mprɛtse no epue na ɔsomafo no amma me kwan. Ɔsee me bio dɛ mber nnsõe a medze pue, nna nnyɛ n’aber nye no gyedɛ mfe anan etwa mu ana; mbom ɔsee me dɛ afrenhyia pɛpɛɛpɛr mensan mbra koko no ho na obehyia me wɔ hɔ; na dɛ menyɛ dɛm afe biara nkɛpem dɛ aber bɔsõ ma me nsa akã mprɛtse no.

“Afe biara ewiei no mokɔr koko no ho dɛ mbrɛ ɔhyɛɛ me no; mihyiaa dɛm ɔsomafo kor no ara wɔ hɔ na aber biara minyaa nkyerɛkyerɛ na nyimdzee fii no hɔ wɔ kokoa mu mpɛnsampɛnsamu kor biara mu no, ɔkãa dza Ewuradze rebɛyɛ, na mbrɛ obesi ahyehyɛ n’ahendzi wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu. …

“Afei ber a ɔwɔ dɛ me nsa kã mprɛtse, Urim na Thummim na akatabo no sõe. Fankwa ne da a otsĩa eduonu-ebien, wɔ afe apem aha awɔtwe eduonu esuon mu no mokɔɔr bea no a ndzɛmba no hyɛ no, dɛ mbrɛ afe biara meyɛ no, na dɛm ɔsomafo kor no ara a ofi sor no dze maa me, nye bɔhyɛ yi: dɛ noho asodzi da mo do; na sɛ mannhwɛ no yie ma ɔyew anaa mubu enyi gu do a, Ewuradze botwa me akyen; mbom sɛ mobɔ mbɔdzen biara a mobotum dze sie kɛpem aber a ɔno ɔsomafo no bɛba abɛgye a, ɔno Ewuradze bɔkora do.

“Annkyɛr biara na muhun siantsir a ɔnam do ma ɔsomafo no hyɛɛ me dzendzenndzen dɛ monhwɛ mprɛtse no do yie no, na siantsir a ɔmaa ɔsee dɛ sɛ muwie dza wɔdze ahyɛ me nsa dɛ menyɛ no a ɔbɛba abɛgye akɔ no. Nkorɔfo tsee dɛ mprɛtse no wɔ mo hɔ no ara, wɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen biara a wobotum dɛ wɔbɛgye efi me nkyɛn. Enyitsew kwan biara a nyimpa fa do a nsa kã a ɔbɛyɛ yie biara no wɔfaa do. Afei atseetsee no yɛɛ yaayaw kyɛɛn ma nkyɛ ɔtse no, na dɔmtutuw yɛɛ krado dabiara dɛ wɔbɛgye efi mo hɔ. Mbom ɔnam Nyame ne nyansaa do, ɔkaa me nsamu dwodwoodwo, kodur dɛ muwiee dza wɔdze hyɛɛ me nsa dɛ menyɛ wɔ ho no. Dɛ mbrɛ nhyehyɛɛ no tse no, ɔsomafo no bae ma medze sanee maa no, na ɔwɔ ne nkyɛn bodu ndɛ a ɔyɛ Esusow Aketseaba ne da a otsĩa ebien wɔ afe 1838 mu yi.”

Ama enya nkyerɛwee yi n’emudzi no, hwɛ Joseph Smith—Abakɔsɛm a ɔwɔ Bota a Ɔsom Bo Mapã no mu.

Tsetseberdo kyerɛwsɛm a woyii fii asaase mu dɛ nyimpa dodow hɔn ndze awɔrekasa fi huntuma mu no, na wɔnam Nyankopɔn n’akyɛdze na no tum do kyerɛɛ ase kɔr nkyirmba hɔn kasaa mu na wɔnam Nyame ahoɔdzen do edzi ho dase no; wodzii kan dze puee wiadze wɔ Borɔfokasa mu dɛ The Book of Mormon wɔ afe 1830 mu.
explanation 0:
[center][font_size=26]Mormon Nwoma No Ne Nkyerɛkyerɛmu Simabaa[/font_size][/center]

Mormon Nwoma no yɛ kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn bi a ɔfa tsetseberdo nkorɔfo a nna wɔtse America ho na woekrukye egu kyɛnsẽ mprɛtse do. Dza odzi do yi kã fibea ahorow a wɔkyerɛɛw nwoma yi fi:

Nephi ne Mprɛtse, no gu mu ahorow ebien: mprɛtse nkakraba na mprɛtse akɛse. Dza odzi kan no fa sunsum mu ndzɛmba na nkɔnhyɛfo no, hɔn somdwuma na hɔn nkyerɛkyerɛ na hɔn dwumadzi ho. Na dza odzi do no so yɛ nkorɔfo a wɔrekã hɔnho asɛm no ho abakɔsɛm (1 Nephi 9:2–4). Ofi Mosiah n’aber do na wɔdze mprɛtse akɛse no so aka ndzɛmba a sunsum mu ndzɛmba etsitsir wɔ do no ho.

Mormon ne Mprɛtse, iyi so yɛ Nephi ne mprɛtse akɛse do nsɛm a Mormon etwitwa do esinesin, na ɔakã ho nsɛm pii so. Dɛm mprɛtse yi do na yebohu abakɔsɛm a Mormon kyerɛwee no no nsɔwdo na dza ne ba Moroni so dze kãa ho.

Ether ne Mprɛtse, iyi so kã hɛn Jaredfo ho abakɔsɛm. Moroni twitwaa nsɛm no do esinesin na ɔdze nankasa nedze kekãa ho na ɔkyerɛɛw ber no mu abakɔsɛm na ɔkãa bɔɔ mu na ɔtoo no dzin “Ether Nwoma”.

Ayewa Mprɛtse no Lehi no nkorɔfo dze fi Jerusalem bae wɔ afe 600 a nna wonnyaa nnwoo Christ no. Dza ɔwɔ yinom do nye “Moses no nwoma enum, … na Jewfo hɔn kyerɛwsɛm fitsi ahyɛse, … dze kɛpem ber a Judahfo hɔn hen Zedekiah hyɛɛ n’ahendzi ase no; na nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn hɔn nkɔnhyɛfo” (1 Nephi 5:11–13). Kyerɛwsɛm pii a ɔwɔ mprɛtse yinom do a ɔfa Isaiah na nkɔnhyɛfo a hɔn edzin wɔ Bible mu nye hɔn a hɔn edzin nnyi mu no so ho nsɛm wɔ Mormon Nwoma no mu.

Mormon Nwoma no gu mu ahorow anaa nkyekyɛmu etsitsir duenum, a wɔfrɛ kor biara nwoma a, ɔtɔdɛ hɔn a wɔkyerɛwee no ne dzin na ɔda do, gyedɛ no mu kor pɛr. No mu dodow a odzi kan (nwoma no mu esia a odzi kan dze kɛpem Omni no) wɔkyerɛɛ ase fii Nephi ne mprɛtse nkakraba no do. Nwoma a ɔwɔ Omni na Mosiah ne ntamu no, wɔdze dza wɔfrɛ no Mormon ne Nsɛm no ahyɛ hɔ. Dza wɔdze ahyɛ ntamu hɔ no toa kyerɛwsɛm no a woekrukye wɔ mprɛtse nkakraba no nye dza ɔwɔ mprɛtse akɛse no do a Mormon twitwaa do esinesin no do.

Dza ɔwar koraa a ɔhyɛ ase fi Mosiah dze kɛpem Mormon tsir 7 no yɛ Nephi ne mprɛtse akɛse no a Mormon twitwaa do esinesin a wɔakyerɛ ase no. Dza odzi ewiei a ɔhyɛ ase fi Mormon tsir 8 dze kesi nwoma no n’ewiei no Mormon ne babanyin Moroni na okrukyee. Ɔno na ber a otwitwaa n’egya ne bra mu nsɛm kyerɛw no, otwitwaa Jaredfo abakɔsɛm do esinesin wiei (dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ Ether nwoma no) ekyir no ɔdze dza wɔfrɛ no Moroni nwoma no kãa ho.

Bɛyɛ mfe 421 a wɔwoo Christ n’ekyir no mu, na Moroni a ɔyɛ Nephifo hɔn nkɔnhyɛnyi a odzi ekyir—abakɔsɛm kyerɛwfo no sɔɔw kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no ano na ɔdze kosumae maa Ewuradze, ama woeyi no wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu, dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn nam Ne tsetse nkɔnhyɛfo do kãe no. Wɔwoo Christ n’ekyir, wɔafe 1823 mu, na dɛm Moroni kor yi ara, a nna ɔasoɛr efi ewufo mu no kɛseraa Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith na oyii mprɛtse a woekrukye no maa no.

Dza ɔfa nwoma kor yi ho: Asɔpɔkan dzin krataafa a, odzi dza ɔwɔ mu krataafa no enyim pɛɛ no, woyii fii mprɛtse no mu na ɔkã kyerɛwee krɔnkrɔn no ho. Mbueienyi no a ɔammfa akyerɛwamba soronko annkyerɛw, tse dɛ 1 Nephi na dza odzi Mosiah tsir 9 enyim pɛɛ no no so kã kyerɛwee krɔnkrɔn no ho. Mbueienyi horow a wɔdze akyerɛwmba soronko akyerɛw, tse dɛ tsir ne tsir nsɛm no, nnkã asɔpɔkan kyerɛwee no ho mbom ɔyɛ adzesũa mboa a wɔdze akã ho ama akenkan aakɔ do yie.

Mfomdo nkakramba binom akɔ do wɔ nkaano Mormon Nwoma a woetsintsim no Ngyerisi Bɔrofo kasa mu no. Nwoma yi na ɔatsentsen dza ɔfata a ɔdze no mu nsɛm nye dza asɔpɔkan nwoma a Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith yɛɛ mu nsesae ana woritsinstim no asaa.
1-ne 1:
[center][font_size=26]Nephi Nwoma a Odzi Kan no[/font_size][/center]

n’Ahendzi na ne Ɔsomdwuma

Nsɛm a Lehi na ne yer Sariah na ne mbabanyin baanan a wɔfrɛ hɔn (yɛhyɛ ase fi panyin no do) Laman, Lemuel, Sam na Nephi. Ewuradze bɔ Lehi kɔkɔ dɛ omfi Jerusalem asaase do, osiandɛ ɔhyɛɛ nkorɔfo no nkɔm a ɔfa hɔn emumuyɛdze ho na wɔhwehwɛ dɛ wobotwa no nkwa do. Ɔnye n’ebusuafo nyina tu kwan ndaansa kɔr sar no do. Nephi fa no nuanom no na wɔsan kɔ Jerusalem asaase do kɔhwehwɛ Jewfo ho abakɔsɛm. Hɔn amandzehu mu nsɛm. Wɔwarwar Ishmael ne mbabaa. Wɔfa hɔn ebusuafo no na wɔkɔ sar no do. Hɔn ɔhaw na amandzehu wɔ sar no do. Hɔn akwantu. Wɔba esu akɛse no ho. Nephi no nuanom no tsew no do etua. Ɔhyɛɛ hɔn fɛr na ɔpam hɛn. Wɔfrɛ bea no Dzifuu. Wotwa esu akɛse no kɔ anohoba asaase no do, na dza ɔkekã ho. Dɛm na Nephi ne nsɛm no tse anaa ma morohwehwɛ akã nye dɛ, emi mara Nephi na mekyerɛw dɛm abakɔsɛm yi.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi hyɛ ase kã no nkorɔfo ho nsɛm—Lehi hu ogyafadum wɔ enyido-adzehu mu na ɔkenkan fi nkɔnhyɛ nwoma mu—Oyi Nyame ayɛw, ɔkã Messiah ne mbaa ho asɛm, na ɔhyɛ nkɔm dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ Jerusalem—Jewfo no tseetsee no. Bɛyɛ mfe 600 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Emi, Nephi, abaatan pa na wɔwoo me, dɛm ntsi dza m’egya nyim nyinara na ɔdze kyerɛkyerɛɛ me; na muhun amandze pii wɔ mo nkwa nda mu, naaso minyaa enyimnyam kɛse wɔ Ewuradze enyim wɔ me nda nyinara mu; nyew, minyaa Nyankopɔn ne papayɛ na n’esumasɛm ho nyimdzee kɛsenara, dɛm ntsi merekyerɛw mo nkwa nda yi mu nsɛm.

2 Nyew, merekyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ m’egya ne kasaa mu, dza ɔyɛ Jewfo nyimdzee na Egyptfo hɔn kasaa no.

3 Na minyim dɛ nsɛm a merekyerɛw yi yɛ nokwar, na mankasa me nsa na medze rekyerɛw; na dza minyim na merekyerɛw.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a odzi kan wɔ ɔhen Zedekiah, Judahhen n’aber do, (m’egya Lehi tsenaa Jerusalem no nkwa nda nyinara); na dɛm afe no ara mu no nkɔnhyɛfo pii soɛree na wɔhyɛɛ dɔm no nkɔm dɛ otwar dɛ wonu hɔnho, annyɛ dɛm a wɔbɛsɛɛ Jerusalem kuropɔn no.

5 Dɛm ntsi ɔbaa dɛ m’egya, Lehi, kɔr dɛ ɔrokɔbɔ mpaa ama Ewuradze, nyew ɔdze n’akoma nyinara bɔɔ mpaa wɔ no nkorɔfo ntsi.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ ogu do robɔ mpaa ma Ewuradze no, gyafadum bi besii botan kɛse bi a osi n’enyim no do; na ohunii na ɔtsee nsɛm pii; na osian ndzɛmba a ohunii na ɔtsee no ntsi no ho wosowee na ɔpopoe.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔsanee Kɔr nankasa ne fie wɔ Jerusalem, na ɔtoow noho kyeen ne mpa do wɔ aber a nna Sunsum na ndzɛmba a ohunii no ahyɛ no do.

8 Na Sunsum no nyaa hyɛɛ no do no, ohun enyido-adzehu dɛ ɔsorsor ebue, na ɔyɛɛ no dɛ ohun Nyankopɔn dɛ ɔtsena n’ahengua do a abɔfo mboano pii a wonntum nnkan hɔn etwa no ho ehyia na wɔrotow ndwom na wɔrotonton hɔn Nyankopɔn.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ ohun Kor dɛ orisian fi sor na ohun dɛ no subea hyerɛn sen ewiaber ewia mpo.

10 Na ohun duebien bio so dɛ wodzi n’ekyir, na hɔn so hɔn subea hyerɛn sen wimu nworaba.

11 Na wosiaan famu na wɔnantseew asaase enyi; na nyia odzi kan no begyinaa m’egya n’enyim, na ɔdze nwoma bi maa no, na ɔsee no dɛ ɔnkenkan.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔkenkanee no Ewuradze no Sunsum hyɛɛ no mã.

13 Na ɔkenkanee, see dɛ: Jerusalem ndue, ndue, osiandɛ mehu w’ebusudze! Nyew, na ndzɛmba pii na m’egya kenkanee a ɔfa Jerusalem ho—dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ no, na nyimpa a wɔtse mu nyinara, dodowara bɛhera wɔ nkrantsee ano, na dodowara so na wɔbɔsoa hɔn ndɔmmum mu akɔ Babylon.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ m’egya kenkanee no ohun anwanwadze akɛse pii, na ɔtseaa mu kãa nsɛm pii kyerɛɛ Ewuradze; bi nye dɛ: Wo ndwuma sõ na ɔyɛ nwanwa O Ewuradze Nyankopɔn Tumfo! W’ahengua krɔn wɔ sor, na wo tum, na wo papayɛ na w’ehumbɔbɔr kata adasa nyinara a wɔwɔ asaase do; na osiandɛ ewɔ ehumbɔbɔr ntsi, eremma hɔn a wɔba wo nkyɛn no nnhera!

15 Na dɛm nsunsuando na m’egya kasae dze yii ne Nyame ayɛw, osiandɛ ne kra dzii dɛw, na n’akoma hyɛɛ mã, osian ndzɛmba a ohunii ntsi, nyew, ndzɛmba a Ewuradze eyi akyerɛ no ntsi.

16 Na afei emi, Nephi, merennkyerɛw ndzɛmba nyinara a m’egya akyerɛw no, osiandɛ ɔakyerɛw ndzɛmba pii a ohunii wɔ enyido-adzehu na adaaso mu; na ɔakyerɛw ndzɛmba pii so a ɔhyɛɛ ho nkɔm kyerɛɛ ne mba a merennka ne nyinara.

17 Mbom mebɛkyerɛw me bra mu nsɛm. Hwɛ, murutwitwa m’egya ne nkyerɛwee no do tsia wɔ mprɛtse a medze mankasa me nsa yɛe no do; dɛm ntsi, sɛ mutwa m’egya ne nkyerɛwee do tsia wie a nna mebɛkyerɛw mara so me bra mu nsɛm.

18 Dɛm ntsi, mebɛpɛ dɛ hom hu, dɛ Ewuradze yii anwanwadze pii kyerɛɛ m’egya Lehi ekyir no, nyew, dza ɔfa Jerusalem ne nsɛe ho no, hwɛ, ɔkɔr nkorɔfo no mu, na ɔhyɛɛ ase hyɛɛ nkɔm a ɔfa ndzɛmba a oehu na ɔatse ho.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ Jewfo no sii no atwetwe osian ndzɛmba a ɔgyee ho dase no ntsi; na nokwar, ɔkãa hɔn emumuyɛ na hɔn ebusudze ho nsɛm; na ɔgyee dase dɛ ndzɛmba a ohunii na ɔtsee, na ndzɛmba a ɔkenkanee wɔ nwoma no mu no, gye dase pefee wɔ Messiah ne mbae no ho, na wiadze no ɔpon so ho.

20 Na Jewfo no tsee dɛm nsɛm yi no hɔn bo fuuw no; nyew, dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze yɛɛ nkɔnhyɛfo adadafo no mpo, hɔn a wɔtoow hɔn kyenee, na wosiiw hɔn abo na wokum hɔn no; na hɔn so peer dɛ wobeyi no nkwa efi hɔ. Mbom hwɛ, emi, Nephi, mebɛkyerɛ hom dɛ Ewuradze n’adɔyɛ mbɔbɔrhu wɔ hɔ ma hɔn a ɔasan mu eyi hɔn no, osian hɔn gyedzi ntsi, na ɔbɛma hɔn ahoɔdzen a wɔdze fi ɔhaw mu.
1-ne 2:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lehi nye n’ebusua si mu kɔ sar no a ɔda Po Memen ne nkyɛn no do—Wogya hɔn egyapadze wɔ hɔ—Lehi bɔ afɔr ma Ewuradze na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ ne mbabanyin dɛ wondzi mbrasɛm no do—Laman na Lemuel hwinhwin hɔn egya—Nephi yɛ setsie na ɔbɔ mpaa wɔ gyedzi mu; Ewuradze kasa kyerɛ no, na wɔfa no dɛ ɔnhwɛ no nuanom no do. Bɛyɛ mfe 600 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze kasaa kyerɛɛ m’egya, nyew, wɔ adaaso mu, na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ no dɛ: Nhyira akã ɔwo Lehi, osian dza ayɛ ntsi; na osiandɛ edzi nokwar na ada ndzɛmba a mekãa kyerɛɛ wo no edzi akyerɛ ɔman yi ntsi, hwɛ, wɔrohwehwɛ eyi wo nkwa efi hɔ.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze hyɛɛ m’egya wɔ adaaso mu dɛ ɔmfa n’ebusua na womfi hɔ nkɔ sar no do.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔyɛɛ setsie maa Ewuradze n’asɛm, dɛm ntsi ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze hyɛɛ no no.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ ofii hɔ kɔr sar no do. Na ogyaa ne fie, na n’egyapadze asaase, na ne sika, na ne dwetɛ, na ne ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo, na ɔammfa biribiara kã n’ebusuafo, na edziban, na ntamadan ho, na ofii hɔ kɔr sar no do.

5 Na osianee baa Po Memen n’egya, na ɔdze faa sar no do wɔ bea a ɔbɛn Po Memen n’egya; na ɔnye n’ebusuafo tuu kwan wɔ sar no do, hɔn nye me nã Sariah, na mo nuanom mpanyimfo Laman, Lemuel, na Sam.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a wotuu kwan nda ebiasa wɔ sar no do no, osii ne ntamadan wɔ bɔnsa bi mu wɔ nsu esutsen bi nkyɛn.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔdze abo sii afɔrmbukyia na ɔbɔɔ afɔr maa Ewuradze na ɔdze ndaase maa Ewuradze hɛn Nyankopɔn.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔtoo esutsen no dzin, Laman, na n’ano bɔ Po Memen no mu; na mbɔnsa no nye nsu no bɔ ɔhye.

9 Na aber a m’egya hun dɛ nsu esutsen no ano bɔ Po Memen no mu no, ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Laman see dɛ: O nkyɛ ayɛ dɛ esutsen yi, na apem daa akɔ tsenenee nyina no nsunyiwa mu!

10 Na ɔkasaa so kyerɛɛ Lemuel dɛ: O nkyɛ ayɛ dɛ bɔnsa yi, egyina pintsinn na etsintsim na innkehihim da, na esie Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm no!

11 Ɔkãa iyi osian Laman na Lemuel hɔn akɔnkyesu ntsi; na hwɛ wohwinhwinii tsiaa hɔn egya wɔ ndzɛmba pii ho, osiandɛ ɔyɛ enyido-adzehu nyimpa ntsi, na oeyi hɔn efi Jerusalem asaase no do ma woegya hɔn egyapadze asaase, nye hɔn sika, nye hɔn dwetɛ, nye hɔn ndzɛmba a ɔsom hɔn bo, dɛ wɔrebɛhera wɔ sar no do. Na wɔkãa dɛ osian nkwasea nsusui a ɔyɛe wɔ n’akoma mu ntsi na aba no dɛm no.

12 Na ɔnam dɛ Laman na Lemuel yɛ mpanyimfo ntsi wohwinhwiin tsiaa hɔn egya. Na wohwinhwinii osiandɛ wonnyim Nyame no a ɔbɔɔ hɔn no n’akwan.

13 Eso wɔanngye enndzi dɛ Jerusalem, kuropɔn kɛse no, wɔbɛsɛɛ no dɛ mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛfo akã no. Na wɔyɛ hɔn adze dɛ Jewfo no a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no a wɔpeer dɛ wobeyi m’egya no nkwa efi hɔ no.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ m’egya kasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ tum mu wɔ Lemuel bɔnsa no mu, na Sunsum hyɛɛ no mã kesii dɛ hɔn nyimpadua wosowee wɔ n’enyim. Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn fɛr, na woenntum annkasa enntsia no; dɛm ntsi, wɔyɛɛ dza ɔhyɛɛ hɔn no.

15 Na m’egya tsenaa ntamadan mu.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ emi, Nephi, nna musuar koraa, naaso nna mo sõ, na eso minyaa pɛ kɛse bi dɛ mobohu Nyankopɔn n’esumasɛm, ntsi musũi frɛɛ Ewuradze; na hwɛ ɔbaa me nkyɛn, na ɔbɔdwedwee m’akoma ma megyee nsɛm nyinara a m’egya kãe no dzii; dɛm ntsi, manntsew no do etua dɛ ma mo nuanom no yɛe no.

17 Na mekasaa kyerɛɛ mo nua Sam ma ohun ndzɛmba a Ewuradze nam no Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn do ada no edzi akyerɛ me no. Na ɔgyee me nsɛm dzii.

18 Mbom hwɛ, Laman na Lemuel dze wɔanngye me nsɛm no enndzi; na ɔnam dɛ nna midzi yaw wɔ hɔn akoma a epirim no ntsi musũi frɛɛ Ewuradze maa hɔn.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze kasaa kyerɛɛ me, see dɛ: Nhyira nkã wo, Nephi, osian wo gyedzi ntsi, osiandɛ edze akoma a ɔyɛ botoo aper ahwehwɛ me enyiberdo.

20 Na susuampaara dɛ hom bɛda ho edzi me mbrasɛm do no, hom bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm, na wɔbɛgye hom akɔ anohoba asaase no do; nyew, asaase a mesiesie ama hom no do, nyew, asaase a ɔbɔ asaase nyinara do no.

21 Na susuampaara dɛ a wo nuanom no bɔkɔ do atsew etua wɔ wo do no, wobotwa hɔn efi Ewuradze enyim akyen.

22 Na susuampaara dɛ ebɛdaho edzi me mbrasɛm do no, wɔbɛyɛ wo ɔhwɛfo na kyerɛkyerɛnyi wɔ wo nuanom do.

23 Na hwɛ, da biara a wɔbɛtsew etua wɔ mo do no, medze ndom yaayaw bɛpaa hɔn, na worinnya tum wɔ w’asefo do gyedɛ hɔn so tsew etua wɔ mo do.

24 Na sɛ ɔba dɛ wɔtsew etua wɔ mo do a, wɔbɛyɛ abaa ahwe w’asefo, dze ekenyan hɔn ma wɔakaa m’akwan.
1-ne 3:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lehi ne mbabanyin no san hɔn ekyir kɔ Jerusalem dɛ wɔrekɛfa ayewa mprɛtse no—Laban ammpɛ dɛ ɔdze mprɛtse no ma—Nephi kasa kyerɛ no nuanom no na ɔhyɛ hɔn nkuran—Laban wia hɔn egyapadze na ɔpɛ dɛ nkyɛ oku hɔn—Laman na Lemuel bobɔ Nephi na Sam na ɔbɔfo kã hɔn enyim. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ emi, Nephi, menye Ewuradze kasae wiei no mesanee kɔr m’egya ne ntamadan no mu.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ: Hwɛ, maso daa, na daa no mu no, Ewuradze hyɛɛ me dɛ ɔwo nye wo nuanom no bɛsan hom ekyir akɔ Jerusalem.

3 Na hwɛ, Laban wɔ Jewfo ho abakɔsɛm na me nananom hɔn ebusuasantsen so, na woekrukye no wɔ ayewa mprɛtse do.

4 Dɛm ntsi, Ewuradze ahyɛ me dɛ ɔwo na wo nuanom no nkɔ Laban fie, nkɔhwehwɛ kyerɛwsɛm no, na hom mfa mbra sar yi do.

5 Na afei, hwɛ wo nuanom no ruhwinhwin se dɛ mebisa adze a ɔyɛ dzen efi hɔn hɔ, mbom hwɛ mimmbisaa biribi mmfii hɔn hɔ, na ɔyɛ mbrasɛm a ofi Ewuradze hɔ.

6 Dɛm ntsi, kɔ, me babanyin, na ibenya enyimnyam wɔ Ewuradze enyim, osiandɛ ɔwo ennhwinhwin.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ, emi Nephi, mekãa kyerɛɛ m’egya dɛ, mobɔkɔ akɛyɛ ndzɛmba a Ewuradze ahyɛ no, osiandɛ minyim dɛ Ewuradze mmfa mbrasɛm biara mma adasamba, gyedɛ oesiesie kwan ama hɔn a wɔnam do botum ayɛ dza ɔahyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ no.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ m’egya tsee dɛm nsɛm yi no n’enyi gyee mbordo, osiandɛ onyim dɛ Ewuradze ehyira me.

9 Na emi, Nephi, na mo nuanom no faa hɛn ntamadan na yɛhyɛɛ hɛn akwantu no ase wɔ sar no do dɛ yɛrokɔ Jerusalem asaase do.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a yɛbaa Jerusalem asaase do no, emi na mo nuanom dzii hɛnho ebisabisa nkorkor.

11 Na yɛtwee tonto hwɛɛ hɛn mu nyia ɔsɛ dɛ ɔkɔ Laban fie hɔ. Na ɔbaa dɛ tonto no bɔɔ Laman; na Laman kɔr Laban ne fie hɔ, na ɔnye no kasae wɔ aber a nna ɔtse ne fie hɔ.

12 Na obisaa Laban kyerɛwsɛm no a woekrukye no wɔ ayewa mprɛtse do no a ɔfa m’egya n’ebusuasantsen ho no.

13 Na hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ Laban no bo fuwii na oyii no edzi fii n’enyim, na ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔdze kyerɛwsɛm no ma no, dɛm ntsi, ɔsee no dɛ: Hwɛ, eyɛ odwotwafo ntsi muboku wo.

14 Mbom Laman guanee fii n’enyim, na ɔbɛkãa dza Laban ayɛ no kyerɛɛ hɛn. Na hɛn werɛ hyɛɛ ase howee; na mo nuanom no pɛɛ dɛ wɔsan hɔn ekyir kɔ m’egya nkyɛn wɔ sar no do.

15 Mbom hwɛ, mesee hɔn dɛ: Dɛ Ewuradze tse ase, na hɛn so yɛtse ase yi, yɛrennsan nnkɔ hɛn egya nkyɛn wɔ sar no do gyedɛ yɛayɛ dza Ewuradze ahyɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ no ana.

16 Dɛm ntsi hom mma yenya gyedzi na yendzi Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm no do; na hom mma yɛnkɔ hɛn egya n’egyapadze asaase no do, na hwɛ ogyaa sika na dwetɛ na ahodze ahorow pii. Na iyi nyinara ɔyɛɛ osian Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm ntsi.

17 Na onyim dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ Jerusalem osian dɔm no hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi.

18 Na hwɛ, wɔapow nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn nsɛm. Dɛm ntsi sɛ m’egya tsenaa asaase no do ber a wɔhyɛɛ no dɛ onguan mfi asaase no do ekyir no a, hwɛ, nkyɛ ɔno so bɛhera. Dɛm ntsi, oye dɛ oguanee fii asaase no do.

19 Na hwɛ, ɔtsen wɔ Nyame enyi do dɛ hɛn nsa kã kyerɛwsɛm yi, ama yɛakora hɛn egyanom hɔn kasaa do yie ama hɛn mba;

20 Na yɛakora nsɛm so a nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn dze hɔn ano kãe no, dza wɔnam Nyame no Sunsum na no tum do dze maa hɔn fitsi wiadze ahyɛse dze besi dɛm aber yi no.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm kasa a mekãe yi sakyeer mo nuanom adwen ma wonyaa gyedzi wɔ Nyame ne mbrasɛm no ho.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛkɔr hɛn egyapadze asaase no do na yɛkɔboaboaa hɛn sika, na hɛn dwetɛ, na hɛn ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo nyinara ano.

23 Na yɛboaboaa ndzɛmba yi ano wiei no, yɛkɔr Laban fie hɔ bio.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛkɔr Laban nkyɛn kebisaa no dɛ ɔmfa kyerɛwsɛm no a woekrukye no wɔ ayewa mprɛtse do no mma hɛn, na yɛdze hɛn sika, na hɛn dwetɛ, na hɛn ndzɛmba nyinara a ɔsom bo no bɛhyɛ ananmu.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Laban hun hɛn ahodze no dɛ ɔdɔɔ sõ no, n’enyi beree ma dɛm ntsi ɔpaam hɛn fii hɔ na ɔsomaa no nkowaa dɛ wombokunkum hɛn, ama oeenya kwan afa hɛn ahodze no.

26 Na ɔbaa dɛ yeguanee fii Laban no nkowaa no enyim ntsɛmara ma dɛm ntsi yegyaa hɛn ahodze no ma okedzii Laban nsamu.

27 Na ɔbaa dɛ yeguanee kɔr sar no do na Laban no nkowaa no annto hɛn na yekosumaa ɔbotan bi mu.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ Laman no bo fuuw me, nye m’egya so; na Lemuel so dɛmara; osiandɛ otsiee Laman ne nsɛm, dɛm ntsi Laman na Lemuel kasaa dzendzenndzen dze tsiaa hɛn a yɛyɛ hɔn nuanom nkakraba; na wɔdze hɔn poma mpo bor hɛn.

29 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔhwee hɛn mbaa no, hwɛ, Ewuradze no bɔfoe bae begyinaa hɔn enyim, na ɔkasae kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ: Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom hwe hom nua kakraba yi mbaa? Hom nnyim dɛ Ewuradze asan mu eyi no dɛ ɔmbɛyɛ ɔhwɛfo wɔ hom do, na iyi tse dɛm osian hom bɔn ntsi? Hwɛ hom bɔkɔ Jerusalem bio, na Ewuradze beyi Laban ahyɛ hom nsa.

30 Na ɔbɔfo no wiee kasa no ɔkɔree.

31 Na ber a ɔbɔfo no kɔree no, Laman na Lemuel hyɛɛ ase hwinhwinii see dɛ: Ɔbɛyɛ dɛn bɛyɛ na Ewuradze beyi Laban ahyɛ hɛn nsa? Hwɛ, ɔyɛ nyimpa a no ho yɛ dzen, na otum hwɛ eduonum do, nyew, obotum eku eduonum mpo; na hɛn?
1-ne 4:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi ku Laban dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze hyɛ no no na ɔfa kwan bi do ma ne nsa kã ayewa mprɛtse no—Zoram pen dɛ ɔbɛkã Lehi n’ebusuafo no ho wɔ sar no do. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ mo nuanom no dɛ: Hom mma yɛnsan nkɔ Jerusalem bio, na hom mma yenya gyedzi wɔ Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm no mu; na hwɛ ɔbɔ adze nyinara do, na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na no ho nnkɛyɛ dzen asen Laban na n’eduonum no, nyew anaadɛ ne mpempem?

2 Dɛm ntsi, hom mma yɛnkɔ; hom mma yenya ahoɔdzen dɛ Moses; na nokwar, ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ nsu a ɔwɔ Po Memen no mu no ma no mu paa ebien, kor wɔ afã na kor so wɔ afã, na hɛn egyanom duaa mu, wɔ asaase kɛsɛɛ do, fii ndɔmmum mu, na Pharoah no nsordaafo no kãa hɔn do na Po Memen no mu nsu meem hɔn.

3 Afei hwɛ, hom nyim dɛ iyi yɛ nokwar; na hom nyim so dɛ ɔbɔfo akasa akyerɛ hom; ebɛn ntsi na hom begye kyim? Hom mma yɛnkɔ; Ewuradze botum agye hɛn dɛ mbrɛ ɔgyee hɛn egyanom no, na ɔasɛɛ Laban dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze yɛɛ Egyptfo no.

4 Mekãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, hɔn bo fuwii na wɔkɔr do hwinhwinii, naaso wɔkãa mo do kodur dɛ yɛbaa Jerusalem afasu ekyir.

5 Nna adze asã; na memaa wosumaa afasu no ekyir. Na wosumaa hɔnho no, emi, Nephi, moweaweaa kɔr kurow kɛse no mu na misii mu dɛ morokɔ Laban ne fie.

6 Na Sunsum no gyaa me kɔr hɔ a nna minnyim dza merekɛyɛ.

7 Naaso mokɔr m’enyim, na ber a mebɛɛn Laban ne fie no, muhun banyin bi dɛ ɔda famu wɔ m’enyim na ɔabow.

8 Na mokɔr ne nkyɛn no muhun dɛ Laban a.

9 Na muhun ne nkrantsee, na motwee fii no bɔha mu; na bea a wosuo mu no yɛ sika mapa, na no ho edwindze so yɛ fɛw, na muhun dɛ n’ano no dadze a ɔsom bo ara yie na wɔdze yɛe.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ Sunsum no hyɛɛ me dɛ munku Laban; mbom mekãa wɔ m’akoma mu dɛ: mennkãa nyimpa no bɔgyaa nnguu da. Na mepeem adze na mammpɛ dɛ muboku no.

11 Na Sunsum no kasaa kyerɛɛ me bio dɛ: Hwɛ Ewuradze eyi no ahyɛ wo nsa. Nyew, na mo so minyim dɛ ɔpɛɛ dɛ oyi mankasa mo nkwa fi hɔ; nyew, na oenntsie Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm; na ɔafa hɛn ahodze so.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ Sunsum no kasaa kyerɛɛ me bio dɛ: Ku no, na Ewuradze eyi no ahyɛ wo nsa.

13 Hwɛ Ewuradze ku omumuyɛnyi ama ne nhyehyɛɛ tsenenee aada edzi. Oye dɛ nyimpa kor bɛhera sen dɛ ɔman bɔwodow wɔ gyedzi mu na wɔahera.

14 Na afei, ber a emi, Nephi, metsee dɛm nsɛm yi no, mekaa nsɛm a Ewuradze kãa kyerɛɛ me wɔ sar no do, dɛ: Susuampaara dɛ w’asefo bedzi me mbrasɛm do no, wɔbɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ anohoba asaase no do.

15 Nyew, na mo so modween dɛ worunntum nndzi Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm do dɛ mbrɛ Moses ne mbra tse, gyedɛ wonya mbra no ana.

16 Na minyim so dɛ mbra no woekrukye no wɔ ayewa mprɛtse do.

17 Na bio, minyim dɛ Ewuradze eyi Laban ahyɛ me nsa wɔ dɛm kwan yi do—ama me nsa aakã kyerɛwsɛm no dɛ mbrɛ ne mbrasɛm tse.

18 Dɛm ntsi, mitsiee Sunsum no ne ndze, na musuoo Laban ne tsinhwi mu, na medze nankasa ne nkrantsee twaa ne tsir fii do.

19 Na aber a medze nankasa ne nkrantsee twaa ne tsir fii do wiei no, mefaa ne ntar no na mehyɛe; nyew, ne nyina mpo, na medze n’akodze no bɔɔ m’asen do.

20 Na meyɛɛ iyi ekyir no, mokɔr Laban ne sikakorabea hɔ. Na aber a morokɔ Laban ne sikakorabea hɔ no, hwɛ, mohun Laban n’akowaa a sikakorabea no ne saafee wɔ no hɔ no. Na medze Laban ne ndze hyɛɛ no dɛ ɔnye me nkɔ sikakorabea hɔ.

21 Na osusuu dɛ meyɛ no wura Laban, osiandɛ ohun n’atar na ne nkrantsee dɛ ɔbɔ m’asen do.

22 Na ɔkãa Jewfo mpanyimfo ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ me, nna onyim dɛ no wura, Laban, akɔ hɔn nkyɛn anafua no.

23 Na mekasaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ Laban ara pɛr.

24 Na mekãa so kyerɛɛ no dɛ medze kyerɛwsɛm a woekrukye no wɔ ayewa mprɛtse do no rekɛma mo nuanom mpanyimfo no a wɔwɔ afasu no ekyir no.

25 Na mesee no so dɛ ɔnka mo do.

26 Na ɔno, osusuu dɛ merekã enuanom no a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu no ho nsɛm, na dɛ ampaara dɛ meyɛ dɛm Laban a mekum no no, dɛm ntsi ɔkãa mo do.

27 Na ɔkãa Jewfo mpanyimfo no ho nsɛm pii kyerɛɛ me wɔ ber a morokɔ mo nuanom no nkyɛn wɔ afasu no ekyir no.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ Laman hun me no n’akoma tuu kɛsenara, Lemuel na Sam so dɛmara. Na woguanee fii m’enyim kɔree; osiandɛ wosusũu dɛ ɔyɛ Laban, na dɛ woeku me na ɔrohwehwɛ hɔn so eyi hɔn nkwa efi hɔ.

29 Na ɔbaa dɛm no, mefrɛɛ hɔn na wɔtsee me ndze; no wogyaa dɛ woruguan efi m’enyim.

30 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Laban n’akowaa no hun mo nuanom no, no ho hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔropopo, na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ oruguan efi m’enyim asan n’ekyir akɔ Jerusalem kurow kɛse no mu.

31 Na afei, emi, Nephi, meyɛ nyimpa a mo sõ, na menya Ewuradze hɔ ahoɔdzen kɛse so, dɛm ntsi musuoo Laban n’akowaa no mu, na medze no gyinaa hɔ, amma oennguan.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ menye no kasaa, dɛ, sɛ otsie me nsɛm a, dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi, na mo so metse ase yi, dɛmara so na sɛ otsie hɛn nsɛm a, yɛdze no nkwa bɛkyɛ no.

33 Na mekasaa kyerɛɛ no, na midzii nsew mpo dɛ mma onnsuro; na sɛ ɔnye hɛn bɔkɔ sar no do a obenya ahotɔ dɛ hɛnara so.

34 Na mekasaa kyerɛɛ no bio dɛ: Nokwar, Ewuradze na ɔhyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ dɛm; ana ɔnnsɛ dɛ yedzi Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm do? Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ebɔkɔ m’egya nkyɛn wɔ sar no do a, ɔno ibenya tsenabew wɔ hɛn nkyɛn.

35 Na ɔbaa dɛ Zoram nyaa akokodur wɔ nsɛm a mekãa no ho. Zoram nye akowa no ne dzin; na ɔbɔɔ anohoba dɛ ɔbɔkɔ sar no do wɔ m’egya nkyɛn. Na odzii nsew so dɛ ɔnye hɛn bɛtsena, fitsi dɛm da no dze kɔ nyinara.

36 Na yɛpɛɛ dɛ ɔnye hɛn tsena wɔ dɛm saintsir yi ho ntsi amma Jewfo no ennhu dɛ yeguan kɔ sar no do, ɔno bɛyɛ na woetsiw hɛn na wɔabɛsɛɛ hɛn.

37 Na ɔbaa dɛ Zoram dzii nsew kyerɛɛ hɛn wiei no, hɛn suro wɔ noho bɔɔ adze.

38 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛfaa ayewa mprɛtse no na Laban n’akowaa no, na yesii mu kɔr sar no do, na yetuu kwan kɔr hɛn egya ne ntamadan no mu.
1-ne 5:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sariah kasa tsia Lehi—Hɔn nyina dzi ehurusi wɔ hɔn mbabanyin no sanee no ho—Wɔbɔ afɔr—Moses na nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn kyerɛwsɛm no wɔ ayewa mprɛtse no do—Mprɛtse no kyerɛ dɛ Lehi yɛ Joseph n’asenyi—Lehi hyɛ nkɔm wɔ n’asefo na mbrɛ wobesi akora mprɛtse no yie ho. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ yedur sar no do wɔ hɛn egya nkyɛn no, hwɛ, dɛw hyɛɛ no mã, na me nã Sariah so n’enyi gyee mbordo, osiandɛ nokwar nna oesi nkrum wɔ hɛn ntsi.

2 Nna ɔyɛ no dɛ yɛahera wɔ sar no do: na eso ɔakasa etsia m’egya dɛ ɔyɛ enyido-adzehu nyimpa, ɔse: Hwɛ afa hɛn efi hɛn egyapadze asaase do, na me mba nnyi hɔ bio, na ama yɛrehera wɔ sar yi do.

3 Na dɛm kasa yi na me nã kãa dze tsiaa m’egya.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛm no m’egya kãa kyerɛɛ no dɛ, minyim dɛ meyɛ enyido-adzehu nyimpa, na sɛ munnhun Nyankopɔn ne ndzɛmba wɔ enyido-adzehu mu a nkyɛ minnyim Nyame ne papayɛ; na mbom nkyɛ yɛda ho tse Jerusalem, na yɛnye enuanom no ahera.

5 Mbom hwɛ meenya anohoba asaase, iyi mu na midzi dɛw; nyew, na minyim dɛ Ewuradze bɛgye me mba no efi Laban nsamu na ɔdze hɔn abrɛ hɛn bio wɔ sar yi do.

6 Na dɛm kasa yi na m’egya, Lehi, dze kyekyee me nã Sariah no werɛ wɔ hɛnho wɔ ber a yetuu kwan fii sar no do kɔr Jerusalem asaase do dɛ yɛrekɛgye Jewfo ho abakɔsɛm no.

7 Na yɛsanee baa m’egya ne ntamadan mu no, hwɛ hɔn dɛw hyɛɛ mã, na me nã nyaa awerɛkyekyer.

8 Na ɔkasaa see dɛ: Afei na mehu dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar dɛ Ewuradze na ɔhyɛɛ mo kun dɛ onguan mbra sar yi do; nyew, na mehu so dɛ Ewuradze na ɔagye me mba yi efi Laban nsamu, na ɔama hɔn tum dɛ wɔmfa ndzi dwuma a Ewuradze ahyɛ hɔn no. Na dɛm nsɛm yi na ɔkãe.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn enyi gyee mbordo, na wɔbɔɔ afɔr, na ɔhyew-afɔr maa Ewuradze; na wɔdze ndaase maa Israel Nyankopɔn.

10 Na wɔdze ndaase maa Israel Nyankopɔn ekyir no, m’egya, Lehi, faa ayewa mprɛtse a woegu kyerɛwsɛm wɔ do no, na ɔhwehwɛɛ mu fii ahyɛse no.

11 Na ohun dɛ Moses nwoma enum no a ɔkyerɛ mbrɛ wosii bɔɔ wiadze, nye Adam na Eve a wɔyɛ hɛn awofo a wodzi kan no ho nsɛm wɔ do.

12 Afei Jewfo ho abakɔsɛm, fitsi Zedekiah, Judahfo hɔn hen ber a ɔhyɛɛ adzedzi ase mpo.

13 Na nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no so hɔn nkɔnhyɛ fitsi ahyɛse kesi ber a ɔhen Zedekiah hyɛɛ adzedzi ase; na nkɔnhyɛ pii so a ofi Jeremiah n’anomu so wɔ do.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ m’egya, Lehi, hun n’egya n’ebusuasantsen no so wɔ ayewa mprɛtse no do; dɛm ntsi ohun dɛ ɔyɛ Joseph n’asenyi; nyew, dɛm Joseph no a ɔyɛ Jacob ne babanyin no a wɔtɔɔn no kɔr Egypt, ɔno na Ewuradze dze ne nsa koraa no do ama oeetum akora n’egya Jacob na ne fifo amma wɔannhera wɔ ɔkɔm ntsi.

15 Na woyii hɔn so fii ndɔmmum mu fii Egypt asaase do a dɛm Nyame kor no ara so na ɔkoraa hɔn do.

16 Na dɛm na m’egya, Lehi, nam dze hun n’egyanom hɔn ebusuasantsen no. Na Laban so yɛ Joseph n’asenyi, dɛm ntsi na ɔno na n’egyanom dze kyerɛwsɛm no siei.

17 Na aber a m’egya hun dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyinara no, Sunsum hyɛɛ no mã, na ɔhyɛɛ ase hyɛɛ nkɔm a ɔfa n’asefo ho—

18 Dɛ, dɛm ayewa mprɛtse yi wɔ dɛ ɔkɔ aman, ebusuafo, kasa horow na nyimpa nyina a wɔyɛ n’asefo no hɔ.

19 Dɛm ntsi ɔkãa dɛ, dɛm ayewa mprɛtse yi onnyi dɛ ɔyew; nna onnyi so dɛ no ho bisiw dabiarada. Na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm pii a ɔfa n’asefo ho.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ mbertsentsen nyina no emi na m’egya yedzii mbrasɛm a Ewuradze dze hyɛɛ hɛn no do.

21 Na yenya kyerɛwsɛm no a Ewuradze hyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnkɛfa no na yɛpɛnsapɛnsaa mu na yehun dɛ oye; nyew, ɔsom bo kɛse mpo ma hɛn dɛm ntsi yɛfaa adwen yɛbɔkora Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm no do ama hɛn mba.

22 Dɛm ntsi ɔyɛ adze a ɔtsen a ofi Ewuradze hɔ dɛ yɛdze botu hɛn kwan wɔ sar no do akɔ asaase a wɔbɔɔ hɛn ho anohoba no do.
1-ne 6:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi kyerɛw ndzɛmba a ɔfa Nyankopɔn ho—Nephi no botae nye dɛ ɔbɛdan nkorɔfo ma wɔaba Abraham ne Nyankopɔn hɔ ma ɔagye hɔn nkwa. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei emi, Nephi, memmpɛ dɛ mekã m’egyanom hɔn ebusuasantsen ho nsɛm wɔ dza merekyerɛw wɔ ɔfã ha yi mu, na merennkyerɛw no dabiarada so wɔ mprɛtse a merekyerɛw yi do osiandɛ ɔwɔ kyerɛwsɛm no a m’egya dze esie no mu; dɛm ntsi na merennkyerɛw no wɔ dɛm nsɛm yi mu no.

2 Na ɔdɔɔ me sõ dɛ mebɛkã dɛ yɛyɛ Joseph n’asefo.

3 Na ɔmmfa mo ho dɛ nkyɛ mebɛkyerɛw dza ɔfa m’egya ho nyinara, na mbom ɔronnkɔ mprɛtse yinom do, na mbom mepɛ enya kwan wɔ do ama meetum akyerɛw nsɛm a ɔfa Nyankopɔn ho.

4 Mobotae kɛse ara nye dɛ mebɛkekã adasa aba Abraham ne Nyankopɔn, na Isaac ne Nyankopɔn, na Jacob ne Nyankopɔn hɔ ma wɔagye hɔn nkwa.

5 Dɛm ntsi mennkyerɛw ndzɛmba a ɔsɔ wiadze enyi na mbom ndzɛmba a ɔsɔ Nyankopɔn na hɔn a wɔnnyɛ wiadzemba enyi na mekyerɛw.

6 Dɛm ntsi mebɛhyɛ mbra ama m’asefo dɛ mma wɔnnkyerɛw ndzɛmba a no ho nnhia wɔ dɛm mprɛtse yi do mma adasamba.
1-ne 7:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lehi ne mbabanyin no san kɔ Jerusalem na wɔkɛfa Ishmael na ne fifo ma wɔbɛkã hɔnho wɔ hɔn akwantu mu—Laman na binom tsew etua—Nephi kasa kyerɛ no nuanom no dɛ wonya gyedzi wɔ Ewuradze mu—Wɔdze ntampehoma kyekyer no na wɔfa apam dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ no—Gyedzi no tum yi no fi mu—No nuanom no serɛ bɔnfakyɛ—Lehi na no nkorɔfo bɔ afɔr nye ɔhyew afɔr. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei mepɛ dɛ hom tse dɛ m’egya Lehi wiee no nkɔnhyɛ a ɔfa n’asefo ho no, ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze nye no kasaa bio dɛ onnye mma ɔno Lehi dɛ ɔnye n’ebusua nko bɔkɔ sar no do, mbom ɔsɛ dɛ ne mbabanyin no nhwehwɛ mbabaa nwar hɔn ama hɔn aba adɔr ama Ewuradze wɔ asaase a wɔbɔɔ ho anohoba kyerɛɛ hɔn no do.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze hyɛɛ no dɛ emi, Nephi, na mo nuanom no nsan nkɔ Jerusalem asaase no do bio nkɛfa Ishmael na n’ebusuafo nsian mbra sar no do.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ emi, Nephi, na mo nuanom no faa sar no do dɛ yɛrokɔ Jerusalem bio.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛkɔr Ishmael fie, na yenyaa enyimpa wɔ Ishmael n’enyim araa ma yetumii kãa Ewuradze ne nsɛm kyerɛɛ no.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze botoow Ishmael na ne fifo hɔn akoma ma dɛm ntsi wɔnye hɛn tuu kwan wɔ sar no do baa hɛn egya ne ntamadan no mu.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a yɛnam sar no do no, hwɛ, Laman na Lemuel na Ishmael ne mbabaa beenu na Ishmael ne mbabanyin beenu nye hɔn ebusuafo tseew etua wɔ hɛn do, nyew wɔtseew etua wɔ emi Nephi na Sam, na hɔn egya Ishmael, na ne yer na ne mbabaa baasa no do.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ etuatsew no mu no, wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔsan hɔn ekyir kɔ Jerusalem asaase do.

8 Na afei emi, Nephi, midzii awerɛhow kɛse maa hɔn wɔ hɔn akomadzen ntsi, dɛm ntsi mekasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn, nyew, kyerɛɛ Laman na Lemuel see dɛ: Hwɛ hom nye mo nuanom mpanyimfo, na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom akoma ayɛ dzen dɛm na hom adwen mu efura hom yi, dɛ hom ma kwan ma emi a meyɛ hom nua kakraba kasa kyerɛ hom, nyew na menyɛ fasusu ma hom?

9 Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom nntsie Ewuradze n’asɛm yi?

10 Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom werɛ efir dɛ hom ehu Ewuradze no bɔfoe yi?

11 Nyew, na ebɛnadze ntsi na hom werɛ efir ndzɛmba akɛse a Ewuradze ayɛ ama hɛn, dɛ ɔgyee hɛn fii Laban nsamu, na hɛn nsa so kãa kyerɛwsɛm no?

12 Nyew, na ebɛnadze ntsi na hom werɛ efir dɛ Ewuradze wɔ tum dɛ ɔyɛ adze nyina wɔ ne pɛ do dze ma adasamba, sɛ ɔba dɛ wonya gyedzi wɔ no mu a? Dɛm ntsi hom mma yenya gyedzi wɔ no mu.

13 Na sɛ yenya gyedzi wɔ no mu a hɛn nsa bɛkã asaase a ɔbɔɔ ho anohoba no; na mber bi bɛba a hom bohu dɛ Ewuradze n’asɛm a ɔfa Jerusalem ne nsɛɛ ho no aba mu; osiandɛ nsɛm nyina a Ewuradze akã a ɔfa Jerusalem ne nsɛɛ ho no bɛba mu.

14 Na hwɛ Ewuradze no Sunsum rennkyɛr na egyaa dɛ ɔnye hɔn bedzi aper; na hwɛ, wɔapow nkɔnhyɛfo no, na wɔdze Jeremiah ato efiadze. Na wɔpɛɛ dɛ woyi m’egya no nkwa fi hɔ, ma dɛm ntsi wɔapam no efi asaase no do.

15 Afei hwɛ, mese hom dɛ sɛ hom san kɔ Jerusalem a hom so hom nye hɔn bɛhera. Na afei, sɛ hom pɛ a hom nkɔ asaase no do, na hom nkaa nsɛm a makã akyerɛ hom yi, dɛ sɛ hom kɔ a hom so hom bɛhera na dɛm na Ewuradze no Sunsum hyɛ me dɛ menka.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a emi, Nephi, mekãa dɛm nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ mo nuanom ekyir no, hɔn bo fuuw me. Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔyeer me, na hwɛ nna hɔn bo efuw kɛse, dɛm ntsi wɔdze ntampehoma kyekyeer me, osiandɛ wɔpɛɛ dɛ woyi mo nkwa fi hɔ na wogya me wɔ sar no do hɔ ma mbowa abɔyafo dzi me nam.

17 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ, mobɔɔ mpaa maa Ewuradze see dɛ: O Ewuradze, dɛ mbrɛ me gyedzi a ɔwɔ wo mu tse no, nkyɛ agye me efi mo nuanom nsamu; nyew, nkyɛ ama me ahoɔdzen ma metum atsew ntampehoma a ɔkyekyer me yi mu.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ mekãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, hwɛ, ntampehoma no sianee fii me nsa na m’anan, na mosoɛree gyinaa mo nuanom no enyim na menye hɔn kasaa bio.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn bo fuuw me bio, na wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔyer me; mbom hwɛ, Ishmael ne mbabaa no mu kor, nyew, na ne nã so, na Ishmael ne mbabanyin no mu kor, paa mo nuanom no kyɛw araa ma hɔn bo dwee na wogyaa dɛ wɔbɔhwehwɛ mo nkwa eyi efi hɔ.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ afei wodzii yaw kɛse wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ no ntsi ma dɛm ntsi wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze wɔ m’enyim na wɔpaa me kyɛw dɛ memfa hɔn bɔn nkyɛ hɔn wɔ dza wɔyɛɛ tsiaa me no ntsi.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ nokwar, medze dza wɔdze ayɛ me no nyinara kyɛɛ hɔn, na mehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ nkyɛ wɔmbɔ mpaa mma Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ama ɔdze hɔn bɔn aakyɛ hɔn. Na ɔbaa dɛ afei wɔyɛɛ dɛm. Na wɔbɔɔ mpaa maa Ewuradze wiei no, yɛsɔɔw hɛn akwantu no do bio dɛ yɛrokɔ hɛn egya ne ntamadan no ho.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ yedur hɛn egya ne ntamadan no mu. Na ber a emi na mo nuanom na Ishmael na ne fifo nyinara baa m’egya ne ntamadan no mu no, wɔdze ndaase maa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, na wɔbɔɔ afɔr na ɔhyew afɔr maa no.
1-ne 8:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lehi hu enyido-adzehu a ɔfa nkwadua no ho—Odzi n’eduaba no bi na ɔhwehwɛ dɛ n’ebusuafo so bɛyɛ dɛmara—Ohu dadze poma, ɔkwan a ɔyɛ nkekãnkekã na ɔyɛ tseaba, nye sum kebii etwa nyimpa ho ehyia—Sariah, Nephi na Sam dzi eduaba no bi, mbom Laman na Lemuel powee. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛboaboaa eduaba n’aba ahorow pii ano, nye nduadzewa ahorow pii so aba ano.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a m’egya rotweɔn wɔ sar no do no ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ hɛn dɛ: hwɛ maso daa, anaaso dɛ mehu enyido-adzehu bi.

3 Na hwɛ, osian dza mehu ntsi, ɔsɛ dɛ midzi dɛw wɔ Ewuradze mu osian Nephi na Sam so ntsi; na mowɔ saintsir a ɔma mutum susu dɛ hɔn na hɔn asefo pii so benya nkwagye.

4 Mbom hwɛ, Laman na Lemuel, mowɔ suro kɛse bi ma hom na hwɛ ɔyɛ dɛ m’adaaso mu no muhun sar kɛsɛɛ tumm bi.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun ɔbarimba bi a ɔhyɛ atar fitaa bi, na ɔbaa begyinaa m’enyim.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ afei ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me na ɔsee me dɛ menka no do.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ, mekãa no do no, muhun dɛ mowɔ sar a no do yɛ hu na sum ahyɛ do mã mu.

8 Na menantseew ndɔnhwer pii wɔ sum mu no afei mehyɛɛ ase bɔɔ mpaa maa Ewuradze dɛ, osian n’ehumbɔbɔr pii no ntsi, onhu me mbɔbɔr.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ mobɔɔ mpaa maa Ewuradze ekyir no, muhun kwã petee kɛse bi.

10 Na afei muhun dua bi a n’eduaba yɛ akɔndɔ na obotum so ama nyimpa enyigye.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ mokɔr eduaba no ho kedzii bi: na muhun dɛ ɔyɛ dɛw papapanara sen nduaba a masɔ ahwɛ nyinara. Nyew na muhun dɛ eduaba no yɛ fitaa sen adze fitaa biara a mehu da.

12 Na midzii eduaba no, muhun dɛ enyigye kɛse bi ahyɛ me kra mã; dɛm ntsi mepɛɛ dɛ m’ebusua so dzi bi; na muhun dɛ ɔyɛ akɔndɔ sen eduaba biara.

13 Na aber a medze m’enyiwa kɔr aprɔw dɛ mubohu m’ebusua so no, muhun nsu esutsen; na ɔrepem wɔ dua no a miridzi n’eduaba no ho.

14 Na mohwɛɛ dɛ mubohu bea a ofi reba; na muhun ne tsir wɔ ekyir kakra; na ne tsir hɔ no muhun hom nã, Sariah na Sam na Nephi, na wogyinagyina hɔ dɛ gyama wonnyim bea a wɔrokɔ.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ motoo hɔn nsa na medze ndze kɛse kãa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbra me nkyɛn, na wombedzi eduaba no a ɔyɛ ahomka sen eduaba biara no bi.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔbaa me nkyɛn na hɔn so wobedzii bi.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ afei mepɛɛ dɛ Laman na Lemuel so bɛba ebedzi eduaba no bi; dɛm ntsi motoo m’enyiwa hwɛɛ esutsen no ne tsir no ho dɛ gyangyanbiara mubohu hɔn.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun hɔn na mbom nna wɔmmpɛ dɛ wɔba me nkyɛn bedzi eduaba no bi.

19 Na muhun dadze poma, na wɔatsen mu afa esutsen no n’egya dze akɛpem dua a migyina ho no.

20 Na afei so muhun kwan tseaba a no mu yɛ nkekãnkekã bi dɛ ɔda dadze poma no ho, dze abɛpem dua a migyina ho no; dze kɛpem bea a nsunyiwa no no ne tsir wɔ dze kɔto kwã kɛse petee bi a ɔtse dɛ wiadze bi mu.

21 Na muhun dɔmpepe bi a worunntum nnkan hɔn a hɔn mu dodowara nna wɔreper ba kan dɛ wobotum esi kwan a ɔdze ba dua a migyina ho no mu.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔperee bae na wobesii kwan no a wɔdze ba dua no ho no mu.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ sum ehubɔhubɔw bi hyɛe, nyew, sum ehubɔhubɔw kebii bi, ma dɛm ntsi hɔn a wobesii kwan no do no foom kwan no, wɔtɔɔ gon na wɔyewee.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun binom so a wɔreper ba kan, na wɔbaa kan bosuoo dadze poma no ano; na wɔperee faa sum kebii no mu dzedze dadze poma no mu ara kesii dɛ wɔbaa bedzii dua no n’eduaba no bi.

25 Na wodzii dua no n’eduaba no bi wiei no, wɔtotoo hɔn enyi dɛ mbrɛ fɛr akã hɔn.

26 Na mo so medze m’enyiwa kɔr aprɔw, na muhun wɔ nsu esutsen n’afã no ho dɛ dan kɛse pontonn bi, sensɛn wimu na ɔnnka asaase.

27 Na dɔm ahyɛ mu mã, mpanyimfo na mbofra, mbanyin na mbasiafo; na hɔn ntar yɛ fɛw dodow; na hɔn ndzeyɛɛ yɛ dɛ mbrɛ worisi atwetwe na wɔdze hɔn nsatseaba retsentsen hɔn a wɔaba na woridzi eduaba no bi no do.

28 Na wodzii eduaba no bi wiei no wɔfɛree, osian hɔn a worisi hɔn atwetwe no ntsi na wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɛfaa akwan a wɔabra hɔn ho no do na wɔyewee.

29 Na afei, emi Nephi, merennka m’egya ne nsɛm no nyinara.

30 Mbom, murutwa no tsia, na hwɛ, ohun dɔmpepe bi so a wɔreper ba kan; na wɔbaa bosuoo dadze poma no ano; na wɔpeer dɛ wɔbɛba kan, wosuoo dadze poma no mu dzendzenndzen, kesii dɛ wɔbaa kan, na wobotwaa hwee famu na wodzii dua no eduaba no bi.

31 Na afei so ohun dɔmtutu bi so a nna wɔreper hwehwɛ kwan akɔ dɛm dan kɛse pontonn no ho.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ nsunyiwa no bun no faa hɔn mu dodowara; na pii so na wɔyewee wɔ n’enyido koduaduaa akwan fofor mu.

33 Na pii kɛhɛɛn dɛm dan soronko no mu. Na afei wɔkɛhɛɛn dan no mu no, wɔtsentseen hɔn enyimtsia nsatseaba wɔ emi nye hɔn a woridzi eduaba no do; naaso yɛannkasa hɔn ho.

34 M’egya ne nsɛm a ɔkãa nye dɛ: Na dodow a wɔkasaa hɔnho no wɔhwee ase.

35 Na Laman na Lemuel enndzi eduaba no bi, dɛm na m’egya kãe.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a m’egya kãa n’adaaso anaaso n’enyido-adzehu no mu nsɛm nyina wiei no, ɔsee hɛn dɛ osian ndzɛmba yi a ohunii wɔ n’enyido-adzehu no mu no, nna ɔmaa suro kɛse kãa no wɔ Laman nye Lemuel ho no: nyew, osuroo dɛ bɛyɛ na woeyi hɔn tokyen wɔ Ewuradze enyim.

37 Na ɔdze abadaa biara a ɔbaatan biara wɔ no tuu hɔn fo, ɔsee hɔn dɛ wombetsie n’asɛm, kyerɛ dɛ Ewuradze bohu hɔn mbɔbɔr, na oenntwa hɔn annkyen; nyew, m’egya kãa nsɛmpa kyerɛɛ hɔn.

38 Na ɔkãa nsɛmpa kyerɛɛ hɔn na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn nkɔm so wɔ ndzɛmba pii ho wiei no, ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wondzi Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm do; na ogyaa dɛ ɔbɛkasa akyerɛ hɔn.
1-ne 9:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi yɛ mprɛtse ahorow ebien—Kor biara dzin dze Nephi ne mprɛtse—Hɔn wiadzedze ho abakɔsɛm na ɔwɔ mprɛtse akɛse no do; na nyamesom ho nkyekyeree so wɔ nkakraba no do. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ndzɛmba yi nyinara na m’egya hunii, na ɔtsee na ɔkãe, ber a ɔtse ne ntamadan no mu no, wɔ Lemuel bɔnsa no mu, na ndzɛmba pii so a murunntum nnkyerɛw wɔ mprɛtse yi do.

2 Na afei dɛ mbrɛ makã wɔ mprɛtse yi ho no hwɛ ɔnnyɛ mprɛtse no a makyerɛw mo nkorɔfo hɔn abakɔsɛm nyina wɔ do; na dɛm mprɛtse no a makyerɛw mo nkorɔfo ho nsɛm wɔ do no mato no dzin Nephi, dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛ no Nephi mprɛtse, medze mankasa me dzin ato do; na dɛm mprɛtse yi so wɔfrɛ no Nephi mprɛtse.

3 Na menya Ewuradze hɔ mbrasɛm dɛ menyɛ dɛm mprɛtse yi wɔ botae soronko ho ama meekrukye nsɛm a ɔfa mo nkorɔfo hɔn ɔsomdwuma ho wɔ do.

4 Mprɛtse afofor bi so do no wobokrukye nsɛm a ɔfa ahemfo hɔn ahendzi ho nye akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi a osii mo nkorɔfo hɔn mu no wɔ do; dɛm ntsi, dɛm mprɛtse yi do nsɛm no dodowara fa ɔsomdwuma ho; na mprɛtse nkaa no so mu nsɛm dodowara fa ahemfo hɔn ahendzi nye akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi a osii mo nkorɔfo hɔn mu ho.

5 Dɛm ntsi na Ewuradze ahyɛ me dɛ menyɛ dɛm mprɛtse yi wɔ noara ne nyansaa botae do a dɛm kwan no minnyim.

6 Mbom Ewuradze dze onyim adze nyinara fitsi ahyɛse; dɛm ntsi osiesie kwan a wɔdze yɛ no ndwuma nyinara wɔ adasamba mu; na hwɛ, ɔwɔ tum nyinara dɛ ɔma ne nsɛm nyinara hyɛ mã. Na dɛm na ɔtse. Amen.
1-ne 10:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lehi hyɛ nkɔm dɛ Babylonfo bɛfa Jewfo ndɔmmum—Ɔkã Messiah, Agyenkwa, Ɔpomfo no a obefi Jewfo mu epue no ho asɛm—Lehi kã nyia otwar dɛ onuma Nyame Eguambaa no so ne mbaa ho asɛm—Lehi kã Messiah no no wu na no wusoɛr ho asɛm—Ɔdze Israelmba a wɔbɔbɔ hɔn apetse na wɔbɛkã hɔn aboa ano no to ngodua ho—Nephi kã Nyankopɔn ne Ba, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze, na mbrɛ tseneneeyɛ ho si hia ho asɛm. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, emi Nephi, mahyɛ ase rekyerɛw mprɛtse yinom no do ndzɛmba a osii wɔ m’ahendzi na me ɔsomdwuma; dɛm ntsi ansaana mebɛkyerɛw me nsɛm no, ɔsɛ dɛ mekã biribi a ɔfa m’egya na mo nuanom so ho.

2 Na hwɛ ɔbaa dɛ aber a m’egya wiee ne kasaa a ɔfa n’adaaso ho, na afotu pa a ɔdze maa hɔn no, ɔkãa Jewfo hɔn ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn.

3 Dɛ sɛ wɔsɛɛ hɔn nye Jerusalem kuropɔn no wie a wɔbɔsoa hɔn mu dodowara akɔ ndɔmmum mu wɔ Babylon; dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze noara ne mber a ɔahyɛ no tse no, wɔbɛsan aba bio, nyew, wobeyi hɔn efi ndɔmmum mu aba; na sɛ wonya dze hɔn fi ndɔmmum mu ba a hɔn nsa bɛkã hɔn egyapadze asaase no bio.

4 Nyew, ofitsi mfe ahaesia ekyir a m’egya fii Jerusalem no mpo; Ewuradze Nyankopɔn beyi nkɔnhyɛnyi efi Jewfo mu—Messiah mpo a, anaa dɛ, wiadze Agyenkwa.

5 Na ɔkasaa so faa nkɔnhyɛfo no ho, mbrɛ hɔn mu dodowara agye dase wɔ ndzɛmba a ɔfa dɛm Messiah yi ho, ɔno a ɔakã no ho nsɛm, anaadɛ dɛm wiadze Pomfo yi.

6 Dɛm ntsi adasamba nyinara ayew na wɔahwehwe ase, na sɛ wobenya nkwagye a ɔno ɔsɛ dɛ wɔtwer dɛm Ɔpomfo yi.

7 Na ɔkasaa so faa nkɔnhyɛnyi bi a obedzi Messiah no enyim ebesiesie Ewuradze n’akwan mu.

8 Nyew, koraa mpo dɛ ɔbɔkɔ sar no do akɛtseatsea mu dɛ: Hom nsiesie Ewuradze n’akwan, na wɔmma n’atsempɔn ntsentsen osiandɛ obi gyina hom finimfin ha a hom nnyim no; na ɔwɔ tum sen me, na no nsokota ho ahoma mennsɛ dɛ mesan mpo. Na pii na m’egya kãe a ɔfa iyinom ho.

9 Na m’egya see dɛ wobonuma wɔ Bethabara, wɔ Jordan egya, na ɔkãa bio dɛ wɔdze nsu bonuma no; na koraa mpo dɛ wɔdze nsu bonuma Messiah no.

10 Na wɔdze nsu enuma Messiah no ekyir no, obohu na ɔagye dase dɛ woeenuma Nyame Eguambaa no; nyia obeyi wiadze bɔn akɔ no.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ m’egya kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ mo nuanom no wɔ dza ɔfa Asɛmpa no a wɔbɔkɔ akɛkã akyerɛ Jewfo no, na afei so dza ɔfa no Jewfo no wodow a wɔbɔwodow wɔ hɔn gyedzi mu. Na ekyir woeku Messiah no a ɔbɛba no na no wu ekyir no ɔbɔsoɛr efi ewufo mu, na ɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no do bɛda noho edzi akyerɛ Amanamamfo.

12 Nyew, m’egya kãa nsɛm pii mpo a ɔfa Amanamamfo ho, na dza ɔfa Israel fifo so ho, dɛ wɔdze hɔn bɔto ngodua ho, dɛ n’abaw bɛpan na wɔapetse asaase nyinara enyi.

13 Dɛm ntsi, ɔkãa dɛ obehia dɛ yɛyɛ kor na wɔgye hɛn kɔ anohoba asaase no do, ama Ewuradze n’asɛm aahyɛ mã, dɛ yɛbɛpetse asaase nyinara enyi.

14 Na Israel fifo no apetse ekyir no, wɔbɛsan aboaboa hɔn ano bio; anaa no korakora, dɛ Amanamamfo nsa akã Asɛmpa n’amahyɛ ekyir no, ngodua n’abaw pa no, anaa dɛ Israel fifo hɔn ahyɛ mu nkaasefo no wɔbɛgye hɔn ahyɛ mu, anaaso wobohu nokwar Messiah, hɔn Ewuradze na hɔn Pomfo no.

15 Na dɛm nsɛm yi na m’egya dze hyɛɛ nkɔm na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ mo nuanom no, na nsɛm pii so a mannkyerɛw wɔ nwoma yi mu; na makyerɛw no mu dodowara a mohwɛ a oye ma me wɔ mo nwoma kor no mu.

16 Na dza makã ho nsɛm yi nyinara, sii ber a m’egya tse ne ntamadan mu wɔ Lemuel bɔnsa no mu no.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ emi, Nephi, metsee nsɛm a m’egya kãe a ɔfa ndzɛmba a ohun wɔ enyido-adzehu mu nye nsɛm so a ɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum do kãe; tum a ɔnam gyedzi a onyae wɔ Nyankopɔn ne Ba no mu—na Nyankopɔn ne Ba no nye Messiah no a ɔbɛba no—Emi, Nephi, so mepɛɛ dɛ mubohu na matse na menam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum do ehu ndzɛmba yi a ɔyɛ Nyame n’akyɛdze dze ma hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ no enyiberdo, wɔ tsetseberdo na mber so a obeyi noho akyerɛ adasamba.

18 Na ɔtse dɛm ndeda, ndɛ na afebɔɔ, na woesiesie kwan no ato hɔ ama adasa fitsi wiadze ne fapem, sɛ ɔba no dɛ wonu hɔnho na wɔba ne nkyɛn a.

19 Na hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ enyiberdo no wobohu; na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum no bɛda Nyame n’esumasɛm edzi akyerɛ hɔn wɔ mber yi mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no tsetseberdo no; na dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no tsetseberdo no dɛmara so na ɔbɛyɛ wɔ mber a ɔreba no mu, dɛm ntsi Ewuradze n’akwan yɛ kor na ɔkɔ aprɔw onnyiewiei.

20 Dɛm ntsi kaa, O ɔdasanyi, dɛ wo ndwuma nyina mu no wɔdze wo bɛba ebobu wo atsɛn.

21 Dɛm ntsi, sɛ epɛɛ dɛ ebɛyɛ emumuyɛdze wɔ wo nsɔhwɛber yi mu a, nna woho renntsew wɔ Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu egua no enyim; na adze a no ho nntsew biara runntum nye Nyankopɔn nntsena; dɛm ntsi, otwar dɛ wotwa wo kyen afebɔɔ.

22 Na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ma me tum dɛ menkã dɛm nsɛm yi na mma minnsiw do.
1-ne 11:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi hu Ewuradze no Sunsum na onya nkwadua no ho enyido-adzehu—Ohu Nyankopɔn ne Ba no ne nã nye mbrɛ Nyankopɔn si kotow—Ohu Nyame Eguambaa no n’enuma, ne somdwumadzi na ne mbeamudua mu bɔ—Ohu Eguambaa no n’Asomafo Duebien no hɔn frɛ na hɔn som dwuma. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ ekyir yi a minyaa pɛ dɛ muhu ndzɛmba a m’egya hunii no; na minyaa gyedzi dɛ Ewuradze botum ada no edzi akyerɛ me; aber a metse hɔ rodwendwen ho wɔ m’akoma mu no, Ewuradze no Sunsum hwiim me kɔree, nyew ɔdze me kɔr bepɔw tsentsen bi a munnhun ne saso na m’anan so nsii bi do da do.

2 Na Sunsum no see me dɛ: Hwɛ, ebɛnadze na erohwehwɛ?

3 Na mesee dɛ mepɛ dɛ muhu dza m’egya hunii no.

4 Na Sunsum no see me dɛ ana egye dzi dɛ w’egya hun dua no a ɔakã ho asɛm no?

5 Na mesee dɛ: Hwɛ ɔwoara inyim dɛ megye m’egya ne nsɛm nyinara dzi.

6 Na ber a mekãa dɛm nsɛm yi no, Sunsum no dze ndze kɛse tseaa mu see dɛ: Hosanna nkã Ewuradze, ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn; osiandɛ Ɔno nye Nyame wɔ asaase nyinara do, nyew, ɔbɔ adze nyinara do. Na nhyira akã ɔwo, Nephi, osiandɛ egye ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn ne Ba no dzi; dɛm ntsi, ibohu ndzɛmba a erohwehwɛ no.

7 Na hwɛ wɔdze dɛm sɛnkyerɛdze yi bɛma wo, dɛ ehu dua no a ɔsow eduaba no a w’egya dzii no, ibohu nyimpa bi a ofi sor risian, na no ho na ebɛgye dase; na agye no ho dase ewie no, akyerɛw ato hɔ dɛ ɔno nye Nyankopɔn ne Ba.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ Sunsum no see me dɛ: Hwɛ! Na mohwɛe na muhun dua no; na ɔtse dɛ dua no a m’egya hunii no; na ne fɛw wɔnnka, nyew, ɔsen adze fɛɛfɛw biara; na ɔyɛ fitaayɛ bor esukwankyɛba ne fitaayɛ koraa.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a muhun dua no ekyir no mesee Sunsum no dɛ: Mehu dɛ edze dua no a ɔsombo kyɛn adze nyinara no akyerɛ me.

10 Na ɔsee me dɛ: Ebɛnadze na erohwehwɛ?

11 Na mesee no dɛ: Nkyɛ meehu dɛm adze yi ne nkyerɛase—na mekasaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa rekasa; osiandɛ muhun dɛ ɔwɔ nyimpadua su; naaso nna minyim dɛ ɔyɛ Ewuradze no Sunsum; na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa kasa kyerɛ ne nyɛnko.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔsee me dɛ: Hwɛ! na meyɛɛ dɛ morohwɛ no, na mennhu no; nna ɔayew wɔ m’enyi do.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ mohwɛe na muhun Jerusalem kuropɔn no na nkuropɔn binom so. Na muhun Nazareth kuropɔn no; na Nazareth kuropɔn no mu no muhun ɔbaabun bi a no ho yɛ fɛw na ɔyɛ fitaa so.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun dɛ ɔsorsor ebue; na sor ɔbɔfo siaan famu begyinaa m’enyim; na ɔsee me dɛ: Nephi, ebɛnadze na ehu yi?

15 Na mesee no dɛ: Ɔbaabun a, na no ho yɛ fɛw sen mbaabun nyinara.

16 Na ɔsee me dɛ: Ana inyim mbrɛ Nyankopɔn si kotow?

17 Na mesee no dɛ: Minyim dɛ ɔdɔ ne mba; na mbom minnyim ndzɛmba nyinara ase.

18 Na ɔsee me dɛ: Hwɛ, ɔbaabun no a ihun no no yɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba ne nã wɔ honam afamu.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun dɛ Sunsum no dze no kɔ; na aber a Sunsum no dze no kɔree ekyir ma mber kakra guu mu no, sor ɔbɔfo no kasaa kyerɛɛ me, see dɛ: Hwɛ!

20 Na mohwɛe na muhun ɔbaabun no bio, na otur abofra wɔ n’abaw mu.

21 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ Nyame Eguambaa, nyew, Onnyiewiei Egya ne Ba no! Ana dua no a w’egya hunii no inyim ase?

22 Na miyii no ano see dɛ: Nyew, ɔyɛ Nyame no dɔ no a ɔhɛnhɛn adasamba akoma mu no; dɛm ntsi ɔyɛ adze pa a ɔsom bo kyɛn adze nyinara.

23 Na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me see dɛ: Nyew, na ɔma ɔkra enyigye mbordo.

24 Na ɔkãa dɛm nsɛm yi ekyir no, ɔsee me dɛ: Hwɛ! Na mohwɛe, na muhun Nyankopɔn ne Ba no dɛ orisian adasamba mu; na muhun dɛ dodowara etwa ahwe n’ananadze na wɔrosom no.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun dɛ dadze poma no a m’egya hunii no yɛ Nyame n’asɛm a ɔkɔbɔ nkwa nsunyiwa no mu, anaaso n’ano pem nkwadua no a dɛm nsu no gyina hɔ ma Nyame no dɔ no; na muhunii so dɛ nkwadua no gyina hɔ ma Nyame no dɔ.

26 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me bio dɛ: Hwɛ na hu mbrɛ Nyankopɔn si kotow!

27 Na mohwɛe na muhun wiadze Pomfo no, nyia m’egya akã noho asɛm no; na afei so muhun nkɔnhyɛnyi no a ɔrebɛba ebesiesie n’akwan no. Na Nyame Eguambaa no kɔree ma onumaa no; na onumaa no wiei no, muhun dɛ sor ebue, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no fi sor ba besi no do wɔ ebubur su do.

28 Na muhun dɛ ɔnam nyimpa no mu resom hɔn wɔ tum nye enyimnyam kɛse mu; na dɔm pii etwa no ho ehyia ritsie no; na muhun dɛ woeyi no edzi efi hɔn mu.

29 Na muhun afofor duebien bi so a wodzi n’ekyir. Na ɔbaa dɛ Sunsum no bɛfaa hɔn fii m’enyido kɔree. Na mennhu hɔn bio.

30 Na ɔbaa dɛ sor ɔbɔfo no kasaa kyerɛɛ me bio, see dɛ: Hwɛ! na mohwɛe, na muhun dɛ sor ebue bio, na muhun sor abɔfo dɛ worisian ba adasamba do; na wɔsoom hɔn.

31 Na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me bio dɛ: Hwɛ! Na mohwɛe na muhun Nyame Eguambaa no dɛ orisian adasamba mu. Na muhun dɔm pii a wɔyar, na hɔn a yarba ahorow, na mbɔnsam na esunsum fĩ rehaw hɔn; na sor ɔbɔfo no kasae na ɔdaa iyi nyinara edzi kyerɛɛ me. Na Nyame Eguambaa no tum no saa hɔn yarba; na wotuu mbɔnsam na sunsum fĩ nyinara fii hɔn mu.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ sor ɔbɔfo no kasaa kyerɛɛ me bio dɛ: Hwɛ! Na mohwɛe na muhun Nyame Eguambaa no, dɛ dɔm no akyer no; nyew, Nyame a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem ne Ba no, wiadze buu no atsɛn; na muhunii na midzii ho dase.

33 Na emi, Nephi, muhun dɛ wɔama no do asɛn mbeamudua do na woeku no ama wiadze bɔn.

34 Na wokum no wiei no, muhun asaase no do dɔmtutuw dɛ wɔaboa hɔn ano dɛ wɔrokõ tsia Eguambaa n’asomafo no; na dɛm na Ewuradze no sor ɔbɔfo no dze frɛɛ duebien no.

35 Na asaase no do dɔmtutuw no boaboaa hɔn ano; na muhun dɛ wɔwɔ dan kɛse pontonn bi mu, tse dɛ dan no a m’egya hunii no Na Ewuradze no sor ɔbɔfo no kasaa kyerɛɛ me bio dɛ: Hwɛ wiadze na no mu nyansa nyinara; nyew, hwɛ Israel fifo aboaboa hɔn ano dɛ wɔrobɔkõ etsia Eguambaa n’asomafo duebien no.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhunii na midzii ho dase dɛ dan kɛse pontonn no yɛ wiadze ahantan; na ɔhwee ase, na n’asehwe no yɛɛ kɛse. Na Ewuradze no sor ɔbɔfo no kasaa kyerɛɛ me bio dɛ: Dɛm na wɔbɛsɛɛ aman, ebusuafo nyina, kasa horow, na nyimpa a wɔbɔkõ etsia Eguambaa n’asomafo duebien no.
1-ne 12:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi hu enyido-adzehu wɔ anohoba asaase ho; ndzeyɛtsenenee, emumuyɛ, na no mu mba hɔn asehwe; Nyame Eguambaa no ne mbaa wɔ hɔn mu; kwan a Esuafo Duebien no nye Asomafo Duebien no bɛfa do ebu Israel atsɛn; mbrɛ hɔn a wɔbɔwodow wɔ gyedzi mu no hɔn efi fi dze gyinabew bɛyɛ. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ, na hu w’asefo, na wo nuanom so hɔn asefo. Na mohwɛe, na muhun anohoba asaase no; na muhun dɔmtutuw, nyew, na hɔn dodow dɔɔ sõ dɛ mpoano anhwea.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun dɔmtutuw dɛ wɔaboa hɔn ano roko tsia hɔnho; na muhun ɔkõ na metsee akõkoekõ nka na ewudzi pii a wɔdze afona dzii wɔ mo nkorɔfo no mu.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun ebusuasantsen pii a woetwa mu kɔ, ɔnam akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi a ɔwɔ asaase no do ntsi; na muhun nkurow pii, nyew, menntum annkan hɔn dodow mpo.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun sum ehubɔwhubɔw wɔ anohoba asaase no enyi; na muhun asenaman, na metsee wimu mpaapaamu na asaasewosow na dede huuhu pii nka; na muhun asaase na mbotan a apaapaa; na muhun akoko dɛ worudwurudwuruw gu; na muhun asaase dɛ apaapaa; na muhun nkuropɔn pii a amemem; na muhun pii a gya ahyew hɔn; na muhun pii so a asaasewosow ntsi edwurudwuruw egu asaase do.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun iyinom ekyir no, muhun sum ehubɔhubɔw dɛ ofi asaase enyi kɔ; na hwɛ, muhun dɔmtutuw a wɔannhwehwe ase osian Ewuradze n’atsɛmbu kɛse huhu no ntsi.

6 Na muhun dɛ sor ebue; na Nyame Eguambaa no fi sor risian; na ɔbaa famu beyii noho kyerɛɛ hɔn.

7 Na muhunii na midzii dase dɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tɔɔ duebien bi so do; na Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ hɔn asɔfo na oyii hɔn.

8 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ Eguambaa n’esuafo duebien, hɔn na wɔasan mu eyi hɔn dɛ wɔmbɔsom w’asefo.

9 Na ɔsee me dɛ: Ana ekaa Eguambaa n’asomafo duebien no? Hwɛ hɔn na wobobu Israel ebusuakuw duebien no atsɛn; dɛm ntsi wobobu w’asefo asɔfo duebien no atsɛn; osiandɛ hom yɛ Israel fifo.

10 Na dɛm asomfo duebien a ehu hɔn yinom na wobobu w’asefo atsɛn. Na hwɛ, wɔyɛ atseneneefo afebɔɔ; ɔnam hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ Nyame Eguambaa no mu ntsi wɔahor hɔn ntar ma ayɛ fitaa wɔ no bɔgyaa mu.

11 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ! Na mohwɛe, na muhun ebusuasantsen ebiasa a etwa mu kɔ wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu no; na hɔn ntar yɛ fitaa tse dɛ Nyame Eguambaa nedze no. Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Wɔayɛ iyinom fitaa wɔ Nyame Eguambaa no bɔgyaa no mu, osian hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ no mu ntsi.

12 Na emi, Nephi, so muhun ebusuasantsen a ɔtɔ do anan no mu dɔm pii a woetwa mu kɔ wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun asaase no do dɔmtutuw a wɔaboa hɔn ano.

14 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ w’asefo, na wo nuanom so hɔn asefo.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ mohwɛe na muhun m’asefo dɔm pii dɛ wɔaboa hɔn ano na woetsia mo nuanom hɔn asefo no; na wɔaboaboa hɔn ano dɛ wɔrobɔkõ.

16 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ, nsunyiwa fĩfĩ no a w’egya hunii no nye no; nyew, esutsen no a ɔkãa ho asɛm no; na no bun nye hɛl no bun.

17 Na sum ehubɔhubɔw no yɛ abɔnsam nsɔhwɛ a ofura enyiwa, na ɔdze pirim adasamba hɔn akoma, na ogya hɔn fa kwan tɛtɛr mu ma wɔhera na wɔyew.

18 Na dan kɛse pontonn no a w’egya hunii no, yɛ esusuhun na adasamba hɔn ahantanyɛ. Bun kɛse bi da hɔn ntamu; nyew, Onnyiewiei Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛr na Messiah no a ɔyɛ Nyame Eguambaa no a Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn gye noho dase fitsi wiadze ahyɛse dze besi ndɛ, na ofitsi dɛm aber yi na afebɔɔ.

19 Na aber a sor ɔbɔfo no kãa nsɛm yi no, mohwɛe na muhun dɛ mo nuanom hɔn asefo no nye m’asefo no ridzi esi dɛ mbrɛ sor ɔbɔfo no n’asɛm tse; na osian m’asefo hɔn ahantanyɛ, na abɔnsam no nsɔhwɛ ntsi, muhun dɛ mo nuanom hɔn asefo no ahyɛ m’asefo no do.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ mohwɛe na muhun dɛ mo nuanom hɔn asefo no edzi m’asefo no do konyim; na dɔmtutuw no kɛhyɛɛ asaase enyi mã.

21 Na muhun dɔmtutuw no dɛ wɔaboa hɔn ano; na muhun ɔkõ na metsee akõkoekõ nkã wɔ hɔn mu; na akodzi nye akõkoekõ nkã a metsee ekyir no, muhun dɛ ebusuasantsen pii etwa mu kɔ.

22 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ iyinom nyinara bɔwodow wɔ gyedzi mu.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ ekyir no a muhun dɛ wɔawodow wɔ gyedzi mu no wobirii, yɛɛ nkɔwkɔw, na nyimpa a wɔpɛ fĩ, na enyihaw na ebusudze ahorow ahyɛ hɔn mã.
1-ne 13:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi hu enyido-adzehu dɛ wɔakyekyer abɔnsam n’asɔr wɔ Amanamamfo no mu, America no mpuedo, Bible ne mbea bi a ɔyɛ pefee na ɔsom bo pii yew, amanamamfo no yew gyedzi, asɛmpa ne nkenyanee, da a odzi ekyir kyerɛwsɛm ne mbaa nye Zion ne nkyekyeree. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ! Na mohwɛe na muhun amanaman nye ahenman pii.

2 Na sor ɔbɔfo no bisaa me dɛ: Ebɛnadze na ihu yi? Na mesee dɛ: Muhu amanaman nye ahenman pii.

3 Na ɔsee me dɛ: Iyi nye amanaman nye Amanamamfo hɔn ahenman.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun wɔ Amanamamfo no aman mu asɔr kɛse bi ne nkyekyeree.

5 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ asɔr a ɔyɛ mbusudze kyɛn asɔrasɔr nyinara mu no ne fapem, dza okum Nyame n’ahotseweefo, nyew, na ɔyɛɛ hɔn ayakayakadze, na ɔkyekyeer hɔn, na ɔdze dadze kɔndua totoo hɔn twee hɔn kɔr ndɔmmum mu.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun dɛm mbusu asɔr kɛse no, muhun dɛ abɔnsam nye ne fapem.

7 Na muhun sika, na dwetɛ, na nserekye, na atam amemen fɛɛfɛw, nye awentam fɛɛfɛw, na atam a ɔsombo so; na muhun ndwamambɔfo pii.

8 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ sika, na dwetɛ, na nserekye, na atam amemen fɛɛfɛw na awentam fɛɛfɛw, na atam a ɔsom bo, na ndwamambɔfo na dɛm mbusu asɔr kɛse yi kɔn dɔ.

9 Na wiadze enyimnyam a wɔrohwehwɛ ntsi wɔsɛɛ Nyame n’ahotseweefo na wɔnye hɔn ba ndɔmmum mu.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ mohwɛe na muhun esu pii; na wɔpaa Amanamamfo no fii mo nuanom no hɔn asefo no ho.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Hwɛ Nyankopɔn n’ebufuhyew wɔ wo nuanom hɔn asefo do.

12 Na mohwɛe na muhun banyin bi wɔ Amanamamfo no mu, ɔno na esu no twa no na mo nuanom no hɔn asefo no ntamu; na muhun Nyame no Sunsum dɛ ɔaba abɛhɛn banyin no mu; na ɔfaa esu pii no do kɔr mo nuanom hɔn asefo no a wɔwɔ anohoba asaase no do.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun Nyame no Sunsum dɛ ɔabɛhɛn Amanamamfo nkaa no mu; na wɔfaa esu pii no do fii ndɔmmum mu.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun dɔmtutuw a wɔyɛ Amanamamfo wɔ anohoba asaase no do; na muhun Nyankopɔn n’ebufuhyew, dɛ aba mo nuanom hɔn asefo no do; na wɔabɔ hɔn apetse wɔ Amanamamfo no enyim ma woekuku hɔn.

15 Na muhun Ewuradze no Sunsum dɛ aba Amanamamfo no do, na wɔayɛ prɔmprɔm na hɔn nsa akã asaase no dze ayɛ hɔn egyapadze; na muhun dɛ wɔayeyɛ fitafitaa, na hɔnho so ayeyɛ fɛw ara yie dɛ mbrɛ mo nkorɔfo no tse ansaana worubokuku hɔn no.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ emi, Nephi, muhun dɛ Amanamamfo no a wofii ndɔmmum mu bae no brɛɛ hɔnho adze wɔ Ewuradze enyim; na Ewuradze no tum wɔ hɔn do.

17 Na muhun dɛ Amanamamfo a wɔyɛ hɔn nãnom no aboaboa hɔn ano wɔ esu no do na asaase no so do, dɛ wɔnye hɔn robɔkõ.

18 Na muhun dɛ Nyankopɔn no tum kã hɔnho, na Nyankopɔn n’ebufuhyew so wɔ hɔn a wɔaboa hɔn ano dɛ wɔnye hɔn robɔkõ no do.

19 Na emi, Nephi, muhun dɛ Amanamamfo no a wofii ndɔmmum mu no Nyankopɔn no tum no agye hɔn efi amanaman nkaa no nyina nsamu.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ emi, Nephi, muhun dɛ wɔayeyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase no do; na muhun nwoma bi dɛ wɔso wɔ hɔn finimfin.

21 Na sor ɔbɔfo no bisaa dɛ: Ana inyim nwoma n’adzeban?

22 Na mubuaa no dɛ: Minnyim.

23 Na ɔsee dɛ: Hwɛ ofi Jewnyi n’anomu bae. Na emi, Nephi, mohwɛe; na ɔsee me dɛ: Nwoma a ihu yi yɛ Jewfo ho abakɔsɛm no a ɔfa Ewuradze n’ahyɛmu a ɔnye Israel fifo edzi no ho; na nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no hɔn nkɔnhyɛsɛm no so pii wɔ mu, na ɔtse dɛ kyerɛwsɛm no a woekrukye wɔ ayewa mprɛtse do no, soronko ara nye dɛ no mu nsɛm no nndɔɔ sõ; naaso, Ewuradze n’ahyɛmu no a ɔnye Israel fifo dzii no wɔ mu, dɛm ntsi ɔsom bo kɛse ma Amanamamfo no.

24 Na Ewuradze no bɔfoe no see me dɛ: Ehu dɛ nwoma no fi Jewnyi anomu bae; na dɛ ofi Jewnyi anomu no ɔyɛ Ewuradze n’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ, ɔno na asomafo duebien no gye ho dase; na wɔgye dase dɛ mbrɛ nokwar a ɔwɔ Nyame Eguambaa no mu tse.

25 Dɛm ntsi nsɛm yi fi Jewfo hɔ wɔ krɔnkrɔn mu na wɔdze maa Amanamamfo, dɛ mbrɛ nokwar no tse wɔ Nyame mu.

26 Na ekyir no nsɛm yi fi Eguambaa n’asomafo duebien nsamu bae, na ofi Jewfo no hɔ baa Amanamamfo no hɔ, nsɛ ehu mbusu asɔr kɛse no ne fapem no, dza n’ebusudze bɔ asɔrasɔr nyinara do no; na hwɛ, woeyi Eguambaa n’asɛmpa no mu nsɛm pii a ɔda ndzɛmba edzi pefee na dza ɔsom bo kɛse no nyinara efi mu; na eso Ewuradze n’ahyɛmu no mu pii na woeyi efi mu.

27 Na wɔyɛɛ iyinom nyinara ama wɔdze akontom Ewuradze n’akwan a ɔtsen no, ama wɔdze eefura hɔn enyiwa na woeepirim adasamba hɔn akoma.

28 Dɛm ntsi na ihu dɛ, nwoma no koduaa mbusu asɔr kɛse no nsamu no, ekyir no, nna nsɛm a ɔda ndzɛmba edzi pefee na dza ɔsom bo no mu pii a ɔyɛ Nyame Eguambaa no nwoma no woeyi efi mu no.

29 Na woyiyii nsɛm a ɔda ndzɛmba edzi pefee na ɔsom bo fii mu no ekyir no, wɔdze kɔr Amanamamfo aman hɔ, na wɔdze kɔr Amanamamfo aman hɔ ekyir no, nyew, wɔdze twaa esu pii dɛ mbrɛ ehu no wɔ Amanamamfo no a wofi ndɔmmum mu bae nkyɛn no, ehu—osiandɛ woeyiyi nsɛm a ɔda ndzɛmba edzi pefee na ɔsom bo no efi nwoma no mu, dza ɔda ndzɛmba edzi pefee ma adasamba tum tse ase, dɛ mbrɛ ne pefeeyɛ tse wɔ Nyame Eguambaa no mu no—osiandɛ woeyiyi dɛm ndzɛmba yi efi Eguambaa n’asɛmpa no mu no ntsi, dɔm dodowara afom kwan, nyew, ma dɛm ntsi Satan enya tum kɛse wɔ hɔn do.

30 Naaso ehu dɛ Amanamamfo no a wofi ndɔmmum mu bae no a Nyame no tum ama hɔn do abɔ aman nkaa nyinara do no, wɔ asaase a ɔbɔ asaase nyinara do no, asaase no a Ewuradze Nyankopɔn nye w’egya edzi ho ahyɛmu dɛ n’asefo bɛfa dze ayɛ hɔn egyapadze asaase no; dɛm ntsi ehu dɛ Ewuradze Nyankopɔn remma kwan ma Amanamamfo nnsɛɛ w’asefo a wɔafora wɔ wo nuanom no mu no korakora.

31 Afei so ɔremma kwan ma Amanamamfo no nnsɛɛ wo nuanom asefo.

32 Eso Ewuradze Nyankopɔn ronnhwɛ ma Amanamamfo no nnka enyifura gyinabew huhu yi a ihu dɛ wɔwɔ mu yi mu afebɔɔ, osian Eguambaa no n’asɛmpa no mu dza ɔyɛ pefee na ɔsom bo no a mbusu asɔr no dze siei a n’ahyɛse no, ehu no ntsi.

33 Dɛm na Nyame Eguambaa no se: Mobohu Amanamamfo no mbɔbɔr, na medze atsɛmbu kɛse aba Israel fifo nkaa do.

34 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze no bɔfoe kasaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ: Hwɛ, dɛm na Nyame Eguambaa no se, mabɛsera Israel fifo nkaa ekyir no—na nkaa yi a merekã hɔnho asɛm yi yɛ w’egya n’asefo—dɛm ntsi, medze atsɛmbu aba hɔn do n’ekyir no, na medze Amanamamfo nsa etwa hɔn no, na Amanamamfo mfom kɛse ekyir no, osiandɛ dza ɔyɛ pefee na ɔsom bo kɛse wɔ Eguambaa n’asɛmpa mu no a mbusu asɔr no a ɔyɛ ndwamambɔfo hɔn nã no eyiyi dze esuma no ntsi, dɛm na Eguambaa no se—Mubohu Amanamamfo mbɔbɔr wɔ da no mu, menam mo tum do medze m’asɛmpa no a ɔyɛ pefee na ɔsom bo no bɛma hɔn, dɛm na Eguambaa no se.

35 Na hwɛ, dɛm na Eguambaa no se: Mebɛda moho edzi akyerɛ w’asefo, ama wɔaakyerɛw ndzɛmba pii a mibeyi akyerɛ hɔn, dza ɔbɛyɛ pefee na ɔsom bo so; na w’asefo nsɛe ekyir, ber a wɔawodow wɔ gyedzi mu no, na wo nuanom hɔn asefo so no, hwɛ, wɔdze dɛm ndzɛmba yinom bosuma na ɔnam Eguambaa n’akyɛdze na no tum do woeeyi epue ama Amanamamfo no.

36 Na hɔn mu na wɔbɛkyerɛw m’asɛmpa no, Eguambaa no na ɔse, nye me botan na me nkwagye.

37 Na nhyira nkã hɔn a wɔbɛper dɛ wɔdze me Zion bɛba dɛm da no mu, na wobenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze na no tum no; na sɛ wotsim kodu ewiei a, wɔbɛma hɔn do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu, na ɔagye hɔn nkwa wɔ Eguambaa n’ahenman a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no mu; na nyia ɔbɔbɔ asomdwee ho dawur, nyew, nsɛmpa dɛɛdɛw kɛse no mbrɛ wodua bɛyɛ fɛw wɔ mbepɔw no do a!

38 Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun mo nuanom hɔn asefo nkaa no, na Nyame Eguambaa no nwoma no so a ofi Jewnyi n’anomu no, na ofii Amanamamfo no hɔ baa mo nuanom hɔn asefo no hɔ.

39 Na ɔbaa hɔn hɔ ekyir no muhun nwoma binom so a ofi Eguambaa no tum mu bae a ofi Amanamamfo no nkyɛn dze rebɛhyɛ mo nuanom hɔn asefo nkaa no nkuran, nye Jewfo no so a wɔapetse wɔ asaase nyinara enyi no, dɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no na Eguambaa n’asomafo duebien no hɔn nsɛm no yɛ nokwar.

40 Na sor ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ: Dɛm kyerɛwsɛm a odzi ewiei yi a ehu wɔ Amanamamfo mu yi, bɛda nokwar a ɔwɔ dza odzi kan no mu no edzi, dza ɔyɛ Eguambaa n’asomafo duebien dze no, na ɔbɛda ndzɛmba no a ɔsom bo no so a woeyiyi efi mu no edzi pefee; na wɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ ebusuafo nyinara, kasa horow, na nyimpa nyinara dɛ Nyame Eguambaa no nye Onnyiewiei Egya ne Ba no, ɔno nye wiadze Agyenkwa no; na otwar dɛ nyimpa nyinara ba no hɔ, annyɛ dɛm a ɔno wɔrenngye hɔn nkwa.

41 Na ɔsɛ dɛ wɔba dɛ mbrɛ nsɛm a obefi Eguambaa n’anomu bɛkyerɛ no; na Eguambaa ne nsɛm no wɔbɛda no edzi wɔ w’asefo hɔn kyerɛwsɛm mu, nye Eguambaa n’asomafo duebien no hɔn kyerɛwsɛm no mu; dɛm ntsi, wɔdze ne nyinara bɔbɔmu ada no edzi kor; osiandɛ Nyame kor na Oguanhwɛfo kor na wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔbɔ asaase nyinara do.

42 Na mber no reba a ɔbɛda noho edzi akyerɛ aman nyinara, Jewfo nye Amanamamfo nyinara; na sɛ ɔda noho edzi kyerɛ Jewfo nye Amanamamfo no so wie a, afei ɔbɛda no ho edzi akyerɛ Amanamamfo nye Jewfo no so, na edziekyirfo bedzi kan na edzikamfo ebedzi ekyir.
1-ne 14:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ɔbɔfo kã Amanamamfo no hɔn nhyira na hɔn ndom ho asɛm kyerɛ Nephi—Nsɔr ebien pɛr na ɔwɔ hɔ; Nyame Eguambaa no n’Asɔr na abɔnsam n’asɔr—Mbusu asɔr kɛse no tseetsee Nyankopɔn n’Ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ amanaman mu nyina. Ɔsomafo John bɛkyerɛw ndzɛmba bi a ɔfa wiadze n’ewiei ho. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ Amanamamfo no betsie Nyame Eguambaa no wɔ da a ɔbɛda no ho edzi akyerɛ hɔn wɔ kasa mu, nye tum nye ndzeyɛɛ so mu, dze eyi hɔn fintsidua no efi hɔ—

2 Na worimmpirim hɔn akoma nntsia Nyame Eguambaa no a, wɔbɛkan hɔn afora w’egya n’asefo: nyew, wɔbɛkan hɔn afora Israel fifo na wɔbɛyɛ nhyira mba wɔ anohoba asaase no do afebɔɔ; wɔnye hɔn remmba ndɔmmum mu bio; na Israel fifo enyim runngu ase bio.

3 Na mona kɛse no a mbusu asɔr kɛse no a, abɔnsam na ne mba kyekyeree no etu dɛ wɔdze rotwe akra akɔ hɛl no—nyew, dɛm mona kɛse no a woetu dɛ wɔdze resɛɛ adasa no, hɔn a wotui noara na wɔbɛhyɛ no mã, dze hɔn akɔ ɔsɛɛ kɛse mu, Nyame Eguambaa no na ɔse; ɔkra no rennsɛɛ, gyedɛ wɔatow no akyen hɛl a onnyiewiei no mu.

4 Na hwɛ, dɛm na abɔnsam no ndɔmmumfa tse, na eso dɛm na Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛryɛ tse wɔ hɔn a wɔbɛyɛ emumuyɛdze na ekyiwadze wɔ n’enyim no.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ sor ɔbɔfo no kasaa kyerɛɛ emi, Nephi, dɛ: Ehu dɛ sɛ Amanamamfo no nu hɔnho a obesi hɔn yie; na ɔwoara so inyim dza ɔfa no ahyɛmu a Ewuradze nye Israel fifo edzi no; na atse so dɛ obiara a oennu noho no ɔbɛhera.

6 Dɛm ntsi, Amanamamfo no ndue sɛ ɔba no dɛ wopirim hɔn akoma dze tsia Nyame Eguambaa no a.
