12 Wɔyɛ abɔyafo, na womuo, na wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔpɛ bɔgya, wɔgye hɔn egyanom amambra dzi, ɔno nye dɛ—wɔgye dzi dɛ wɔpaam hɔn fii Jerusalem asaase do osian hɔn egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi, na hɔn enuanom yɛɛ hɔn bɔn wɔ sar no do, na wɔyɛɛ hɔn bɔn so ber a worutwa po no;

13 Na bio, dɛ wɔyɛɛ hɔn bɔn ekyir no a wotwaa po no, wɔ hɔn egyapadze asaase a odzi kan no do, wotwaa po ekyir no, na ne nyina ne siantsir nye dɛ Nephi yɛɛ obi a odzii Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm do—dɛm ntsi Ewuradze n’enyi sɔɔ no, na Ewuradze tsiee ne mpaabɔ, na obuaa hɔn na ɔno na odzii hɔn kan wɔ hɔn akwantu mu wɔ sar no do.

14 Na no nuanom no bo fuuw no osiandɛ wɔanntse Ewuradze ne nyɛe ase; Hɔn bo so fuuw no wɔ esu no do osiandɛ wopiriim hɔn akoma dze tsiaa Ewuradze.

15 Na hɔn bo fuuw no bio ber a wodur asaase a wɔdze bɔɔ hɔn anohoba no do, osiandɛ wɔkãa dɛ wɔagye dɔm no hɔn do nhwɛe no efi hɔn nsamu; na wɔpeer dɛ woboku no.

16 Na hɔn bo fuuw no bio osiandɛ ofii hɔn mu kɔr sar no do dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze hyɛɛ no no, na ɔfaa kyerɛwsɛm no a woekrukye wɔ ayewa mprɛtse do no, na wɔkãa dɛ oetwa hɔn edwoo.

17 Na dɛm na wɔdze akyerɛkyerɛ hɔn mba dɛ wonkyir hɔn, na dɛ wonkuku hɔn, na dɛ wontwa hɔn edwoo na wɔmbɔ hɔn epoo, na wɔnyɛ adze nyinara a wobotum mfa nsɛɛ hɔn; dɛm ntsi wɔwɔ ɔtan a onnyiewiei bi dze ma Nephi mba.

18 Na osian iyiara ntsi na ɔhen Laman, nam ndabraba na akɔhwi kwan do nye anohoba do daadaa me, ma medze mo nkorɔfo yi baa asaase yi do, ama ɔasɛɛ hɔn; nyew, yɛahaw dɛm mfe pii yi mu wɔ asaase no do.

19 Na afei emi, Zeniff, mekãa dɛm nsɛm yinom nyinara a ɔfa Lamanfo ho ekyir no, mehyɛɛ hɔn nkuran dɛ wɔmfa hɔn ahoɔdzen nkɔ ɔkõ a wɔdze hɔn werɛ ahyɛ Ewuradze mu wɔ ho no; dɛm ntsi yɛnye hɔn hyiaa enyim na enyim.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛpaam hɔn bio fii hɛn asaase do; na yekum hɔn ara yie, ma yenntum mpo annkan hɔn.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛsaan hɛn ekyir bio kɔr hɛnankasa hɛn asaase do, na mo nkorɔfo no hyɛɛ ase bio dɛ wɔrenyɛn hɔn nguankuw, na wɔyɛɛ ekuadwuma wɔ asaase no do.

22 Na afei emi, mayɛ akɔdaa ntsi, medze ahendzi no maa me mba mbanyin no mu kor; dɛm ntsi, merennkasa bio. Na Ewuradze nhyira mo nkorɔfo. Amen.
mosiah 11:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ɔhen Noah dzi hen wɔ etsirmɔdzen mu—Ɔnye ne yernom na no nwewefo gye hɔn enyi wɔ asakasakabra bɔ mu—Abinadi hyɛ nkɔm dɛ wɔbɛfa nkorɔfo no akɔ nkowaasom mu—Ɔhen Noah hwehwɛ dɛ oboku no. Bɛyɛ mfe 160–150 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Zeniff dze n’ahendzi maa Noah, ne mbabanyin no mu kor; dɛm ntsi Noah hyɛɛ ase dzii n’egya n’adze; na ɔannantsew n’egya n’akwan mu.

2 Na hwɛ, oenndzi Nyame ne mbrasɛm do, mbom ɔnantseew n’akoma n’apɛdze do. Na onyaa yernom nye nwewefo pii. Na ɔmaa no nkorɔfo yɛɛ bɔn, na wɔyɛɛ dza ɔyɛ ekyiwadze wɔ Ewuradze enyim. Nyew, na wɔbɔɔ ndwamambra na wɔyɛɛ emumuyɛdze ahorow pii.

3 Na ɔhyehyɛɛ tow too hɔ dɛ dza wɔwɔ nyinara wɔnkyɛ mu enum na wontu no mu kor mma no, wɔnkyɛ hɔn sika nye dwetɛ mu enum na wontu no mu kor mma no, wɔnkyɛ hɔn ziff, nye hɔn kɔɔber mu enum na wontu no mu kor mma no, nye hɔn boran na hɔn ndaadze; wɔnkyɛ hɔn nguan a wɔadɔ angoa mu enum na wontu no mu kor mma no; wɔnkyɛ hɔn eburow so mu enum na wontu no mu kor mma no.

4 Na iyinom nyinara ɔgyegyee na ɔdze hwɛɛ noho nye ne yernom nye no nwewefo; nye n’asɔfoe so na hɔn yernom nye hɔn nwewefo; dɛm na ɔyɛɛ dze sesaa ahenman no ne nhyehyɛɛ.

5 Na oyii nyimpa nyinara a n’egya hyɛɛ hɔn asɔfo no fii hɔ, na ɔhyɛɛ afofor hyɛɛ hɔn ananmu, hɔn a wɔamema hɔnho do wɔ akoma mu.

6 Nyew, iyi maa wonyaa mboa, wɔ hɔn enyihaw nye hɔn abosonsom mu, na hɔn ndwamambɔ so mu; na tow a nna ɔhen Noah dze ato no nkorɔfo do no ntsi; ɔmaa dɔm no yɛɛ edwumadzen dze gyee emumuyɛ abamba.

7 Nyew, na hɔn so bɛyɛɛ abosonsomfo, osiandɛ ɔhen no nye n’asɔfoe no dze ndaadaa na kasa fenemfenem daadaa hɔn; wɔkãa kasa fenemfenem kyerɛɛ hɔn.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Noah sisii adan akɛse a ɔyɛ fɛw pii; na ɔdze ndua edwindze fɛɛfɛw siesiee ho, nye ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo ahorow pii, sika, nye dwetɛ, na daadze, nye boran, nye ziff nye kɔɔber.

9 Na osii ahemfie kɛse na ɔdze ahengua sii finimfin, ne nyinara wɔdze dua a ɔyɛ fɛw nye sika nye dwetɛ nye ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo siesie ho.

10 Na ɔmaa n’edwumayɛfo no dze dua a ɔyɛ fɛw, nye kɔɔber, nye boran yɛɛ edwindze a ɔyɛ fɛw ahorow pii wɔ temple n’afasu mu.

11 Na ngua a wɔdze esisi nkyɛn ama asɔfompanyin no, dza ɔbɔ ngua nkaa nyinara do no, ɔdze sika mapa siesiee ho; na ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ akokyɛm edwindze sisii hɔn enyim, ama woeetum atsentsen hɔn mu na wɔaagye hɔn ahom wɔ do wɔ ber a wɔreka atorsɛm na nsɛm gyangyan akyerɛ no dɔm no.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ osii abantsentsen wɔ temple no nkyɛn; nyew, abantsentsen ara yie, ɔwar araa ma otum gyina n’etsifi na ɔhwɛ Shilom asaase nye Shemlon asaase a nkyɛ Lamanfo wɔ do no; nna otum mpo hu asaase a otwa ho hyia nyinara.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔmaa wosisii adan pii wɔ Shilom asaase no do; na ɔmaa wosii abantsentsen wɔ koko bi a ɔwɔ Shilom asaase etsifi afamu hɔ bea a nkyɛ ɔyɛ Nephi ne mba hɔn sumabew wɔ ber a woguanee fii asaase no do no; na dɛm ndzɛmba yi, sika a onyaa fii tow a ɔgyee fii no dɔm no hɔ no na ɔdze yɛe.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔdze n’akoma hyɛɛ n’ahodze mu, na ɔnye ne yernom nye ne nwewe dzii hɔn mber wɔ sakasakayɛ mu; na dɛmara na n’asɔfoe so nye ndwamambɔfo yɛe.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ oduaa wenyin ture pii bɔɔ asaase no ho aprɔw; na ɔyɛɛ wenyin mfir na ɔyɛɛ wenyin kwã ara yie; na dɛm ntsi ɔbɛyɛɛ sabokwanyi na no nkorɔfo so dɛmara.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no hyɛɛ ase baa no nkorɔfo no do, hɔn mu kumaabi a wɔrohwɛ hɔn nguankuw do, na wokum hɔn wɔ hɔn kwã no mu.

17 Na ɔhen Noah somaa hɔn a wɔbɔ asaase no ho ban no dɛ wɔnkɛpam hɔn mfi hɔ; na mbom wɔannsoma dɔm a wɔdɔɔ sõ, na Lamanfo no baa hɔn do bokum hɔn, na wɔdze hɔn nguankuw no mu pii fii asaase no do kɔree; dɛm na Lamanfo no hyɛɛ ase sɛɛ hɔn, na wɔkyerɛ hɔn tan wɔ hɔn do.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Noah somaa no nsordaafo wɔ hɔn do, na wɔpaam hɔn mber kakra; dɛm ntsi, wɔsaan hɔn ekyir a nna woridzi dɛw wɔ dza wɔasɛɛ no no ho.

19 Na afei, osian dɛm konyimdzi kɛse yi ntsi ahantanyɛ hyɛɛ hɔn akoma mã; wotuuw hɔnho wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn ahoɔdzen mu see dɛ, hɔn eduonum tum gyina Lamanfo mpem mpem ano; na dɛm na wɔdze tuuw hɔn ho, na hɔn enyi gyee wɔ bɔgya ho, nye dɛ wɔbɛka hɔn nuanom bɔgya egu, na iyi osian hɔn hen nye asɔfo hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔbarimba bi wɔ hɔn mu a ne dzin dze Abinadi; na okyimaa hɔn mu na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehyɛ nkɔm, se dɛ: Hwɛ dɛm na Ewuradze se, na dɛm na ɔahyɛ me dɛ, kɔ, na kɛse dɔm yi dɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze se—Dɛm nkorɔfo yi ndue, na mehu hɔn ekyiwadze nye hɔn emumuyɛdze, nye hɔn ndwamambɔ, na gyedɛ wonu hɔnho, annyɛ dɛm a mebɛba hɔn nkyɛn wɔ m’ebufuhyew mu.

21 Na gyedɛ wonu hɔnho na wɔsan ba Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, hwɛ, medze hɔn bɛhyɛ hɔn atamfo nsa; nyew, na wɔdze hɔn bɛba nkowaasom mu; na wobohu amandze wɔ hɔn atamfo nsa.

22 Na ɔbɛba dɛ wobohu dɛ Emi nye hɔn Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, na meyɛ Nyame nyinkufo a mebɛsera mo nkorɔfo hɔn bɔn:

23 Na ɔbɛba dɛ gyedɛ nkorɔfo yi nu hɔnho na wɔsan ba Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, annyɛ dɛm a wɔdze hɔn bɛba nkowaasom mu; na obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛgye hɔn, gyedɛ Ewuradze, Otumfo Nyankopɔn.

24 Nyew, na ɔbɛba dɛ ber a wobosũ afrɛ me no, mebɛyɛ nyaa etsie hɔn sufrɛ, nyew, na mebɛma kwan ma hɔn atamfo ahaw hɔn.

25 Na gyedɛ wonu hɔn ho na wofura wertam na wɔtsena nsõ mu, na wosũ dzendzenndzen frɛ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn. Mirinntsie hɔn mpaabɔ, nna merenngye hɔn mmfi hɔn amandzehu mu; na dɛm na Ewuradze ahyɛ me dɛ menkã.

26 Afei ɔbaa dɛ aber a wɔtsee dza Abinadi kãe no, hɔn bo fuuw no na wɔpeer dɛ wobeyi no nkwa efi hɔ; na mbom Ewuradze gyee no fii hɔn nsamu.

27 Afei aber a ɔhen Noah tsee nsɛm a Abinadi kãa kyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no, no so no bo fuwii na ɔsee dɛ: Woana nye dɛm Abinadi no a orubobu emi nye mo nkorɔfo atsɛn yi, anaa woana nye dɛm Ewuradze no a ɔdze dɛm amandzehu kɛse reba mo nkorɔfo do yi?

28 Mese hom dɛ hom mfa Abinadi mbra ha ma munku no, osiandɛ ɔakã dɛm nsɛm yi dze asɛɛ mo nkorɔfo no ma woenya ebufuw ama hɔnho na ɔdze wentwiwentwi aba mo nkorɔfo mu; dɛm ntsi muboku no.

29 Afei nkorɔfo no hɔn enyiwa efura; dɛm ntsi wopiriim hɔn akoma wɔ Abinadi ne nsɛm no ntsi na ofitsi dɛm aber no dze kɔ no wɔpeer dɛ wobosuo no mu. Na ɔhen Noah piriim n’akoma wɔ Ewuradze n’asɛm ho na oennu noho emmfi ne bra bɔn ho.
mosiah 12:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ɔnam nkɔm a Abinadi hyɛ wɔ nkorɔfo no hɔn nsɛɛe na ɔhen Noah no wu ho ntsi, wɔdze no to efiadze—Asɔfo atorfo no san si kyerɛwsɛm no do na wɔyɛ dɛ gyama wodzi Moses ne mbra no do—Abinadi hyɛ ase kyerɛkyerɛ hɔn Mbra Du no. Bɛyɛ mfe 148 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ bɛyɛ mfe ebien ekyir no Abinadi sakyeer noho na ɔbaa hɔn mu a woennhu no, na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehyɛ nkɔm wɔ hɔn mu se dɛ: Dɛm na Ewuradze se—Abinadi, kɔ na kɛhyɛ nkɔm kyerɛ mo nkorɔfo, na woepirim hɔn akoma wɔ me nsɛm do, wonnuu hɔnho wɔ hɔn ndzebɔn ho; dɛm ntsi mebɛsera hɔn wɔ m’ebufuw mu, nyew, m’ebufuhyew huhu no mu na mebɛba abɛsera hɔn wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ nye hɔn ekyiwadze ntsi.

2 Nyew, ebusuasantsen yi ndue! Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: Tsen wo nsa na hyɛ nkɔm, se dɛ: Dɛm na Ewuradze se, ɔbɛba dɛ ebusuasantsen yi, osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi wɔdze hɔn bɛba nkowaasom mu, na wɔbɔbobɔ hɔn asomu; nyew, na mbarimba bɔtwe hɔn, na woekoku hɔn; na wimu mpɛtɛ, nye mbɔdɔm, nyew, na mbowa abɔyafo, bedzi hɔn nam.

3 Na ɔbɛba dɛ wobobu ɔhen Noah no nkwa mpo dɛ bataker a ogu fononoo hyew mu; na obohu dɛ Emi nye Ewuradze.

4 Na ɔbɛba dɛ medze amandzehu yaayaw bɛba mo nkorɔfo yi do, nyew, medze kɔm nye yardɔm bɛba hɔn do; na mebɛma wɔatsẽatsẽa mu yayaayaw wɔ adzekyee nyinara mu.

5 Nyew, mebɛma wɔdze ndzesoadze atoto hɔn ekyir; na wɔatwe hɔn dɛ asoaso a ɔatɔ mum.

6 Na ɔbɛba dɛ mobɔtotow esukwankyɛba efi sor egu hɔn do, na obokuku hɔn; na boka mframa so bepira hɔn; na mbowaba bɛsɛɛ hɔn asaase so na wɔawe hɔn eburow.

7 Na yardɔm kɛse bokuku hɔn—na mebɛyɛ iyinom nyinara osian hɔn emumuyɛ nye ekyiwadze ntsi.

8 Na ɔbɛba dɛ gyedɛ wonu hɔn ho annyɛ dɛm a mebɛsɛɛ hɔn korakora efi asaase enyi; nyew na wɔbɛkyerɛw hɔn ho nsɛm ato hɔ na mobɔkora do yie dze ama amanaman a wɔbɛba abɛfa asaase no; nyew, mebɛyɛ iyi dze ada nkorɔfo yi hɔn ebusudze edzi akyerɛ amanaman nkaa no. Na Abinadi hyɛɛ nkɔm pii tsiaa dɛm nkorɔfo yi.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn bo fuuw no; na wɔfaa no na wɔkyekyeer no na wɔsoaa no kɔr ɔhen no enyim, na wɔsee ɔhen no dɛ: Hwɛ, yɛdze ɔbarimba yi aba w’enyim, nyia wɔahyɛ nkɔm bɔn wɔ wo nkorɔfo ho, na ɔse dɛ Nyankopɔn bɛsɛɛ hɔn.

10 Na ɔhyɛ nkɔm bɔn so fa wo nkwa ho, na ɔse dɛ wo nkwa bɛyɛ dɛ bataker a ogu fononoo a woekua ogya wɔ mu.

11 Na ɔkã bio dɛ ebɛyɛ dɛ abaw, mpo a akyenkyen wɔ kwã mu, dza mbowa guan fa do na wɔdze hɔn anan tsiatsia do no.

12 Na ɔkã bio dɛ ebɛyɛ dɛ ohwirom do nhyiren a sɛ ɔber ara yie na mframa bɔ a ɔtsew petse asaase do. Na ɔayɛ ma ayɛ dɛ Ewuradze na ɔakã. Na ɔse iyinom nyinara bɛba wo do osian wo emumuyɛ ntsi, na gyedɛ inu woho.

13 Na afei, O ɔhen, ebɛn bɔn kɛse na ayɛ, anaadɛ ebɛn bɔn kɛse na wo nkorɔfo ayɛ, ma ɔwɔ dɛ Nyankopɔn bu hɛn fɔ anaadɛ ɔbarimba yi bu hɛn atsɛn?

14 Na afei, O ɔhen, hwɛ, yenndzi fɔ, na ɔwo, O ɔhen, nnyɛɛ bɔn; dɛm ntsi, ɔbarimba yi edzi ator wɔ woho, na ɔahyɛ nkɔm gyangyan.

15 Na hwɛ, hɛnho yɛ dzen, yɛronnkɔ nkowaasom mu, nna hɛn atamfo remmfa hɛn ndɔmmum so; nyew, na ɔwo ayɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase yi do, na ebɛyɛ prɔmprɔm so.

16 Hwɛ, ɔbarimba no nye yi, yɛdze no hyɛ wo nsa; dza ehwɛ a oye ma wo no fa yɛ no.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Noah hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa Abinadi nto efiadze; na ɔsee asɔfo no dɛ wɔmboa hɔn ano ma ɔnye hɔn ndwendwen dza ɔmfa nyɛ no.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔsee ɔhen no dɛ: Fa no bra ha ma yembisa no nsɛm; na ɔhen no hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa no mbra hɔn enyim.

19 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase bisabisaa no nsɛm, ama hɔn nsa aaka no, ama wɔnam do enya biribi dze etsia no, ebu no fɔ; na oyii hɔn ano akokodur mu, na otumii yiyii hɔn nsɛmbisa nyinara ano, nyew, ma hɔn ho boow hɔn; na ogyinaa hɔn nsɛmbisa nyinara ano, na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn fɛr wɔ hɔn nsɛm nyinara mu.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn mu kor see no dɛ: Nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw no ase ha yi kyerɛ dɛn, dza hɛn egyanom dze kyerɛkyerɛɛ dɛ:

21 Mbrɛ nyia ogyina mbepɔw do dze nsɛmpa ma no n’anan ho dua yɛ fɛw a; nyia ɔdze asomdwee tahye; nyia ɔdze papa ho nsɛmpa ba; nyia ɔdze nkwagye tahye; nyia ɔse Zion dɛ, Wo Nyame dzi hen;

22 W’aweɔmfo bɛma hɔn ndze do; wɔdze ndze bɔbɔmu na wɔatow ndwom; na wobohu no enyiwa tua enyiwa ber a Ewuradze dze Zion bɛba bio;

23 Hom ndzi dɛw; hom mbɔmu ntow ndwom Jerusalem mbea a etwee; na Ewuradze akyekye no nkorɔfo werɛ, ɔapon Jerusalem;

24 Ewuradze eyi n’abasa krɔnkrɔn no ho wɔ amanaman nyinara enyim, na asaase n’ano n’ano nyinara bohu hɛn Nyankopɔn no nkwagye!

25 Na afei Abinadi see hɔn dɛ: Ana hom yɛ asɔfo na hom ahyɛ da kyerɛkyerɛ dɛm nkorɔfo yi, ma wɔaatse nkɔnhyɛ sunsum ase, na nkyii hom pɛ dɛ hom hu dɛm ndzɛmba yi ne nkyerɛase fi emi mo hɔ?

26 Mese hom dɛ, hom ndue hom a hom kontom Ewuradze n’akwan! Osiandɛ sɛ hom tse dɛm ndzɛmba yi ase nna hom ammfa annkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn; dɛm ntsi, hom akontom Ewuradze n’akwan.

27 Hom ammfa hom akoma amma ntseasee; dɛm ntsi, hom annyɛ enyansafo. Dɛm dze a, ebɛnadze na hom dze kyerɛkyerɛ dɛm nkorɔfo yi?

28 Na wɔsee dɛ: Yɛkyerɛkyerɛ Moses mbra.

29 Na ɔsee hɔn bio dɛ: Sɛ hom kyerɛkyerɛ Moses mbra a, ebɛnadze ntsi na hom nndzi do? Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom dze hom akoma taa sika do? Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom bɔ edwamambra na hom hwer hom ahoɔdzen wɔ ndwamanyɛ ho, nyew, na hom ma dɔm yi yɛ bɔn na wɔama Ewuradze asoma me dɛ membɛhyɛ nkɔm ntsia nkorɔfo yi; nyew, dza ɔyɛ bɔn kɛse mpo ntsia dɛm nkorɔfo yi?

30 Ana hom nnyim dɛ meka nokwar no? Nyew, Hom nyim dɛ mekã nokwar no; ɔwɔ dɛ hom ho popo wɔ Nyame enyim.

31 Na ɔbɛba dɛ wobotwa hom akyen wɔ hom emumuyɛ ho, osiandɛ hom akã dɛ hom kyerɛkyerɛ Moses mbra? Na ebɛnadze na hom nyim a ɔfa Moses mbra ho? Ana nkwagye nam Moses mbra do ba? Hom kã dɛn?

32 Na wobuaa dɛ nkwagye nam Moses ne mbra do bae.

33 Mbom afei Abinadi see hɔn dɛ: Minyim dɛ hom dzi Nyame ne mbrasɛm do a wɔbɛgye hom nkwa; nyew, sɛ hom dzi mbrasɛm a Ewuradze dze maa Moses wɔ bepɔw Sinai no a ɔse:

34 Emi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn, nyia oyii hom fii Egypt asaase do, fii nkowaasom mu.

35 Mma hom nnya Nyame fofor bi nnkã moho.

36 Mma hom nnyɛ ohonyi bi, anaa biribi a ɔwɔ wimu wɔ sor, anaa dza ɔwɔ asaase do wɔ famu ne saso mma woho.

37 Afei Abinadi bisaa hɔn dɛ, Ana hom ayɛ iyi nyinara? Mese hom dɛ, Oho, hom nnyɛe. Ana hom akyerɛkyerɛ nkorɔfo yi dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyinara? Mese hom dɛ, Oho, hom nnyɛe.
mosiah 13:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Tum a ofi sor bɔ Abinadi ho ban—Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ Mbra Du no—Nnyɛ Moses mbra no nko mu na nkwagye fi ba—Nyankopɔn Nankasa dze Noho bɛyɛ werdambɔ na Ɔapon No nkorɔfo. Bɛyɛ mfe 148 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei aber a ɔhen no tsee nsɛm yi no, ɔsee n’asɔfoe no dɛ: hom mfa dɛm nyimpa yi mmfi ha nkɔ, na wonku no; na ebɛnadze na yɛnye no wɔ yɛ, ɔabɔ dam.

2 Na wɔsoɛree gyinae na wɔyɛɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔn nsa rekɛkã no; na ɔnye hɔn gyinae, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ:

3 Mma hom mmfa hom nsa nnkã me, na Nyame boku hom, sɛ hom dze hom nsa kã me a, osiandɛ memmfaa nsɛm a Ewuradze dze ama me dɛ memfa mma hom no mmaa hom; eso mennkãa dza hom bisaa me dɛ menkã nkyerɛ hom no mennkãe; dɛm ntsi, Nyankopɔn remma kwan mma wɔnnsɛɛ me dɛm aber yi.

4 Na mbom ɔsɛ dɛ mema mbrasɛm a Nyame dze ama me no hyɛ mã; osiandɛ makã nokwar no akyerɛ hom ntsi, hom bo efuw me. Na bio, osiandɛ makã Nyame n’asɛm ntsi hom ebu me atsɛn dɛ mabɔ dam.

5 Afei ɔbaa dɛ aber a Abinadi kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔhen Noah no nkorɔfo no enntum ammfa hɔn nsa annkã no, osiandɛ nna Ewuradze ne Sunsum aba no do; na n’enyim hyerɛɛn mbordo, dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ Moses so wɔ aber a ɔwɔ bepɔw Sinai do nye Ewuradze rekasa no.

6 Na tum na tumdzi a ofi Nyankopɔn hɔ na ɔdze kasae; na ɔsɔɔw ne nsɛm do dɛ:

7 Hom ehu dɛ hom nnyi tum dɛ woboku me, dɛm ntsi mewie m’asɛm kã. Nyew, muhu dɛ otwa hom kɔ hom akoma mu osiandɛ mekã dza ɔyɛ nokwar a ɔfa hom emumuyɛ ho.

8 Nyew, na me nsɛm ayɛ hom nwanwa nye ahobow, na ahyɛ hom ebufuw.

9 Mbom mewie m’asɛm kã; na afei onnhia beebi a mobɔkɔ, sɛ ɔba dɛ wɔagye me nkwa a.

10 Mbom iyi dze mekã kyerɛ hom, dza hom dze bɛyɛ me ekyir no, ɔbɛyɛ ngyinahɔmadze nye mununkum ama ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba.

11 Na afei merekenkan Nyame ne mbrasɛm a aka no akyerɛ hom, osiandɛ muhu dɛ wɔnnkyerɛwee wɔ hom akoma mu; muhu dɛ hom esua na hom akyerɛkyerɛ emumuyɛ wɔ hom nkwa nda ne kɛse mu.

12 Na afei, hom nkaa dɛ mesee hom dɛ: Mma hom nnyɛ ohonyi bi anaa adze a ɔwɔ wimu wɔ sor anaa dza ɔwɔ asaase do ne famu anaa dza ɔwɔ nsu mu wɔ asaase ase mma homho.

13 Na bio: Mma hom mmbɔ hom mu adze mma hɔn; anaa hom nnsom hɔn; na Emi Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn, Meyɛ Nyame nyinkufo a medze egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ bɔhwɛ mba, ekodu ebusuasantsen ebiasa nye anan a wɔtan me do;

14 Na muhu mpempem a wɔdɔ me na wodzi me mbrasɛm do mbɔbɔr.

15 Mma mmbɔ Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn ne dzin gyangyan, na Ewuradze nnkɛma nyia no a ɔbɔ ne dzin gyangyan afa noho tɔtrɔtɔ.

16 Kaa ahomgyeda no na sie no krɔnkrɔn.

17 Nda esia na yɛ edwuma na dzi wo dwuma nyinara;

18 Mbom da a otsĩa esuon no yɛ Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn ahomgyeda; mma nnyɛ edwuma biara wɔ mu, ɔwo o, wo babanyin o, wo babaa o, w’akowaa o, w’afonabaa o, wo mbowa o, wo hɔho a ɔwɔ wo kuropɔn mu o;

19 Na nda esia na Ewuradze bɔɔ sor nye asaase, po, nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara; dɛm ntsi na Ewuradze hyiraa ahomgyeda no, na ɔyɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn.

20 Dzi w’egya nye wo nã nyi; ama wo nda aawar wɔ asaase a Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do.

21 Mma nndzi ewu.

22 Mma nntõ awar. Mma nnwia adze.

23 Mma nngye wo nyɛnko ho dasewia.

24 Mma w’enyi mmber wo nyɛnko fi, mma w’enyi mmber ne yer, anaa n’akowaa, anaa n’afonabaa, anaa ne nantwi, anaa n’asoaso, anaa biribiara a ɔyɛ wo nyɛnko dze.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Abinadi wiee dɛm nsɛm yi kã no, ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Ana hom akyerɛkyerɛ nkorɔfo yi dɛ wɔnhwɛ na wondzi dɛm mbrasɛm yi do?

26 Mese hom dɛ, Oho; na sɛ hom ayɛ a, nkyɛ Ewuradze remma memmba na memmbɛhyɛ nkɔm bɔn wɔ nkorɔfo yi ho.

27 Na afei hom akã dɛ nkwagye nam Moses mbra do ba. Mese hom dɛ ohia dɛ hom bedzi Moses mbra do aber yi mu; na mbom mese hom dɛ mber bɛba a onnkehia bio dɛ hom bedzi Moses mbra do.

28 Na bio, mese hom dɛ, nkwagye nnam mbra no nko do ba; na sɛ ɔnnyɛ werdambɔ no a, dza Nyame nankasa rebɛyɛ ama no nkorɔfo hɔn bɔn nye hɔn emumuyɛ a, nkyɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛdan biara wɔbɛhera, ɔmmfa ho mpo dɛ Moses ne mbra no wɔ hɔ.

29 Na afei mese hom dɛ ohia dɛ nna mbra wɔ hɔ ma wɔdze maa Israelmba, nyew, mbra a ɔyɛ finkyiim mpo a; osiandɛ wɔyɛ akɔnkyɛfo, hɔnho yɛ har wɔ emumuyɛ ne yɛ ho, na wɔyɛ nyaa wɔ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ne nkae ho.

30 Dɛm ntsi mbra wɔ hɔ a wɔdze maa hɔn, nyew, dwumadzi nye ayɛdze ho mbra, mbra a ɔsɛ dɛ wodzi do pɛrpɛr daa daa, ama wɔdze aakaa hɔn Nyankopɔn nna hɔn ndwuma a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔyɛ ma no.

31 Mbom hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, iyinom nyinara yɛɛ ngyinahɔmadze ma ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba.

32 Na afei, ana wɔtsee mbra no ase? Mese hom dɛ, Oho, nnyɛ hɔn nyinara na wɔtsee mbra no ase; na iyi osian hɔn akomadzen ntsi; na wɔanntse ase dɛ ɔdasanyi biara rinnya nkwagye gyedɛ ɔnam Nyankopɔn no ɔpon kwan no do.

33 Na hwɛ, ana Moses annhyɛ hom nkɔm a ɔfa Messiah no ne mbaa ho, na dɛ Nyankopɔn bɔpon no nkorɔfo? Nyew, na nkɔnhyɛfo nyinara mpo a wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm fi wiadze n’ahyɛse no—ana wɔannkasa pii ammfa dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho?

34 Ana wɔannkã dɛ Nyankopɔn nankasa bɛba asaase do wɔ adasamba mu na ɔafa nyimpa honandua ahyɛ, na ɔdze tum kɛse anantsew asaase enyi?

35 Nyew, na wɔannkã so dɛ ɔdze wusoɛr bɛbrɛ ewufo, na nakasa dze wɔbɛtseetsee no na oehu amandze?
mosiah 14:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Isaiah kã Messiah ho asɛm—Wɔda Messiah a wɔbrɛɛ no adze no na n’amandzehu edzi—Ɔdze Ne kra bɔ afɔr ma bɔn na ɔyɛ ntamugyinafo ma mbratofo—Fa to Isaiah 53 ho. Bɛyɛ mfe 148 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Nyew, ana Isaiah mpo annka dɛ: Woana na ɔagye hɛn amandzɛɛ edzi, na woana na woeyi Ewuradze n’abasa akyerɛ no?

2 Na obenyin dɛ dua fɔr wɔ n’enyim, na dɛ ndwow a ofi asaase kɛsɛɛ mu, onnyi frɔdɔɔ anaadɛ enyimnyam biara; na sɛ yehu no a, onnyi ahoɔfɛw biara a ɔbɛma no ho ayɛ hɛn akɔndɔ.

3 Adasa buu no enyimtsia, na wɔpoow no; awerɛhow nyimpa a yaw abra no; na wobuu no enyimtsia dɛ obi a adasa dze hɔn enyim ehuntsa no; na yemmbu no hwee.

4 Ampaara, ɔasɔw hɛn yaw, na ɔasoa hɛn awerɛhow; naaso yebuu no dɛ nyia wɔahwe no, Nyame abɔ no, na woehiahia no ho.

5 Na mbom wopiraa no wɔ hɛn mbrato ntsi, woposoow no wɔ hɛn emumuyɛ ntsi, wɔdze hɛn asomdwee ho ntsẽa too no do; na ne mbaa ano na wɔdze asa hɛn yarba.

6 Hɛn nyinara yɛatotɔ dɔnsuar dɛ nguan; yɛamanman obiara afa noara no kwan do; na Ewuradze dze hɛn nyinara hɛn emumuyɛ ato no do.

7 Wɔhyɛɛ no ahoɔyaw na wɔhaaw no naaso oemmbue n’ano; dɛ eguambaa a wɔdze no rokɔ ekumii na dɛ oguan a ɔatɔ mmum wɔ no nhwitwitwafo enyim, eso oemmbue n’ano.

8 Woyii no fii efiadze nye atsɛmbu mu; woana na ɔbɛda n’ebusuasantsen edzi? Na woetwa no efi atseasefo asaase do akyen; mo nkorɔfo hɔn mbrato ntsi na wɔhwee no.

9 Na wɔbɔɔ ne nda wɔ emumuyɛfo nkyɛn na ahonyafo nkyɛn wɔ no wu mu; osiandɛ ɔnnyɛɛ bɔn bi, eso woennhu ndaadaa bi wɔ n’anomu.

10 Naaso ɔsɔɔ Ewuradze enyi dɛ ɔhyɛɛ no amen; ɔahyɛ no ɔyaw; ber a edze ne kra bɛyɛ bɔn ho afɔrbɔdze no, obohu n’asefo, ɔbɛma ne nda awar, na Ewuradze n’enyisɔ bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ ne nsamu.

11 Obohu ne kra n’dzi, na ɔamee; ɔnam ne nyimdzee do na m’akowaa tseneneenyi bobu piinara bem; na ɔbɔsoa hɔn emumuyɛ.

12 Dɛm ntsi mebɛkyɛ adze mama ɔno ɔnye akɛsefo, na ɔnye ahoɔdzenfo bɛkyɛ asadze; osiandɛ ohuee ne kra maa owu; na wɔkaan no foraa mbratofo; na ɔsoaa dodowara hɔn bɔn, na ɔyɛɛ ntamugyinafo maa mbratofo.
mosiah 15:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mbrɛ Christ si yɛ Egya nye Ɔba no nyina—Ɔbɛyɛ ntamugyinafo na Ɔasoa No nkorɔfo hɔn mbrato—Hɔn nye nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no nyina yɛ N’asefo—Ɔdze Owusoɛr ba—Mbofra nkakraba wɔ onnyiewiei nkwa. Bɛyɛ mfe 148 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei Abinadi see hɔn dɛ: Mepɛ dɛ hom tse ase dɛ Nyankopɔn nankasa besian aba adasamba mu, na ɔabɔpon no nkorɔfo.

2 Na osiandɛ ɔtse honam mu ntsi wɔbɛfrɛ no Nyankopɔn ne Ba, na ɔbɛbrɛ no ho adze wɔ honam mu dze ama Egya no ne pɛ, dɛ ɔyɛ Egya na Ɔba—

3 Egya, osiandɛ wonyinseen no wɔ Nyame no tum mu; nna Ɔba, osian honam no ntsi; dɛm na ɔma ɔbɛyɛ Egya na Ɔba no—

4 Na wɔyɛ Nyame kor, nyew, sor nye asaase Onnyiewiei Egya noara.

5 Dɛm na honam no bɛhyɛ Sunsum no ase, anaadɛ Ɔba no hyɛ Egya no ase, ma wɔayɛ Nyame kor, nsɔhwɛ too no, na oenngyaa no ho amma nsɔhwɛ no, na mbom ɔmaa kwan ma wosii no atwetwe, na wɔkãa no mpire, na wɔtoow no kyenee, na no nkorɔfo poow no.

6 Na iyi nyinara ekyir no, ɔayɛ anwanwadze akɛse wɔ adasamba mu ewie no, wɔnye no bɔkɔ, nyew, dɛ mbrɛ Isaiah mpo kãe dɛ, ɔtse dɛ oguan a ɔatɔ mmum wɔ ne nhwitwitwafo enyim no, ntsi oemmbue n’ano.

7 Nyew, dɛmara so mpo na wɔnye no bɔkɔ akɔbɔ no mbeamudua mu, na woeku no, na no honam no abɛhyɛ owu ase, na Ɔba no ne pɛ akɔ akɛhyɛ Egya no ne pɛ mu.

8 Na dɛm na Nyankopɔn bobubu owu no mpokyerɛ mu, ber a oedzi konyim wɔ owu do; ɔama Ɔba no tum ma ɔayɛ ntamugyinafo ama adasamba—

9 Na ɔbɔfow akɔ sor, na ehumbɔbɔr ahyɛ n’abadaa mu; ayamuhyehye ahyɛ no mã wɔ adasamba ho, oegyina hɔ nye pɛrpɛr ntamu; ber a oebubu owu no mpokyerɛ mu, na ɔafa hɔn emumuyɛ nye mbrato ato no do, na ɔapon hɔn, na ɔayɛ pɛrpɛr n’ahyɛdze ama no.

10 Na afei mese hom dɛ, Woana na ɔbɛda n’ebusuasantsen edzi? Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, ber a wɔdze ne kra abɔ afɔr ama bɔn yi, obohu n’asefo. Na afei hom ka dɛn? Na woananom na wɔbɛyɛ n’asefo?

11 Hwɛ mese hom dɛ, obiara a ɔatse nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn nsɛm, nyew, nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn a wɔahyɛ nkɔm a ɔfa Ewuradze ne mbaa ho—Mese hom dɛ, hɔn a woetsie hɔn nsɛm, na wɔagye edzi dɛ Ewuradze bɔpon no nkorɔfo, na wɔhwɛɛ dɛm da no kwan a wobenya hɔn bɔnfakyɛ no, mese hom dɛ, woyinom nye n’asefo, anaadɛ wɔyɛ Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no adzedzifo.

12 Na woyinom nye hɔn a ɔsoaa hɔn bɔn; woyinom nye hɔn a owui maa hɔn, ama ɔaapon hɔn eefi hɔn mbrato mu. Na afei, ana wɔnnyɛ n’asefo?

13 Nyew, ana nnyɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no a, obiara a oebue n’ano ahyɛ nkɔm no, na ɔnnhwee mbrato mu, mekyerɛ dɛ nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn nyinara a wɔaba fitsi wiadze ahyɛse? Mese hom dɛ hɔn nyinara yɛ n’asefo.

14 Na woyinom nye hɔn a wɔdze asomdwee apetse, hɔn a wɔdze nsɛmpa aba, hɔn a wɔdze nkwagye aba; na wɔsee Zion dɛ: wo Nyame dzi hen!

15 Na O mbrɛ hɔn anan ho dua yɛ fɛw wɔ mbepɔw no do a!

16 Na bio mbrɛ hɔn a wogu do rekã asomdwee nsɛm no, hɔn anan ho dua yɛ fɛw wɔ mbepɔw no do a!

17 Na bio, mbrɛ hɔn a ekyir yi so wɔbɛkã asomdwee nsɛm no, hɔn anan ho dua yɛ fɛw wɔ mbepɔw no do a, nyew, fitsi aber yi na afebɔɔ!

18 Na hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, nnyɛ ne nyinara nye yi. Na O mbrɛ nyia ɔdze nsɛmpa ba no n’anan ho dua yɛ fɛw wɔ mbepɔw no do a, ɔno nye asomdwee ne farbaa, nyew, Ewuradze mpo a; ɔno na ɔapon no nkorɔfo; ɔno nye nyia ɔdze nkwagye ama no nkorɔfo;

19 Na sɛ nnyɛ ɔpon a ɔdze too hɔ maa no nkorɔfo, dza wosiesiee too hɔ fitsi wiadze ne fapem no, mese hom dɛ, sɛ nnyɛ iyi a, nkyɛ adasamba nyinara bɛhera.

20 Mbom hwɛ, wobobubu owu no mpokyerɛ mu na Ɔba no edzi hen, na ɔwɔ tum wɔ owu do; dɛm ntsi ɔdze owusoɛr abɔbɔadze.

21 Na owusoɛr bɛba, owusoɛr a odzi kan no mpo; nyew, owusoɛr mpo ma hɔn a wɔaba dada, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ ha sesei, nye hɔn a wɔbɛba no, kesi Christ no wusoɛr mpo—na dɛm na wɔbɛfrɛ no.

22 Na afei, nkɔnhyɛfo nyinara hɔn wusoɛr, nye hɔn a wɔgyee hɔn nsɛm dzii no, anaadɛ hɔn a wodzii Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do no, wobopue aba wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu; dɛm ntsi, hɔn nye owusoɛr edzikamfo.

23 Woenyan hɔn ma wɔnye Nyankopɔn a ɔapon hɔn no atsena; dɛm ntsi wɔwɔ onnyiewiei nkwa wɔ Christ mu, nyia oebubu owu mpokyerɛ mu.

24 Na iyinom nye hɔn a wɔwɔ kyɛfa wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu; na iyinom nye hɔn a wɔannkã nkwagyesɛm no annkyerɛ hɔn na wowui ansaana Christ reba. Na dɛm na Ewuradze dze nkenyan bɛma iyinom ma woenya kyɛfa wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu, anaadɛ Ewuradze apon hɔn ma woenya onnyiewiei nkwa.

25 Na mbofra nkakraba so wɔ onnyiewiei nkwa.

26 Mbom hwɛ, na suro, na ma woho mpopo wɔ Nyame enyim, na ɔsɛ dɛ woho popo; osiandɛ Ewuradze rommpon obiara a ɔtsew etua wɔ no do na owu wɔ no bɔn mu; nyew, dɛm nkorɔfo yi nyinara ahera wɔ hɔn bɔn ntsi fitsi aber a wɔhyɛɛ wiadze ase, hɔn a wosii nketse tseew etua wɔ Nyankopɔn do, hɔn a wonyim Nyame ne mbrasɛm na wonndzi do; woyinom na wonnyi kyɛfa wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu.

27 Dɛm ntsi ɔnnsɛ dɛ woho popo? Osiandɛ nkwagye remmba obiara a ɔtse dɛm hɔ; na Ewuradze mmpon obiara a ɔtse dɛm; nyew, Ewuradze runntum mmpon obiara a ɔtse dɛm; osiandɛ orunntum mmpa no ho; osiandɛ orunntum nnsiw pɛrpɛrdzi kwan.

28 Na afei mese hom dɛ mber bɛba ma wɔabɔ Ewuradze no nkwagye ho dawur akyerɛ ɔman biara, ebusuafo, kasa horow, nye nyimpakuw nyinara.

29 Nyew, Ewuradze, w’aweɔmfo bɛma hɔn ndze do; wɔdze ndze bɔbɔmu na wɔatow ndwom; na wobohu no enyim na enyim ber a Ewuradze dze Zion bɛba bio.

30 Hom ndzi dɛw; hom mbɔmu ntow ndwom, Jerusalem mbea a etwee; na Ewuradze akyekye no nkorɔfo hɔn werɛ, ɔapon Jerusalem.

31 Ewuradze eyi n’abasa krɔnkrɔn no ho wɔ amanaman nyinara enyim; na asaase n’ano n’ano nyinara bohu hɛn Nyankopɔn no nkwagye.
mosiah 16:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nyankopɔn pon nyimpa fi hɔn yew na asehwe tsebew mu—Hɔn a wɔwɔ wiadze su no gyina hɔn ananmu tse dɛ mbrɛ ɔpon bi nnyi hɔ—Christ dze owusoɛr ba dze ma nkwa a onnyi ewiei anaa dze ma afɔbu a onnyi ewiei. Bɛyɛ mfe 148 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, ɔbaa dɛ aber a Abinadi kãa dɛm nsɛm nyinom wiei no, ɔtseen ne nsa na ɔsee dɛ: Mber no bɛba ma obiara ehu Ewuradze no nkwagye; ber a aman, ebusuafo, kasa horow, nye nyimpa nyinara dze hɔn enyiwa bohu na wɔakã wɔ Nyame enyim dɛ n’atsɛmbu nyinara yɛ pɛrpɛr.

2 Na afei wobotwa emumuyɛfo akyen, na iyi bɛma wɔatsẽatsẽa mu, na woesũ, na wɔakeka mu na wɔatwɛr hɔn sẽ; osiandɛ worinntsie Ewuradze ne ndze; dɛm ntsi Ewuradze rommpon hɔn.

3 Na wɔayɛ wiadzefo nye mbɔnsam, na abɔnsam wɔ tum wɔ hɔn do; nyew, dɛm abowatsena dadaw no mpo a ɔdaadaa hɛn awofo a wodzii kan no, ɔno na ɔdze hɔn asehwe bae; ɔno na ɔmaa adasamba bɛyɛɛ honandze, akɔndɔdze, mbɔnsamdze, wonyim papa nye bɔn, nna wogyaa hɔn ho mu maa abɔnsam.

4 Dɛm ntsi adasamba nyinara yewee; na hwɛ, sɛ Nyankopɔn ammpon no nkorɔfo emmfi hɔn yew nye asehwe mu a nkyɛ wɔyeew koraa.

5 Mbom kaa dɛ nyia osi nketse wɔ ne wiadze su mu, na ɔnam bɔn kwan do tsew etua wɔ Nyankopɔn do no, bɛda ho atsena n’asehwe mu, na abɔnsam wɔ tum nyinara wɔ no do. Dɛm ntsi, ɔbɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔpon biara nnyi hɔ ma no, na ɔyɛ ɔtamfo ma Nyame; na abɔnsam so yɛ ɔtamfo ma Nyame.

6 Na afei sɛ Christ ammba wiadze yi mu, ammbɛkã ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba ho nsɛm annkyerɛ tse dɛ mbrɛ ɔaba dadaw a, ɔpon biara nnyi hɔ.

7 Na sɛ Christ annsoɛr emmfi owu mu, anaadɛ oemmbubu owu mpokyerɛ mu ma owumaa nnyi tum, na owu so nnyi bɔr a, nkyɛ owusoɛr biara nnyi hɔ.

8 Mbom owusoɛr wɔ hɔ, dɛm ntsi adakamaa nnyi tum, na owu no bɔr akɛhyɛ Christ mu.

9 Ɔno nye wiadze kan no na nkwa no; nyew, kan a onnyi ewiei, dɛ onnkodum da; nyew, na nkwa a onnyi ewiei, na dɛ owu nnyi hɔ bio.

10 Dɛm ɔnnkyebo honam yi bɛfa bɛkyebo ahyɛ, na honam a ɔprɔw yi bɛfa honam a ɔmmprɔw ahyɛ, wɔdze hɔn bɛba ebegyina Nyankopɔn asɛndzipon enyim, ma woebu hɔn atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse, dɛ oye anaadɛ omuo no—

11 Sɛ oye a, wobenya owusoɛr a ɔyɛ nkwa a onnyi ewiei nye enyigye; na sɛ omuo so a, wobenya afɔbu a onnyi ewiei, na wobeyi hɔn ama abɔnsam, nyia wɔhyɛ n’ase iyi nye afɔbu no—

12 Ber a wɔtaa hɔn honam ne pɛ nye akɔndɔ ekyir, na wɔammfrɛ Ewuradze wɔ aber a ehumbɔbɔr abasa no ɔatsen mu wɔ hɔn do no; na ehumbɔbɔr abasa no wɔtsenee wɔ hɔn do, na wɔannkasa ho; wɔbɔɔ hɔn kɔkɔ wɔ hɔn bɔn ho naaso wɔanntwe hɔnho emmfi ho; na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wonnu hɔnho naaso woennu hɔnho.

13 Na afei, ana ɔnnsɛ dɛ homho popo na hom nu homho wɔ hom bɔn ho, na hom kaa dɛ wɔnam Christ nko do na wɔbɛgye hom nkwa?

14 Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom rekyerɛkyerɛ Moses mbra no a, hom nkyerɛkyerɛ so dɛ ɔyɛ ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba no ne saso—

15 Hom nkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn dɛ ɔpon fi Ewuradze Christ mu ba, ɔno nye nokwar Onnyiewiei Egya no. Amen.
mosiah 17:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 17[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma gye dzi na ɔkyerɛw Abinadi ne nsɛm no—Abinadi wu wɔ ogya mu—Ɔhyɛ nkɔm dɛ hɔn a woruku no no bɛyar na wobodua ogya mu ewu. Bɛyɛ mfe 148 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ aber a Abinadi wiee dɛm nsɛm yi kã no, nna ɔhen no hyɛɛ dɛ asɔfo no mfa no nkɔ ma wonku no.

2 Mbom nna hɔn mu kor wɔ hɔ a ne dzin dze Alma, na ɔno so yɛ Nephi n’asenyi. Na ɔyɛ aberantsɛ, na ɔgyee nsɛm a Abinadi kãe no dzii, osiandɛ onyim emumuyɛdze a Abinadi akasa etsia no; dɛm ntsi ɔhyɛɛ ase paa ɔhen no kyɛw dɛ mma no bo mmfuw Abinadi, mbom ɔngya no kwan ma ɔnkɔ asomdwee mu.

3 Mbom iyi maa ɔhen no no bo fuwii ara yie, na ɔmaa kwan dɛ wonyi Alma mfi hɔn mu, na ɔsomaa no nkowaa dɛ wɔnkã no do nkoku no.

4 Mbom oguanee fii hɔn enyim na ɔdze noho kosumae ma woennhu no. Na okosumaa nda pii mu no ɔkyerɛɛw nsɛm no nyina a Abinadi kãe no.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen no maa n’aweɔmfo no bɔɔ Abinadi ho aprɔw na wɔfaa no; na wɔkyekyeer no na wɔtoow no kyeen efiadze.

6 Na nda ebiasa ekyir no a ɔnye n’asɔfoe pamee wiei no, ɔmaa wɔkɛfaa no baa n’enyim bio.

7 Na ɔsee no dɛ: Abinadi, yenya asɛm etsia wo, na esɛ owu.

8 Osiandɛ akã dɛ Nyankopɔn nankasa besian aba adasamba mu; na afei, dɛm ntsi wobokum wo gyedɛ etwe nsɛm a akã nyina a ɔyɛ mbusu dze ma emi nye mo nkorɔfo no san.

9 Afei Abinadi see no dɛ: Mese wo dɛ moronntwe nsɛm a makã a ɔfa nkorɔfo yi ho no nnsan osiandɛ ɔyɛ nokwar; na dɛ mama hom ehu dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar ntsi na mama moho kwan na mabɔtɔ wo nsamu.

10 Nyew, na mebɛma moho kwan araa dze ekesi owu mu mpo, na moronntwe me nsɛm nnsan, na obegyina hɔ dɛ dasegye etsia hom. Na sɛ hom ku me a, hom bɛkã bɔgya a afɔbu nnyi ho egu, na iyi so begyina hɔ dɛ ɔyɛ dasegye etsia hom wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

11 Na afei nkyɛ ɔhen Noah rebegyaa no mu, osiandɛ nna osuro n’asɛm no; na osuro dɛ Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu bɛba no do.

12 Na mbom asɔfo no maa hɔn ndze do tsiaa no, na wɔhyɛɛ ase kasaa tsiaa no see dɛ: Ɔakã kasa bɔn etsia ɔhen; Dɛm ntsi woekenyan ɔhen no n’ebufuw wɔ no ho, ma oyii no maa dɛ wonkoku no.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔfaa no na wɔkyekyeer no, na wɔdze dadze abaa hwee no, nyew, dze kɔr owu mu mpo.

14 Na afei aber a ogyaframee hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehyew no no, ɔtseaa mu see hɔn dɛ:

15 Hwɛ, dɛ mbrɛ hom dze ayɛ me yi, dɛmara na hom asefo bɛma hom mu dodowara bohu amandze a muruhu yi bi, wɔ ogya mu owu ne yaw mpo; na iyi besi osiandɛ wɔgye Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn no nkwagye no dzi.

16 Na ɔbɛba dɛ osian hom emumuyɛ ntsi hom bohu amandze wɔ nyarba horow pii ano.

17 Nyew, bea a hom bɛdan afa biara wɔbɔhwe hom, na wɔbɛpam hom na wɔabɔ hom apetse na hom edzi akɔnaaba dɛ mbrɛ mbowa abɔyafo pam kwaamu nguankuw.

18 Na dɛm da no mu wobetsiw hom, na hom atamfo nsa bɛkã hom, na hom bohu amandze, dɛ mbrɛ muruhu amandze, wɔ ogya mu owu ne yaw yi.

19 Dɛm na Nyankopɔn dze awerdzi bɛba hɔn a wɔsɛɛ no nkorɔfo do. O Nyame, gye me kra.

20 Na afei ber a Abinadi kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔhwee ase, na owui wɔ ogya no mu; nyew, wokum no osiandɛ ɔammpow Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm, na ɔdze no wu sɔɔw no nokwar a ɔwɔ ne nsɛm ho no ano.
mosiah 18:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 18[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma kã nyamesɛm wɔ kokoa mu—Ɔdze enuma ahyɛmudzi no to gua na onuma binom wɔ Mormon esu mu—Ɔkyekyer Christ N’Asɔr na ɔhyɛ asɔfo—Wɔyɛ pampam suomu na wɔkyerɛkyerɛ nkorɔfo no—Alma na no nkorɔfo guan fi ɔhen Noah nsa kɔ sar no do. Bɛyɛ mfe 147–145 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Alma a oguanee fii ɔhen Noah no nkowaa no nsa no, nuu noho wɔ no bɔn nye n’emumuyɛ ho, na okyinkyiin nkorɔfo no do nsumaamu, na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ hɔn Abinadi ne nsɛm no—

2 Nyew, ɔfa dza ɔreba no ho, nye dza ɔfa ewufomusoɛr so ho, nye nkorɔfo no hɔn mponee a ɔnam Christ no tum, n’amandzehu, nye no wu, na no wusoɛr nye no sorkɔ do bɛba.

3 Na dodowara a wotsiee ne nsɛm no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn. Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ kokoa mu, amma ɔhen no anntse. Na dodowara gyee ne nsɛm no dzii.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ dodowara a wɔgyee no dzii no kɔr bea bi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Mormon, bea no nyaa ne dzin fii no do ɔhen no ne nsaase n’ahe do a odu mber bi a nna mbowa abɔyafo ahyɛ hɔ mã no.

5 Afei, nsunyiwa bi wɔ hɔ a no mu nsu yɛ nsu krɔngyee wɔ Mormon, hɔ na Alma kɛhyɛe, ndua nkakraba kusuww bi wɔ nsu ne nkyɛn, na no mu na ɔdze noho kosumaa adzekyee osiandɛ nna ɔhen no ama wɔrohwehwɛ no.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ dodowara a wɔgyee no dzii no kɔr hɔ ketsiee ne nsɛm.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ nda pii ekyir no nyimpa pii kɔboaa hɔn ano wɔ Mormon dɛ woriketsie Alma ne nsɛm. Nyew, hɔn a wɔgyee ne nsɛm dzii no nyina kɔboaa hɔn ano dɛ woriketsie no. Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn, na ɔkãa nnuho, nye ɔpon, na Ewuradze mu gyedzi ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, Mormon esu wɔ ha (na dɛm na wɔfrɛɛ esu no) na hwɛ, hom enya pɛ dɛ hom bɛba Nyame no nguanbuw mu, na wɔafrɛ hom no nkorɔfo, na hom pɛ dɛ hom soasoa kor biara n’adzesoadze ama ɔayɛ har;

9 Nyew, na hom pɛ dɛ hom nye hɔn a hɔn werɛ ahow dzi hɔn yaw, nyew, na wɔkyekye hɔn a wohia awerɛkyekyer no hɔn werɛ, na wogyina dɛ Nyankopɔn n’adasefo aber nyina wɔ adze nyina mu, wɔ gyinabew biara a hom wɔ mu no mu, kesi owu mu mpo, ama Nyankopɔn apon hom, na wɔakan hom afora owusoɛr edzikamfo no hɔn mu, ama hom eenya onnyiewiei nkwa—

10 Afei mese hom dɛ sɛ iyi yɛ ɔpɛ a ofi hom akoma mu a, nna ebɛnadze na osiw hom kwan dɛ wobonuma hom wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu, ayɛ dasegye wɔ n’enyim dɛ hom nye no edzi ahyɛmu ntsi wɔnnkɛpɛ, dɛ hom bɔsom no na hom edzi ne mbrasɛm do, ama oeehue no Sunsum mbordo mbordo egu hom do?

11 Na afei ber a nkorɔfo no tsee dɛm nsɛm yi no, wɔbɔɔ hɔn nsamu enyigye mu, na wɔtsẽaa mu dɛ: Iyi yɛ ɔpɛ a ofi hɛn akoma mu.

12 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Alma faa Helam, ɔno nye edzikamfo no hɔn mu kor na ɔnye no kɔree kegyinaa nsu no mu, na ɔtseaa mu see dɛ: O Ewuradze, hue wo Sunsum gu w’akowaa do ama ɔdze akoma a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn aayɛ edwuma yi.

13 Na ber a ɔkãa nsɛm yi no, Ewuradze no Sunsum baa no do, na ɔsee dɛ: Helam, menya tumdzi a ofi Otumfo Nyankopɔn no, monuma wo dze gye dase dɛ ahɛn ahyɛmudzi mu dɛ ebɔsom no ekesi dɛ ibowu dɛ mbrɛ nyimpadua a ɔyɛ dɛtse yi tse; na ma Ewuradze nhue no Sunsum ngu wo do na ɔmma wo nkwa a onnyiewiei ɔnam Christ n’ɔpon do, ɔno a oesiesie fitsi wiadze ne fapem no.

14 Na Alma kãa nsɛm yi ekyir no, Alma nye Helam nyina kɛhyɛɛ nsu n’ase, na wɔsoɛree fii nsu no mu bae no nna woridzi dɛw, na Sunsum no ahyɛ hɔn mã.

15 Na Alma faa obi, bio, na ɔkɔr nsu no mu ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebien, na onumaa no dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no kan no ara pɛr, soronko a ɔwɔ mu ara nye dɛ ɔammfa no ho nyina annkɛhyɛ nsu no mu bio.

16 Na dɛm kwan yi na ɔfaa do numaa obiara a ɔkɔr Mormon bea no do no; na hɔn dodow bɛyɛ akra ahaebien na anan; nyew, wonumaa hɔn wɔ Mormon esu mu, na Nyame n’adom hyɛɛ hɔn mã.

17 Na wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Nyame n’asɔr, anaa Christ n’asɔr, ofi dɛm aber no dze kɔ. Na ɔbaa dɛ obiara a wɔnam Nyame no tum do numaa no no bɛkãa n’asɔr no ho.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ Alma a ɔwɔ tumdzi fi Nyame hɔ no hyɛɛ asɔfo; hɔn mu eduonum biara nyaa ɔsɔfo kor a ɔkã asɛmpa no kyerɛ hɔn na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ndzɛmba a ɔfa Nyankopɔn n’ahenman ho.

19 Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn biribiara nka dza ɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn no ho, nye dza nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no dze hɔn ano kãe no ho.

20 Nyew, ɔhyɛɛ hɔn mpo dɛ mma wɔnnkã asɛmpa biara gyedɛ nnuho nye gyedzi wɔ Ewuradze mu ho, nyia ɔapon no nkorɔfo no.

21 Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wentwiwentwi mba obiara nye no nua ntamu, na mbom wɔmfa enyiwa kor nhwɛ kan, wɔ gyedzi kor nye enuma kor mu, akoma a wɔabɔmu wɔ koryɛ mu na wɔndodɔ hɔnho nkorkor.

22 Na dɛm na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnka asɛmpa no. Na dɛm ntsi wɔbɛyɛɛ Nyankopɔn ne mba.

23 Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkaa ahomgyeda no na wonsie no krɔnkrɔn, na da biara so wɔmfa ndaase mma Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn.

24 Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn bio dɛ hɔn a ɔahyɛ hɔn asɔfo no mfa hɔnankasa hɔn nsa nyɛ edwuma mfa nhwɛ hɔnho.

25 Na wɔdze da kor sii hɔ wɔ dapɛn biara mu a wɔboaa hɔn ano dze kyerɛkyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no, na wɔsoom Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, na aber biara so a wobotum no, wohyiaa mu.

26 Na onnyi dɛ asɔfo no hɔn enyi da kwan dɛ dɔm no bɛnyɛn hɔn; mbom hɔn ndwuma n’akatua nye dɛ hɔn nsa bɛkã Nyame n’adom, dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dzen wɔ Sunsum mu, na woenya Nyame ne nyimdzee, ama wɔdze ahoɔdzen nye tum a ofi Nyankopɔn hɔ akyerɛkyerɛ.

27 Na bio Alma hyɛɛ dɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu no nyiyi hɔn ahodze mfa mma, obiara dɛ mbrɛ dodow biara a ɔwɔ no tse; sɛ ɔwɔ no mbordo a, ɔwɔ dɛ ɔma mbordo; na nyia ɔwɔ kakraabi no, ɔmma kakraabi, na mbom nyia onnyi bi no so, wɔmma no bi.

28 Na dɛm na wonyiyi hɔn ahodze mfa mma mfi hɔnankasa hɔn akoma mu nye ɔpɛ pa a wɔwɔ no wɔ Nyankopɔn mu, mfa mma asɔfo a wɔwɔ ahokyer mu, nyew, nye ɔkra biara a ohia na odzi adagyaw.

29 Na Nyame na ɔhyɛɛ no dɛ ɔnka nkyerɛ hɔn; na wɔnantseew tɔɔtseen wɔ Nyame enyim, na wonyi mma hɔn ho nkorkor dɛ mbrɛ hɔn hia na hɔn ahwehwɛdze wɔ honam nye sunsum mu nyina tse.

30 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ wɔyɛɛ iyi nyina wɔ Mormon, nyew, wɔ Mormon esu ho, wɔ haban a ɔbɛn Mormon esu ho mu; nyew, Mormon mbew do, Mormon esu, Mormon haban mu, mbrɛ hɔ duaa yɛɛ fɛw maa hɔn a wɔbaa hɔ bohun hɔn Pomfo no a, nyew, na mbrɛ woduaa hyiraa hɔn a, na wɔbɔtow n’ayɛyi ndwom afebɔɔ.

31 Na wɔyɛɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi wɔ asaase no, n’ahe do no ho, amma ɔhen no anntse hɔn nkã.

32 Mbom hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen no hun dɛ biribi rokɔ do wɔ nkorɔfo no mu, dɛm ntsi ɔsomaa no nkowaa dɛ wɔnkɛtsɛw hɔn. Dɛm ntsi da bi aber a wɔboaa hɔn ano dɛ woritsie Ewuradze n’asɛm no wobohun hɔn na wɔkɛkãa kyerɛɛ ɔhen no.

33 Na afei ɔhen no kãa dɛ Alma rununu nkorɔfo no ma wɔatsew no do etua; dɛm ntsi ɔsomaa no nsordaafo dɛ wɔnkɛsɛɛ hɔn.

34 Na ɔbaa dɛ Alma nye Ewuradze no dɔm no tsee nkã dɛ ɔhen no nsordaafo no reba; dɛm ntsi wɔfaa hɔn ntamadan nye hɔn ebusua ebusua na wofii hɔ kɔr sar no do.

35 Na hɔn dodow bɛyɛ akra ahaanan eduonum.
mosiah 19:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 19[/font_size][/center]

[i]Gideon per dɛ oboku ɔhen Noah—Lamanfo kyer nsera wɔ asaase no do—Ɔhen Noah wu wɔ ogya mu—Limhi dzi hen a otua tow. Bɛyɛ mfe 145–121 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen no ne nsordaafo no kyinii hwehwɛɛ Ewuradze ne dɔm no, na woennhu hɔn ntsi wɔsanee.

2 Na afei hwɛ, ɔhen no ne dɔm no do huanee ma ɔkaa kakraabi na mpaapaamu hyɛɛ ase baa hɔn a wɔaka no mu.

3 Na afã no a wosuar no hyɛɛ ase hwinhwiin ɔhen no, na wentwiwentwi hyɛɛ ase baa hɔn mu.

4 Na afei ɔbarimba bi wɔ hɔn mu a ne dzin dze Gideon, na ɔyɛ ɔbarimba a no ho yɛ dzen na ɔyɛ ɔhen no ne tamfo, dɛm ntsi ɔtwee ne nkrantsee, na ɔkãa ntam wɔ n’ebufuhyew mu dɛ oboku ɔhen no.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔnye ɔhen no kõe; na aber a ɔhen no hun dɛ oribedzi no do konyim no, oguanee na ɔkɛhyɛɛ abantsentsen bi a ɔwɔ temple no ne nkyɛn no do.

6 Na Gideon taa no do dɛ nkyɛ ɔrokɔ abantsentsen no do ekoku ɔhen no, na ɔhen no dze n’enyiwa kɔr aprɔw dze hwɛɛ Shemlon asaase do, na hwɛ, ohun Laman nsordaafo dɛ wɔatra asaase no n’ahe aba mu.

7 Na afei ɔhen no dze ne kra mu ahohyehye tseatseaa mu dzendzenndzen see dɛ: Gideon, mma nnku me na Lamanfo no etu hɛn do sa, na wɔrebɛsɛɛ hɛn; nyew, wɔrebɛsɛɛ mo nkorɔfo.

8 Na afei nna nnyɛ dɛ no nkorɔfo no ho hia no pii dɛ nankasa no nkwa; naaso Gideon dze no nkwa kyɛɛ no.

9 Na ɔhen no hyɛɛ no nkorɔfo no dɛ wonguan Lamanfo no, na nankasa dzii hɔn enyim ma woguanee kɔr sar no do, wɔnye hɔn mbasiafo nye hɔn mba nyinara.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no taa hɔn do, na wɔtõo hɔn, na wɔhyɛɛ ase kunkum hɔn.

11 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen no see mbarimba no dɛ wongyaa hɔn yernom nye hɔn mba no na wonguan Lamanfo no.

12 Afei nna hɔn mu dodowara mmpɛ dɛ wogyaa hɔn, na mbom wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔbɛka hɔ na wɔnye hɔn ewu. Na nkaafo no gyaa hɔn yernom nye hɔn mba ma woguanee.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn a wɔnye hɔn yernom nye hɔn mba kaa hɔ no maa hɔn mbabaa ahoɔfɛfo no soɛree gyinaa hɔn enyim na wɔpaa Lamanfo no kyɛw dɛ mma wonnku hɔn.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no nyaa ayamuhyehye maa hɔn osiandɛ hɔn mbasiafo hɔn ahoɔfɛw no hyɛɛ hɔn do dodow.

15 Dɛm ntsi Lamanfo no dze hɔn nkwa kyɛɛ hɔn, na wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum na wɔdze hɔn sanee kɔr Nephi asaase do, na wɔmaa hɔn kwan dɛ wɔmfa asaase no, na mbom wɔnhyɛ bɔ dɛ wɔbɛkyer ɔhen Noah dze no ama hɔn, na wɔmfa hɔn ahodze mma hɔn; wɔnkyɛ hɔn sika nye dwetɛ nye hɔn ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo nyinara mu ebien mfa nyɛ tow ntua mma Lamanfo hɔn hen afe biara.

16 Na afei hɔn a wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum no hɔn mu kor yɛ ɔhen no ne babanyin; ne dzin dze Limhi.

17 Na afei Limhi ammpɛ dɛ wɔsɛɛ n’egya; naaso, Limhi nyim n’egya n’emumuyɛdze nyinara, na nankasa dze odzi pɛrpɛr.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ Gideon somaa nyimpa wɔ nsumaamu dɛ wɔnkɔ sar no do nkɔhwehwɛ ɔhen no nye hɔn a wɔkã no ho no. Na ɔbaa dɛ wohyiaa nkorɔfo no nyinara wɔ sar no do, kã ɔhen no nye n’asɔfoe no.

19 Afei wɔkãa ntam wɔ hɔn akoma mu dɛ wɔbɛsan hɔn ekyir akɔ Nephi asaase do, na sɛ woekuku hɔn yernom na hɔn mba nye hɔn so a wɔnye hɔn kae no a, ɔnodze wɔbɛyɛ hɔn bi ahyɛ ananmu, na wɔnye hɔn nyinara so ahwer hɔn nkwa.

20 Na ɔhen no hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnsan hɔn ekyir; na hɔn bo fuuw ɔhen no, na wɔmaa ohun amandze, ma owui wɔ ogya mu mpo.

21 Na nkyɛ wɔrefa asɔfo no so na woeku hɔn, na woguanee fii hɔn enyim.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ nkyɛ wɔresan hɔn ekyir akɔ Nephi asaase do no, wohyiaa Gideon no nkorɔfo no. Na Gideon no nkorɔfo no kãa dza osii hɔn yernom na hɔn mba do; na dɛ Lamanfo no ama hɔn kwan dɛ wɔmfa asaase no na wɔmfa hɔn ahodze mu fã ntua tow mma Lamanfo.

23 Na nkorɔfo no kãa kyerɛɛ Gideon no nkorɔfo no dɛ woeku ɔhen no, na n’asɔfoe no eguan kɔ ekyirekyir wɔ sar no do.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ wowiee ehyiadzi no, wɔdze enyigye saan hɔn ekyir kɔr Nephi asaase do, osiandɛ woennku hɔn yernom na hɔn mba; na wɔkãa dza wɔdze yɛɛ ɔhen no kyerɛɛ Gideon.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo hɔn hen no dzii nsew kyerɛɛ hɔn, dɛ mma no nkorɔfo no nnku hɔn.

26 Na Limhi so osiandɛ ɔyɛ ɔhen no ne ba ntsi, no dɔm no hyɛɛ no ɔhen na ɔno so dzii nsew kyerɛɛ Lamanfo hɔn hen no dɛ no nkorɔfo no dze hɔn ahodze mu fã botua tow ama no.

27 Na ɔbaa dɛ Limhi hyɛɛ ase kyekyeer ahenman no na ɔmaa asomdwee baa dɔm no mu.

28 Na Lamanfo hɔn ɔhen no dze aweɔmfo bɔɔ asaase no ho aprɔw ama Limhi no dɔm no aatsena asaase no nko do amma woemmfi hɔ annkɔ sar no do; na tow a onyaa fii Nephifo hɔ no nna ɔdze hwɛɛ aweɔmfo no.

29 Na afei ɔhen Limhi nyaa asomdwee wɔ n’ahenman no mu bɛyɛ mfe ebien ntamu, na Lamanfo no anntseetsee hɔn anaadɛ wɔammper dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn.
mosiah 20:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 20[/font_size][/center]

[i]Noah n’asɔfoe kɛkyekyer Laman mbabaa no bi guan—Lamanfo tu hɔn nsordaafo ma wɔkɔ Limhi na no nkorɔfo do dɛ wɔnye hɔn rokɔkõ—Wɔbɔ Laman nsordaafo gu na wɔpata hɔn. Bɛyɛ mfe 145–123 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei bea bi wɔ Shemlon a Lamanfo mbabaa boa hɔn ano wɔ hɔ tow ndwom na wɔsaw gye hɔn enyi.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ da kor bi hɔn mu kumaabi boaa hɔn ano dɛ wɔrobɔtow ndwom na wɔasaw.

3 Na afei nna ɔhen Noah n’asɔfoe no hɔn enyiwa ato ntsi nna wonntum nnsan hɔn ekyir nnkɔ Nephi kurow no mu, nyew, nna wosuro so dɛ dɔm no boku hɔn, dɛm ntsi wɔyɛɛ dɛ wɔrennsan nnkɔ hɔn yernom na hɔn mba hɔn nkyɛn ara da.

4 Na wɔtsenaa sar no do kyɛree no, wohun Lamanfo hɔn mbaabaa no, wɔtsetsɛɛw hɔn.

5 Na wohun dɛ hɔn a wɔaboa hɔn ano rebɛsaw no suar no, wofii hɔn sumabew hɔ kɛkyekyeer hɔn kɔr sar no do; nyew, Lamanfo mbabaa a wɔdze hɔn kɔr sar no do no hɔn dodow yɛ eduonu-anan.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo hun dɛ hɔn mbabaa no ayew no, hɔn bo fuuw Limhi no nkorɔfo no osiandɛ wosusuu dɛ Limhi no nkorɔfo no na wɔyɛɛ dɛm.

7 Dɛm ntsi wotuu hɔn nsordaafo ma wɔkɔr hɔn do; nyew, ɔhen nankasa mpo na odzii hɔn enyim ma wɔkɔr Nephi asaase no do dɛ wɔrekɛsɛɛ Limhi no nkorɔfo no.

8 Na afei Limhi hun biribiara wɔ abantsentsen no do, hɔn mboaboaho nyinara so mpo ohunii; dɛm ntsi ɔboaboaa no nkorɔfo ano, na wɔtweɔɔn hɔn wɔ haban nye kwaa nyinara mu.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo baa hɔ no, Limhi no nkorɔfo no puei fii hɔn sumabew hɔ na wotui hyɛɛ hɔn do, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worukuku hɔn.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkõ no mu yɛɛ dzen papanara, osiandɛ wɔkõo dɛ nwendadze a wɔrohwehwɛ hɔn afonam.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ Limhi no nkorɔfo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrekã Lamanfo no gu; naaso nna hɔn dodow nndu Lamanfo hɔn dodow mu fã mpo. Naaso wɔkõe osian hɔnankasa hɔn nkwa nye hɔn yernom na hɔn mba nkwa ntsi; iyi ho ntsi wɔmiaa hɔnho kõe dɛ mbowa abɔyafo.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ wohun Lamanfo hɔn hen no dɛ ɔfora hɔn ewufo no mu; naaso nna onnwui, na mbom nna oepira na woegya no wɔ famu hɔ, osiandɛ no dɔm no guaan ntsɛntsɛm.

13 Na wɔfaa no na wɔkyekyeer n’epirakur, na wɔdze no baa Limhi n’enyim, na wɔsee dɛ: Hwɛ, Lamanfo hɔn hen nye yi; opirae na ɔhwee famu wɔ ewufo no mu na woegya no hɔ; na hwɛ, yɛdze no aba w’enyim; na afei ma yenku no.

14 Mbom Limhi see hɔn dɛ: Mma hom nnku no, mbom hom mfa no mbra ha ma monhwɛ no. Na wɔdze no bae. Na Limhi see no dɛ: Siantsir bɛn ntsi na hom aba nye mo nkorɔfo robɔkõ yi? Hwɛ, mo nkorɔfo nntõo nsew a midzii kyerɛɛ wo no; na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔwo atõ nsew a idzii kyerɛɛ mo nkorɔfo yi?

15 Na afei ɔhen no see dɛ: matõ nsew no osiandɛ wo nkorɔfo soaa mo nkorɔfo hɔn mbabaa kɔree; dɛm ntsi m’ebufuhyew mu no na memaa mo nkorɔfo kwan dɛ wɔmbra na wɔnye wo nkorɔfo mobɔkõ.

16 Na afei yi mu no nna Limhi nntsee biribiara fa dɛm asɛm yi ho; dɛm ntsi ɔsee dɛ: mobɔhwehwɛ mo nkorɔfo yi mu na obiara a ɔayɛ dɛm adze yi no ɔbɔhwer no nkwa. Dɛm ntsi ɔmaa kwan dɛ wɔnhwehwɛ no nkorɔfo no mu.

17 Afei aber a Gideon a ɔyɛ ɔhen no nsordaafo mu panyin no tsee dɛm nsɛm yi no, ɔkɔr ɔhen no hɔ kɛsee no dɛ: Meserɛ wo, sie abotar, na mma nnhwehwɛ dɔm yi mu, na mma mmfa asɛm yi nnto hɔn do.

18 Ana ennkaa w’egya n’asɔfoe no a dɛm nkorɔfo yi peer dɛ woboku hɔn no? Ana wonnyi sar no do? Ana nnyɛ hɔn na woewia Lamanfo hɔn mbabaa no?

19 Na afei, hwɛ, na kã dɛm nsɛm yi kyerɛ ɔhen no, ama ɔakã akyerɛ no nkorɔfo no ama ɔaapata hɔn ama hɛn; na hwɛ wɔaboa hɔnho dada reba hɛn do; na hu so dɛ hɛn dodow suar.

20 Na hwɛ, wɔdze hɔn dɔmtutuw nyinara reba; na gyedɛ ɔhen no pata hɔn ma hɛn ɔno yɛbɛhera.

21 Ana Abinadi ne nsɛm no nnhyɛɛ mã, nkɔnhyɛ a ɔhyɛɛ tsiaa hɛn no—na osiandɛ yenntsie Ewuradze ne nsɛm, na yɛanndan emmfi hɛn emumuyɛ ho, ntsi na iyi nyinara aba?

22 Na afei ma yɛmpata ɔhen no, na yendzi nsew a yedzii maa no no do; na oye dɛ yɛbɛhyɛ nkowaasom ase sen dɛ yɛbɔhwer hɛn nkwa; dɛm ntsi ma yensiw dɛm bɔgyagu pii yi ano.

23 Na afei Limhi faa nsɛm a n’egya nye asɔfo no a woguanee kɔr sar no do no kãe no nyinara kyerɛɛ ɔhen no, na ɔdze mfom no too hɔn do dɛ hɔn na wɔbɔsoaa hɔn mbabaa no kɔree.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen no no bo dwee wɔ no nkorɔfo no ho; na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hom mma yɛnkɔ nkehyia mo nkorɔfo no, mma hom mmfa akodze; na medzi nsew akyerɛ hom na mehyɛ bɔ dɛ mo nkorɔfo runnku hom.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔkãa ɔhen no do kɔree a wɔammfa akodze kehyiaa Lamanfo no. Na ɔbaa dɛ wohyiaa Lamanfo no; na ɔhen no bɔɔ no mu adze maa hɔn, na ɔpaa kyɛw maa Limhi no nkorɔfo.

26 Na ber a Lamanfo no hun Limhi no nkorɔfo no dɛ wonnkura akodze no, wonyaa ayamuhyehye maa hɔn na wonyaa abodwee wɔ hɔn ho, na wɔnye hɔn hen no sanee kɔr hɔn asaase do asomdwee mu.
mosiah 21:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 21[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfo hwe Limhi no nkorɔfo na wodzi hɔn do konyim—Limhifo hyia Ammon na ɔsakyer hɔn—Wɔkã Jaredfo mprɛtse eduonu anan no ho asɛm kyerɛ Ammon. Bɛyɛ mfe 122–121 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ Limhi nye no nkorɔfo no saan hɔn ekyir kɔr Nephi kuropɔn no mu, na wɔhyɛɛ ase tsenaa asaase no do asomdwee mu bio.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ nda pii ekyir no Lamanfo no hyɛɛ ase nyaa ebufuw bio wɔ Nephifo no ho, na wobotwaa hɔn asaase ho hyiae.

3 Afei dze wonnyi ho kwan dɛ woku hɔn osian nsew a hɔn hen edzi akyerɛ Limhi no ntsi; na mbom wɔbobɔɔ hɔn asomu na wodzii hɔn do tum; na wɔhyɛɛ ase dze adzesoadze a ɔyɛ dur totoo hɔn ekyir, na wɔkãa hɔn dɛ asoaso a ɔatɔ mmum—

4 Nyew, wɔyɛɛ iyi nyinara ama Ewuradze n’asɛm aahyɛ mã.

5 Na afei Nephifo hɔn amandzehu no yɛɛ kɛse, na wonnhu kwan biara so a wobodua do agye hɔnho efi hɔn nsa, osiandɛ Lamanfo no etwa hɔnho nyinara ehyia.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɔm no hyɛɛ ase hwinhwinii ɔhen no osian hɔn amandzehu no ntsi; na wonyaa pɛ bi dɛ wɔbɔkɔ hɔn do nye hɔn akɔkõ. Na wɔdze hɔn sombobɔ tseetsee ɔhen no dodow; dɛm ntsi ɔmaa hɔn kwan dɛ wɔnyɛ dza wɔpɛ dɛ wɔyɛ.

7 Na wɔboaboaa hɔnho bio, na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn akotar, na wɔkɔr Lamanfo do dɛ worukotu hɔn efi hɔn asaase do.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no kãa hɔn gui, na wɔpaam hɔn na wokum hɔn mu pii.

9 Na afei nna sũ na kwadwom twa aba Limhi no dɔm no mu, okunafo rusũ no kun, babanyin nye babasia rusũ ma hɔn egya, na nuambanyin rusũ ma hɔn nuanom.

10 Afei nna ekunafo pii wɔ asaase no do, na wosũ dzendzenndzen da biara, osian Lamanfo ho suro a ahyɛ hɔn mu mã no ntsi.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn daadaa sũ no pusuuw Limhi no nkorɔfo a wɔaka no ma hɔn bo fuuw Lamanfo no; na wɔkɔr bio dɛ wɔrokɔkõ, na mbom wɔpaam hɔn bio, na wɔhweer nyimpa pii.

12 Nyew, wɔkɔr bio, ne mprɛnsa na wohun amandze dɛmara bio; na hɔn a woennku hɔn no saan hɔn ekyir bio baa Nephi kuropɔn no mu.

13 Na wɔbrɛɛ hɔn ho adze araa wɔ famu mpo, dze hɔn ho hyɛɛ nkowaasom nkɔndua ase, gyaa hɔn ho dze maa ɔhwe nye akɔnaaba ne dzi nye adzesoadze biara a hɔn atamfo pɛɛ dɛ wɔdze soa hɔn no mu.

14 Na wɔbrɛɛ hɔnho adze kɔr ahobrɛadze ne bun mu mpo; na wosũ dzendzenndzen frɛɛ Nyame; nyew, wosũi frɛɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn adzekyee nyinara mu dɛ onyi hɔn mfi hɔn amandzehu mu.

15 Na afei Ewuradze yɛɛ nyaa dɛ obetsie hɔn sũfrɛ osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi; naaso Ewuradze tsiee hɔn sũ, na ɔhyɛɛ ase goow Lamanfo no hɔn akoma; naaso Ewuradze hun dɛ ɔnnsɛ dɛ ɔgye hɔn fi nkowaasom mu.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ prɔmprɔm nkakrankakra wɔ asaase no do, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worinya ewifua pii, nye nguankuw na anantwikuw, dɛm ntsi ɔkɔm anndze hɔn.

17 Afei nna mbaa a wɔwɔ hɔ no dɔɔ sõ sen mbanyin no; dɛm ntsi ɔhen Limhi hyɛɛ mbra dɛ ɔbanyin biara mma biribi ma wɔmfa mboa ekunafo nye hɔn mba, amma ɔkɔm ennku hɔn; na wɔyɛɛ iyi osiandɛ hɔn a wokum hɔn no dɔɔ sõ.

18 Afei Limhi no nkorɔfo no bɔɔ mu yɛɛ kuw kor dɛ mbrɛ wobotum, hwɛɛ hɔn ewifua nye hɔn nguankuw do yie.

19 Na ɔhen nankasa so suroo dɛ no nko bɛtra afasu a wɔatow no wɔ kurow no ho no, gyedɛ n’aweɔmfo kã no ho, osuroo dɛ annhwɛ a nna ɔakɔtɔ Lamanfo nsa mu.

20 Na ɔmaa no nkorɔfo no weɔɔn asaase a etwa hɔn ho ehyia no yie ama wɔnam kwan bi do eetum akyer asɔfo no a woewia Lamanfo hɔn mbabaa dze hɔn eguan akɔ sar no do no a ɔnam dɛm ntsi ma dɛm ɔsɛɛ kɛse a ɔtse dɛm aba hɔn do no.

21 Na wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔkyer hɔn na wɔtwe hɔn aso; osiandɛ wɔaba Nephi asaase do anafua, na wɔabɔsoa hɔn ewifua nye hɔn ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo pii kɔ; dɛm ntsi nna wɔretsɛw hɔn.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ basabasayɛ biara ammbɛda Lamanfo na Limhi no nkorɔfo no ntamu, kesii aber mpo a Ammon nye no nuanom baa asaase no do.

23 Na ɔhen no na n’aweɔmfo fiir edzi kɔr kurow no mbobow ekyir, na hɔ na wohun Ammon na no nuanom no; wɔdween dɛ wɔyɛ Noah n’asɔfoe no, dɛm ntsi ɔmaa wɔfaa hɔn na wɔkyekyeer hɔn dze hɔn too efiadze. Na sɛ wɔyɛ Noah n’asɔfoe no a nkyɛ ɔmaa wokum hɔn.

24 Mbom aber a ohun dɛ ɔnntse dɛm, na mbom wɔyɛ n’enuanom, na wofi Zarahemla asaase do bae no, dɛw kɛse hyɛɛ no mã.

25 Afei ansaana Ammon rebɛba hɔ no, ɔhen Limhi somaa nyimpa kakra bi dɛ wɔnkɔhwehwɛ Zarahemla asaase no; na mbom woennhu hɔ, na wɔyeew wɔ sar no do.

26 Naaso, wohun asaase a nna dɔm wɔ do ara yie; nyew, asaase a mbiew a ho akokwa ahyɛ do mã; nyew, asaase a nkyɛ nyimpa pii wɔ do na wɔasɛɛ no; na wosusuu dɛ ɔyɛ Zarahemla asaase, ntsi wɔsaan hɔn ekyir baa Nephi asaase do, wodur asaase no do no, annkyɛr biara na Ammon bae.

27 Na wɔdze nkyerɛwee bi bae, nkorɔfo no a wohun hɔn mbiew no hɔn nkyerɛwee mpo; na woekrukye no wɔ boran mprɛtse do.

28 Na afei dɛw hyɛɛ Limhi ma bio ber a ɔtsee fii Ammon n’anomu dɛ ɔhen Mosiah wɔ akyɛdze a ofi Nyame hɔ a ɔbɛma oetum akyerɛ nkrukye no ase no; nyew, na Ammon so n’enyi gyee.

29 Naaso awerɛhow hyɛɛ Ammon na no n’enuanom no ma osiandɛ woekuku hɔn enuanom no mu pii.

30 Na bio ɔhen Noah nye n’asɔfoe so ama nkorɔfo no ayɛ emumuyɛdze pii etsia Nyankopɔn; na wosũi so dze maa Abinadi no wu; nna Alma nye dɔm a wɔka no ho kɔree no so, hɔn a wɔnam Nyankopɔn n’ahoɔdzen na no tum do nyaa gyedzi gyee nsɛm a Abinadi kãe no too mu no kyekyeer Nyame n’asɔr.

31 Nyew, wosũi wɔ hɔn nkɔree no ntsi, osiandɛ wonnyim bea a woeguan kɔ. Nkyɛ wɔdze enyigye bɔdɔm hɔn, osiandɛ hɔn so nye Nyame edzi ahyɛmu dɛ wɔbɔsom no na woedzi ne mbrasɛm do.

32 Na afei ofitsi ber a Ammon bae n’ekyir no, ɔhen Limhi nye no nkorɔfo no mu dodowara so nye Nyame edzi ahyɛmu dɛ wɔbɔsom no na woedzi ne mbrasɛm do.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Limhi nye no nkorɔfo no mu dodowara pɛɛ dɛ wonuma hɔn; mbom nna obiara nnyi asaase no do a oenya tumdzi bi efi Nyame hɔ. Na Ammon ammpɛ dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛm adze yi, nna obu noho dɛ ɔyɛ akowaa a onndzi mu.

34 Dɛm ntsi dɛm aber no wɔammboa hɔn ano annkyekyer asɔr, mbom nna wɔrotweɔn Ewuradze no Sunsum. Afei nna wɔpɛ dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ Alma nye n’enuanom no mpo, a woeguan kɔ sar no do no tse.

35 Wɔpɛɛ dɛ wonnuma hɔn ma ɔyɛ dasegye dɛ wɔpɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔn akoma nyinara som Nyame; naaso wɔmaa mber guu mu ara yie; na wɔbɛkã hɔn enuma ho nsɛm ekyir yi.

36 Na afei Ammon na no dɔm, nye ɔhen Limhi na no dɔm hɔn aperdzi ara nye dɛ wobefi Lamanfo nsa na woefi nkowaasom mu.
mosiah 22:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wɔyɛ nhyehyɛɛ a nkorɔfo no botum edua do eguan efi Laman nkowaasom mu—Wɔma Lamanfo nom nsã bobow—Nkorɔfo no guan, san kɔ Zarahemla na wɔbɔsom Ɔhen Mosiah. Bɛyɛ mfe 121–120 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Ammon nye ɔhen Limhi hyɛɛ ase bisabisaa dɔm no kwan a wobotum edua do agye hɔnho efi nkowaasom mu; na wɔmaa dɔm no nyinara poon hɔn ho hyiaa mu; na wɔyɛɛ dɛm ama hɔn nyinara woeetum akyerɛ hɔn adwen wɔ asɛm no ho.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ woennhu kwan biara a wɔbɛfa do agye hɔnho efi nkowaasom mu, gyedɛ wɔfa hɔn mbasiafo nye mbofra no, nna hɔn nguankuw, nye anantwikuw, nye hɔn ntamadan, na woguan kɔ sar no do, osiandɛ Lamanfo no dɔɔ sõ ntsi ɔyɛ dzen dɛ Limhi ne dɔm no botum nye hɔn akõ na wɔagye hɔn ho efi nkowaasom mu.

3 Afei ɔbaa no dɛ Gideon kɔree kegyinaa ɔhen no n’enyim, na ɔsee no dɛ: O ɔhen, mpɛn pii na etsie me nsɛm ber a yɛnye hɛn enuanom Lamanfo nyaa akasakasa no.

4 Na afei, O ɔhen sɛ innhun dɛ meyɛ akowaa a mfaso nnyi no ho, anaa sɛ etsie me nsɛm kakra ara yie ma ɔayɛ mboa ama wo dze a, nna mebɛpɛ dɛ ibetsie me nsɛm dɛm aber yi so, na mebɛyɛ wo akowaa na magye nkorɔfo yi efi nkowaasom mu.

5 Na ɔhen no maa no kwan dɛ ɔnkasa. Nna Gideon see no dɛ:

6 Hwɛ kwan a ɔda ban no ekyir wɔ kurow n’ekyir afamu hɔ no. Lamanfo, anaa Lamanfo aweɔmfo, nom nsa bow anadwe biara; dɛm ntsi ma yɛnsoma ma wɔnkɔ nkɛse hɔn dɛ wɔmboaboa hɔn nguankuw na anantwikuw ano, ama wɔaaka hɔn akɔ sar no do anadwe.

7 Na dɛ mbrɛ wo mbra tse no, mobɔkɔ ekotua wenyin tow a odzi ewiei ama Lamanfo no, na wɔaabobɔw na ber a wɔabobow na wɔadeda no, yebodua nsumaamu kwan no a ɔda asaase no n’abankum afamu hɔ no akɔ.

8 Dɛm na yebotum nye hɛn mbasiafo na hɛn mba nye hɛn nguankuw na anantwikuw akɔ sar no do; na yɛbɛfa Shilom asaase ho akɔ.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen no tsiee Gideon ne nsɛm no.

10 Na ɔhen Limhi hyɛɛ mbra dɛ no nkorɔfo no mboaboa hɔn nguankuw ano; na wonkotua wenyin tow no mma Lamanfo no; na ɔsomaa so ma wɔdze wenyin pii kɛkyɛɛ hɔn; na wɔnoom wenyin a ɔhen Limhi dze kɛmaa hɔn no ara yie.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Limhi no nkorɔfo no fii hɔ anadwe no kɔr sar no do, wɔdze hɔn nguankuw nye hɔn anantwikuw, na woduaa Shilom asaase nkyɛn wɔ sar no do, na wɔfaa Zarahemla asaase do kwan, Ammon nye no nuanom na wodzii hɔn enyim.

12 Na wɔfaa hɔn sika, na dwetɛ, nye hɔn ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo nyinara a wobotum asoa, nye hɔn edziban so dze sii mu tuu hɔn kwan kɔr sar no do.

13 Na wodzii nda pii wɔ sar no do ekyir no, wodur Zarahemla asaase do, na wɔkɛkãa Mosiah no nkorɔfo no ho na wɔbɛyɛɛ nedze.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ Mosiah dze enyigye gyee hɔn; na ɔgyee hɔn nkyerɛwee no so, nye nkyerɛwee no so a Limhi no nkorɔfo no hunii no.

15 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ Limhi no nkorɔfo no eguan efi asaase no do anadwe no, wotuu nsordaafo dɛ wontsiw hɔn wɔ sar no do;

16 Na wotsiiw hɔn bɛyɛ nda ebien na woennhu bea a wɔfae; dɛm ntsi wɔyewee wɔ sar no do.
mosiah 23:
Dza ɔfa Alma nye Ewuradze no nkorɔfo a ɔhen Noah no dɔm paam hɔn koguu sar no do ho.

Ne nyinara wɔ etsir 23 na 24 mu.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 23[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma pow dɛ obedzi hen—Ɔsom dɛ ɔsɔfopanyin—Ewuradze tsẽa No nkorɔfo, na Lamanfo dzi Helam asaase do konyim—Amulon, Ɔhen Noah n’asɔfoe etsiɔdzenfo no ne kandzifo bɛhyɛ Laman ahentum ase dzi hen. Bɛyɛ mfe 145–121 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei Ewuradze bɔɔ Alma kɔkɔ dɛ ɔhen Noah no nsordaafo no bɛba hɔn do, ntsi ɔkãa kyerɛɛ no dɔm no ma dɛm ntsi wɔboaboaa hɔn nguankuw nye hɔn ewifua ano, na wosii mu kɔr sar no do ansaana ɔhen Noah no nsordaafo no reba.

2 Na Ewuradze maa hɔn ahoɔdzen amma ɔhen Noah no annto hɔn na wɔannsɛɛ hɔn.

3 Na woguanee ara nda awɔtwe wɔ sar no do.

4 Na wɔbaa asaase bi do, nyew, asaase a ɔyɛ fɛw na ɔyɛ ahomka so, asaase a nsu krɔngyee wɔ do.

5 Na wosisii hɔn ntamadan na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɔɔw asaase no, na wɔhyɛɛ ase sisii adan; nyew, wɔyɛ edwumayɛfo ntsi wɔyɛɛ edwuma mbordo.

6 Na nkorɔfo no pɛɛ dɛ Alma bɛyɛ hɔn hen, osiandɛ nna no nkorɔfo no dɔ no yie.

7 Mbom ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, onnhia dɛ yebenya ɔhen; na dɛm na Ewuradze se: Mma hom mmbu honam kor nnsen kor, anaa mma nyimpa bi nndwen mma no ho dɛ ɔbɔ obi do; dɛm ntsi mese hom dɛ onnhia dɛ hom benya ɔhen.

8 Naaso sɛ hom botum enya nyimpa a wodzi pɛrpɛr daa ma wɔayɛ hom hen a ɔno obeye ama hom dɛ hom benya ɔhen.

9 Mbom hom nkaa ɔhen Noah nye n’asɔfoe no hɔn emumuyɛ; na emi mara mpo motɔɔ efir mu ma meyɛɛ ndzɛmba pii a ɔyɛ ekyiwadze wɔ Ewuradze enyim a ɔmaa munuu moho kɛsenara.

10 Naaso, abɛbrɛsɛ pii ekyir no, Ewuradze tsiee mo sufrɛ, na otsiee me mpaabɔ, na ɔayɛ me edwindadze wɔ ne nsamu ma hom mu dodowara ebenya no nokwar ho nyimdzee.

11 Naaso, mennhyɛ moho enyimnyam wɔ iyi mu, osiandɛ minndzi mu biara a ɔsɛ dɛ mehyɛ moho enyimnyam.

12 Na afei mese hom dɛ, ɔhen Noah tseetsee hom, na hom yɛɛ nkowaa maa ɔno nye n’asɔfoe, na wɔmaa hom yɛɛ emumuyɛdze; dɛm ntsi wɔdze emumuyɛ mpokyerɛ kyekyeer hom.

13 Na afei dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn dze no tum eyi hom efi dɛm nkyehoma yi mu; nyew, oegya hom mpo efi ɔhen Noah nye no dɔm nsa, na oeyi hom so efi emumuyɛ nkyehoma mu no, dɛmara so na mepɛ dɛ hom gyina pintsinn wɔ dɛm ahotɔ yi a hom enya yi mu, na mma hom mmfa hom werɛ nnhyɛ ɔdasanyi biara mu dɛ obedzi hom do hen.

14 Na mma hom nnsusu so dɛ obi mbɛyɛ hom kyerɛkyerɛnyi anaa hom sɔfoe; gyedɛ ɔyɛ Nyame ne nyimpa a ɔnantsew n’akwan mu na odzi ne mbrasɛm do.

15 Dɛm na Alma dze kyerɛkyerɛɛ no nkorɔfo, dɛ ɔdasanyi biara wɔ dɛ ɔdɔ ne nyɛnko dɛ nankasa noho, amma wentwiwentwi ammba hɔn mu.

16 Na afei, Alma bɛyɛɛ hɔn sɔfopanyin, osiandɛ ɔno na ɔkyekyeer asɔr no.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ obiara ennya tumdzi dɛ ɔbɛkã nsɛmpa no anaa ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ gyedɛ Nyame dze dua no do dze ma. Dɛm ntsi ohyiraa hɔn asɔfoe nye hɔn akyerɛkyerɛfo no nyinara; na oennhyira hɔn mu biara gyedɛ hɔn a wodzi pɛrpɛr no.

18 Dɛm ntsi wɔhwɛɛ hɔn nkorɔfo no do yie, na ndzɛmba a ɔfa tseneneeyɛ ho nko na wɔdze nyɛn hɔn.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔhyɛɛ ase yɛɛ prɔmprɔm mbordo wɔ asaase no do; na wɔfrɛɛ asaase no Helam.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔdɔree na wɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm mbordo wɔ Helam asaase no do; na wɔkyekyeer kurow kɛse bi a wɔtoo no dzin Helam kuropɔn.

21 Naaso, Ewuradze hu dɛ oye dɛ ɔtsẽa no nkorɔfo; nyew, na ɔsɔ hɔn abotar na hɔn gyedzi hwɛ.

22 Naaso, obiara a ɔdze no werɛ twer no no, ɔnoara so na wɔbɛmaa no do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu. Nyew, na dɛm na ɔdze yɛɛ nkorɔfo yi.

23 Na hwɛ, mebɛkyerɛ wo dɛ wɔdze hɔn baa nkowaasom mu, na obiara enntum anngye hɔn, gyedɛ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, nyew, nyia ɔyɛ Abraham na Isaac na Jacob Nyankopɔn no.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔgyee hɔn, na ɔdaa no tum kɛse no edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn, na hɔn enyigye yɛɛ kɛse.

25 Na hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ aber a wɔwɔ Helam asaase do no, nyew, wɔ Helam kurow kɛse mu no, ber a wɔrodɔw twa asaase no ho no, wohun Lamanfo nsordaafo no mu bi wɔ asaase n’ahe do.

26 Afei ɔbaa dɛ Alma n’enuanom no guanee fii hɔn kwã mu, na wɔboaa hɔn ano wɔ Helam kurow kɛse no mu; na hɔn akoma tuu kɛsenara osian Lamanfo no ntsi.

27 Mbom Alma kɔree kegyinaa hɔn mu na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn nkuran dɛ mma hɔn akoma nntu, na mbom wɔnkaa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn na ɔbɛgye hɔn.

28 Dɛm ntsi wɔtram hɔn suro, na wɔhyɛɛ ase sũi frɛɛ Ewuradze dɛ ɔndwedwe Lamanfo no hɔn akoma ama wɔdze hɔn nye hɔn yernom na hɔn mba hɔn nkwa aakyɛ hɔn.

29 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze goow Lamanfo no hɔn akoma. Na Alma nye n’enuanom no kɔree kegyaa hɔnho hyɛɛ Lamanfo nsa; na Lamanfo no faa Helam asaase no.

30 Afei Laman nsordaafo no a wotsiiw ɔhen Limhi no nkorɔfo no yeew wɔ sar no do nda pii.

31 Na hwɛ, wohun ɔhen Noah n’asɔfoe no wɔ bea a wɔfrɛ hɔ Amulon; na wɔfaa Amulon asaase no na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrodɔw asaase no.

32 Afei dɛm asɔfo no hɔn baanodzifo no ne dzin dze Amulon.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amulon paa Lamanfo no kyɛw; na wɔsomaa hɔn yernom so a wɔyɛ Lamanfo hɔn mbabaa no dɛ wɔnkɔ nkɛpa hɔn enuanom no kyɛw, dɛ mma wonnku hɔn kunnom.

34 Na Lamanfo no nyaa ayamuhyehye maa Amulon nye n’enuanom no, na wɔannsɛɛ hɔn osian hɔn yernom no ntsi.

35 Na Amulon na n’enuanom no kɔdɔɔm Lamanfo no, na wɔnam sar no do rohwehwɛ Nephi asaase nna wohun Helam asaase no a ɔyɛ Alma nye n’enuanom dze no.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no bɔɔ Alma nye n’enuanom no anohoba dɛ sɛ wɔkyerɛ hɔn kwan a wɔfa do dze kɔ Nephi asaase do a ɔno wɔdze hɔn nkwa nye hɔn ahotɔ bɛkyɛ hɔn.

37 Mbom aber a Alma kyerɛɛ hɔn kwan a wɔfa do kɔ Nephi asaase do wiei no, Lamanfo no enndzi hɔn anohoba no do; mbom wɔdze aweɔmfo bɔɔ Helam asaase na Alma nye n’enuanom ho aprɔw.

38 Na hɔn a wɔkae no kɔr Nephi asaase no do; na hɔn mu binom so saan hɔn ekyir baa Helam asaase do, na wɔdze aweɔmfo no a wogyaa hɔn wɔ asaase no do no hɔn yernom na hɔn mba kãa hɔn ho bae.

39 Na Lamanfo hɔn hen no maa Amulon kwan dɛ ondzi hen na ɔnhwɛ no nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Helam asaase do no; naaso onnyi tum biara dɛ ɔbɛyɛ biribiara a otsia Lamanfo hɔn hen ne pɛ.
mosiah 24:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 24[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amulon tseetsee Alma na no nkorɔfo—Sɛ wɔbɔ mpaa a woboku hɔn—Ewuradze yɛ ma hɔn adzesoa yɛ har—Oyi hɔn fi nkowaasom mu na wɔsan kɔ Zarahemla. Bɛyɛ mfe 145–120 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo hɔn hen no n’enyi gyee Amulon ho; dɛm ntsi, Lamanfo hɔn hen no maa kwan dɛ wɔnyɛ ɔno na n’enuanom no akyerɛkyerɛfo wɔ no nkorɔfo no do, nyew, wɔ dɔm a wɔwɔ Shemlon asaase do, nye Shilom asaase do, nye Amulon asaase do no mpo.

2 Osiandɛ Lamanfo no afa dɛm nsaase no nyinara; dɛm ntsi Lamanfo hɔn hen no dze ahemfo sisii dɛm nsaase no nyinara do.

3 Na afei Lamanfo hɔn hen no ne dzin dze Laman, wɔdze n’egya ne dzin too no; dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ no ɔhen Laman. Na odzii hen wɔ dɔmtutuw do.

4 Na ɔyɛɛ Amulon n’enuanom no akyerɛkyerɛfo wɔ asaase biara a no nkorɔfo wɔ do no do; na dɛm maa wɔhyɛɛ ase dze Nephi kasa kyerɛkyerɛɛ Lamanfo dɔm no nyinara.

5 Na wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔdodɔ hɔnho nkorkor; naaso wonnyim Nyame; afei so Amulon n’enuanom no annkyerɛ hɔn biribiara a ɔfa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ho, anaa Moses mbra no; nna wɔannkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn Abinadi ne nsɛm no so;

6 Mbom wɔkyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkyerɛw hɔnho nsɛm nsie, na wɔnkyerɛkyerɛw hɔn ho nkorkor.

7 Na dɛm maa Lamanfo no hɔn sika hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrodɔr, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔnye hɔn ho ridzi gua na wɔyɛɛ akɛsefo, na wɔbɛyɛɛ ndabrabafo nye wiadze mu enyansafo, nyew, nyimpa ndabrabafo a hɔn enyigye wɔ emumuyɛdze ahorow nyinara mu nye epoobɔ ho, mbom wɔammfa iyinom annyɛ hɔnankasa hɔn enuanom.

8 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Amulon hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekyerɛ no tum wɔ Alma nye n’enuanom do, na ɔhyɛɛ ase tseetsee no, na ɔmaa ne mba kwan dɛ wɔntseetsee hɔn mba.

9 Osiandɛ Amulon nyim Alma, dɛ nkyɛ ɔyɛ ɔhen n’asɔfoe no mu kor, na dɛ ɔno na ɔgyee Abinadi ne nsɛm no dzii ma woyii no edzi fii ɔhen no enyim, na dɛm ntsi, no bo fuuw no, na ɔno ɔhyɛ ɔhen Laman n’ase, naaso ɔkyerɛɛ no tum wɔ hɔn do, na ɔdze edwuma soaa hɔn, na ɔmaa edwuma ahwɛdofo hwɛɛ hɔn do.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn amandzehu yɛɛ kɛsenara ma wɔhyɛɛ ase sũu dzendzenndzen kyerɛɛ Nyankopɔn.

11 Na Amulon hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wonngyaa hɔn sufrɛ no; na ɔmaa aweɔmfo weɔɔn hɔn ama sɛ wohu dɛ obi refrɛ Nyame a woeku no.

12 Na Alma nye no nkorɔfo no amma hɔn ndze do ammfrɛ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, mbom wohuee hɔn akoma maa no; na ɔnodze onyim hɔn akoma mu adwendwen.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze ne ndze baa hɔn nkyɛn wɔ hɔn amandzehu mu see dɛ: Hom mma hom etsir do na hom nya awerɛkyekyer, na minyim ahyɛmu a hom edzi akyerɛ me; na menye mo nkorɔfo bedzi ahyɛmu na meeyi hɔn efi nkowaasom mu.

14 Na mebɛma adzesoadze a wɔdze egu hom abatsir do no ayɛ har a hom renntse mpo dɛ ɔda hom ekyir, wɔ ber a hom wɔ nkowaasom mu mpo; na iyi na mebɛyɛ ama hom egyina ayɛ adasefo ama me ndaamba, na ama hom ehu nokwar no dɛ Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, mesera mo nkorɔfo wɔ hɔn amandzehu mu.

15 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ adzesoadze a wɔdze too Alma nye n’enuanom do no yɛɛ har; nyew, Ewuradze hyɛɛ hɔn dzen ama woeetum asoa hɔn adzesoadze no na wɔammberɛ, na enyigye mu na abotar na wɔdze gyaa hɔnho mu maa Ewuradze ne pɛ.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn gyedzi na hɔn abotar yɛɛ kɛsenara ma Ewuradze ne ndze baa hɔn nkyɛn bio, dɛ: Hom ndzi dɛw na adze kyee no mebeyi hom efi nkowaasom mu.

17 Na ɔsee Alma dɛ: Ɔwo ibedzi nkorɔfo yi enyim akɔ, na menye hom bɔkɔ na mibeyi nkorɔfo yi efi nkowaasom mu.

18 Afei ɔbaa dɛ Alma nye no nkorɔfo no boaboaa hɔn nguankuw ano, na ɔnye hɔn ewifua so; nyew, adzesaaber no mu nyinara mpo nna wɔreka hɔn nguankuw boaboa ano.

19 Na adzekyee no Ewuradze maa nda heii tɔɔ Lamanfo no do, nyew, nye hɔn ndwuma do ahwɛfo no nyinara do; ma wɔdaa heii.

20 Na Alma nye no nkorɔfo no fii hɔ kɔr sar no do; na ber a wotuu hɔn kwan da no nyinara mu no, wosisii hɔn ntamadan wɔ bɔnsa bi mu, na wɔtoo bɔnsa no dzin Alma, osiandɛ ɔno na odzii hɔn kan wɔ sar kwan no do.

21 Nyew, na wɔ Alma bɔnsa mu hɔ no nna wɔdze hɔn ndaase maa Nyankopɔn osiandɛ oehu hɔn mbɔbɔr, na ɔmaa hɔn adzesoadze yɛɛ har, na oeyi hɔn efi nkowaasom mu, na wɔwɔ nkowaasom mu no, obiara enntum ennyi hɔn, gyedɛ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn nko.

22 Na wɔdze ndaase maa Nyankopɔn, nyew, hɔn mbanyin nyinara, na hɔn mbasiafo nyinara, nye hɔn mbofraba a wotum kasa nyinara maa hɔn ndze do wɔ hɔn Nyankopɔn n’ayɛyi mu.

23 Na afei Ewuradze see Alma dɛ: Ma wo ho nyɛ har na nye nkorɔfo yi mfi asaase yi do, na Lamanfo no enyanyan na woritsiw hom; dɛm ntsi hom mfi asaase yi do, na mebɛma Lamanfo no esanka wɔ bɔnsa yi mu amma woenntsiw nkorɔfo yi annkɔ ekyir bio.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ wofii bɔnsa no mu, na wosii mu dze faa sar no do.

25 Na wɔkɛhyɛɛ sar no do bɛyɛ dadu nda ebien ekyir no, woduu Zarahemla asaase do; na ɔhen Mosiah so dze enyigye gyee hɔn.
mosiah 25:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 25[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mulek n’asefo a wɔwɔ Zarahemla no bɛyɛ Nephifo—Wɔtse Alma na Zeniff hɔn nkorɔfo ho nsɛm—Alma numa Limhi na no nkorɔfo nyina—Mosiah ma Alma tumdzi dɛ ɔnkyekyer Nyankopɔn N’Asɔr no. Bɛyɛ mfe 120 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔhen Mosiah see dɔm no nyinara dɛ wɔmboa hɔn ano.

2 Afei Nephi ne mba a wɔwɔ hɔ no nndɔɔ sõ pii, anaadɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ Nephi n’asefo no nndɔɔ sõ pii dɛ Zarahemla no nkorɔfo, na ɔno yɛ Mulek n’asenyi, na hɔn so wɔnye no fi sar no do bae.

3 Na Nephi no nkorɔfo nye Zarahemla no nkorɔfo nndɔɔ sõ pii wɔ hɔ dɛ Lamanfo; nyew, wonndu hɔn mu fã mpo.

4 Na afei Nephi no nkorɔfo no nyinara boaa hɔn ano, na Zarahemla no nkorɔfo nyinara so dɛmara, na wɔboaa hɔn ano ma wɔyɛɛ ekuw ebien.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ Mosiah kenkanee, na ɔmaa hɔn so wɔkenkaan Zeniff ne nkyerɛwee no kyerɛɛ no nkorɔfo no; nyew, ɔkenkaan Zeniff no nkorɔfo hɔn nkyerɛwee fi ber a wofii Zarahemla asaase do kesi ber a wɔsaan hɔn ekyir bio bae.

6 Na ɔkenkaan Alma na no nuanom ho nsɛm nye dza ɔfa hɔn amandzehu ho fitsi aber a wofii Zarahemla asaase do dze kɛpem aber a wɔsanee baa bio.

7 Na afei ber a Mosiah dze nkyerɛwee no a ɔrekenkan no baa ewiei no, no nkorɔfo no a wɔkaa wɔ asaase no do hɔ no, ho dwuruuw hɔn na ɔyɛɛ hɔn ahobow.

8 Nna wonnyim dza wɔdwen wɔ ho koraa; na ber a wohun hɔn a woyii hɔn fii nkowaasom mu no, dɛw mbordo hyɛɛ hɔn akoma mu ma.

9 Na bio, ber a wɔdwendween hɔn enuanom a Lamanfo ekuku hɔn ho no, awerɛhow hyɛɛ hɔn mã, na wokyii nyinsuwa pii.

10 Na bio, ber a wɔdwendween Nyankopɔn ne papayɛ na no tum a ɔdze gyee Alma nye no nuanom fii Lamanfo nsamu na oyii hɔn fii nkowaasom mu ho a ɔnkyɛree no, wɔmaa hɔn ndze do dze ndaase maa Nyankopɔn.

11 Na bio, ber a wɔdwendween Lamanfo a wɔyɛ hɔn enuanom no hɔn bɔn nye ɔsɛe tsebew a wɔwɔ mu no ho no, yaw na awerɛhow hyɛɛ hɔn do dze maa hɔn akra n’eyiedzi.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ Amulon nye n’enuanom, no a wɔfaa Lamanfo hɔn mbabaa yɛɛ hɔn yernom no, hɔn mba no werɛ poow hɔn egyanom hɔn suban, ntsi wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔn egyanom edzin bɛfrɛ hɔn bio, dɛm ntsi wɔfaa Nephi ne dzin too hɔn do ma wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Nephi ne mba na wɔkaan hɔn foraa hɔn a wɔfrɛ hɔn Nephifo no.

13 Na afei dɔm nyinara a wɔwɔ Zarahemla no wɔkaan hɔn foraa Nephifo no, osiandɛ wɔammfa ahendzi no amma obiara, gyedɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ Nephi n’asefo.

14 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Mosiah wiee kasa na ɔdze dza ɔrekenkan no so baa ewiei no, ɔpɛɛ dɛ Alma so bɛkasa akyerɛ dɔm no.

15 Na Alma kasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ aber a nna wɔaboa hɔn ano ekuwekuw akɛse akɛse no, na ofii kuw kor do kɔr kor so do kɛkyerɛkyerɛɛ dɔm no nnuho nye gyedzi wɔ Ewuradze mu.

16 Na ɔhyɛɛ Limhi nye n’enuanom no a woyii hɔn fii nkowaasom mu no nkuran, ma wɔakaa dɛ Ewuradze na ɔgyee hɔn.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Alma kyerɛkyerɛɛ dɔm no ndzɛmba pii, na ɔnye hɔn wiee kasa no, ɔhen Limhi pɛɛ dɛ wonuma no; na no nkorɔfo nyinara so pɛɛ dɛ wonuma hɔn so.

18 Dɛm ntsi, Alma kɔr nsu no mu na onumaa hɔn dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no pɛpɛɛpɛr dze maa n’enuanom no wɔ Mormon esu mu no; nyew, na dodowara a onumaa hɔn no bɔdɔɔm Nyame n’asɔr; na wɔyɛɛ iyi osian hɔn gyedzi a wɔwɔ no wɔ Alma ne nsɛm no mu ntsi.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Mosiah maa Alma kwan dɛ ɔnkyekyer nsɔr wɔ Zarahemla asaase nyinara do; na ɔmaa no tum dɛ ɔnhyɛ asɔfo na onyi akyerɛkyerɛfo mfa hɔn nsisi asɔr biara ano.

20 Afei ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ no dɛm osiandɛ dɔm no dɔɔ sõ dodow, ma kyerɛkyerɛnyi kor nnkotum ahwɛ hɔn nyina do; anaadɛ hɔn nyinara runntum nntsie Nyame n’asɛm wɔ nhyiamu dan kor pɛr mu.

21 Dɛm ntsi wɔboaboaa hɔn ano ekuwekuw, na iyi na wɔfrɛɛ hɔn asɔrasɔr no; asɔr biara wɔ n’asɔfoe nye n’akyerɛkyerɛfo, na sɔfo biara so kã asɛmpa a oenya efi Alma n’anomu.

22 Na dɛm ntsi; nna ɔammfa ho dɛ asɔrasɔr pii wɔ hɔ; hɔn nyinara yɛ asɔr kor, nyew, Nyame n’asɔr; na wɔannka asɛmpa biara wɔ asɔrasɔr no nyinara mu hɔ gyedɛ dza ɔfa nnuho nye gyedzi wɔ Nyame mu.

23 Na afei nna asɔrasɔr esuon na ɔwɔ Zarahemla asaase do. Na ɔbaa dɛ obiara a onyaa pɛ dɛ ɔdze Christ ne dzin, anaa Nyame ne dze bɔto no do no, ɔkɔdɔɔm Nyame ne nsɔr no.

24 Na wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Nyame no nkorɔfo. Na Ewuradze huee no Sunsum guu hɔn do, na wohyiraa hɔn, na wɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase no do.
mosiah 26:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 26[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ekyingyefo gya Asɔrmba no pii kɔ bɔn mu—Wɔdze onnyiewiei nkwa bɔ Alma anohoba—Hɔn a wonu hɔnho na wonuma hɔn no wonya bɔnfakyɛ—Asɔrmba ndzebɔnyɛfo a wonu hɔnho na wɔkã hɔn bɔn kyerɛ Alma nye Ewuradze no benya bɔnfakyɛ; annyɛ dɛm a, wɔrennkan hɔn nka asɔrmba ho. Bɛyɛ mfe 120–100 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ebusuasantsen a wɔaba do no mu mba pii enntum anntse ɔhen Benjamin ne nsɛm no ase, osiandɛ ber a ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no nkorɔfo no nna wɔyɛ mbofra nkakraba ntsi wɔanngye hɔn egyanom no hɔn amambra no enndzi.

2 Wɔanngye dza wɔakã a ɔfa owusoɛr anaa dza ɔfa Christ ne mbaa ho no enndzi.

3 Na afei osian hɔn ekyingye ntsi woenntum anntse Nyame n’asɛm ase; na hɔn akoma pirimii.

4 Na wɔamma woennuma hɔn, eso wɔanndɔm asɔr no. Na wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a hɔnho nntsew osian mbrɛ hɔn gyedzi tse ntsi, na wɔtsenaa wɔ hɔn honam su nye hɔn bɔn tsebew mu dɛmara dze kɔr ewiei, na wɔammpɛ dɛ wobosũ afrɛ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn.

5 Na afei Mosiah n’ahendzi aber do no nna hɔn dodow nndu Nyame no nkorɔfo no hɔn mu fã mpo; na mbom ɔnam etuatsew a ɔbaa enuanom no mu no ntsi wɔdɔree.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔdze ndaadaasɛm daadaa hɔn a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu pii, na wɔmaa wɔyɛɛ bɔn pii; dɛm ntsi okehiaa dɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu na wɔyɛɛ bɔn no wɔkã hɔn enyim.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔdze hɔn baa asɔfo no na akyerɛkyerɛfo no enyim, na woyii hɔn maa asɔfo no na asɔfo no so dze hɔn baa Alma a ɔyɛ sɔfopanyin no enyim.

8 Afei nna ɔhen Mosiah ama Alma tum dɛ ɔnhwɛ asɔr no do.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ nna Alma nnyim biribiara a ɔfa hɔn ho; na mbom adasegyefo pii gyee dase tsiaa hɔn; nyew, nkorɔfo gyinaa gyee dase wɔ hɔn emumuyɛdze pii ho.

10 Afei nna adze a ɔtse dɛm biara nnsii da wɔ asɔr no mu; dɛm ntsi Alma haaw wɔ no sunsum mu na ɔmaa wɔdze hɔn baa ɔhen no enyim.

11 Na ɔsee ɔhen dɛ: Hwɛ, nyimpa dodow a yɛdze hɔn aba w’enyim ha yi, hɔn enuanom agye dase etsia hɔn; nyew, wɔayɛ emumuyɛdze ahorow pii. Na wonnu hɔnho wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ ho; dɛm ntsi yɛdze hɔn aba w’enyim, ama ebu hɔn fɔ dɛ mbrɛ hɔn bɔn tse.

12 Mbom ɔhen Mosiah see Alma dɛ: Hwɛ, murummbu hɔn atsɛn; dɛm ntsi medze hɔn hyɛ wo nsa ma ɔwoara ebu hɔn atsɛn.

13 Na afei Alma no sunsum tseetsee bio wɔ no mu; na ɔkɔree na okebisaa Ewuradze dza ɔnyɛ wɔ asɛm yi ho, osiandɛ osuro dɛ ɔbɛyɛ bɔn wɔ Nyame enyim.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a ohue ne kra nyinara maa Nyame no, Ewuradze ne ndze baa ne nkyɛn see dɛ:

15 Nhyira akã wo, Alma, na nhyira akã hɔn a wonumaa hɔn wɔ Mormon esu mu no so. Woehyira wo osian gyedzi mbordo a enya wɔ m’akowaa Abinadi ne nsɛm ho no ntsi.

16 Na nhyira akã hɔn so osian hɔn gyedzi mbordo a wonyae wɔ nsɛm a ekãa kyerɛɛ hɔn no ntsi.

17 Na nhyira akã wo osiandɛ akyekyer asɔr wɔ dɔm yi mu; na wɔbɔdɔr na wɔbɛyɛ mo nkorɔfo.

18 Nyew, nhyira akã nkorɔfo a wɔagye ato mu dɛ wɔbɛgye me dzin; na wɔdze me dzin bɛfrɛ hɔn; na wɔayɛ medze.

19 Na osiandɛ ebisa me biribi a ɔfa mbratonyi ho ntsi, nhyira akã wo.

20 Ɔwo nye m’akowaa; na menye wo edzi ahyɛmu dɛ ibenya onnyiewiei nkwa; na ɔwo ebɔsom me na anantsew wɔ me dzin mu, na edze mo nguan aboa ano.

21 Na nyia obetsie me ndze no bɛyɛ mo guan; na ɔno na gye no wɔ m’asɔr mu, na mo so mebɛgye no.

22 Na hwɛ, iyi nye m’asɔr; na obiara a wonuma no no, wobonuma no akɔ nnuho mu. Na obiara a ebɛgye no no bɛgye me dzin edzi na ɔno na medze no bɔn bɛkyɛ no kwa.

23 Na Emi na mafa wiadze bɔn nyinara ato mo do; na Emi na mobɔɔ hɔn; na Emi na mema hɔn a wɔgye me dzi kɔ ewiei no bea wɔ m’abanyimfa.

24 Na hwɛ, me dzin mu na wɔafrɛ hɔn; na sɛ wohu me a wobefir aba, na woebenya tsenabew a onnyiewiei wɔ m’abanyimfa.

25 Na ɔbɛba dɛ aber a totorobɛnto a otsĩa ebien no bɔbɔ mu no, hɔn a wonnyim me no befir aba ebegyina m’enyim.

26 Na aber no na wobohu dɛ Emi nye Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn no a meyɛ hɔn Pomfo; na mbom wɔrommpon hɔn.

27 Na mebɛse hɔn dɛ minnyim hɔn; na wobefi hɔ akɔ daapem ogya a woesiesie ama abɔnsam nye n’abɔfoe no mu.

28 Dɛm ntsi, mese hom dɛ, nyia onnketsie me ndze no, dɛm nyimpa noara so na mma hom nngye no nnto m’asɔr mu, na dɛm nyimpa no merenngye no wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

29 Dɛm ntsi mese wo dɛ, Kɔ; na obiara a ɔbɛyɛ bɔn etsia me no, hwɛ bɔn a ɔayɛ no ho na bu no atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ; na sɛ ɔkã no bɔn wɔ ɔwo na Emi enyim na onu no ho nokwar mu wɔ n’akoma mu a fa kyɛ no, na Emi so medze bɛkyɛ no.

30 Nyew, mber dodow biara a mo nkorɔfo bonu hɔnho no, medze hɔn mfom a wɔayɛ etsia me no bɛkyɛ hɔn.

31 Na hom so hom mfa hom bɔn nkyekyɛ homho nkorkor; na nokwar mese wo dɛ, nyia ɔammfa ne nyɛnko no bɔn annkyɛ no wɔ aber a ɔakã dɛ oenu noho no, dɛm nyimpa no dze noho ahyɛ afɔbu mu.

32 Afei Mese wo dɛ, Kɔ; na nyia a oennu noho wɔ no bɔn ho no, dɛm nyimpa no mma wɔnnkan no mmfora mo nkorɔfo; na iyi hom nhyɛ no nsew fitsi aber yi dze kɔ.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Alma tsee dɛm nsɛm yi no ɔkyerɛwee too hɔ ama ɔdze eesie na ɔdze ebu nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu no atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ Nyame ne mbrasɛm no tse.

34 Na ɔbaa dɛ Alma kɔree na okobuu hɔn a wɔayɛ emumuyɛ no atsɛn, dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze n’asɛm se.

35 Na hɔn a wonuu hɔnho na wɔkãa hɔn bɔn no, hɔn na ɔkaan hɔn foraa asɔrmba no.

36 Na hɔn a wɔannkã hɔn bɔn na woennu hɔnho wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ ho no, ɔannkan hɔn ammfora asɔrmba no, na ɔpepaa hɔn edzin.

37 Na ɔbaa dɛ Alma hyehyɛɛ asɔr no mu dwumadzi nyinara; na wɔhyɛɛ ase bio nyaa asomdwee na wɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm mbordo wɔ asɔr no dwumadzi nyinara mu, wɔnantseew nyimdzee mu wɔ Nyame enyim, wonyaa dɔm pii, na wonnumaa pii so.

38 Na afei dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyinara na Alma nye n’edwumayɛfo a wɔhwɛ asɔr no do no yɛe, wɔnantseew enyimpi do, kyerɛkyerɛɛ Nyame n’asɛm no wɔ adze nyinara mu, wohun amandze ahorow pii, na hɔn a wɔnndɔm Nyame n’asɔr no tseetsee hɔn ara yie.

39 Na wɔbɔɔ hɔn enuanom no kɔkɔ, na hɔnara so nyaa kɔkɔbɔ fii Nyame n’asɛm mu, obiara dɛ mbrɛ no bɔn tse, anaa bɔn a ɔayɛ, na Nyame hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbɔ mpaa aber nyinara, na wɔnda ase wɔ adze nyinara mu.
mosiah 27:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mosiah bra atseetsee na ɔkã pɛryɛ ho asɛm—Alma kakraba na Mosiah ne mbabanyin baanan no per dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ Asɔr no—Ɔbɔfo yi noho kyerɛ hɔn na ɔhyɛ hɔn dɛ wongyaa hɔn kwan bɔn a wɔnam do no—Alma tɔ mmum—Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔwo adasamba nyina fofor ama woenya nkwagye—Alma na Mosiah ne mbabanyin no bɔ enyigyesɛm ho dawur. Bɛyɛ mfe 100–92 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ atseetsee a ekyingyefo no dze tseetsee asɔrmba no mu yɛɛ dzen araa ma asɔrmba no hyɛɛ ase hwinhwinii na wɔkasaa ho kyerɛɛ hɔn ahwɛdofo no wɔ dɛm adze no ho; na wɔkasaa ho so kyerɛɛ Alma. Na Alma so dze asɛm no kɔtoo ɔhen Mosiah enyim. Na Mosiah nye asɔfo no dwendween ho.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Mosiah bɔɔ dawur wɔ asaase n’afa nyinara do dɛ mma ekyingyefo no nntseetsee Nyame n’asɔr mba no bio.

3 Na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn dzendzen wɔ nsɔrbansɔrba nyinara mu dɛ mma obiara nntseetsee ne nyɛnko na wɔmma pɛryɛ mbɛda adasamba nyinara mu.

4 Mma wɔmma ahantanyɛ nye ahopɔwyɛ nnsɛɛ hɔn asomdwee; na dɛ obiara mbu ne nyɛnko dɛ noara noho, na wɔmfa hɔn nsa nyɛ edwuma nhwɛ hɔnho.

5 Nyew, na hɔn asɔfo nye akyerɛkyerɛfo nyinara mfa hɔn nsa nyɛ edwuma nhwɛ hɔnho, wɔ biribiara mu, gyedɛ yarba anaa ohia dodow nko; na wɔyɛɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi no, wonyaa adom wɔ Nyame mu.

6 Na asomdwee hyɛɛ ase baa asaase no do bio; na nkorɔfo no hyɛɛ ase dɔree, na wɔhyɛɛ ase tserɛwee wɔ asaase no enyi, nyew, fitsi etsifi kɛpem anaafo, boka dze kɛpem anee na wɔkyekyeer nkurow akɛse nye nkuraase wɔ asaase ne fã biara.

7 Na Ewuradze bɛseraa hɔn na ɔyɛɛ hɔn prɔmprɔm, na wɔdɔree na wɔyɛɛ ahonyafo.

8 Afei Mosiah ne mbabanyin no wɔkaan hɔn foraa ekyingyefo no; na Alma ne mbabanyin no mu kor so wɔ hɔ a wɔkaan no foraa hɔn, ɔno so wɔfrɛɛ no Alma, na wɔdze no too n’egya; naaso ɔbɛyɛɛ omumuyɛnyi nye ɔbosonsɔrnyi kɛsenara.
