8 Na ɔbarimba no see no dɛ: Yɛnngye nndzi dɛ iyim adze a ɔtse dɛm. Yɛnngye dɛm nkwaseasɛm amambra yi nndzi. Yɛnngye nndzi dɛ iyim ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba, eso yɛnngye nndzi dɛ hom egyanom nye hɛn so hɛn egyanom nyim biribi a ɔfa ndzɛmba a wɔakã dɛ ɔbɛba ho nsɛm.

9 Afei Aaron hyɛɛ ase dɛ orubuebue kyerɛwsɛm no n’enyi do kyerɛ hɔn, nye dza ɔfa Christ ne mbaa ho, nye dza ɔfa owusoɛr so ho, na dɛ ɔpon biara nnyi hɔ mma adasamba gyedɛ ɔnam Christ no wu nye n’amandzehu do, nye no bɔgyaa a ɔdze bɔbɔ werdam no do.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi mu akyerɛ hɔn no, hɔn bo fuuw no, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ woridzi noho fɛw; na woenntsie nsɛm a ɔrekã no.

11 Dɛm ntsi, ber a ohun dɛ worinntsie ne nsɛm no, ofii hɔn nhyiamudan no mu na ɔbaa ekuraase bi a wɔfrɛ no Ani-Anti, hɔ na ohun Muloki dɛ ɔrekã asɛmpa no kyerɛ hɔn; na Ammah nye n’enuanom so wɔ hɔ. Na wɔnye dodowara fimfenee wɔ asɛm no ho.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ wohun dɛ dɔm no epirim hɔn akoma, dɛm ntsi wofii hɔ baa Middoni asaase do. Na wɔkãa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ dodowara, na kumaabi na wɔgyee nsɛm a wɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn no dzii.

13 Naaso, wɔdze Aaron na n’enuanom no mu binom guu efiadze, na hɔn a wɔkae no so guanee fii Middoni asaase do kɔr mbeambea a wɔabɔ ho aprɔw no.

14 Na hɔn a wɔnye hɔn guu efiadze no hun amandze pii, na Lamoni na Ammon bɛgyee hɔn, na wɔmaa hɔn edziban ma wodzii na wɔmaa hɔn ntar ma wɔhyɛe.

15 Na wɔkɔr bio dɛ wɔrekɛkã asɛm no, na dɛm na wɔdze yii hɔn fii efiadze ahyɛse no; na dɛm so ntsi na wohun amandze.

16 Na wɔkɔr beebiara a Ewuradze no Sunsum gyaa hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ kɛkãa Nyame n’asɛm wɔ Amalekifo hɔn nhyiamudan biara mu na Lamanfo hɔn ehyiadzi biara a wɔmaa hɔn ho kwan mu.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze hyɛɛ ase dɛ orihyira hɔn araa ma wɔmaa dodowara bohun nokwar no, nyew, wɔmaa dodowara gyee hɔn bɔn na hɔn egyanom amambra no a ɔnntsen too mu.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ammon na Lamoni saan hɔn ekyir fii Middoni asaase do baa Ishmael asaase do, dza ɔyɛ hɔnara hɔn egyapadze asaase no.

19 Na ɔhen Lamoni amma kwan dɛ Ammon bɔsom no, anaa ɔbɛyɛ n’akowaa.

20 Mbom ɔmaa wosisii nhyiamudan wɔ Ishmael asaase do; na ɔmaa no nkorɔfo, anaa nkorɔfo a wɔhyɛ n’ahenman ase no boaboaa hɔn ano.

21 Na odzii dɛw wɔ hɔnho, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn ndzɛmba pii. Na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔhyɛ n’ase na wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔdze hɔn fahodzi ama hɔn, na woeyi hɔn efi n’egya ɔmanhen no ne nhyɛ ase; osiandɛ n’egya ama no kwan dɛ ondzi hen wɔ dɔm a wɔwɔ Ishmael asaase nye asaase nyinara a etwa ho ehyia no do.

22 Na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔwɔ kwan dɛ wɔsom Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ahotɔ mu wɔ hɔn pɛ do na bea biara a wɔwɔ do, dɛ sɛ ɔyɛ asaase a ɔhyɛ ɔhen Lamoni n’ahendzi ase a.

23 Na Ammon kãa nsɛmpa no kyerɛɛ ɔhen Lamoni no dɔm no; na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn ndzɛmba nyinara a ɔfa tseneneeyɛ ho. Na osii nketse tuu hɔn fo daa nyina; na wotsiee n’asɛm na wɔpeen do dɛ wobedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do.
alma 22:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aaron kã Abɔdze, Adam n’Asehwe na ɔpon ho nhyehyɛɛ a ɔnam Christ mu ba ho asɛm kyerɛ Lamoni n’egya—Ɔmanhen no nye ne fifo nyina sakyer—Wɔkyerɛ mbrɛ wosi kyɛ asaase no mu ma Nephifo na Lamanfo no kyerɛ hɔn. Bɛyɛ mfe 90–77 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei, ber a Ammon gu do rekyerɛkyerɛ Lamoni no nkorɔfo no, yɛbɛsan hɛn ekyir akɔsɔw Aaron na n’enuanom no hɔnho nsɛm no do; na ber a ofii Middoni asaase do no, Sunsum no dze no kɔr Nephi asaase do, dze no kɔr ɔmanhen no a ɔhwɛ asaase a ɔwɔ hɔ nyina do no ne fie, na Ishmael asaase nko na ɔnnka ho; na ɔno nye Lamoni n’egya.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔnye n’enuanom no kɔr ɔmanhen no nkyɛn wɔ n’ahemfie, na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ ɔhen no enyim na ɔsee no do: Hwɛ, O ɔhen, yɛyɛ Ammon n’enuanom no a ɔgyee hɛn fii efiadze no.

3 Na afei, O ɔhen, sɛ edze hɛn nkwa kyɛ hɛn a, yɛbɛyɛ wo nkowaa. Na ɔhen no see hɔn dɛ: Hom nsoɛr, na medze hom nkwa bɛkyɛ hom, na meremma kwan mma hom nnyɛ mo nkowaa; mbom mebɛma hom akyerɛkyerɛ me; osiandɛ hom nua Ammon n’ayamuyie nye ne nsɛm akɛse no ama m’adwen rehaw me; na mepɛ dɛ muhu siantsir a ɔnam do ma ɔnye hom emmfi Middoni ammba.

4 Na Aaron see ɔhen no dɛ: Hwɛ Ewuradze no Sunsum afrɛ no wɔ beebi fofor; ɔkɔ Ishmael asaase do, rekɛkyerɛkyerɛ Lamoni no nkorɔfo.

5 Afei ɔhen no see hɔn dɛ: Ebɛnadze nye dɛm Ewuradze no Sunsum yi a hom akã ho asɛm yi? Hwɛ, iyi nye adze a ɔrehaw me.

6 Na ebɛnadze so nye dɛm asɛm yi a Ammon kãe dɛ—Sɛ inu woho a wɔbɛgye wo nkwa, na sɛ ennu woho a, wobotwa wo akyen wɔ nda a odzi ewiei no mu no?

7 Na Aaron buaa no see dɛ: Ana egye dzi dɛ Nyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ? Na ɔhen no see dɛ: minyim dɛ Amalekifo no kã dɛ Nyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ, na mama hɔn kwan dɛ wonsisi krɔnkrɔnbea, ama woeehyia mu dze asom no. Na sɛ afei erekã dɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ hɔ a, hwɛ mebɛgye edzi.

8 Na afei ber a Aaron tsee iyi no, n’akoma hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi dɛw, na ɔsee dɛ: Hwɛ, nokwar dɛ ber a etse ase yi, O ɔhen, Nyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ.

9 Na ɔhen no bisaa dɛ: Ana dɛm Nyankopɔn no nye dɛm Sunsum Kɛse no a ɔnye hɛn egyanom fii Jerusalem asaase do bae no?

10 Na Aaron see no dɛ: Nyew, ɔno nye dɛm Sunsum Kɛse no, na ɔno na ɔbɔɔ ndzɛmba nyinara a ɔwɔ sor nye asaase. Egye iyi dzi anaa?

11 Na ɔsee dɛ: Nyew, megye dzi dɛ Sunsum Kɛse no na ɔbɔɔ ndzɛmba nyina, na mepɛ dɛ ekã dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho nsɛm kyerɛ me, na mebɛgye wo nsɛm edzi.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Aaron hun dɛ ɔhen no bɛgye ne nsɛm no edzi no, ɔhyɛɛ ase kenkaan kyerɛwsɛm no kyerɛɛ ɔhen no fitsi ber a wɔbɔɔ Adam—mbrɛ Nyankopɔn sii bɔɔ nyimpa wɔ nankasa no su do, na dɛ Nyankopɔn maa no mbrasɛm, na osian mbrato ntsi, nyimpa hwee ase.

13 Na Aaron kyerɛkyerɛɛ no kyerɛwsɛm no mu fitsi ber a wɔbɔɔ Adam, na ɔmaa ohun nyimpa n’asehwe nye no honam su tsebew na ɔpon ho nhyehyɛɛ no so, dza wosiesiei too hɔ fitsi wiadze ne fapem wɔ Christ mu ma obiara a ɔbɛgye ne dzin edzi no.

14 Na susuampaara dɛ nyimpa ahwe ase no, nankasa runntum nnyɛ biribi pa biara mmfa mma nankasa noho; na mbom Christ n’amandzehu nye no wu no bɔ werdam dze ma hɔn bɔn wɔ gyedzi nye nnuho nye dza ɔkekã ho biara mu; na oebubu owu no mpokyerɛ mu na owumaa nnyi konyimdzi biara, na ɔama enyimnyam mu enyidado amen owu no bɔr; na Aaron kyerɛkyerɛɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina mu kyerɛɛ ɔhen no.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Aaron kyerɛkyerɛɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina mu kyerɛɛ ɔhen no wiei no, ɔhen no see dɛ: Ebɛnadze na menyɛ ma minya dɛm onnyiewiei nkwa yi a akã ho asɛm yi? Nyew, ebɛnadze na menyɛ ma Nyankopɔn nwo me fofor na woetutu emumuyɛ sunsum aagye ndwow wɔ mo mu yi, na meebenya no Sunsum, ama dɛw aahyɛ me mã, amma woenntwa me annkyen wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu? Hwɛ, ɔse, mibegyaa m’ahodze nyina mu, nyew, mobɔpow m’ahenman, ama me nsa akã dɛm dɛw kɛse yi.

16 Mbom Aaron see no dɛ: Sɛ epɛ dɛm adze yi, na sɛ ebɔbɔ wo mu adze wɔ Nyame enyim, nyew, sɛ ibonu woho wɔ wo bɔn nyina ho, na ebɔbɔ wo mu adze wɔ Nyame enyim, na abɔ ne dzin wɔ gyedzi mu, na agye edzi dɛ wo nsa bɛkã a, ɔno wo nsa bɛkã enyidado no a erohwehwɛ no.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Aaron kãa dɛm nsɛm yi no, ɔhen no bɔɔ no mu adze buu ntwɛr wɔ Ewuradze enyim; nyew, ɔdze noho too famu koraa, na osũu dzendzenndzen dɛ:

18 O Nyankopɔn, Aaron akã akyerɛ me dɛ Nyame bi wɔ hɔ, na sɛ Nyame bi wɔ hɔ a, na sɛ ɔwo nye Nyankopɔn no a nna yi woho kyerɛ me, na mibegyaa mo bɔn nyina yɛ ama meehu wo, ama woeenyan me efi owu mu, na wɔaagye me nkwa wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu. Na afei ber a ɔhen no kãa dɛm nsɛm yi no, ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ oewu.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ no nkowaa no tuu mbirika kɛkãa dza esi ɔhen no do nyina kyerɛɛ ɔhembaa no. Na ɔbaa ɔhen no nkyɛn; na ber a ohun dɛ ɔda kegyaa dɛ mbrɛ oewu, na Aaron nye n’enuanom no gyina hɔ dɛ mbrɛ hɔn na wɔayɛ ma ɔahwe ase no, no bo fuuw hɔn, na ɔhyɛɛ no nkowaa no, anaadɛ ɔhen no nkowaa no dɛ wɔmfa hɔn nkɔ nkoku hɔn.

20 Afei nkowaa no hun siantsir a ɔhen no hwee ase, dɛm ntsi wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔn nsa bɛka Aaron nye no nuanom no; na woserɛɛ ɔhembaa no dɛ: Ebɛnadze ntsi na ehyɛ hɛn dɛ yenku dɛm nkorɔfo yi, ber a ehwɛ a hɔn mu kor mpo noho yɛ dzen sen hɛn nyinara yi? Dɛm ntsi yɛbɔtɔr wɔ hɔn enyim.

21 Afei ber a ɔhembaa no hun dɛ nkowaa no suro no, suro kɛse hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekã no so, dɛ annhwɛ a mbusu bi bɛba no do. Na ɔsee no nkowaa no dɛ wɔnkɔ nkɛfrɛ dɔm no ama woeetum eku Aaron nye no nuanom no.

22 Afei ber a Aaron hun dɛ ɔhembaa no esi n’adwen pi na onyim so dɛ nkorɔfo no hɔn akomadzen no, osuroo dɛ annhwɛ a dɔmtutuw no bɔboa hɔn ano aba, na wentwiwentwi na basabasayɛ bɛba hɔn mu; dɛm ntsi ɔtseen ne nsa na ɔmaa ɔhen no do fii famu hɔ, na ɔsee no dɛ: Soɛr. Na ogyinaa n’anan do, na onyaa ahoɔdzen;

23 Mbom dɛm adze yi sii wɔ ɔhembaa no nye nkowaa no hɔn mu pii enyim. Na ber a wohun dɛm no, hɔnho boow hɔn kɛsenara, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worusuro. Ɔhen no soɛree gyinae, na ɔhyɛ ase soom hɔn. Na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn araa ma ne fifo nyina nyaa nsakyer na wɔbaa Ewuradze hɔ.

24 Afei nna dɔmtutuw aboa hɔn ano wɔ hɔ osian ɔhembaa no ne mbra a ɔhyɛɛ no ntsi, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ woruhwinhwin kɛsenara wɔ hɔn mu osian Aaron nye n’enuanom no ntsi.

25 Mbom ɔhen no soɛree gyinaa hɔn mu na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn. Na wonyaa abodwee wɔ Aaron nye hɔn a wɔkã noho no ho.

26 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔhen no hun dɛ dɔm no hɔn bo adwe no, ɔsee Aaron nye n’enuanom no dɛ wɔmbra mbegyina dɔmtutuw no finimfin na wɔnkãa nsɛm no nkyerɛ hɔn.

27 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen no maa wɔbɔɔ dawur wɔ asaase no nyina do, wɔ no nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ mbeambea a etwa hɔnho ehyia nyina mu, mbea a ɔbɔ asaase noho aprɔw dze kɔ po mu afamu, wɔ boka nye anee afamu, dza ɔkyɛ Zarahemla asaase mu a ɔyɛ sar tseabaa a ɔda po no boka dze kɔ po n’anee mpo, wɔ mpoano, sar a ɔda Zarahemla asaase n’etsifi afamu dze fa Manti ɔhe do wɔ Sidon esutsen ne tsir afamu fi boka dze kɔ anee—na dɛm na ɔdze kyɛ Lamanfo nye Nephifo mu ebien.

28 Afei Lamanfo no hɔn mu dodow a wɔyɛ enyiahafo no tse sar no do, na wɔtse ntamadan mu; na wɔabɔ apetse wɔ sar no n’anee afamu wɔ Nephi asaase do; nyew, nye Zarahemla asaase n’anee afamu, wɔ mpoano, nye Nephi asaase n’anee afamu, wɔ bea a ahyɛse no nna ɔyɛ hɔn egyanom egyapadze asaase a odzi kan no, na iyi nye ɔhe a ɔda mpoano hɔ.

29 Na Lamanfo pii so wɔ mpoano no boka afamu hɔ na Nephifo no paam hɔn. Na dɛm na ɔama Lamanfo no etwa Nephifo ho ehyia; naaso Nephifo no afa etsifi afamu nsaase a etwa sar no ho ehyia nyina, wɔ Sidon esutsen n’etsifi afamu, fi boka dze kɛpem anee, abɔ sar n’afã ho aprɔw; fi etsifi dze ba asaase a wɔfrɛ hɔ Dzifuu no.

30 Na ɔda asaase a wɔfrɛ no Amamfõ ne he do, ɔda etsifi afamu papaapa na ɔtsen dze ba asaase no a nkyɛ nyimpa pii wɔ do na wɔsɛɛ hɔn no a yɛakã hɔn mbiew ho asɛm dada no, dza nkorɔfo a wofi Zarahemla kopuee do no, hɔ nye bea a wodzii kan soɛe.

31 Na wofii hɔ baa sar no n’anaafo afamu. Dɛm na ɔmaa wɔfrɛɛ asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu no Amamfõ no, na asaase a ɔda anaafo afamu no wɔfrɛɛ no Dzifuu, hɔ yɛ sar a mbowa abɔyafo ahorow biara wɔ, wofi etsifi afamu hɔ bɔhwehwɛ edziban.

32 Na afei, Nephinyi dze da kor na fã tu kwan fi Dzifuu dze kɔ Amamfo, fi po no boka dze kɔ n’anee; aka kakraabi ma nsu etwa Nephifo hɔn asaase nye Zarahemlafo hɔn asaase ho ehyia, asaase tseabaa na ɔda etsifi afamu nye anaafo afamu.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no kɛtsenaa asaase Dzifuu do, fi boka dze kɔ anee afamu, na dɛm na Nephifo no nye hɔn aweɔmfo nye hɔn nsordaafo no nam hɔn nyansaa do esiw Lamanfo no kwan wɔ anaafo afamu hɔ amma hɔn nsa annka asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu amma woenntum anntserɛw asaase no mu ammfa annkɔ etsifi afamu hɔ.

34 Dɛm ntsi Lamanfo no nsa enntum nnkã asaase biara bio ammfa gyedɛ Nephi asaase no nko, nye sar no a etwa hɔnho ehyia no. Afei iyi nye Nephifo hɔn nyansaa, na osiandɛ Lamanfo no yɛ hɔn atamfo ntsi wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔbɛma hɔn kwan ma wɔahaw hɔn wɔ kwan biara do, na woenya kurow bi a sɛ wɔpɛ a wobotum eguan akɔ do.

35 Na afei ber a makã iyi ewie yi, mebɛsan m’ekyir akɔ Ammon na Aaron, Omner na Himni, nye hɔn enuanom no hɔnho nsɛm do bio.
alma 23:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 23[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wɔbɔ nyamesom ho fahodzi ho dawur—Lamanfo a wɔwɔ nsaase esuon nye nkurow mu sakyer—Wɔfrɛ hɔnho Anti-Nephi-Lehifo na woyi hɔn fi ndom ase—Amalekifo nye Amulonfo pow nokwar no. Bɛyɛ mfe 90–77 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo hɔn hen no maa wɔbɔɔ dawur wɔ no nkorɔfo nyinara mu, dɛ mma wɔmmfa hɔn nsa nnka Ammon, anaa Aaron, anaa Omner, anaa Himni, anaa hɔn enuanom no a wɔbɔkɔ akɛkã Nyame n’asɛm wɔ asaase n’afã beebiara no.

2 Nyew, ɔdze ɔmom maa hɔn, dɛ mma wɔmmfa hɔn nsa nkã hɔn nkyekyer hɔn, anaa wɔmmfa hɔn nngu efiadze; anaa wonnhimahima hɔn ntafi, anaa wɔnnhwe hɔn, anaa wonnyi hɔn edzi mmfi hɔn nhyiamudan mu, anaa wonnsi hɔn mpire anaa wɔnntow abo mmbɔ hɔn, na mbom wɔmma hɔn kwan mma wɔmbra hɔn efiefi, nye hɔn temple mu, nye hɔn nhyiamudan so do.

3 Na dɛm bɛma woeetum akɔ beebiara a wɔpɛ akɛkã asɛm no, osiandɛ ɔhen no asakyer aba Ewuradze hɔ, ɔnye ne fifo nyina; dɛm ntsi ɔmaa wɔbɔɔ dawur wɔ no nkorɔfo no mu wɔ asaase no do nyina, amma fintsidua biara ennsiw Nyame n’asɛm kwan, na mbom apetse asaase nyina do, ama no nkorɔfo eetum ehu dza ɔfa hɔn egyanom hɔn emumuyɛdze amambra, na wɔama woehu dɛ hɔn nyina yɛ enuanom, na dɛ onnyi dɛ wodzi ewu, anaa wɔbɔ epoo, anaa wowia adze, anaa wɔto awar, anaa wɔyɛ emumuyɛdze biara.

4 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔhen no maa wɔbɔɔ dɛm dawur yi no, Aaron nye n’enuanom no fii kurow kor mu kɔr kor so mu, fii asɔrfi kor mu kɔr kor so mu, kyekyeer asɔrasɔr, na wɔhyɛɛ asɔfo na woyiyii akyerɛkyerɛfo fii Lamanfo no mu wɔ asaase no do hɔ nyina dɛ wɔnkã Nyame n’asɛm no na wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn; na dɛm maa hɔn edwuma kɔr do yie.

5 Na wɔtwee mpempem baa Ewuradze ho nyimdzee ho, nyew, wɔmaa mpempem nyaa gyedzi wɔ Nephifo hɔn amambra ho; na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn kyerɛwsɛm nye nkɔnhyɛ a wɔdze egyaa hɔn fi tsetse dze besi dɛm aber no mu.

6 Na nokwar dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi, dodowara a wɔgyee dzii no, anaadɛ dodowara a ɔnam Ammon nye n’enuanom no hɔn nsɛmpa a wɔrekã no do nyaa nokwar no ho nyimdzee, wɔ ɔfa no nyikyerɛ sunsum nye nkɔnhyɛ, nye Nyankopɔn no tum a ɔreyɛ anwanwadze wɔ hɔn mu no—nyew, mese hom dɛ, dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi, Lamanfo dodowara a wɔgyee hɔn nsɛm no dzii no na wɔsakyeree baa Ewuradze hɔ no, annkɔ asehwe mu ara da.

7 Na wɔbɛyɛɛ atseneneefo; na wɔdze hɔn akodze a wɔdze tsew etua guu famu dɛ wɔronnkõ nntsia Nyankopɔn anaa hɔn enuanom bio.

8 Afei, iyinom nye hɔn a wɔsakyeree na wɔbaa Ewuradze hɔ:

9 Lamanfo no a wɔwɔ Ishmael asaase do;

10 Nye Lamanfo no so a wɔwɔ Middoni asaase do.

11 Nye Lamanfo so a wɔwɔ Nephi kuropɔn mu;

12 Nye Lamanfo so a wɔwɔ Shilom asaase do, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Shemlon, nye Lemuel kuropɔn mu, nye Shimnilom.

13 Na woyinom nye Lamanfo no a wɔsakyeree na wɔbaa Ewuradze hɔ no hɔn nkurow edzin; woyinom so na wɔdze hɔn etuatsew ho akodze guu famu, nyew, hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze; na hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ Lamanfo.

14 Na Amalekifo no annsakyer, gyedɛ nyimpa kor pɛr; na Amulonfo no so annsakyer; na mbom wopiriim hɔn akoma na Lamanfo no a wɔtse asaase ne mbea a wɔtse no so dɛmara, nyew, hɔn a wɔtsetse hɔn nkuraase nyina nye hɔn nkurow nyina mu.

15 Dɛm ntsi na yɛabobɔ nkurow a Lamanfo a woenu hɔnho na woehu nokwar no na wɔasakyer no edzin no.

16 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen no nye hɔn a wɔasakyer pɛɛ dɛ wonya dzin ama soronko aabɛda hɔn nye hɔn enuanom no ntamu; dɛm ntsi ɔhen no nye Aaron nye hɔn asɔfoe mu pii dwendween dzin a wɔmfa nto hɔn do, ama wɔaabɛyɛ soronko.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔfrɛɛ hɔnho Anti-Nephi-Lehifo; na dɛm na wɔdze frɛɛ hɔn na wɔammfrɛ hɔn Lamanfo bio.

18 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ edwuma papanara; nyew, na wɔfaa Nephifo no anyɛnkofo; dɛm ntsi, wɔnye hɔn dzii nkitaho, na Nyankopɔn ne ndom no enndzi hɔn ekyir bio.
alma 24:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 24[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfo no ba Nyankopɔn no nkorɔfo no do—Anti-Nephi-Lehifo dzi dɛw wɔ Christ mu na abɔfo bɛsera hɔn—Wɔpɛ dɛ wowu kyɛn dɛ wɔbɔkõ agye hɔnho—Lamanfo pii so sakyer. Bɛyɛ mfe 90–77 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalekifo nye Amulonfo nye Lamanfo a wɔwɔ Amulon no, nye Helam asaase so do no, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Jerusalem asaase do no, ne sin ara nye dɛ nsaase a etwa ho ehyia nyina a wonnyaa nsakyer no na wɔammfa Anti-Nephi-Lehi dzin annto hɔn do no, Amalekifo nye Amulonfo no nunuu hɔn ma wonyaa ebufuw wɔ hɔn enuanom no ho.

2 Na hɔn ebufuw a ɔwɔ hɔnho no mu yɛɛ dzen mbordo araa mpo ma wɔtseew etua wɔ hɔn hen do; na wɔammpɛ dɛ obedzi hɔn do hen dɛm ntsi, wɔfaa akodze dze kɔr Anti-Nephi-Lehi dɔm do.

3 Afei ɔhen no dze ahendzi no maa ne ba, na ɔtoo no dzin Anti-Nephi-Lehi.

4 Na ɔhen no wui wɔ dɛm afe no a Lamanfo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔroboaboa hɔnho nye Nyame ne mba abɔkõ no mu.

5 Afei ber a Ammon na n’enuanom nye hɔn a wɔnye hɔn bae no hun dɛ Lamanfo no roboaboa hɔnho dze akɛsɛɛ hɔn enuanom no, wɔbaa Midian asaase do na Ammon hyiaa n’enuanom no nyina; na wofii hɔ baa Ishmael asaase do dɛ wɔnye Lamoni nye no nua Anti-Nephi-Lehi robɔbɔ ngua na wɔadwendwen adze a wɔbɛyɛ dze abɔ hɔnho ban wɔ Lamanfo ho.

6 Afei hɔn a wɔasakyer aba Ewuradze hɔ no mu kor mpo ammpɛ dɛ ɔbɛfa akodze na ɔnye n’enuanom no akɔkõ; nna wɔammpɛ mpo dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ahoboaboa biara dze akɔkõ; nyew, na hɔn hen so hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnyɛ.

7 Afei, dɛm nsɛm yi na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ no nkorɔfo no wɔ asɛm yi ho: Mo nkorɔfo adɔfo, meda Nyankopɔn ase dɛ hɛn Nyame kokroko nam ne papayɛ do asoma hɛn enuanom Nephifo yi ma wɔaba hɛn nkyɛn dɛ wɔmbɛkã nsɛmpa no nkyerɛ hɛn ma yenhu hɛn egyanom emumuyɛfo hɔn amambra no.

8 Na hwɛ, meda me Nyame kokroko no ase dɛ ɔama hɛn no Sunsum no bi ma ɔagow hɛn akoma, ma yɛnye hɛn enuanom Nephifo yi ridzi nkitaho.

9 Na hwɛ, meda me Nyame ase dɛ oebue dɛm nkitahodzi kwan yi ato hɔ na yehu hɛn bɔn nye ewudzi pii a yedzi.

10 Na meda me Nyame ase so, nyew, me Nyame kokroko no, dɛ ɔama yennu hɛnho wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho, na eso dɛ ɔdze hɛn bɔn pii yi nye ewudzi a yedzi akyɛ hɛn, na ɔnam ne Ba no ndwuma pa mu oeyi hɛn afɔdzi efi hɛn akoma mu.

11 Na afei hwɛ, m’enuanom, ber yi dza yebotum ayɛ ara nye dɛ (osiandɛ hɛn nye adasamba a yɛayew koraa) yebonu hɛnho wɔ hɛn bɔn nyina ho nye ewudzi pii a yedzi ho, na yebisa Nyankopɔn ma oeyi efi hɛn akoma mu, osiandɛ iyinom ara na yebotum ayɛ dze enu hɛnho yie wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim ama oeeyi hɛnho nkekãa efi hɔ—

12 Afei, mo nuanom adɔfo, ber a Nyankopɔn eyi hɛnho nkekaa efi hɔ, hɛn nkrantsee ho atsew yi, mma hom mma yɛmmfa hɛn nuanom hɔn bɔgyaa nnkekã ho bio.

13 Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, Oho, hom mma yɛmfa hɛn nkrantsee nsie amma hɛn nuanom hɔn bɔgyaa annkekã ho; annyɛ na sɛ yɛma nkekãa ba hɛn nkrantsee ho bio a worunntum nhohor ho ma noho atsew bio wɔ hɛn Nyame kokroko no ne Ba no bɔgyaa a obekyi dze ayɛ werdambɔ dze ama hɛn bɔn.

14 Na Nyame kokroko no ehu hɛn mbɔbɔr, na ɔama yehu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom amma yɛannhera; nyew, ɔama yehu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom dada osiandɛ ɔdɔ hɛn akra so dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze dɔ hɛn mba: dɛm ntsi, ɔnam n’ehumbɔbɔr do ama n’abɔfoe abɛsera hɛn, ama yeehu nkwagye nhyehyɛɛ no na ndaamba hɛn ebusuasantsen so ehu.

15 O hɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ mbɔbɔrhufo! Na afei hwɛ, susuampaara dɛ yɛfona ara yie ansaana yerutum eyi hɛn nkekãa efi hɛnho, na hɛn nkrantsee ho atsew yi, hom mma yemfa nsuma ama noho ada ho atsew ma ayɛ dasegye ama hɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu, anaadɛ wɔ da a wɔdze hɛn bɛba ebegyina n’enyim ma oebu hɛn atsɛn no mu, dɛ yɛammfa hɛn enuanom hɔn bɔgyaa annkekã hɛn nkrantsee ho fi ber a ɔdze n’asɛm no maa hɛn ma ɔnam do tseew hɛnho no.

16 Na afei, m’enuanom, sɛ hɛn nuanom no rohwehwɛ asɛɛ hɛn a, hwɛ, yɛdze hɛn nkrantsee bosuma, nyew, yɛdze besie wɔ asaasetsirmu, ama noho ada ho aatsew ma ayɛ dasegye dɛ yɛammfa annyɛ hwee da, wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu; na sɛ hɛn enuanom no sɛɛ hɛn a, hwɛ, yɛbɔkɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn na ɔbɛgye hɛn nkwa.

17 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔhen no wiee dɛm nsɛm yi kã no, dɔm no nyinara boaa hɔn ano na wɔfaa hɔn nkrantsee, nye akodze biara a wɔdze kã nyimpa bɔgya gu no, na wosiee no wɔ asaasetsirmu.

18 Na wɔyɛɛ iyi dze yɛɛ dasegye maa Nyankopɔn nye adasamba, dɛ wɔremmfa nnkã nyimpa no bɔgyaa nngu bio da; na dɛm na wɔyɛe dze kyerɛɛ hɔn awerɛhyɛmu na wɔnye Nyankopɔn dzii ahyɛmu dɛ mbom wobegyaa hɔnankasa hɔn nkwa mu ama sen dɛ wɔbɛkã hɔn enuanom bɔgya egu; na dɛ wɔbɛgye efi onua bi nsamu no, mbom hɔnankasa wɔdze bɛma no; na dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn nda wɔ enyihaw mu no, mbom wɔdze hɔn nsa bɛyɛ edwuma mbordo.

19 Na dɛm na ɔma yehu dɛ ber a Lamanfo no gyee dzii no na wohun nokwar no, wogyinaa pintsinn na wɔpɛɛ dɛ wobohu amandze dze akɔ owu mu mpo sen dɛ wɔbɛyɛ bɔn; na yehu dɛ wosiee hɔn asomdwee ho akodze, anaadɛ wosiee hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze dze hwehwɛɛ asomdwee.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn enuanom no, Lamanfo no boaboaa hɔnho dɛ wɔrokɔkõ, na wɔbaa Nephi asaase do dɛ wɔrebɛsɛɛ ɔhen no, na wɔdze fofor esi n’ananmu, na wɔasɛɛ Anti-Nephi-Lehi dɔm efi asaase no do.

21 Afei ber a dɔm no hun dɛ wɔreba hɔn do no wɔkɔr dɛ worikehyia hɔn kwan, na wɔdze hɔnho too famu wɔ hɔn enyim, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrobɔ Ewuradze ne dzin, na wɔdaa famu hɔ dɛmara kesii dɛ Lamanfo no bae na wobotui hyɛɛ hɔn do, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔdze hɔn nkrantsee rukuku hɔn.

22 Na wɔnye hɔn enndzi aper biara ntsi wokum hɔn mu apem nye enum; na yenyim dɛ woehyira hɔn, osiandɛ wɔnye hɔn Nyankopɔn rekɛtsena.

23 Afei Lamanfo no hun dɛ hɔn enuanom no nnguan mmfi hɔn nkrantsee ano anaadɛ wɔnndan hɔnho nnkɔ hɔn nsa enyimfa anaa bakum, na mbom wɔdaa famu hɔ kesii dɛ wobowu, na ber a woruwu wɔ nkrantsee ano no mpo nna woriyi Nyame ayɛw.

24 Afei ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛm no, wogyaa dɛ wokuku hɔn; na hɔn mu dodowara wɔ mu a awerɛhow hyɛɛ hɔn akoma mã wɔ hɔn enuanom a wɔatɔr wɔ nkrantsee ano no ntsi, na wonuu hɔnho wɔ dza wɔayɛ no ho.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔtoow hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze no gui, na wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔbɛfa bio, osiandɛ nna yaw akã hɔn wɔ ewudzi a woedzi no ho; na wɔdaa famu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn enuanom no ayɛ no mpo hwɛɛ dɛ hɔn a wɔamema hɔn nsa do dze rukuku hɔn no benya ehumbɔbɔr anaa.

26 Na ɔbaa dɛ nkorɔfo a wɔbɛkãa Nyankopɔn no nkorɔfo ho no dɔɔ sõ sen hɔn a woeku hɔn no; na hɔn a wokum hɔn no yɛ atseneneefo, dɛm ntsi ekyingye biara nnyi ho, yenyim dɛ wɔagye hɔn nkwa.

27 Na omumuyɛnyi biara nnyi hɔn a wokum hɔn no mu; mbom dɔm a wɔbor apem na wonyaa nokwar no ho nyimdzee; dɛm ma yehu dɛ Ewuradze nam akwan pii do ma no nkorɔfo nya nkwagye.

28 Afei Lamanfo a wokum hɔn enuanom no hɔn mu dodowara yɛ Amalekifo nye Amulonfo, na hɔn mu dodowara na wɔdɔm Nehor ne fɛkuw no.

29 Afei, hɔn a wɔbɛkãa Ewuradze no nkorɔfo ho no mu biara nnyi hɔ a wɔyɛ Amalekifo anaa Amulonfo, anaa hɔn a wɔdɔm Nehor ne fɛkuw no, na mbom hɔn a wɔyɛ Laman nye Lemuel asefo.

30 Na dɛm ma yehu pefee dɛ nkorɔfo a woenya Nyame no Sunsum ne kan da, na woenya tsenenee ndzɛmba ho nyimdzee kɛse no, na nkyii wɔhwe ase wɔ bɔn nye mbrato mu a, hɔn akoma pirim mbordo, na dɛm ma hɔn tsebew sɛɛ koraa sen hɔn a wonnyim dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho hwee koraa.
alma 25:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 25[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfo hɔn ntoabɔ no tserɛw—Noah n’asefo asɔfo no hera dɛ mbrɛ Abinadi hyɛ ho nkɔm no—Lamanfo pii sakyer na wɔkɛkã Anti-Nephi-Lehifo ho—Wɔgye Christ dzi na wodzi Moses mbra do. Bɛyɛ mfe 90–77 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ dɛm Lamanfo no bo fuuw mbordo osian hɔn enuanom no a woekuku hɔn no ntsi; dɛm ntsi wɔkãa ntam dɛ wobedzi Nephifo no awer; na woeku Anti-Nephi-Lehifo no wɔ dɛm mber no mu bio.

2 Mbom wɔfaa hɔn nsordaafo no na wɔkɔr Zarahemla asaase no kurotsia, na wɔkɔr dɔm a wɔwɔ Ammonihah asaase do no do, na wɔkɛsɛɛ hɔn.

3 Na ɔno ekyir, wɔnye Nephifo no dzii akõ pii a no mu no wɔpaam hɔn na wokum hɔn.

4 Na Lamanfo no a wokum hɔn no mu dodowara yɛ Amulon nye n’enuanom hɔn asefo, wɔyɛ Noah n’asɔfoe, na wɔtotɔree wɔ Nephifo nsaano;

5 Na hɔn a wɔkaa no guanee kɔr sar no boka afamu, hɔ na wonyaa tum wɔ Lamanfo no do, na wɔmaa wɔdze gya hyeew Lamanfo no mu pii osian hɔn gyedzi ntsi—

6 Na hɔn mu dodowara yeew hɔn nkorɔfo pii na wohun amandze pii n’ekyir no, wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrekaa nsɛm a Aaron nye n’enuanom no kãa kyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn asaase no do no; dɛm ntsi wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ woruhu dɛ hɔn egyanom hɔn amambra no nyinara nnyɛ nokwar, na wɔgyee Ewuradze dzii, na wohun dɛ ɔno na ɔdze tum kɛse maa Nephifo no; na iyi maa hɔn mu dodowara nyaa nsakyer wɔ sar no do.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ ahwɛdofo no a wɔyɛ Amulon ne mba nkaase no hyɛɛ mbra dɛ wonku hɔn, nyew, hɔn a wɔgye dɛm ndzɛmba yinom dzi nyina.

8 Afei hɔn a osian hɔn gyedzi ntsi woeku hɔn wɔ Nyame mu no maa hɔn enuanom no bo fuwii; na wentwiwentwi hyɛɛ ase wɔ sar no do; na Lamanfo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ woritsiw Amulon nye no nuanom hɔn asefo no, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worukuku hɔn; na iyi maa woguanee kɔr sar no boka afamu.

9 Na hwɛ, Lamanfo no gu do rohwehwɛ hɔn dze besi ndɛ da yi. Iyi ama Abinadi ne nsɛm no a ɔkãe no ayɛ hɔ, dza ɔkãe a ɔfa asɔfo no a wɔmaa wɔdze ogya hyeew no no hɔn asefo.

10 Osiandɛ ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Dza hom dze rebɛyɛ me yi bɛyɛ ngyinahɔmadze ama ndaamba.

11 Na afei Abinadi nye nyia odzii kan wui wɔ ogya mu osian ne gyedzi a ɔwɔ no wɔ Nyame mu ntsi; afei iyi nye dza ɔrohwehwɛ akã, dɛ, dodowara bowu wɔ ogya mu dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze ayɛ no yi.

12 Na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ Noah n’asɔfoe no dɛ hɔn asefo bɛma woekuku nyimpa pii, dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze ayɛ no no, na dɛ wɔbɔbɔ hɔn apetse na woekuku hɔn dɛ nguan a wonnyi oguanhwɛfo a mbowa abɔyafo taa hɔn do na worukuku hɔn mpo; na afei hwɛ, dɛm nsɛm yi ada edzi, osiandɛ Lamanfo no ataa hɔn do etsiw hɔn na wɔahwe hɔn.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ worunntum nndzi Nephifo do konyim no, wɔsaan hɔn ekyir baa hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do; na hɔn mu dodowara baa bɛtsenaa Ishmael asaase nye Nephi asaase do, na wɔdze hɔnho kɔbɔɔ Nyame no nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Anti-Nephi-Lehifo no ho.

14 Na hɔn so siee hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nuanom no yɛe no, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ atseneneefo; na wɔnantseew Ewuradze n’akwan mu, na wosii nketse dɛ wobesie ne mbrasɛm nye n’ahyɛdze.

15 Nyew, wodzii Moses mbra do; osiandɛ okehiaa dɛ wodzi Moses mbra do wɔ mber no mu, osiandɛ ne nyina nnhyɛɛ mã. Mbom Moses mbra no nyina ekyir no, wɔhwɛɛ Christ ne mbae no so kwan, nna wosusu ho dɛ Moses mbra no yɛ ne mbae no ho ngyinahɔmadze, na wɔgyee dzii dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ wodzi baguamu ayɛdze no do kesi aber a wobeyi no akyerɛ hɔn.

16 Afei nna wonnsusu dɛ nkwagye nam Moses mbra do bɛba; na mbom Moses mbra no na ɔhyɛ hɔn gyedzi dzen wɔ Christ mu; na iyi maa wɔnam gyedzi do gyinaa pintsinn wɔ enyidado mu dze kɔr onnyiewiei nkwagye mu, na aber nyina wɔtwer nkɔnhyɛ sunsum no a ɔkã ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba ho asɛm kyerɛ no.

17 Na afei hwɛ, Ammon, na Aaron, nye Omner, nna Himni, nye hɔn enuanom no nyaa enyigye mbordo; osian dza wɔyɛɛ wɔ Lamanfo no mu a asow aba ntsi, na wohun dɛ Ewuradze etsie hɔn mpaabɔ, na ɔada n’asɛm no so edzi wɔ hɔn mu wɔ kwan biara mu.
alma 26:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 26[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ammon tuw noho wɔ Ewuradze mu—Ewuradze hyɛ agyedzifo dzen na ɔma hɔn nyimdzee—Nyimpa botum edua gyedzi do dze akra mpempem aba nnuho mu—Nyankopɔn wɔ tum nyina na adze nyina mu ntseasee. Bɛyɛ mfe 90–77 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, nsɛm a Ammon kãa kyerɛɛ n’enuanom no nye dɛ: Mo nuanom na m’enuanom, nhwɛ mese hom dɛ, ebɛnadze tsitsir ntsi na ɔwɔ dɛ yedzi dɛw; ana yesusuu wɔ ber a yesii mu fii Zarahemla asaase do no dɛ Nyankopɔn bɛma hɛn nhyira kɛse a ɔtse dɛm?

2 Na afei, mibisa hom dɛ, ebɛn nhyira kɛse na oehue egu hɛn do yi? Ana hom botum akã?

3 Hwɛ, miriyi ano ama hom; osiandɛ nna hɛn enuanom Lamanfo no wɔ sum mu, nyew, nna wɔwɔ sum kebii mu, na mbom hwɛ, hɔn mu baahen na woebohu Nyankopɔn ne kan nwanwa yi? Na iyi nye nhyira a oehue egu hɛn do, ma yɛayɛ edwindadze wɔ Nyame ne nsamu ma ɔdze hɛn edzi dwuma kɛse.

4 Hwɛ, hɔn mu mpempem ridzi dɛw, na wɔdze hɔn aba Nyame no nguanbuw mu.

5 Hwɛ, kwã no aber, na nhyira akã hom, osiandɛ hom atow hom kantankrankye ato mu dze hom ahoɔdzen rutwa, nyew, hom ayɛ edwuma wɔ da no nyina mu; na hom nhwɛ hom efi-efi no dodow? Na wɔbɔboaboa ano dze ekogu san do, amma ɔannsɛɛ.

6 Nyew, ehum runnhwe hɔn no wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu; nyew, ekyinehyia mframa runnhuw hɔn nnkɔ sor; na mbom sɛ ehum bɔ a wɔbɔbom aboa hɔn ano wɔ hɔn bea do amma ehum no enntum annhɛn hɔn mu; nyew, nna mframa dzendzen so runntum nnhuw hɔn nnkɔ beebiara a ɔtamfo no pɛ dɛ ɔdze hɔn kɔ.

7 Mbom hwɛ, wɔwɔ otwa ber Wura no ne nsamu, na wɔyɛ nedze; na ɔbɛma hɔn do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

8 Nhyira nkã hɛn Nyankopɔn; hom mma yɛntow ndwom nyi no ayɛw, nyew, hom mma yɛmfa ndaase mma ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no, osiandɛ ne tseneneeyɛ wɔ hɔ afebɔɔ.

9 Na sɛ yemmfi Zarahemla asaase do ammba a nkyɛ hɛn enuanom adɔfo yi a wɔwɔ hɛnho ɔdɔ nwanwa yi, bɛda ho ekyir hɛn dzendzenndzen, nyew, na nkyɛ wɔda ho so yɛ ananaben ama Nyankopɔn.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Ammon kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, no nuabanyin Aaron kãa n’enyim see dɛ: Ammon, musuro dɛ mebɛkã dɛ w’enyigye rotwe wo akɔ ntuw mu.

11 Mbom Ammon see no dɛ: Munntuw wɔ mankasa m’ahoɔdzen mu, anaadɛ wɔ mankasa me nyansaa mu; na mbom hwɛ, me dɛw ahyɛ mã, nyew, dɛw ahyɛ m’akoma mu mã, na mibedzi dɛw wɔ me Nyame mu.

12 Nyew, minyim dɛ mennsɛ hwee; sɛ mohwɛ m’ahoɔdzen ho a nna meyɛ mberɛw koraa; dɛm ntsi murunntuw moho, na mbom mobotuw wɔ Nyame mu, osiandɛ n’ahoɔdzen mu na mutum meyɛ ndzɛmba nyina; nyew, yɛayɛ etumdze akɛse pii wɔ asaase yi do, na iyi ho ntsi yebeyi ne dzin ayɛw afebɔɔ.

13 Hwɛ, hɛn nuanom mpem ahen na oeyi hɔn efi hɛl ne yaw mu; na wɔaba robɔtow ɔdɔ ɔpon ho ndwom, na iyi osian n’asɛm no tum a ɔwɔ hɛn mu ntsi, dɛm ntsi ana yennyi siantsir tsitsir bi a yɛhwɛ ho dzi dɛw?

14 Nyew, yɛwɔ siantsir bi a yɛhwɛ ho dze yi no ayɛw afebɔɔ, osiandɛ ɔno nye Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn no, na oesian hɛn nuanom efi hɛl no nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn no mu.

15 Nyew, nna daapem sum nye ɔsɛɛ etwa hɔnho ehyia; na mbom hwɛ, ɔdze hɔn aba ne daapem kan mu, nyew, wɔaba daapem nkwagye mu; na no dɔ kɛse no etwa hɔnho ehyia; nyew, na hɛn na yɛayɛ edwindadze wɔ ne nsamu edzi dɛm dwuma a ɔsõ na ɔyɛ nwanwa yi.

16 Dɛm ntsi, hom mma yenhyɛ hɛnho enyimnyam, nyew, yɛbɛhyɛ hɛnho enyimnyam wɔ Ewuradze mu; nyew, yebedzi dɛw, osiandɛ hɛn dɛw ahyɛ mã; nyew, yebeyi hɛn Nyame ayɛw afebɔɔ. Hwɛ, woana na obotum ahyɛ noho enyimnyam kɛse wɔ Ewuradze mu? Nyew, woana na obotum akã no tum kɛse no nye n’ehumbɔbɔr, nye ne penkyɛr a ɔwɔ wɔ adasamba ho asɛm pii? Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, dza ɔyɛ wɔ mo mu no murunntum nnkã no mu ketseketse mpo.

17 Woana dwen dɛ hɛn Nyame bohu hɛn mbɔbɔr ara ekesi dɛ ɔbɔtwe hɛn efi hɛn bɔn kɛse nye ɔsɛɛ no mu?

18 Hwɛ, yɛdze ebufuhyew kɛse mpo na ehunahuna kɔr dɛ yɛrekɛsɛɛ n’asɔr.

19 Ao, ebɛnadze ntsi na oenngyaa hɛn amma ɔsɛɛ kɛse, nyew, ebɛnadze ntsi na ɔamma ne pɛrpɛrdzi nkrantsee no ammba hɛn do, mma yɛammba abagura a onnyiewiei mu?

20 Ao, sɛ modwen ho a, ɔma me kra mpo guan. Hwɛ, ɔamma ne pɛrpɛrdzi no enndzi dwuma wɔ hɛn do, na mbom ɔnam n’ehumbɔbɔr kɛse do dze hɛn atra daapem owu no bun nye awerɛhow no mpo ma hɛn akra enya nkwagye.

21 Na afei hwɛ, mo nuanom, honammunyi bi wɔ hɔ a onyim dɛm ndzɛmba yinom? Mese hom dɛ, obiara nnyi hɔ a onyim dɛm ndzɛmba yinom, gyedɛ nyia oenya nnuho.

22 Nyew, nyia oenu noho na ɔma ne gyedzi yɛ edwuma, na ɔyɛ ndwuma pa, na ɔbɔ mpaa daadaa a onngyaa da—nyimpa ɔtse dɛm yi na ɔwɔ ho kwan dɛ ohu Nyankopɔn n’esumasɛm; nyew, dɛm nyimpa yi na wɔbɛma oeyi ndzɛmba a wonnyii nnkyerɛɛ da no akyerɛ; nyew, wɔbɛma dɛm nyimpa no atwe mpempem aba nnuho mu mpo dɛ mbrɛ wɔama yɛatwe hɛn enuanom yinom aba nnuho mu yi.

23 Afei hom akaa, m’enuanom, dɛ yɛkãa kyerɛɛ hɛn enuanom wɔ Zarahemla asaase do dɛ yɛrokɔ Nephi asaase do akɛkã nsɛmpa no akyerɛ hɛn enuanom Lamanfo no wɔsereew hɛn, sii hɛn atwetwe?

24 Na wɔsee hɛn dɛ: Ana hom susuu dɛ hom botum atwe Lamanfo aba nokwar no ho? Ana hom susuu dɛ hom botum ama Lamanfo yinom agye edzi dɛ hɔn egyanom hɔn amambra no a ɔnntsen, nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ akɔnkyefo dɛm yi; dɔm a hɔn akoma mu enyigyedze ara nye bɔgyakagu; dɔm a wɔasɛɛ hɔn mber nyina dze ayɛ emumuyɛ yaayaa; dɔm a hɔn akwan nyina yɛ mbrato akwan fitsi ahyɛse yi? Afei m’enuanom, hom kaa dɛ iyi nye hɔn nsɛm.

25 Na wɔkãe so dɛ: Hom mma yɛmfa akodze na yɛnkɔ hɔn do, ama yɛaasɛɛ hɔn nye hɔn emumuyɛdze nyina efi asaase yi do, amma woenndzi kan ammba hɛn do ammbɛsɛɛ hɛn.

26 Mbom hwɛ, m’enuanom adɔfo, yɛammba sar yi do dɛ yɛrebɛsɛɛ hɛn nuanom, mbom hɛn adwen nye dɛ gyangyanbiara yebotum yɛagye hɔn mu binom hɔn akra nkwa.

27 Afei ber a hɛn werɛ howee, na nkyɛ yɛreyɛ asan hɛn ekyir no, hwɛ, Ewuradze kyekyee hɛn werɛ, na ɔsee dɛ: Hom nkɔ hom enuanom Lamanfo no mu, na hom mfa abotar nsɔw hom amandzehu, na mebɛma hom konyimdzi.

28 Na afei hwɛ, yɛaba, na yɛabɛkã hɔnho; na yenya abotar wɔ hɛn haw mu; na yɛasɔw enyimguase biara; nyew, yekyin fi fie akɔ fie mu, yɛtwer wiadze ehumbɔbɔr—na nnyɛ wiadze n’ehumbɔbɔr nko na mbom Nyame n’ehumbɔbɔr so.

29 Na yɛahɛn hɔn efiefi mu na yɛakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn, na yɛakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn abɔntsen do; nyew, na yɛakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn akoko do; na yɛahɛn hɔn temple nye hɔn nhyiamudan nyina mu na yɛakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn; na woyii hɛn edzi na wodzii hɛnho fɛw, na wohimaa ntafi guu hɛn do, na wɔbɔɔ hɛn asotɔr; na wohiim hɛn abo, na wɔfaa hɛn dze ntampehoma dzendzen kyekyeer hɛn, na wɔdze hɛn guu efiadze; na ɔnam Nyame no tum nye ne nyansaa do woeyi hɛn efi mu bio.

30 Na yɛsɔɔw amandzehu ahorow pii, wɔ iyi mu, dɛ gyangyanbiara akra binom nam hɛn do benya nkwa; na yenyim dɛ hɛn dɛw bɛhyɛ mã dɛ ɔnam hɛn do ma akra binom enya nkwa.

31 Afei hwɛ, yehu hɛn edwuma no mu ndɔbaa; osuar anaa? Mese hom dɛ, Oho, ɔdɔɔ sõ ara yie; nyew, na yetum gye hɔn nokwardzi ho dase, osian ɔdɔ a wɔwɔ dze ma hɔn enuanom nye hɛn so ntsi.

32 Na hwɛ, wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔn nkwa bɔbɔ afɔr sen dɛ wobeyi hɔn atamfo nkwa efi hɔ; na wɔdze hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze esie asaase tsir mu, osian dɔ a wɔwɔ dze ma hɔn enuanom ntsi.

33 Na afei hwɛ mese hom dɛ, ana ɔdɔ kɛse a ɔtse dɛm yi bi wɔ asaase nyinara do? Oho, bi nnyi hɔ, bi nnyi Nephifo mpo mu.

34 Na hwɛ, wɔbɛfa akodze nye hɔn enuanom akõ; wɔremmfa hɔnho mma dɛ wonku hɔn. Na mbom hwɛ hɔn mu dodow na wɔdze hɔn nkwa too hɔ; na yenyim dɛ wɔkɔ hɔn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, osian hɔn dɔ nye bɔn a wokyirii dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ntsi.

35 Afei ana siantsir bi nnyi hɔ mma hɛn dɛ yedzi dɛw? Nyew, mese hom dɛ, fitsi wiadze n’ahyɛse nyimpa biara nnyi hɔ a wɔwɔ siantsir kɛse bi a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔhwɛ ho dzi dɛw dɛ hɛn; nyew, m’enyigye adɔɔ sõ araa ma murutuw wɔ me Nyame mu; osiandɛ ɔwɔ tum nyina, nye nyansa nyina, nye adze nyina mu ntsease; onyim adze nyina, na ɔyɛ mbɔbɔrhunyi, na ɔma hɔn a wonu hɔnho na wɔgye ne dzin dzi no nya nkwagye mpo.

36 Afei sɛ iyi yɛ ntuw a, nna dɛmara mpo na mubotuw moho; osiandɛ iyi nye mo nkwa na me kandzea, m’enyigye na mo nkwagye, na mo ɔpon fi daapem mbusu mu. Nyew, nhyira nkã me Nyankopɔn ne dzin, nyia ɔdwen dɛm nkorɔfo yi a wɔyɛ Israel duatantam n’abaw a, wɔayew efi ne duatantam ho wɔ ananabea do; nyew, mese, nhyira nkã me Nyankopɔn ne dzin, nyia ɔdwen hɛnho hɛn a yɛayɛ ekyimakyimafo wɔ ananabea.

37 Afei mo nuanom, yehu dɛ Nyankopɔn dwen nyimpa nyina ho, wɔ asaase biara do; nyew, ɔkan no nkorɔfo, na n’ehumbɔbɔr abadaa kata adze nyina do. Afei iyi nye m’enyigye, nye me ndaase kɛse; nyew, na medze ndaase bɛma me Nyankopɔn afebɔɔ. Amen.
alma 27:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ewuradze hyɛ Ammon dɛ ondzi Anti-Nephi-Lehifo enyim kan nkɔ bea a hɔyɛ dwudwoodwo—Ammon hyia Alma, onya enyigye mbordo ma n’ahom pa—Nephifo dze Jershon asaase no ma Anti-Nephi-Lehifo—Wɔfrɛ hɔn Ammon no nkorɔfo. Bɛyɛ mfe 90–77 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a dɛm Lamanfo no a wɔkɔr dɛ wɔrokɔkõ etsia Nephifo no hun dɛ hɔn mbɔdzembɔ pii nyina ekyir no worunntum nnsɛɛ hɔn no, wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɔr Nephi asaase do bio.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalekifo no bo fuuw kɛsenara osiandɛ nna hɔn dɔm no mu pii atotɔr. Na ber a wohun dɛ worunntum nndzi Nephifo no hɔn wer no, wɔhyɛɛ ase nunuu dɔm no ara ma hɔn bo fuuw hɔn enuanom Anti-Nephi-Lehifo no; dɛm ntsi wɔhyɛɛ ase bio dɛ wɔresɛɛ hɔn.

3 Afei dɛm nkorɔfo yi poow bio dɛ wɔbɛfa hɔn akodze, na wɔdze hɔnho maa hɔn atamfo no dɛ wonku hɔn dɛ mbrɛ wɔpɛ.

4 Afei ber a Ammon nye n’enuanom no hun dɛm ɔsɛɛ ndwuma yi wɔ hɔn a wɔdɔ hɔn papaapa, na hɔn so wɔdɔ hɔn papaapa—osiandɛ wɔfaa hɔn dɛ wɔyɛ abɔfo a Nyankopɔn asoma hɔn dɛ wɔmbɛgye hɔn nkwa mfi daapem ɔsɛɛ mu—dɛm ntsi, ber a Ammon nye n’enuanom no hun dɛm ɔsɛɛ ndwuma kɛse yi no, hɔn yamu hyehyee hɔn, na wɔkãa kyerɛɛ ɔhen no dɛ:

5 Ma yɛmboaboa Ewuradze no dɔm yi ano, na yenguan mfi hɛn atamfo yi nsa nkɔ hɛn enuanom Nephifo nkyɛn wɔ Zarahemla asaase do amma wɔaannsɛɛ hɛn.

6 Na mbom ɔhen no see hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, Nephifo no bɛsɛɛ hɛn, osian ewudzi nye bɔn pii a yɛayɛ etsia hɔn ntsi.

7 Na Ammon see dɛ: Mobɔkɔ ekebisa Ewuradze, na sɛ ɔse hɛn dɛ, yɛnkɔ hɛn enuanom no nkyɛn a, ana yɛ bɔkɔ?

8 Na ɔhen no see no dɛ: Nyew, sɛ Ewuradze se hɛn dɛ yɛnkɔ a, yɛbɔkɔ hɛn enuanom nkyɛn na yɛakɛyɛ hɔn ndɔnkɔfo ekesi dɛ yɛbɔsom dze etua ewudzi nye bɔn pii a yɛayɛ etsia hɔn no kaw.

9 Mbom Ammon see no dɛ: Iyi tsia hɛn enuanom no hɔn mbra a m’egya yɛe too hɔ, dɛ mma wonnya ndɔnkɔfo biara wɔ hɔn mu no; dɛm ntsi hom mma yɛnkɔ hɔ na yɛnkɛdan hɛn nuanom no hɔn mbɔbɔrhu.

10 Na mbom ɔhen no see no dɛ: Kebisa Ewuradze, na sɛ ɔse hɛn dɛ yɛnkɔ a, yɛbɔkɔ; annyɛ dɛm a yɛbɔhwer hɛn nkwa wɔ asaase no do.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ammon kɔree kebisaa Ewuradze, na Ewuradze see no dɛ:

12 Ma nkorɔfo yi mfi asaase yi do amma wɔannhwer hɔn nkwa; osiandɛ Satan esuo Amalekifo no hɔn akoma mu dzendzenndzen, ma dɛm ntsi onunu Lamanfo no hɔn akoma mu ma wonya ebufuw wɔ hɔn enuanom ho dɛ wobokuku hɔn; dɛm ntsi hom mfi asaase yi do; na nhyira akã dɛm nkorɔfo yi wɔ dɛm ebusuasantsen yi mu, na mobɔbɔ hɔnho ban.

13 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Ammon kɔree na ɔkɛkãa nsɛm nyinara a Ewuradze akã akyerɛ no no kyerɛɛ ɔhen no.

14 Na wɔboaboaa hɔn dɔm nyina ano, nyew, Ewuradze no dɔm nyina, na wɔboaboaa hɔn nguankuw nye hɔn anantwikuw nyina ano, na wofii asaase no do, na wɔbaa sar no a ɔda Nephi asaase nye Zarahemla asaase ntamu no do, na wobodur asaase no ne he do.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ammon see hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, emi nye m’enuanom yi bɔkɔ Zarahemla asaase do hɔ, na hom bɔtweɔn wɔ ha ekesi dɛ yɛbɛsan; na yɛrokɔhwɛ dɛ sɛ hɛn nuanom no bɛpɛ dɛ hom bɛba hɔn asaase do a.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Ammon rokɔ asaase no do no, ɔno nye no nuanom no hyiaa Alma wɔ bea a wɔakã ho asɛm no do; na hwɛ, iyi yɛɛ nhyiamu a ɔyɛɛ enyigye.

17 Afei Ammon nyaa enyigye mbordo; nyew, onyaa Nyame mu enyigye araa ma n’ahom mpo pae; ma ɔhwee famu bio.

18 Afei ana iyi nnyɛ enyigye mbordo? Hwɛ, iyi yɛ enyigye bi a obiara nnkenya gyedɛ nyia oenu noho nokwar mu na ɔdze ahobrɛadze rohwehwɛ enyigye.

19 Afei enyigye a Alma nyae ber a ohyiaa n’enuanom no dɔɔ sõ dodow, na dɛmara so na Aaron, Omner, nye Himni so nyae; na mbom hwɛ hɔn enyigye no annyɛ dza ɔbor hɔn ahom do.

20 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Alma dzii n’enuanom no enyim nye hɔn sanee kɔr Zarahemla asaase do; na ɔnye hɔn kɔr nankasa ne fie. Na wɔkɔree kɛkãa dza osii wɔ hɔn nye hɔn enuanom Lamanfo no ntamu wɔ Nephi asaase do nyina kyerɛɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no maa wɔbɔɔ dawur wɔ asaase nyina do dɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ohu dɔm no hɔn adwen sɛ wɔpen do dɛ wɔngye hɔn enuanom Anti-Nephi-Lehifo no a.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɔm no see dɛ: Hwɛ, yɛdze Jershon asaase a ɔda po no boka afamu, dza ɔsɔw Dzifuu asaase n’anee afamu no bɛma hɔn; na dɛm Jershon asaase yi na yɛdze bɛma hɛn enuanom no ma ɔayɛ hɔn egyapadze.

23 Na hwɛ, yɛdze hɛn nsordaafo bogu Jershon asaase nye Nephi asaase ntamu, ama yɛaabɔ hɛn enuanom a wɔwɔ Jershon asaase do no ho ban; osiandɛ wosuro dɛ wɔbɛfa akodze akõ etsia hɔn enuanom amma wɔannyɛ bɔn; na woenya dɛm suro kɛse yi osian nnuho kɛse a woenya wɔ hɔn ewudzi nye hɔn emumuyɛ huhu no ho ntsi.

24 Na afei hwɛ, iyi na yɛbɛyɛ dze ama hɛn enuanom, dɛ wɔmfa Jershon asaase; na yɛdze hɛn nsordaafo bɔbɔ hɔnho ban efi hɔn atamfo nsa, sɛ wɔbɛma hɛn hɔn ahonyadze kakra dze aboa hɛn ma yɛdze ahwɛ hɛn nsordaafo no a.

25 Afei, ɔbaa dɛ ber a Ammon tsee iyi no, ɔsaan n’ekyir kɔr Anti-Nephi-Lehifo no nkyɛn, na Alma so nye no kɔr sar no do wɔ bea a woesisi hɔn ntamadan wɔ no, na ɔdaa ndzɛmba yinom nyina edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn. Na Alma so kãa ɔno nye Ammon na Aaron nye hɔn enuanom no hɔn nsakyer ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn.

26 Na ɔbaa dɛ iyi dze enyigye kɛse brɛɛ hɔn. Na wɔkɔr Jershon asaase do; na wɔkɛfaa Jershon asaase no tsenaa do; na Nephifo no frɛɛ hɔn Ammon no nkorɔfo; dɛm ntsi dɛm dzin yi yɛɛ hɔn dansewa ofi dɛm da no dze kɔ.

27 Na wɔforaa Nephifo no mu, na wɔkaan hɔn kãa hɔn a wɔyɛ Nyame n’asɔrmba no ho. Na hɔn dɔ mapa a wɔwɔ wɔ Nyankopɔn nye nyimpa so ho no so yɛɛ hɔn dansewa; na wodzii nokwar ara yie na wɔyɛɛ atseneneefo wɔ ndzɛmba nyina ho; na wogyinaa pintsinn wɔ gyedzi mu wɔ Christ mu, dze kɔr ewiei.

28 Na dɛ wɔbɛkã hɔn enuanom hɔn bɔgyaa egu no yɛɛ ebusudze kɛsenara wɔ hɔn enyi do; na biribiara enntum annyɛ hɔn mma wɔammfa akodze annkõ enntsia hɔn enuanom da; na owu annyɛ adze a ɔyɛ hu wɔ hɔn enyi do, osian hɔn enyidado wɔ Christ nye owusoɛr mu no ntsi; dɛm ntsi wohun dɛ Christ no konyimdzi no amen owu ama hɔn.

29 Dɛm ntsi wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔbɛma kwan ma hɔn enuanom no edua etsirmɔdzen, emumuyɛ nye akwan horow biara mu ekuku hɔn kyɛn dɛ wɔbɔtwe nkrantsee anaa pea dze eku hɔn.

30 Na dɛm na ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ nkorɔfo a hɔn dɔ mu yɛɛ dzen mapa, nye nkorɔfo a Ewuradze n’enyi gyee hɔnho mbordo.
alma 28:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 28[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfo dzi ɔkogu wɔ ɔkõ huhu bi mu—Woku nyimpa ɔpepedu—Emumuyɛfo bɔkɔ mbusu a onnyi ewiei tsebew mu; na atseneneefo eenya enyigye a onnyi ewiei da. Bɛyɛ mfe 77–76 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Ammon no nkorɔfo no hɔn ase gyee wɔ Jershon asaase do, na wɔkyekyeer asɔr so wɔ Jershon asaase do, na Nephifo hɔn nsordaafo no bɔɔ Jershon asaase ho ban, nyew, nye mbea nyina a etwa Zarahemla asaase ho ehyia no; hwɛ Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo no tsiiw hɔn enuanom no kɔr sar no do.

2 Na dɛm maa ɔkõ dzendzen bi sii hɔ; nyew, dza ɔtse dɛm yi bi nnsii wɔ nyimpa nyinara mu da wɔ asaase no do fi ber a Lehi dze fii Jerusalem; nyew, na Lamanfo no hɔn mu ɔpepe du na wokum hɔn petsee mbeambea.

3 Nyew, na wokum Nephifo no so hɔn mu pii; naaso wɔpaam Lamanfo no, bɔɔ hɔn petsee, na Nephifo no saan hɔn ekyir bio kɔr hɔn asaase do.

4 Na afei aber yi mu no wɔtsee nkrumsi nye kwadwom twa kɛse wɔ Nephifo nyinara mu wɔ asaase no do—

5 Nyew, ekunafo a worusũ ma hɔn kunnom, nna egyanom a worusũ ma hɔn mbabanyin, nna akyerɛbaa dze rema no nuabanyin, nyew, onuabanyin dze rema n’egya; na dɛm na ɔmaa wɔtsee nkrumsi wɔ hɔn nyinara hɔn mu, wosũi dze maa hɔn ebusuafo a woekuku hɔn no.

6 Na afei nokwar, dɛm da no yɛɛ awerɛhow da; nyew, awerɛhow mber, mber a wɔdze faa akɔnkye na wɔbɔɔ mpaa kɛse.

7 Na dɛm na atsɛmbuafo a wɔhwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no hɔn afe a otsĩa duenum no dze baa ewiei.

8 Na iyi nye nsɛm a ɔfa Ammon nye n’enuanom ho, dza ɔfa hɔn akwantu nyina ho wɔ Nephi asaase do, nye hɔn haw wɔ asaase no do hɔ, hɔn awerɛhow nye hɔn amandzehu nye hɔn enyigye a onnyi kabea, na mbrɛ wosii gyee enuanom no dwudwoodwo dze hɔn kɔr Jeshon asaase do. Na afei Ewuradze no a ɔyɛ adasa nyina hɔn Pomfo no nhyira hɔn akra afebɔɔ.

9 Na iyi nye dza ɔfa akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi a osii Nephifo mu, nye akodzi so a osii Nephifo nye Lamanfo ntamu no; na atsɛmbuafo no hɔn afe a otsĩa duenum no aba ewiei.

10 Na ofi afe a odzi kan no dze kesi duenum no mu no akra mpempem na wɔsɛɛ hɔn; nyew, bɔgyaka pii na osii.

11 Na mpempem hɔn efun na ɔkɛhyɛɛ asaase mu, na mpempem pii so efun aboa ano ayɛ esiw wɔ asaase enyi no bɔɔ etur; nyew, na mpempem pii so na wosũi maa hɔn ebusuafo a wɔayew hɔn, na osiandɛ Ewuradze abɔ anohoba dɛ oegyaa hɔn mu ama mbusu a onnyi ewiei tsebew mu ntsi iyi abɔ hɔn hu.

12 Ber a mpempem binom rusũ nokwar mu ma hɔn ebusuafo a wɔayew no, nna woridzi dɛw so wɔ enyidado a wɔwɔ, na wonyim so dɛ Ewuradze n’anohoba kyerɛ mpo dɛ, wobenyan hɔn ma wɔaakɛtsena Nyankopɔn n’abanyimfa wɔ enyigye tsebew a onnyi ewiei da mu.

13 Na dɛm ma yehu nsonsonee wɔ nyimpa mu osian bɔn nye mbrato ntsi, nye abɔnsam no tum a ɔnam ndabraba nhyehyɛɛ a ɔayɛ do dze sua nyimpa hɔn akoma efir ntsi.

14 Na dɛm ma yehu ɔfrɛ kɛse dɛ nyimpa bɛyɛ edwuma wɔ Ewuradze ne wenyin ture enyimpi mu; na dɛm kyerɛ hɛn ma yehu mbrɛ awerɛhow tse, na mbrɛ enyigye so tse—awerɛhow ba osian owu nye ɔsɛɛ a osi nyimpa mu ntsi, na enyigye so ba osian Christ ne kan a ɔma nkwa no ntsi.
alma 29:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 29[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma pɛ dɛ obenya abɔfo ndze dze akã nnuho ho asɛm—Ewuradze dze akyerɛkyerɛfo ma aman nyina—Alma tuw noho wɔ Ewuradze n’edwuma mu nye konyim a Ammon na n’enuanom edzi mu. Bɛyɛ mfe 76 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 O kɛtseankyɛ meyɛ ɔbɔfo, na metum enya m’akoma n’apɛdze, na metum ekyin dze Nyame ne totorobɛnto akasa, medze ndze awosow asaase atsẽa mu akã nnuho ho nsɛm akyerɛ nyimpa biara!

2 Nyew, nkyɛ medze ndze a ɔbobɔ mu dɛ sinaman akã nnuho nye ɔpon nhyehyɛɛ ho nsɛm akyerɛ ɔkra biara ama woeenu hɔnho na wɔaba hɛn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, amma awerɛhow ammba asaase nyina enyi do bio.

3 Na mbom hwɛ, meyɛ nyimpa, na menam me pɛ kwan do yɛ bɔn; na ɔsɛ dɛ m’enyi sɔ ndzɛmba a Ewuradze dze ama me no ho.

4 Ɔnnsɛ dɛ mehaw moho wɔ mara m’apɛdze, dza ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn a odzi pɛrpɛr no ne ɔmom a osi pi no, na minyim dɛ ɔdze ma adasa dɛ mbrɛ hɔn apɛdze tse, dɛ ɔyɛ owu anaa nkwa; nyew, minyim dɛ ɔahyɛ ɔmom a ɔnnsesã dze ama adasa dɛ mbrɛ hɔn pɛ tse, dɛ ɔyɛ nkwagye anaa ɔsɛɛ.

5 Nyew, na minyim dɛ papa na bɔn gu adasa nyina enyim; nyia onnyim soronko a ɔda papa na bɔn ntamu no nndzi fɔ; na mbom nyia onyim papa na bɔn no, ɔno na wɔama no ho kwan dɛ ɔmfa dza ɔpɛ, dɛ ɔpɛ papa anaa bɔn, nkwa anaa owu, enyigye anaa dza ne tsibowa bɛhaw no.

6 Afei, ber a mehu na minyim dɛm ndzɛmba yinom yi, ebɛnadze na morohwehwɛ bio kã dza ɔwɔ dɛ meyɛ ho dɛ mebɛyɛ edwuma a wɔafrɛ me dɛ menyɛ no?

7 Ebɛnadze ntsi na mepɛ dɛ meyɛ dɛ ɔbɔfo ama meetum makasa akyerɛ obiara wɔ asaase n’ano n’ano nyina mu?

8 Na hwɛ, Ewuradze ama aman nyina kwan dɛ wɔmfa hɔnankasa hɔn man mu kasa nkã n’asɛm no nkyerɛ, nyew, ɔnam ne nyansaa do dze dza ohu dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ wonya biara ama hɔn; dɛm ntsi yehu dɛ Ewuradze kyerɛkyerɛ wɔ ne nyansaa mu wɔ dza ɔtsen na ɔyɛ nokwar mu.

9 Minyim dza Ewuradze ahyɛ me dɛ menyɛ, na mehyɛ moho enyimnyam wɔ mu. Mennhyɛ moho enyimnyam wɔ dza mara meyɛ ho, mbom mehyɛ moho enyimnyam wɔ dza Ewuradze ahyɛ me dɛ menyɛ no ho, nyew, na iyi na nye m’enyimnyam, dɛ annhwɛ a mebɛyɛ wo edwindadze wɔ Nyankopɔn ne nsamu dze atwe akra aba nnuho mu, na iyi na ɔma m’enyigye.

10 Na hwɛ, sɛ muhu m’enuanom pii a woenu hɔnho nokwar mu na wɔaba Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn hɔ a, nna dɛw ahyɛ me kra mã; afei ɔma mekaa dza Ewuradze ayɛ ama me, nyew, dɛ oetsie me mpaabɔ mpo; nyew, ɔma mekaa n’ehumbɔbɔr abasa a ɔtsenee wɔ mo do no.

11 Nyew, na mekaa m’egyanom so hɔn ndɔmmum no; na minyim dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar dɛ Ewuradze yii hɔn fii nkowaasom mu, na ɔnam iyi do dze kyekyeer n’asɔr; nyew, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn no, Abraham ne Nyankopɔn, Isaac ne Nyankopɔn nye Jacob ne Nyankopɔn no na oyii hɔn fii nkowaasom mu.

12 Nyew, mekaa m’egyanom hɔn ndɔmmumfa aber nyinara; na dɛm Nyankopɔn kor noara a ɔgyee hɔn fii Egyptfo hɔn nsamu no nna oyii hɔn fii nkowaasom mu.

13 Nyew, na dɛm Nyankopɔn kor noara so na ɔkyekyer n’asɔr wɔ hɔn mu; nyew, dɛm Nyankopɔn kor noara so na ɔfrɛɛ me ɔfrɛ krɔnkrɔn, dɛ menkã asɛm no nkyerɛ dɔm yi, na ɔama me konyimdzi kɛsenara, na ɔno mu na ɔma me dɛw hyɛ mã.

14 Na mbom menndzi dɛw wɔ mo nko mo konyimdzi ho, mbom me dɛw hyɛ mã osian m’enuanom no so a wɔkɔr Nephi asaase do no hɔn konyimdzi ntsi.

15 Hwɛ, wɔayɛ edwuma mbordo, na wɔdze ndɔbaa pii eduaba; na mbrɛ hɔn akatua dua dɔɔ sõ a!

16 Afei, sɛ modwen m’enuanom yinom hɔn konyimdzi ho a nna me kra eguan araa ma ɔatsew noho koraa mpo efi me nyimpadua ho, na dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛ no, dɛmara so na m’enyigye ne kɛse tse.

17 Na afei Nyankopɔn mma m’enuanom yinom ntsena Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no mu; nyew, na hɔn so a wɔyɛ hɔn edwuma mu ndɔbaa nyina so ntsena hɔ a worimmfi edzi bio, na mbom dɛ wobeyi no ayɛw afebɔɔ. Na Nyankopɔn mma ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛ mbrɛ me nsɛm tse, na dɛ mbrɛ makã no so mpo. Amen.
alma 30:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 30[/font_size][/center]

[i]Korihor, Christ-otsiafo no, si Christ, Werdambɔ no, na nkɔnhyɛ sunsum no atwetwe—Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ dɛ Nyame, nyimpa asehwe, bɔn ho akatua na Christ biara nnyi hɔ—Alma gye dase dɛ Christ bɛba na ndzɛmba nyina kyerɛ dɛ Nyame wɔ hɔ—Korihor bisa asɛnkyerɛdze na otwa hwe famu na ɔtɔ mmum—Abɔnsam yi noho kyerɛ Korihor dɛ ɔbɔfo na ɔkyerɛ no dza ɔnkã—Wotsiatsia Korihor do na owu. Bɛyɛ mfe 76–74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Ammon no dɔm no tsimii wɔ Jershon asaase do no, nyew, na wɔpaam Lamanfo so fii asaase no do, ma dɔm a wɔwɔ asaase do no siee hɔn efun no—

2 Afei woenntum annkan hɔn ewufo no osiandɛ wɔdɔɔ sõ dodow; nna woenntum annkan Nephifo so hɔn ewufo—mbom ɔbaa dɛ ber a wosiee hɔn efun no, na wɔdze hɔn akɔnkye na sũ nye mpaabɔ baa ewiei no (na iyi sii wɔ afe duesia no mu wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo a wɔhwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no hɔn afe a otsĩa duesia no mu) asomdwee hyɛɛ ase toatoaa do baa asaase nyina do kyɛree.

3 Nyew, na dɔm no bɔɔ mbɔdzen dzii Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm do; na wodzii Nyankopɔn n’ayɛdze do pɛpɛɛpɛr dɛ mbrɛ Moses mbra no tse; osiandɛ wɔkyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ wondzi Moses mbra do nkesi dɛ ɔbɛhyɛ mã.

4 Na dɛm maa basabasayɛ biara ennsi dɔm no mu wɔ afe duesia no nyina mu wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn afe a otsĩa duesuon no mu no nna asomdwee da ho wɔ hɔ.

6 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ ɔdze rokɔ afe duesuon n’ewiei no, ɔbarimba bi baa Zarahemla asaase do hɔ a nna ɔyɛ Christ-otsiafo, na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekã nsɛm a otsia nkɔnhyɛ a nkɔnhyɛfo no akã a ɔfa Christ ne mbaa ho kyerɛ dɔm no.

7 Afei mbra biara nnyi hɔ a otsia nyimpa ne gyedzi; osiandɛ otsia Nyankopɔn ne mbra dzendzenndzen dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ma mbra bi a ɔdze sorbi bɛba abɛda nyimpa mu.

8 Osiandɛ kyerɛwsɛm kã dɛ: Hom nsan mu nyi ndɛ da yi, nyia hom bɔsom no.

9 Afei sɛ nyimpa bi pɛ dɛ ɔsom Nyankopɔn a, ɔwɔ ho kwan dɛ ɔyɛ; anaadɛ sɛ ɔwɔ gyedzi wɔ Nyame mu a ɔwɔ ho kwan dɛ ɔsom no; na mbom sɛ ɔmmpɛ dɛ onya gyedzi wɔ no mu a mbra biara nnyi hɔ dɛ wɔtwe n’aso.

10 Mbom sɛ odzi ewu a wɔtwe n’aso dze ku no bi; na sɛ otwa edwoo so a wɔtwe n’aso no; na sɛ owia adze so a wɔtwe n’aso; na sɛ ɔto awar so a wɔtwe n’aso; nyew, na dɛm emumuyɛdze yi nyina wɔtwe hɔn aso wɔ ho.

11 Na mbra wɔ hɔ dɛ wɔtwe nyimpa aso wɔ hɔn bɔn a wɔyɛɛ no ho. Naaso, mbra biara nnyi hɔ a otsia nyimpa ne gyedzi; dɛm ntsi, nyimpa yɛ bɔn nko a nna wɔtwe n’aso wɔ dza ɔayɛ no ho; dɛm ntsi nyimpa nyina gyina gyinabew kor do.

12 Na dɛm Christ-otsiafo yi, ne dzin dze Korihor, (na mbra nntum nnkyer no) ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ nkorɔfo no dɛ Christ biara nnyi hɔ. Na nna ɔkyerɛ dɛ:

13 O hom a wɔakyekyer hom ahyɛ nkwasea enyidado hun ase, ebɛnadze ntsi na hom dze nkwaseasɛm a ɔtse dɛm kyekyer homho? Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom hwɛ Christ bi kwan? Na obiara runntum nnhu dza ɔreba.

14 Hwɛ, dza hom frɛ no nkɔnhyɛ nyinara a hom se nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn na wɔakã ato hɔ no, hwɛ, ne nyinara yɛ hom egyanom hɔn nkwasea amambra.

15 Hom yɛ dɛn hu dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar? Hwɛ, hom runntum nnhu ndzɛmba a hom nnyim ho hwee; dɛm ntsi hom runntum nnhu dɛ Christ bi bɛba.

16 Hom hwɛ kwan kã dɛ hom hu hom bɔnfakyɛ. Mbom hwɛ, iyi yɛ abɔdamdwen; na hom adwen a wɔayɛ basabasa yi fi hom egyanom hɔn amambra no a ogya hom ma hom nya gyedzi wɔ ndzɛmba a onnyi hɔ no mu.

17 Na nsɛm a ɔtsetse dɛm pii na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn, ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ werdambɔ biara nnyi hɔ a obotum dze adasamba hɔn bɔn akyɛ hɔn, na dɛ nyimpa biara dza ɔba no do no fi nankasa n’abrabɔ; dɛm ntsi sɛ nyimpa biara bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm a nna ofi nankasa ne nyansaa, na dɛ nyimpa biara no konyimdzi gyina n’ahoɔdzen do; na biribiara a nyimpa bɛyɛ no nnyɛ bɔn.

18 Na dɛm na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn, dze twee dodowara hɔn akoma, ma hɔn tsir mu yɛɛ dzen dze yɛɛ emumuyɛdze, nyew, ɔtwee mbaa pii, nye mbarimba so pii ma wɔbɔɔ ndwamanbra—na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ sɛ nyimpa wu a nna oewu.

19 Afei dɛm ɔbarimba yi kɔr Jershon asaase so do dɛ ɔrekɛkã dɛm nsɛm yi wɔ Ammon no dɔm no mu, hɔn a nkyɛ wɔyɛ Lamanfo no.

20 Mbom hwɛ, wɔyɛ enyansafo koraa kyɛn Nephifo no hɔn mu dodowara; na wosuoo no mu na wɔkyekyeer no, na wɔsoaa no kɔr Ammon a ɔyɛ ɔsɔfopanyin wɔ dɔm no do no enyim.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔmaa woyii no edzi fii asaase no do. Na ɔbaa Gideon asaase do, na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekasa kyerɛ hɔn so; na ennsi no yie amma no koraa wɔ ha, osiandɛ wɔfaa no na wɔkyekyeer no na wɔsoaa no dze no kɔr ɔsɔfopanyin no, nye ɔtsɛmbuafopanyin no so a ɔhwɛ asaase no do no enyim.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔsɔfopanyin no see no dɛ: Ebɛnadze ntsi na irikyima kontom Ewuradze n’akwan yi? Edɛnadze ntsi na ekã kyerɛ nkorɔfo yi dɛ Christ biara remmba, dze resɛɛ hɔn adwen yi? Ebɛnadze ntsi na ekasa tsia nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn hɔn nkɔnhyɛ nyinara yi?

23 Afei ɔsɔfopanyin no ne dzin dze Giddonah. Na Korihor see no dɛ: Osiandɛ mennkyerɛkyerɛ hom egyanom hɔn nkwasea amambra no, na osiandɛ mennkyerɛkyerɛ nkorɔfo yi ma wɔmmfa nkwasea ayɛdze nye nyɛe a tsetseberdo asɔfo hyɛɛ too hɔ, ama woedzi hɔn do dze enya tum na tumdzi wɔ hɔn do ma wɔayɛ atɔbɔ, amma wɔamma hɔn tsir do, na mbom wɔdze hɔn nsɛm abrɛ hɔn adze.

24 Hom kã dɛ nkorɔfo yi yɛ fahodzifo. Hwɛ, mekã dɛ wɔwɔ nkowaasom mu. Hom kã dɛ dɛm tsetse nkɔnhyɛ yinom yɛ nokwar. Hwɛ, mekã dɛ hom nnyim dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar no.

25 Hom kã dɛ nkorɔfo yi yɛ afɔdzifo a wɔahwe ase osian ɔwofo ne mbrato ntsi. Hwɛ, mekã dɛ ɔba nndzi fɔ osian n’awofo ho ntsi.

26 Na hom kã so dɛ Christ bɛba. Mbom hwɛ, mekã dɛ hom nnyim dɛ Christ bi bɛba. Na hom kã so dɛ woboku no dze ama wiadze bɔn.

27 Na dɛm na hom dze twe dɔm yi ma wɔtaa hom egyanom nkwasea amambra nye homankasa hom pɛ ekyir; na hom kã hɔn hyɛ nsuadze tse dɛ mbrɛ wɔhyɛ nkowaasom mu mpo, ama hom dze hom yafun aato hɔn nsaanodwuma do, amma woenntum ammfa akokodur amma hɔn mu do, ammfa anngye hɔn kyɛfa nye hɔn ndzinoa.

28 Nyew, na wonntum mmfa dza ɔyɛ hɔn dze nnyɛ hɔnho osiandɛ wosuro dɛ annhwɛ a wɔbɔfom hɔn asɔfoe no a wɔhyɛ hɔn kɔndua dɛ mbrɛ wɔpɛ, na wɔayɛ hɔn araa ma woenya gyedzi wɔ hɔn amambra, nye hɔn adaaso nye hɔn adwen hun na enyido-adzehu nye hɔn ndaadaa esumadze mu, dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ wɔyɛ, na sɛ wɔannyɛ dza wɔase hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ no a, wɔbɔfom nyimpa bi a wonnyim no a wɔse dɛ ɔyɛ Nyame—nyimpa bi a obiara nnyim no na wonnhu no da, obi a onnyi hɔ da anaadɛ ɔremmba da.

29 Afei ber a ɔsɔfopanyin no nye ɔtsɛmbuafopanyin no hun mbrɛ n’akoma esi epirim no, nyew, ber a wohun dɛ ɔbɛkã nsɛmbɔn etsia Nyankopɔn mpo no, woemmbua ne nsɛm a ɔkãa no mu biara; mbom wɔmaa wɔkyekyeer no; na wɔdze no hyɛɛ nsordaafo mpanyimfo nsa ma wɔdze no kɔr Zarahemla asaase do dze no kɔr Alma nye ɔtsɛmbuafopanyin a ɔyɛ ambrado wɔ asaase nyinara do no enyim.

30 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔnye no baa Alma na ɔtsɛmbuafopanyin no enyim no, ɔkɔr do yɛɛ dza ɔyɛɛ wɔ Gideon asaase do no ara wɔ hɔ so; nyew, ɔkɔr do kãa kasabɔn.

31 Na ɔsoɛree kãa ano bɔɔdosɛm akɛse wɔ Alma n’enyim, na ɔkasaa bɔn dze tsiaa asɔfo nye akyerɛkyerɛfo, dɛ hɔn na wɔatwe dɔm no dze hɔn akɛhɛn hɔn egyanom amambra gyangyan mu, ama woeenya kwan dze hɔn yafun ato dɔm no do.

32 Afei Alma see no dɛ: Iyim dɛ yɛmmfa hɛn yafun nnto dɔm yi do; na hwɛ medze mankasa me nsa ayɛ edwuma ahwɛ moho fitsi ber a atsɛmbuafo hyɛɛ ase dɛ woridzi adze yi dze besi sesei, na ammfa moho mpo koraa dɛ mutu akwan pii kyin bɔ asaase do aprɔw kã Nyame n’asɛm dze kyerɛ mo nkorɔfo yi.

33 Na ammfa moho koraa dɛ mayɛ edwuma pii wɔ asɔr yi mu, Menngyee sika senine mpo da wɔ m’edwumayɛ ho; nna m’enuanom yi mu biara so nngyee hwee da, gyedɛ atsɛmbua egua no do nko; na ɔno so mpo yɛgye wɔ hɛn mber dodow a yɛdze dzi asɛm ho dɛ mbrɛ mbra se.

34 Na afei, sɛ yɛnngye biribiara wɔ hɛn edwuma a yɛyɛ wɔ asɔr no mu ho a, nna ebɛn mfaso na yenya wɔ asɔr no mu, ana nnyɛ nokwar no a yɛreda no edzi no nko, ama yeedzi dɛw wɔ hɛn nuanom hɔn enyigye ho?

35 Afei sɛ ɔtse dɛm a nna ebɛnadze ntsi na ese yɛkã nsɛmpa no kyerɛ nkorɔfo yi dze nya mfaso, wɔ aber a w’ankasa nyim dɛ yennya mfaso biara yi? Na afei egye dzi dɛ sɛ nsɛmpa yi ma nkorɔfo yi nya enyigye a ɔtse dɛm wɔ hɔn akoma mu a, nna yɛredaadaa hɔn a?

36 Na Korihor buaa no dɛ, Nyew.

37 Na Alma see no dɛ: Ana egye dzi dɛ Nyame bi wɔ hɔ?

38 Na obuaa dɛ, Oho.

39 Afei Alma see no dɛ: Ana ebɛgye kyim bio dɛ Nyame bi nnyi hɔ, na agye kyim so wɔ Christ ho? Na hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, minyim dɛ Nyame wɔ hɔ, na dɛ Christ so bɛba.

40 Na afei ana ewɔ dasegye bi gye dze kyerɛ dɛ Nyame bi nnyi hɔ, anaadɛ Christ bi remmba? Mese wo dɛ innyi bi, gyedɛ wo nsɛm ara.

41 Mbom, hwɛ, mowɔ ndzɛmba pii a ɔyɛ dasegye dɛ ndzɛmba yi yɛ nokwar; na wo so wɔ ndzɛmba pii a ɔyɛ dasegye dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar; ana ebɛgye ho kyim? Ana egye dzi dɛ ndzɛmba yinom nyina yɛ nokwar?

42 Hwɛ, minyim dɛ egye dzi, na mbom ndaadaa sunsum bi na ɔafa wo, ma eyi Nyame no Sunsum no tokyen ma onnyi tsenabew bi wɔ wo mu; mbom abɔnsam na ɔwɔ tum wɔ wo do, na ɔnye wo rikyin ridzi dwuma bɔn bi ama oeenya kwan asɛɛ Nyame ne mba.

43 Na afei Korihor see Alma dɛ: Sɛ ibeyi asɛnkyerɛdze bi akyerɛ me ma magye edzi dɛ Nyame bi wɔ hɔ, nyew, akyerɛ me dɛ ɔwɔ tum a ɔno na ɔbɛma magye edzi dɛ wo nsɛm yɛ nokwar.

44 Mbom Alma see no dɛ: Ehu nsɛnkyerɛdze ara yie; Ana ebɔsɔ wo Nyame ahwɛ? Ana ebɛse dɛ, Kyerɛ me asɛnkyerɛdze, wɔ ber a atse w’enuanom yinom nyina nye nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn nyina so hɔn dasegye yi? Kyerɛwsɛm nyina dzi w’enyim adagyaw, nyew, na ndzɛmba nyina so kyerɛ dɛ Nyame wɔ hɔ; nyew, asaase mpo, nye ndzɛmba nyina a ɔwɔ do, nyew, noho a okyin, nyew, sor abɔdze so a wɔwɔ sor a wokyin hɔnho gye dase dɛ Bɔadze Kokroko bi wɔ hɔ.

45 Naaso erokɔ aprɔw, gye dase kyerɛ dɔm yi dɛ Nyame bi nnyi hɔ, dze twe hɔn akoma ekyir? Ana ibotum agye kyim wɔ dɛm dasegye yi nyina ho? Na ɔsee dɛ: Nyew, mebɛgye kyim, gyedɛ iyi asɛnkyerɛdze bi kyerɛ me.

46 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Alma see no dɛ: Hwɛ midzi yaw osian w’akoma a epirim ntsi, nyew, dɛ eda ho ropow nokwar sunsum, ma wo kra akɔ ɔsɛɛ mu.

47 Mbom hwɛ, oye koraa dɛ wo kra bɛyew sen dɛ akra pii bodua w’akohwi nye wo ndaadaa do akɔ ɔsɛɛ mu; dɛm ntsi sɛ egye kyim bio a, hwɛ Nyankopɔn bɔhwe wo, ma aatɔ mmum, amma enntum emmbue w’ano bio ammfa anndaadaa dɔm yi bio.

48 Afei Korihor see no dɛ: Menngye kyim dɛ Nyame bi wɔ hɔ, na mbom menngye nndzi dɛ Nyame bi wɔ hɔ; na mekã so dɛ, nnyim dɛ Nyame bi wɔ hɔ; na gyedɛ iyi asɛnkyerɛdze bi dze kyerɛ me, annyɛ dɛm a merenngye nndzi.

49 Afei Alma see no dɛ: Asɛnkyerɛdze yi na medze bɛma wo, ɔno nye dɛ ebɔtɔ mmum, dɛ mbrɛ me nsɛm se; na mekã wɔ Nyame ne dzin mu dɛ tɔ mmum, amma enntum annkasa bio.

50 Afei ber a Alma kãa dɛm nsɛm yi no, Korihor tɔɔ mmum, ma oenntum annkasa, dɛ mbrɛ Alma ne nsɛm se no.

51 Na afei ber a ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no hun iyi no, ɔtseen ne nsa na ɔkyerɛwee dze kyerɛɛ Korihor dɛ: Ana agye edzi dɛ Nyame wɔ tum? Woana do na epɛ dɛ Alma dua dze yi n’asɛnkyerɛdze? Ana epɛ dɛ ɔtseetsee binom dze yɛ asɛnkyerɛdze kyerɛ wo? Hwɛ, oeyi asɛnkyerɛdze akyerɛ wo; na afei ebɛgye kyim bio anaa?

52 Na Korihor tseen ne nsa na ɔkyerɛɛw, dɛ: Minyim dɛ matɔ mmum, osiandɛ munntum mennkasa; na minyim dɛ biribiara nnyi hɔ a obotum dze dɛm adze yi aba mo do, gyedɛ Nyame no tum; nyew, na minyim dada so dɛ Nyame wɔ hɔ.

53 Mbom hwɛ, abɔnsam adaadaa me; osiandɛ oyii noho kyerɛɛ me dɛ ɔbɔfo, na ɔsee me dɛ: Kɔ na kɛgye dɔm yi, osiandɛ hɔn nyina ayew, na woekedzi Nyame bi a wonnyim no ekyir. Na ɔsee me dɛ: Nyame biara nnyi hɔ; nyew, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ me dza menkã. Na makyerɛkyerɛ ne nsɛm no; na osiandɛ me honam su adwen enyigye ho ntsi medze kyerɛkyerɛe; na medze kyerɛkyerɛe araa kesii dɛ midzii konyim mpo, na iyi maa megyee dzii dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar; na iyi ntsi na ɔmaa mitsiaa nokwar no araa kesii dɛ medze ndom kɛse yi aba mo do.

54 Afei ber a ɔkãa dɛm wiei no, ɔpaa Alma kyɛw dɛ ɔmbɔ mpaa mma Nyankopɔn ma onyi ndom no mfi no do.

55 Mbom Alma see no dɛ: Sɛ woyi ndom yi fi wo do a ebɔtwe dɔm yi hɔn akoma asan ekyir bio; dɛm ntsi, ɔbɛyɛ hɔ ama wo dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze pɛ.

56 Na ɔbaa dɛ ndom no emmfi Korihor do; mbom woyii no tokyen, na okyinkyiin efiefi serɛserɛɛ edziban.

57 Afei adze a oesi Korihor no do no tahyee asaase nyina do ntsɛmara; nyew, ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no maa wɔbɔɔ dawur kyerɛɛ dɔm nyinara a wɔwɔ asaase no do a wɔagye Korihor ne nsɛm no edzi no dɛ, wonnu hɔnho ntsɛntsɛm amma dɛm atsɛmbu no ammba hɔn so hɔn do.

58 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn nyinara gyee dzii dɛ Korihor yɛ omumuyɛnyi; dɛm ntsi hɔn nyinara sakyeer bio baa Ewuradze hɔ; na iyi dze Korihor n’emumuyɛ no baa ewiei. Na Korihor kyinkyiin efiefi serɛserɛɛ edziban dzii.

59 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔnenam dɔm no mu no, nyew, dɔm a wɔatsew hɔnho efi Nephifo ho na wɔfrɛ hɔnho Zoramfo a, na hɔn banodzifo nye bi a wɔfrɛ no Zoram—na ber a ɔnenam hɔn mu no, hwɛ wotwui faa no do na wotsiatsiaa no do kesii dɛ owui.

60 Na dɛm ntsi yehu nyia ɔkontom Ewuradze n’akwan mu no mbrɛ n’ewiei tse; na dɛm ma yehu so dɛ abɔnsam renngye ne mba abamba wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu, na mbom ɔtwe hɔn ntsɛntsɛm dze hɔn kɔ hɛl.
alma 31:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 31[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma dzi asɛmpasomafo binom enyim ma wɔkɛgye Zoramfo a wɔahwe ase wɔ gyedzi mu no—Zoramfo pow Christ, wɔgye adzehun dzi, na wogyina mpaabɔ bi a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ do som—Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn hyɛ asɛmpasomafo mã—Enyigye a wɔwɔ no Christ mu men hɔn amandzehu. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei ɔbaa dɛ Korihor wui ekyir no, Alma tsee dɛ Zoramfo no rokontom Ewuradze n’akwan, na dɛ Zoram a ɔyɛ hɔn kandzifo no atwe dɔm no hɔn akoma ma wɔrobɔ hɔn mu adze ma honyi mmum no, n’akoma hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔreyar osian nkorɔfo no hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi.

2 Na Alma dzii awerɛhow kɛsenara ber a ɔtsee emumuyɛ a nkorɔfo no reyɛ no; dɛm ntsi, yaw kɛse kãa no osian Zoramfo hɔnho a wɔatsew efi Nephifo ho ntsi.

3 Afei nna Zoramfo no aboa hɔn ano wɔ asaase bi a wɔfrɛ no Antionum a ɔda Zarahemla asaase no boka afamu a ɔda mpoano dze kɔ Jershon asaase n’anaafo afamu, bea a ɔda sar n’anaafo a Lamanfo no ahyɛ do mã no.

4 Afei Nephifo no suroo pii dɛ bɛyɛ na Zoramfo no nye Lamanfo no akɛyɛ kor ma Nephifo no nam do ayew hɔn dɔm no mu pii.

5 Na afei, sɛ wɔkã asɛm no a onya tum kɛse bi wɔ nkorɔfo no do ma ogya hɔn ma wɔyɛ dza ɔtsen—nyew, onya tum kɛse wɔ dɔm no hɔn adwen do sen nkrantsee, anaa adze biara a oesi hɔn do pɛn—dɛm ntsi Alma hun dɛ obeye dɛ wɔdze Nyame n’asɛm no nokwar no bedzi dwuma ahwɛ.

6 Dɛm ntsi ɔfaa Ammon, nye Aaron, nye Omner; na ogyaa Himni wɔ Zarahemla asɔr no mu; na mbom ɔfaa baasa no woedzi kan afa hɔn akã noho, na ɔfaa Amulek nye Zeezrom so a wɔwɔ Melek, na ɔfaa ne mbabanyin beenu no so.

7 Afei ne mbabanyin hɔn mu panyin a ɔwɔ mu no dze ɔammfa no annka noho, na ne dzin dze Helaman; na mbom hɔn a ɔfaa hɔn kãa noho no hɔn edzin dze Shiblom, nye Corianton; na dɛm nkorɔfo yinom na wɔnye no kɔr Zoramfo no hɔn mu dɛ wɔrekɛkã asɛm no akyerɛ hɔn.

8 Afei dɛm Zoramfo yi yɛ etuatsewfo fi Nephifo a wɔtseew etua fii Nephifo mu; dɛm ntsi wɔakã Nyame n’asɛm no akyerɛ hɔn da.

9 Mbom wɔahwe ase wɔ mfom akɛse mu, na dɛm ama wonndzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm nye ne nhyehyɛɛ do dɛ mbrɛ Moses mbra no se.

10 Nna wonndzi asɔr no no dwumadzi biara do, dɛ wɔbɔkɔ do abɔ mpaa na woesũ afrɛ Nyankopɔn daadaa, amma wɔannkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu.

11 Nyew, ne sin ara nye dɛ, wɔakontom Ewuradze n’akwan wɔ akwan pii mu; na iyi ntsi, na Alma nye n’enuanom no kɔr asaase no do dɛ wɔrekɛkã asɛm no akyerɛ hɔn.

12 Afei, ber a wɔbaa asaase no do no, hwɛ, hɔnho boow hɔn ber a wohun dɛ Zoramfo no esisi nhyiamudan, na wɔboa hɔn ano wɔ hɔ da kor wɔ dapɛn mu, wɔmmfrɛ dɛm da no Ewuradze ne da; na wɔsɔr wɔ kwan bi do a Alma na n’enuanom no nnhun bi da;

13 Na woesi biribi wɔ hɔn nhyiamudan ne finimfin, na hɔ nye bea a wogyina, na hɔ krɔn bɔ nyimpa ne tsentsen do, na nyimpa kor pɛr na otum gyina hɔ.

14 Dɛm ntsi, obiara a ɔpɛ dɛ ɔkɔsɔr no ɔwɔ dɛ okegyina sor hɔ, na ɔma ne nsa do wɔ sor, na ɔdze ndze kɛse tsea mu dɛ:

15 Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn Nyame; yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔwo nye Nyankopɔn, na yɛgye dzi dɛ eyɛ krɔnkrɔn, na dɛ nna eyɛ sunsum, na eda ho yɛ sunsum, na eyɛ afebɔɔ.

16 Krɔnkrɔn Nyame, yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔwo na apaa hɛn efi hɛn enuanom ho; na yɛnngye hɛn enuanom hɔn amambra no nndzi, dza hɔn egyanom nam hɔn mbofradwen do ahyehyɛ ato hɔ ama hɔn no; mbom yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔwo na asan mu eyi hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ wo mba krɔnkrɔn; na ama yehu so dɛ Christ biara remmba.

17 Na mbom ɔwo, dɛ mbrɛ etse dɛm ndeda, ndɛ na afebɔɔ; na asan mu hɛn ama wɔabɛgye hɛn nkwa, ber a hɔn a wɔabɔ hɛnho aprɔw nyinara asan mu eyi hɔn dɛ wɔnam w’ebufuhyew do wɔbotoow hɔn egu hɛl; na O, Nyankopɔn, yɛda wo ase wɔ dɛm krɔnkrɔnyɛ yi ho; na yɛda wo ase so dɛ eyi hɛn esi hɔ amma yenndzi hɛn nuanom no hɔn nkwasea amambra no ekyir, dza ama wɔakyekyer hɔn afam Christ gyedzi ho no, dza wɔnam do ama hɔn akoma efi ɔwo hɛn Nyankopɔn wo nkyɛn koraa no.

18 Na bio, yɛda wo ase, O Nyankopɔn, dɛ yɛyɛ dɔm a wɔasan mu eyi hɛn na yɛyɛ nkorɔfo a hɛnho tsew. Amen.

19 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Alma na n’enuanom nye ne mba no tsee dɛm mpaabɔ yi no, hɔnho boow hɔn kɛse.

20 Na hwɛ, obiara kɔree kɔbɔɔ dɛm mpaa kor no ara.

21 Na afei wɔfrɛ dɛm bea no Rameumptom, ne nkyerɛase nye dɛ, krɔnkrɔn gyinabea.

22 Afei, dɛm bea yi do na obiara kɔ kegyina bɔ dɛm mpaa kor yi ara dze ma Nyankopɔn, dze da hɔn Nyankopɔn ase dɛ ɔasan mu eyi hɔn, na dɛ oenngyaa hɔn mma woenndzi hɔn enuanom hɔn amambra ekyir, na dɛ wɔanntwe hɔn akoma mma wɔanngye ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba a wonnyim ho hwee no enndzi.

23 Afei, ber a dɔm no nyinara daa ase wɔ dɛm kwan yi do wiee no, wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɔr hɔn efiefi, na wɔannkã hwee wɔ hɔn Nyame ho bio kesii dɛ wɔboaa hɔn ano bio wɔ dɛm krɔnkrɔn gyinabea hɔ dze ndaase mae dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛ no.

24 Afei ber a Alma hun iyi no n’akoma dzii yaw; osiandɛ ohun dɛ wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ emumuyɛfo na wɔaman efi nokwar no ho; nyew ohun dɛ hɔn akoma taa sika nye dwetɛ, nye afɛɛfɛdze ahorow pii ekyir.

25 Nyew na ohunii so dɛ ntuw kɛse nye ahantanyɛ ahyɛ hɔn akoma mã.

26 Na ɔmaa ne ndze do wɔ sor, na ɔtsẽaa mu dɛ: O, onkodu dabɛn, O Ewuradze, nna ebɛma wo nkowaa atsena ase ha wɔ honam mu, dze ahwɛ dɛm emumuyɛdze kɛse yi wɔ adasamba mu?

27 Hwɛ, O Nyankopɔn, worusũ frɛ wo, naaso ahantanyɛ amen hɔn akoma. Hwɛ, O Nyankopɔn, wɔdze hɔn ano rusũ frɛ wo, wɔ ber a wɔdze wiadze mu egyangyandze hyehyɛ hɔnho gɔsɔɔ dze mema hɔnho do.

28 Hwɛ, O me Nyankopɔn hɔn ntar abodzen, na hɔn mpɛtsea, na hɔn nsakɔnadze, na hɔn sika egudze nye ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo mapa na wɔdze siesie hɔnho; na hwɛ, hɔn akoma da ho, naaso wosũ frɛ wo na wɔkã dɛ—Yɛda wo ase, O Nyankopɔn, osiandɛ yɛyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔasan mu eyi hɛn ama wo, wɔ aber a binom bɛhera.

29 Nyew, na wɔse dɛ ɔwo ama woehu dɛ Christ biara remmba.

30 O Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, onkodu dabɛn nna ebɛma kwan ma dɛm emumuyɛdze nye ndzebɔn a ɔtse dɛm atsena nkorɔfo yi mu? O Ewuradze ana ebɛma me ahoɔdzen ma metum dze asɔw me mberɛwyɛ. Osiandɛ meyɛ mberɛw, na emumuyɛdze a ɔtse dɛm a ɔwɔ dɔm yi mu yi ma me kra dzi yaw.

31 O Ewuradze, m’akoma ridzi awerɛhow kɛse; ana ebɛma me kra enya awerɛkyekyer wɔ Christ mu. O Ewuradze, ana ebɛma menya ahoɔdzen, ama menya abotar dze asɔw amandzehu a ɔbɛba mo do osian nkorɔfo yi hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi.

32 O Ewuradze, ana ebɛma me kra enya awerɛkyekyer, na ama menye m’enuanom edwumayɛfo yinom so a wɔkã moho yi konyimdzi—nyew, Ammon, nye Aaron, nna Omner, nye Amulek na Zeezrom nye me mbabanyin beenu yi so—nyew, ana ebɛkyekye woyinom nyina so hɔn werɛ, O Ewuradze. Nyew, ana ebɛma hɔn akra enya awerɛkyekyer wɔ Christ mu.

33 Ana ebɛma woenya ahoɔdzen, ama woeetum asɔw hɔn amandzehu a ɔbɛba hɔn do osian dɛm nkorɔfo yi hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi.

34 O Ewuradze, ana ebɛma hɛn konyimdzi ma yɛatwe hɔn bio ama wo wɔ Christ mu.

35 Hwɛ, O Ewuradze, hɔn akra som bo, na hɔn mu dodowara yɛ hɛn enuanom; dɛm ntsi, ma hɛn tum nye nyansa, O Ewuradze ma yentum ntwe hɛn enuanom yinom bio mma wo.

36 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Alma kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔbɔɔ ne nsamu guu hɔn a wɔnye no wɔ hɔ no nyinara do. Na hwɛ, ber a ɔbɔɔ ne nsamu guu hɔn do no, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛhyɛɛ hɔn mã.

37 Na ɔno ekyir wodzii mpaapaamu, na obiara kɔr no kwan wɔanndwen hɔnankasa hɔn yieyɛ ho wɔ dza wobedzi anaa dza wɔbɔnom, anaa dza wobɛhyɛ ho.

38 Na Ewuradze hwɛɛ hɔn do ma ɔkɔm anndze hɔn, eso nsukɔm anndze hɔn; nyew, na ɔmaa hɔn ahoɔdzen so, mma wɔannsɔw amandzehu biara, gyedɛ wɔmen no wɔ Christ enyigye mu. Afei iyinom sii osian Alma ne mpaabɔ a ɔbɔe wɔ gyedzi mu ntsi.
alma 32:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 32[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma kyerɛkyerɛ abɔbɔfo no a hɔn amandzehu abrɛ hɔn adze no—Gyedzi nye enyidado wɔ adze a enyi nntua ho na eso ɔyɛ nokwar—Alma gye dase dɛ abɔfo som mbanyin, mbaa na mbofra—Alma dze asɛm no too aba ho—Ɔwɔ dɛ wodua na wogugu do nsu na wosiesie ho—Nna onyin yɛ dua na no do na wɔtsew onnyiewiei nkwa eduaba fi. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔkɔree kɛhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrekã Nyame n’asɛm no kyerɛ nkorɔfo no, wɔhɛnhɛɛn hɔn nhyiamudan mu nye hɔn efiefi; nyew, na wɔkãa asɛm no wɔ hɔn abɔntsen so do mpo.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔyɛɛ edwuma ara yie wɔ hɔn mu, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ woridzi konyim wɔ abɔbɔfo no mu; na hwɛ, woeyi hɔn edzi efi nhyiamudan mu osian hɔn ntar basabasa no ntsi—

3 Dɛm ntsi wɔamma hɔn kwan mma wɔannhɛn hɔn nhyiamudan mu annkɔsom Nyame, wobuu hɔn dɛ ɔyɛ efĩfĩdze; dɛm kyerɛ dɛ wɔyɛ ehiafo; nyew, hɔn enuanom no buu hɔn dɛ wɔyɛ nwura; dɛm ntsi wɔyɛ ehiafo wɔ wiadze ndzɛmba afamu; na wɔyɛ abɔbɔfo so wɔ akoma mu.

4 Afei, ber a Alma rekyerɛkyerɛ na ɔrekasa kyerɛ nkorɔfo no wɔ koko Onidah do no, dɔmtutuw bi baa ne nkyɛn, hɔn a yɛakã hɔnho asɛm dɛ wɔyɛ abɔbɔfo wɔ akoma mu osian hɔn hia wɔ wiadze ndzɛmba mu ntsi no.

5 Na wɔbaa Alma nkyɛn; na hɔn kandzifo no see no dɛ: Hwɛ, ebɛnadze na mo nuanom yinom nyɛ, osian hɔn hia ntsi nkorɔfo eyi hɔn tokyen, nyew, hɛn asɔfo no mpo tsitsir; na wɔapam hɛn efi hɛn nhyiamudan a yɛabrɛ dze hɛn nsa esi no mu; na osian hɛn hia dodow ntsi wɔapam hɛn; na yennyi beebi a yɛbɔsɔr hɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ; na hwɛ, ebɛnadze na yɛnyɛ?

6 Na afei ber a Alma tsee dɛm no, ɔdaan noho ntsɛmara dze n’eyim kyerɛɛ hɔn, na ɔhwɛɛ hɔn enyigye mu ara; osiandɛ ohun dɛ hɔn amandzehu no abrɛ hɔn adze ampa na dɛ wɔayɛ krado dɛ wobetsie asɛm no.

7 Dɛm ntsi ɔannkã hwee bio annkyerɛ dɔm nkaa no; na mbom ɔtseen ne nsa na ɔfrɛɛ hɔn a oehu dɛ woenu hɔnho nokwar mu no, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ:

8 Muhu dɛ hom akoma ayɛ botoo; na sɛ dɛm a nna nhyira akã hom.

9 Hwɛ hom nua yi akã dɛ, Ebɛnadze na yɛnyɛ?—osiandɛ wɔapam hɛn efi hɛn nhyiamudan mu, ma yenntum nnsɔr hɛn Nyame.

10 Hwɛ mese hom dɛ, ana hom dwen dɛ hom runntum nnsɔr Nyankopɔn wɔ beebiara gyedɛ hom nhyiamudan mu nko?

11 Na afei so, mibisa hom dɛ, ana hom susu dɛ ɔnnsɛ dɛ hom sɔr Nyame da kor pɛr wɔ dapɛn no mu?

12 Mese hom dɛ, oye dɛ wɔapam hom efi hom nhyiamudan mu, ama hom aayɛ ahobrɛadze na hom esũa nyansa; osiandɛ ohia dɛ hom sũa nyansa; na osiandɛ hom yɛ ehiafo so dodow ntsi na hom nuanom ebu hom enyimtsia na woeyi hom tokyen, ama hom akoma aayɛ botoo; na hom ayɛ ahobrɛadze.

13 Na afei, osiandɛ wɔahyɛ hom ma hom abrɛ homho adze ntsi nhyira akã hom; osiandɛ odu aber bi na sɛ wɔhyɛ obi ma ɔbrɛ noho ase a, onyia no nya nnuho; na afei nokwar, obiara a onu noho no wobohu no mbɔbɔr; na nyia wobohu no mbɔbɔr na otsim kodu ewiei no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa.

14 Na afei, dɛ mbrɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ hom no, dɛ osiandɛ wɔahyɛ hom ma hom abrɛ homho adze ntsi nhyira akã hom, ana hom nndwen dɛ nhyira kɛse akã hɔn a wɔbrɛ hɔnho adze osian asɛm no ntsi?

15 Nyew, nyia ɔbrɛ noho adze nokwar mu, na onu noho wɔ no bɔn ho, na otsim kodu ewiei no, wobehyira no—nyew, wobehyira no asen hɔn a ɔnam osian hɔn hia dodow ntsi wɔahyɛ hɔn ma wɔabrɛ hɔnho adze no.

16 Dɛm ntsi, nhyira akã hɔn a wɔbrɛ hɔnho adze a nnyɛ dɛ wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ma wɔbrɛɛ hɔnho adze; anaa nhyira nye nyia ommpirim n’akoma, na ɔgye Nyankopɔn n’asɛm dzi, na woenuma no, nyew, na nnyɛ dɛ wɔyɛɛ no ma otsiee asɛm no, anaa wɔhyɛɛ no ma otsiei ansaana ɔregye edzi.

17 Nyew dodowara wɔ hɔ a wɔkã dɛ: Sɛ ema asɛnkyerɛdze bi fi sor ba a, na yɛbɛgye ato mu; nna yɛbɛgye edzi.

18 Afei mibisa dɛ, ana iyi yɛ gyedzi? Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, Oho; osiandɛ sɛ obi nyim biribi a onnhia dɛ ɔgye dzi, osiandɛ onyim.

19 Na afei, ebɛn ndom kyɛnee na ɔnnkɛba nyia onyim Nyankopɔn n’apɛdze na ɔnnyɛ no do, nnsen nyia ɔgye dzi ara, anaa ɔwɔ saintsir a ɔgye dzi na ɔtɔ mbrato mu no do?

20 Afei homankasa hom mbu dɛm adze yi ho atsɛn. Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ afã ha yi dɛmara so mpo na ɔtse wɔ afã no ho; na ɔbɛyɛ hɔ ama obiara dɛ mbrɛ no ndwuma tse.

21 Na afei dɛ mbrɛ mekãa wɔ gyedzi ho no—nnyɛ gyedzi nye dɛ ibenya nyimdzee a odzi mu wɔ ndzɛmba ho; dɛm ntsi sɛ hom wɔ gyedzi a nna hom wɔ enyidado wɔ ndzɛmba a enyi nntua ho na ho ɔyɛ nokwar ho.

22 Na afei, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ mepɛ dɛ hom kaa dɛ Nyankopɔn hu hɔn a wɔgye ne dzin dzi nyina mbɔbɔr; dɛm ntsi ahyɛse no ara na ɔpɛɛ dɛ hom nya gyedzi, nyew dɛ hom bɛgye n’asɛm no edzi mpo.

23 Na afei, ɔnam sor abɔfo do da n’asɛm edzi kyerɛ mbarimba, nyew, nnyɛ mbarimba nko na mbom mbaa so. Afei nnyɛ ne nyina nye yi; mbofra nkakraba so nya nsɛm mpɛn pii a ɔhyɛ enyansafo nye enyimdzefo fɛr.

24 Na afei, m’enuanom adɔfo, hom pɛ dɛ mekyerɛ hom dza hom nyɛ, osiandɛ wɔatseetsee hom na woeyi hom tokyen ntsi—na afei memmpɛ dɛ hom bɔdwen dɛ morohwehwɛ ebu hom atsɛn wɔ dza ɔyɛ nokwar nko ho—

25 Na mennkyerɛ dɛ hom nyina na wɔhyɛɛ hom ma hom brɛɛ homho adze; na megye dzi nokwar mu dɛ binom wɔ hom mu a wɔbɛbrɛ hɔnho adze wɔ gyinabew biara a wɔwɔ mu no mu.

26 Afei, dɛ mbrɛ mekãe a ɔfa gyedzi ho no—dɛ ɔnnyɛ nyimdzee a odzi mu bi no—dɛm na me nsɛm kyerɛ. Hom runntum nnhu no nokwar mapa no ahyɛse no ara nnwie, dɛ mbrɛ gyedzi yɛ dɛ nyimdzee mapã no.

27 Mbom hwɛ, sɛ hom bɔ soɛr na hom akekã homho na hom asɔ me nsɛm no ahwɛ mpo, na hom dze gyedzi kumaabi edzi dwuma a, nyew, sɛ hom benya pɛ bi dze agye edzi a, hom mma dɛm pɛ yi nyɛ edwuma wɔ hom mu nkesi mpo dɛ hom benya gyedzi wɔ kwan a ɔbɛma me nsɛm no kakra wɔaatsena hom mu.

28 Afei yɛdze asɛm no bɔto aba ho. Afei sɛ hom ma kwan ma wodua aba wɔ hom akoma mu a, hwɛ sɛ ɔyɛ aba a odzi mu, anaa aba pa a, na sɛ hom ammfa hom ekyingye ennyi no annkyen, na hom ennsiw Ewuradze no Sunsum no kwan a, hwɛ ɔbɛhyɛ ase ayeyer wɔ hom akoma mu; na sɛ hom tse dɛ ɔreyeyer a, hom bɛhyɛ ase akã wɔ homankasa hom mu dɛ—ɔyɛ dɛ dɛm aba yi yɛ aba pa, anaa asɛm yi ye, osiandɛ ɔahyɛ ase dɛ orinyin me kra; nyew ɔahyɛ ase dɛ orubuebue me ntseasee mu, nyew, ɔahyɛ ase dɛ ɔdze dɛw bi rehɛn me.

29 Afei hwɛ, ana iyi nnkɔto hom gyedzi mu? Mese hom dɛ Nyew, eso nna onnyinii mmbɛyɛɛ nyimdzee a odzi mu.

30 Mbom hwɛ, sɛ aba no yeyer, na opue sor na ɔhyɛ ase dɛ orinyin a, nna ebɛkã dɛ aba no ye; na hwɛ ɔayeyer na oepue sor na ɔahyɛ ase rinyin. Na afei, ana iyi nnkɛhyɛ hom gyedzi dzen? Nyew, ɔbɛhyɛ hom gyedzi dzen: osiandɛ hom bɛse dɛ minyim dɛ iyi yɛ aba pa; na hwɛ oepue na ɔahyɛ ase rinyin.

31 Na afei, hwɛ, ana hom gye to mu dɛ iyi yɛ aba pa? Mese hom dɛ, Nyew; osiandɛ aba biara sow nankasa ne saso.

32 Dɛm ntsi, sɛ aba nyin a nna oye, na mbom sɛ oennyin a, hwɛ nna omuo, dɛm ntsi wɔtow kyen.

33 Na afei, hwɛ, osiandɛ hom asɔ ahwɛ, na hom edua aba no, na ɔayeyer na oepue sor, na ɔahyɛ ase dɛ orinyin ntsi, ɔsɛ dɛ hom hu dɛ aba no ye.

34 Na afei, hwɛ, ana hom nyimdzee dzi mu? Nyew, hom nyimdzee dzi mu wɔ dɛm adze no ho, na hom gyedzi apa ada; osiandɛ hom nyim, na hom nyim dɛ asɛm no ama hom akra ayeyer, na hom nyim so dɛ oepue, ma ɔahyɛ ase retsew hom ntseasee mu, na hom adwen mu ahyɛ ase rubuebue.

35 O ana iyi nnyɛ nokwar? Mese hom dɛ Nyew, osiandɛ ɔyɛ kan; na adze biara a ɔyɛ kan no, oye, osiandɛ ɔda edzi pefee, dɛm ntsi ɔsɛ dɛ hom hu dɛ oye; na afei hwɛ, hom sɔɔ dɛm kan yi hwɛe ekyir yi, ana hom nyimdzee edzi mu?

36 Hwɛ mese hom dɛ, Oho; nna mma hom mmfa hom gyedzi nnto nkyɛn, osiandɛ afei na hom dze hom gyedzi edua aba ama hom aahwɛ eehu no dɛ ɔyɛ aba pa anaa.

37 Na hwɛ, ber a dua no ahyɛ ase dɛ orinyin no, hom bɛkã dɛ: Hom mma yengugu dua n’ase fa na yɛnhwɛ do yie, ama oenya ndwow, ama oenyin akɔ sor, na ɔasow eduaba ama hɛn. Na afei hwɛ, sɛ hom hwɛ do yie a obenya ndwow, na oenyin akɔ sor, na ɔasow eduaba.

38 Mbom sɛ hom bu hom enyi gu dua no do, na hom annhwɛ do yie a, hwɛ, orinnya ndwow biara; na sɛ ewia ne hyew kã no a, osiandɛ onnyi ndwow ntsi ɔkyenkyen, na hom tu na wɔtow kyen.

39 Afei, dɛm nnkyerɛ dɛ aba no muo, anaa ɔnnkyerɛ dɛ n’eduaba no nnyɛ dza wodzi; na mbom osiandɛ asaase no etwie na hom enngugu dua no ase fa ntsi hom rinnya eduaba wɔ do.

40 Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom annkora asɛm no do yie, na hom ammfa gyedzi enyiwa annhwɛ eduaba no kwan a, hom runntum nntsew eduaba mmfi nkwadua no do da.

41 Mbom sɛ hom kora asɛm no yie, nyew, sɛ hom hwɛ dua no do yie ma ɔhyɛ ase dɛ orinyin, na hom dze gyedzi kɛse a ɔyɛ dzen nye abotar hwɛ eduaba a ɔbɛba do no kwan a obenya ndwow; na hwɛ ɔbɛyɛ dua a obenyin dze akɔ daapem nkwa mu.

42 Na osian hom mbɔdzembɔ nye hom gyedzi nye hom abotar a hom dze rokora asɛm no do yie, ama oenya ndwow wɔ hom mu ntsi, hwɛ ndaamba hom bɛtsew eduaba efi do, dza ɔsom bo mapa na ɔyɛ dɛw kyɛn eduaba nyina na ɔhoa kyɛn adze biara a ɔhoa, nyew, na noho tsew kyɛn adze biara a noho tsew; na hom bedzi dɛm aba yi ara ekesi dɛ hom bɛmee mpo, amma ɔkɔm anaa nsukɔm anndze hom da.

43 Afei m’enuanom, hom bobu hom gyedzi nye hom mbɔdzembɔ, nye hom abotar, na penkyɛr ho ndɔbaa, dze atweɔn dua no ma oeyi n’eduaba ama hom.
alma 33:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 33[/font_size][/center]

[i]Zenos kyerɛkyerɛɛ dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ nyimpa bɔ mpaa na ɔsom wɔ mbea nyina do, na osian Ɔba no ntsi woeyi atsɛmbu efi hɔ—Zenock kyerɛkyerɛɛ dɛ osian Ɔba no ntsi, wɔdze ehumbɔbɔr ama—Moses ma Ɔba no ne ngyinahɔmadze do wɔ sar no do. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei Alma kãa dɛm nsɛm yi n’ekyir no, wɔsomaa ma wɔkɔr ne nkyɛn kɛsee no dɛ wɔpɛ dɛ wohu dɛ sɛ wɔngye Nyankopɔn kor pɛr ndzi ama hɔn nsa aakã dɛm eduaba yi a ɔakã ho asɛm yi, anaadɛ wonsi dɛn ndua aba no, anaa asɛm no a ɔakã ho asɛm no, dza ɔkãa dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ wodua wɔ hɔn akoma mu no; anaadɛ wonsi dɛn nhyɛ ase mfa hɔn gyedzi nyɛ edwuma.

2 Na Alma see hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, hom akã dɛ hom runntum nnsom hom Nyankopɔn osiandɛ wɔapam hom efi hom nhyiamudan mu. Na mbom hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, sɛ hom kã dɛ hom runntum nnsom Nyankopɔn a, nna hom fom kɛsenara, na ɔsɛ dɛ hom hwehwɛ kyerɛwsɛm no mu yie; sɛ hom dwen dɛ iyi na wɔdze kyerɛkyerɛɛ hom a, nna ɔno hom nntse ase.

3 Ana hom kaa dɛ hom akenkan dza Zenos, tsetse nkɔnhyɛnyi no kãe a ɔfa mpaabɔ anaa ɔsom ho no?

4 Na ɔkãa dɛ: Eyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo, O Nyankopɔn, osiandɛ ɔwo itsie me mpaabɔ, ber a mowɔ sar no do no mpo; nyew, ihun me mbɔbɔr ber a mobɔɔ mpaa wɔ hɔn a wɔyɛ m’atamfo ho no, ɔwo edan hɔn maa me.

5 Nyew, O Nyankopɔn, na ihun me mbɔbɔr ber a mosũi frɛɛ wo wɔ me kwã mu no; ber a mosũi frɛɛ wo wɔ me mpaabɔ mu no, na ɔwo itsiee me.

6 Na bio, O Nyankopɔn, ber a mesaan m’ekyir kɔr me fie no ɔwo itsiee me mpaabɔ.

7 Na ber a mesanee kɔr me pia mu no, O Ewuradze, na mobɔɔ mpaa maa wo no, ɔwo itsiee me.

8 Nyew, ɔwo ihu wo mba mbɔbɔr, sɛ wosũ frɛ wo a dɛ, ɔwo ibetsie hɔn na nnyɛ nyimpa bi a, ɔwo ibetsie hɔn.

9 Nyew, O Nyankopɔn, ɔwo ihun me mbɔbɔr, na itsiee mo sufrɛ wɔ mboanofo mu.

10 Nyew, na ɔwo so itsiee me ber a woyii me tokyen na m’atamfo buu me enyimtsia; nyew, itsiee mo sufrɛ, na wo bo fuuw m’atamfo, na ɔwo edze ebufuw sɛɛ hɔn ntsɛntsɛm.

11 Na ɔwo itsiee me osian m’amandzehu nye mo nokwardzi ntsi; na osian wo Ba no ntsi na ihun me mbɔbɔr dɛm, dɛm ntsi mobosũ afrɛ wo wɔ m’amandzehu nyina mu, na wo mu na m’enyigye wɔ; na ɔwo eyi w’atsɛmbu efi mo do osian wo Ba no ntsi.

12 Na afei Alma see hɔn dɛ: Ana hom gye kyerɛwsɛm no a tsetsemba kyerɛwee no dzi?

13 Hwɛ, sɛ hom gye dzi a, nna ɔsɛ dɛ hom gye dza Zenos kãe no dzi; na hwɛ, ɔsee dɛ: Ɔwo eyi w’atsɛmbu kɔ osian wo Ba no ntsi.

14 Afei hwɛ, m’enuanom, mepɛ dɛ mibisa hom dɛ hom akenkan kyerɛwsɛm no? Sɛ hom akenkan a, nna ɔyɛ dɛn na hom nngye Nyankopɔn ne Ba no nndzi?

15 Na wɔannkyerɛw dɛ Zenos nko na ɔkãa dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho nsɛm, na mbom Zenock so kãa dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho nsɛm—

16 Na hwɛ, ɔkãa dɛ: O Ewuradze, wo bo efuw nkorɔfo yi, osiandɛ wɔnntse w’ehumbɔbɔr a ɔwo osian wo Ba no ntsi edze ama hɔn no ase.

17 Na afei, mo nuanom, hom ehu dɛ tsetse nkɔnhyɛnyi a otsĩa ebien no so gyee Nyankopɔn ne Ba no ho dase, na osiandɛ nkorɔfo no enntum anntse ne nsɛm no ase ntsi wosiiw no abo ma owui.

18 Mbom hwɛ, nnyɛ ne nyinara nye iyi; nnyɛ dɛm nkorɔfo yinom nko na wɔkãa nsɛm a ɔfa Nyankopɔn ne Ba no ho no kyerɛɛ hɔn.

19 Hwɛ, Moses so kãa noho asɛm; nyew, na hwɛ wɔmaa ngyinahɔmadze bi do sii hɔ wɔ sar no do dɛ, obiara a ɔbɔhwɛ no obenya nkwa. Na dodowara hwɛe na wonyaa nkwa.

20 Mbom kumaabi na wɔtsee dɛm ndzɛmba no ase, osian hɔn akomadzen ntsi. Na mbom dodowara wɔ hɔ a hɔn akoma yɛɛ dzen araa ma wɔannhwɛ, ma dɛm ntsi wɔherae. Afei siantsir a ɔnam do ma wɔannhwɛ nye dɛ wɔanngye enndzi dɛ ɔbɛsa hɔn yarba.

21 O m’enuanom, sɛ hom ma hom enyi do hwɛ ara gyan na sɛ hom benya ayarsa a, ebɛnadze ntsi na hom nnhwɛ no ntsɛm, anaa hom pɛ dɛ hom dze ekyingye pirim hom akoma, yɛ akwadwer, ma dɛm ntsi hom mma hom enyi do nnhwɛ, amma hom annhera?
