22 Sɛ dɛm a, mbusu bɛba hom do; na sɛ nnyɛ dɛm a, ɔno hom mma hom enyi do na hom nhyɛ ase ngye Nyankopɔn ne Ba no ndzi, ama ɔaaba abɔpon no nkorɔfo, na ɔbɛba ebohu amandze na oewu dze noho abɔ werdam etua hɔn bɔn; na dɛ ɔbɔsoɛr bio efi owu mu a ɔbɛma owusoɛr aba, ama adasa nyina aaba ebegyina n’enyim, ma oebu hɔn atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse wɔ atsɛmbu da a odzi ewiei no mu.

23 Na afei, m’enuanom, mepɛ dɛ hom dua asɛm yi wɔ hom akoma mu, na sɛ ɔhyɛ ase dɛ ɔreyeyer a hom mfa hom gyedzi nkora do yie. Na hwɛ, ɔbɛyɛ dua, na oenyin wɔ hom mu dze akɔ daapem nkwa mu. Na Nyankopɔn ndua ne Ba no n’enyigye do mma hom adzesoa nyɛ har. Na sɛ hom pɛ nkotsee dze a hom botum mpo ayɛ iyi nyinara. Amen.
alma 34:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 34[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amulek gye dase dɛ asɛm no wɔ Christ mu dze kɔ nkwagye mu—Sɛ werdambɔ ammba a nkyɛ adasamba nyina bɛhera—Moses mbra nyina kyerɛ Nyame ne Ba n’afɔrbɔ no—Onnyiewiei ɔpon ho nhyehyɛɛ no gyina gyedzi na nnuho do—Bɔ mpaa fa hwehwɛ honam nye sunsum mu nhyira—Nkwaber yi mu na ɔwɔ dɛ adasamba siesie hɔnho dze hyia Nyame kwan—Fa suro yɛ wo nkwagye ho edwuma wɔ Nyame enyim. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Alma kãa dɛm nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ hɔn wiei no ɔtsenaa famu, na Amulek soɛree na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ hɔn; ɔsee dɛ:

2 M’enuanom, modwen dɛ nsɛm a wɔakã a ɔfa Christ ne mbae ho yi yɛ nsɛm a hom nnkotum akã dɛ hom nnyim, nyia yɛakyerɛ mu akyerɛ hom dɛ ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba no; nyew, minyim dɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ ndzɛmba yinom mu yie kyerɛɛ hom ansaana hom retsew etua efi hɛn mu.

3 Na dɛ mbrɛ hom enya pɛ dɛ mo nua dɔfo yi nkyerɛ hom dza ɔsɛ dɛ hom yɛ, osian hom amandzehu ntsi; na ɔakã biribi a akyerɛ hom dze esiesie hom adwen mu akyerɛ hom; nyew, na oetu hom fo ama hom enya gyedzi na abotar—

4 Nyew, ma hom enya gyedzi mpo a ɔsõ ara yie ma hom dze edua asɛm no mpo wɔ hom akoma mu, ma hom abɔ mbɔdzen asɔ ahwɛ ehu dɛ oye.

5 Na yehu dɛ asɛm bisa kɛse a ɔwɔ hom adwen mu nye dɛ ana asɛm no wɔ Nyankopɔn ne Ba no mu, anaadɛ Christ biara nnyi hɔ.

6 Na hom so hom ehu dɛ mo nua, edua akwan pii do, ada no edzi pefee akyerɛ hom dɛ asɛm no wɔ Christ mu dze kɔ nkwagye mu.

7 Mo nua yi akã Zenos ne nsɛm no, dɛ ɔpon fi Nyankopɔn ne Ba no mu ba, na ɔakã Zenock so ne nsɛm; na ɔdze Moses so nedze akã ho dze ayɛ mfatoho akyerɛ hom ama hom eehu dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom yɛ nokwar.

8 Na afei, hwɛ, mankasa merebɛgye me dasee akyerɛ hom ma hom eehu dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom yɛ nokwar. Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ minyim dɛ Christ bɛba adasamba mu, na ɔabɛfa no nkorɔfo hɔn mbrato ato no do, na ɔdze noho abɔ werdam dze etua wiadze bɔn kaw; na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔakã.

9 Na ohia dɛ wɔbɔ werdam yi; osiandɛ ɔwɔ Onnyiewiei Nyankopɔn ne nhyehyɛɛ kɛse no mu dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ wɔbɔ dɛm werdam no, annyɛ dɛm a adasamba nyina bɛhera; nyew, hɔn nyina epirim hɔn akoma; nyew, hɔn nyina ahwe ase na wɔayew, na ɔsɛ dɛ wɔhera gyedɛ wɔnam dɛm werdam yi a ohia dɛ wɔbɔ yi do.

10 Na ohia dɛ wɔbɔ dɛm afɔrbɔ kɛse a odzi ewiei yi; nyew, nnyɛ nyimpa na afɔrbɔ, nna nnyɛ abowa, anaa nnoma horow no mu biara so; osiandɛ ɔnnyɛ nyimpa afɔrbɔ; na mbom ɔwɔ dɛ ɔyɛ afɔrbɔ onnyiewiei na ɔmmbɔadze da.

11 Afei nyimpa biara nnyi hɔ a obotum dze nankasa no bɔgyaa abɔ werdam dze etua obi no bɔn kaw. Afei, sɛ nyimpa bi dzi ewu a, hwɛ ana hɛn mbra a ɔtsen no, yi no nua no nkwa fi hɔ? Mese hom dɛ Oho.

12 Mbom mbra no gye nyia oedzi ewu no no nkwa; dɛm ntsi biribiara nnyi hɔ a ɔtɔ sin wɔ dɛm werdambɔ a ɔmmbɔadze da no a otum tua wiadze bɔn yi ho kaw.

13 Dɛm ntsi ohia dɛ afɔrbɔ kɛse a odzi ewiei no bɛba na ɔhɔ no na ɔbɛma anaa dɛ obehia dɛ wogyaa bɔgya a wokyi dze bɔ afɔr, na dɛm so na ɔbɛma Moses mbra no ahyɛ mã; nyew, ne nyina bɛhyɛ mã, na no mu kumaabi mpo runntwa mu nnkɔ.

14 Na hwɛ, mbra no n’asekyerɛ nyinara nye yi, no mu biara kyerɛ afɔrbɔ kɛse a odzi ewiei yi; na dɛm afɔrbɔ kɛse a odzi ewiei no bɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba no a, nyew, ɔyɛ ɔmmbɔadze na onnyiewei.

15 Na dɛm na ɔdze nkwagye bɛbrɛ hɔn a wɔbɛgye ne dzin edzi no nyina; na iyi nye afɔrbɔ a odzi ewiei no n’ase, dɛ ɔbɛma ehumbɔbɔr abadaa a otum kã pɛrpɛr hyɛ no aba, na ɔdze biribi abrɛ nyimpa a ɔnam do benya gyedzi a ɔbɛma woenya nnuho no.

16 Na dɛm na ɔbɛma ehumbɔbɔr etum apata pɛrpɛrdzi; na wɔbɛkã hɔn efũa wɔ abasa dwudwoodwo mu, na nyia onnyi gyedzi a wɔdze kɔ nnuho mu no wobegyaa no ahyɛ mbra no nyinara a ɔrohwehwɛ pɛrpɛrdzi no ne nsa; dɛm ntsi nyia ɔwɔ gyedzi a wɔdze kɔ nnuho mu no nko na obenya onnyiewiei na ɔpon ho nhyehyɛɛ kɛse no.

17 Dɛm ntsi m’enuanom, Nyankopɔn mboa hom ma hom ntum nhyɛ ase mfa hom gyedzi nyɛ edwuma nya nnuho, ama hom aahyɛ ase abɔ ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no, ama oeehu hom mbɔbɔr;

18 Nyew, hom nsũ mfrɛ no ma onhu hom mbɔbɔr; osiandɛ ɔwɔ tum a ɔdze gye nkwa.

19 Nyew, hom mbrɛ homho adze, na hom nkɔ do mbɔ mpaa mma no.

20 Hom nsũ mfrɛ no ber a hom wɔ hom kwã mu, nyew, mfa mma hom nguankuw nyina.

21 Hom nsũ mfrɛ no wɔ hom efiefi, nyew, mfa mma hom fifo anapa, ewiaber, nye ewimber.

22 Nyew, hom nsũ mfrɛ no mfa ntsia hom atamfo hɔn tum.

23 Nyew, Hom nsũ mfrɛ no mfa ntsia abɔnsam no a ɔyɛ tsenenee ne tamfo no.

24 Hom nsũ mfrɛ no mfa mma ekuadze a ɔwɔ hom kwã mu, ama hom nam do aayɛ prɔmprɔm.

25 Hom nsũ mfa mma nguankuw a wɔwɔ hom kwã mu ama wɔaadɔr.

26 Mbom nnyɛ, ne nyina nye yi; ɔsɛ dɛ hom hue hom akra gu wɔ hom mpia mu, nye hom sumabea, nye hom sar do.

27 Nyew, na sɛ hom ennsũ ammfrɛ Ewuradze a, hom mma mpaabɔ nhyɛ hom akoma mu mã daa nyina wɔ hom yieyɛ, nye hɔn a woetwa homho ehyia so hɔn yieyɛ ntsi.

28 Na afei hwɛ, mo nuanom adɔfo, mese hom dɛ mma hom nndwen dɛ ne nyina nye yi; osiandɛ sɛ hom yɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina wie, na sɛ hom dan hom ekyir ma abɔbɔfo nye adagyadzifo, na hom nnsera ayarfo nye hɔn a wɔwɔ ɔhaw mu, na sɛ hom wɔ ahodze na hom mmfa bi mma hɔn a wohia a—mese hom dɛ sɛ hom annyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom mu biara a, hwɛ hom mpaabɔ yɛ kwa, na hom rinnya biribiara mmfi mu, na hom yɛ enyisomakyerɛfo a wɔpow gyedzi no.

29 Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom annkaa annyɛ ayamuyie a, hom yɛ dɛ nwura a edwimfo tow gu, (noho nnyi mfaso) na nyimpa dze hɔn anan tsiatsia do.

30 Na afei m’enuanom, mepɛ dɛ, ber a hom enya adasefo pii na hom ehu dɛ kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no gye dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho dase yi, hom ba bɔsow eduaba a wɔdze kɔ nnuho mu.

31 Nyew, mepɛ dɛ hom ba na dɛ hom mmpirim hom akoma bio; na hwɛ aber yi nye hom nkwagye da; na dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom emmpirim hom akoma, na hom nu homho a, wɔdze ɔpon nhyehyɛɛ kɛse no bɛma hom ntsɛmara.

32 Na hwɛ, nkwaber yi mu nna ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa siesie hɔnho hyia Nyankopɔn kwan; nyew, hwɛ dɛm nkwanda yi mu nna ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa dze yɛ hɔn ndwuma.

33 Na afei, dɛ mbrɛ makã akyerɛ hom dada no, dɛ hom enya adasefo pii no ntsi, meserɛ hom dɛ mma hom nntu hom nnuho da no nnhyɛ da nkɛpem ewiei, osiandɛ nkwa da yi mu na wɔdze ama hɛn dɛ yɛmfa nsiesie hɛnho mma mbersantsen no, hwɛ sɛ yɛammbɔ hɛn bra yie wɔ ber a yɛtse nkwa mu yi a, ber a sum adzesaa bɛba no yerunntum nnyɛ.

34 Hom runntum nnka wɔ ahoguan ber no mu dɛ mobonu moho, mebɛsan akɔ me Nyankopɔn nkyɛn. Oho, hom runntum nnka dɛm; osiandɛ dɛm sunsum no a nna hom nyimpadua yɛ nedze ber a nna hom rifi nkwa yi mu no, dɛm sunsum kor no ara so na obenya tum afa hom nyimpadua no ayɛ nedze wɔ dɛm onnyiewiei wiadze no mu.

35 Na hwɛ, sɛ hom tu hom nnuho hyɛ da dze kesi owu mu a, hwɛ, nna hom abɛhyɛ abɔnsam no sunsum ase, na ɔsɔw hom ano yɛ nedze; dɛm ntsi, Ewuradze no Sunsum no twe noho fi homho, na onnyi gyinabew wɔ hom mu, na abɔnsam wɔ tum nyina wɔ hom do; na mbrɛ omumuyɛnyi n’ewiei tsebew bɛyɛ nye no.

36 Na iyi minyim, osiandɛ Ewuradze akã dɛ ɔrenntsena temple a no mu nntsew mu, na mbom atseneneefo akoma mu na ɔbɛtsena; nyew, na ɔakã so dɛ atseneneefo bɛtsena n’ahenman mu, na worimmfi mu bio, na mbom wɔbɔhor hɔn ntar ma wɔayɛ fitaa wɔ Ewuradze no bɔgyaa mu.

37 Na afei, m’enuanom adɔfo, mepɛ dɛ hom kaa dɛm ndzɛmba yinom, na hom dze suro yɛ hom nkwagye ho edwuma wɔ Nyame enyim, na hom mpow Christ ne mbae no.

38 Dɛ hom nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no nnkedzi aper bio, na mbom hom bɛgye no, na hom afa Christ ne dzin ato hom do; na hom abrɛ homho ase koraa mpo dze akɔ huntuma mu, na hom asɔr Nyame wɔ beebiara a hom wɔ, wɔ sunsum nye nokwar mu; na hom ada no ase daadaa, wɔ ehumbɔbɔr nye nhyira pii a ɔdze ehyira hom ntsi.

39 Nyew, m’enuanom, mutu hom fo dɛ hom nweɔn na hom nsɔr aber nyina, amma abɔnsam enndua nsɔhwɛ mu anntwe hom annkɔ, amma oenntum ennya tum wɔ hom do, amma hom ammbɛyɛ nedze wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu; na hwɛ ɔremma hom adzepa biara.

40 Na afei mo nuanom adɔfo, mutu hom fo dɛ hom nya abotar, na hom nsɔw amandzehu ahorow nyina; na mma hom nnkã nsɛmbɔn biara nntsia hɔn a osian hom hia dodow ntsi woeyi hom tokyen, amma hom ammbɛyɛ adzebɔnyɛfo dɛ mbrɛ wɔtse;

41 Mbom hom nya abotar, na hom nsɔw dɛm amandzehu no, na hom nya enyidado a osi pi dɛ da bi hom bɔhom efi hom amandzehu nyina mu.
alma 35:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 35[/font_size][/center]

[i]Asɛmpa ne kã sɛɛ Zoramfo no ndwuma bɔn no—Wɔpam hɔn a wɔasakyer no na wɔakɛka Ammon no nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Jershon no ho—Osian nkorɔfo no hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi, Alma dzi yaw. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Amulek dze ne nsɛm baa ewiei no, wɔtwee hɔnho fii dɔmtutuw no mu na wɔbaa Jershon asaase do.

2 Nyew, na enuanom nkaa no so ber a wɔkãa asɛm no kyerɛɛ Zoramfo no wiee no, hɔn so baa Jershon asaase do.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Zoramfo no mu etsitsir pii boaa hɔn ano dɛ wɔrodwendwen nsɛm a wɔakã akyerɛ hɔn no ho no, hɔn bo fuwii wɔ nsɛm no ho, osiandɛ ɔsɛɛ hɔn ndwuma bɔn no; dɛm ntsi wɔammpɛ dɛ wotsie nsɛm no.

4 Na wɔsomaa ma wɔkɔboaboaa dɔm a wɔwɔ asaase no do nyinara ano, na wɔnye hɔn dwendween nsɛm a wɔakã akyerɛ hɔn no ho.

5 Afei hɔn ahwɛfo nye hɔn asɔfo nye hɔn akyerɛkyerɛfo no amma dɔm no ennhu dza wɔrohwehwɛ; dɛm ntsi wɔnam nsumaamu hun dɔm no nyina hɔn adwen.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wohun dɔm no nyinara hɔn adwen no, wɔpaam hɔn a nna wɔagye nsɛm a Alma na n’enuanom no akã no edzi no fii asaase no do; na hɔn dodow dɔɔ sõ; na hɔn so wɔbaa Jershon asaase do.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ Alma nye no nuanom no soom hɔn.

8 Afei Zoramfo dɔm no bo fuuw Ammon no nkorɔfo no a wɔwɔ Jershon no, na Zoramfo hɔn ɔhwɛfo panyin a ɔyɛ omumuyɛfo no, somaa ma wɔkɔr Ammon no nkorɔfo nkyɛn kɛsee hɔn dɛ wɔmpam hɔn a wofii hɔn mu baa hɔn asaase do no mfi hɔn asaase no do.

9 Na opuuw hɔn mpɛn pii. Na afei Ammon no nkorɔfo no ennsuro hɔn nsɛm no koraa; dɛm ntsi wɔammpam hɔn, mbom wɔgyee Zoramfo ehiafo no nyinara a wɔbaa hɔn nkyɛn no; na wɔmaa hɔn edziban ma wodzii, na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ntar, na wɔmaa wɔkyɛɛ hɔn nsaase ma ɔbɛyɛɛ hɔn egyapadze; na wɔmaa wɔsoom hɔn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ehiadze tse.

10 Afei iyi maa Zoramfo no bo fuuw Ammon no nkorɔfo, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔnye Lamanfo no ridzi afora dze enunu hɔn ma hɔn so hɔn bo efuw hɔn.

11 Na dɛm ntsi Zoramfo nye Lamanfo so hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔroboaboa hɔnho akɔkõ etsia Ammon no nkorɔfo nye Nephifo no.

12 Na dɛm na afe a otsĩa duesuon wɔ atsɛmbuafo a wɔhwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei.

13 Na Ammon no nkorɔfo no fii Jershon asaase do, na wɔbaa Melek asaase do, na wɔdze Jershon asaase no too hɔ dze maa Nephifo nsordaafo no, ama woeetum nye Lamanfo nsordaafo nye Zoramfo nsordaafo no edzi esi, na dɛm na ɔkõ hyɛɛ ase wɔ Lamanfo nye Nephifo no mu wɔ afe a otsĩa duawɔtwe wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn aber do; na dza ɔfa ɔkõ yi ho no wɔbɛkã no ekyir yi.

14 Na Alma nye Ammon nye hɔn enuanom no nye Alma ne mbabanyin beenu no so saan hɔn ekyir kɔr Zarahemla asaase do, ber a Nyankopɔn duaa hɔn abaw do twee Zoramfo no mu pii ma wonyaa nnuho no; na dodowara a wonyaa nnuho no, wɔpaam hɔn fii hɔn asaase do; na mbom nna woenya Jershon nsaase dze ayɛ hɔn egyapadze, na wɔfaa akodze dɛ wɔdze bɛgye hɔnho, nye hɔn yernom na hɔn mba, nye hɔn nsaase.

15 Afei Alma nna no werɛ ahow osian no nkorɔfo hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi, nyew, osian akõkoekõ nye bɔgya a wɔrekã gu, nye wentwiwentwi a aba hɔn mu no ntsi; na ber a ɔkɔr dɛ ɔrekɛkã asɛm no, anaadɛ wɔsomaa no dɛ ɔnkɛkã asɛm no wɔ dɔm no nyina mu wɔ kurow biara mu no; na ohun dɛ nkorɔfo no hɔn akoma ahyɛ ase repirim no, na dɛ asɛm no yɛ hɔn fintsindua osian ne katseeyɛ ntsi, n’akoma dzii awerɛhow kɛsenara.

16 Dɛm ntsi, ɔsomaa dɛ wɔmboa ne mbabanyin no hɔn ano, ama ɔdze hɔn mu kor biara n’edwuma aahyɛ ne nsa, wɔ ɔfa no tsenenee ndzɛmba ho. Na yɛwɔ ne mbrasɛm a ɔdze maa hɔn no ho abakɔsɛm dɛ mbrɛ nankasa ne kyerɛwsɛm no tse.
alma 36:
Alma ne mbrasɛm a ɔdze maa ne babanyin, Helaman.

Ne nyinara wɔ etsir 36 na 37 mu.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 36[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma gye ne nsakyeree no ho dase kyerɛ Helaman ekyir no a ohun ɔbɔfo no—Ohun amandze tse dɛ ɔkra a woebu no fɔ; ɔbɔ mpaa bɔ Jesus ne dzin, na nkyii Nyankopɔn wo no—Dɛw dɛɛdɛw hyɛ ne kra mã—Ohu abɔfo mpempem dɛ woriyi Nyankopɔn ayɛw—Nkorɔfo dodow a wɔasakyer no sɔe hwɛe na wohun dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɔe hwɛe na ohunii no. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Me babanyin, tsie me nsɛm; midzi nsew kyerɛ wo dɛ, mbertsentsen a ibedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do no ebɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase yi do.

2 Mepɛ dɛ eyɛ dza meyɛɛ na ekaa hɛn egyanom hɔn ndɔmmum no; osiandɛ wɔkɔr nkowaasom mu, na obiara enntum anngye hɔn gyedɛ Abraham ne Nyankopɔn, nye Isaac ne Nyankopɔn, nye Jacob ne Nyankopɔn no nko; na nokwar, ɔgyee hɔn fii hɔn amandzehu mu.

3 Na afei, O me babanyin Helaman, hwɛ, ewɔ wo mberantsɛber mu, na dɛm ntsi, meserɛ wo dɛ tsie me nsɛm na sũa me; na minyim dɛ obiara a ɔdze no werɛ twer Nyame no ɔbɔboa no wɔ no nsɔhwɛ, nye n’amandzehu, nye n’akotorka mu, na ɔbɛma no do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

4 Na memmpɛ dɛ ebɔdwen dɛ mankasa na minyim—nnyɛ honandua yi a, na mbom sunsum a, nnyɛ honam su adwen a, na mbom Nyame mu a.

5 Afei, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, sɛ Nyame annwo me a nkyɛ murunnhu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom; na mbom Nyankopɔn edua no bɔfoe krɔnkrɔn no anomu ada dɛm ndzɛmba yinom edzi akyerɛ me, nnyɛ dɛ metsen ntsi a.

6 Na menye Mosiah ne mbabanyin kyinkyinii, peer dɛ yɛbɛsɛɛ Nyankopɔn n’asɔr; na mbom hwɛ, Nyankopɔn somaa no bɔfoe krɔnkrɔn dɛ onsanka hɛn wɔ kwan mu.

7 Na hwɛ, ndze a ɔdze kasaa kyerɛɛ hɛn no tse dɛ sor robobɔ mu, na asaase nyina wosowee wɔ hɛn ananadze; na hɛn nyinara twitwae hwee famu, osiandɛ Ewuradze noho suro baa hɛn do.

8 Mbom hwɛ, ndze no see me dɛ: Soɛr. Na mosoɛree gyinaa hɔ, na muhun ɔbɔfo no.

9 Na ɔsee me dɛ: Sɛ ɔwo w’ankasa wɔbɛsɛɛ wo a, mma mmper bio dɛ ebɛsɛɛ Nyame n’asɔr no.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ mohwee famu; na bɛyɛ nda ebiasa nye adzesaa ebiasa ntamu no nna munntum mmbue m’ano nna munntum mma me nsa na m’anan do.

11 Na ɔbɔfo no kãa nsɛm pii kyerɛɛ me a m’enuanom no tsee, na mbom emi manntse osiandɛ ber a metsee dɛm nsɛm yi—Sɛ ɔwo w’ankasa wɔbɛsɛɛ wo a, mma mmper dɛ ebɛsɛɛ Nyame n’asɔr no—suro na ahobow kɛse bi kãa me ma ɔyɛɛ me dɛ annhwɛ a wɔbɛsɛɛ me, dɛm maa mohwee famu na manntse hwee bio.

12 Mbom onnyiewiei ahohyehye haaw me osiandɛ me kra dzii atseetsee kɛsenara na mo bɔn nyina haaw me.

13 Nyew, mekaa mo bɔn na m’emumuyɛ nyina, na iyi ho na hɛl ne yaw maa moho hyehyee me ara yie; nyew, muhun dɛ matsew me Nyame do etua na dɛ menndzi ne mbrasɛm krɔnkrɔn no do.

14 Nyew, na medzii ne mba pii ewu anaadɛ magye hɔn akɔ ɔsɛɛ mu; nyew, ne sin ara nye dɛ nna m’emumuyɛ sõ ara yie, na dɛm ntsi Nyankopɔn n’enyim nkɔree ho adwendwen sunsuaan me kra mu pasapasa.

15 O, modween dɛ nkyɛ wobotum apam me ma m’ayew koraa me kra nye me nyimpadua nyina, amma wɔnye me ammba emmbegyina me Nyankopɔn enyim, ama oebu me atsɛn wɔ me ndzeyɛɛ ho.

16 Na afei, nda ebiasa nye adzesaa ebiasa mu na atseetsee sunsuaan me, mpo dɛ ɔkra a woebu no fɔ no ne yaw.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ahohyehye rusunsuan mo mu no, ber a mo bɔn pii ho adwendwen rehaw me no, hwɛ, mekae so dɛ metsee dɛ m’egya rehyɛ nkɔm kyerɛ dɔm no fa obi a wɔfrɛ no Jesus Christ a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba a ɔreba abɔbɔ werdam dze etua wiadze bɔn no.

18 Afei, ber a m’adwen twee dɛm nsɛm yi maa me no, musũi wɔ m’akoma mu dɛ: O Jesus, ɔwo a eyɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba, hu me mbɔbɔr, emi a mehyɛ bɔwen wenwen mu; na owu ne daapem nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn etwa moho ehyia no.

19 Na afei, hwɛ, ber a modween dɛm no, mannkaa me yaw no bio; nyew, mo bɔn ho adwendwen no annhaaw me bio.

20 Na ao, ebɛn dɛw nye yi, na ebɛn kan nwanwa na muhunii yi; nyew, dɛw mbordo a ɔtse dɛ me yaw no pɛpɛɛpɛr hyɛɛ me kra mã!

21 Nyew, mese ɔwo, me babanyin dɛ biribiara nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛyɛ yaw kɛse tse dɛ me yaw no. Nyew, na mese wo bio, me babanyin, dɛ biribiara so nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛyɛ dɛw kɛse tse dɛ m’enyigye no.

22 Nyew, ɔyɛ me dɛ muhun adze a hɛn egya Lehi hunii no mpo, Nyankopɔn dɛ ɔtsena n’ahengua do a abɔfo mboano pii a wonntum nnkan hɔn etwa noho ehyia, na wɔrotow ndwom na wɔrotonton hɔn Nyankopɔn; nyew, na me kra pɛɛ dɛ ɔkɔ hɔ bi.

23 Mbom hwɛ, me nsa na m’anan nyaa ahoɔdzen bio, na mosoɛree gyinaa m’anan do, na medaa no edzi kyerɛɛ dɔm no dɛ Nyankopɔn awo me.

24 Nyew, na ofi dɛm aber no dze besi ndɛ mpo, mayɛ edwuma atoa do a menngyaa da, ama matwe akra aaba nnuho mu; ama medze hɔn aaba ma wɔabɔsɔ dɛw mbordo a masɔ ahwɛ no bi, ama hɔn Nyankopɔn aawo hɔn so, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no aahyɛ hɔn mã.

25 Nyew, na afei hwɛ, O me babanyin, Ewuradze ama menya enyigye kɛse wɔ eduaba a mo dwumadzi asow no ho;

26 Na osian asɛm no a ɔdze maa me no ntsi, hwɛ, Nyankopɔn nam do dze awo dodowara, na dza mosoɛe hwɛɛ no, hɔn so wɔasɔ ahwɛ, na wɔdze hɔn enyiwa ehu dza meehu; dɛm ntsi wonyim dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a maakã ho asɛm dɛ minyim yi; na dza minyim no fi Nyame.

27 Na ɔaboa me wɔ mo nsɔhwɛ nye ɔhaw biara mu, nyew, wɔ amandzehu ahorow nyina mu; nyew, Nyankopɔn eyi me efi efiadze, nye mpokyerɛ na owu mu; nyew, medze mo werɛ ahyɛ no mu, na ɔbɔkɔ do agye me.

28 Na minyim dɛ ɔbɛma mo do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu, ma menye no aatsena wɔ enyimnyam mu; nyew, na mibeyi no ayɛw afebɔɔ, osiandɛ ɔdze hɛn egyanom efi Egypt aba, na ɔamemen Egyptfo no wɔ Po Memen no mu; na ɔnam no tum do dze hɔn kɔr anohoba asaase no do; nyew, na oeyi hɔn efi nkowaasom nye ndɔmmum mu fi ber to ber.

29 Nyew, na ɔdze hɛn egyanom efi Jerusalem asaase do so aba; na ɔnam no tum a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no do agye hɔn efi nkowaasom nye ndɔmmum mu fi ber to ber dze ebesi dɛm da yi mu so mpo; na daa mekaa hɔn ndɔmmum no; nyew, na wo so ɔsɛ dɛ ekaa hɔn ndɔmmum no, dɛ mbrɛ mayɛ yi.

30 Mbom hwɛ, me babanyin, nnyɛ ne nyinara nye iyi; na ɔsɛ dɛ ihu dɛ mbrɛ mehu yi, dɛ susuampaara dɛ ibedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do no, ebɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase yi do; na mbertsentsen biara a innkedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do no, wobotwa wo efi n’enyim akyen. Afei dɛm na n’asɛm se.
alma 37:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 37[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wɔkora ayewa mprɛtse nye kyerɛwsɛm binom do dze aagye akra aba nkwagye mu—Osian Jaredfo hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi wɔsɛɛ hɔn—Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze hɔn nsumaamu nsewdzi na ahyɛmudzi suma nkorɔfo no—Enye Ewuradze ndwendwen biribiara a ebɛyɛ ho—Dɛ mbrɛ Liahona gyaa Nephifo no, dɛmara na Christ gye nyimpa kɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, me babanyin Helaman, mehyɛ wo dɛ fa nkyerɛwee no a wɔdze ahyɛ me nsa yi;

2 Na mehyɛ wo so dɛ kyerɛw nkorɔfo yi hɔnho nsɛm dɛ mbrɛ mayɛ yi, wɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse no do, na fa dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina, na sie no krɔnkrɔn dɛ mbrɛ medze esie yi mpo; na nyansaa botae bi ntsi na wɔdze esie yi.

3 Na ayewa mprɛtse iyinom a dɛm nkrukye yi wɔ do yi yɛ kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn nye abakɔsɛm a ɔfa hɛn egyanom hɔn ebusuasantsen ho fi ahyɛse no.

4 Hwɛ, hɛn egyanom ahyɛ ho nkɔm dɛ wɔmfa nsie mfi ebusuasantsen nkesi kor so, na Ewuradze dze ne nsa bɔkora do ekesi dɛ ɔbɔkɔ aman ebusuafo, kasa horow, nye nyimpa nyina hɔ, ama woeehu esumasɛm a ɔwɔ mu.

5 Na afei hwɛ, sɛ wɔdze sie a ɔwɔ dɛ ɔda ho hyerɛn dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse noara; nyew, na wɔbɛda ho ahyerɛn; nyew, na mprɛtse so a kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn wɔ do nyina.

6 Afei ebɔdwen dɛ dza merekã yi yɛ nkwaseasɛm; na mbom hwɛ mese wo dɛ, ɔnam akwan nketsenketse do nna ndzɛmba akɛse dua ba; na mpɛn pii na ndzɛmba a ɔtsetse dɛm hyɛ enyansafo fɛr.

7 Na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn nam dɛm akwan yi do yɛ no ndwuma dze hyɛ onnyiewiei nhyehyɛɛ akɛse mã; na Ewuradze dua ndzɛmba nketsenketse do hyɛ enyansafo fɛr na ɔgye akra pii ba nkwagye mu.

8 Na afei ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn ne nyansaa dɛ wɔdze dɛm ndzɛmba yinom sie; na hwɛ, wɔakaakaa dɛm dɔm yi ara yie, nyew, na wɔama dodowara ehu hɔn mfom akwan, na wɔama woenya hɔn Nyankopɔn ho nyimdzee dze ama hɔn akra no nkwagye.

9 Nyew, mese wo dɛ sɛ nnyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a ɔwɔ kyerɛwsɛm yi a ɔwɔ dɛm mprɛtse yinom do a nkyɛ Ammon na n’enuanom no enntum amma Lamanfo hɔn mu mpempem pii ennhu dɛ hɔn egyanom amambra no nnyɛ nokwar; nyew, dɛm kyerɛwsɛm yinom nye hɔn nsɛm na ɔmaa wonyaa nnuho; ɔno nye dɛ, wɔmaa wonyaa hɔn Ewuradze Nyankopɔn no ho nyimdzee, na wonyaa enyigye wɔ Jesus Christ hɔn Pomfo no mu.

10 Na woana na onyim, dɛ annhwɛ a ɔnam hɔn do na wɔdze bɔtwe mpempem pii, nyew, nna hɛn enuanom Nephifo akɔnkyefo so mu mpempem pii, hɔn a afei woripirim hɔn akoma wɔ bɔn na emumuyɛ mu, aba hɔn Pomfo ho nyimdzee?

11 Afei ɔnndaa dɛm esumadze yinom mu nsɛm nyina edzi nnkyerɛɛ me; dɛm ntsi medze besi ha ara.

12 Na sɛ mekã dɛ wɔdze sie wɔ siantsir pa bi ntsi a, nna megye dzi dɛ ɔnoara dɔɔ sõ, dɛm siantsir no, Nyame na onyim; osiandɛ nyansa na ɔdze kora no ndwuma nyina do na n’akwan tsen, ɔyɛ kor na ɔkɔ aprɔw onnyiewiei.

13 O kaa, kaa, me babanyin Helaman, dɛ Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm yɛ katsee. Na ɔakã dɛ: Sɛ idzi ne mbrasɛm do a ebɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase yi do—na mbom sɛ enndzi ne mbrasɛm do a wobotwa wo efi n’enyim akyen.

14 Na afei kaa, me babanyin, dɛ Nyankopɔn dze dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn a ɔdze esie yi ahyɛ wo nsa, dza oesie no krɔnkrɔn mu no, na ɔdze besie na ɔakora do so yie, osian nyansaa botae bi a ɔwɔ no ntsi, ama ɔaada no tum edzi dze akyerɛ ebusuasantsen a wɔbɛba.

15 Na afei hwɛ, menam nkɔnhyɛ sunsum mu se wo dɛ, sɛ etõ Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm no a, hwɛ Nyankopɔn no tum bɛgye dɛm ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn yi efi wo nsamu, na wobegyaa wo mu ama Abɔnsam, ma oehuw wo dɛ eburow ntsɛw wɔ mframa enyim.

16 Mbom sɛ idzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm yi do, na ehwɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn yi do yie dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze ahyɛ wo ho bɔ yi a, (na ɔwɔ dɛ ibisa Ewuradze biribiara a ɔwɔ dɛ eyɛ wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina ho) hwɛ, tum biara nnyi asaase anaa hɛl a obotum agye efi wo hɔ, osiandɛ Nyame wɔ tum na ɔbɛma ne nsɛm nyina ahyɛ mã.

17 Na ɔbɔpon n’anohoba nyinara a ɔdze abɔ wo no, osiandɛ ɔapon n’anohoba a ɔdze bɔɔ hɛn egyanom no.

18 Na ɔbɔɔ hɔn anohoba dɛ ɔbɔkora dɛm ndzɛmba yinom do wɔ nyansaa botae bi ntsi, ama ɔaakyerɛ no tum akyerɛ ebusuasantsen a wɔbɛba.

19 Na afei hwɛ, adze kor bi wɔ hɔ a ɔama ahyɛ mã, mpo dɛ Lamanfo mpempem pii ma wɔasan aba ebenya nokwar noho nyimdzee; na oedua hɔn do no tum akyerɛ na ɔbɛda ho so akyerɛ no tum a ɔwɔ hɔn mu no akyerɛ ebusuasantsen a wɔbɛba, dɛm ntsi ɔbɔkora do.

20 Dɛm ntsi mehyɛ ɔwo, me babanyin Helaman, dɛ bɔ mbɔdzen dzi me nsɛm nyina do, na bɔ mbɔdzen dzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no ara.

21 Na afei, mebɛkã biribi a ɔfa dɛm mprɛtse eduonu anan noho akyerɛ wo, fa sie, ama esumadze nye sum mu ndwuma, nye hɔn nsumaamu ndwuma, anaadɛ nkorɔfo no hɔn nsumaamu ndwuma no a wɔasɛɛ no no aada edzi ama dɔm no; nyew, hɔn ewudzi nyina, nye hɔn edwotwa, nye hɔn epoobɔ, nye hɔn emumuyɛdze, nye hɔn ekyiwadze nyina bɛda edzi akyerɛ dɔm yi; nyew, ama aakora dɛm asekyerɛdze yi yie.

22 Na hwɛ, Ewuradze hun dɛ no nkorɔfo ahyɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ sum mu ndwuma, nyew, nsumaamu ewudzi nye ebusudze; dɛm ntsi Ewuradze see dɛ, sɛ woennu hɔnho a wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn efi asaase enyi do.

23 Na Ewuradze see dɛ: Mibesiesie ɔbo bi, a ɔbɛhyerɛn wɔ sum mu ma hɔ ayɛ kan dze ama m’akowaa Gazelem, ama mama mo nkorɔfo ehu hɔn a wɔsom me, na mama woehu hɔn enuanom no hɔn ndwuma, nyew hɔn nsumaamu ndwuma, hɔn sum mu ndwuma nye hɔn emumuyɛdze nye ebusudze.

24 Na afei, me babanyin, wɔyɛɛ dɛm asekyerɛdze yi ama Nyankopɔn n’asɛm no aahyɛ mã, dza ɔkãa dɛ:

25 Mibeyi hɔn nsumaamu ndwuma, nye hɔn ebusudze nyina efi sum mu epue kan mu; nna gyedɛ wonu hɔnho annyɛ dɛm a mebɛsɛɛ hɔn efi asaase yi enyi do; na medze hɔn nsumaamu nsɛm nye ekyiwadze bopue kan mu ma ɔman biara a ɔbɛba ekyir abɛfa asaase yi ehu.

26 Na afei, me babanyin, yehu dɛ woennu hɔnho; dɛm ntsi wɔasɛɛ hɔn, na dɛm ama Nyame n’asɛm ahyɛ mã; nyew, wɔdze hɔn nsumaamu ekyiwadze efi sum mu epue ma yehu.

27 Na afei, me babanyin, mehyɛ wo dɛ ma hɔn nsewdzi nye hɔn ahyɛmudzi nye hɔn nhyehyɛɛ wɔ hɔn nsumaamu ebusudze nyina nka hɔ; nyew, na hɔn nsɛnkyerɛdze nye hɔn anwanwadze nyina no dze mma mmfa nnkyerɛ dɔm yi mma wonnhu, amma ekyir yi hɔn so wɔannkɔ sum mu mma wɔannsɛɛ hɔn.

28 Na hwɛ, ndom aba asaase yi nyina do, na ɔnam Nyankopɔn no tum do bɛba dze ɔsɛɛ aba hɔn a wɔyɛ sum mu ndwuma no do, ber a hɔn bɔn adɔɔ so no; dɛm ntsi mennkɛpɛ dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ dɔm yi.

29 Dɛm ntsi fa dɛm nsumaamu nhyehyɛɛ no nye hɔn nsewdzi nye hɔn ahyɛmudzi no sie mma nkorɔfo yi nnhu, na hɔn emumuyɛdze nye hɔn ewudzi nye hɔn ebusudze nko na ma wonhu; na hom nkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ma wonkyir dɛm emumuyɛdze nye ekyiwadze nye ewudzi a ɔtsetse dɛm no; na hom nkyerɛ hɔn so dɛ ɔnam dɛm emumuyɛdze na ebusudze na ewudzi yi do na dɛm nkorɔfo yi ase tui.

30 Na hwɛ, wokum Ewuradze no nkɔnhyɛfo nyina a wɔbaa hɔn mu bɛdaa hɔn emumuyɛ edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn no; na hɔn a wokum hɔn no, hɔn bɔgyaa sũi frɛɛ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn dɛ ondzi hɔn a wodzii hɔn ewu no hɔn wer; na dɛm na Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu nam ba sum mu ndwumayɛfo nye nsumaamu fɛkuwbɔfo no hɔn do.

31 Nyew, na ndom nkã asaase no afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ mfa mma sum mu edwumayɛfo nye nsumaamu fɛkuwbɔfo no nkodu dɛ wɔbɔkɔ ɔsɛɛ mu mpo, gyedɛ wonu hɔnho ansaana hɔn ndzeyɛɛ bɔn no ebu do.

32 Na afei, me babanyin, kaa nsɛm a makã akyerɛ wo no, mma mmfa dɛm nsumaamu ndzɛmba yi a wɔahyehyɛ yi nnkyerɛ dɔm yi, na mbom kyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ma wonkyir bɔn nye emumuyɛ daapem.

33 Kã nnuho nye gyedzi wɔ Ewuradze Jesus Christ mu kyerɛ hɔn, kyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ma wɔmbrɛ hɔnho adze na wɔnyɛ botoo wɔ akoma mu; kyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ma wontum ngyina abɔnsam no nsɔhwɛ biara ano na wɔmfa hɔn gyedzi ntsim Ewuradze Jesus Christ do.

34 Kyerɛkyerɛ hɔn dɛ mma wɔmmfona wɔ ndwuma pa ne yɛ mu, na wɔndwe na wɔnyɛ botoo wɔ akoma mu; osiandɛ dɛm no bɛma woenya ahomgye ama hɔn akra.

35 O, kaa, me babanyin, na sũa nyansa wɔ wo mberantsɛber mu; nyew, sũa dɛ ibedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do wɔ wo mberantsɛber mu.

36 Nyew, sũ frɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ mboa biara a ihia ho; nyew, biribiara a ebɛyɛ biara, yɛ ma Ewuradze, na beebiara a ebɔkɔ biara kɔ wɔ Ewuradze mu; nyew, ma w’adwendwen nyina nkɔ Ewuradze do; nyew, ma w’akoma ndɔ Ewuradze afebɔɔ.

37 Enye Ewuradze mfa apam wɔ biribiara a ebɛyɛ ho, na obegya wo akɔ papa ho; nyew, sɛ erebɛda anafua a fa wo ho hyɛ Ewuradze nsa, ama ɔaahwɛ wo do wɔ wo ndaa mu; na sɛ esoɛr anapa so a ma ndaase nhyɛ w’akoma mu mã mma Nyankopɔn; na sɛ eyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a, wɔbɛma wo do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

38 Na afei, me babanyin, mowɔ biribi kã wɔ adze no a hɛn egyanom frɛ no adze korkorba no, anaadɛ ɔkyerɛakwan no ho—dza hɛn egyanom frɛɛ no Liahona, dza ne nkyerɛase nye kɔmpas no; na Ewuradze na ɔyɛe.

39 Na hwɛ, ɔdasanyi biara nnyi hɔ a obotum edzi edwin huhu soronko a ɔtse dɛm. Na hwɛ, wɔyɛe dze akyerɛ hɛn egyanom kwan a wɔmfa do mfa ntu hɔn kwan wɔ sar no do.

40 Na odzii dwuma maa hɔn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ Nyame mu tse; dɛm ntsi, sɛ wonyaa gyedzi dɛ Nyankopɔn botum ama dɛm adze no ne nsa no akyerɛ kwan a wɔmfa do, hwɛ, na ɔyɛe; dɛm ntsi wonyaa dɛm anwanwadze yi, nye anwanwadze binom so pii a Nyankopɔn nam no tum do yɛe fi ber to ber.

41 Ɛso ɔnam akwan ketseketse yi do ma etumdze yinom sisii, ɔmaa wohun anwanwadze. Wɔyɛɛ akwadwer, na hɔn werɛ fiir dɛ wɔbɛma hɔn gyedzi esi pi na wɔdze ayɛ edwuma na iyi maa dɛm dwuma nwanwa no twaree, na ɔmaa woenntu mpon wɔ hɔn akwantu no mu.

42 Dɛm ntsi, wɔtweɔnee wɔ sar no do, anaadɛ woennhu kwan tsen no ammfa do, na ɔkɔm nye nsukɔm dzee hɔn, osian hɔn mbrato ntsi.

43 Na afei, me babanyin, mepɛ dɛ etse ase dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom wɔ ne nsasodze; osiandɛ ber a hɛn egyanom yɛɛ akwadwer dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dza kɔmpas no bɛkyerɛ hɔn no (afei dɛm ndzɛmba yinom yɛ honam mu dze) wɔannyɛ prɔmprɔm; dɛmara so mpo na sunsum mu ndzɛmba so tse.

44 Na hwɛ, ɔyɛ mberɛw koraa dɛ ibetsie Christ n’asɛm no, dza ɔbɛkyerɛ wo kwan tɔɔtseen a wɔdze kɔ onnyiewiei enyigye mu, dɛ mbrɛ hɛn egyanom so wɔfaa kwan a kɔmpas no dze kyerɛɛ hɔn no, dza ɔkyerɛ hɔn kwan tɔɔtseen a ɔdze hɔn bɔkɔ anohoba asaase no do.

45 Na afei mese dɛ, ana ne saso nnyi dɛm adze yi mu? Na nokwar dɛ mbrɛ dɛm ɔkyerɛakwan yi kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom ma wɔfaa do dze kɔr anohoba asaase do no, dɛmara so na Christ ne nsɛm no, sɛ yɛfa do a ɔdze hɛn bɛtra dɛm awerɛhow bɔnsa yi do akɔ anohoba asaase a oye koraa do.

46 O me babanyin, mma hom mma yɛnnyɛ akwadwer osiandɛ kwan no yɛ mberɛw ntsi; osiandɛ dɛm na hɛn egyanom so yɛe; na dɛmara na wɔyɛe dze maa hɔn, ama sɛ wɔhwɛ a wɔaatsena ase; dɛmara na ɔtse dze ma hɛn so mpo. Woesiesie kwan no ato hɔ, na sɛ yɛhwɛ a yɛbɛtsena ase afebɔɔ.

47 Na afei, me babanyin, hwɛ ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn yinom do yie, nyew, hwɛ Nyankopɔn na tsena ase. Kɔ dɛm nkorɔfo yi nkyɛn na kɛda asɛm no edzi, na yɛ botoo. Me babanyin, nantseyie.
alma 38:
Mbrasɛm a Alma dze ma ne babanyin Shiblon.

Ne nyinara wɔ tsir 38.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 38[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wɔtseetsee Shiblon wɔ tseneneeyɛ ho—Nkwagye wɔ Christ mu, ɔno a ɔyɛ wiadze nkwa na kan—Hom w’adwen mu nkã tse do. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Me babanyin, tsie me nsɛm, na mekã dza mekãa kyerɛɛ Helaman no, kyerɛ wo so dɛ susuampaara dɛ ibedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do no, ebɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase yi do; na susuampaara dɛ innkedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do no, wobotwa wo efi n’enyim akyen.

2 Na afei me babanyin, megye dzi dɛ mibenya enyigye kɛse wɔ woho, osiandɛ egyina pintsinn na edze nokwar ama Nyame; na dɛ mbrɛ wo mberantsɛber mu ebɔkɔ do adan Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn no, dɛmara mpo so na mowɔ enyidado dɛ ebɔkɔ do edzi ne mbrasɛm do; na nhyira akã nyia obetsim ekodu ewiei.

3 Me ba, mese wo dɛ, menya enyigye wɔ woho dada, osian wo nokwardzi nye wo mbɔdzembɔ nye w’abotar, nye wo penkyɛr a inyae wɔ ber a ewɔ Zoramfo mu no ntsi.

4 Na minyim dɛ wɔkyekyeer wo; nyew, na minyim so dɛ wosiiw wo abo wɔ asɛm no ntsi; na inyaa abotar dze sɔɔw dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina osiandɛ nna Ewuradze kã woho; na afei inyim dɛ Ewuradze na oyii wo fii mu.

5 Na afei me babanyin, Shiblon, mepɛ dɛ ekaa dɛ mber dodow a edze wo werɛ twer Nyame mu no dɛmara so mpo na obeyi wo efi wo nsɔhwɛ, nye wo haw, nye w’amandzehu mu, na ɔbɛma wo do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

6 Afei, me babanyin, memmpɛ dɛ ebɔdwen dɛ emi mankasa na minyim dɛm ndzɛmba yinom, mbom Nyankopɔn no Sunsum a ɔwɔ mo mu no nna ɔma muhu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom; na sɛ Nyankopɔn annwo me a nkyɛ murunnhu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom.

7 Mbom hwɛ, Ewuradze nam n’ehumbɔbɔr do somaa no bɔfoe dɛ ɔmbɛkã nkyerɛ me dɛ mingyaa ɔsɛɛ ndwuma no wɔ no dɔm mu; nyew, na mehu ɔbɔfo enyim na enyim, na ɔnye me kasae, na ne ndze tse dɛ mbrɛ sor repaapaa mu, na ɔwosoow asaase nyinara.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ nda ebiasa nye adzesaa ebiasa nyinara mu nna me kra ruhu amandze yaayaw ma ɔrepen; na oenngyaa da, kesii dɛ musũi frɛɛ Ewuradze Jesus Christ dɛ onhu me mbɔbɔr, no mu na minyaa me a bɔnfakyɛ. Mbom hwɛ, musũi frɛɛ no na me kra nyaa asomdwee.

9 Na afei, me babanyin, makã akyerɛ wo dɛ sũa nyansa, ama esũa efi mo hɔ dɛ kwan fofor bi nnyi hɔ anaadɛ biribiara nnyi hɔ a wobodua do dze agye nyimpa nkwa, gyedɛ wɔnam Christ nko do. Hwɛ, ɔno nye nkwa nye wiadze kan no. Hwɛ, ɔno nye nokwar nye tsenenee asɛm no.

10 Na afei, dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛ ase rekyerɛkyerɛ asɛm no, dɛmara so mpo na mepɛ dɛ ebɔsɔw do akyerɛkyerɛ; na mepɛ dɛ ebɔ mbɔdzen na eyɛ botoo so wɔ adze nyina mu.

11 Hwɛ ma ammema woho do wɔ ahantanyɛ mu; nyew, hwɛ ma enntuw wɔ w’ankasa wo nyansaa mu, anaa wɔ w’ahoɔdzen kɛse mu.

12 Fa ndamyɛ, na mbom mma ɔnntra do; na hwɛ na hom w’adwen mu nkã tse so do aama ɔdɔ aahyɛ wo mã; hwɛ na yi enyihaw akwa.

13 Mma mmbɔ mpaa dɛ mbrɛ Zoramfo no yɛ no, na ehu dɛ wɔbɔ mpaa ma nyimpa atse ma wɔaakamfo hɔn nyansaa.

14 Mma nnkã dɛ: O Nyankopɔn, meda wo ase dɛ yeye sen hɛn enuanom; na mbom kã dɛ: O Ewuradze, fa m’esintɔ kyɛ me, na hu m’enuanom mbɔbɔr—nyew, hu w’esintɔ wɔ Nyame enyim aber nyina.

15 Na ma Ewuradze nhyira wo kra, na ɔngye wo nkɔ n’ahenman mu wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu, ama aakɛtsena hɔ asomdwee mu. Afei kɔ, me babanyin, na kɛkyerɛkyerɛ dɔm no asɛm no. Yɛ botoo. Me babanyin, nantseyie.
alma 39:
Alma ne mbrasɛm a ɔdze maa ne babanyin, Corianton.

Ofitsi etsir 39 dze kesi 42.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 39[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ndwamambɔ yɛ ekyiwadze kɛse—Corianton no bɔn no maa Zoramfo anngye asɛm no—Christ ne ɔpon no wɔ hɔ ma nokwafo a wodzii ne kan no. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, me babanyin, mowɔ nsɛm pii kã kyerɛ wo sen dza mekãa kyerɛɛ wo nua no; na hwɛ, ana innhun wo nuabanyin no ne nketsesi, nye no nokwardzi, nye no mbɔdzembɔ wɔ Nyame ne mbrasɛm ho? Hwɛ ɔnnyɛ mfatoho pa mmfa mma wo?

2 Na ɔwo annyɛ, setsie dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ amma me nsɛm dɛ mbrɛ wo nuabanyin no yɛe wɔ Zoramfo no mu no. Afei iyi na mowɔ dze tsia wo, ɔwo ekɔr do tuwii wɔ w’ahoɔdzen nye wo nyansaa mu.

3 Na nnyɛ ne nyina nye yi, me babanyin, ɔwo ayɛ biribi a medzi ho yaw; osiandɛ epoow ɔsomdwuma no, na ekɔr Siron asaase do wɔ Lamanfo no hɔn nkurotsia kedzii Isabel edwamambɔnyi no ekyir.

4 Nyew, ɔtwee dodowara hɔn akoma; na mbom iyi runntum nngye wo, me babanyin. Nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ eyɛ wo ɔsomdwuma no a wɔdze hyɛɛ wo nsa no.

5 Ana innyim, me babanyin, dɛ ndzɛmba yinom yɛ ekyiwadze wɔ Ewuradze enyim, nyew, ɔyɛ bɔn kɛse a ɔbor bɔn nyina do, gyedɛ obi a ɔkã obi a onndzi fɔ no bɔgyaa gu kwa anaa obi a ɔpow Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no?

6 Na hwɛ, sɛ epow Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no wɔ ber a ɔabɛtsena wo mu pɛn, na inyim dɛ apow no a, hwɛ iyi yɛ bɔn a onnyi fakyɛ; nyew, na obiara a odzi ewu tsia Nyankopɔn ne kan nye ne nyimdzee no, ɔbɛyɛ dzen ama no dɛ obenya bɔnfakyɛ; nyew, mese, ɔwo, me babanyin, ɔbɛyɛ dzen dɛ obenya bɔnfakyɛ.

7 Na afei, me babanyin, ɔbɛyɛ me dɛw wɔ Nyame mu dɛ inndzii fɔ wɔ dɛm bɔn akɛse yi ho; sɛ nnyɛ wo yieyɛ ntsi a nkyɛ merennkasa wo bɔn yi ho pii mmfa nnhaw wo kra.

8 Mbom hwɛ irunntum mmfa wo bɔn nnsuma Nyankopɔn; na gyedɛ inu woho, annyɛ dɛm a ɔbɛyɛ dasegye etsia wo wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

9 Afei, me babanyin, mepɛ dɛ inu woho na epow wo bɔn, na nnkedzi w’enyiwa n’akɔndɔbɔn ekyir bio, na mbom ebɛdan w’ekyir ama dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina; na gyedɛ eyɛ iyi, annyɛ dɛm a irunntum nnya Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no nnyɛ wodze. Ao, kaa, na gye to wo do, na dan w’ekyir ma dɛm ndzɛmba yinom.

10 Na mehyɛ wo dɛ ma ɔnyɛ wo ehiadze dɛ enye w’enuanom mpanyimfo no bɔdwen wɔ dza ebɛyɛ biara ho; na hwɛ, ewɔ wo mberantsɛber mu, na ohia dɛ w’enuanom no tsetse wo. Na tsie hɔn afotu.

11 Ma mma woho kwan ma egyangyandze anaa nkwaseadze biara nntwe wo nnkɔ; ma mma kwan ma abɔnsam nntwe w’akoma mmfa nnkedzi dɛm ndwamambɔfo emumuyɛfo no ekyir bio. O me babanyin, hwɛ bɔn kɛse a edze aba Zoramfo do; na ber a wohun wo suban no na ɔmaa wɔanngye me nsɛm no enndzi.

12 Na afei Ewuradze no Sunsum se me dɛ: Hyɛ wo mba no ma wɔnyɛ papa, amma wɔanntwe nkorɔfo pii hɔn akoma annkɔ ɔsɛɛ mu; dɛm ntsi mehyɛ wo, me babanyin, wɔ Nyankopɔn ho suro mu, dɛ twe woho fi wo emumuyɛ ho;

13 Ama edze w’adwen, w’ahom, nye w’ahoɔdzen nyina aadan akɔ Ewuradze nkyɛn; amma anntwe ɔdodow hɔn akoma ma wɔannyɛ emumuyɛdze bio; na mbom san kɔ hɔn nkyɛn bio kɛkã wo mfom nye bɔn a ayɛ kyerɛ hɔn.

14 Mma mmper nnhwehwɛ sika anaa wiadze yi mu egyangyandze; na hwɛ irunntum mmfa nnka woho nnkɔ.

15 Na afei, me babanyin, mepɛ dɛ mekã biribi a ɔfa Christ ne mbae ho kyerɛ wo. Hwɛ, mese wo dɛ nokwar, ɔno na ɔbɛba ebeyi wiadze bɔn akɔ; nyew, ɔreba abɛda nkwagye ho enyigyesɛm edzi akyerɛ no nkorɔfo.

16 Na afei, me babanyin, iyi nye ɔsomdwuma no a wɔfrɛɛ wo ho no, ama aakɛda asɛm a oye yi edzi akyerɛ nkorɔfo yi, dze esiesie hɔn adwen; ama woeenya nkwagye, ma woesiesie hɔn mba hɔn adwen ma woeetsie asɛm no wɔ ber a ɔbɛba no mu.

17 Na afei mobɔboa wo kakra wɔ dɛm asɛm yi ho. Hwɛ, ɔbɛyɛ wo nwanwa dɛ wobohu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom dadaada ansaana esi. Hwɛ mese wo dɛ ana ɔkra a ɔtse ase aber yi mu nnsom bo mma Nyankopɔn dɛ ɔkra a ɔbɛtsena ase wɔ aber a ɔbɛba no mu?

18 Ana onnhia dɛ wɔbɛma nkorɔfo yi atse ɔpon ho nhyehyɛɛ no na hɔn mba so atse no dɛmara?

19 Ana ɔnnyɛ mberɛw mma Ewuradze wɔ aber yi mu dɛ ɔbɔsoma no bɔfoe ma ɔabɛda dɛm enyigyesɛm yi edzi akyerɛ hɛn nye hɛn mba, anaa tse dɛ mber a ɔdze bɛba no ekyir?
alma 40:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 40[/font_size][/center]

[i]Christ dze owusoɛr brɛ adasamba nyina—Atseneneefo a woewuwu no kɔ paradise na emumuyɛfo no so kɔ ekyirekyir sum mu rokɔtweɔn hɔn wusoɛr da no—Wɔdze ndzɛmba nyina san anan mu dze hɔn akɔ hɔn tsebea a odzi mu no mu wɔ Owusoɛr no mu. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei me babanyin, iyi nye dza mepɛ dɛ mekã kyerɛ wo bio; osiandɛ muhu dɛ w’adwen rehaw wo wɔ dza ɔfa owusoɛr no ho.

2 Hwɛ mese wo dɛ owusoɛr nnyi hɔ—anaa, dza mebɛkã nye dɛ, ɔnnkyebo yi nntum mmfa bɛkyebo nnhyɛ, dza ɔprɔw yi remmfa dza ɔmmprɔw nnhyɛ kɛpem Christ ne mbae ekyir no ana.

3 Hwɛ, ɔno na ɔdze owusoɛr no bɛba. Mbom hwɛ, me babanyin, owusoɛr no nnyaa mmbae. Afei, merekã esumasɛm akyerɛ wo; eso, esumasɛm pii wɔ hɔ a wɔdze esuma a obiara nnyim gyedɛ Nyankopɔn no ara. Mbom mebɛkyerɛ wo adze kor bi a mibisaa fii Nyame hɔ enyiber do dɛ ɔmma munhu—ɔno nye dza ɔfa owusoɛr ho.

4 Hwɛ wɔahyehyɛ aber bi ato hɔ a obiara bɔsoɛr efi owu mu. Afei dɛm aber no dze obiara nnyim; na mbom Nyankopɔn nyim dɛm aber no.

5 Afei dɛ ɔbɛyɛ kor, anaa mpɛn ebien, anaa mpɛn ebiasa a nyimpa bɔsoɛr efi owu mu no dze ɔmmfa ho koraa; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn nyim ndzɛmba yinom nyina; na ɔyɛ me enyigye dɛ minyim dɛ dɛm na asɛm no tse—dɛ wɔahyehyɛ aber ato hɔ a obiara bɔsoɛr efi owu mu.

6 Afei ɔsɛ dɛ mber bi bɛda owu nye owusoɛr ntamu.

7 Na afei mibebisa dza ɔbɛba akra do fitsi dɛm owuber yi mu dze kesi aber a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ dze ama owusoɛrber no.

8 Afei sɛ aber a wɔahyehyɛ dze ama adasa dɛ wɔbɔsoɛr no bor kor mpo a ɔmmfa ho; osiandɛ nyimpa nyina mmbɔmu nnwu da kor, na iyi mmfa ho koraa; ne nyina yɛ da kor ma Nyankopɔn, na mber wɔ hɔ ma adasamba nko.

9 Dɛm ntsi, wɔahyehyɛ aber ato hɔ ama nyimpa dɛ wɔbɔsoɛr efi owu mu; na mber da owu nye owusoɛr ntamu. Na afei, ɔfa dɛm mber yi ho, dza ɔbɛba adasa hɔn akra do nye adze a mebisa Ewuradze enyiber do dɛ mepɛ dɛ muhu; na iyi nye adze a minyim.

10 Na sɛ aber no sõ dɛ obiara bɔsoɛr a, nna wobohu dɛ Nyankopɔn nyim mber nyina a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ ama nyimpa.

11 Afei, ɔfa ɔkra ne tsebew wɔ owu na owusoɛr ntamu no—Hwɛ, ɔbɔfo ama mehu dɛ sɛ nyimpa wu a ntsɛmara hɔn esunsum fi no nyimpadua a ɔnnkyebo yi mu, nyew, nyimpa nyina hɔn esunsum, dɛ wɔyɛ papa anaa bɔn no, san kɔ fie wɔ Nyankopɔn a ɔdze nkwa no maa hɔn no ne nkyɛn.

12 Nna afei ɔbɛba dɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ atseneneefo no, wɔbɛgye hɔn esunsum akɔ enyigye tsebew a wɔfrɛ no paradise, ahomgye tsebew na, asomdwee tsebew mu, hɔ na wɔbɔhom efi hɔn haw, nye adwendwen, nye awerɛhow nyina mu.

13 Nna afei ɔbɛba dɛ emumuyɛfo hɔn esunsum, nyew, ndzebɔnyɛfo no—na hwɛ wonnyi kyɛfa biara wɔ Ewuradze no Sunsum mu; osiandɛ hwɛ, wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ndwuma bɔn kyɛn ndwuma pa; dɛm ntsi abɔnsam no sunsum kɛhɛɛn hɔn mu, na ɔfaa hɔn fie—na iyinom na wɔbɔtow hɔn egu ekyirekyir sum mu; hɔ na osũ, nye nkekamu, nye asetwɛr wɔ, na iyi bɛyɛ hɔ osian hɔnankasa hɔn emumuyɛ a ɔnam abɔnsam ne pɛ do dze hɔn kɔr ndɔmmum mu no ntsi.

14 Afei iyi nye emumuyɛfo hɔn esunsum ne tsebew, nyew, wɔ sum nye tsebew a ɔyɛ hu mu, na wɔdze suro bɔhwɛ Nyankopɔn n’ebufuhyew a ɔredzɛw wɔ hɔn do no; na wɔbɛtsena dɛm tsebew yi mu daa, dɛm na atseneneefo no so bɛtsena paradise, ekesi hɔn owusoɛrber.

15 Afei, binom wɔ hɔ a hɔn ntseasee kyerɛ dɛ dɛm ɔkra n’enyigye na n’awerɛhow tsebew yi a ɔwɔ mu ansaana owusoɛr aba no yɛ owusoɛr a odzi kan. Nyew, megye to mu dɛ wobotum afrɛ sunsum anaa ɔkra a worinyan no akɔ n’enyigye anaa n’awerɛhow gyinabew no owusoɛr dɛ mbrɛ wɔakã no.

16 Na hwɛ, wɔakã no bio dɛ owusoɛr a odzi kan wɔ hɔ, owusoɛr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma hɔn a wɔaba kɔ, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ sesei, nye hɔn a wɔbɛba, dze kesi aber a Christ bɔsoɛr efi owu mu.

17 Afei, yennsusu dɛ owusoɛr yi a wɔakã ho asɛm yi botum ayɛ akra hɔn wusoɛr, dza ɔdze hɔn bɔkɔ enyigye na awerɛhow tsebew mu. Irunntum nnsusu dɛ ɔtse dɛm.

18 Hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, Oho; mbom ɔkyerɛ ɔkra nye nyimpadua nkabɔmu no, ɔfa hɔn a wɔtsenaa ase fi Adam n’aber do dze besi Christ no wusoɛr no.

19 Afei, sɛ hɔn a wɔakã hɔnho asɛm no hɔn nyina hɔn akra nye hɔn nyimpadua bɛkã abɔmu prɛko, emumuyɛfo nye atseneneefo nyina, mennkã dɛm dze; na yɛmfa no dɛ hɔn nyina bɔsoɛr aba; anaa yɛbɛkã dɛ hɔn wusoɛr bedzi kan ansaana hɔn a wobowu wɔ Christ no wusoɛr ekyir no so aba.

20 Afei, me babanyin, mennka dɛ ber a Christ bɔsoɛr no nna hɔn so wɔbɔsoɛr; mbom hwɛ, mankasa m’adwen na medze rekã dɛ atseneneefo hɔn akra nye hɔn nyimpadua bɛkã abɔmu ber a Christ bɔsoɛr na ɔafow akɔ sor no.

21 Mbom sɛ iyi besi no wusoɛrber no mu anaa n’ekyir a, morunntum nnkã; na mbom dza mobotum akã ara nye dɛ mber da owu nye nyimpadua no nsoɛree fi owu mu no ntamu, na ɔkra n’enyigye anaa n’awerɛhow tsebew no ekodu aber a Nyankopɔn ahyehyɛ ato hɔ dɛ ewufo bɔsoɛr na hɔn akra nye hɔn nyimpadua bɛkã abɔmu, ma wɔdze hɔn aba ebegyina Nyankopɔn enyim, ma woeebu hɔn atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse.

22 Nyew, iyi nye nsanananmu no a nkɔnhyɛfo no dze hɔn ano kãa ho nsɛm no.

23 Wɔdze ɔkra bɛsan ama nyimpadua no, na nyimpadua no so asan ama ɔkra no; nyew, na wobenya nsa na anan dze ama nyimpadua no; nyew, nhwi kor mpo rennyew; mbom ndzɛmba nyina bɛsananmu esisi ne sibew ma edzi mu.

24 Na afei, me babanyin, iyi nye nsanananmu no a nkɔnhyɛfo no dze hɔn ano kãe—

25 Na afei atseneneefo no bɛhyerɛn wɔ Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no mu.

26 Mbom hwɛ, owu huhu bi reba emumuyɛfo do; na wobowu ama tsenenee ndzɛmba; osiandɛ hɔnho nntsew, na adze a noho nntsew biara runntum nntsena Nyankopɔn n’ahenman mu; na mbom wobotwa hɔn akyen, na wɔama woekedzi hɔn ndwuma n’eduaba no, a ɔyɛ bɔn no; na wɔanom ɔwemba kuraba no ano.
alma 41:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 41[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nyimpa benya enyigye a onnyi ewiei anaa awerɛhow a onnyi ewiei tsebew wɔ Owusoɛr no mu—Emumuyɛdze nnyɛ enyigyedze ara da—Hɔn a wɔyɛ honam ndwuma no nnyi Nyame wɔ wiadze yi mu—Nyimpa biara benya no su nye ndzɛmba a nna nkyɛ ɔwɔ no wɔ dɛm asetsena a ɔnnkye bo a yɛwɔ mu yi bio wɔ Nsanananmu. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, me babanyin, mowɔ biribi kã kyerɛ wo wɔ nsanananmu no a wɔakã ho asɛm no ho; na hwɛ, binom adandan kyerɛwsɛm no na wɔaman efi ho koraa osian dɛm adze yi ho ntsi. Na muhu dɛ wo so w’adwen ahaw wo wɔ dɛm adze yi ho. Mbom hwɛ, merebɛkyerɛ mu akyerɛ wo.

2 Mekã kyerɛ wo, me babanyin, dɛ nsanananmu ho nhyehyɛɛ yi hia Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛrdzi; osiandɛ ohia dɛ ndzɛmba nyina wɔdze sananan mu dze sisi hɔn sibew. Hwɛ, ohia na ɔtsen dɛ mbrɛ Christ no tum nye no wusoɛr no kyerɛ, dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze nyimpa ne kra san ma ne nyimpadua no, na wɔdze nyimpadua ne mfafakuwa biara san ma no.

3 Na ɔyɛ adzehia wɔ Nyankopɔn pɛrpɛrdzi do dɛ wobu nyimpa atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse; na sɛ hɔn nkwa nda yi mu ndwuma ye, na hɔn akoma mu so ye a, wɔbɛsan so ama hɔn wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu no, dza oye.

4 Na sɛ hɔn ndwuma muo a wɔbɛsan ama hɔn dza omuo. Dɛm ntsi, ndzɛmba nyina wɔdze sananan mu dze esisi hɔn sibew, adze biara besi ne sibew dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse dada no—dza ɔnnkye bo bɔsoɛr ayɛ bɛkyebo, dza ɔprɔw akɔ dza ɔmmprɔw bio—wobenyan hɔn akɔ enyigye a onnyi ewiei mu ma wɔaakɛtsena Nyankopɔn n’ahenman mu, anaa wɔbɔkɔ awerɛhow a onnyi ewiei mu akɛtsena abɔnsam n’ahenman mu, kor bɔkɔ afã, na kor so akɔ afã—

5 Kor bɔsoɛr akɔ enyigye mu dɛ mbrɛ ne pɛ ɔwɔ wɔ enyigye ho tse no, anaa ɔbɔkɔ bea a oye dɛ mbrɛ ne pɛ a ɔwɔ no wɔ papa ne yɛ ho tse; na kor no so bɔkɔ bea a omuo dɛ mbrɛ ne pɛ a ɔwɔ bɔn ho tse no, na dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dza omuo daa nyina no, dɛmara so mpo na sɛ adzesaa no ba a obenya n’akatua a omuo.

6 Na dɛm na ɔtse wɔ afã so. Sɛ onuu noho wɔ no bɔn ho, na ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dza ɔtsen dze ekesi no nkwa nda ewiei a, dɛmara so na wɔdze tsenenee botua no kaw.

7 Woyinom nye hɔn a Ewuradze apon hɔn no; nyew, woyinom nye hɔn a oeyi hɔn efi mu epuei, oeyi hɔn efi dɛm sum adzesaa a onnyi ewiei no mu; na dɛm na wobegyina anaa wɔbɔhwe ase; na hwɛ, wɔyɛ hɔnara hɔn atsɛmbuafo, dɛ wɔbɛyɛ papa anaa bɔn.

8 Afei, Nyankopɔn ne ɔmom no dze ɔnnsakyer da; dɛm ntsi, oesiesie kwan no ato hɔ dɛ obiara a ɔbɛfa do no benya nkwagye.

9 Na afei hwɛ, me babanyin, mma nnyɛ bɔn kor mpo bio mmfa nntsia Nyankopɔn wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ ho botae yinom ho, dɛm bɔn a ayɛ pɛn no.

10 Mma nndwen dɛ osiandɛ wɔakã biribi a ɔfa nsanananmu ho ntsi, dɛm no bɛma bɔn asan akɔ enyigye mu. Hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, emumuyɛdze nnyɛ enyigyedze ara da.

11 Na afei, me babanyin, adasa nyina wɔ honam tsebew mu, anaa mebɛkã dɛ, wɔwɔ honam su asetsena mu no, wɔtse bɔnwen wenwen mu nye emumuyɛ mpokyerɛ mu; wonnyi Nyame wɔ wiadze yi mu, na wɔaman efi Nyame no su ho; dɛm ntsi, hɔn tsebew nye enyigye gyinabew bɔ ebira.

12 Na afei hwɛ; ana kasafua nsanananmu n’asekyerɛ nye dɛ wɔbɛsesa adze bi no su ayɛ no fofor, anaa wobeyi adze bi efi ne sibew ekesi bea fofor bi do?

13 O, me babanyin, ɔnntse dɛm; mbom kasafua nsanananmu no n’ase nye dɛ wɔbɛma bɔn abɛyɛ bɔn bio; anaa honam su abɛyɛ honam su; anaa mbɔnsamdze abɛyɛ mbɔnsamdze; papayɛ abɛyɛ papayɛ; tseneneeyɛ abɛyɛ tseneneeyɛ; pɛrpɛrdzi abɛyɛ pɛrpɛrdzi; mbɔbɔrhu abɛyɛ mbɔbɔrhu bio.

14 Dɛm ntsi, me babanyin, hwɛ na hu w’enuanom mbɔbɔr; dzi pɛrpɛr, bu atsɛntsenenee, na yɛ papa daa nyina; na sɛ eyɛ iyinom nyina a nna wo nsa bɛkã w’akatua; nyew, na wɔdze ehumbɔbɔr bɛsan ama wo bio; wɔdze pɛrpɛrdzi bɛsan ama wo bio; na wɔdze tsenenee atsɛmbu bɛsan ama wo bio; na wɔdze papa botua wo kaw.

15 Na dza edze ma no bɛsan aba wo hɔ bio, na wɔdze asananan mu; dɛm ntsi, kasa nsanananmu no bu dzebɔnyɛnyi fɔ, na ommbu no bem bi.
alma 42:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 42[/font_size][/center]

[i]Asetsena a ɔnnkye bo yi yɛ nsɔhwɛber ama nyimpa eetum enu noho na ɔasom Nyankopɔn—Asehwe no dze honam nye sunsum mu owu baa adasamba nyina do—Ɔpon nam nnuho do ba—Nyankopɔn Nankasa abɔ werdam dze ama wiadze bɔn—Ehumbɔbɔr wɔ hɔ ma hɔn a wonu hɔnho—Hɔn a wɔaka no nyina hyɛ Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛrdzi ase—Osian Werdambɔ no ntsi na ehumbɔbɔr ba—Nyia oenu noho nokwar mu no na wɔbɛgye no nkwa. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, me babanyin, muhu dɛ biribi bio wɔ hɔ a ɔhaw w’adwen a inntum nntse ase—dza ɔfa Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛrdzi wɔ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi n’asotwe ho; na erohwehwɛ esusu dɛ ɔnnyɛ dɛ wɔbɛma ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi akɔ awerɛhow tsebew mu.

2 Afei hwɛ, me babanyin, merebɛkyerɛ wo dɛm adze yi ase. Na hwɛ, ber a Ewuradze Nyankopɔn somaa hɛn awofo a wodzii kan no fii Eden ture no mu dɛ wɔnkɔdɔw asaase no a woyii hɔn fii mu bae no—nyew, oyii nyimpa no fii hɔ, na ɔdze cherubfo gyinaa Eden ture no boka afamu na, ɔdze nkrantsee a gya wɔ ano a wohima no kɔ beebiara no dze bɔɔ nkwadua no ho ban—

3 Afei, yehu dɛ nyimpa abɛyɛ dɛ Nyame, na onyim papa na bɔn; na bɛyɛ na ɔatsen ne nsa, na ɔatsew nkwadua no so bi edzi na ɔatsena ase afebɔɔ, ntsi Ewuradze Nyankopɔn dze cherubfo a ɔdze nkrantsee a ogya wɔ ano gyinaa hɔ amma oennkedzi eduaba no bi—

4 Na dɛm ma yehu dɛ wɔama nyimpa mber bi dɛ ɔmfa nnu noho, nyew, nsɔhwɛber, mber a ɔmfa nnu noho na ɔmfa nsom Nyankopɔn.

5 Na hwɛ, sɛ Adam tseen ne nsa ntsɛmara na ɔtseew nkwadua do eduaba no bi dzii a nkyɛ ɔtsenaa ase afebɔɔ dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn n’asɛm se, na nkyɛ oennya mber biara ammfa ennu noho; nyew, na Nyankopɔn n’asɛm so yɛɛ gyan, na nkwagye ho nhyehyɛɛ no so yɛɛ gyan.

6 Mbom hwɛ wɔahyehyɛ dɛ otwar dɛ nyimpa wu—dɛm ntsi, ber a wɔpaam nyimpa fii nkwadua no ho no, ɔsɛ dɛ wotwa no fi asaase yi enyi do kyen koraa—na nyimpa ayew afebɔɔ, nyew, na nyimpa ahwe ase.

7 Na afei, inyim dɛ iyi ho ntsi wotwaa hɛn awofo a wodzii kan no fii Ewuradze enyim kyenee wɔ honam nye sunsum nyina afamu; na dɛm ma yehu dɛ wɔbɛyɛɛ nkowaa dze maa hɔnara hɔn pɛ.

8 Afei hwɛ, nna onnhia dɛ woyi nyimpa fi honam mu owu mu, osiandɛ nkyɛ dɛm no bɛsɛɛ enyigye ho nhyehyɛɛ kɛse no.

9 Dɛm ntsi, dɛ ɔkra nnwu da no, na asehwe no dze sunsum nye honam mu owu nyina aba adasamba do no kyerɛ dɛ woetwa hɔn efi Ewuradze enyim akyen, na okehiaa dɛ woyi adasamba fi dɛm sunsum mu owu yi mu.

10 Dɛm ntsi, osiandɛ wɔabɛyɛ honam dze ntsi, wotsenn hɔn akɔndɔdze nye mbɔnsamdze, osian nyimpa su no ntsi, na dɛm nsɔhwɛber yi abɛyɛ tsebew a no mu na wɔdze siesie hɔnho; na abɛyɛ ahosiesie tsebew.

11 Na afei, kaa, me babanyin, sɛ nnyɛ ɔpon nhyehyɛɛ yi a, (sɛ wɔdze to nkyɛn a) nkyɛ ber a wowui ara pɛr nna hɔn akra yɛɛ mbɔbɔr osiandɛ woetwa hɔn efi Ewuradze enyim akyen.

12 Na afei, nna kwan biara nnyi hɔ a wobodua do dze eyi nyimpa efi dɛm asehwe tsebew yi mu, dza nyimpa nam n’asokyew do dze aba no do no.

13 Dɛm ntsi, dɛ mbrɛ pɛrpɛrdzi tse no, ɔpon ho nhyehyɛɛ no runntum mmba mu, gyedɛ wɔ nnuho ne ngyinado ma nyimpa wɔ nsɔhwɛber yi mu, nyew, wɔ nsɔhwɛber yi mu; osiandɛ gyedɛ ngyinado yinom do, annyɛ dɛm a ehumbɔbɔr runntum nnyɛ n’edwuma dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ, gyedɛ ɔsɛɛ pɛrpɛrdzi no ndwuma. Afei worunntum nsɛɛ pɛrpɛrdzi no ndwuma no; sɛ dɛm a, nna nkyɛ Nyankopɔn begyaa dɛ ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn.

14 Na dɛm na ɔma yehu dɛ adasamba nyina ahwe ase, na wɔhyɛ pɛrpɛrdzi ne nsamu; nyew, Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛrdzi no a ɔbɛma woetwa hɔn efi n’enyim akyen afebɔɔ no.

15 Na afei, ehumbɔbɔr ho nhyehyɛɛ no runntum mmba mu, gyedɛ wɔnam werdambɔ do; dɛm ntsi Nyankopɔn nankasa dze noho ayɛ werdambɔ dze ama wiadze bɔn nyina, ama ehumbɔbɔr ho nhyehyɛɛ no aaba abɛpata pɛrpɛrdzi n’ahwehwɛdze, ama Nyankopɔn aayɛ Nyame a odzi mu, Nyame a ɔtsen, nye Nyame a ɔwɔ ehumbɔbɔr so.

16 Afei, nnuho runntum mmba gyedɛ asotwe wɔ hɔ, no so yɛ onnyiewiei dɛ mbrɛ ɔkra no nkwa so wɔ dɛ ɔyɛ tse, na dza ɔnye enyigye ho nhyehyɛɛ bɔ ebira no so yɛ onnyiewiei dɛ mbrɛ ɔkra no nkwa so tse.

17 Afei, osi dɛn na nyimpa nu noho gyedɛ ɔayɛ bɔn? Osi dɛn yɛ bɔn sɛ mbra nnyi hɔ a? Osi dɛn na mbra wɔ hɔ gyedɛ asotwe bi wɔ hɔ?

18 Afei, wɔahyehyɛ asotwe ato hɔ, na wɔdze pɛrpɛrdzi mbra ama, dza ɔhaw nyimpa ne tsibowa ma onya nnuho.

19 Afei, sɛ wɔnnhyehyɛɛ mbra mmae—dɛ sɛ nyimpa dzi ewu a no so bowu a—ana sɛ odzi ewu a obosuro dɛ obowu?

20 Na eso sɛ wɔnnhyehyɛɛ mbra mmae a otsia bɔn a, nkyɛ nyimpa runnsuro dɛ wɔbɛyɛ bɔn.

21 Na sɛ wɔnnhyehyɛɛ mbra mmae a, nkyɛ sɛ nyimpa yɛ bɔn a ebɛnadze na pɛrpɛrdzi anaa ehumbɔbɔr bɛyɛ, ana wɔwɔ tum bi wɔ nyimpa do?

22 Mbom wɔahyehyɛ mbra ama, na wɔahyehyɛ asotwe so ato hɔ, na wɔama nnuho ho kwan; nnuho no a ehumbɔbɔr wɔ do tum no; nnyɛ dɛm a pɛrpɛrdzi nya tum wɔ nyimpa do ma mbra yɛ n’edwuma, na mbra no na ɔtwe aso; sɛ nnyɛ dɛm a nkyɛ pɛrpɛrdzi no ndwuma bɛsɛɛ, na Nyankopɔn rennda ho nnyɛ Nyankopɔn bio.

23 Mbom Nyankopɔn nngyaa dɛ ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn, na ehumbɔbɔr enya tum wɔ nyia oenya nnuho do, na ehumbɔbɔr nam werdambɔ no do ba; na werdambɔ no na ɔma owusoɛr ba; na owusoɛr no na ɔdze nyimpa bɛsan akɔ Nyankopɔn enyim; na dɛm ntsi wɔsan kɔ n’enyim, ma woebu hɔn atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse, dɛ mbrɛ mbra nye pɛrpɛrdzi so tse.

24 Na hwɛ, pɛrpɛrdzi ne nsa akã dza ɔrohwehwɛ nyina, na ehumbɔbɔr so afa dza ɔyɛ nankasa nedze nyina; na iyi ntsi, hɔn a wonu hɔnho nokwar mu nko na wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa.

25 Ana isusu dɛ ehumbɔbɔr botum ewia pɛrpɛrdzi? Mese wo dɛ, Oho; orunnwia no ketseketse mpo. Sɛ ɔba no dɛm a nkyɛ Nyankopɔn begyaa dɛ ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn.

26 Na dɛm na Nyankopɔn bɛma ne onnyiewiei tsirmpɔw kɛse no a ɔyɛe fitsi wiadze ne fapem no aba mu. Na dɛm so na ɔbɛma adasa hɔn nkwagye nye ɔpon nye hɔn nsɛe na hɔn awerɛhow no so aba.

27 Dɛm ntsi, O me babanyin, obiara a ɔpɛ no ɔmbra na ɔmbɔnom nkwa nsu no kwa; na obiara so a ɔremmba no wɔrennhyɛ no; na mbom da a odzi ewiei no wɔdze bɛsan ama no dɛ ma ne ndzeyɛɛ tse.

28 Sɛ ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔyɛ bɔn, na oennu noho wɔ no nkwa nda mber mu a, hwɛ, wɔdze bɔn bɛyɛ no, dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn ne nsanananmu no tse.

29 Na afei, me babanyin, memmpɛ dɛ ebɛma dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ahaw wo bio, na mbom ma wo bɔn no nhaw wo araa nkesi dɛ ibenya nnuho.

30 O me babanyin, memmpɛ dɛ ebɛgye Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛrdzi no ho kyim bio. Mma osian wo bɔn ntsi, mmper dɛ ebɔhwehwɛ biribi ketseketse bi egyina do dze agye woho, dɛ ebɛgye Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛrdzi no ho kyim; na mbom ma Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛrdzi nye n’ehumbɔbɔr, nye ne penkyɛr no nya tum a odzi mu wɔ w’akoma mu; na ma ho kwan ma ɔntwe wo nsian famu nkɔ huntuma mu wɔ ahobrɛadze mu.

31 Na afei, O me babanyin, Nyankopɔn afrɛ wo dɛ kã n’asɛm no kyerɛ nkorɔfo yi. Na afei, me babanyin, kɔ, na fa nokwar nye botooyɛ kɛkã asɛm no, ama akra eenya nnuho, ama ehumbɔbɔr nhyehyɛɛ kɛse no eenya hɔn do tum. Na ma Nyankopɔn nyɛ mma wo dɛ mbrɛ me nsɛm so mpo se. Amen.
alma 43:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 43[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma na ne mbabanyin kã asɛm no—Zoramfo na Nephifo etuatsewfo binom bɛyɛ Lamanfo—Lamanfo tu Nephifo do sa—Moroni dze bambɔ ho akodze ma Nephifo—Ewuradze da nhyehyɛɛ a Lamanfo ayɛ edzi kyerɛ Alma—Nephifo bɔ hɔn efi, ahotɔ, ebusua ebusua na nyamesom ho ban—Moroni na Lehi nsordaafo twa Lamanfo ho hyia. Bɛyɛ mfe 74 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Alma ne mbabanyin no kɔr dɔm no hɔn mu kɛkãa asɛm no kyerɛɛ hɔn. Na Alma nankasa so nna onntum nntsena koraa, ntsi no so kɔr hɔ bi.

2 Afei yɛrennkã biribi a ɔfa hɔn nsɛmpakã no ho bio, ɔnoara nye dɛ wɔkãa asɛm no nye nokwar no dɛ mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛ sunsum na nyikyerɛ tse; na wɔkãa nsɛmpa no dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn ne nhyehyɛɛ krɔnkrɔn no a wɔnam do dze afrɛ hɔn no tse.

3 Na afei meresan m’ekyir akã akõkoekõ no a osii Nephifo nye Lamanfo ntamu wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn afe a otsĩa duawɔtwe mu no ho asɛm.

4 Na hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ Zoramfo no bɛyɛɛ Lamanfo; dɛm ntsi, afe duawɔtwe n’ahyɛse no Nephifo dɔm no hun dɛ Lamanfo reba hɔn do; dɛm ntsi wɔboaboaa hɔnho dɛ wɔbɔko; nyew, wɔboaboaa hɔn nsordaafo ano wɔ Jershon asaase do.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no dze hɔn mpempem bae; na wɔbaa Antionum asaase a ɔyɛ Zoramfo hɔn asaase no do; na ɔbarimba bi a wɔfrɛ no Zerahemnah na ɔyɛ hɔn ɔkandzifo.

6 Na afei, osiandɛ Amalekifo no yɛ emumuyɛfo nye ewudzifo kɛse kyɛn Lamanfo no ntsi, Zerahemnah dze asahen ekunyin sisii Lamanfo no do, na hɔn nyinara yɛ Amalekifo nye Zoramfo.

7 Afei iyi na ɔyɛe ama wɔada ho atan Nephifo no; na oeetum so dze hɔn abɛhyɛ n’ase dɛ mbrɛ ɔrohwehwɛ no ara pɛr.

8 Na hwɛ, ne pɛ ara nye dɛ obonunu Lamanfo no ma woenya ebufuw wɔ Nephifo ho; na iyi na ɔyɛe ama oeenya tum kɛse wɔ hɔn do, na oeenya tum so wɔ Nephifo do dze atwe hɔn akɔ nkowaasom mu.

9 Na afei Nephifo no dze, dza wɔrohwehwɛ ara nye dɛ wɔbɔbɔ hɔn asaase, nye hɔn adan, nye hɔn yernom, na hɔn mba ho ban efi hɔn atamfo nsa; na wɔbɔ hɔn kyɛfa na ndzinoa ho ban, nyew, nye hɔn ahotɔ so ho ban, ama wɔaasom hɔn Nyankopɔn wɔ kwan a wɔpɛ do.

10 Na wonyim dɛ sɛ wɔkɔtɔ Lamanfo nsamu a, ɔno obiara a ɔbɔsom Nyankopɔn no wɔ sunsum nye nokwar mu no, nokwar tseasefo Nyame no, Lamanfo no bɛsɛɛ no.

11 Nyew, na wonyim okyir kɛse so a Lamanfo no dze kyir hɔn enuanom Anti-Nephi-Lehifo no, hɔn a wɔfrɛ hɔn Ammon no nkorɔfo no—na hɔn dze wɔse worunnsuo akodze biara mu, nyew, woedzi ahyɛmu ntsi wɔnnkɛpɛ dɛ wɔtõ—dɛm ntsi, sɛ wɔkɔtɔ Lamanfo nsamu a, wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn.

12 Na Nephifo no so remma kwan mma wɔnnsɛɛ hɔn; dɛm ntsi wɔmaa hɔn nsaase dɛ wɔmfa nyɛ hɔn egyapadze.

13 Na Ammon no nkorɔfo no dze hɔn ahodze ne kɛse ama Nephifo no dɛ wɔmfa nyɛn hɔn nsordaafo; na dɛm ama aba no dɛ Nephifo nko na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔnye Lamanfo no dzi esi, hɔn nye Laman nye Lemuel na Ishmael ne mbabanyin no a wɔakã hɔnho abɔmu no, nye hɔn a wɔtseew etua fii Nephifo mu no, hɔn a wɔyɛ Amalekifo, nye Zoramfo, nye Noah n’asɔfoe hɔn asefo no.

14 Afei dɛm asefo yi hɔn dodow reyɛ ayɛ dɛ Nephifo no hɔn dodow; na ɔbaa dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ Nephifo no nye hɔn enuanom no dzi esi araa kesi dɛ wɔkã bɔgya mpo gu.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo boaa hɔn ano wɔ Antionum asaase do no, hwɛ, nna Nephifo hɔn nsordaafo so aboaboa hɔnho dɛ wobehyia hɔn wɔ Jershon asaase do.

16 Afei Nephifo hɔn ɔkandzifo, anaadɛ ɔbarimba no a wɔayɛ no ɔsahen panyin wɔ Nephifo hɔn nsordaafo do no—afei dɛm ɔsahen panyin yi na ɔhwɛ Nephifo nsordaafo no nyinara do—na ne dzin dze Moroni.

17 Na Moroni na ɔhwɛ hɔn do na ɔkõ ho nhyehyɛɛ nyina hyɛ ne nsa. Na wɔyɛɛ no ɔsahen panyin wɔ Nephifo nsordaafo no do wɔ ber a nna oedzi mfe eduonu enum pɛr.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ ohyiaa Lamanfo no wɔ Jershon kurotsia, na no nkorɔfo no nna woesiesie hɔnho a wokitsakitsa nkrantsee, nye mpea, nye ɔkõ ho akodze ahorow pii.

19 Na Lamanfo nsordaafo no hun dɛ Nephifo no, anaadɛ Moroni, esiesie no nkorɔfo no na ɔama hɔn akatabo na akokyɛm a ɔhyɛ hɔn nsa na akokyɛm a ɔbɔ hɔn tsir ban na wɔhyehyɛ ntar a no mu yɛ dur so—

20 Afei Zerahemnah no nsordaafo no dze wonnyi ndzɛmba a ɔtsetse dɛm yi bi; dza wɔwɔ ara nye hɔn nkrantsee, nye hɔn mpea, hɔn egyen na egyen-menaba, hɔn totowabo nye abo; na woedzi adagyaw, gyedɛ nwoma pɛr na ɔkyekyer hɔn asen; nyew, wɔnnhyɛ hwee, gyedɛ Zoramfo nye Amalekifo nko;

21 Mbom wonnyi akatabo anaa akokyɛm no mu biara—dɛm ntsi, wosuroo Nephifo nsordaafo no osian hɔn akontar no ntsi, na ɔmmfa ho dɛ wɔdɔɔ sõ koraa sen Nephifo no.

22 Hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ woenntum ammba Nephifo do wɔ Jershon kurotsia hɔ; dɛm ntsi wofii Antionum asaase do kɔr sar no do, na wɔnantsewee bɔɔ aprɔw wɔ sar no do wɔ esutsen Sidon n’etsifi afamu, ama woeetum aba Manti asaase do abɛfa asaase no; na wɔanndwen dɛ Moroni no nsordaafo no bohu bea a wɔkɔ.

23 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ ber a wofii hɔ kɔr sar no do ara pɛr nna Moroni somaa binom dɛ wɔnkɔ sar no do nkɛtsɛw bea a wɔabɔ hɔn asese wɔ no; na Moroni so nyim mbrɛ Alma no nkɔnhyɛ tse, ntsi ɔsomaa binom so ma wɔkɔr ne nkyɛn dɛ ɔpɛ dɛ obisa Ewuradze hwɛ bea ɔsɛ dɛ Nephifo nsordaafo no so kɔ nye Lamanfo no kɔkõ dze bɔ hɔnho ban a.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze n’asɛm baa Alma hɔ, na Alma kãa kyerɛɛ Moroni n’asomafo no dɛ, Lamanfo nsordaafo nenam robɔ aprɔw wɔ sar no do, ama woeetum aba Manti asaase do, ama wɔaahyɛ ase akɔ nkorɔfo no a wɔyɛ mberɛw wɔ dɔm no mu no do. Na dɛm asomafo no kɔree kɛkãa nsɛm no kyerɛɛ Moroni.

25 Afei Moroni, gyaa no nsordaafo no mu kakra wɔ Jershon asaase do, ama sɛ Lamanfo no dua kwan bi do ba asaase no do a woeenntum ammfa kurow no, na ɔfaa no nsordaafo nkaa no na wosii mu kɔr Manti asaase do.

26 Na ɔsee dɔm a wɔwɔ dɛm asaase no do nyinara dɛ wɔmboaboa hɔn ano nye Lamanfo no nkɔkõ mfa ngye hɔn nsaase nye hɔn man, nye hɔn kyɛfa na ahotɔ ho ban; dɛm ntsi nna woesiesie hɔnho dze rotweɔn ber a Lamanfo no bɛba.

27 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni see no nsordaafo no dɛ wonkosuma bɔnsa no a ɔbɛn esutsen Sidon n’egya no mu, bea a odzi kɔ esutsen Sidon n’anee afamu wɔ sar no do.

28 Na Moroni maa binom kosumasumaa hɔ tsɛwee, ama woeehu ber a Lamanfo no bɛba.

29 Na afei Moroni nyim Lamanfo hɔn adwen dɛ wɔrohwehwɛ asɛɛ hɔn enuanom, anaadɛ wɔpɛ dɛ wodzi hɔn do konyim na wɔdze hɔn ba nkowaasom mu ama woeetum wɔakyekyer ahenman ama hɔnho wɔ asaase nyinara do;

30 Na onyim so dɛ dza Nephifo no rohwehwɛ ara nye dɛ wɔbɔbɔ hɔn asaase nye hɔn ahotɔ, nye hɔn asɔr ho ban, dɛm ntsi ohun dɛ ɔnnyɛ bɔn dɛ ɔbɛfa nyansa kwan bi do dze abɔ hɔnho ban, dɛm ntsi ɔnam n’atsɛwfo no do hun akwan a Lamanfo no rohwehwɛ afa do.

31 Dɛm ntsi, ɔkyɛɛ no nsordaafo no hɔn mu na ɔdze hɔn mu bi baa bosumaa bɔnsa no no boka afamu wɔ koko Riplah no anaafo afamu.

32 Na ɔdze hɔn a wɔaka no kosumaa bɔnsa no n’anee afamu hɔ, wɔ esutsen Sidon n’anee afamu, dze kɔ Manti asaase ne hẽ do.

33 Na ber a ɔdze no nsordaafo no hyehyɛɛ mbeabea a ɔpɛ wiei no, osiesiee noho dɛ ɔnye hɔn behyia.

34 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no baa koko no n’etsifi wɔ bea a Moroni no nsordaafo no hɔn mu binom hyɛ no.

35 Na ber a Lamanfo no bɛfaa koko Riplah do, na wosiaan bɔnsa no mu; na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worutwa esutsen Sidon no, nsordaafo no a woesuma wɔ koko n’anaafo afamu no a ɔbarimba a ne dzin dze Lehi na odzi hɔn kan no nye no nsordaafo no puee hɔn ekyir fi boka afamu twaa hɔnho hyiae.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ Nephifo no epue fi hɔn ekyir reba no, wɔdaan hɔnho na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔnye Lehi no nsordaafo no rokõ.

37 Na nyimpakuku hyɛɛ ase wɔ afã na afã nyina, na ɔyɛɛ hu kɛse wɔ Lamanfo afamu, osian hɔn adagyawdzi ntsi na Nephifo hɔn nkrantsee nye hɔn mpea no tum hɔn ara yie ma sɛ wotwa hɔn kor ara pɛr a nna nyimpa atɔr.

38 Wɔ ber a afã no dze ɔkyɛr kakra ansaana Nephifo mu nyimpa kor atɔr wɔ hɔn nkrantsee ano anaadɛ obi ahwer bɔgya ewu, osiandɛ hɔn dze wɔabɔ hɔn nyimpadua ho nyinara ho ban, anaadɛ Lamanfo no hɔn nkrantsee no nntum mmpira hɔn osian hɔn akataho, nye akatabo nye akokyɛm a ɔhyɛ hɔn nsa nye dadzekyɛw no ntsi, iyi maa Nephifo no dzii Lamanfo no ewu pii.

39 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no hɔn akoma tui osian ɔsɛɛ kɛse a nna orisi wɔ hɔn mu no ntsi, na iyi maa wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ woruguan mpo kɔ esutsen Sidon ho.

40 Na Lehi na no dɔm no tsiiw hɔn; na Lehi kãa hɔn guu Sidon esu no mu, na wotwaa Sidon esu no. Na Lehi maa no nsordaafo no kaa esutsen Sidon n’egya amma woenntum enntwa.

41 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni na no nsordaafo no hyiaa Lamanfo no wɔ bɔnsa no mu, wɔ esutsen Sidon n’afã hɔ, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worukuku hɔn.

42 Na Lamanfo no guanee fii hɔn enyim bio, dze faa Manti asaase do kwan; na Moroni no nsordaafo no hyiaa hɔn bio.

43 Afei aber yi mu no Lamanfo no kõe ara yie; nyew nna wonnhu Lamanfo a wɔrokõ wɔ ahoɔdzen dzendzen na akokodur kɛse a ɔtse dɛm mu da, dabi, fitsi ahyɛse no mpo.

44 Na Zoramfo nye Amalekifo no a wɔyɛ asahen ekunyin nye akandzifo no nye Zerahemnah no a ɔyɛ hɔn ɔsahen ekunyin, anaadɛ hɔn ɔkandzifo ekunyin na ɔhwɛdofo no na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn nkuran; nyew, wɔkõo dɛ mbowa abɔyafo, na Nephifo no pii tɔree wɔ hɔn nsaano, nyew, na wotwitwaa dadzekyɛw no pii mu ebien ebien, na wotuetuee hɔn akatabo pii mu, na wotwitwaa hɔn nsa pii fii do; na dɛm na Lamanfo no dze ebufuhyew twitwaa hɔn.

45 Naaso siantsir pa bi ntsi na Nephifo no dze kõe, osiandɛ wɔronnkõ mmfa nnhwehwɛ ahendzi anaa tum na mbom wɔrokõ dze agye hɔn efi, nye hɔn ahotɔ, hɔn yernom, nye hɔn mba, nye hɔn adze nyinara, nyew, dze ama hɔn som nye hɔn asɔr.

46 Na wonyim dɛ dza wɔreyɛ no yɛ dwuma bi a ɔsɛ dɛ wodzi dze ma hɔn Nyankopɔn; osiandɛ Ewuradze akã akyerɛ hɔn nye hɔn egyanom dɛ: Susuampaara dɛ hom nndzi fɔ wɔ mfom a odzi kan no ho no, anaaso wɔ dza otsĩa ebien no ho no, mma hom mma homho kwan mma hom nntɔr wɔ hom atamfo nsa.

47 Na Ewuradze akã no bio dɛ: Hom mbɔ hom ebusuafo ho ban sɛ bɔgyagu mpo na ɔbɛba mu a. Iyi ho ntsi na Nephifo nye Lamanfo ridzi esi dze abɔ hɔnho, nye hɔn ebusuafo, nye hɔn nsaase, nye hɔn man, nye hɔn kyɛfa, nye hɔn nyamesom ho ban no.

48 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni no dɔm no hun Lamanfo no hɔn ebufuhyew no, nkyɛ wɔrohwehwɛ atwe asan na woeguan efi hɔn enyim. Na Moroni, hun dza wɔrohwehwɛ ayɛ no, ɔsomaa ma wɔkɔree dze nsɛm yinom kɛhyɛɛ hɔn nkuran—nyew, dɛ wɔndwen hɔn nsaase, nye hɔn ahotɔ ho, nyew, hom fahodzi wɔ nkowaasom mu.

49 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɔr Lamanfo no do, na wɔdze ndze kor sũi frɛɛ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn wɔ hɔn ahotɔ nye hɔn nkowaasom ho fahodzi ho.

50 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase nyaa tum na wɔnye Lamanfo no dzii esi; na dɛm dɔnhwer no a wosũi frɛɛ Ewuradze wɔ hɔn fahodzi ho ara pɛr no nna Lamanfo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ woruguan efi hɔn enyim; na woguanee ara dze kɔr Sidon esu ho.

51 Afei Lamanfo no dɔɔ sõ ara yie, nyew, hɔn dodow bor Nephifo hɔn dodow mbɔho ebien; naaso, wɔpaam hɔn araa ma wɔboaa hɔn ano kuw kor wɔ bɔnsa a ɔwɔ esutsen Sidon n’egya no mu.

52 Dɛm ntsi, Moroni no nsordaafo no twaa hɔnho hyiae, nyew, wɔ esutsen Sidon n’afã na n’afã nyina, na hwɛ, boka afamu hɔ so Lehi no dɔm no wɔ hɔ.

53 Dɛm ntsi, ber a Zerahemnah hun dɛ Lehi no dɔm no wɔ esutsen Sidon no boka afamu, na Moroni no nsordaafo so wɔ esutsen Sidon n’anee afamu na dɛ Nephifo no etwa hɔnho ehyia no, suro kyekyeer hɔn.

54 Afei ber a Moroni hun dɛ wosuro no, ɔkãa kyerɛɛ no dɔm no dɛ mma wɔnnkã bɔgya nngu bio.
alma 44:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 44[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moroni hyɛ Lamanfo dɛ wɔnye hɔn ndzi asomdwee ahyɛmu annyɛ dɛm a, wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn—Zerahemnah pow nhyehyɛɛ no, na ɔkõ hyɛ ase bio—Moroni no nsordaafo dzi Lamanfo do konyim. Bɛyɛ mfe 74–73 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ wogyae na wɔtwee hɔnho kɔr ekyir ma kwan kakra bɛdaa hɔn ntamu. Na Moroni see Zerahemnah dɛ: Hwɛ, Zerahemnah, yɛnnyɛ dɔm a yɛpɛ bɔgya. Hom nyim dɛ hɛn nsa esuo hom mu, naaso yɛmmpɛ dɛ yeku hom.

2 Hwɛ, yɛammba dɛ yɛnye hom robɔkõ, ama yɛakã hom bɔgyaa egu dze agye tum; eso yɛmmpɛ dɛ yɛdze hom bɛhyɛ nkowaasom kɔndua mu. Mbom dɛm adze yi ho ara ntsi na hom aba nye hɛn robɔkõ yi; nyew, na hom bo efuw hɛn osian hɛn nyamesom ntsi.

3 Mbom afei, hom ehu dɛ Ewuradze kã hɛnho; na hom ehu dɛ ɔdze hom ahyɛ hɛn nsa. Na afei mepɛ dɛ hom tse ase dɛ osian hɛn nyamesom nye hɛn gyedzi a ɔwɔ Christ mu ntsi na dɛm esi. Na afei hom ehu dɛ hom runntum nnsɛɛ hɛn gyedzi yi.

4 Afei hom ehu dɛ iyi nye Nyankopɔn no nokwar gyedzi no; nyew, hom ehu dɛ Nyankopɔn bɔboa hɛn, na ɔakora hɛn do, na ɔabɔ hɛnho ban wɔ mbertsentsen biara a yebedzi nokwar ama no, dze ama hɛn gyedzi, nye hɛn nyamesom; na Ewuradze remma kwan mma wɔnnsɛɛ hɛn, nna gyedɛ yɛyɛ mbratofo na yɛpow hɛn gyedzi.

5 Na afei, Zerahemnah, mehyɛ wo, wɔ otumfo Nyankopɔn no a ɔama hɛn abasa mu ayɛ dzen ma hɛn nsa ada hom do no ne dzin mu, wɔ hɛn gyedzi mu, wɔ hɛn nyamesom mu, nye hɛn nyamesom ho guado-adzeyɛ mu, nye hɛn asɔr, nye hɛn asodzii a ɔyɛ wansann a yɛwɔ dze ma hɛn yernom, nye hɛn mba, wɔ dɛm ahotɔ no a ɔkã hɛn bɔmu wɔ hɛn asaase nye hɛn man mu; nyew, nye Nyame n’asɛm krɔnkrɔn no so a yesuo mu no, dza no mu na hɛn ahomka nyina nye adze nyina a ɔsom hɛn bo kɛse fi no—

6 Nyew, na nnyɛ ne nyina nye yi; Mehyɛ hom wɔ hom pɛ a hom wɔ nyina wɔ hom nkwa ho dɛ hom ngyaa hom ɔkõ ho akodze mu mfa mma hɛn, na yɛremmper hom bɔgyaa ho, na mbom yɛdze hom nkwa bɛkyɛ hom, sɛ ɔba dɛ hom bɔkɔ hom kwan na hom remmba bio nye hɛn mmbɔkõ a.

7 Na afei, sɛ hom annyɛ iyi a, hwɛ, hom wɔ hɛn nsamu, na mebɛhyɛ mo dɔm yi ma wɔakyɛ egu hom do, epirapira hom nyimpadua akɔ owu mu ma hom ase ahyew koraa; na afei yebohu nyia obenya tum wɔ dɛm nkorɔfo yi do; nyew, yɛbɔhwɛ nyia wɔdze no bɛba nkowaasom mu.

8 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Zerahemnah tsee dɛm nsɛm yi no ɔbae na ɔdze ne nkrantsee na ne peaa, nye ne egyen hyɛɛ Moroni ne nsa na ɔsee no dɛ: Hwɛ, hɛn ɔkõ ho akodze nye yi; yɛdze bɛma wo, na mbom yerinndzi nsew nnkyerɛ hom a yenyim dɛ yɛbɔtõ, na hɛn mba so demara; mbom fa hɛn ɔkõ ho akodze, na ma hɛn kwan ma yemfi ha nkɔ sar no do; annyɛ dɛm a yɛbɛfa hɛn nkrantsee na yɛahera anaadɛ yedzi konyim.

9 Hwɛ, yennyi hom gyedzi yi bi; na yɛnngye nndzi dɛ Nyankopɔn na ɔdze hɛn ahyɛ hom nsa; mbom yɛgye dzi dɛ hom ndaadaa na wɔakora hom efi hɛn nkrantsee ano. Hwɛ, hom akatabo nye hom akokyɛm na wɔakora hom.

10 Na afei ber a Zerahemnah wiee dɛm nsɛm yi kã no, Moroni dze nkrantsee nye ɔkõ ho akodze no a ɔagye no sanee maa Zerahemnah na ɔsee dɛ: Hwɛ, yɛdze ɔkõ no bɛba ewiei.

11 Afei moronntwe nsɛm a makã no nnsan, dɛm ntsi dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi, hom rimmfi ha nnkɔ gyedɛ hom edzi nsew dɛ hom rennsan nye hɛn mmbɔkõ bio ansaana hom akɔ. Afei, dɛ hɛn nsa akã hom yi, yɛbɛkã hom bɔgyaa egu famu, nna gyedɛ hom dzi dza makã yi do.

12 Na afei ber a Moroni kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, Zerahemnah no bo fuuw Moroni na ɔfaa ne nkrantsee na otuu kɔr Moroni do dɛ orukoku no, na mbom ber a ɔmaa ne nkrantsee do ara pɛr, nna hwɛ, Moroni no nsordaafo no mu kor bɔe kyeen famu, ma ne nsa no bui na otwaa Zerahemnah so na oyii ne tsir ho nam no too famu. Na Zerahemnah guanee fii hɔn enyim kɛhyɛɛ no nsordaafo no mu.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ nsordaanyi no a ogyina hɔn nkyɛn no, nyia oyii Zerahemnah ne tsir ho nam kyenee no suoo nhwi no mu na oyii fii famu na ɔdze tuaa ne nkrantsee no ano, na ɔtsenee wɔ dɔm no do na ɔdze ndze kɛse see hɔn dɛ:

14 Dɛ mbrɛ dɛm tsir ho nam yi atɔ famu yi, dza ɔyɛ hom ɔkandzifo ne tsir ho nam yi no, dɛmara so na hom so hom bɔhwe famu gyedɛ hom gyaa hom ɔkõ ho akodze mu ma na hom nye hɛn dzi asomdwee ho ahyɛmu.

15 Afei dodowara a wɔwɔ hɔ, ber a wɔtsee dɛm nsɛm yi na wohun tsir ho nam no a ɔhyɛ nkrantsee no ano no, suro kãa hɔn; na dodowara baa bɔtoow hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze guu Moroni n’anan ho, na wɔnye no bedzii asomdwee ho ahyɛmu. Na dodowara a wɔhɛnn ahyɛmu no mu no, wɔmaa hɔn kwan ma wofii hɔ kɔr sar no do.

16 Afei ɔbaa dɛ Zerahemnah no bo fuwii, na onunuu no nsordaafo a wɔaka no ma wonyaa ebufuw dɛ wɔnye Nephifo no bɔkõ ahoɔdzen mu.

17 Na afei Moroni no bo fuwii, osian Lamanfo no hɔn asoɔdzen ntsi; dɛm ntsi ɔhyɛɛ no nkorɔfo no dɛ wɔnkyɛ ngu hɔn do nkuku hɔn. Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worukuku hɔn; nyew, na Lamanfo no dze hɔn nkrantsee nye hɔn dzii akõ ahoɔdzen mu.

18 Mbom hwɛ, osiandɛ wɔnnhyɛ hwee wɔ hɔnho na woeyi hɔn tsinhwi ntsi ɔmaa Nephifo hɔn nkrantsee ano tum hɔn yie; nyew, hwɛ wopirapiraa hɔn na wotwitwaa hɔn, nyew, na wɔtotɔree ara yie wɔ Nephifo no nkrantsee ano; na wɔhyɛɛ ase twitwaa hɔn guu famu, mpo sen dɛ mbrɛ Moroni ne sordaanyi no hyɛɛ ho nkɔm no.

19 Afei ber a Zerahemnah hun dɛ wɔrebɛsɛɛ hɔn nyina no, ɔtsẽaa mu see Moroni dɛ sɛ wɔdze hɔn a wɔaka no hɔn nkwa bɛkyɛ hɔn a ɔnye no bedzi ahyɛmu no, na no nkorɔfo a wɔkã noho no so dɛmara, na wɔremmba nye hɔn mmbɔkõ bio.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni see hɔn dɛ mma wonnkuku nkorɔfo no bio. Na ɔgyee ɔkõ ho akodze no fii Lamanfo no hɔ; na ber a wɔnye hɔn edzi asomdwee ho ahyɛmu no wiei no, wɔmaa hɔn kwan ma wofii hɔ kɔr sar no do.

21 Afei wɔannkan hɔn ewufo no osiandɛ wɔdɔɔ sõ dodow; nyew, hɔn ewufo no hɔn dodow sõ ara yie, Nephifo nye Lamanfo no nyina.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔtoow hɔn ewufo no guu Sidon esu mu, na wosiee hɔn wɔ po no bun mu.

23 Na Nephifo nsordaafo no, anaadɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ Moroni dze no saan hɔn ekyir baa hɔn efi nye hɔn nsaase do.

24 Na dɛm na afe a otsĩa duawɔtwe wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei. Na dɛm na Alma ne kyerɛwsɛm a ɔkyerɛwee wɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse no do no dze baa n’ewiei.
alma 45:
Dza ɔfa Nephi no nkorɔfo hɔn ho, nye hɔn akõkoekõ nye hɔn etuatsew, wɔ Helaman n’aber do dɛ mbrɛ Heleman ne nkyerɛwee no a ɔkyerɛwee wɔ n’aber do no tse.

Ofitsi etsir 45 dze kesi 62.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 45[/font_size][/center]

[i]Helaman gye Alma ne nsɛm dzi—Alma hyɛ Nephifo nsɛɛe ho nkɔm—Ohyira na ɔdze ndom kã asaase no—Bi a Sunsum no faa Alma kɔr sor dɛ mbrɛ ɔfaa Moses no—Etuatsew soɛr asɔr no mu. Bɛyɛ mfe 73 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo no enyi gyee mbordo, osiandɛ Ewuradze agye hɔn bio efi hɔn atamfo nsa; dɛm ntsi wɔdze ndaase maa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn; nyew, na wɔfaa akɔnkye ara yie na wɔbɔɔ mpaa so ara yie, na wɔdze enyigye kɛse sɔree maa Nyankopɔn.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsĩa duakron mu wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo dzi adze wɔ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no, nna Alma baa ne babanyin Helaman nkyɛn bɛsee no dɛ: Ana egye nsɛm a mekãa kyerɛɛ wo a ɔfa dɛm nkyerɛwee a wɔdze esie no dzi?

3 Na Helaman see no dɛ: Nyew, megye dzi.

4 Na Alma see bio dɛ: Ana egye Jesus Christ a ɔreba no dzi?

5 Na ɔsee dɛ: Nyew, megye nsɛm nyinara a akã no dzi.

6 Na Alma see no bio dɛ: Ana ibedzi me mbrasɛm do?

7 Na ɔsee dɛ: Nyew, medze m’akoma nyina bedzi wo mbrasɛm do.

8 Afei Alma see no dɛ: Nhyira akã wo; na Ewuradze bɛyɛ wo prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase yi do.

9 Mbom hwɛ, merehyɛ biribi ho nkɔm akyerɛ wo; mbom nkɔm a merehyɛ wo yi, mma nnda no edzi nnkyerɛ obiara; nyew, nkɔm a merehyɛ wo yi ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔda no edzi kyerɛ obiara, mpo kesi dɛ nkɔnhyɛ no bɛhyɛ mã; dɛm ntsi kyerɛw nsɛm a merebɛkã yi.

10 Na nsɛm no nye iyi: Hwɛ, muhu dɛ dɛm nkorɔfo yi ara, Nephifo yi, ɔfa no nyikyerɛ sunsum a ɔwɔ mo mu no kyerɛ dɛ mfe ahaanan mu fi ber a Jesus Christ beyi noho akyerɛ hɔn no, wɔbɔwodow wɔ gyedzi mu.

11 Nyew, na wobohu akõkoekõ nye ɔyardɔm, nyew, ɔkɔm nye bɔgyagu mpo ekesi dɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo nyinara hɔn ase bɛhyew koraa.

12 Nyew, na iyi besi osiandɛ wɔbɔwodow wɔ gyedzi mu na wɔayɛ sum mu ndwuma, nye ntantan bra nye emumuyɛ ahorow pii ekyir; nyew, mese wo dɛ, wɔbɛyɛ bɔn etsia kan nye nyimdzee kɛse a ɔtse dɛm yi, nyew, mese wo dɛ, ofi dɛm da no dze kɔ, ebusuasantsen a otsĩa anan mu dɔm nyinara mpo runntwa mu nnkɔ ansaana dɛm emumuyɛ kɛse yi ne yɛ aba.

13 Na ber a dɛm da kɛse no bɛba no, hwɛ, mber no reba ntsɛntsɛm a hɔn a wɔtse ase sesei, anaadɛ hɔn a wɔakan hɔn afora Nephi no nkorɔfo no hɔn aba no wɔrennkan hɔn mmfora Nephi no mu bio.

14 Mbom obiara a ɔbɛka na wɔnnkɛsɛɛ no wɔ dɛm da kɛse a ɔyɛ hu no mu no, wɔbɛkan no afora Lamanfo no, na hɔn nyina bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔtse ara pɛr, gyedɛ kumaabi a wɔbɛfrɛ hɔn Ewuradze n’esuafo; na Lamanfo no betsiw hɔn so araa ekodu dɛ hɔn ase bɛhyew koraa. Na afei, osian emumuyɛ ntsi, dɛm nkɔnhyɛ yi bɛhyɛ mã.

15 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Alma kãa ndzɛmba yinom kyerɛɛ Helaman wiei no, ohyiraa no, nye ne mbabanyin nkaafo no so; na ohyiraa asaase no so osian atseneneefo ntsi.

16 Na ɔsee dɛ: Dɛm na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn se—Ndom bɛkã asaase, nyew, dɛm asaase, yi dze ama aman, ebusuafo, kasa horow nye nyimpa nyinara, dze akɔ ɔsɛɛ mu, dze ama hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛdze no, ber a hɔn bɔn adɔɔ sõ no na dɛ mbrɛ makã no, ɔbɛyɛ hɔ so; na iyi nye Nyankopɔn no ndom nye nhyira a ɔdze egu asaase yi do, osiandɛ Ewuradze runntum nnhwɛ bɔn wɔ kwan ketseketse biara do.

17 Na afei, ber a Alma kãa dɛm nsɛm yinom wiei no, ohyiraa asɔr no, nyew, nye hɔn nyinara a ɔsɛ dɛ wogyina pintsinn wɔ gyedzi mu fi dɛm mber no dze kɔ no.

18 Na ber a Alma yɛɛ iyi wiei no, ofii Zarahemla asaase do hɔ dɛ mbrɛ ɔrokɔ Melek asaase do. Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔanntse ne nka bio; ɔfa no wu mu anaadɛ ne nsiei mu no yennyim ho hwee.

19 Hwɛ, iyi na yenyim, dɛ ɔyɛ tseneneenyi; na asɛm yi petsee asɔr no mu nyinara dɛ Sunsum no faa no kɔr sor, anaadɛ Ewuradze noara dze ne nsa siee no, dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze yɛɛ Moses no. Mbom hwɛ, kyerɛwsɛm kyerɛ dɛ Ewuradze faa Moses kɔr ne nkyɛn; na yesusu dɛ ɔagye Alma wɔ sunsum mu so akɔ ne nkyɛn; dɛm ntsi, yennyim biribiara a ɔfa no wu nye ne nsiei ho.

20 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsĩa duakron wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo dzi adze wɔ Nephi no nkorɔfo do n’ahyɛse no, Helaman kɔr dɔm no mu kɛkãa asɛm no kyerɛɛ hɔn.

21 Na hwɛ osian akõ a wɔnye Lamanfo no dzii nye hɔn etuatsew nketsenketse pii nye basabasayɛ a ɔbaa dɔm no mu no ntsi, ɔbɛyɛɛ ehiadze dɛ wɔkã Nyankopɔn n’asɛm no wɔ dɔm no mu, nyew, na wɔhyehyɛ mbra no yie bio wɔ asɔr nyinara mu.

22 Dɛm ntsi, Helaman nye no nuanom no kɔr dɛ wɔrekɛkyekyer asɔr no bio wɔ asaase no do nyina, nyew, wɔ kurow biara a ɔwɔ asaase no do nyina, a ɔyɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo dze. Na ɔbaa dɛ woyiyii asɔfo nye akyerɛkyerɛfo wɔ asaase no nyina do na wɔdze hɔn sisii asɔr nyina ano dɛ wɔnhwɛ do.

23 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Helaman na no nuanom no yiyii asɔfo nye akyerɛkyerɛfo dze hɔn sisii asɔr nyina ano dɛ wɔnhwɛ do no maa etuatsew baa hɔn mu, na wɔammpɛ dɛ wotsie Helaman na no nuanom no hɔn nsɛm.

24 Mbom wɔyɛɛ ahantan, na wɔmemaa hɔnho do, osian hɔn ahonya mbordo a woenya ntsi, dɛm ntsi osiandɛ woehu dɛ woenya ahonya dodow ntsi, wɔammpɛ dɛ wotsie hɔn nsɛm, na wɔnantsew tseneneeyɛ mu wɔ Nyame enyim.
alma 46:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 46[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amalickiah paam tsir do dɛ obedzi hen—Moroni ma fahotɔ mfrankaa do wɔ sor—Ɔkã nkorɔfo no boa ano ma wɔbɔ hɔn nyamesom ho ban—Wɔfrɛ agyedzifo mapa no Christianfo—Wɔbɔkora Joseph nkaa do—Amalickiah na etuatsewfo no guan kɔ Nephi asaase do—Woku hɔn a wɔpow dɛ wobosuo mu ma woenya fahodzi no. Bɛyɛ mfe 73–72 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ dodowara a wɔmmpɛ dɛ wotsie Helaman na n’enuanom hɔn nsɛm no kãa hɔnho boaa ano tsiaa hɔn enuanom no.

2 Na afei hwɛ, hɔn bo fuuw kɛse ma wɔyɛɛ hɔn adwen dɛ woboku hɔn.

3 Afei hɔn a hɔn bo efuw hɔn enuanom no hɔn ɔkandzifo no yɛ nyimpa a ɔsõ na noho so yɛ dzen; na ne dzin dze Amalickiah.

4 Na Amalickiah pɛɛ dɛ obedzi hen; na nkorɔfo no a hɔn bo efuw no so pɛɛ dɛ ɔyɛ hɔn do hen; na hɔn mu pii na wɔyɛ atsɛmbuafo nkumaa wɔ asaase no do, nna wɔrohwehwɛ tum.

5 Na Amalickiah daadaa hɔn dɛ sɛ wɔgye no to mu na wɔboa no ma ɔbɛyɛ hɔn hen a ɔbɛyɛ hɔn ahwɛdofo wɔ dɔm no do.

6 Dɛm na Amalickiah dze twee hɔn ma wɔtsew etua, na Helaman na n’enuanom no hɔn nsɛmpa a wɔrekã no ammfa hɔnho koraa, nyew, ɔhwɛ kɛse a wɔdze rohwɛ asɔr no do no ammfa hɔnho koraa; nna hɔn na wɔyɛ asɔfo mpanyimfo a wɔhwɛ asɔr no do.

7 Na dodowara wɔ asɔr no mu a wɔgyee Amalickiah ne ndaadaasɛm no dzii, dɛm ntsi wɔtseew etua fii asɔr no mu mpo; na dɛm na ɔmaa Nephi no nkorɔfo no hɔn ndzeyɛɛ bɛyɛɛ ɔhaw na esian kɛse na hɔn konyimdzi kɛse a wodzii wɔ Lamanfo do, nye hɔn ehurusi kɛse a wodzii wɔ ɔgye a Ewuradze dze agye hɔn no ammfa hɔnho koraa.

8 Iyi ma yehu mbrɛ osi ma adasamba hɔn werɛ fir Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ntsɛntsɛm, nyew, mbrɛ osi ma hɔnho yɛ har wɔ emumuyɛ ne yɛ ho, na wɔma abɔnsam twe hɔn kɔ.

9 Nyew, na yehu emumuyɛdze kɛse so a omumuyɛnyi kor tum ma osi adasamba mu.

10 Nyew, yehu dɛ Amalickiah, osian ne ndabraba na ɔyɛ nyimpa a ndaadaasɛm pii ahyɛ n’anomu mã ntsi ɔtwee dɔm no pii hɔn akoma ma wɔyɛɛ bɔn; nyew, na wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔsɛɛ Nyankopɔn n’asɔr, na wɔsɛɛ ahotɔ fapem a Nyankopɔn dze ama hɔn no, anaadɛ nhyira a Nyankopɔn dze ehyira asaase n’enyi osian atseneneefo a wɔwɔ asaase no do no ntsi.

11 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni a ɔyɛ Nephifo hɔn nsordaafo panyin no tsee dɛm etuatsew yi no, no bo fuuw Amalickiah.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ osunsuaan no sortar mu; na ɔfaa no mu kor, na ɔkyerɛɛw mu dɛ—Yɛdze kaa hɛn Nyankopɔn, hɛn nyamesom, nye fahodzi, nye hɛn asomdwee, hɛn yernom, nye hɛn mba—na ɔdze kyekyeer poma ano.

13 Na ɔdze ne dadzekyɛw hyɛe, nye n’akatabo na ɔfaa n’akokyɛm, na ɔdze ne nkrantsee bɔɔ n’asen do; na ɔfaa poma no a no sortar bɔ ano no, (na ɔfrɛɛ no ahotɔ mfrankaa) na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ famu, na ɔbɔɔ mpaa dzendzenndzen maa ne Nyankopɔn dze serɛɛ dɛ fahodzi mbra n’enuanom do mber dodow biara a Christian fɛkuw bɛda ho atsena asaase no do no—

14 Na dɛm na hɔn a wonnyi asɔr no mu no dze frɛɛ Christ n’agyedzifo nokwafo no a wɔwɔ Nyankopɔn n’asɔr no mu no.

15 Na hɔn a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu no dzii nokwar; nyew, hɔn a wɔyɛ Christ n’agyedzifo nokwafo no faa Christ ne dzin too hɔn do enyigye mu ara, na wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Christianfo osian gyedzi a wɔwɔ wɔ Christ a ɔbɛba no no mu ntsi.

16 Na dɛm ntsi aber yi mu, Moroni bɔɔ mpaa dɛ Christianfo hɔn ahwehwɛdze nyɛ hɔ, mma hɔn na fahodzi a ɔwɔ asaase no do no ntsim.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔdze ne kra mu nsɛm too Nyame enyim no, ɔbobɔɔ nsaase nyina a ɔwɔ Amamfõ n’anaafo afamu edzin, nyew, ne sin ara nye dɛ, nsaase nyina a ɔwɔ etsifi nye dza ɔwɔ anaafo nyina—Asaase a wɔasan mu eyi, nye fahodzi asaase no.

18 Na ɔsee dɛ: Ampa Nyankopɔn remma kwan mma hɛn a wokyir hɛn osiandɛ yɛafa Christ ne dzin ato hɛn do ntsi, wonntsiatsia hɛn do wɔ famu na wɔnnsɛɛ hɛn, gyedɛ hɛnankasa hɛn mbrato na ɔdze dɛm adze yi bɛba hɛn do.

19 Na ber a Moroni kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔkɔr dɔm no mu, na onyaam n’atar a osunsuaan mu no wɔ wimu, ama hɔn nyinara woeehu dza ɔakyerɛw wɔ tamsin no mu no, na ɔdze ndze kɛse tsẽaa mu dɛ:

20 Hwɛ, obiara a ɔgye dɛm frankaa yi to mu wɔ asaase yi do no, ɔmbra wɔ Ewuradze n’ahoɔdzen mu, na woedzi ahyɛmu ntsi wɔnnkɛpɛ dɛ wobosuo hɔn kyɛfa, nye hɔn nyamesom mu, ama Ewuradze Nyankopɔn eehyira hɔn.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, hwɛ, dɔm no faa hɔn akotar hyɛe na wotuu mbirika bae, na wosunsuaan hɔn ntar mu dze dzii ahyɛmu dɛ wɔrommpow Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, anaadɛ sɛ wɔtõ Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm no, anaa wɔyɛ mbratofo, na hɔn enyi tõ dɛ wɔbɛfa Christ ne dzin no ato hɔn do a, ɔno Ewuradze ntsetsew hɔn mu tse dɛ mbrɛ woesunsuan hɔn ntar mu no.

22 Afei iyi nye ahyɛmu a wodzii, na wɔtoow hɔn ntar guu Moroni n’ananadze, see dɛ: Yɛnye hɛn Nyame edzi ahyɛmu, dɛ ɔnsɛɛ hɛn dɛ hɛn enuanom a wɔwɔ etsifi afamu no, sɛ yɛhwe ase wɔ mbrato mu a; nyew sɛ yɛhwe ase wɔ mbrato mu a ɔntow hɛn nkyen hɛn atamfo hɔn ananadze, mpo dɛ mbrɛ yɛatow hɛn ntar egu w’ananadze dɛ wontsiatsia do yi.

23 Moroni see hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, yɛyɛ Jacob n’asefo nkaa; nyew, yɛyɛ Joseph no a n’enuanom sunsuaan n’atar mu nketsenketse pii no n’asefo nkaa; nyew, na afei hwɛ, hom mma yɛnkaa dɛ yebedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do, annyɛ dɛm a hɛn enuanom no bosusuaan hɛn ntar mu, na wɔdze hɛn egu efiadze, anaadɛ wɔatɔn hɛn, anaa woekuku hɛn.

24 Nyew, hom mma yensuo hɛn ahotɔ mu dɛ Joseph ne nkaa; nyew, hom mma yɛnkaa Jacob ne nsɛm a ɔkãa ansaana orubowu no, na hwɛ, ohun dɛ wɔakora Joseph no sortar no ne fa nkaa bi do amma ɔannsɛɛ. Na ɔsee dɛ—Dɛ mbrɛ wɔkoraa me babanyin n’atar nkaa yi do no, dɛmara so na Nyankopɔn bɔkora me babanyin n’asefo nkaa no do, dze ama noho, na ber no mu ara so na Joseph n’asefo nkaa no so wɔbɛhera, dɛ mbrɛ n’atar nkaa no yɛe no.

25 Afei hwɛ, iyi ma me kra dzi yaw; naaso, iyi ekyir nyina me kra wɔ enyigye wɔ me babanyin no mu, osian n’asefo binom a wɔbɛfa hɔn akɔ Nyankopɔn nkyɛn no ntsi.

26 Afei hwɛ, iyi nye Jacob n’anomukasa.

27 Na afei woana nyim dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛ Joseph n’asefo nkaa no a wɔbɛhera dɛ mbrɛ n’atar yɛe no, nye hɔn a wɔatsew etua efi hɛn mu no? Nyew, na obotum ayɛ hɛnankasa so mpo sɛ yenngyina pintsinn wɔ gyedzi mu wɔ Christ mu a.
