28 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔkɔree, na ɔsomaa so ma wɔkɔr asaase ne mbeabea nyina a etuatsew wɔ no, na wɔboaboaa nkorɔfo nyina a wɔpɛ dɛ wosuo hɔn ahotɔ mu yie no ano na wɔsee hɔn dɛ wɔnye Amalickiah nye hɔn a wɔatsew etua no a wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Amalickifo no nsi.

29 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Amalickiah hun dɛ Moroni no nkorɔfo no dɔɔ sõ koraa sen Amalickifo no—na ohunii so dɛ no nkorɔfo no hɔn adwen hihim wɔ dza wɔayɛ ho no, osuroo dɛ bɛyɛ na orinnya egyinabew, dɛm ntsi ɔfaa no nkorɔfo no a onyim dɛ wɔbɛkã no do no, na ɔdze hɔn fii hɔ kɔr Nephi asaase do.

30 Afei Moroni hun dɛ ɔnnsɛ dɛ Lamanfo no nya ahoɔdzen bio; dɛm ntsi osusuu ho dɛ obesiw Amalickiah no nkorɔfo no kwan, anaadɛ ɔbɛfa hɔn nye hɔn asan hɔn ekyir aba na oeku Amalickiah; nyew, osiandɛ onyim dɛ obonunu Lamanfo no ma hɔn bo efuw hɔn, na ɔama wɔaba nye hɔn abɔkõ; na iyi nye dza onyim dɛ Amalickiah bɛyɛ ama ne nsa akã dza osi n’enyido.

31 Dɛm ntsi, Moroni hun dɛ ohia dɛ ɔfa no nsordaafo no, hɔn a wɔaboa hɔn ano, na woesiesie hɔnho, na woedzi ahyɛmu ntsi wɔnnkɛpɛ dɛ wɔbɔhwehwɛ asomdwee—na ɔbaa dɛ ɔfaa no nsordaafo na ɔdze hɔn kɔr sar no do, dɛ orikesiw Amalickiah no kwan wɔ sar no do.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔyɛɛ dza ɔrohwehwɛ, na ɔkɔr sar no do na okotwar Amalickiah no nsordaafo no.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalickiah nye no dɔm no mu kumaabi guanee, na hɔn a wɔkaa no, wɔdze hɔn hyɛɛ Moroni ne nsa na ɔdze hɔn sanee kɔr Zarahemla asaase do.

34 Afei, Moroni nye nyimpa a atsɛmbuafo mpanyimfo no nye dɔm no yii no sii hɔ, dɛm ntsi ɔwɔ tum wɔ Nephifo nsordaafo do, dɛ ɔbɛma woetsim na ɔakyerɛ no tumdzi wɔ hɔn do.

35 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalickifo no mu biara ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔnye hɔn woedzi ahyɛmu ntsi wɔnnkɛpɛ dɛ ɔboboa ma woesuo fahodzi mu, ama woeenya fahodzi aban no, ɔmaa wokum no; na hɔn mu kumaabi na wɔpoow fahodzi ahyɛmu no.

36 Na ɔbaa so dɛ, ɔmaa wɔdze ahotɔ mfrankaa sisii abantsentsen biara a ɔwɔ asaase no nyinara a ɔyɛ Nephifo dze no do; na dɛm na Moroni dze duaa ahotɔ mfrankaa wɔ Nephifo no mu.

37 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worinya asomdwee bio wɔ asaase no do; na dɛm maa wɔtsenaa asomdwee mu wɔ asaase no do araa dze kesii bɛyɛ afe duakron n’ewiei wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn aber do.

38 Na Helaman nye asɔfompanyimfo no so hwɛe ma biribiara kɔr do pɛpɛɛpɛr wɔ asɔr no mu; nyew, bɛyɛ mfe anan ntamu no mpo wonyaa asomdwee na enyigye wɔ asɔr no mu.

39 Na ɔbaa dɛ dodowara wɔ hɔ a wowui wɔ gyedzi a osi pi mu dɛ Ewuradze Jesus Christ apon hɔn akra; dɛm ntsi wɔdze enyigye fii wiadze mu kɔree.

40 Na binom nam papu mu wui, na dɛm yarba yi taa sii wɔ afe ne ber bi mu wɔ asaase no do—na mbom papu no ennku hɔn pii, osian ndua nye ndwow a oye a nna Nyankopɔn esiesie wɔ hɔ a wɔdze sa yarba no a osian mbrɛ hɔn wimu tse ntsi ɔtaa kã nyimpa no—

41 Mbom binom so wɔ hɔ a osian mpanyinyɛ ntsi ɔmaa wowui; na hɔn a wowui a nna wɔwɔ gyedzi wɔ Christ mu no wɔ tse ahomka mu wɔ no mu, dɛ mbrɛ yesusu no ara.
alma 47:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 47[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amalickiah dua kɔnkɔnsa, ewudzi na nsumaamu nhyehyɛɛ bɔn do bɛyɛ Lamanfo hɔn hen—Nephi etuatsewfo no yɛ emumuyɛfo na abɔyafo kyɛn Lamanfo no. Bɛyɛ mfe 72 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei yɛbɛsan hɛn ekyir dze abakɔsɛm no akɔ Amalickiah nye hɔn a ɔnye hɔn guanee kɔr sar no do no hɔnho nsɛm no do; na hwɛ ɔfaa hɔn a wɔnye no kɔree no, dze hɔn kɔr Lamanfo no mu wɔ Nephi asaase do, na okonunuu Lamanfo no ma hɔn bo fuuw Nephi no nkorɔfo no, ma dɛm ntsi Lamanfo hɔn hen no bɔɔ dawur wɔ no dɔm no mu wɔ asaase no nyina do dɛ wɔmboaboa hɔn ano bio na wɔnye Nephifo no nkɔkõ.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔbɔɔ dawur no, hɔn akoma tuu yie; nyew, nna wosuro dɛ wɔbɔfom ɔhen no, na wosuroi so dɛ wɔnye Nephifo no bɔkɔ akɔkõ na wɔahwer hɔn nkwa. Na ɔbaa dɛ nna wɔmmpɛ dɛ wɔkɔ, anaadɛ nna hɔn mu dodowara mmpɛ dɛ wodzi ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm do.

3 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ osian hɔn asokyew ntsi ɔhen no no bo fuwii, dɛm ntsi ɔmaa Amalickiah tum wɔ no nsordaafo no a wɔkãa no do no, na ɔmaa no tum dɛ ɔnkɔ na ɔnkɛhyɛ hɔn ma wɔmfa hɔn akodze.

4 Afei hwɛ, iyi nye dza Amalickiah rohwehwɛ, na ɔyɛ nyimpa a noho yɛ har ara yie wɔ emumuyɛdze ne yɛ ho, dɛm ntsi ɔhyehyɛɛ wɔ n’akoma mu dɛ obotu Lamanfo hɔn hen no adze do.

5 Na afei ama oenya tum wɔ Lamanfo no a wɔnye ɔhen no yɛ adwen no do, na ɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ ɔbɛma hɔn a wɔyɛɛ asokyew no apɛ n’asɛm, dɛm ntsi ɔkɔr bea a wɔfrɛ no Onidah, hɔ na Lamanfo no nyina eguan akɛhyɛ, osiandɛ wohun dɛ nsordaafo no reba, na wɔdween dɛ wɔreba abɛsɛɛ hɔn, dɛm ntsi woguanee kɔr Onidah, bea a akodze hyɛ.

6 Na woeyi ɔbarimba bi dɛ ɔmbɛyɛ ɔhen nye banodzinyi wɔ hɔn do, nna woesi hɔn adwen pi dɛ wɔremma obiara nnhyɛ hɔn ma wɔnye Nephifo no nkɔkõ.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔboaa hɔn ano wɔ bepɔw bi a wɔfrɛ no Antipas n’etsifi, dze siesiee hɔnho dɛ wɔrobɔkõ.

8 Afei nnyɛ Amalickiah n’adwen dɛ ɔnye hɔn rokɔkõ osiandɛ ɔhen ne mbrasɛm nnse dɛm; mbom hwɛ, n’adwen ara nye dɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma n’enyim aba nyam wɔ Lamanfo nsordaafo no enyim, ama oeetum edzi hɔn enyim na oetu ɔhen no efi adze do na ɔafa ahenman no.

9 Na hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ ɔmaa no nsordaafo no sisii hɔn ntamadan wɔ bɔnsa a ɔbɛn bepɔw Antipa no mu.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a adzesaa bae no ɔsomaa binom wɔ nsumaamu dɛ wɔnkɔ bepɔw Antipas do nkɛse hɔn a wɔwɔ bepɔw no do no hɔn banodzi no a ne dzin dze Lehonti dɛ onsian mbra bepɔw no ase, na ɔpɛ dɛ ɔnye no kasa.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lehonti ne nsa kãa nkra no, ɔammpɛ dɛ obesian akɔ bepɔw no ase. Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalickiah somaa ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebien dɛ wonsian mbra. Na ɔbaa dɛ Lehonti ennsian; na ɔsomaa ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebiasa.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Amalickiah hun dɛ ne nsa rennka Lehonti ma onnsian famu nnfi bepɔw no do no ɔfoow bepɔw no, na ɔkaa kakra ma oedu Lehonti n’asoɛe hɔ no, ɔsomaa ne mpɛn a otsĩa anan ma wɔkɛkãa asɛm no bio kyerɛɛ Lehonti, dɛ ɔpɛ dɛ osian ba famu, na dɛ ɔmfa n’aweɔmfo no nka noho mbra.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lehonti nye n’aweɔmfo no sianee baa Amalickiah hɔ no, Amalickiah see no dɛ ɔnye no nsordaafo no nsian mbra adzesaaber mu na wombotwa dɔm no a ɔhen no ama no tum wɔ hɔn do no ho nhyia na sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔno (Amalickiah) banodzinyi a otsĩa ebien wɔ nsordaafo no nyinara do a ɔdze hɔn bɛhyɛ Lehonti ne nsa.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lehonti nye no dɔm no sianee na wobotwaa Amalickiah no dɔm no ho hyiae, na aber a wonyanee ahanamakye no nna Lehonti no nsordaafo no etwa hɔnho ehyia.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wohun dɛ woetwa hɔnho ehyia no, wɔtotɔe serɛɛ Amalickiah dɛ mma ɔmma wɔnnye hɔn enuanom no nnkɔkõ, amma wɔannsɛɛ hɔn. Afei iyi nye adze a Amalickiah rohwehwɛ.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔdze no dɔm no mae, dza ɔhen ne mbrasɛm tsia koraa. Afei iyi nye dza Amalickiah rohwehwɛ, ama oeetum ayɛ biribi dze etu ɔhen no adze do.

17 Afei ɔyɛ Lamanfo hɔn amandze dɛ sɛ hɔn banodzinyi panyin wu a, woyi banodzinyi a otsĩa ebien no ma ɔbɛyɛ hɔn banodzinyi panyin.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalickiah maa no nkowaa no hɔn mu kor dze edubɔn too Lehonti edziban mu nkakrankakra ma owui.

19 Afei, ber a Lehonti wui no, Lamanfo no yii Amalickiah ma ɔbɛyɛɛ hɔn banodzinyi nye ɔhwɛdofo panyin.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalickiah nye no nsordaafo no too santsen kɔr (osiandɛ ne nsa akã dza ɔrohwehwɛ) Nephi kurow a ɔyɛ kurow kɛse no mu wɔ Nephi asaase do.

21 Na ɔhen no puee abowano behyiaa no nye n’aweɔmfo no, osiandɛ ɔdween dɛ Amalickiah edzi ne mbra do, na dɛ Amalickiah aboaboa nsordaafo pii a ɔtse dɛm ano ma wɔakɔ nye Nephifo akɔkõ.

22 Mbom hwɛ ber a ɔhen no puee abowano dɛ oribehyia no kwan no Amalickiah see no nkowaa no dɛ wɔnkɔ nkehyia ɔhen no kwan. Na wɔkɔree kɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze wɔ ɔhen n’enyim, dɛ wɔdze enyidzi rema no osian ne kɛseyɛ ntsi.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen no tseen ne nsa dɛ orusuo hɔn mu ma wɔasoɛr, dɛ mbrɛ Lamanfo hɔn amandze tse a ɔkyerɛ asomdwee, dɛm amandze yi, wosũaa fii Nephifo nkyɛn.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a osuoo ma odzi kan no mu ma ɔsoɛree fii famu no, hwɛ ɔdze pea wɔɔ ɔhen no ma ohwiraa n’akoma mu; na ɔhwee famu.

25 Afei ɔhen no nkowaa no guanee; na Amalickiah no nkowaa no tseatseaa mu see dɛ:

26 Hwɛ, ɔhen no nkowaa no dze pea awɔ n’akoma ma ɔatɔr na woeguan; hwɛ, hom mbra mobɔhwɛ.

27 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalickiah hyɛɛ no nsordaafo no dɛ wɔnkɔ nkɔhwɛ adze kor a ayɛ ɔhen no; na ber a wɔbae no wohun dɛ ɔhen no da no bɔgyaa mu, Amalickiah yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ no bo efuw, na ɔsee dɛ: Obiara a ɔdɔ ɔhen no, ontsiw no nkowaa no na ɔnkyer hɔn mbra ma wonku hɔn.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn a wɔdɔ ɔhen no nyina ber a wɔtsee dɛm nsɛm yi no, tsiiw ɔhen no nkowaa no.

29 Afei ber a ɔhen no nkowaa no hun dɛ nsordaafo no ritsiw hɔn no, hɔn akoma tuu bio, na woguanee kɔr sar no do, na wɔbaa Zarahemla asaase do na wɔbɛkãa Ammon no nkorɔfo ho.

30 Na nsordaafo no a wotsiiw hɔn no saan hɔn ekyir a hɔn nsa annkã hɔn; na dɛm na Amalickiah, nam ne ndabraba kwan do dze maa dɔm no pɛɛ n’asɛm.

31 Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no ɔnye no nsordaafo no kɔr Nephi kurow no mu, na ɔfaa kurow no.

32 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ɔhembaa no tsee dɛ woeku ɔhen no—osiandɛ Amalickiah tuu bɔfo ma ɔkɛkãa kyerɛɛ ɔhembaa dɛ ɔhen no nkowaa no eku no, ma ɔnye no nsordaafo no etsiw hɔn, na mbom hɔn nsa annka hɔn, ma woeguan kɔ—

33 Dɛm ntsi, ber a ɔhembaa no ne nsa kãa nkra yi no, ɔsomaa ma wɔkɛkãa kyerɛɛ Amalickiah dɛ, ɔpɛ dɛ ɔdze dɔm a wɔwɔ kurow no mu hɔ no hɔn nkwa kyɛ hɔn; na ɔpɛ dɛ ɔba ne nkyɛn; na ɔpɛ dɛ ɔdze adasefo ba ma wobedzi dase so wɔ ɔhen no no wu ho.

34 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalickiah faa dɛm akowaa no a okum ɔhen no nye hɔn a wɔkã noho nyina, na ɔkɔr ɔhembaa no nkyɛn, wɔ bea a ɔtse no; na hɔn nyina gyee dase kyerɛɛ no dɛ ɔhen no nankasa no nkowaa no na wokum no; na wɔkãa so dɛ: Woeguan; ana iyi nngye dase nntsia hɔn? Na dɛm na wɔgyee ɔhen no wu ho dase kyerɛɛ ɔhembaa no.

35 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalickiah yɛɛ ma ɔhembaa no pɛɛ n’asɛm, na ɔwaar no; na dɛm na ɔnam ne ndabraba nye no nkowaa hɔn ndabraba do ma ne nsa kãa ahenman no; nyew, wɔgyee no too mu dɛ ɔyɛ ɔhen wɔ asaase no nye Lamanfo no nyina do, wɔyɛ Lamanfo nye Lemuelfo a wɔakã hɔnho abɔmu nye Nephifo etuatsewfo no nyina, ofi Nephi n’adzedzi ber do dze besi aber yi.

36 Afei etuatsewfo yinom enya nkyerɛkyerɛ kor nye nkyerɛkyerɛ kor noara a Nephifo no enya no, nyew, wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn Ewuradze ho nyimdzee kor noara, naaso, ɔyɛ ahobow dɛ wɔbɛkã dɛ wɔtseew etua no annkyɛr koraa na wopiriim hɔn akoma na wonnyi nnuho, na wɔbɛyɛɛ yerɛyerɛw mbordo, emumuyɛfo na ndam mbordo kyɛn Lamanfo no—wɔnye Lamanfo no bɔɔ hɔn amambra nyina; na wogyaa hɔnho maa dza ɔnnsɛ, nye ewurkadze ahorow nyina; nyew, hɔn werɛ fiir Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn koraa.
alma 48:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 48[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amalickiah nunu Lamanfo no ma wotsia Nephifo—Moroni siesie no nkorɔfo ma wɔbɔ dza ɔma wɔyɛ Christianfo no ho ban—Odzi dɛw wɔ ahotɔ na fahodzi mu na ɔyɛ Nyame nyimpa ɔkokodurfo. Bɛyɛ mfe 72 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ, ber a Amalickiah ne nsa kãa ahenman no, ɔhyɛɛ ase ntsɛmara dɛ ɔrekenyan Lamanfo no hɔn akoma etsia Nephi no dɔm no; nyew, oyii nyimpa ma wokegyinaa hɔn abantsentsen no do kasaa kyerɛɛ Lamanfo no dze tsiaa Nephifo no.

2 Na dɛm na ɔdze kenyaan hɔn akoma dze tsiaa Nephifo no araa ma atsɛmbuafo no hɔn afe a otsĩa duakron n’ewiei no mu, ber a ne nhyehyɛɛ no dzii mu ara yie no, nyew, na wɔhyɛɛ no hen wɔ Lamanfo do no, ɔpɛɛ so dɛ odzi hen wɔ asaase nyina do, nyew, wɔ nkorɔfo nyinara a wɔwɔ asaase no do, Nephifo nye Lamanfo so do.

3 Dɛm ntsi ne nhyehyɛɛ no edzi mu, osiandɛ oepirim Lamanfo no hɔn akoma na oefura hɔn adwen, na oenunu hɔn ma woenya ebufuw araa ma ɔaboaboa hɔn dɔm pii no ano dɛ wɔnye Nephifo no rokɔkõ.

4 Na osian no dɔm no hɔn dodow no ntsi, osii n’adwen tadua dɛ ɔbɛkã Nephifo ahyɛ ne tum ase na ɔdze hɔn aba nkowaasom mu.

5 Dɛm ntsi ɔyɛɛ Zoramfo hɔn mu binom asahen ekunyin, osiandɛ hɔn na wɔnye Nephifo no edzi nkitaho na wonyim mbrɛ hɔn ahoɔdzen tse nye hɔn sumabew, nye hɔn nkurow a ɔyɛ mberɛw; dɛm ntsi ɔyɛɛ hɔn asahen ekunyin wɔ no nsordaafo do.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔfaa hɔn ntamadan, na wosii mu dze faa sar no do dɛ wɔrokɔ Zarahemla asaase do.

7 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Amalickiah nam ndabraba nye akɔhwi kwan do dze regye tum no, nna Moroni so risiesie nkorɔfo adwen ma woedzi nokwar ama Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn.

8 Nyew, ɔrema Nephifo nsordaafo no nkuranhyɛ na orisisi aban nkakraba, anaa sumabew; ɔdze dɛtse risisi dze abɔ no nsordaafo ho ban na ɔdze abo so rotow ban etwa hɔnho, nye hɔn nkurow nye hɔn nsaase nyinara ho ehyia.

9 Na hɔn mbea a bambɔ no nnyɛ dzen no, ɔdze dɔm pii koguu hɔ; dɛm na ɔyɛe dze bɔɔ asaase a ɔyɛ Nephifo dze no ho ban yie.

10 Na dɛm na ɔyɛe dɛ ɔdze robɔ hɔn ahotɔ, hɔn nsaase, hɔn nyernom, nye hɔn mba, nye hɔn asomdwee ho ban ama woeetum atsena ase ama Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, na ama woeetum ekura dzekodze a ɔnam do ma hɔn atamfo frɛɛ hɔn Christianfo no mu dzen.

11 Na Moroni yɛ nyimpa pankor a noho yɛ dzen; ɔyɛ nyimpa a ɔwɔ ntseasee mapã; nyew, nyimpa a n’enyi nngye bɔgya kã gu ho; nyimpa a ne kra enyi gye ne man n’ahotɔ na fahodzi ho, na ɔdwen mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a n’enuanom befi nkowaasom nye dɔnkɔyɛ mu;

12 Nyew, nyimpa a ndaase ahyɛ n’akoma mu mã a ɔdze ma Nyankopɔn wɔ ndzinoa na nhyira pii a ohue gu no nkorɔfo do; nyimpa a odzi dwuma pii wɔ no nkorɔfo hɔn yieyɛ nye bambɔ ntsi.

13 Nyew, na ɔyɛ nyimpa a ne gyedzi a ɔwɔ Christ mu si pi, na ɔakã ntam edzi nsew dɛ ɔbɔbɔ no nkorɔfo, nye ne kyɛfa nye ne man, nye ne nyamesom ho ban, sɛ ɔba dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ ɔhwer no nkwa mpo a.

14 Afei wɔakyerɛkyerɛ Nephifo no dɛ wɔmbɔ hɔnho ban wɔ hɔn atamfo ho, sɛ ɔba dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ wɔkã bɔgya gu mpo a; nyew, na wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn so dɛ mma wɔnnto fintsidua da, nyew, na mma wɔnntwe afõwa wɔ obiara do gyedɛ ɔtamfo nko, na eso gyedɛ wɔdze robɔ hɔn nkwa ho ban.

15 Na hɔn gyedzi nye dɛ sɛ wɔyɛ dɛm a Nyankopɔn bɛyɛ hɔn prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase no do, anaa ne sin ara nye dɛ, sɛ wɔdze gyedzi dzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do a ɔbɛyɛ hɔn prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase no do; nyew, ɔabɔ hɔn kɔkɔ dɛ wonguan, anaadɛ wɔmboaboa hɔnho nkɔkõ, dɛ mbrɛ mbusu a ɔreba hɔn do tse;

16 Na eso dɛ Nyankopɔn bɛda no edzi akyerɛ hɔn, sɛ wɔnkõ mfa mbɔ hɔnho ban mfi hɔn atamfo ho a, na sɛ wɔyɛ dɛm a, Ewuradze bɛgye hɔn; na Moroni ne gyedzi nye iyi, na n’akoma hyɛɛ noho enyimnyam wɔ iyi mu; nnyɛ bɔgyakã ho, na mbom wɔ papayɛ ho, dɛ ɔrokora nkorɔfo do, nyew, na obedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do, nyew, na obeyi emumuyɛ akwa.

17 Nyew, nokwar, nokwar mese hom dɛ, sɛ nyimpa nyinara yɛɛ dɛ, na wɔtse dɛ, anaa nkyɛ dabi wɔbɛyɛ dɛ Moroni a, hwɛ, nkyɛ hɛl tum nyina bɔwosow afebɔɔ; nyew, nkyɛ abɔnsam rinnya tum wɔ adasamba hɔn akoma do da.

18 Hwɛ, ɔtse dɛ Mosiah ne babanyin Ammon ara pɛr, nyew, nye Mosiah ne mbabanyin nkaafo no so, nyew, ɔtse dɛ Alma na ne mbabanyin so, osiandɛ hɔn nyinara yɛ Nyame nyimpa.

19 Afei hwɛ, Helaman na n’enuanom no hɔn so soom dɔm no tse dɛ Moroni ara pɛr; na wɔkãa Nyame n’asɛm no, na nyimpa biara a otsiee hɔn nsɛm no wonumaa hɔn kɔr nnuho mu.

20 Na dɛm na wɔkɔr do, na osian hɔn nsɛm no ntsi dɔm no brɛɛ hɔnho adze araa ma wɔsɔɔ Ewuradze enyi, na dɛm ntsi akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi biara ennsi hɔn mu, nyew, bɛyɛ mfe ebiasa ntamu mpo.

21 Na mbom dɛ mbrɛ mekãe no, afe duakron n’ewiei mu no, nyew, ammfa ho koraa dɛ wɔtse asomdwee mu, ɔbaa dɛ wɔnye hɔn enuanom Lamanfo no kɔkõ, naaso nna ɔnnyɛ hɔn pɛ.

22 Nyew, ne sin ara nye dɛ, wɔnye Lamanfo ɔkõ no kɔr do mfe pii a, ɔwɔ mu dɛ nna wɔmmpɛ.

23 Afei ɔyɛɛ hɔn yaw dɛ wɔfaa akodze na wɔnye Lamanfo no kõe, osiandɛ hɔn enyi nngye ho dɛ wɔbɛkã bɔgya egu; nyew, na nnyɛ ne nyinara nye iyi—ɔyɛɛ hɔn yaw dɛ ɔnam hɔn do na hɔn enuanom mu pii efi wiadze yi mu kɔ onnyiewiei wiadze mu a wonnsiesiee hɔnho dɛ wɔnye hɔn Nyankopɔn bedzi ehyia.

24 Naaso, wɔremma kwan mma wɔnnsɛɛ hɔn nkwa, ma dɛm ewudzifo etsirmɔdzemfo yi a nkyɛ wɔyɛ hɔn enuanom, nyew, na wɔatsew etua efi hɔn asɔr mu, na wɔagye hɔn ho, na wɔakɔdɔm Lamanfo na wɔrebɛsɛɛ hɔn na woekuku hɔn yernom na hɔn mba.

25 Nyew, wɔremmpen mma hɔn enuanom yi nndzi dɛw wɔ Nephifo bɔgyaa do, wɔ mbertsentsen a binom wɔ hɔ a wodzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do, osiandɛ Ewuradze n’anohoba nye dɛ, sɛ wodzi ne mbrasɛm do a wɔbɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase no do.
alma 49:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 49[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfo no a woetu sa no nntum mmfa Ammonihah na Noah nkurow a wɔabɔ ho ban no—Amalickiah paa Nyame na ɔkã ntam dɛ ɔbɔnom Moroni no bɔgyaa—Helaman na n’enuanom kɔ do hyɛ Asɔr no dzen. Bɛyɛ mfe 72 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ bosoom a otsĩa dubiako wɔ afe a otsĩa duakron no mu wɔ da a otsĩa du wɔ bosoom no mu no, wohun dɛ Lamanfo nsordaafo no reba Ammonihah asaase do.

2 Na hwɛ, wɔakyekyer kurow no bio, na Moroni dze nsordaafo ekogu kurow no ne kurotsia, na wɔatow ndɛtse dze abɔ ho aporɔw dze agye hɔnho ban amma Lamanfo hɔn egyen-menaba nye abo annka hɔn; na hwɛ, wɔdze abo nye egyen-menaba kõ.

3 Hwɛ, mekaa dɛ Ammonihah kurow no wɔakyekyer no bio. Mese hom dɛ, nyew, wɔakyekyer ne fã bi; na osian dɔm no hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi Lamanfo no asɛɛ hɔ pɛn, wɔdween dɛ ɔrennyɛ dzen mma hɔn bio dɛ wɔbɛfa.

4 Na mbom hwɛ, hɔn abaw guraa kɛsenara; na hwɛ, Nephifo no etutu dɛtse aboa ano afã na afã dze etu bɔnsa etwa hɔnho ehyia, na ɔkrɔn ara yie ma Lamanfo nntum nntow hɔn abo nye hɔn egyen-menaba no nngu hɔn do mmpira hɔn, nna wonnkotum afa beebi aba hɔn do gyedɛ hɔn kwan a wɔfa mu no ara nko.

5 Afei dɛm aber yi no Lamanfo nsordaafo asahen ekunyin no hɔn abaw guraa mbordo, osian Nephifo no hɔn nyansaa a wonyae dze bɔɔ hɔnho ban no ntsi.

6 Afei Lamanfo hɔn banodzifo no dween dɛ osiandɛ wɔdɔɔ sõ ntsi, nyew, wɔdween dɛ iyi bɛma woetum aba hɔn do dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛ no daa no; nyew, nna hɔn so wɔdze akokyɛm, nye akatabo esiesie hɔnho, na wɔdze abowa-nwoma apempam ntar ahyɛ, nyew, ntar a no mu yɛ dur ara yie na wɔdze akata hɔn adagyaw do.

7 Na wosiesiee hɔnho dɛm no ntsi wɔdween dɛ ɔrennyɛ dzen mma hɔn koraa dɛ wɔbɛkã hɔn enuanom no ahyɛ na woedzi hɔn do konyim na wɔdze hɔn ahyɛ nkowaasom kɔndua mu, anaa woetwitwa hɔn eku hɔn dɛ mbrɛ wɔpɛ.

8 Na mbom hwɛ, hɔnho boow hɔn kɛsenara wɔ ber a wohun dɛ woesiesie hɔnho rotweɔn hɔn wɔ kwan bi do a wonnhun bi da wɔ Lehi ne mba mu. Afei nna woesiesie hɔnho rotweɔn Lamanfo no, na wɔnye hɔn akõ wɔ kwan a Moroni dze akyerɛ hɔn do.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no, anaadɛ Amalickifo no hɔnho boow hɔn mbordo ber a wohun mbrɛ woesi esiesie hɔnho dɛ wɔrobɔkõ no.

10 Afei sɛ ɔhen Amalickiah na odzii no nsordaafo hɔn enyim fi Nephi asaase do dze bae a nkyɛ annhwɛ a ɔbɛma Lamanfo no akɔ Nephifo no do wɔ Ammonihah kurow no mu; na hwɛ, ɔnodze ommbu no nkorɔfo hɔn bɔgyaa ho bi koraa.

11 Na mbom hwɛ, Amalickiah nankasa ammba ammbɔkõ. Na hwɛ, no nsordaafo no hɔn asahen ekunyin no enntum annkɔ Nephifo no do wɔ Ammonihah kurow no mu, osiandɛ Moroni asakyer nhyehyɛɛ biara a wɔyɛe wɔ Nephifo no mu araa ma Lamanfo no abaw guraa wɔ hɔn asoɛe hɔ ma woenntum ammba hɔn do.

12 Dɛm ntsi wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɔr sar no do na wɔkɛfaa hɔn ntamadan na wɔdze faa Noah asaase do kwan; wɔdween dɛ hɔ so nye bea a ntoado a obeye ama hɔn ama woeetum aba Nephifo do.

13 Nna wonnyim dɛ Moroni agyegye ban anaadɛ esisi aban atsentsen wɔ kuropɔn biara a etwa ehyia asaase no ho nyina; dɛm ntsi, wosii mu dɛ wɔrokɔ Noah asaase do a wɔabɔ hɔn tsirmu pɔw dzendzenndzen wɔ hɔnho; nyew, hɔn nsordaafo asahen ekunyin begyinaa hɔn enyim na wodzii nsew dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ dɔm a wɔwɔ dɛm kurow no mu no nyina.

14 Na mbom hwɛ, hɔnho boow hɔn, osiandɛ nna Noah kurow no a nkyɛ ɔyɛ bea a hɔ yɛ mberɛw, osian Moroni ntsi no, hɔ abɛyɛ dzen, na n’ahoɔdzen akyɛn Ammonihah kurow n’ahoɔdzen mpo.

15 Na afei, hwɛ, iyi yɛ Moroni ne nyansaa; osiandɛ osusuu ho na ohun dɛ sɛ wɔba Ammonihah kurow no mu a hɔn akoma botu; na Noah kurow no nye asaase ne bea a hɔ yɛ mberɛw, dɛm ntsi, wobefi hɔ akɔ hɔ nye hɔn akɔkõ; na dɛmara nna ɔrohwehwɛ.

16 Na hwɛ, Moroni eyi Lehi ayɛ no nsordaafo no hɔn asahen panyin dɛ ɔnhwɛ dɔm a wɔwɔ kurow no mu no do; na ɔno nye Lehi kor noara a ɔnye Lamanfo no kõe wɔ Sidon esutsen no boka afamu bɔnsa no mu no.

17 Na afei hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ, ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ Lehi na ɔhwɛ kurow no do no, hɔn abaw guraa bio, osiandɛ wosuroo Lehi dodow naaso nna hɔn nsordaafo asahen ekunyin no akã ntam edzi nsew dɛ wɔbɔkɔ kurow no do; dɛm ntsi, wɔdze hɔn nsordaafo no bae.

18 Afei hwɛ, Lamanfo no nnhu kwan biara a wɔbɛfa do dze akɔ hɔn abantsentsen no mu biara mu kã hɔn kwan kortsee no ho, osiandɛ ban a wɔatow dze abɔ kurow noho aprɔw no krɔn dodow, na mona a woetu dze etwa ho ehyia no so mu dɔ dodow, na kwan a ɔda hɔ ara nye kwan kortsee noara.

19 Na aber no nna Nephifo no ayɛ krado dɛ wɔbɔtotow abo nye egyen-menaba dze asɛɛ hɔn mu biara a ɔbɛper dɛ ɔbɔfow akɛhɛn abantsentsen no mu wɔ kwan biara do.

20 Dɛm na wɔboaboaa hɔnho, nyew, hɔn mbarimba akatakyi ahoɔdzenfo, dɔm a wokurakura hɔn nkrantsee nye hɔn totowabo ayɛ krado dɛ wobotwitwa obiara a ɔbɛper dɛ abodua kwan no mu dze aba bea a wɔabɔ ho ban no na dɛm na wɔboaboaa hɔnho dɛ wɔnye Lamanfo no robɔkõ dze agye hɔnho.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no hɔn nsordaafo asahen mpanyimfo no dze hɔn nsordaafo baa kwan no ano, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔnye Nephifo no ridzi aper wɔ hɔ, dze enya kwan dze hɔn aba bea a wɔagye ban wɔ no; na mbom hwɛ, wɔpaam hɔn fi ber to ber, araa ma wokum hɔn mu pii.

22 Afei ber a wohun dɛ hɔn nsa nntum nnda Nephifo no do wɔ kwan n’ano hɔ no, wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worututu hɔn dɛtse a wɔaboa ano no dze abɔ kwan ama hɔn nsordaafo no ma wɔafa mu, ama hɔn so woeetum nye hɔn akõ pɛr; na mbom hwɛ, ber a wogu do reyɛ dɛm no, wɔtotow abo nye egyen-menaba guu hɔn do dze paam hɔn fii hɔ; na ber a nkyɛ wɔpɛɛ dɛ wotutu dɛtse dze esiw mona no, hɔn efun na epirafo na wɔdze hyɛɛ mu mã.

23 Dɛm maa Nephifo no dzii hɔn atamfo do konyim; na iyi maa Lamanfo no peer dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ Nephifo no kesii dɛ wokum hɔn asahen ekunyin no nyina; nyew, wokum Lamanfo bɔbor apem; wɔ aber a nna woennku Nephinyi ɔkra kor.

24 Bɛyɛ hɔn mu eduonum na wopirapirae, iyinom Lamanfo hɔn egyen-menaba a wɔtotowee duaa kwan tseaba no mu no na ɔkãa hɔn na mbom hɔn akokyɛm nye hɔn akatabo, nye hɔn dadzekyɛw no gyee hɔn, dɛm ntsi wopirapiraa wɔ hɔn anan ho nko, na hɔn mu pii pirae ara yie.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ, ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ woekuku hɔn asahen ekunyin nyina no, woguanee kɔr sar no do. Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɔr Nephi asaase do, dɛ wɔrekɛkã akyerɛ hɔn hen Amalickiah a ɔyɛ Nephinyi wɔ awo mu no dza osii hɔ a ɔmaa hɔn mu pii ewuwu.

26 Na ɔbaa dɛ no bo fuuw no nkorɔfo no mbordo, osiandɛ ne nsa annka Nephifo no ammfa hɔn ammbɛhyɛ nkowaasom kɔndua mu.

27 Nyew, no bo fuuw mbordo ma dɛm ntsi ɔpaa Nyankopɔn, nye Moroni so, ɔkãa ntam dzii nsew dɛ ɔbɔnom no bɔgyaa; na iyi kyerɛ dɛ Moroni dzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do, ntsi na otumii siesiee sumabew dze maa no nkorɔfo no.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ, dɛm aber noara so mu nna Nephi no nkorɔfo no so daa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ase, wɔ no tum a onnyi kabea a ɔnam mu agye hɔn efi hɔn atamfo nsa.

29 Na dɛm na atsɛmbuafo hɔn afe a otsĩa duakron wɔ Nephi no nkorɔfo do dze baa ewiei.

30 Nyew, na asomdwee baa dɔm no hɔn mu kyɛree ara yie, na asɔr no yɛɛ prɔmprɔm kɛse osiandɛ wosii nketse suoo Nyame n’asɛm mu dɛ, ma dza Helaman na Shiblon, nye Corianton, nye Ammon na n’enuanom no kãa kyerɛɛ hɔn no, nyew, nye hɔn so a wɔnam Nyankopɔn ne nhyehyɛɛ krɔnkrɔn do hyɛɛ hɔn asɔfo, na wonumaa hɔn kɔr nnuho mu no, na wɔsomaa hɔn dɛ wɔnkɛkã nsɛmpa no wɔ dɔm no mu.
alma 50:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 50[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moroni bɔ Nephifo nsaase ho ban—Wɔkyekyer nkuropɔn fofor pii—Ɔkõ na ɔsɛɛ ba Nephifo do wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ na ekyiwadze nda no mu—Teancum dzi Morianton na no etuatsewfo do konyim—Nephihah wu na ne ba Pahoran bɛtsena atsɛmbu egua no do. Bɛyɛ mfe 72–67 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Moroni enngyaa akodze ho nsiesie, anaadɛ oenngyaa dɛ ɔbɔbɔ no nkorɔfo ho ban wɔ Lamanfo ho; na atsɛmbuafo no aber do afe a otsĩa eduonu no mu no ɔsee no nsordaafo no dɛ wɔnhyɛ ase ntutu dɛtse mboa ano mfa ntwa nkurow a ɔyɛ Nephifo dze no ho nyina nhyia wɔ asaase no do.

2 Na dɛm dɛtse no n’etsifi no, ɔsee hɔn dɛ wɔmfa ndupɔn nsisi do, nyew, wɔmfa ndupɔn nsisi ban a n’atsentsen bɛyɛ dɛ nyimpa ne tsentsen, mfa mbɔ nkurow no ho aprɔw.

3 Na ɔmaa wɔdze ndua a hɔn ano yɛ hwironhwirom sisii ndupɔn a wɔdze etwa ho ehyia nyina do; na ndua no yɛ dzen na ɔwowar.

4 Na ɔmaa wosisii abantsentsen a ɔbɔ ndua no do, na ɔmaa wosisii bambɔ mbea dze sisii dɛm abantsentsen no do, amma Lamanfo no hɔn abo nye egyen-menaba no emmpira hɔn.

5 Na wosiesiee hɔnho yɛɛ krado amma woetum atotow abo efi sor hɔ dɛ mbrɛ wɔpɛ na hɔn ahoɔdzen botum, dze eku nyia ɔbɛper dɛ ɔbɛbɛn kurow ne ban no ho.

6 Dɛm na Moroni yɛɛ dze bɔɔ kurow biara ho ban wɔ asaase no do nyina, dze siiw hɔn atamfo kwan.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni see no nsordaafo no dɛ wɔnkɔ sar a ɔda boka afamu no do; nyew, na wɔkɔr hɔ kɛpaam Lamanfo no a wɔwɔ sar a ɔda boka afamu no do ma wɔkɔr hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do, dza ɔda Zarahemla asaase n’anaafo afamu no.

8 Na Nephi asaase no da mu turododo fi po no boka dze kɔ n’anee afamu.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni paam Lamanfo nyina fii boka sar no do, dza ɔda hɔnankasa hɔn asaase n’etsifi no, ɔsee hɔn a wɔwɔ Zarahemla asaase do nye hɔn a wogu asaase a etwa hɔn ho ehyia no kɔr sar no boka wɔ mpoano afamu dɛ wɔnkɛfa asaase no.

10 Na ɔdze nsordaafo so koguu anaafo afamu wɔ hɔn asaase no nkurotsia, na ɔmaa wɔgyee ban ama wɔdze abɔ hɔn nsordaafo nye hɔn nkorɔfo ho ban efi hɔn atamfo nsa.

11 Na dɛm maa oyii Lamanfo no a wɔwɔ sar a ɔda boka afamu no hɔn bambɔ mbea no akwa koraa, nyew, nye anee afamu hɔ so, ɔgyee ban twaa Nephifo nye Lamanfo ntamu wɔ Zarahemla asaase nye Nephifo asaase ntamu, ofi po a ɔda anee afamu dze kɔ Sidon esutsen n’etsifo afamu—Asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu nyina bɛyɛɛ Nephifo dze, nyew, asaase a ɔda Dzifuu asaase n’etsifi afamu hɔ no nyina bɛyɛɛ hɔndze.

12 Dɛm na Moroni nye no nsordaafo no a wɔdɔr adzekyee biara no osian bambɔ a no ndwuma no dze maa hɔn no ntsi wotwaa Lamanfo no hɔn ahoɔdzen na hɔn tum fii hɔnankasa hɔn asaase ho amma woennya tum wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrotow kuropɔn bi ne fapemee, na wɔtoo no dzin Moroni kuropɔn; na ɔwɔ po no no boka afamu, na ɔda anaafo afamu bea a Lamanfo hɔn egyapadze asaase da no.

14 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase so dɛ wɔrekyekyer nkurow wɔ Moroni kurow nye Aaron kurow ntamu ama Aaron nye Moroni nkurow aatõa mu, na wɔfrɛɛ kurow no anaa asaase no Nephihah.

15 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase wɔ dɛm afe noara so mu dɛ wɔrekyekyer nkurow pii wɔ etsifi mantam afamu, na, no mu kor nye Lehi a ɔwɔ etsifi no mpoano afamu.

16 Na dɛm na afe a otsĩa eduonu no dze baa ewiei.

17 Na wɔ dɛm prɔmprɔmyɛ yi mu na Nephifo dze hyɛɛ ase wɔ afe a otsĩa eduonu biako mu wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no.

18 Na wɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm mbordo, na wɔyɛɛ esikafo mapa, nyew, na wɔdɔree na wonyaa ahoɔdzen wɔ asaase no do.

19 Na dɛm ma yehu mbrɛ Ewuradze n’ehumbɔbɔr nye no nokwardzi tse, na ɔma ne nsɛm nyina a ɔkã kyerɛ adasamba no hyɛ mã, nyew, yetum hu dɛ ne nsɛm yɛ nokwar, na aber yi mu mpo, dza ɔkãa kyerɛɛ Lehi, dɛ:

20 Nhyira nka ɔwo nye wo mba, na wobehyira hɔn, na susuampaara dɛ wobedzi me mbrasɛm do no wɔbɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase yi do. Na mbom susuampaara dɛ wonnkedzi me mbrasɛm do no wobotwa hɔn akyen efi Ewuradze enyim.

21 Na yehu dɛ dɛm anohoba yi ada edzi pefee wɔ Nephi no nkorɔfo do, osian hɔn ham, nye hɔn wentwiwentwi, nyew, hɔn ewudzi, nyew hɔn epoobɔ, hɔn abosonsom, hɔn ndwamambɔ, nye hɔn ebusudze a ɔdze akodzi nye ɔsɛɛ aba hɔn do ntsi.

22 Na hɔn a wodzi Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm do nokwar mu no nya ɔgye aber nyina, wɔ aber a hɔn enuanom emumuyɛfo mpempem kɔ nkowaasom mu anaa wɔhera wɔ nkrantsee ano, anaa wɔwodow wɔ gyedzi mu, na wɔnye Lamanfo dzi afora.

23 Mbom hwɛ ofi Nephi n’aber do dze ba, Nephi no nkorɔfo nnyaa ahomka kɛse nnsen Moroni n’aber do, nyew, besi aber yi mu wɔ afe eduonu biako mu wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn aber do.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsĩa eduonu ebien wɔ atsɛmbuafo hɔn aber do no so baa ewiei asomdwee mu, nyew, nye afe a otsĩa eduonu ebiasa no so.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe eduonu anan n’ahyɛse mu wɔ atsɛmbuafo aber do no so sɛ nnyɛ wentwiwentwi a ɔbaa hɔn mu wɔ Lehi asaase ho nye Morianton asaase a ɔsɔw Lehi asaase do no a, nkyɛ asomdwee bɛba Nephi no nkorɔfo mu, asaase ebien yi nyina da mpoano.

26 Na hwɛ nna nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Morianton asaase do no reper afa Lehi asaase no ne fã ayɛ hɔndze, dɛm ntsi wentwiwentwi kakra ara yie bi baa hɔn mu araa ma dɔm a wɔwɔ Morianton faa akodze dze kɔr hɔn enuanom no do, na wɔyɛɛ hɔn adwen dɛ wɔbɔtwe nkrantsee dze ekuku hɔn.

27 Mbom hwɛ, nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Lehi asaase do no guanee kɔr bea a Moroni wɔ, na wɔsee no dɛ ɔmboa hɔn, osiandɛ hwɛ, mfom biara nnyi hɔn afã.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Morianton hɔ a hɔn banodzinyi ne dzin dze Morianton hun dɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Lehi eguan kɔ bea a Moroni wɔ no, wosuroo mbordo osiandɛ wosusuu dɛ bɛyɛ na Moroni ne nsordaafo aba hɔn do abɛsɛɛ hɔn.

29 Dɛm ntsi, Morianton kãa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ wonguan nkɔ asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu no do, bea a esu akɛse wɔ no, na wɔnkɛfa dɛm asaase no a ɔda etsifi mantam mu no.

30 Na hwɛ, nkyɛ woribedzi dɛm nhyehyɛɛ yi do, (dza nkyɛ wobotwa ho kwadwom na mbom) hwɛ, Morianton yɛ obi a n’akoma haw no yie dɛm ntsi no bo fuuw ne mbaawa no mu kor, na ɔhwee no ara yie.

31 Na ɔbaa dɛ oguanee, na ɔkɔr bea a Moroni wɔ, na ɔkɛkãa biribiara a ɔfa dɛm asɛm noho, nye hɔn nhyehyɛɛ so a wɔayɛ dɛ woboguan akɔ etsifi mantam afamu hɔ no dze kyerɛɛ Moroni.

32 Afei hwɛ, nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Dzifuu asaase, anaa Moroni no, suroo dɛ wobetsie Morianton ne nsɛm na wɔakɛkã no dɔm no ho, na dɛm bɛma ne nsa akã dɛm asaase no ayɛ ne dze, na iyi bɛma kwan ma nsɛmansɛma a ɔyɛ dzen esisi Nephi no nkorɔfo mu, nyew, nsɛmansɛma a ɔbɛyɛ ma hɔn ahotɔ efi hɔn nsa.

33 Dɛm ntsi Moroni somaa nsordaafo dɛ wɔmfa hɔn ndzɛmba na wontwar Morianton no nkorɔfo nkedzi hɔn enyim ama woeesanka hɔn mma woennguan annkɔ asaase a ɔwɔ etsifi afamu no do.

34 Na ɔbaa dɛ woenntum enntwaar hɔn ennkedzi hɔn kan kesii dɛ wɔbaa Amamfõ asaase no ne hẽ do; na hɔ na wotwaar hɔn kwan tseatseaba bi a ɔda anaafo afamu a wɔdze kɔ etsifi afamu no do, nyew, dza po da n’anee nye no boka afamu so no.

35 Na ɔbaa dɛ nsordaafo no a Moroni somaa hɔn no a hɔn banodzinyi ne dzin dze Teancum no, hyiaa Morianton no nkorɔfo no; na Morianton no nkorɔfo no yɛ asokyewfo ara yie (na ɔdze n’emumuyɛ nye ne ndaadaasɛm dze nunuu hɔn) ntsi wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔnye hɔn rokõ; ɔkõ no mu no Teancum kum Morianton na odzii no nsordaafo no do konyim, na ɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum, na ɔnye hɔn sanee kɔr bea a Moroni wɔ. Na dɛm na afe eduonu anan wɔ aber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei.

36 Na dɛm na wɔyɛe dze saan Morianton no nkorɔfo ekyir. Na wɔmaa wodzii ahyɛmu dɛ wɔbɛma asomdwee aba no, wogyaa hɔn ma wɔkɔr Morianton asaase do bio, na wɔnye Lehi no nkorɔfo no yɛɛ kor na wogyaa hɔn nsaase no mu so maa hɔn bio.

37 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe kor noara mu no a Nephi no nkorɔfo nyaa asomdwee no, nna Nephihah a ɔyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin a otsĩa ebien no wui, na ber a ɔtse atsɛmbu egua no do no ɔyɛɛ dza odzi mu na ɔtsen wɔ Nyame enyim.

38 Naaso, ɔamma kwan ma Alma ammfa dɛm abakɔsɛm nye ndzɛmba no a Alma nye n’egyanom bu no dɛ ɔyɛ adze krɔnkrɔn no ennsie, dɛm ntsi Alma dze hyɛɛ ne babanyin, Helaman nsa.

39 Hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ Nephihah ne babanyin no na woyii no dze no sii atsɛmbu egua no do dze no hyɛɛ n’egya n’ananmu; nyew, woyii no yɛɛ no ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin nye ambrado wɔ dɔm no do a wɔmaa odzii nsew na ɔyɛɛ ayɛdze krɔnkrɔn dze kyerɛɛ dɛ obobu atsɛn nokwar mu, na ɔahwɛ ma asomdwee nye dɔm no hɔn fahodzi atsena hɔ daa, na ɔama dɔm no ndzinoa krɔnkrɔn ma wɔasom Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, nyew, ma ɔaboa oedzi Nyankopɔn ne nhyehyɛɛ do no nkwa nda nyina, na oebu emumuyɛfo atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn bɔn tse.

40 Afei hwɛ, ne dzin dze Pahoran. Na Pahoran na ɔtsenaa n’egya n’egua do, na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrohwɛ Nephifo no do wɔ afe eduonu anan n’ewiei mu.
alma 51:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 51[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ahensifo no pɛ dɛ wɔsesã mbra no na wɔhyɛ ɔhen—Dɔm no fua Pahoran na fahodzifo no ekyir—Moroni hyɛ ahensifo no dɛ wɔmbɔ hɔn ahotɔ ho ban, annyɛ dɛm a woboku hɔn—Amalickiah nye Lamanfo no fa nkurow pii a wɔabɔ ho ban—Teancum san Laman akofo no na oku Amalickiah wɔ n’asese mu. Bɛyɛ mfe 67–66 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ afe eduonu enum n’ahyɛse wɔ aber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no, ber a nna asomdwee aba Lehi no nkorɔfo nye Morianton no nkorɔfo ntamu wɔ dza ɔfa hɔn nsaasesɛm ho no, na afe eduonu enum no so ahyɛ ase wɔ asomdwee mu no;

2 Mbom, woenntum amma asomdwee enntsim asaase no do annkyɛr, osiandɛ wentwiwentwi hyɛɛ ase wɔ dɔm no mu a ɔfa no ɔtsɛmbuafopanyin Pahoran ho; na hwɛ, dɔm no mu binom wɔ hɔ a wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔsesã mbra no mu bi kakra.

3 Mbom hwɛ, Pahoran ammpɛ dɛ ɔsesã anaaso ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔbɛma kwan ma wɔasesã mbra no; dɛm ntsi, ɔannkasa hɔn a wɔdze bɔtoo n’enyim dɛ ɔnsesã mbra no hɔn ho.

4 Dɛm ntsi, hɔn a wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔsesa mbra no hɔn bo fuuw no, na wɔammpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin wɔ asaase no do bio; dɛm ntsi manso sii hɔn mu wɔ asɛm no ho, na mbom wɔannka bɔgya enngu.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔfrɛɛ hɔn a wɔpɛɛ dɛ wotu Pahoran fi atsɛmbu egua no do no ahensifo, osiandɛ wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔsesã mbra no wɔ kwan bi do a ɔbɛma woetum etu fahodzi aban no egu na wɔahyɛ ɔhen wɔ asaase no do.

6 Na hɔn so a wɔpɛɛ dɛ Pahoran da ho yɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin wɔ asaase no do no dze dzin fahodzifo too hɔn do; na dɛm na ɔdze mpaapaamu baa hɔn mu, osiandɛ fahodzifo no akã ntam anaadɛ woedzi ahyɛmu dɛ wobokura hɔn nyamesom ne kyɛfa na ne ndzinoa a fahodzi aban dze ama no mu.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɔm no hɔnankasa siesiee wentwiwentwi no. Na ɔbaa dɛ dɔm no fuaa fahodzifo no hɔn nsɛm ekyir, ma Pahoran daa ho tsenaa atsɛmbu egua no do, na iyi maa enyigye kɛse baa Pahoran n’enuanom no mu na ahotɔfo no hɔn mu pii so yɛɛ ma ahensifo no yɛɛ dzinn, na wosuroo dɛ wɔbɔkõ etsia hɔn na mbom wɔgyee fahodzi nsɛm too mu dɛmara.

8 Afei hɔn a wofuaa ahemfo no nsɛm ekyir nye hɔn a wɔyɛ adehye no, nna wɔrohwehwɛ edzi hen; na hɔn a wofuaa hɔn ekyir nye hɔn a wɔreper enya dɔm no do tum na tumdzi no.

9 Mbom hwɛ, nna dɛm aber yi nnyɛ aber a otwar dɛ dɛm wentwiwentwi yi ba Nephi no nkorɔfo mu; osiandɛ hwɛ, Amalickiah enunu Lamanfo no ma woenya ebufuw wɔ Nephifo ho, ma ɔroboaboa nsordaafo a wɔwɔ n’asaase no do hɔ nyina ano, na ɔmaa hɔn akodze, na ɔyɛɛ hɔn krado dɛ wɔrokɔkõ enyiberdo; osiandɛ ɔakã ntam dɛ ɔbɔnom Moroni no bɔgyaa.

10 Mbom hwɛ, yebohu dɛ ɔpɛɛ ntsɛm bɔɔ n’anohoba no; naaso, ɔboaboaa noho nye no nsordaafo no so ano ama wɔaaba na wɔnye Nephifo no abɔkõ.

11 Afei no nsordaafo no nndɔɔ sõ pii dɛ mbrɛ nkyɛ wɔtse no, osiandɛ Nephifo no ekuku hɔn mu mpempem; na mbom ammfa hɔnho koraa dɛ hɔn mu pii ahyew dze, eso Amalickiah boaboaa nsordaafo dɔm kese ara a oye ano ma dɛm ntsi nna onnsuro koraa dɛ ɔbɛba Zarahemla asaase do.

12 Nyew, Amalickiah nankasa so mpo na odzii Lamanfo no enyim bae. Na iyi sii atsɛmbuafo aber do wɔ afe eduonu enum no mu; na dɛm aber no ara so mu nna wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worisiesie wentwiwentwi a oesi ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin, Pahoran ho no.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a hɔn a wɔfrɛ hɔn ahensifo no tsee dɛ Lamanfo reba nye hɔn abɔkõ no, dɛw hyɛɛ hɔn akoma mu mã; na wɔpoow dɛ wɔbɛfa akodze, osiandɛ nna hɔn bo efuw ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no, nye ahotɔfo no, dɛm ntsi wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔbɛfa akodze dze abɔ hɔn man ho ban.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni hun dɛm no, na ohunii so dɛ Lamanfo no reba hɔn asaase n’ahe do no, no bo fuuw nkorɔfo a ɔaberɛ hɔnho ara yie dze agye hɔn no hɔn asokyew no; nyew, no bo fuuw kɛse; ebufuw hyɛɛ ne kra mã wɔ hɔnho.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔnye dɔm no yɛɛ adwenkor somaa ma wɔdze ntotɔserɛ nwoma kɛmaa asaase no do ambrado no dɛ wɔpɛ dɛ ɔkenkan na ɔma ɔno (Moroni) tum dɛ ɔnhyɛ etuatsewfo no ma wɔmbɔ hɔn kurow ho ban na sɛ wɔannyɛ a wonku hɔn.

16 Osiandɛ dza osi n’enyi do a odzi kan nye dɛ ɔbɛma wentwiwentwi nye etuatsew a ɔwɔ dɔm no mu no abɔ adze; na hwɛ, iyi na ɔdze ɔsɛɛ aba hɔn do. Na ɔbaa dɛ dɔm no penee do.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni hyɛɛ no nsordaafo no dɛ wɔnkɔ ahensifo no do nkotwuw hɔn adze wɔ famu mfa nsɛɛ hɔn ahantanyɛ nye hɔn adehyedzi anaadɛ wɔmfa akodze na wɔmfa mfua ahotɔ ekyir.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ nsordaafo no sii mu kɔr hɔn do; na wotwuuw hɔn adze, sɛɛ hɔn ahantanyɛ nye hɔn adehyedzi araa ma ber a wɔfaa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze, na wɔyɛɛ dɛ wɔnye Moroni no dɔm no robɔkõ no, wotwitwaa hɔn guu famu.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ etuatsewfo no hɔn mu mpem anan na wɔdze nkrantsee twitwaa hɔn guu famu; na hɔn banodzifo no a woennkuku hɔn wɔ ɔkõ mu no, wɔdze hɔn koguu efiadze, osiandɛ nna ber nnyi hɔ dɛm mber no mu a wɔdze bedzi hɔn asɛm.

20 Na etuatsewfo no a wɔaka no ammpɛ dɛ wɔbɛma wɔdze nkrantsee etwitwa hɔn egu famu, ntsi wɔpeen do dɛ wobedzi ahotɔ mfrankaa no do, na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ma wɔdze ahotɔ mfrankaa sisii hɔn abantsentsen do, nye hɔn nkuropɔn mu, na wɔfaa akodze dze bɔɔ hɔn man ho ban.

21 Na dɛm na Moroni yɛe dze siiw dɛm ahensifo no hɔn ano, na dɔm no mu biara nnyi hɔ bio a wɔfrɛ hɔn ahensifo bio; na dɛm so na ɔdze siiw hɔn a wɔse wɔyɛ adehye no hɔn ahantanyɛ nye hɔn asokyew ano; na mbom ɔmaa wɔbrɛɛ hɔnho adze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn enuanom nkaa no tse ara pɛr, ama wɔaakõ akokodur mu dze agye hɔn fahodzi efi nkowaasom mu.

22 Hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni gu do risiw akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi a ɔwɔ nankasa no dɔm no mu ano, na ɔdze hɔn rokɔ asomdwee nye enyibue mu, na ɔreyɛ nhyehyɛɛ a wɔbɛfa do dze ayɛ ahomboaboa nye Lamanfo no akɔkõ no, hwɛ, nna Lamanfo no aba Moroni asaase a ɔda mpoano afamu no do.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ nna Nephifo no a wɔwɔ Moroni kurow mu no hɔnho nnyɛ dzen, dɛm ntsi Amalickiah paam dɔm no na okum hɔn mu pii. Na ɔbaa dɛ Amalickiah faa kurow no, nyew, ɔfaa hɔn abantsentsen a wɔdze abɔ hɔnho ban nyina.

24 Na hɔn a woguanee fii Moroni kurow mu no baa Nephihah kurow mu; na dɔm a wɔwɔ Lehi kurow mu no so boaboaa hɔnho, na wosiesiee hɔnho yɛɛ krado tweɔɔn Lamanfo no.

25 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ Amalickiah amma kwan mma wɔannkɔ Nephihah kurow mu annkɔkõ, na mbom ɔmaa wɔtsenaa mpoano hɔ, na ogyaa nyimpa wɔ kurow biara mu dɛ wɔnhwɛ do na wɔmbɔ ho ban.

26 Na ɔkɔr do dɛmara dze faa nkurow pii, Nephihah kurow, nye Lehi kurow, nye Morianton kurow, nye Omner kurow, nye Gid kurow, nye Mulek kurow, iyinom nyina deda mpoano afamu.

27 Na dɛm na Amalickiah nam ne ndaadaa do ma Lamanfo a wonntum nnkan hɔn no nsa kãa nkurow pii, na dɛm nkurow yi nyina, Moroni gyee ban a ɔyɛ dzen dze bɔɔ ho ban; na dɛm ban yi nyina mu na Lamanfo dze yɛɛ hɔn sumabew.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ wosii mu kɔr Dzifuu asaase do, na wɔpaam Nephifo no wɔ hɔn enyim na wokunkum hɔn mu pii.

29 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ wɔnye Teancum no a okuu Morianton no na odzii no dɔm enyim nye hɔn guanee no hyiae.

30 Na ɔbaa dɛ otwaar Amalickiah so kedzii n’enyim, ber a ɔnye no nsordaafo nam dɛ wɔrokɔ akɛfa Dzifuu asaase nye asaase so a ɔda etsifi afamu no.

31 Mbom hwɛ n’abaw gurae, ber a ohyiaa Teancum nye no dɔm no osiandɛ wɔyɛ akofo mapã; na Teancum ne nyimpa kor biara n’ahoɔdzen so sen Lamanfo hɔn ahoɔdzen nye hɔn ɔkõ ho nyimdzee koraa, na iyi maa hɔn nsa daa Lamanfo no do.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔtseetsee hɔn na wokum hɔn araa kesii dɛ sum hyɛe. Na ɔbaa dɛ Teancum nye no dɔm no sisii hɔn ntamadan wɔ Dzifuu asaase no kurotsia hɔ; na Amalickiah so sii ne ntamadan wɔ mpoano afamu, na dɛm kwan yi do na wɔnam dze paam hɔn.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a adze sãe no, Teancum nye n’akowaa wiaa hɔnho kɔr Amalickiah ne nseraban hɔ; na hwɛ, nna nda afa no osiandɛ nna ɔafona ara yie osian berɛ a ɔaberɛ nna da no mu hyew ntsi.

34 Na ɔbaa dɛ Teancum wiaa noho bɔkɔɔ kɔr ɔhen no ne ntamadan mu, na ɔdze pea wɔɔ n’akoma mu; na okum ɔhen no ntsɛmara ma oennyan no nkowaa no.

35 Na ɔsaan n’ekyir bio nsumaamu kɔr ne nseraban hɔ, na hwɛ, nna no nkorɔfo no adeda, na onyaan hɔn na ɔkãa dza ɔayɛ nyina kyerɛɛ hɔn.

36 Na ɔmaa no nsordaafo no yɛɛ krado, ama sɛ Lamanfo no nyan na wɔba hɔn do a wɔnye hɔn akõ.

37 Na dɛm na afe eduonu enum wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei, na dɛm so na Amalickiah ne nda dze baa ewiei.
alma 52:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 52[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ammoron dzi Amalickiah n’adze na odzi Lamanfo do hen—Moroni, Teancum, na Lehi dzi Nephifo enyim ma wɔnye Lamanfo kõ dzi hɔn do konyim—Wɔsan gye Mulek kurow na woku Jacob, Zoramnyi no. Bɛyɛ mfe 66–64 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, ɔbaa dɛ afe eduonu esia mu, wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no, hwɛ, ber a Lamanfo no soɛɛr anapa wɔ da a odzi kan wɔ bosoom a odzi kan mu no; hwɛ, wohun dɛ Amalickiah ewu wɔ nankasa ne ntamadan mu; na wohun so dɛ Teancum reyɛ krado nye hɔn abɔkõ dɛm da no.

2 Na afei, ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛm no, hɔn akoma tui; na wogyaa dɛ wobesi mu akɔ asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu no do, na wɔnye hɔn nsordaafo no nyina saan hɔn ekyir kɔr Mulek kurow no mu, na wokosumaa hɔn abantsentsen mu.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ woyii Amalickiah no nuabanyin na wɔhyɛɛ no ɔhen wɔ dɔm no do; na ne dzin dze Ammoron; dɛm na ɔhen Ammoron, Amalickiah no nuabanyin no, wɔdze no dzii adze hyɛɛ n’ananmu.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhyɛɛ mbra ma no nkorɔfo no hwɛɛ nkurow no a wokyii bɔgya dze gyee no do yie; osiandɛ wɔammfa kurow biara a wɔannhwer bɔgya pii wɔ ho.

5 Na afei, Teancum hun dɛ Lamanfo no ayɛ hɔn adwen dɛ wɔremma kwan mma dɛm nkurow a wɔagye na asaase n’afã a ɔabɛyɛ hɔn dze no mmfi hɔn nsa; na afei so ɔhwɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow si dɔɔ sõ no a, ohun dɛ mfaso nnyi ho koraa dɛ ɔbɛyɛ n’adwen dɛ ɔnye hɔn bɔkɔ akɔkõ wɔ aban no mu.

6 Mbom ɔmaa no dɔm no bɔɔ hɔ aprɔw dɛ mbrɛ wɔroboaboa hɔnho akɔkõ; nyew, na nokwar ɔroboaboa noho dze abɔ noho ban, dɛm ntsi ɔrotow afasu na orisiesie mbea a wobotum ekosuma hɔ.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkɔr do boaboaa noho dɛ ɔrokɔkõ kesii dɛ Moroni somaa dɔmtutuw dɛ wɔmbɛkã no nsordaafo noho.

8 Na Moroni somaa so ma wɔkɛkãa kyerɛɛ no dɛ onsuo adaduafo nyina a ne nsa bɛkã hɔn no mu yie; na dɛ mbrɛ Lamanfo no ɔafa hɔn dɔm no mu binom adaduafo no, no so nsuo Lamanfo adaduafo no mu mfa nhyɛ hɔn a Lamanfo no afa hɔn no ananmu.

9 Na ɔsomaa so ma wɔkɛkãa kyerɛɛ no dɛ ɔmbɔ Dzifuu asaase ho ban yie, na ɔnweɔn kwan tseatseaba no a wɔfa do dze kɔ etsifi asaase do no yie, amma Lamanfo no nsa annka dɛm bea no mma woennya tum ammfa annhaw hɔn wɔ afã na afã nyina.

10 Na Moroni so somaa ma wɔkɛkãa kyerɛɛ no dɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ nokwafo na ɔkora asaase ne bea a ɔtse dɛm no do na ɔahwehwɛ kwan biara a obotum esi Lamanfo no mpire wɔ dɛm bea no yie dɛ mbrɛ obotum, ama gyangyanbiara sɛ obotum nam nyansa bi do anaa kwan fofor bi do agye dɛm nkurow a wɔagye efi hɔn nsamu no bio a; na dɛ ɔmbɔ mbɔdzen so mbɔ nkurow a etwa hɔnho ehyia no a Lamanfo no nsa nnkãe no ho ban na ɔnhyɛ hɔn dzen.

11 Na ɔkãa so kyerɛɛ no dɛ, nkyɛ mebɛba wo nkyɛn, na mbom hwɛ, Lamanfo no aba hɛn do na wɔwɔ asaase no n’ahe do wɔ po n’anee afamu; na hwɛ morokɔ hɔn do, dɛm ntsi murunntum mmba wo nkyɛn.

12 Afei, ɔhen no (Ammoron) efi Zarahemla asaase do, na ɔama ɔhembaa no atse dɛ no nuabanyin no ewu, na ɔboaboaa dɔmtutuw ara yie ano, na osii mu dɛ ɔrokɔ Nephifo do wɔ po n’anee afamu.

13 Na dɛm na ɔyɛɛ n’adwen dɛ ɔrekɛhaw Nephifo no, na ɔatwe hɔn nsordaafo no mu binom akɔ asaase n’afã hɔ, ber no nna ɔase no dɔm a oegya hɔn hɔ no dɛ wɔnhwɛ nkurow a ɔagye no do, na dɛ hɔn so wɔnhaw Nephifo no a wɔda po n’ano wɔ boka afamu no na wɔmbɔ mbɔdzen ara yie dɛ mbrɛ wobotum, ngye hɔn nsaase osian mbrɛ hɔn nsordaafo no wɔ ahoɔdzen tse ntsi.

14 Na dɛm na ɔmaa Nephifo no kegyina mbusu gyinabew wɔ ber a afe eduonu esuon dze rokɔ n’ewiei no wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo no hɔn hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no.

15 Mbom hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ afe eduonu esuon no mu wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do no, na Teancum nam Moroni n’anomusɛm do—Nyia ɔatsew nsordaafo kuw dɛ wɔmbɔ po mu nsaase n’ahe nye nsaase a ɔdeda anee ho ban; na wotuu ntsen faa Dzifuu asaase do kwan ama ɔaboa Teancum ma ɔagye nkurow no efi hɔn nsa bio.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ Teancum nyaa nkra dɛ ontu Mulek kurow do sa, na ɔnhwɛ sɛ obotum a ɔnsan ngye kurow no.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ Teancum boaboaa noho dɛ orukotu Mulek kurow do sa, na ɔnye no nsordaafo no kɔr Lamanfo no do; na mbom ohun dɛ ne nsa runntum nnda hɔn do ber a wɔhyehyɛ hɔn abantsentsen no mu no; dɛm ntsi ogyaa dza nkyɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ no na ɔsaan n’ekyir kɔr Dzifuu kurow mu bio, dɛ ɔrokɔtweɔn Moroni ma ɔaba, ama no nsordaafo no enya ahom.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni nye no nsordaafo no baa Dzifuu asaase do, wɔ afe eduonu esuon n’ewiei mu wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no.

19 Na afe eduonu awɔtwe n’ahyɛse no, Moroni nye Teancum nye nsordaafo no hɔn asahen ekunyin no mu pii hyiaa faa ɔko no ho apam—dza wɔbɛyɛ ma ɔbɛma Lamanfo no epue nye hɔn abɔkõ; anaa dza ɔbɛdan hɔn adwen ma woefi hɔn abantsentsen no mu epuei, ama woeetum edzi hɔn do konyim na wɔagye Mulek asaase no bio.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔsomaa nkorɔfo bi ma wɔkɔr Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo no a wɔweɔn Mulek kurow no hɔn banodzinyi a ne dzin dze Jacob no ne nkyɛn kɛsee no dɛ, wɔpɛ dɛ ɔnye no nsordaafo no hyia hɔn wɔ asaase petee a ɔda nkurow ebien no ntamu no do. Mbom hwɛ, Jacob, a ɔyɛ Zoramnyi no, ammpɛ dɛ ɔnye no nsordaafo no hyia hɔn wɔ asaase petee no do.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni ennya enyidado biara dɛ obehyia hɔn wɔ asaase papa biara do, dɛm ntsi ɔfaa adwen bi a obotum dze adaadaa Lamanfo no ma woefi hɔn abantsentsen no mu efi.

22 Dɛm ntsi ɔsee Teancum dɛ ɔmfa dɔm kakraabi na wonsi mu nkɔ mpoano afamu; na Moroni nye no nsordaafo no sii mu anafua wɔ sar no do fii Mulek kurow n’anee afamu; na ber a adze kyee no, Lamanfo aweɔmfo no hun Teancum, na wɔdze mbirika kɛkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn banodzinyi Jacob.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo nsordaafo no sii mu dɛ wɔreba Teancum do, na wosusuu dɛ wɔndɔɔ sõ ntsi wobedzi Teancum do konyim. Na ber a Teancum hun dɛ Lamanfo nsordaafo no reba no do no ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔresan n’ekyir kɔ mpoano, etsifi afamu.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ ɔasan n’ekyir ruguan no, wonyaa akokodur na wɔhyɛɛ ase dze ahoɔdzen tsiiw hɔn. Na ber a Teancum rotwe Lamanfo no a wɔtaa hɔn do kwa no rokɔ no, hwɛ, Moroni hyɛɛ no nsordaafo no a wɔkã noho no mu binom dɛ wɔnkɔ kurow no mu, na wɔnkɛfa.

25 Na wɔyɛɛ dɛmara, na wokum hɔn a wogyaa hɔn wɔ hɔ dɛ wɔnweɔn kurow no, nyew, hɔn a nna wɔmmpɛ dɛ wogyaa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze mu ma no nyina.

26 Na dɛm na Moroni no nsordaafo hɔn mu binom yɛe dze gyee Mulek kurow no, dɛm aber no nna no so ɔnye hɔn a wɔaka no esi mu dɛ worikehyia Lamanfo no a wɔtaa Teancum do no, sɛ gyangyanbiara wɔsan hɔn ekyir dɛ wɔreba a.

27 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no tsiiw Teancum kodur dɛ wɔbɛɛn Dzifuu kurow no, na hɔ na Lehi nye nsordaafo kakraabi a wogyaa hɔn wɔ hɔ dɛ wɔnweɔn Dzifuu kurow no hyiaa hɔn kwan.

28 Na afei hwɛ, ber a Lamanfo hɔn asahen ekunyin no hun dɛ Lehi nye no nsordaafo no reba hɔn do no, hɔn adwen mu yɛɛ hɔn basaa, dɛm ntsi woguanee osiandɛ nna wosuro dɛ bɛyɛ na sɛ Lehi bɔto hɔn a hɔn nsa annka Mulek kurow no; osiandɛ nna osian nantsew dodow ntsi wɔafonafona mbom nna Lehi no dɔm no dze wɔmmfonaa koraa.

29 Afei Lamanfo no nnyim dɛ Moroni nye no nsordaafo no esi hɔn ekyir; na hɔn a wosuro hɔn ara nye Lehi na no dɔm no.

30 Afei Lehi dze nna ɔmmpɛ dɛ ɔpa hɔnho kesi dɛ wobehyia Moroni nye no nsordaafo no.

31 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no twaa hɔnho hyiae ansaana Lamanfo no rokɔ kan, Moroni no dɔm wɔ afã, na Lehi no dɔm so wɔ afã, na hɔn nyinara so mmfonae na wɔwɔ ahoɔdzen ara yie; na mbom Lamanfo no dze nna wɔafonafona osiandɛ wɔanantsew kwan tsentsen.

32 Na Moroni see no dɔm no dɛ wɔnye hɔn nkɔkõ nkesi dɛ wobegyaa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze mu ama.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ Jacob, hɔn banodzinyi no so yɛ Zoramnyi, na no sunsum yɛ dzen, ntsi ɔdze ebufuw nye Lamanfo no kɔr dɛ wɔnye Moroni rokɔkõ.

34 Nna Moroni wɔ hɔn kwan no ara so do, dɛm ntsi Jacob yɛɛ n’adwen dɛ obokuku hɔn na oedua hɔn mu akɔ Mulek kurow no mu. Na mbom hwɛ, Moroni nye no dɔm no wɔ ahoɔdzen koraa kyɛn hɔn; dɛm ntsi wɔamma Lamanfo no kwan.

35 Na ɔbaa dɛ afã na afã nyina dze ebufuw kõe; na wokuum pii nara wɔ afa ebien no nyina nyew, na wopiraa Moroni nna wokum Jacob.

36 Na Lehi nye no dɔm ahoɔdzenfo dze ebufuhyew sii hɔn ekyir nye hɔn kõe araa ma Lamanfo no a wodzi ekyir no gyaa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze mu mae; na hɔn a wɔaka no adwen furae ma nna wonnhu dza wɔnyɛ, sɛ wɔnkɔ o, anaadɛ wɔnsan o.

37 Afei Moroni hun dɛ hɔn adwen asɛɛ no ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Sɛ hom gyaa hom ɔkõ ho akodze mu ma a, hwɛ yebegyaa dɛ yɛkã hom bɔgyaa egu.

38 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no tsee dɛm nsɛm yi no, hɔn nsordaafo asahen ekunyin no a wonnkum hɔn no nyina baa bɔtoow hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze guu Moroni n’ananadze, na wɔsee hɔn dɔm no so dɛ wɔnyɛ dɛmara.

39 Na mbom hwɛ, hɔn mu dodowara ammpɛ dɛ wɔyɛ; na hɔn a wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔn nkrantsee ma no, wɔfaa hɔn na wɔkyekyeer hɔn, na wɔgyee hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze fii hɔn nsamu, na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnye hɔn nuanom no nsi mu nkɔ Dzifuu asaase do.

40 Na afei hɔn a wɔfaa hɔn adaduafo no dɔɔ sõ koraa sen hɔn a wokum hɔn no, nyew, wɔdɔɔ sõ koraa sen hɔn a wokum hɔn wɔ afã na afã no nyinara.
alma 53:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 53[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wɔdze Laman adaduafo bɔ Dzifuu kuropɔn no ho ban—Etuatsew a osi Nephifo mu no dze Lamanfo hɔn konyimdzi ba—Helaman hwɛ Ammon no nkorɔfo no hɔn mberantsɛ a wɔyɛ nsordaafo mpemebien do. Bɛyɛ mfe 64–63 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔfaa aweɔmfo ma wɔweɔɔn Lamanfo adaduafo no, na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ nkesie hɔn efun, nyew, nye Nephifo so a wokum hɔn no hɔn efun; na Moroni faa nkorɔfo dɛ wɔnweɔn hɔn ber a wɔreyɛ hɔn edwuma no.

2 Na Moroni nye Lehi kɔr Mulek kurow mu, na ɔdze kurow no do tum hyɛɛ Lehi nsa. Afei hwɛ, Lehi yi nye ɔbarimba a ɔnye Moroni akɔ n’ako no ne kɛse; na ɔyɛ ɔbarimba tse dɛ Moroni noara, na hɔn enyi gyee dɛ hɔn nyinara wɔtse nkwa mu; nyew, wɔdɔɔ hɔnho, na Nephi no nkorɔfo nyinara so dɔɔ hɔn.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no wiee hɔn efun nye Nephifo so hɔn efun sie no, wɔnye hɔn sii mu kɔr Dzifuu asaase do; na Moroni kãa kyerɛɛ Teancum dɛ ɔmma wɔnhyɛ ase nyɛ edwuma na wontu mona mbɔ asaase noho aprɔw anaadɛ Dzifuu kurow ho aprɔw.

4 Na ɔmaa wosisii mpuna na wɔdze beabeaa mu wɔ mona no ekyir; na wɔsesaaw dɛtse fii mona no mu dze guguu mpuna a wɔdze beabeaa mu noho; na dɛm edwuma yi na wɔmaa Lamanfo no yɛe kesii dɛ wɔdze mpuna na dɛtse no toow ban tsentsen a ɔwar ara yie dze bɔɔ Dzifuu kurow no ho aprɔw.

5 Na dɛm kurow yi noho bambɔ yɛɛ dzen ara yie; na dɛm kurow yi mu na wɔweɔɔn Lamanfo adaduafo no; nyew wɔ ban a hɔnankasa dze hɔn nsa sii mpo mu. Afei nna ɔwɔ dɛ Moroni ma Lamanfo no yɛ edwuma, osiandɛ sɛ wɔyɛ edwuma a ɔyɛ mberɛw koraa dze ma hɔn a wɔweɔn hɔn no; na aber biara a ɔsɛ dɛ ɔnye Lamanfo no kɔkõ no, ɔpɛ dɛ ne nsa kã no nsordaafo nyina wɔ ne nkyɛn.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni dzii konyim wɔ Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafokuw kɛse no do, na ne nsa kãa Mulek kurow no a nna ɔyɛ Lamanfo no hɔn sumabew kɛse no mu kor wɔ Nephi asaase do; na afei osii bea bi so a ɔdze n’adaduafo siee mu.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔammper bio dɛ ɔnye Lamanfo no bɔkɔ akɔkõ wɔ dɛm afe no mu, na mbom ɔmaa no nkorɔfo boaboaa hɔnho wɔ ɔkõ ho, nyew, na wɔyɛɛ hamudwuma so ama ɔkɔm nye ɔhaw aammba hɔn mbaa nye hɔn mba do, na woenya edziban so dze ama hɔn nsordaafo no.

8 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni nnyi hɔ no, Nephifo binom kɛdaa hɔn nsumaamu nhyehyɛɛ bɔn edzi ma ɔdze etuatsew baa hɔn mu, na iyi maa Lamanfo no nyaa Nephifo no ho kwan ma hɔn nsa daa hɔn do, nyew, ɔyɛɛ dɛmara ma wɔgyee hɔn nkurow pii wɔ dɛm asaase no n’afã wɔ po n’anee afamu dze kɔ n’anaafo hɔ.

9 Na dɛm sii osian emumuyɛ a nna ɔwɔ hɔn mu no ntsi, nyew, osian etuatsew a ɔwɔ hɔn mu nye nokwar a woenndzi amma hɔnho no ntsi wɔdze hɔnho kɛhyɛɛ mbusu kɛse mu.

10 Na afei hwɛ, mowɔ biribi kã wɔ Ammon no dɔm no a ahyɛse no nna wɔyɛ Lamanfo; na mbom ɔnam Ammon na n’enuanom do, anaa ɔnam Nyankopɔn n’asɛm no tum do, nyaa nsakyer danee baa Ewuradze nkyɛn; na wɔdze hɔn baa Zarahemla asaase do, na Nephifo abɔ hɔnho ban fitsi dɛm aber no ho.

11 Na osian hɔn nsew a wodzii no ntsi wonntum ammfa akodze nye hɔn enuanom no nkɔkõ; osiandɛ woedzi nsew dɛ wɔrennkã bɔgya nngu bio; na osian hɔn nsewdzi no ntsi nkyɛ wɔbɛhera; nyew, nkyɛ wɔbɛma hɔnho kwan ma woehu amandze wɔ hɔn enuanom nsa, sɛ nnyɛ Ammon nye no nuanom no hɔn ehumbɔbɔr nye hɔn dɔ kɛse a wonyaa maa hɔn no a.

12 Na iyi ho ntsi na wɔdze hɔn baa Zarahemla asaase do; na Nephifo no abɔ hɔnho ban fitsi dɛm aber no.

13 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ ber a wohun mbusu, nye amandzehu na abɛbrɛsɛ a Nephifo ruhu ma hɔn no, hɔn yamu hyehyee hɔn na wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔfa akodze dze bɔ hɔn man ho ban.

14 Mbom hwɛ, ber a nkyɛ wɔrebɛfa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze no ara pɛr na Helaman nye n’enuanom no bae nye hɔn bɛkasae ara ma wɔgyee too mu, osiandɛ nkyɛ woebu nsew a woedzi no.

15 Na Helaman suroo dɛ, sɛ wɔyɛ dɛm a bɛyɛ na wɔayew hɔn akra; dɛm ntsi wɔsee hɔn a wɔahɛn dɛm ahyɛmudzi yi mu no dɛ wongyaa mma hɔn enuanom no nsɔw hɔn amandzehu no wɔ hɔn gyinabew huhu yi mu wɔ dɛm mber yi mu.

16 Mbom hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ nna wɔwɔ mbabanyin pii, a wɔnnhɛn ahyɛmudzi biara mu dɛ wɔremmfa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze nnko nntsia hɔn atamfo mmfa nngye hɔnho; dɛm ntsi hɔn mu dodow a wobotum afa akodze no poon hɔnho hyiae na wɔfrɛɛ hɔnho Nephifo.

17 Na wodzii ahyɛmu dɛ wɔbɔkõ dze ahwehwɛ Nephifo no hɔn ahotɔ, nyew, dɛ wɔdze hɔn nkwa bɔto hɔ dze abɔ asaase no ho ban; nyew, na woedzi ahyɛmu mpo dɛ worinngyaa hɔn ahotɔ mu mma ara da, na mbom wɔbɔkõ wɔ adze nyinara mu dze abɔ Nephifo nye hɔnankasa so hɔnho ban efi nkowaasom mu.

18 Afei hwɛ, mberantsɛ a wɔwɔ hɔ no mu mpemebien na wodzii dɛm ahyɛmu yi na wɔfaa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze dɛ wɔdze bɔbɔ hɔn ɔman ho ban.

19 Na afei hwɛ, mber biara nnyi hɔ a wɔannyɛ Nephifo no mboa na dɛm aber yi so mu na wɔayɛ hɔn mboa kɛse a ɔtse dɛm; na wɔfaa hɔn akodze, na wɔsee Helaman dɛ ɔnyɛ hɔn banodzinyi.

20 Na hɔn nyina yɛ mberantsɛ, na wɔwɔ akokodur a ɔyɛ ndam, na wɔwɔ ahoɔdzen na hɔnho yɛ hyew so; na mbom hwɛ, nnyɛ ne nyina nye iyi—wɔyɛ nyimpa a wodzi nokwar aber nyina wɔ biribiara a wɔdze ahyɛ hɔn nsa ho.

21 Nyew, wɔyɛ nyimpa a wodzi nokwar na wɔdwe, osiandɛ wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn dɛ wondzi Nyame ne mbrasɛm do na wɔnantsew tseneneeyɛ mu wɔ n’enyim.

22 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Helaman dzii no nsordaafo mberantsɛ nkakraba mpem ebien no enyim, sii mu kɔr dɛ wɔrokɔboa nkorɔfo a wɔda asaase n’ahe do a ɔwɔ po n’anee afamu dze kɔ n’anaafo hɔ no.

23 Na dɛm na afe eduonu awɔtwe wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei.
alma 54:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 54[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ammoron na Moroni kã kwan a wɔbɛfa do asesã adaduafo ho asɛm—Moroni hwehwɛ dɛ Lamanfo bɔtwe hɔn nsordaafo ekyir na woegyaa hɔn yerɛyerɛw no yɛ—Ammoron hwehwɛ dɛ Nephifo dze hɔn akodze bogu famu na wɔabɛhyɛ Lamanfo ase. Bɛyɛ mfe 63 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ afe eduonu akron mu wɔ atsɛmbuafo aber do no, Ammoron somaa ma wɔkɔr Moroni hɔ kɛsee no dɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ɔdze n’adaduafo ba dze bɛgye nedze.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni n’enyi gyee mbordo wɔ dɛm ebisadze yi ho, osiandɛ ɔpɛ dɛ edziban a ɔdze nyɛn Lamanfo adaduafo no, ɔdze nyɛn nankasa no nkorɔfo; na ɔpɛ so dɛ ne nsa kã nankasa no nkorɔfo ma wɔbɛkã ho ma no nsordaafo dɔr.

3 Afei Lamanfo no afa mbaa nye mbofra pii ndɔmmum na ɔbaa anaa abofra kor mpo nnyi Moroni n’adaduafo mu, anaadɛ adaduafo a Moroni afa hɔn no mu; dɛm ntsi Moroni hwehwɛɛ nyansakwan bi a ɔbɛfa do dze agye Nephifo adaduafo no pii dɛ mbrɛ obotum efi Lamanfo hɔ.

4 Dɛm ntsi ɔkyerɛɛw nwoma na ɔdze maa Ammoron n’akowaa kor noara a ɔdze nwoma brɛɛ Moroni no ma ɔdze kɛmaa no. Afei iyi nye nsɛm a ɔkyerɛwee dze kɛmaa Ammoron:

5 Hwɛ, Ammoron, makyerɛw wo biribi a ɔfa ɔkõ yi a erokõ tsia mo nkorɔfo yi, anaadɛ wo nuabanyin akõ etsia hɔn, na wo so esi nketse dɛ ebɔsɔw do wɔ no wu ekyir yi.

6 Hwɛ, mebɛkã biribi a ɔfa Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛrdzi ho, nye n’ebufuhyew nkrantsee no, dza ɔsensɛn wo do no, nna gyedɛ inu woho na efa wo nsordaafo fi ha dze hɔn kɔ homankasa hom nsaase do, anaadɛ asaase a ɔyɛ hom dze a ɔyɛ Nephi asaase no do.

7 Nyew, mebɛkã dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho asɛm akyerɛ wo, sɛ ibotum ayɛ aso etsie a; nyew, merekã dɛm hɛl no a ɔda hɔ rotweɔn agye ewudzifo a wɔtsetse dɛ ɔwo nye wo nuabanyin no, nna gyedɛ inu woho na igyaa w’ewudzidze botae no, na enye wo nsordaafo no san hom ekyir kɔ homankasa hom asaase do.

8 Mbom dɛ apow dɛm ndzɛmba yinom, na akõ etsia Ewuradze no dɔm yi, dɛmara so na minyim dɛ ebɛyɛ so bio.

9 Na afei hwɛ, yɛayɛ krado rotweɔn hom; nyew, na gyedɛ esakyer wo su, annyɛ dɛm a ebɔtwe Nyankopɔn no a apow no no n’ebufuhyew aba wo do, ma ɔasɛɛ wo korakora mpo.

10 Mbom dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi, hɛn nsordaafo bɛba wo do; nna gyedɛ hom san hom ekyir, annyɛ dɛm a ɔrennkyɛr na owu aba hom nkyɛn osiandɛ hɛn nkurow nye hɛn nsaase bɛda ho atsena hɔ ama hɛn, nyew, na yebosuo hɛn som nye hɛn Nyame dwuma mu yie.

11 Mbom hwɛ, ɔyɛ me dɛ merekã dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho nsɛm kyerɛ wo kwa; anaadɛ ɔyɛ me dɛ eyɛ hɛl ba; dɛm ntsi medze mo nwoma yi aba ewiei a merekã kyerɛ wo dɛ meremmfa m’adaduafo nnsesã w’adaduafo, gyedɛ hom gye to mu dɛ hom dze banyin na ne yer na ne mba bɛma dze agye daduanyi kor; na sɛ dɛm nhyehyɛɛ yi hom bedzi do a, ɔno mebɛyɛ.

12 Na hwɛ, sɛ annyɛ iyi a, menye mo nsordaafo bɛba wo do; nyew, medze akodze bɛma me mbaa nye mo mbofra mpo, na mebɛba wo do, na mebɛkã wo do araa dze ekodu wankasa w’asaase do mpo, dza ɔyɛ hɛn egyapadze asaase a odzi kan no; nyew, na yɛdze bɔgya bɛhyɛ bɔgya ananmu, nyew, nkwa bɛhyɛ nkwa ananmu; na menye wo bɔkõ araa ekesi dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ wo efi asaase yi enyi do.

13 Hwɛ, mowɔ m’ebufuw mu, na mo dɔm so dɛmara; hom reper dɛ hom boku hɛn, na hɛn dze yɛreper dɛ yɛbɔbɔ hɛnho ban. Mbom hwɛ, sɛ hom rohwehwɛ asɛɛ hɛn a hɛn so yɛbɛsɛɛ hom koraa; nyew, na yɛbɛgye hɛn asaase, hɛn egyapadze asaase a odzi kan no.

14 Afei medze mo nwoma aba ewiei. Emi nye Moroni; emi nye Nephifo hɔn banodzinyi no.

15 Afei ɔbaa dɛ Ammoron, ber a ne nsa kãa dɛm nwoma yi no, no bo fuwii; na ɔkyerɛɛw nwoma kor so dze kɛmaa Moroni, na dɛm nsɛm yi na ɔkyerɛwee:

16 Emi nye Ammoron, Lamanfo hɔn hen no; emi nye Amalickiah no a ikum no no nuabanyin. Hwɛ, mobɔtɔ no wer wɔ wo do, nyew, na menye mo nsordaafo bɛba wo do osiandɛ munnsuro w’ehunahuna no.

17 Na hwɛ, hom egyanom yɛɛ hɔn enuanom bɔn, na wotwaa hɔn edwoo gyee hɔn nsamu ahendzi ho kyefa a nna ɔyɛ hɔndze no.

18 Na afei hwɛ, sɛ hom dze hom akodze bogu famu, na hom dze homho abɛhyɛ hɔn a ahendzi no dzi wɔ hɔn no hɔn ase a, ɔno mebɛma mo nkorɔfo dze hɔn akodze egu famu na woegyaa dɛ wɔnye hom bɔkõ bio.

19 Hwɛ, hom ehunahuna emi na mo nkorɔfo; na mbom hwɛ, yennsuro hom ehunahuna no.

20 Naaso, mepen do enyigye mu dɛ yɛbɛsesa adaduafo dɛ mbrɛ erohwehwɛ ma yɛayɛ no, ama mesie m’edziban ama mo dɔm a wɔkõ no; na yɛbɔkõ ɔkõ bi a onnyiewiei, dɛ yɛbɛkã Nephifo ahyɛ hɛn tum ase anaadɛ yɛbɛhyew hɔn koraa.

21 Na dɛ ɔfa Nyame no a hom se yɛapow no no, hwɛ, yennyim obi a ɔtse dɛm; nna hom so hom nnyim obi a ɔtse dɛm; na mbom sɛ biribi tse dɛm wɔ hɔ dze a, hɛndze yennyim na mbom dɛ ɔno na ɔbɔɔ hɛn nye hom so.

22 Na sɛ ɔwɔ mu dɛ abɔnsam na hɛl wɔ hɔ a, hwɛ ana ɔnnkɛfa wo akɔ hɔ ma enye mo nuabanyin no a ikum no na akã dɛ ɔkɔ dɛm bea no do no akɛtsena bi a? Na mbom hwɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom mmfa ho.

23 Emi nye Ammoron, Zoram n’asenyi, nyia hom egyanom hyɛɛ no na wɔnye no fii Jerusalem bae no.

24 Na hwɛ afei, meyɛ Lamannyi ɔkokodurfo; hwɛ, na bɔn a wɔdze yɛɛ hɔn no ntsi na yɛrokõ dɛm ɔkõ yi dze agye ahendzi no kyɛfa no; na medze mo nwoma a merekyerɛw dze akɛma Moroni no aba ewiei.
alma 55:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 55[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moroni pow dɛ ɔbɛsesa adaduafo—Wɔdze nsã daadaa Laman aweɔmfo no ma wɔbow, na woyi Nephi adaduafo no ma woguan—Wɔfa Gid kurow wɔ ber a wɔnnkã bɔgya biara nngu. Bɛyɛ mfe 63–62 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni ne nsa kãa nwoma yi no, no bo fuuw kɛse osiandɛ onyim dɛ Ammoron nyim pefee dɛ oridzi akɔhwi; nyew, onyim dɛ Ammoron nyim dɛ dza ɔnam do ma ɔnye Nephifo rokõ no nnyɛ.

2 Na ɔsee dɛ: Hwɛ, menye Ammoron rennsesa adaduafo no gyedɛ ɔsakyer ne ndzeyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ mekyerɛwee wɔ mo nwoma no mu no; na meremmpen do mma no mma onnya ahoɔdzen kɛse nnsen dza ɔwɔ no.

3 Hwɛ, minyim bea a Lamanfo no roweɔn mo nkorɔfo no a wɔafa hɔn adaduafo no wɔ; na sɛ Ammoron rennyɛ dza mekyerɛwee wɔ mo nwoma mu no a, hwɛ, mebɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ makã no pɛpɛɛpɛr; nyew, mobokuku hɔn araa ekesi dɛ wɔbɔhwehwɛ asomdwee n’ekyir kwan.

4 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔsee dɛ wɔnhwehwɛ no dɔm no mu dɛ gyangyanbiara wobohu obi a ɔyɛ Laman n’asenyi wɔ hɔn mu.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ wohun kor a ne dzin dze Laman; na ɔyɛ ɔhen no a Amalickiah kum no no nkowaa mu kor.

6 Afei Moroni see Laman nye no dɔm no hɔn mu kakra dɛ wɔnkɔ aweɔmfo no a wɔhwɛ Nephifo do no nkyɛn.

7 Afei Nephifo yi wɔ Gid kurow mu na wɔweɔn hɔn; dɛm ntsi Moroni yii Laman na ɔsee no dɔm no hɔn mu kakra dɛ wɔnye no nkɔ.

8 Na ewimber no Laman kɔr aweɔmfo no a wɔhwɛ Nephifo do no nkyɛn, na hwɛ wohun dɛ ɔreba no, wohuhoor no; na mbom ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Mma hom nnsuro; hwɛ, meyɛ Lamannyi. Hwɛ, Nephifo no adeda, na yeguan efi hɔn nkyɛn; na hwɛ yɛafa hɔn wenyin dze aba.

9 Afei ber a Lamanfo no tsee dɛm nsɛm yi no, wɔdze enyigye gyee no; na wɔsee no dɛ: Fa wo wenyin yi ma hɛn ma yɛnom; ɔyɛ hɛn ahomka dɛ edze wenyin kãa woho bae osiandɛ yɛafonafona.

10 Mbom Laman see hɔn dɛ: Hom mma yɛmfa hɛn wenyin nsie na yɛnkɔ nye Nephifo no nkɔkõ ana. Mbom dɛm kasa yi maa hɔn kɔn dɔɔ mbordo dɛ wɔbɔnom wenyin no;

11 Na wɔsee dɛ: Yɛafonafona, dɛm ntsi ma yɛnom wenyin yi, na ɔnnkɛkyɛr biara wɔbɛbrɛ hɛn wenyin a ɔbɛma hɛn ahoɔdzen ma yɛakɔ yɛnye Nephifo no akɔkõ.

12 Na Laman see hɔn dɛ: Hom botum ayɛ dza hom pɛ.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔnoom wenyin no ara yie; nna ɔyɛ hɔn dɛw dodow dɛm ntsi wɔnoom mbordo; na ɔyɛ dzen so, osiandɛ wɔyɛɛ no yie.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔnomee na hɔn enyi gyee, na annkyɛr biara na hɔn nyinara bobowee.

15 Na afei ber a Laman nye no dɔm no hun dɛ wɔabobow na wɔada tuu no, wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɔr Moroni hɔ kɛkãa ndzɛmba a esi hɔ nyina kyerɛɛ no.

16 Na afei dɛm adze yi yɛ Moroni ne nhyehyɛɛ. Na Moroni maa no dɔm a oesiesie hɔn no ɔkõ ho akodze; na ɔmaa wɔkɔr Gid kurow mu ber a Lamanfo no adeda tuu na wɔabobow no, na wɔtotoow ɔkõ ho akodze dze maa hɔn a wɔwɔ ndɔmmum mu no araa ma hɔn nyinara nyaa akodze;

17 Nyew, wɔmaa hɔn mbaa nye mba a wobotum akõ nyina akodze, na Moroni dze akodze yi maa adaduafo no bɔkɔɔ.

18 Mbom sɛ wonyaan Lamanfo no a, hwɛ nkyɛ hɔn nyina abobow ntsi Nephifo no botum ekuku hɔn.

19 Mbom hwɛ, nnyɛ dɛm na Moroni rohwehwɛ; n’enyi anngye ewudzi anaa bɔgya kã ho, na mbom n’enyi gyee dɛ obeyi no nkorɔfo no efi ɔsɛɛ mu; na iyi ntsi na ɔmmpɛ dza ɔnntsen wɔ n’akwan mu, ɔronnkɔ nnkɛsɛɛ Lamanfo no wɔ aber a wɔabobow.

20 Mbom ne nsa akã dza ɔrohwehwɛ; osiandɛ ɔama adaduafo no a wɔwɔ kurow a wɔagye ho ban no mu no akodze, na ɔama hɔn tum dɛ wɔngye mbea nyina a ɔwɔ ban no mu no.

21 Na ɔsee dɔm a wɔnye no wɔ hɔ no dɛ wɔntwe hɔnho kakra mfi hɔn nkyɛn, na wontwa Lamanfo nsordaafo no ho nhyia.

22 Afei hwɛ wɔyɛɛ dɛm adze yi nyina anafua, ntsi ber a Lamanfo no nyaan anapa no wohun dɛ Nephifo no etwa hɔnho ehyia wɔ ban no ekyir na hɔn adaduafo no so dzedze akodze wɔ ban no mu.

23 Na iyi maa wohun dɛ Nephifo no enya tum wɔ hɔn do; na dɛm gyinabew yi maa wohun dɛ ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔnye Nephifo no kõ; dɛm ntsi hɔn nsordaafo mu asahen ekunyin no see hɔn dɛ wɔmfa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze mbrɛ hɔn, na wɔdze baa boguu Nephifo no ananadze, na wɔserɛɛ hɔn dɛ wonhu hɔn mbɔbɔr.

24 Afei hwɛ, dza Moroni rohwehwɛ ara nye iyi. Ɔfaa hɔn ɔkõ mu adaduafo, na ɔgyee kurow no, na ɔmaa wogyaa Nephifo adaduafo no nyinara ma wɔbɛkãa Moroni no nsordaafo ho, na iyi maa no nsordaafo hɔn ahoɔdzen yɛɛ kɛse.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔsee Lamanfo a ɔafa hɔn adaduafo no dɛ wɔnhyɛ ase nyɛ edwuma ngye ban a ɔyɛ dzen mfa mbɔ Gid kurow ho aprɔw.

26 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔgyee Gid kurow ho ban, dɛ mbrɛ ɔrohwehwɛ no, ɔsee dɛ wɔmfa n’adaduafo no nkɔ Dzifuu kurow mu; na ɔmaa nsordaafo a hɔnho yɛ dzen yie bɔɔ dɛm kuropɔn no so ho ban.

27 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo hɔn ndabraba nyina ammfa hɔnho, ma adaduafo nyina a wɔfaa hɔn no, wɔdze hɔn siee na wɔbɔɔ hɔnho ban, na wɔkoraa nsaase nyina so a hɔn nsa akã no bio no so do yie.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ woridzi konyim bio, na wɔregye hɔn kyɛfa na ndzinoa bio.

29 Mpɛn pii na Lamanfo peer dɛ wobotwa hɔnho ehyia anafua, na dɛm ndzeyɛɛ no maa wɔyeew adaduafo pii.

30 Na mpɛn pii so na wɔpeer dɛ wɔbɛma Nephifo no anom hɔn wenyin, ama bɔr anaa hɔn nsãbow asɛɛ hɔn.

31 Mbom hwɛ, Nephifo annyɛ nyaa wɔ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ne nkaa ho wɔ dɛm amandzehuber yi mu. Hɔn efir ammpa hɔn da; nyew, wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔnom hɔn wenyin wɔ aber a wonndzii kan mmfaa bi mmaa Lamanfo adaduafo no.

32 Na wɔhwɛɛ hɔnho yie amma hɔn mu biara annom bɔr no osiandɛ sɛ hɔn wenyin tum ku Lamannyi a nna obotum eku Nephinyi so; na dɛm na wɔdze yɛɛ sɔɔ hɔn nsã hyew biara hwɛe.

33 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ okehiaa dɛ Moroni yɛ mboaboaho na ɔkɔ Morianton kurow so do; osiandɛ hwɛ, Lamanfo no bɔɔ mbɔdzen gyee ban dze bɔɔ Morianton kurow ho araa kesii dɛ hɔ bɛyɛɛ hɔn sumabew kɛse.

34 Na aber biara nna wɔdze nsordaafo afofor reba kurow no mu, nye kwan mu edziban so.

35 Na dɛm na afe eduonu akron wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no so dze baa ewiei.
alma 56:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 56[/font_size][/center]

[i]Helaman dze krataa kɛma Moroni kɛkã ɔkõ a wɔnye Lamanfo kõe no mu nsɛm kyerɛ no—Antipus na Helaman dzi konyim kɛse wɔ Lamanfo do—Helaman ne mberantsɛ mpemebien no dze tum nwanwa bi kõ na wonnku hɔn mu biara. Nkyekyɛmu 1, bɛyɛ mfe 62 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ; nkyekyɛmu 2–19, bɛyɛ mfe 66 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ; nye nkyenkyɛmu 20–57, bɛyɛ mfe 65–64 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ afe eduasa n’ahyɛse wɔ atsɛmbuafo aber do wɔ bosoom a odzi kan ne da a otsĩa ebien mu no, Moroni ne nsa kãa nwoma fii Helaman hɔ a ɔfa nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ dɛm asaase no do hɔ.

2 Na nsɛm a ɔkyerɛwee no nye iyi: Mo nuabanyin Moroni a modɔ wo mapa, wɔ Ewuradze mu nye hɛn ɔkõ abɛbrɛsɛ so mu; hwɛ, mo nuabanyin dɔfo, mowɔ nsɛm bi kã kyerɛ wo a ɔfa hɛn akosɛm ho wɔ asaase n’afamu ha yi.

3 Hwɛ, nkorɔfo no a Ammon dze hɔn fi Nephi asaase do bae no hɔn mbabanyin mu mpemebien—afei inyim dɛ iyinom yɛ Laman a ɔyɛ hɛn egya Lehi ne babanyin panyin no n’asefo;

4 Afei onnhia dɛ mobɔkɔ do akyerɛkyerɛ dza ɔfa no hɔn amambra anaa hɔn gyedzi mu akyerɛ wo, osiandɛ inyim dɛm nsɛm iyinom nyina—

5 Dɛm ntsi oye ara dɛ mekã kyerɛ wo dɛ dɛm mberantsɛ mpemebien yinom afa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze, na wɔpɛ dɛ meyɛ hɔn banodzinyi; na yɛaba dɛ yɛrobɔbɔ hɛn man ho ban.

6 Na afei hom nyim dza ɔfa no ahyɛmu a hɔn egyanom edzi, dɛ wɔremmfa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze nye hɔn enuanom nnkõ mmfa nnkã bɔgya nngu.

7 Mbom afe eduonu esia mu ber a wohun hɛn amandzehu nye hɛn abɛbrɛsɛ no nkyɛ worubu hɔn ahyɛmu no a woedzi no do na wɔafa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze dze akõ ama hɛn.

8 Mbom mammpen do amma hɔn dɛ wobobu dɛm ahyɛmu a woedzi no do, nna mususu dɛ Nyankopɔn bɛhyɛ hɛn dzen ara ma yerunnhu amandze pii osiandɛ woedzi nsew a wodzii no do.

9 Mbom hwɛ, yɛwɔ enyigye kɛse wɔ dɛm adze kor yi a osii yi ho. Na hwɛ, afe eduonu esia mu no, emi, Helaman, midzii dɛm mberantsɛ mpemebien yi enyim dze hɔn kɔr Judea kurow mu, dɛ yɛrokɔboa Antipus, nyia hom eyi no banodzinyi dɛ ɔnhwɛ dɔm a wɔwɔ dɛm asaase no do no.

10 Na medze me mbabanyin (na wɔfata dɛ wɔfrɛ hɔn mbabanyin) mpemebien kãa Antipus no nsordaafo ho, na iyi maa Antipus nyaa ahoɔdzen, na ɔmaa n’enyi gyee mbordo; na hwɛ, nna no nsordaafo no hɔn do atsew ara yie osiandɛ Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo no ekuku hɛn nkorɔfo no hɔn mu pii, na ɔwɔ dɛ yedzi awerɛhow kɛse wɔ iyi ho.

11 Naaso, yɛbɛkyekye hɛn werɛ wɔ ntsease yi ho, dɛ wowui dze maa hɔn man nye hɔn Nyankopɔn, nyew, na wɔwɔ ahomka.

12 Na Lamanfo no afa hɔn mu pii so adaduafo, na hɔn nyina yɛ nsordaafo asahen ekunyin, na nkaafo no nyina woekuku hɔn. Na yesusu dɛ sɛ wonnkunkum hɔn a nna ɔno wɔwɔ Nephi asaase do dɛm aber yi.

13 Na afei dɛm nkurow yi na Lamanfo no akã hɛn mbarimba akatakyi bɔgyaa egu dze agye.

14 Manti asaase, anaa Manti kurow, nye Zeezrom kurow, nye Cumeni kurow, nye Antiparah kurow.

15 Na dɛm nkuropɔn yinom na ber a mebaa Judea no nna ɔwɔ hɔn nsamu; na muhun Antipus na no dɔm no dɛ wɔreyɛ edwuma ahoɔdzen mu dze abɔ kuropɔn no ho ban.

16 Nyew, nna wɔatotɔ bahaw wɔ honandua mu nye sunsum mu so dɛmara, osiandɛ wɔkõo ahoɔdzen mu anapa na wɔyɛɛ edwuma anafua so dze bɔɔ hɔn nkurow ho ban, na wohun amandze ahorow pii.

17 Na afei woesua dɛ wobedzi konyim wɔ bea yi do anaadɛ wobowu; dɛm ntsi ibohu dɛ mo dɔm kakra a menye hɔn bae no, nyew, me mbabanyin no maa wonyaa enyidado nye enyigye kɛse.

18 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ Antipus enya dɔm pii akã no nsordaafo ho no, Ammoron hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnsoɛr Judea kuropɔn no do, anaa hɛn so hɛn do nye hɛn mmbɔkõ.

19 Na dɛm na Ewuradze yɛe dze doom hɛn; osiandɛ sɛ wɔbaa hɛn do ber a nna yɛayɛ mberɛw no a nkyɛ annhwɛ a wɔsɛɛ hɛn nsordaafo kakra no; mbom dɛm na oduae dze koraa hɛn do.

20 Ammoron hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkora dɛm nkurow no a wɔagye no do yie. Na dɛm na afe eduonu esia no dze baa ewiei. Na afe eduonu esuon n’ahyɛse no yesiesiee hɛn kurow no na yesiesiee hɛnho dze bɔɔ hɛnho ban.

21 Afei yɛpɛɛ dɛ nkyɛ Lamanfo bɛba hɛn do; osiandɛ nna yɛmmpɛ dɛ yɛbɔkɔ hɔn do wɔ hɔn aban no mu.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛsomaa atsɛwfo dɛ wɔnkɔ nkɛtsɛw nhwɛ dza wɔreyɛ, amma woemmbesian hɛnho adzesaa anaa adzekyee annkɔ hɛn nkuropɔn nkaa no a ɔwɔ etsifi afamu no do.

23 Na yenyim dɛ dɛm nkuropɔn yinom mu mba no nnyi ahoɔdzen yie a wobotum nye hɔn edzi esi; dɛm ntsi na yɛpɛɛ dɛ, sɛ wɔbɛpa hɛnho a, yebesi hɔn ekyir akã hɔn ahyɛ, na ber a binom atoa hɔn wɔ ekyir no nna binom so ehyia hɔn wɔ enyim. Yɛdween dɛ yebenya hɔn do tum; nna mbom hwɛ, dza yɛrohwehwɛ no ammba mu.

24 Woenntum ammfa hɔn nsordaafo nyinara ammbɛpa hɛnho, eso woenntum ammfa hɔn mu bi mpo ammbɛsen osiandɛ bɛyɛ na woennya ahom kɛse enngyina hɛn ano ma wɔatotɔr.

25 Eso woenntum enntu Zarahemla do sa; nna woenntum enntwa Sidon etsifi ammfa annkɔ Nephihah kurow do.

26 Na dɛm ntsi wɔnye hɔn nsordaafo no yɛɛ adwen dɛ wɔbɔkora dɛm nkurow no a wɔagye no do.

27 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe yi no bosoom a otsĩa ebien mu no, wɔdze edziban pii fi me dɛm mbabanyin mpemebien no hɔn egyanom hɔ brɛɛ hɛn.

28 Na wɔdze dɔm mpemebien so fi Zarahemla asaase do brɛɛ hɛn. Na iyi maa hɛn dɔm bɛyɛɛ mpem du, na yenyaa edziban so a yɛdze bɛma hɔn nye hɔn yernom na hɔn mba so.

29 Na ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ hɛn nsordaafo rodɔr daa daa, na wɔbrɛ hɛn edziban so ma yedzi no, wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worusuro, na wɔpɛɛ dɛ wotu hyɛ hɛn do ama sɛ wɔyɛ na ɔbɛyɛ a woesiw kwan amma hɛn nsa annka edziban nye dɔm a wɔbɛba abɔboa hɛn no.

30 Afei ber a yehun dɛ Lamanfo no hɔnho ahyɛ ase rihiahia hɔn wɔ iyi ho ntsi no, yɛpɛɛ dɛ yesua efir bi dze pa hɔn; dɛm ntsi Antipus hyɛɛ me dɛ memfa me mbabanyin kakra no nkɔ kurow bi a ɔbɛn hɛn mu, tse dɛ mbrɛ yɛdze edziban rokɔ dɛm kurow no mu.

31 Na dɛ yɛmfa Antiparah kurow nkyɛn nkɔ, tse dɛ mbrɛ yɛrokɔ kurow a ɔda ekyir wɔ mpoano afamu no mu.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ yesii mu na yɛyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ yɛdze hɛn edziban rokɔ dɛm kurow no mu.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ Antipus so faa no nsordaafo mu fã na wosii mu kɔree, na wogyaa hɔn a wɔaka no dɛ wɔnhwɛ kurow no do. Mbom wɔannkɔ kesii dɛ emi menye mo nsordaafo kakra no sii mu kɔree, na yɛbɛɛn Antiparah kurow no.

34 Na afei, Antiparah kurow mu hɔ na Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo a hɔnho yɛ dzen ara yie no wɔ; nyew, wɔdɔɔ sõ ara yie.

35 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a hɔn atsɛwfo kãa kyerɛɛ hɔn no, wɔnye hɔn nsordaafo no puei na wɔdze twitwi baa hɛn do.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ yeguanee dze faa etsifi afamu. Na dɛm na yɛyɛe dze twee Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo a hɔnho yɛ dzen ara yie no fii hɔn bea do;

37 Nyew, wɔbaa ekyir kakra ara yie na ber a wohun dɛ Antipus no nsordaafo no ritsiw hɔn ahoɔdzen mu no, wɔamman ammfa nyimfa anaa bankum, mbom wɔbaa hɔn enyim tsentsendo kãa hɛn do; na, yesusu dɛ, hɔn adwen nye dɛ wobokuku hɛn ansaana Antipus ato hɔn, amma hɛn nkorɔfo no annka hɔn annhyɛ.

38 Na afei ber a Antipus hun dɛ yɛwɔ mbusu mu no, ɔmaa no nsordaafo no miaa hɔn nantsew mu. Mbom hwɛ, ɔyɛ adzesaaber dɛm ntsi wɔannto hɛn, nna Antipus so annto hɔn; dɛm ntsi yesisii hɛn ntamadan na yɛdaa dze tweɔɔn adzekyee.

39 Na ɔbaa dɛ ansaana adze rebɛkye no, hwɛ nna Lamanfo no ritsiw hɛn. Afei so hɛnho nnyɛ dzen dodow a yebotum yɛnye hɔn akõ; nyew na mmpɛ dɛ me mbabanyin nkakraba yinom so totɔr wɔ hɔn nsaano; dɛm ntsi yɛsɔɔw do kɔree, na yɛdze faa sar no do.

40 Afei nna wonntum mman mmfa nyimfa anaa bankum osiandɛ bɛyɛ na woetwa hɔnho ehyia; nna mo so mamman ammfa nyimfa anaa bankum osiandɛ bɛyɛ na wɔato hɛn, na yerunntum so nye hɔn nndzi esi osiandɛ wobokuku hɛn, na woeguan akɔ; na dɛm na ɔmaa yeguaan dɛm da no nyinara wɔ sar no do, kesii dɛ sum bae.

41 Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee bio no, yehun dɛ Lamanfo no kã hɛn do, na yeguaan hɔn.

42 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ woenntsiiw hɛn annkɔ ekyir papa nna wogyinae; na iyi sii wɔ bosom a otsĩa esuon ne da a otsĩa ebiasa n’anapa no mu.

43 Na afei, sɛ Antipus bɔtoo hɔn a ɔno dze yennyim, mbom mesee dɔm no dɛ: Hwɛ, yennyim na mbom woegyina ama yɛaakɔ hɔn do, na yɛakɔtɔ hɔn efir mu.

44 Dɛm ntsi ebɛn asɛm na hom wɔ kã, me mbabanyin, ana hom bɔkɔ nye hɔn akɔkõ?

45 Na afei mo nuabanyin dɔfo Moroni, mese wo dɛ, munnhun akokodur kɛse a ɔtse dɛm da, oho, bi nnyi Nephifo nyinara mu.

46 Na dɛ mbrɛ aber nyina mefrɛ hɔn me mbabanyin no (osiandɛ hɔn nyina susuar) dɛm ntsi wɔsee me dɛ: Egya, hwɛ hɛn Nyame kã hɛnho, na ɔremma kwan mma yɛnntotɔr ntsi ma yɛnkɔ; yennkokuku hɛn enuanom no sɛ wɔannhaw hɛn a; dɛm ntsi ma yɛnkɔ, annyɛ a hɔn nsa bɛda Antipus no nsordaafo no do.

47 Afei hɔn nnkõo da, naaso woennsuro owu; na wɔdween hɔn egyanom hɔn ahotɔ ho seen hɔn nkwa; nyew, hɔn nãnom akyerɛkyerɛ hɔn dɛ sɛ wonya gyedzi a, Nyankopɔn bɛgye hɔn.

48 Na wɔkaa nsɛm a hɔn nãnom kãa kyerɛɛ me no na wɔsee me dɛ: Yenngye kyim dɛ hɛn nãnom no nyim dɛm.

49 Na ɔbaa dɛ menye me mpem ebien no saan hɛn ekyir dɛ yɛrokɔ Lamanfo no a wotsiiw hɛn no do. Na afei hwɛ, Antipus no nsordaafo no ato hɔn ma ɔkõ a ɔyɛ hu esi.

50 Na Antipus no nsordaafo, osiandɛ woetwa kwan tsentsen wɔ mber tsiabaa mu ntsi, nna wɔafonafona, ma nkyɛ wɔrobɔtotɔr wɔ Lamanfo nsa; na sɛ menye me mpem ebien no annsan ekyir ammba a nkyɛ hɔn nsa kãa dza wɔrohwehwɛ wɔayɛ.

51 Na osiandɛ wɔafonafona wɔ hɔn nantsew a wɔnantseew no ɔhyew do ntsi, Antipus nye no banodzifo no mu pii atotɔr wɔ nkrantsee ano no—dɛm ntsi Antipus no dɔm no osiandɛ hɔn banodzifo atotɔr ntsi, wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrepa abaw wɔ Lamanfo enyim.

52 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no nyaa akokodur na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ woritsiw hɔn; na ber a Lamanfo dze ahoɔdzen kɛse ritsiw hɔn no, nna Helaman nye ne mpemebien no puee hɔn ekyir, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worukuku hɔn mbordo, iyi maa Lamanfo nsordaafo no nyina gyinae na wɔdaan hɔnho wɔ Helaman do.

53 Afei ber a Antipus no dɔm no hun dɛ Lamanfo no adan hɔnho no, wɔboaboaa hɔn nkorɔfo ano na wosii Lamanfo no hɔn ekyir bio.

54 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ hɛn, Nephi no nkorɔfo no, Antipus no dɔm, nye emi na me mpem ebien no, twaa Lamanfo ho hyiae, na yekum hɔn; nyew, yekum hɔn araa ma ɔbaa dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze ma na wɔdze hɔnho so ma, ma wɔfa hɔn dɛ wɔyɛ ɔkõ mu adaduafo.

55 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a wogyaa hɔnho mu maa hɛn no, hwɛ mekaan dɛm mberantsɛ no a wɔkãa moho ma yɛkõe no, nna musuro dɛ wobokuku hɔn mu pii.

56 Mbom hwɛ, m’enyi gyee kɛsenara osiandɛ hɔn mu ɔkra kor mpo anntɔ wɔ asaase no do; nyew, na wɔkõo dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze Nyankopɔn n’ahoɔdzen; nyew, wonnhun mbanyin a wɔdze ahoɔdzen a ɔtse dɛm akõ pɛn; na wɔdze tum kɛse a ɔtse dɛm kɔr Lamanfo do, ma otuu hɔn akoma; na iyi ho ntsi na ɔmaa Lamanfo no gyaa hɔnho mu maa dɛ ɔkõ mu adaduafo no.

57 Na yennyi bea a yɛdze bɛma hɛn adaduafo no, beebi a yebotum akora hɔn do efi Lamanfo nsordaafo nsa, dɛm ntsi yɛmaa Antipus no dɔm no a woennku hɔn no hɔn mu fã nye hɔn kɔr Zarahemla asaase do; na mefaa hɔn a wɔaka no dze hɔn kãa me mberantsɛ nkakraba Ammonfo no ho, na yɛsaan hɛn ekyir kɔr Judea kurow mu.
alma 57:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 57[/font_size][/center]

[i]Helaman kã Antiparah ne mfae nye hɔnho a wɔdze mae na ekyir no wɔkɔbɔ Cumeni ho ban ho asɛm—Ammon ne mberantsɛmba no kõ akokodur mu na wopirapira hɔn nyina na mbom wonnku obiara—Gid kã Lamanfo hɔn nkumii na Laman adaduafo hɔn nguanee ho asɛm. Bɛyɛ mfe 63 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ me nsa kãa nwoma fii Ammoron a ɔyɛ ɔhen no nkyɛn a ɔkyerɛ dɛ sɛ medze dɛm ɔkõ mu adaduafo a yɛafa hɔn no ma a ɔno ɔdze Antiparah kurow no bɛma hɛn.

2 Mbom mosomaa ma wɔdze nwoma kɛmaa ɔhen no dɛ, yɛwɔ awerɛhyɛmu dɛ hɛn nsordaafo no dɔɔ sõ a wobotum agye Antiparah kurow no; na sɛ yɛdze ɔkõ mu adaduafo no ma a, nna ɔwɔ dɛ yehu dɛ yennyim nyansa, na mbom yɛdze hɛn adaduafo no bɛma sɛ wɔdze hɛn so hɛndze bɛma dze ahyɛ ananmu a.

3 Na Ammoron anngye no nwoma no, osiandɛ ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔdze no adaduafo no bɛma dze agye nedze; dɛm ntsi yɛhyɛɛ ase dɛ yɛroboaboa hɛnho na yɛakɔ Antiparah kurow no do.

4 Mbom nyimpa a wɔwɔ Antiparah kurow mu no fii kurow no mu, na woguanee kɔr hɔn nkurow binom do a ɔwɔ hɔn nsamu, mbea a wobotum agye ho ban; na iyi maa hɛn nsa kãa Antiparah kurow no.

5 Na dɛm na afe eduonu-awɔtwe wɔ atsɛmbuafo aber do no dze baa ewiei.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe eduonu akron n’ahyɛse mu no, wɔdze edziban brɛɛ hɛn, na wɔdze nyimpa bɛyɛ mpemesia so fi Zarahemla asaase nye asaase a ɔda ho no bɛkãa hɛn nsordaafo mpemebien a wɔyɛ kumaabi no ho, na Ammonfo mbabanyin eduosia so baa bɛkãa hɔn enuanom no ho. Na afei hwɛ, hɛnho yɛɛ hɛn dzen, nyew, na wɔdze edziban pii so brɛɛ hɛn.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ nna yɛpɛ dɛ yɛnye nsordaafo no a wɔdze hɔn egu hɔ dɛ wɔmbɔ Cumeni kurow ho ban no kɔkõ.

8 Na afei hwɛ, mebɛkyerɛ wo mbrɛ ɔyɛ a annkyɛr koraa na yɛyɛɛ dza yɛrohwehwɛ no; nyew, yɛfaa hɛn nsordaafo ahoɔdzenfo no, anaadɛ hɛn nsordaafo ahoɔdzenfo no bi na adzesaaber no, yɛkɔree na yekotwaa Cumeni kurow ho hyiae, wɔ ber a aka kakra ma wɔdze hɔn edziban abrɛ hɔn no.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛbɔɔ hɛn asese twaa kurow no ho hyiae, na yɛyɛɛ dɛm adzesaaber mpɛn pii; na mbom yɛdedaa hɛn nkrantsee do na yɛweɔnee, amma Lamanfo no ammba hɛn do anafua emmbokuku hɛn, na mpɛn pii na wɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛm; na mbom mber dodow biara a wɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛm no hɔn bɔgyaa gui.

10 Ekyir yi hɔn kwan mu edziban bae na ber a wɔyɛɛ dɛ wɔrebɛhɛn kurow no mu anafua no, na ɔnam dɛ yɛyɛ Nephifo na yɛnnyɛ Lamanfo ntsi, yɛfaa hɔn nye hɔn edziban no.

11 Na ammfa Lamanfo hɔnho koraa dɛ yɛayɛ dɛm ma hɔn nsa annka hɔn edziban, nna woesi nketse dɛ wɔbɛfa kurow no; dɛm ntsi nna ohia dɛ yɛgye edziban no ma wɔdze kɔ Judea, na hɛn adaduafo no so, wɔdze hɔn kɔr Zarahemla asaase do.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ enndzi nda dodow biara na Lamanfo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrepa abaw wɔ hɔn edzidzi ho; dɛm ntsi wogyaa kurow no mu maa hɛn; na dɛm na ɔmaa hɛn nsa kãa Cumeni kurow no dɛ mbrɛ yɛrohwehwɛ no.

13 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ nna hɛn adaduafo no dɔɔ sõ, na kaansa yɛdɔɔ sõ dɛmara mpo a, okehiaa dɛ yɛdze hɛn dɔm no nyina hwɛ adaduafo no do, anaadɛ yebokuku hɔn.

14 Na hwɛ, wotum bɔmu guan, na wɔ dze abo na ndua, anaadɛ biribiara a hɔn nsa bɛkã no kõ, iyi ntsi, yɛfaa hɔn ɔkõ mu adaduafo no, yekukuu hɔn mu mpemebien.

15 Dɛm ntsi ohiaa dɛ yetwa hɔn nkwa do, anaadɛ yekura nkrantsee, dze weɔn hɔn, dze hɔn kɔ Zarahemla asaase do; na hɛn edziban so bɔsõ hɛnankasa hɛn nkorɔfo a bi rommbor do, ammfa ho koraa dɛ yɛagye bi efi Lamanfo nsamu.

16 Na afei dɛm ahokyer yi mu, nna ato hɛn adwendwen wɔ dza yɛmfa nyɛ dɛm ɔkõ mu adaduafo no; naaso yɛdween ho dɛ yɛbɛma wɔdze hɔn akɔ Zarahemla asaase do; dɛm ntsi yeyiyii hɛn dɔm mu binom, na yɛhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmfa hɛn adaduafo no nkɔ Zarahemla asaase do.

17 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ adzekyee no wɔsaan hɔn ekyir bae. Na afei hwɛ, yemmbisa hɔn biribiara a ɔfa adaduafo no ho; osiandɛ hwɛ, nna Lamanfo no aba hɛn do, ntsi wɔbaa ber a oye bɛgyee hɛn ma yɛanntɔ wɔ hɔn nsaano. Na hwɛ, Ammoron asoma ma wɔdze edziban fofor na nsordaafo pii so abrɛ hɔn.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ nkorɔfo a yɛsomaa hɔn ma wɔdze adaduafo no kɔree no baa mber pa mu bɛmaa wohun hɔn gyinabew, ber a nkyɛ wɔreyɛ akã hɛn ahyɛ.

19 Mbom hwɛ mo dɔm mpemebien eduosia no kõo enyiber do ara yie; nyew, wogyinaa pintsinn wɔ Lamanfo no enyim, na wokum hɔn a wɔnye hɔn dzii esi nyina.

20 Na ber a hɛn nsordaafo a wɔaka no nkyɛ wɔreyɛ apa abaa wɔ Lamanfo enyim no, hwɛ, dɛm mpemebien eduosia no gyinaa pintsinn na woennhihim.

21 Nyew, na wodzii mbra do na wɔyɛɛ dza wɔsee hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ biara pɛpɛɛpɛr; nyew, na dɛ mbrɛ hɔn gyedzi tse no, ɔyɛɛ hɔ maa hɔn; na mekaa nsɛm a wɔkãa kyerɛɛ me dɛ hɔn nãnom akyerɛkyerɛ hɔn no.

22 Na afei hwɛ, ɔnam me mbabanyin yinom, nye dɔm no a woyii hɔn dɛ wɔmfa adaduafo no nkɔ no do na yedzii dɛm konyim kɛse yi; osiandɛ hɔn na wɔhwee Lamanfo no; dɛm ntsi wɔpaam hɔn ma wɔsanee kɔr Manti kurow mu.

23 Na yɛfaa hɛn kurow Cumeni, na nnyɛ hɛn nyina na yewui nkrantsee ano; naaso, nna yɛayew dɔm pii.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no guanee kɔree no, ntsɛmara mehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wonyiyi mo nkorɔfo no a woepirapira no mfi ewufo no mu, na wɔnkyekyer hɔn ekur no.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ me mpemebien eduosia mu ahaebien hɔn enyiwa do siiw hɔn osiandɛ nna wɔahwer bɔgya pii; naaso, osian Nyankopɔn ne papayɛ ntsi, na dza ɔyɛɛ hɛn ahobow kɛse, na ɔyɛɛ hɛn nsordaafo no nyina so enyigye nye dɛ, hɔn mu ɔkra kor mpo ennwu; nyew, eso ɔkra kor mpo nnyi mu a nna oemmpira.
