26 Na afei, hɔn bambɔ no yɛɛ ahobowsɛm dze maa hɛn nsordaafo nyinara, nyew, dɛ woennku hɔn wɔ ber a nna woekum hɛn enuanom mu apem. Na yɛkã no wɔ nokwar mu dɛ iyi fi Nyankopɔn n’anwanwa tum no, osian hɔn gyedzi mbordo a wonyae wɔ hɔn nãnom nkyerɛkyerɛ no ho ntsi—dɛ Nyame nokwafo wɔ hɔ, na dodow biara a wɔanngye noho kyim no, n’anwanwa tum no bɛgye hɔn.

27 Afei iyi nye gyedzi a hɔn a makã hɔnho nsɛm no wɔ; wosusuar, na hɔn adwen si pi, na wɔdze hɔn gyedzi hyɛ Nyame mu aber nyina.

28 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a yɛhwɛɛ hɛn epirafo na yesiee hɛn efun nye Lamanfo hɔn efun so a wɔdɔɔ sõ wiei no, hwɛ, yebisaa Gid adaduafo no a ɔnye hɔn kɔr Zarahemla asaase do no hɔnho nsɛm.

29 Afei Gid nye nsordaanyi ɔsahen panyin a ɔhwɛɛ dɔm a woyii hɔn ma wɔnye hɔn kɔr asaase no do.

30 Na afei, dɛm nsɛm yi na Gid kãa kyerɛɛ me: Hwɛ, yesii mu dɛ yɛnye hɛn adaduafo no rokɔ Zarahemla asaase do. Na ɔbaa dɛ yehyiaa hɛn nsordaafo hɔn atsɛwfo no nna wɔasoma hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔnweɔn bea a Lamanfo abɔ hɔn asese wɔ no.

31 Na wɔtsẽatsẽaa mu frɛɛ hɛn dɛ—Hwɛ Lamanfo nsordaafo no esi mu rokɔ Cumeni kuropɔn do; na hwɛ, wɔnye hɔn rokɔkõ, nyew, na wɔbɛsɛɛ hɛn nkorɔfo.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɛn adaduafo no tsee hɔn ndze, na iyi maa wonyaa akokodur; na wɔtseew hɛn do etua.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ osian hɔn etuatsew ntsi yɛmaa hɛn nkrantsee kɔr hɔn do. Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔyɛɛ kor faa twitwi wɔ hɛn do bɛhyɛɛ hɛn nkrantsee do, na iyi maa okum hɔn mu pii; na hɔn a wɔkae no duaa mu guanee.

34 Na hwɛ, ber a woguanee na yenntum annkyer hɔn no, yesii mu ntsɛmara dɛ yɛrokɔ Cumeni kurow mu; na hwɛ, yedur hɔ mber pa mu ama yeetum aboa hɛn enuanom ma wɔabɔ kurow noho ban.

35 Na hwɛ, ɔagye hɛn efi hɛn atamfo nsa bio. Nhyira nkã hɛn Nyankopɔn ne dzin; osiandɛ hwɛ, ɔno na ɔagye hɛn; nyew, na ɔayɛ dɛm adze kɛse yi ama hɛn.

36 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a emi, Helaman, metsee Gid ne nsɛm yi no, dɛw hyɛɛ me mã osiandɛ Nyankopɔn ne papayɛ ntsi na ɔwowaa hɛn, amma hɛn nyinara ennwu; nyew, na megye dzi dɛ hɔn a wokum hɔn no hɔn akra ahɛn hɔn Nyankopɔn n’ahomgye mu.
alma 58:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 58[/font_size][/center]

[i]Helam, Gid na Teomner fa nyansakwan bi do gye Manti kuropɔn no—Lamanfo twe san—Ammon no nkorɔfo hɔn mbabanyin no gyina pintsinn dɛ wɔdze robɔ hɔn ahotɔ na gyedzi ho ban. Bɛyɛ mfe 63–62 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ hɛn botae a osi hɛn enyi do bio nye dɛ yɛbɛgye Manti kuropɔn no; na mbom hwɛ, nna kwan biara nnda beebi a yɛnye hɛn nsordaafo kumaabi yi bɛfa do ma yeetum etu hɔn efi kurow no mu. Osiandɛ wɔkaa dza yɛayɛ da; dɛm ntsi nna yenntum nnsũa hɔn efir mfa ndaadaa hɔn ma wommfi hɔn sumabew do mmpue.

2 Na wɔdɔɔ sõ koraa sen hɛn nsordaafo no ntsi nna yerunntum nnkɔ nye hɔn nnkɔkõ wɔ hɔn sumabew no do.

3 Nyew, na okehiaa dɛ yɛma hɛn nkorɔfo no kɔ, kɔkora asaase a yɛagye no a ɔyɛ hɛnankasa hɛn dze no do; dɛm ntsi okehiaa dɛ yɛtweɔn ma yenya dɔm pii fi Zarahemla ma wɔbɛkã hɛnho na wɔbrɛ hɛn edziban fofor so.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ mosomaa ananmusinyi ma ɔkɔr ambrado a ɔwɔ hɛn asaase no do no hɔ kɛkãa mbrɛ hɛn nkorɔfo ho tse kyerɛɛ no. Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛtweɔnee dɛ wɔdze edziban na dɔm befi Zarahemla asaase do abrɛ hɛn.

5 Mbom hwɛ, iyi boaa hɛn kakraabi pɛr, osiandɛ nna Lamanfo so rinya dɔm nye edziban daadaa, na dɛm na hɛn asetsena mu bɛyɛe.

6 Na Lamanfo no puee baa hɛn do fi ber to ber, hwehwɛɛ kwan a wɔbɛfa do asɛɛ hɛn; naaso yenntum nye hɔn annkõ osian hɔn ekyir nsanee mpɛn pii no nye hɔn bambɔ dzendzen no ntsi.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛtweɔnee wɔ dɛm ahokyer ber yi mu bɛyɛ abosoom pii ntamu mpo, kesii dɛ nkyɛ ɔkɔm reyɛ eku hɛn.

8 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ nsordaafo mpemebien baa dɛ wɔrobɔboa hɛn, na wɔdze edziban so brɛɛ hɛn; na iyi nko nye mboa a hɛn nsa kãe, dɛ yɛmfa mbɔ hɛnho nye hɛn man ho ban amma hɛn atamfo nsa annka hɛn, nyew, dɛ yɛnye atamfo a wonntum nnkan hɔn dodow ndzi esi.

9 Na afei dɛm adze yi maa hɛnho boow hɛn, anaadɛ yennyim siantsir kor a ɔnam do ma wɔammfa dɔm pii ammbrɛ hɛn; dɛm ntsi hɛn werɛ howee na suro so hyɛɛ hɛn mã, dɛ bɛyɛ na ɔnam biribi do ma Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu aba hɛn asaase do, ma woedzi hɛn do konyim na wɔasɛɛ hɛn koraa.

10 Dɛm ntsi yehuee hɛn akra wɔ mpaabɔ mu maa Nyame dɛ ɔnhyɛ hɛn dzen na ɔngye hɛn mfi hɛn atamfo nsamu, nyew, na ɔmma hɛn ahoɔdzen so ma yentum ngye hɛn nkurow nye hɛn nsaase, na hɛn ahodze, ama yɛdze aaboa hɛn nkorɔfo.

11 Nyew, na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze hɛn Nyankopɔn bɛɛn hɛn na ɔbɔɔ hɛn anohoba dɛ ɔbɛgye hɛn; nyew, ɔkãa asomdwee nsɛm kyerɛɛ hɛn akra, na ɔmaa hɛn gyedzi kɛse, na ɔsee hɛn dɛ yenya enyidado wɔ no mu dɛ ɔbɛgye hɛn.

12 Na yɛnye hɛn nsordaafo kakra no a hɛn nsa akã hɔn no nyaa akokodur, na yesii hɛn adwen pi dɛ yebedzi hɛn atamfo do konyim, na yɛagye hɛn nsaase, nye hɛn ahodze, nye hɛn yernom na hɛn mba, na hɛn ahotɔ so.

13 Na dɛm ntsi yɛdze hɛn ahoɔdzen nyina sii kwan do dɛ yɛnye Lamanfo a wɔwɔ Manti kurow mu no rokɔkõ; na yesisii hɛn ntamadan wɔ sar no ne nkyɛn, bea a ɔbɛn kurow no.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no, ber a Lamanfo hun dɛ yɛwɔ sar n’ano afamu bea a ɔbɛn kurow no ne he do no, wɔsomaa hɔn atsɛwfo no ma wotwaa hɛnho hyiae ama woeetum ehu hɛn nsordaafo hɔn dodow nye mbrɛ hɔn ahoɔdzen tse.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wohun dɛ hɛnho nnyɛ dzen osiandɛ hɛn dodow suar, na wosuro dɛ yebesiw kwan no ma hɔn nsa rennka hɔn edziban nna gyedɛ woepue aba nye hɛn abɔkõ na woekuku hɛn, nna wosusui so dɛ sɛ wɔnye hɔn dɔmtutuw no ba hɛn do a ɔnnkɛkyɛr na wɔasɛɛ hɛn koraa, dɛm ntsi wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔroboaboa hɔnho na woepue aba na wɔnye hɛn abɔkõ.

16 Na ber a yehun dɛ wɔroboaboa hɔnho na woepue aba nye hɛn abɔkõ no, hwɛ, mesee Gid dɛ, ɔnye dɔm kakra nkɔ sar no do nkosuma, na Teomner so nye dɔm kakra nkosuma sar no do.

17 Afei Gid nye no dɔm no wɔ nyimfa na nkaafo no so wɔ bankum; na ber a wɔdze hɔnho sumaa no, hwɛ, emi menye nsordaafo a wɔaka no kaa dɛm bea no a ahyɛse no yesisii hɛn ntamadan wɔ no do dze hwɛɛ ber a Lamanfo no bopue nye hɛn abɔkõ.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no dze hɔn nsordaafo dɔmtutuw no puee baa dɛ wɔnye hɛn robɔkõ. Na ber a wɔbae na wɔyɛɛ dɛ wɔdze nkrantsee reba hɛn do no, mesee mo dɔm a wɔkã moho no dɛ wɔnsan nkɔ sar no do.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no kãa hɛn do ntsɛmara, osiandɛ wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔto hɛn ama woeekuku hɛn; dɛm ntsi wɔkãa hɛn do kɔr sar no do; na yɛkɛfaa Gid nye Teomner hɔn finimfin pɛpɛɛpɛr ma Lamanfo no ennhu hɔn.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no bɛsenee no, anaadɛ ber a nsordaafo no bɛsenee no, Gid nye Teomner soɛree fii hɔn sumabea hɔ na wotwitwaa Lamanfo hɔn atsɛwfo amma wɔaannsan hɔn ekyir annkɔ kurow no mu.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wotwitwaa hɔn wiei no, wotuu mbirika kɔr kurow no mu na wokotui hyɛɛ aweɔmfo no a woegya hɔn wɔ hɔ dɛ wɔnweɔn kurow no do na wɔsɛɛ hɔn na wɔgyee kurow no.

22 Afei dɛm adze yi sii osiandɛ Lamanfo no maa hɔn nsordaafo no nyina kɔr sar no do ma ɔkaa aweɔmfo kumaabi wɔ hɔ.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ Gid nye Teomner nam dɛm kwan yi do ma hɔn nsa kãa hɔn sumabea a ɔyɛ dzen no. Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛnantsewee ara yie wɔ sar no do no, ekyir no yɛfaa hɛn kwan dɛ yɛrokɔ Zarahemla asaase do.

24 Na ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ wɔrokɔ Zarahemla asaase do no, hɔn akoma tuu mbordo osiandɛ nna wosuro dɛ bɛyɛ na wɔayɛ nhyehyɛɛ bi a ɔdze hɔn bɔkɔ ɔsɛɛ mu; dɛm ntsi wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɔr sar no do bio, nyew, wɔsanee faa kwan kor noara a wɔfaa do bae no do.

25 Na hwɛ, nna adze asã ntsi wosisii hɔn ntamadan, na Lamanfo nsordaafo asahen ekunyin no susuu dɛ Nephifo no aberɛberɛ osian kwan tsentsen a wotwae no ntsi; na wosusuu dɛ wɔdze hɔn nsordaafo nyina kɔ, dɛm ntsi wɔanndwen Manti kurow no ho.

26 Afei ɔbaa dɛ adze sãe no, mesee mo dɔm no dɛ mma wɔnnda, na mbom wonsi mu mfa kwan fofor do nkɔ Manti kurow mu.

27 Na ɔnam dɛm hɛn anago nantsew no ntsi, hwɛ, adze kyee no nna yekedzi Lamanfo no enyim, dɛm ntsi yedzii hɔn enyim kan kɔr Manti kurow no mu.

28 Na dɛm nyansakwan yi do na yeduae dze gyee Manti kurow a yɛannka bɔgya enngu.

29 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo nsordaafo no bɛɛn kurow no, na wohun dɛ yɛayɛ mboaboaho rotweɔn hɔn no, hɔnho boow hɔn mbordo na suro kɛse so kãa hɔn ntsi woguanee kɔr sar no do.

30 Nyew, na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo nsordaafo no guanee fii dɛm asaase yi do koraa kɔree. Na mbom hwɛ, wɔfaa mbaa nye mbofra pii fii asaase no do kɔree.

31 Na dɛm nkuropɔn a Lamanfo agye no nyina abɛyɛ hɛndze aber yi mu; na hɛn egyanom nye hɛn mbaa na hɛn mba nyina asan reba hɔn efiefi, hɔn nyina, gyedɛ hɔn a Lamanfo afa hɔn adaduafo no nko.

32 Mbom hwɛ, hɛn nsordaafo no suar ntsi ɔyɛ dzen dɛ wobotum ahwɛ dɛm nkuropɔn pii yinom nye ahodze pii a ɔtse dɛm do.

33 Mbom hwɛ, yɛwɔ gyedzi wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn mu, ntsi na ɔama hɛn konyimdzi wɔ dɛm asaase no do ma hɛn nsa akã dɛm nkuropɔn nye nsaase a nna nkyɛ ɔyɛ hɛnankasa hɛndze no.

34 Afei yennyim siantsir kor a ɔnam do ma aban no amma hɛn dɔm pii na dɔm so a wɔbaa bɔboaa hɛn no so nnyim siantsir a ɔnam do ma hɛn nsa annka dɔm pii no.

35 Hwɛ, mbom yennyim, sɛ hom enndzi konyim ntsi na hom dze dɛm nsordaafo no kɔr dɛm asaase n’afã hɔ; sɛ ɔtse dɛm a, nna yɛnnkɛpɛ dɛ yebohwinhwin.

36 Na sɛ nnyɛ dɛm a, hwɛ, nna ɔyɛ a ɔbɛyɛ dɛ osian mpaapaamu a ɔwɔ aban no mu no ntsi wɔamma dɔm pii ammba ammbɔboa hɛn; osiandɛ yenyim dɛ dɔm pii wɔ hɔ sen dza wɔmaa wɔbae no.

37 Mbom, hwɛ, ɔnnyɛ hwee—nna yɛgye dzi dɛ Nyame bɛgye hɛn, na ammfa ho koraa dɛ hɛn nsordaafo suar, nyew, na ɔagye hɛn efi hɛn atamfo nsa.

38 Hwɛ, ɔdze rokɔ afe eduonu-akron, n’ewiei no mu no, nna hɛn nsa kãa hɛn nsaase; na Lamanfo no guanee kɔr Nephi asaase do.

39 Na dɛm Ammon no nkorɔfo hɔn mbabanyin no a makã hɔnho nsɛm papa nko no nye me wɔ Manti kurow mu; na Ewuradze aboa hɔn, nyew, ɔakora hɔn do ma wɔanntotɔr wɔ nkrantsee ano, ntsi ɔkra kor mpo anntɔr.

40 Mbom hwɛ, wopirapiraa hɔn pii; naaso wogyinaa pintsinn wɔ dɛm ahotɔ no a Nyankopɔn dze ama hɔn ma woenya fahodzi no mu; na hɔn enyi ber dɛ wɔbɛkaa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn daa daa; nyew, wodzi ne nhyehyɛɛ nye n’atsɛmbu nye ne mbrasɛm do aber nyina; na hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ nkɔnhyɛ a ɔfa dza ɔbɛba ho no yɛ dzen.

41 Na afei, mo nuabanyin dɔfo, Moroni, Ewuradze hɛn Nyankopɔn no a, ɔapon hɛn na ɔayɛ hɛn fahodzifo no mfa wo nsie aber nyina wɔ n’enyim; nyew, na ɔmboa dɔm yi, nkesi dɛ hom bedzi konyim na hom nsa akã nsaase nyina a Lamanfo no agye efi hom hɔ no, dza yenya edziban fi mu no. Na afei, hwɛ, medze me krataa yi aba ewiei. Emi nye Helaman, Alma ne babanyin no.
alma 59:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 59[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moroni kã kyerɛ Pahoran dɛ ɔmfa nsordaafo nkɔboa Helaman—Lamanfo fa Nephihah kuropɔn no—Moroni no bo fuw aban no. Bɛyɛ mfe 62 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Afei ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsĩa eduasa wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no mu no, ber a Moroni ne nsa kãa Helaman ne krataa na ɔkenkanee wiei no, n’enyi gyee mbordo osiandɛ ndzɛmba kɔr do yie, nyew, Helaman no konyimdzi mbordo no a, dɛ ɔagye dɛm nsaase no a ofii hɔn nsa no.

2 Nyew, na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ no dɔm no nyinara a wɔwɔ asaase a etwa hɔnho ehyia nyinara ama hɔn so woeedzi dɛw.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkyerɛɛw krataa ntsɛmara dze kɛmaa Pahoran, dɛ ɔnhwɛ ma wɔmboaboa dɔm no ano ama wɔaakɔboa Helaman, anaa Helaman no nsordaafo no, ama woeetum akora asaase ne bea biara a ɔnam etumdzi nwanwa do ne nsa akã no do.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni somaa ma wɔdze krataa no kɔr Zarahemla asaase do no, ɔhyɛɛ ase bio dɛ ɔreyɛ nhyehyɛɛ a ɔbɛma oetum agye dɛm ahodze nye nkurow nkaa a Lamanfo gyee fii hɔn nsamu no.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni roboaboa noho akɔ nye Lamanfo no akɔkõ no, hwɛ, Nephihafo a wɔboaboaa hɔn ano fii Moroni kuropɔn mu, nye Lehi kuropɔn mu nye Morianton kuropɔn mu dze hɔn reba no, Lamanfo no tui hyɛɛ hɔn do.

6 Nyew, hɔn mpo a wɔmaa woguanee fii Manti asaase do, nye asaase a etwa hɔnho ehyia nyinara baa bɛkãa Lamanfo a wɔwɔ dɛm bea yi do no ho.

7 Na dɛm maa wɔdɔr mbordo, nyew, nna da nyinara dɔm binom so bɛkãa hɔnho, na Ammoron hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbra na wɔnye Nephihafo mobɔkõ, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worukuku hɔn mbordo.

8 Na hɔn nsordaafo no dɔɔ sõ araa ma nna ɔwɔ dɛ Nephihafo nkaa no guan hɔn; na wɔbaa bɛkãa Moroni no nsordaafo ho mpo.

9 Na afei dɛ mbrɛ Moroni susui dɛ wɔbɛma wɔdze dɔm akɔ Nephihah kurow mu akɔboa dɔm no ma wɔakora dɛm kurow no do, na wonyim so dɛ ebɔkora kurow do ma atamfo nsa nnkɛkã no bɛyɛ mberɛw asen dɛ ebɛgye no bio efi hɔn hɔ, dɛm ntsi osusuu dɛ ɔbɛyɛ mberɛw ama hɔn dɛ wɔbɔkora dɛm kurow no do.

10 Dɛm ntsi ɔsee no nsordaafo no dɛ wɔnka ekyir na wɔnhwɛ dɛm mbea a wɔagyegye no do.

11 Na afei, ber a Moroni hun dɛ Nephihah kurow no efi hɔn nsa no, no werɛ hoow mbordo, na n’adwen hyɛɛ ase dɛ orihihim osian dɔm no hɔn emumuyɛdze ntsi, na dɛ ana wɔronntɔ hɔn enuanom no hɔn abaa mu.

12 Afei dɛm na no nsordaafo asahen ekunyin no nyina dwenee. Hɔn adwen hihimii na wɔbɔɔ mbubuw so osian dɔm no hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi, na wɔyɛɛ iyi osian Lamanfo hɔn konyimdzi wɔ hɔn do no ntsi.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni no bo fuuw aban no, osian hɔn man no ne fahodzi a ɔmmfa noho no ntsi.
alma 60:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 60[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moroni hwinhwin Pahoran aban no dɛ oebu enyi egu nsordaafo no do—Ewuradze ma kwan ma woku atseneneefo—Nephifo no wɔ dɛ wɔdze hɔn tum nyina, na wɔfa kwan biara a wobotum do gye hɔnho fi hɔn atamfo nsa—Moroni hunahuna aban no dɛ sɛ ɔammfa mboa amma no nsordaafo no a, ɔbɛba no do nye no abɔkõ. Bɛyɛ mfe 62 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkyerɛɛw krataa bio dze kɛmaa ambrado no a ɔwɔ asaase no do no, ɔno nye Pahoran, na dɛm nsɛm yi na ɔkyerɛwee: Hwɛ, medze me krataa yi rema Pahoran a ɔwɔ Zarahemla asaase do no, nyia ɔyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo na ambrado a ɔhwɛ asaase no do no, nye hɔn nyina a dɔm no eyi hɔn dɛ wɔnhwɛ ɔman no do na wɔnhyehyɛ ɔkõ yi ho dwumadzi no.

2 Na hwɛ, mowɔ nsɛm bi kã dze bu hɔn fɔ hɔn; na hwɛ, homankasa hom nyim dɛ woyii hom ma hom aaboaboa dɔm ano, na hom ama hɔn nkrantsee, nye mpea, na ɔkõ ho akodze ahorow nyina, na hom ama wɔakɔ nye Lamanfo no akɔkõ, wɔ hɛn asaase n’afã biara a wɔbɛba no.

3 Na afei hwɛ, mese hom dɛ emi, na mo dɔm so, nye Helaman so na no dɔm ehu amandze pii nyew, ɔkɔm, nsukɔm, nye ɔfona, na amandzehu ahorow pii.

4 Mbom hwɛ, na sɛ iyinom nko nye amandze a yehunii a nkyɛ yerunnhwinhwin anaadɛ yɛrennkã ho asɛm.

5 Mbom hwɛ, woekuku hɛn nkorɔfo mu piinara; nyew, mpempem atotɔr wɔ nkrantsee ano, wɔ aber a nkyɛ ɔremmba no dɛm sɛ hom brɛɛ hɛn nsordaafo a wɔdɔɔsõ na edziban so a. Nyew, hom ebu hom enyi egu hɛn do dodow.

6 Na afei hwɛ, yɛpɛ dɛ yehu siantsir a ɔnam do ma hom ebu hom enyi egu hɛn do kɛse dɛm yi; nyew, yɛpɛ dɛ yehu siantsir a ɔnam do ma hom anndwen iyi ho yi.

7 Ana hom dwen dɛ hom bɛtsena hom ahengua do tsibɔɔ wɔ ber a hom atamfo ridzi ewu bɔ homho aprɔw? Nyew, wɔ ber a worukuku hom enuanom mpempem—

8 Nyew, hɔn a hɔn enyi da hom do mpo dɛ hom bɔbɔ hɔn ho ban no, nyew, wɔdze hom esi dɛm bea yi do ama hom aaboa hɔn na wɔama hɔn edziban, nyew, nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ hom kɛma hɔn nsordaafo ma wɔkɔboa hɔn, ma wɔgye mpempem nkwa amma wɔanntɔ wɔ nkrantsee ano.

9 Mbom hwɛ, nnyɛ ne nyinara nye yi—hom dze hom edziban akam hɔn araa ma dodowara akõ ahwer hɔn nkwa osiandɛ wɔpɛ dɔm yi hɔn yieyɛ ntsi; nyew, na wɔyɛɛ iyi wɔ ber a nna ɔkɔm ruboku hɔn, osiandɛ hom ebu hom enyi egu hɔn do.

10 Na afei, m’enuanom adɔfo—ɔsɛ dɛ nkyɛ hom nya ɔdɔ; nyew, na ɔsɛ dɛ nkyɛ hom kenyan homho enyiber do dze ma dɔm yi hɔn yieyɛ nye hɔn fahodzi; na mbom hwɛ, hom ebu hom enyi egu do, dɛm ntsi mpempem hɔn bɔgyaa bogu hom tsir do dze edzi wer; nyew, osiandɛ hɔn sũ nye hɔn amandzehu nyinara Nyame nyim—

11 Hwɛ, hom susu dɛ hom bɛtsena hom ahengua do, a hom rennyɛ hwee na osiandɛ Nyankopɔn ne papayɛ dɔɔ sõ ntsi ɔbɛgye hom? Hwɛ, sɛ dɛm na hom susu a nna hom nsusui yɛ kwa.

12 Ana hom susu dɛ osian hom enuanom yi hɔn emumuyɛdze pii ntsi na wokum hɔn yi? Mese hom dɛ, sɛ dɛm na hom susu a nna hom nsusui yɛ kwa na mese hom dɛ, dodowara wɔ hɔ a wɔatotɔ wɔ nkrantsee ano a hwɛ afɔdzi no yɛ hom dze;

13 Na Ewuradze ma kwan ma woku atseneneefo ama ne pɛrpɛrdzi na n’atsɛmbu aaba emumuyɛfo do; dɛm ntsi mma hom nnsusu dɛ atseneneefo no ayew osiandɛ woekuku hɔn; mbom hwɛ, wɔhɛn Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn n’ahomgye mu.

14 Na afei hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, mowɔ suro kɛse dɛ Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu bɛba dɔm yi do, osian hɔn enyihaw mbordo ntsi, nyew, hɛn aban mpo n’enyihaw, na hɔn enyi a wobu no mbordo gu hɔn enuanom do, nyew, wɔ hɔn a woeku hɔn no do.

15 Na sɛ nnyɛ emumuyɛdze a nna ahyɛse no ɔwɔ hɛn tsir mu a nkyɛ yetumii nye hɛn atamfo dzii esi ma woenntum ennya tum wɔ hɛn do.

16 Nyew, sɛ nnyɛ ɔkõ a osii hɛnankasa hɛn mu no a; nyew, sɛ nnyɛ dɛm ahensifo no a, hɔn na wɔkãa bɔgya pii gui wɔ hɛn mu no, sɛ yɛkaa wentwiwentwi a osii hɛnankasa hɛn mu no, sɛ yɛkãa hɛn ahoɔdzen bɔɔ mu dɛ mbrɛ yɛayɛ no sesei yi a; nyew, sɛ nnyɛ dɛm ahensifo yi a nna wɔrohwehwɛ hɛn do tum nye tumdzi; sɛ wodzii nokwar dze maa hɛn fahodzi, na wɔnye hɛn yɛɛ kor, ma yɛkɔree nye hɛn atamfo no kɔkõe seen dɛ wɔfaa hɔn akodze nye hɛn bɔkõe ma yɛkãa hɛnankasa hɛn bɔgya pii gui; nyew, sɛ yɛkɔr hɔn do wɔ Ewuradze n’ahoɔdzen mu a, nkyɛ yɛbɔɔ hɛn atamfo petsee, na nkyɛ ɔbɛyɛ hɔ dɛm ma n’asɛm aahyɛ mã.

17 Mbom hwɛ, afei Lamanfo no reba hɛn do, regyegye hɛn nsaase, na wɔdze nkrantsee rukuku hɛn nkorɔfo, nyew, hɛn mbaa nye hɛn mbofra, na wɔafa hɔn ndɔmmum so dze hɔn kɔ, na wɔama woehu amandze ahorow pii, na iyi nyinara fi hɔn a nna wɔreper hwehwɛ tum nye tumdzi no hɔn emumuyɛdze, nyew, ɔyɛ dɛm ahensifo no.

18 Mbom ebɛnadze ntsi na merekasa pii fa dɛm asɛm yi ho? Osiandɛ nna yennyim dza ɔnam do ma homankasa hom reper hwehwɛ tumdzi yi. Yennyim, na mbom yehu dɛ hom yɛ hom man n’atamfo.

19 Anaadɛ hom ebu hom enyi egu hɛn do osiandɛ hom hyɛ hɛn man yi ne finimfin na aweɔmfo etwa homho ehyia ntsi na hom mma wɔmmfa edziban mmbrɛ hɛn, na wɔmmfa dɔm so mmbɛkã hɛn nsordaafo ho?

20 Ana hom werɛ efir Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm no? Nyew, ana hom werɛ efir hɛn egyanom hɔn ndɔmmum no? Ana hom werɛ efir mpɛn pii a ɔagye hɛn efi hɛn atamfo nsa no?

21 Anaa hom susu dɛ Ewuradze bɛda ho agye hɛn, wɔ ber a yɛtsena hɛn ahengua do na dza Ewuradze dze ama hɛn no, yɛremmfa nndzi dwuma?

22 Nyew, ana hom bɛtsena enyihaw mu wɔ ber a mpempem etwa homho ehyia a hɔn so wɔtse enyihaw mu, wɔ aber a mpempem so etwa asaase n’ahe ho ehyia a wɔrotɔ wɔ nkrantsee ano, nyew, woepirapira na worikyi bɔgya?

23 Ana hom susu dɛ Nyankopɔn bɔhwɛ hom dɛ hom nndzi fɔ wɔ ber a hom da ho tse hɔ rohwɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom? Hwɛ mese hom dɛ, Oho. Afei mebɛpɛ dɛ hom kaa dɛ Nyankopɔn akã dɛ wobedzi kan atsew kuraba no mu ansaana, wɔatsew noho so.

24 Na afei, gyedɛ hom nu homho wɔ dza hom ayɛ ho, na hom hyɛ ase ma hom mu do yɛ biribi, na hom dze edziban na dɔm brɛ hɛn, nye Helaman so, ama ɔdze ama hɔn a wɔrohwɛ hɛn kurow n’afã bea a ne nsa akã bio no, na hɛn so yetum agye hɛn ahodze wɔ dɛm mbea so a aka no, hwɛ obeye dɛ yebegyaa dɛ yɛnye Lamanfo no bɔtwe bio kesi dɛ yebedzi kan atsew hɛn kuraba no mu, nyew, hɛn aban ne tsir kɛse no mpo.

25 Na gyedɛ hom pen me krataa yi do, na hom yi fahodzi sunsum mapã kyerɛ me na hom per ma hɛn nsordaafo na hom bɔ hɔnho ban, na hom ma hɔn edziban ma wodzi, hwɛ mebegya me fahodzifo mu yi ne fã ma wɔahwɛ hɛn asaase yi n’afã, na mebɛserɛ Nyankopɔn n’ahoɔdzen nye ne nhyira egu hɔn do, amma tum biara enntum annkõ enntsia hɔn—

26 Na iyi osian hɔn gyedzi mbordo, nye hɔn abotar a woenya wɔ hɔn abɛbrɛsɛ mu ntsi—

27 Na mebɛba hom nkyɛn, na sɛ obi wɔ hom mu a ɔpɛ fahodzi a, nyew, fahodzi kakraabi mpo a, hwɛ, mibekenyan bi wɔ hom mu, ekesi dɛ hɔn a wɔper hwehwɛ tum no mpo bɛsã koraa.

28 Nyew, hwɛ munnsuro hom tum anaaso hom tumdzi, na mbom me Nyame na musuro no; na ne mbrasɛm ntsi na mafa me nkrantsee dɛ medze robɔ me man ho ban, na osian hom emumuyɛ ntsi na yɛayew hɛn dɔm mu pii dɛm.

29 Hwɛ mber asõ, nyew, mber abɛn, na gyedɛ hom kentsen homho dɛ hom bɔbɔ hom man nye hom mbofra nkakraba ho ban, annyɛ dɛm a pɛrpɛrdzi nkrantsee no bɛsensɛn hom do; nyew, obesi hom do na ɔasɛɛ hom koraa mpo.

30 Hwɛ, morotweɔn hom mboa; na, gyedɛ hom bɔboa hɛn, hwɛ, mereba hom do wɔ Zarahemla asaase do na medze nkrantsee ebotwitwa hom araa ma hom rinnya tum bio mmfa nnsiw nkorɔfo yi hɔn fahodzi kwan.

31 Na hwɛ Ewuradze remma kwan mma hom nntsena ase, mma homho nnyɛ dzen wɔ hom bɔn mu mma hom mmfa nnsɛɛ n’atseneneefo.

32 Hwɛ, ana hom susu dɛ Ewuradze begyaa hom na oebua Lamanfo atsɛn wɔ ber a osian hɔn egyanom amambra ntsi na ama woekyir hom, nyew, na hɔn a wɔtseew etua fii hɛn mu no so ntsi na wɔama ɔtan yi ayɛ kɛse, ana osian hom enyimnyampɛ nye wiadze mu egyangyandze ntsi na hom yɛ bɔn yi?

33 Hom nyim dɛ hom atõ Nyame ne mbra, nna hom nyim so dɛ hom tsiatsia do wɔ hom ananadze. Hwɛ, Ewuradze kãa kyerɛɛ me dɛ: Sɛ hɔn a hom eyi hɔn dɛ wɔnhwɛ hom do no ennu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn nye hɔn emumuyɛ ho a, ɔno hom nkɔ nye hɔn nkɔkõ.

34 Na afei hwɛ, emi Moroni, medzi ahyɛmu dɛ mibedzi me Nyame ne mbrasɛm do; dɛm ntsi mebɛpɛ dɛ hom betsie Nyame n’asɛm, na ntsɛmara hom nsoma ma wɔmfa edziban nye dɔm mbrɛ emi nye Helaman so.

35 Na hwɛ, sɛ hom annyɛ iyi a, mebɛba hom do ntsɛmara; na hwɛ, Nyankopɔn remma kwan mma ɔkɔm nnku hɛn; dɛm ntsi ɔbɛma hɛn hom edziban no bi, sɛ ɔba no dɛ nkrantseetwe mu mpo a. Afei hom nhwɛ ma Nyame n’asɛm nhyɛ mã.

36 Hwɛ, emi nye Moroni, hom nsordaanyi ɔsahen panyin no. Meremmper nnhwehwɛ tum, na mbom dɛ mebɛbrɛ no adze. Moronnhwehwɛ wiadze enyimnyam, mbom me Nyankopɔn n’enyimnyam, nye me man ne fahodzi nye ne yieyɛ a. Dɛm ntsi medze mo nwoma yi aba ewiei.
alma 61:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 61[/font_size][/center]

[i]Pahoran kã mbrɛ nkorɔfo esi akã hɔnho abɔmu na wɔatsew aban no do etua ho asɛm kyerɛ Moroni—Ahensifo no fa Zarahemla na wɔnye Lamanfo yɛ kor—Pahoran serɛ nsordaafo a wɔbɔboa no ma ɔnye etuatsewfo no akõ. Bɛyɛ mfe 62 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni somaa ma wɔdze ne krataa no kɛmaa ambrado panyin no, annkyɛr koraa na ne nsa kãa krataa fii Pahoran a ɔyɛ ambrado panyin no nkyɛn. Na nsɛm a ɔwɔ mu nye yi:

2 Emi Pahoran a meyɛ ambrado panyin wɔ asaase yi do, dze dɛm nsɛm yi brɛ Moroni, mo nsordaafo hɔn ɔsahen panyin no. Hwɛ mekã kyerɛ ɔwo Moroni dɛ, minndzi dɛw wɔ amandzehu kɛse a iruhu yi ho, nyew, me kra dzi yaw wɔ ho.

3 Mbom hwɛ, binom wɔ hɔ a wodzi dɛw wɔ amandzehu a iruhu yi ho, nyew, iyi ho ntsi wɔasoɛr atsew etua wɔ emi nye fahodzifo no so do, nyew, na hɔn a wɔasoɛr wɔ hɛn do dɔɔ sõ ara yie.

4 Na hɔn a wɔreper agye atsɛmbu egua no efi me nsamu no na wɔama emumuyɛ kɛse yi aba; osiandɛ wɔdze ndaadaa atwe dɔm pii hɔn akoma a dɛm ntsi wɔama ɔhaw a ɔtse dɛm aba hɛn do; na wɔmmfa hɛn edziban mma hɛn, na wɔahyɛ hɛn fahodzifo abagura ma wɔmmba hɛn nkyɛn.

5 Na hwɛ, wɔapam me efi enyim, ma meguan akɔ Gideon asaase do, menye dɔm dodow a me nsa kãa hɔn no kɔree.

6 Na hwɛ, mabɔ dawur wɔ asaase n’afã ha nyinara do; na hwɛ, wɔba hɛn nkyɛn daadaa bɛgye hɔn akodze dɛ wɔdze bɔbɔ hɛn man nye hɔn fahodzi ho ban, na woedzi wer wɔ bɔn a yɛdze ayɛ hɔn no ho.

7 Na wɔaba hɛn do dɛ wɔrobɔkõ etsia hɔn a wɔasoɛr atsew etua wɔ hɛn do no, nyew, dɛm ntsi wosuro hɛn na wonntum mmba hɛn do nye hɛn mmbɔkõ.

8 Na wɔagye asaase no, anaadɛ wɔagye Zarahemla kuropɔn no afa; na woeyi ɔhen ma ɔhwɛ hɔn do, na wɔakyerɛw Lamanfo hɔn hen no na ɔnye no akɛyɛ kor dɛ ɔno ɔbɔhwɛ Zarahemla kurow no do, na osusu dɛ dɛm no bɛma Lamanfo no etum agye asaase nkaa a aka no, ama sɛ Lamanfo no dzi hɔn do konyim a wɔdze no eedzi hen wɔ dɔm yi do.

9 Na afei, wo krataa no mu no akã m’enyim, na mbom ɔnnyɛ hwee; mobo mmfuwii, na mbom midzi dɛw wɔ w’akokodur ho. Emi Pahoran, moronnhwehwɛ tum, na mbom dɛ mebɛda ho atsena atsɛmbu egua no do ama meetum abɔ mo nkorɔfo hɔn kyɛfa nye hɔn ahotɔ ho ban. Me kra gyina pintsinn wɔ dɛm ahotɔ no a Nyame dze ama hɛn fahodzi no mu.

10 Na afei, hwɛ, yebesiw emumuyɛ ano sɛ ɔba no dɛ yɛkã bɔgya gu mpo a. Yɛrennka Lamanfo hɔn bɔgyaa nngu sɛ wɔbɛtsena hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do a.

11 Yɛrennka hɛn enuanom hɔn bɔgyaa nngu sɛ wɔannsoɛr anntsew etua na wɔammfa nkrantsee ammba hɛn do a.

12 Yɛbɛbrɛ hɛnho adze wɔ nkowaasom kɔndua ase mu sɛ Nyankopɔn ne pɛrpɛrdzi ma ɔba no dɛm a, anaadɛ sɛ ɔhyɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ dɛm a.

13 Mbom hwɛ ɔnnhyɛ hɛn dɛ yɛmfa hɛnho mma hɛn atamfo, na mbom dɛ yɛmfa hɛn werɛ ntwer no mu, na ɔbɛgye hɛn.

14 Dɛm ntsi, mo nua dɔfo, Moroni, ma yensiw emumuyɛ ano, na emumuyɛ biara a yerunntum mmfa hɛn kasaa nnsiw ano no, nyew, biribi tse dɛ basabasayɛ nye etuatsew, ma yɛmfa hɛn nkrantsee nnkõ ntsia ama yeetum esuo hɛn fahodzi mu yie, ama yeedzi dɛw wɔ ehutudze kɛse a ɔwɔ hɛn asɔr mu nye hɛn Pomfo na hɛn Nyankopɔn ntsi.

15 Dɛm ntsi, enye wo dɔm kakra mbra me nkyɛn ntsɛmara na gyaa hɔn a wɔaka no ma Lehi nye Teancum; na ma hɔn tum ma wondua Nyame no Sunsum a ɔyɛ fahodzi sunsum so no a ɔwɔ hɔn mu no do mfa nhwɛ ɔkõ a wɔrokõ wɔ dɛm bea no do no do.

16 Hwɛ masoma ma wɔdze edziban kakra rebrɛ hɔn, amma ɔkɔm ennkuku hɔn kesi dɛ hom bɛba me nkyɛn.

17 Boaboa nsordaafo biara a ibotum ano na enye hɔn mbra ha, na ntsɛmara yɛbɔkɔ akɔkõ etsia etuatsewfo no wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn n’ahoɔdzen mu dɛ mbrɛ gyedzi a ɔwɔ hɛn mu no tse.

18 Na yɛbɛgye Zarahemla kurow no, ama yeetum enya edziban pii dze asoma ma wɔdze akɛma Lehi na Teancum; nyew, yɛbɔkɔ hɔn do wɔ Ewuradze n’ahoɔdzen mu, na yɛbɛma dɛm emumuyɛ kɛse yi aba n’ewiei.

19 Na afei, Moroni, ɔyɛ me dɛw dɛ me nsa akã wo krataa yi, osiandɛ nna ɔhaw me kakra wɔ dza ɔsɛ dɛ yɛyɛ ho, dɛ ɔfata dɛ yɛnye hɛn enuanom bɔkɔ akɔkõ.

20 Mbom wɔakã dɛ, gyedɛ wonu hɔnho, annyɛ dɛm a, Ewuradze ahyɛ wo dɛ enye hɔn nkɔkõ.

21 Hwɛ na hyɛ Lehi na Teancum dzen wɔ Ewuradze mu; kã kyerɛ hɔn dɛ mma wonnsuro, na Nyame bɛgye hɔn, nyew, nye hɔn nyinara so a woegyina pintsinn wɔ dɛm ahotɔ a Nyame nam do dze ama woenya fahodzi no mu. Na afei medze me krataa a merekyerɛw dze akɛma mo nua dɔfo, Moroni no aba ewiei.
alma 62:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 62[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moroni si mu dɛ ɔrokɔboa Pahoran wɔ Gideon asaase do—Woku ahensifo no a wɔmmpɛ dɛ wɔbɔ hɔn man ho ban no—Pahoran na Moroni san gye Niphihah—Lamanfo pii bɛkã Ammon no nkorɔfo ho—Teancum ku Ammoron na woku no so—Wɔpam Lamanfo no fi asaase no do, na asomdwee ba—Helaman san bɛyɛ ɔsomdwuma no na ɔkyekyer Asɔr no. Bɛyɛ mfe 62–57 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni ne nsa kãa krataa yi no, onyaa akokodur, na dɛw kɛse hyɛɛ no mã osian Pahoran no nokwardzi ntsi, dɛ saana ɔnnkõ nntsia ɔman no ne fahodzi.

2 Mbom odzii yaw mbordo osian emumuyɛ a hɔn a wɔapam Pahoran efi atsɛmbu egua no do no ayɛ ntsi, nyew, ne sin ara nye dɛ, osian hɔn a wɔatsew etua wɔ hɔn man nye hɔn Nyankopɔn so do no ntsi.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni faa dɔm kakra dɛ mbrɛ Pahoran rohwehwɛ no, na ɔmaa Lehi nye Teancum tum dɛ wɔnhwɛ no nsordaafo a wɔaka no do, na osii mu dɛ ɔrokɔ Gideon asaase do.

4 Na beebiara a odurii no okenyaan ahotɔ ho frankaa no wɔ hɔ, na nsordaafo dodow biara a ne nsa kãa hɔn no, ɔdze hɔn nyinara sii mu kɔr Gideon asaase do.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ mpempem kɔr ne mfrankaa afã, na wɔfaa hɔn nkrantsee dɛ wɔdze rokɔkõ dze abɔ hɔn fahodzi ho ban amma wɔannkɛhyɛ nkowaasom ase.

6 Na ber a Moroni boaboaa dɔm biara a ne nsa kãa hɔn wɔ n’akwantu no mu no ano wiei no, ɔdze hɔn baa Gideon asaase do; na ɔdze no nsordaafo kɛkãa Pahoran nedze ho ma wɔdɔree ara yie, wɔdɔɔ sõ koraa sen Pachus nedze, nyia odzi hen wɔ dɛm etuatsewfo no a wɔpaam fahodzifo no fii Zarahemla asaase do na wɔfaa asaase no no.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni na Pahoran nye hɔn nsordaafo no kɔr Zarahemla asaase do, na wodur kuropɔn no mu no, wohyiaa Pachus no dɔm no, ntsi wɔnye hɔn kõe.

8 Na hwɛ, wokum Pachus na wɔfaa no dɔm no adaduafo, na wɔdze Pahoran sii n’atsɛmbu egua no do bio.

9 Na wodzii Pachus no nkorɔfo no nye ahensifo no a wɔkyekyee hɔn no asɛm, dɛ mbrɛ mbra no se, na wɔdze hɔn guu efiadze; na wokum hɔn dɛ mbrɛ mbra no se; nyew, Pachus no dɔm no nye ahensifo no mu biara a wɔammfa hɔn akõdze annkõ ammfa ammbɔ hɔn man ho ban no, na mbom wɔkoe tsiaa no no, wokum hɔn.

10 Na dɛm maa okehiaa dɛ wɔhwɛ ma wodzi mbra no do yie ama woeetum abɔ hɔn man ho ban, nyew, na obiara a wobohu no dɛ ɔmmpɛ hɔn fahodzi no ntsɛmara wokum no dɛ mbrɛ mbra no se.

11 Na dɛm na afe eduasa wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei; Moroni nye Pahoran hwɛɛ ma asomdwee baa dɔm a wɔwɔ Zarahemla asaase do no mu, na hɔn a woenndzi nokwar amma dɛm fahodzi yi no wokum hɔn.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe eduasa biako n’ahyɛse, wɔ atsɛmbuafo aber a wɔhwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no Moroni somaa ntsɛmara ma wɔdze edziban nye dɔm mpemesia kɛmaa Helaman, ama aaboa no ma oeetum ahwɛ asaase no n’afã hɔ no do yie.

13 Na ɔkãa so dɛ wɔnsoma ma wɔmfa nsordaafo mpemesia nye edziban a ɔdɔɔ sõ ara yie nkɛma Lehi nye Teancum hɔn nsordaafo no. Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔyɛɛ iyi ama woeetum abɔ asaase no ho ban amma Lamanfo no enntum ammba hɔ.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni nye Pahoran gyaa dɔm a hɔn dodow sõ ara yie wɔ Zarahemla asaase no do, na wɔfaa dɔm so a ɔsõ ara yie na wosii mu dɛ wɔrokɔ Nephihah asaase do, nna wɔayɛ hɔn adwen dɛ wɔrekɛkã Lamanfo a wɔwɔ kurow mu hɔ no egu.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wosii mu dɛ wɔrokɔ asaase no do no, wɔfaa Lamanfo dɔm a wɔdɔɔ sõ ara yie, na wokum hɔn mu pii, na wɔfaa hɔn edziban nye hɔn akodze.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔfaa hɔn no, wɔmaa wodzii ahyɛmu dɛ wɔnnkɛfa hɔn akodze aba Nephifo do bio.

17 Na ber a wodzii dɛm ahyɛmu yi wiei no, wɔmaa wɔnye Ammon no nkorɔfo no kɛtsenae, na hɔn dodow bɛyɛ mpem anan na woennku hɔn.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔmaa wɔkɔree no, wosii mu bio dɛ wɔrokɔ Nephihah asaase do. Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔbaa Nephihah kurow mu no, wosisii hɔn ntamadan wɔ Nephihah asaase petee do wɔ bea a ɔbɛn Nephihah kurow no.

19 Afei Moroni pɛɛ dɛ Lamanfo no bopue aba nye hɔn abɔkõ wɔ bea a hɔ yɛ petee no do; na mbom Lamanfo no nyim dɛ wɔwɔ akokodur kɛse na wohunii so dɛ wɔdɔɔ sõ, dɛm ntsi wɔammpɛ dɛ wobopue aba hɔn do; dɛm ntsi wɔammba nye hɔn ammbɔkõ dɛm da no.

20 Na ber a adze sae no, Moroni faa sum no mu, na obegyinaa ban no dɛ ɔrebɛtsɛw kurow no n’afã bea a Lamanfo no nye hɔn nsordaafo no abɔ hɔn asese wɔ no.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ nna wɔwɔ boka afamu wɔ kwan ano; na hɔn nyinara adeda. Na afei Moroni saan n’ekyir kɔr no nsordaafo nkyɛn, kɛsee hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ ntampehoma a ɔyɛ dzen na ntwer atsentsen, na wongyaa mu wɔ afasu no n’etsifi mfa nsensɛn afasu noho wɔ afasu no mu.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni maa no dɔm no fowee begyinagyinaa ban no n’etsifi; na wogyaagyaa hɔnho sisii daadze wɔ kurow no n’afã, nyew, wɔ anee afamu, beebi ma Lamanfo nye hɔn nsordaafo no ammbɔ hɔn asese wɔ no.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔnam hɔn ntampehoma dzendzen nye hɔn ntwer no gyaagyaa hɔnho sisii kurow no mu anafua no; dɛm ntsi aber a adze kyee no nna hɔn nyinara wɔ kurow n’afasu no mu.

24 Na afei, ber a Lamanfo no nyaan anapa no na wohun dɛ Moroni no nsordaafo no wɔ ban no mu no, hɔn akoma tui araa ma wɔfaa kwan tseaba no mu guanee.

25 Na afei ber a Moroni hun dɛ woruguan no, ɔsee no dɔm no dɛ wɔnkã hɔn do, na wokum hɔn mu pii, na wotwaa dodow so ho hyiae, na wɔfaa hɔn adaduafo; na nkaafo no so guanee kɔr Moroni asaase do, dza ɔda mpoano afamu no.

26 Dɛm na Moroni nye Pahoran yɛe gyee Nephihah kurow no a hɔn mu ɔkra kor mpo anntɔr; na wokum Lamanfo no mu pii.

27 Afei ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo a wɔyɛɛ adaduafo no hɔn mu dodowara pɛɛ dɛ wɔkɛkã Ammon no nkorɔfo no ho na wonya fahodzi.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn mu dodowara a wɔyɛɛ dɛm no, wɔpeen hɔn pɛ do maa hɔn.

29 Dɛm ntsi, Lamanfo adaduafo no nyina kɛkãa Ammon no nkorɔfo no ho, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ edwuma mbordo, rututu daadze, na worudua ewifua ahorow pii, na wɔrenyɛn nguankuw na anantwikuw ahorow nyina; na dza wɔyɛe yi yii fona kɛsenara fii Nephifo do; nyew, dɛm ntsi woyii Lamanfo adaduafo no hɔn haw nyina fii hɔn do.

30 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni ne nsa kãa Nephihah kurow no ekyir no, na ɔfaa Lamanfo hɔn mu dodowara adaduafo ma ɔmaa Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo no hɔn dodow do huanee ara yie, na hɔn nsa so kãa Nephifo hɔn mu dodowara a wɔafa hɔn adaduafo no na wɔdze hɔn kãa Moroni no nsordaafo ho ma wɔdɔɔr mbordo; dɛm ntsi Moroni fii Nephihah asaase do kɔr Lehi asaase do.

31 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ Moroni reba hɔn do no, hɔn akoma tuu bio na woguaan Moroni no nsordaafo no.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni nye no nsordaafo no tsiiw hɔn fi kurow kɔ kurow, kesii dɛ wɔnye Lehi na Teancum hyiae; Lamanfo no guaan Lehi na Teancum araa dze siaan famu faa mpoano afamu, kesii dɛ wɔbaa Moroni asaase do.

33 Na Lamanfo nsordaafo no nyina boaa hɔn ano ma wɔyɛɛ kuw kor wɔ Moroni asaase do. Afei dze nna Lamanfo hɔn hen Ammoron so kã hɔnho.

34 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni na Lehi nye Teancum bɔɔ hɔn asese dze twaa Moroni asaase n’ahe ho hyiae, dɛm maa wɔkãa Lamanfo no hyɛe osiandɛ sar etwa hɔn asaase n’anaafo nye no boka afamu nyina ho ehyia.

35 Na wɔbɔɔ hɔn asese wɔ hɔ anafua no. Na hwɛ Nephifo nye Lamanfo no so nyina afonafona osiandɛ woetwa kwan tsentsen; dɛm ntsi woenntum ammfa adwen biara dɛm anafua no gyedɛ Teancum nko; osiandɛ nna no bo efuw Ammoron mbordo osiandɛ onyim dɛ Ammoron nye no nuabanyin Amalickiah na wɔama dɛm ɔkõ kɛse a ɔda hɔn nye Lamanfo ntamu no akyɛr na wɔakã bɔgya pii egu, nyew, ma ɔkɔm kɛse so aba.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ Teancum nam n’ebufuw do kɔr bea a Lamanfo no abɔ hɔn asese wɔ no na ɔsaan kuropɔn n’afasu no kɔr mu. Na ofi bea kor do kɔr kor do kesii dɛ ohun ɔhen no; na ɔtoow pea dze wɔɔ no ma otuee n’akoma mu. Mbom hwɛ, ɔhen no nyaan no nkowaa no ansaana oruwu, dɛm ntsi wotsiiw Teancum na wokum no.

37 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lehi na Moroni hun dɛ Teancum ewu no, hɔn werɛ hoow mbordo; osiandɛ hwɛ, ɔyɛ obi a ɔakõ ahoɔdzen mu papanara dze ama ne man, nyew, ahotɔ ne nyɛnko nokwafo; ɔasɔw akotorka nwenwen pii. Na mbom hwɛ, oewu, na ɔkɔ asaase nyina kwan.

38 Afei ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no Moroni sii mu, na ɔbaa Lamanfo do na wokunkum hɔn ara yie; na wɔpaam hɔn fii asaase no do; na woguanee araa kesii dɛ wɔannsan hɔn ekyir ammba Nephifo do bio.

39 Na dɛm na afe eduasa biako wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei; na dɛm na akõkoekõ, na bɔgyagu, nye ɔkɔm, na amandzehu baa hɔn do bɛyɛ mfe pii ntamu.

40 Na ewudzi, nye wentwiwentwi, na etuatsew, nye emumuyɛ horow nyina sii Nephi no nkorɔfo mu; naaso osian atseneneefo no ntsi, nyew, osian atseneneefo no hɔn mpaabɔ ntsi, wɔdze hɔn nkwa kyɛɛ hɔn.

41 Mbom hwɛ, osiandɛ ɔkõ a osii Nephifo nye Lamanfo mu no kyɛree ntsi ɔmaa hɔn mu dodowara hɔn akoma pirimii, na osiandɛ ɔkõ no kyɛree ntsi ɔmaa dodowara so dwee osian hɔn amandzehu ntsi, dɛm maa wɔbrɛɛ hɔnho adze wɔ Nyame enyim, kɔr ahobrɛadze no bun mu.

42 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moroni gyee ban dze sisiiw asaase no ne mbeambea a kwan deda a Lamanfo botum edua mu aba no nyina kesii dɛ wonyaa bambɔ a ɔyɛ dzen a oye no, ɔsaan n’ekyir kɔr Zarahemla kurow mu; na Helaman so saan n’ekyir kɔr noara n’egyapadze man mu; na asomdwee baa Nephi no nkorɔfo mu bio.

43 Na Moroni gyaa no tum a ɔwɔ wɔ nsordaafo mu dze maa ne babanyin a ne dzin dze Moronihah; na ɔkɔr nankasa ne fie kɛgyee n’ahom ama oeenya asomdwee wɔ ne nda nkaa a aka no mu.

44 Na Pahoran so sanee kɛtsenaa n’atsɛmbu egua no do; na Helaman fae too no do bio dɛ ɔbɛkã Nyame n’asɛm no akyerɛ nkorɔfo; na osian akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi pii no ntsi okehiaa dɛ wɔhyehyɛ asɔr no ne nhyehyɛɛ no bio.

45 Dɛm ntsi, Helaman nye n’enuanom no kɔree, na wɔdze tum kɛse kãa Nyame n’asɛm no ma nkorɔfo pii hun hɔn emumuyɛdze ma ɔmaa wonuu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn ho na wɔmaa wonumaa hɔn maa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn.

46 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔkyekyeer Nyankopɔn n’asɔr bio wɔ asaase nyina do.

47 Nyew, na wɔyɛɛ nhyehyɛɛ a ɔfa mbra no ho. Na woyiyii hɔn atsɛmbuafo nye hɔn atsɛmbuafo mpanyimfo no so.

48 Na Nephi no nkorɔfo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ prɔmprɔm bio wɔ asaase no do, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrodɔr na hɔnho reyɛ dzen mbordo bio wɔ asaase no do. Na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ esikafo mbordo.

49 Mbom hɔn sika, anaa hɔn ahoɔdzen, anaa hɔn prɔmprɔmyɛ no amma wɔmmema hɔn ho do enyi ma ɔtratra hɔn ntɔn; anaadɛ wɔanyɛ nyaa wɔ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ne nkaa ho; na mbom wɔbrɛɛ hɔnho adze mbordo wɔ n’enyim.

50 Nyew, wɔkaa ndzɛmba akɛse a Ewuradze ayɛ ama hɔn, dɛ oeyi hɔn efi owu, nye nkyehoma, na efiadzeda mu, nye amandzehu ahorow nyina mu, na ɔagye hɔn efi hɔn atamfo nsa.

51 Na wɔbɔɔ mpaa maa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn daa daa araa ma ɔmaa Ewuradze hyiraa hɔn, dɛ mbrɛ n’asɛm se, dɛm maa hɔnho yɛɛ dzen na wɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase no do.

52 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔyɛɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyinara. Na Helaman wui wɔ afe eduasa-enum no mu wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do.
alma 63:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 63[/font_size][/center]

[i]Shiblon na ekyir no Helaman fa nkyerɛwee krɔnkrɔn no sie—Nephifo pii tu kwan kɔ asaase a ɔda etsifi no do—Hagoth pam hɛn a ɔkɔ po a ɔda anee afamu no do—Moronihah dzi Lamanfo do konyim wɔ ɔkõ mu. Bɛyɛ mfe 56–52 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe eduasa esia n’ahyɛse no wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no, Shiblon faa dɛm nkyerɛwee krɔnkrɔn no a Alma dze maa Helaman no.

2 Na ɔyɛ nyimpa a odzi pɛrpɛr, na ɔnantseew tseneneeyɛ mu wɔ Nyame enyim; na ɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ ɔbɛyɛ papa daa nyina na oedzi Ewuradze ne Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do; na dɛmara so na no nuabanyin no so yɛe.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moroni so wui. Na dɛm na afe eduasa esia wɔ atsɛmbuafo aber do no dze baa ewiei.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe eduasa esuon wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do no, nyimpa dɔm kɛse a hɔn dodow bɛyɛ mpemenum ahaanan nye hɔn yernom na hɔn mba fii Zarahemla asaase do kɔr asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu no do.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ Hagoth, ɔno nna ɔyɛ odwimfo nwanwanyi bi, dɛm ntsi ɔkɔree kɛpaam hɛn kɛse bi wɔ Dzifuu asaase no ne he do wɔ bea a ɔbɛn Amamfõ asaase no, na opiaa too po a ɔda anee, asaase tseabaa a ɔdze kɔ etsifi afamu no do.

6 Na hwɛ, Nephifo hɔn mu dodowara na wɔkɔr mu na wɔfaa edziban pii na mbaa nye mbofra pii kãa hɔnho kɔree; na wɔdze faa asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu no do. Na dɛm na afe eduasa esuon dze baa ewiei.

7 Na afe eduasa awɔtwe mu no, dɛm banyin yi paam hɛn bi so. Na hɛn no a odzi kan no so sanee bae, na dɔm pii kɔr mu; na hɔn so wɔfaa edziban pii, na otuu bio dze hɔn faa asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu no do.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔanntse hɔn nka bio. Na yesusu dɛ wɔdɔe kɔr po n’ase bun mu. Na ɔbaa dɛ hɛn kor so tui kɔree; na bea a ɔkɔree dze yennyim.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe yi mu, nkorɔfo pii na wɔkɔr asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu no do. Na dɛm na afe eduasa awɔtwe so dze baa ewiei.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe eduasa akron wɔ atsɛmbuafo aber do no, Shiblon so wui, na Corianton dze hɛn kɔr asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu no do dɛ ɔdze edziban rekɛma nkorɔfo a wɔkɔ dɛm asaase no do no.

11 Dɛm ntsi nna ohia dɛ Shiblon dze dɛm ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn yinom ma Helaman ne babanyin no a wɔfrɛ no Helaman, nyia wɔdze n’egya ne dzin too no no, ma ɔdze sie, ansaana oewu.

12 Afei hwɛ, dɛm nkrukye yinom a ɔwɔ Helaman hɔ esie yi, wɔhwɛɛ do kyerɛkyerɛɛw pii dze kɛmemaa adasamba a wɔwɔ asaase no do nyina, gyedɛ dɛm mbea a Alma kãa dɛ mma wɔmma ommpue no nko.

13 Naaso, ɔsɛ dɛ wosie dɛm ndzɛmba yinom krɔnkrɔn, na wɔdze fi ebusuasantsen kor do ma kor so; dɛm ntsi wɔdze maa Helaman afe yi mu ansaana Shiblon rubowu.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe yi so mu etuatsewfo binom kɔree kɛkãa Lamanfo ho; na wokonunuu hɔn bio ma hɔn bo fuuw Nephifo bio.

15 Na dɛm afe yi so mu wɔdze nsordaafo pii baa bio dɛ wɔnye Moronihah no nkorɔfo no robɔkõ, anaadɛ wɔbaa Moronihah no nsordaafo do, ɔkõ no mu no wodzii hɔn do konyim na wɔpaam hɔn bio ma wɔkɔr hɔnankasa hɔn nsaase do, na hɔn mu dɔm pii wuwui.

16 Na dɛm na afe eduasa akron wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei.

17 Na dɛm na dza ɔfa Alma, na Helaman a ɔyɛ ne babanyin, na Shiblon so a ɔyɛ ne babanyin baa ewiei.
hel 1:
[center][font_size=26]Helaman Nwoma No[/font_size][/center]

Nephifo hɔn ho nsɛm. Hɔn akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi na hɔn etuatsew. Hɔn nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn so hɔn nkɔnhyɛ ansaana Christ reba dɛ mbrɛ Helaman a ɔyɛ Helaman ne babanyin ne nkyerɛwee se, nye ne mbabanyin so hɔn nkyerɛwee fitsi aber no dze besi Christ ne mbae do mpo. Lamanfo so hɔn mu pii sakyeree. Hɔn nsakyer ho nsɛm. Lamanfo hɔn ndzeyɛtsenenee, nye Nephifo hɔn emumuyɛ nye ekyiwadze ho nsɛm, dɛ mbrɛ Helaman na ne mbabanyin hɔn nkyerɛwee se dze besi Christ ne mbae do, iyi nye dza wɔfrɛ no Helaman nwoma no, na dza ɔkekã ho.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Pahoran a otsĩa ebien no bɛyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin na Kishkumen ku no—Pacumeni bɛtsena atsɛmbu egua no do—Coriantumr bɛyɛ Lamanfo nsordaafo no hɔn sahen, ɔgye Zarahemla na oku Pacumeni—Moronihah dzi Lamanfo do konyim na ɔsan gye Zarahemla na woku Coriantumr. Bɛyɛ mfe 52–50 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan no n’ahyɛse wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo no dzi Nephi no nkorɔfo no do hen no, ɔhaw a ɔyɛ dzen sii Nephifo no mu.

2 Na hwɛ, nna Pahoran ewu, na ɔkɔ asaase nyina kwan no; dɛm ntsi wentwiwentwi kɛse hyɛɛ ase wɔ enuanom a wɔyɛ Pahoran ne mbabanyin no mu wɔ nyia ɔfata dɛ ɔtsena atsɛmbu egua no do.

3 Afei hɔn a wɔper atsɛmbu egua no ho na wɔmaa dɔm no dzii aper no edzin nye yi: Pahoran, Paanchi na Pacumeni.

4 Na afei nnyɛ Pahoran mbabanyin nyina nye iyinom (mbom nna ɔwɔ pii), na mbom iyinom na wɔper atsɛmbu egua no ho bi, dɛm ntsi wɔmaa dɔm no hɔn mu kyɛɛ baasa.

5 Naaso ɔbaa dɛ dɔm no ndze na woyii Pahoran ma ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin nye ambrado wɔ Nephi no dɔm no mu.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Pacumeni hun dɛ ne nsa rennka atsɛmbu egua no, ɔnye dɔm no yɛɛ kor.

7 Mbom hwɛ, Paanchi, nye dɔm a wɔpɛ dɛ ɔhwɛ hɔn do no bo fuuw kɛse; dɛm ntsi, nna nkyɛ ɔreper adaadaa dɛm nkorɔfo no ma wɔasoɛr atsew etua wɔ hɔn enuanom no do.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a nkyɛ ɔrebɛyɛ iyi no, hwɛ, wɔkyeer no na wodzii n’asɛm dɛ mbrɛ dɔm no se, na wobuu no fɔ na wɔhyɛɛ dɛ wonku no; osiandɛ ɔatsew etua rohwehwɛ asɛɛ dɔm no hɔn ahotɔ.

9 Afei dɔm no a wɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔhwɛ hɔn do no hun dɛ woebu no okumfɔ no, dɛm ntsi hɔn bo fuwii, dɛm ntsi hwɛ, wɔsomaa obi a wɔfrɛ no Kishkumen ma ɔkɔr bea a Pahoran n’atsɛmbu egua no wɔ na okokum Pahoran wɔ ber a ɔtse atsɛmbu egua no do.

10 Na Pahoran no nkowaa no taa no do; mbom hwɛ, Kishkumen n’enguan mu yɛɛ hyew araa ma ɔdasanyi biara enntum annkyer no.

11 Na ɔkɔr hɔn a wɔsomaa no no nkyɛn, na hɔn nyina dzii ahyɛmu, nyew, wɔdze hɔn Yɛfo a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no akã ntam ntsi wɔnnkɛpɛ, dɛ wɔbɛka akyerɛ ɔdasanyi biara dɛ Kishkumen na okum Pahoran.

12 Dɛm ntsi, Nephi no nkorɔfo no ennhu Kishkumen, osiandɛ ber a okokum Pahoran no, nna ɔasesã no ho. Na Kishkumen nye no dɔm no a wɔnye no dzii nsew no dze hɔn ho kɔforaforaa dɔm no mu, wɔyɛɛ no kwan bi do ma woennhu hɔn; na mbom dodowara a wohun hɔn no, wobuu hɔn okumfɔ.

13 Na afei hwɛ, woyii Pacumeni dɛ mbrɛ dɔm no ndze se, ma ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin nye dɔm no do ɔhwɛfo, ma ɔhyɛɛ no nuabanyin Pahoran ananmu; na iyi dzi wɔ no. Na wɔyɛɛ iyi nyinara wɔ atsɛmbuafo aber no mu wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan no mu; na ɔbaa ewiei.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo hɔn afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan biako wɔ ber a wodzi adze mu no, Lamanfo no boaboaa hɔn nsordaafo dɔm pii ano, na wɔmaa hɔn akodze a ɔyɛ nkrantsee nye ekuma, nye egyen na egyen-menaba, nye dadzekyɛw, nye akatabo nye akokyɛm horow pii.

15 Na wɔbaa Nephifo do bio dɛ wɔnye hɔn robɔkõ. Na ɔbarimba bi a wɔfrɛ no Coriantumr dzii hɔn enyim na ɔyɛ Zarahemla n’asenyi, na ɔyɛ obi a ɔtseew etua fii Nephifo mu; na ɔyɛ ɔbarimba a ɔsõ na ɔyɛ ɔkatakyi so.

16 Dɛm ntsi, Lamanfo hɔn hen a ne dzin dze Tubaloth, a ɔyɛ Ammoron ne babanyin, susuu dɛ Coriantumr a ɔyɛ ɔbarimba katakyi no botum dze n’ahoɔdzen na ne nyansa so akõ etsia Nephifo no, ntsi sɛ wɔsoma no a obotum edzi Nephifo do nyim—

17 Dɛm ntsi, onunuu hɔn ma wonyaa ebufuw, na ɔboaboaa no nsordaafo ano, na oyii Coriantumr dɛ ɔnyɛ hɔn banodzinyi, na ogyaa hɔn kwan dɛ wɔnkɔ Zarahemla na wɔnye Nephifo nkɔkõ.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ osian wentwiwentwi pii a esi hɔn mu nye aban fona a ɔrofona ntsi nna wonnyi aweɔmfo pii wɔ Zarahemla asaase no do; na wosusuu dɛ Lamanfo no runntum mmba hɔn asaase ne finimfin no do mmbɔkõ wɔ Zarahemla kurow kɛse no mu.

19 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ Coriantumr dzii dɔmtutuw no enyim, na wɔbaa dɔm a wɔtse kurow kɛse no mu no do, na hɔn mbae no yɛɛ hyew dodow, ntsi Nephifo no ennya kwan ammboaboa hɔn nsordaafo ano.

20 Dɛm ntsi Coriantumr twaa ɔweɔmfo a ɔtse kurow kɛse no n’abowano roweɔn no hwee famu, na ɔnye no nsordaafo nyinara kɔr kurow kɛse no mu, na wokum obiara a ɔnye hɔn fimfenee, wɔyɛɛ dɛmara kɛpeem aber a wɔfaa kurow no nyinara.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ Pacumeni a ɔyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no, guanee fii Coriantumr enyim dze kodur kurotsia. Na ɔbaa dɛ Coriantumr dze nkrantsee twitwaa no wɔ afasu no ho araa ma owui. Na dɛm na Pacumeni ne nda baa ewiei.

22 Na afei ber a Coriantumr hun dɛ ne nsa akã Zarahemla kurow kɛse no, na ohun dɛ Nephifo no eguan hɔn, na woekuku hɔn, na wɔafa hɔn so dze hɔn egu efiadze no, na ne nsa akã asaase ne mbea a ɔyɛ dzen no, onyaa akokodur na ɔyɛɛ dɛ ɔbɔkɔ nye aman nkaa no nyina akɔkõ.

23 Na afei ɔannsɛɛ mber wɔ Zarahemla asaase do, mbom ɔnye no nsordaafo dɔmtutuw no kɔree, na wɔdze faa kwan a wɔdze kɔ Dzifuu kurow do; na n’adwen nye dɛ ɔdze nkrantsee rukonu hɔn mu na ɔakɛfa asaase n’etsifi afamu no.

24 Na osusuu dɛ hɔn ahoɔdzen ne kɛse wɔ kurow no ne finimfin dɛm ntsi ɔkɔr kan na ɔamma hɔn mber koraa mma wɔammfa ammboaboa hɔn ano yie gyedɛ ekuw ekuw nkakraba nkakraba; dɛm ntsi wotui hyɛɛ hɔn do na wotwitwaa hɔn guu asaase no do.

25 Mbom hwɛ kurow no ne finimfin a Coriantumr fae no, maa Moronihah nyaa tum kɛse wɔ hɔn do, ɔwɔ mu dɛ woeku Nephifo pii dze.

26 Na hwɛ, Moronihah ennsusu dɛ Lamanfo no botum aba kurow no ne finimfin, na mbom wɔbɔkɔ nkurow a ɔdeda no ho hyia no mu dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛɛ no mber bi no; dɛm ntsi Moronihah hyɛɛ dɛ no nsordaafo a hɔnho yɛ dzen no mbɔ mbea a ɔabɔ hɔn ho aprɔw no ho ban.

27 Mbom hwɛ, Lamanfo no ennsuro dɛ mbrɛ ɔdwenee, na mbom wɔbaa asaase no ne finimfin, dɛ wɔrebɛfa kurow kɛse Zarahemla no, na wɔnantseew ɔman no no nkuropɔn nyinara mu dɛ worukuku dɔm no ara yie, mbanyin, mbasiafo, nye mbofra nyinara, na wɔrefa nkurow nye mbea etsitsir pii.

28 Mbom aber a Moronihah hun iyi no, ntsɛmara ɔsomaa Lehi dɛ ondzi nsordaafo a wɔwɔ hɔ no enyim nkotwar hɔn ansaana wɔaba Dzifuu asaase no do.

29 Na dɛm na ɔyɛe; na odzii hɔn enyim kɔree ansaana wɔreba Dzifuu asaase no do, na wɔnye hɔn kõe ara yie, ma wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔresan hɔn ekyir dze aba Zarahemla asaase do.

30 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔsaan hɔn ekyir no, nna Moronihah so sii hɔn ekyir, na ɔnye hɔn kõe ara yie, na wɔkãa bɔgya pii gui, nyew, wokunkum hɔn mu pii, na wohun dɛ Coriantumr fora ewufo no mu.

31 Na afei, hwɛ, nna Lamanfo no nntum nnsan hɔn ekyir mmfa kwan biara do, wonntum mmfa etsifi anaa anaafo anaa anee anaa boka, osiandɛ nna Nephifo no etwa hɔn ho nyinara ehyia.

32 Na dɛm na Coriantumr kãa Lamanfo no kɛhyɛɛ Nephifo no finimfin araa ma Nephifo no nyaa hɔn do tum, na ɔnoara dze wokum no, na Lamanfo no gyaa hɔn ho hyɛɛ Nephifo nsa.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ Moronihah ne nsa kãa kurow kɛse Zarahemla bio no ɔmaa Lamanfo a wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum no kwan dɛ womfi asaase no do nkɔ asomdwee mu.

34 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan biako wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn aber do no baa ewiei.
hel 2:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Helaman, Helaman ne babanyin, bɛyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafopanyin—Gadianton bɛyɛ Kishkumen no kuw no ne panyin—Helaman no nkowaa ku Kishkumen, na Gadianton kuw no guan kɔ sar no do. Bɛyɛ mfe 50–49 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn aber do afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan ebien, wɔ ber a Moronihah ama asomdwee aba Nephifo nye Lamanfo mu bio no, hwɛ nna obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛtsena atsɛmbu egua no do; dɛm ntsi wentwiwentwi hyɛɛ ase baa dɔm no mu a ɔfa nyia a ɔsɛ dɛ ɔtsena atsɛmbu egua no do.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ Helaman a ɔyɛ Helaman ne babanyin no na dɔm no yii no dɛ ɔntsena atsɛmbu egua no do.

3 Mbom hwɛ, Kishkumen a okum Pahoran no tsɛɛw dɛ oboku Helaman so; na no kuw no a wɔnye no edzi ahyɛmu ntsi wɔnnkɛpɛ dɛ mma wɔmma obiara nnhu n’emumuyɛdze no nye no yɛɛ adwen.

4 Na nyimpa bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Gadianton a n’ano atsew yie, na ɔawea nsumaamu ewudzi nye edwotwa ne yɛ mu; dɛm ntsi ɔbɛyɛɛ Kishkumen no kuw no ne panyin.

5 Dɛm ntsi ɔdaadaa hɔn nye Kishkumen dɛ sɛ wɔdze no tsena atsɛmbu egua no do a ɔbɔhwɛ ma wɔdze hɔn a wɔdɔm kuw no enya tum nye tumdzi wɔ dɔm no mu; dɛm ntsi Kishkumen peer dɛ oboku Helaman.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔrokɔ atsɛmbu egua no ho ekoku Helaman no, hwɛ Helaman no nkowaa mu kor dandaan noho puee anafua ma ɔtsee kuw no hɔn nhyehyɛɛ a wɔayɛ dɛ wɔdze boku Helaman—

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ ohyiaa Kishkumen, na ɔyɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze bi kyerɛɛ no; dɛm ntsi Kishkumen kãa dza ɔpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ kyerɛɛ no, na ɔsee no dɛ ɔnye no nkɔ atsɛmbu egua no ho ma onkoku Helaman.

8 Na ber a Helaman n’akowaa no tsee dza Kishkumen ahyehyɛ wɔ n’akoma mu dɛ obedzi ewu, na dɛ osi hɔn a wɔdɔm no kuw no so enyido dɛ wobedzi ewu na wobotwa edwo adze, na wɔagye tum no, (na iyi nye hɔn nsumaamu nsusui na fɛkuw) Helaman n’akowaa no see no dɛ: Ma yɛnkɔ atsɛmbu egua no ho.

9 Afei iyi maa Kishkumen n’enyi gyee mbordo, na ɔdween dɛ ne nhyehyɛɛ no bɛyɛ yie; mbom hwɛ, ber a wɔrokɔ atsɛmbu egua no ho no, Helaman n’akowaa no dze pea wɔɔ Kishkumen ma ohwiraa n’akoma mu ma ɔhwee famu wui a ɔannkasa koraa. Na otuu mbirika kɔr Helaman nkyɛn kɛkãa dza ohunii, na ɔtsee, na ɔyɛe.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ Helaman somaa dɛ wɔnkɛfa dɛm nsumaamu edwotwafo nye ewudzifo kuw no mbra, ma wonku hɔn dɛ mbrɛ mbra no se.

11 Mbom hwɛ, ber a Gadianton hun dɛ Kishkumen annsan n’ekyir no osuroo dɛ annhwɛ a woboku no; dɛm ntsi ɔmaa no kuwmba no kãa no do. Na wɔfaa nsumaa kwan bi do guanee fii asaase no do kɔr sar no do; na dɛm ntsi ber a Helaman somaa dɛ wɔnkɛfa hɔn mbra no, woennhu hɔn wɔ beebiara.

12 Na mebɛkã dɛm Gadianton yi ho nsɛm pii ekyir yi. Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan ebien wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn aber do wɔ Nephi no nkorɔfo no mu no baa ewiei.

13 Na hwɛ, nwoma yi n’ewiei no, yebohu dɛ dɛm Gadianton yi dzii hɔn do nyim, nyew, nkyɛ ɔresɛɛ Nephifo no nyinara.

14 Hwɛ mennkyerɛ dɛ Helaman no nwoma yi n’ewiei nye yi, mbom mekyerɛ Nephi no nwoma a miyii nsɛm a m’akyerɛw yi fii mu no n’ewiei.
hel 3:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephifo pii guan kɔ asaase a ɔwɔ etsifi afamu no do—Wosisi adan pa na wɔdze kyerɛwsɛm pii sie—Wɔsakyer nyimpa mpem mpem na wonuma hɔn—Nyankopɔn n’asɛm gya nkorɔfo kɔ nkwagye mu—Helaman ne ba Nephi bɛtsena atsɛmbu egua no do. Bɛyɛ mfe 49–39 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan ebiasa wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn aber do mu no, wentwiwentwi biara ennsi Nephifo no mu kã ahantanyɛ kakraabi a ɔbaa asɔr no mu no, ɔno na ɔmaa etuatsew kakraabi baa dɔm no mu, na wosiesiee dɛm nsɛm yi wɔ mfe eduanan ebiasa dze rokɔ n’ewiei no mu.

2 Na wentwiwentwi biara ennsi dɔm no mu wɔ mfe eduanan anan no mu; eso wentwiwentwi biara ennsi wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan enum no mu.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan esia no mu no, nyew, wentwiwentwi na etuatsew pii sii; na iyi maa hɔn mu dodowara fii Zarahemla asaase do, na wɔkɔr asaase a ɔwɔ etsifi afamu no do kɛtsenaa hɔ.

4 Na wotuu kwan kɔr ekyir kodur dɛ wɔkɔtoo esu taaye akɛse nye esutsen pii.

5 Nyew, na wɔpetsee asaase no nyinara do, kɔr beebiara a hɔn a wodzii kan kɛtsenaa asaase no do no nnyɛɛ no amamfo na ndupɔn nnyi hɔ.

6 Na afei asaase ne beebiara nnyɛ amamfo, gyedɛ ndupɔn nko; na osian dɔm a wodzii kan kɛtsenaa hɔ no mbrɛ wosii sɛɛ hɔn no ntsi na wɔfrɛɛ asaase no amamfõ.

7 Na ndupɔn a ɔwɔ asaase n’enyi do no suar dze, naaso dɔm a wɔkɔr hɔ no nyaa nyimdzee mbordo wɔ adanpa ne si, dɛm ntsi wosisii adan pa na wɔtsenaa mu.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔdɔree na wɔtserɛwee, dze fii asaase no po mu afamu dze kɔr n’etsifi afamu, na wɔdɔree araa ma wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrekata asaase no nyina enyi, fitsi po no n’anaafo dze kɛpem po no n’etsifi, fitsi po n’anee afamu dze kɛpem po no boka.

9 Na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asaase no n’etsifi afamu no tsenaa ntamadan na adan pa mu, na wogyaa dua biara a ofiir asaase n’enyi do ma onyinii bɛyɛɛ odupɔn ama mber bi a ɔbɛba no woeenya ndupɔn dze esisi hɔn adan, nyew, hɔn nkurow akɛse, na hɔn temple, hɔn nhyiamudan nye hɔn krɔnkrɔnbea, na hɔn adan ahorow nyina.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ osiandɛ nna ndupɔn ho yɛ na dodow wɔ etsifi mantam no mu ntsi, wɔdze pii guu wusihɛn mu kɔr hɔ.

11 Na dɛm maa nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asaase n’etsifi afamu hɔ no tumii dze ndua sisii adan pa na wɔ kyekyeer nkurow akɛse.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ammon no dɔm pii a wɔyɛ Lamanfo no so kɔr dɛm asaase yi do.

13 Na afei dza dɛm nkorɔfo yi yɛe no, hɔn mu pii kyerɛɛw ho nsɛm dze siei a ɔyɛ tsitsir na ɔdɔɔsõ na ɔfa hɔn ho.

14 Mbom hwɛ, dza dɔm yi yɛe no, nyew, dza ɔfa Lamanfo nye Nephifo ho, nye hɔn akõkoekõ, na wentwiwentwi, na etuatsew, nye hɔn nsɛmpa nkae, na hɔn nkɔnhyɛ, nye hɔn wusihɛn mu akwantu na hɔn wusihɛn mpamee, nye hɔn temple ne nsisii, na hɔn nhyiamudan, nye hɔn krɔnkrɔnbea ne nsisii na hɔn ndzeyɛtsenenee nye hɔn emumuyɛdze, nye hɔn ewudzi nye hɔn edwotwa nye hɔn epoobɔ nye ekyiwadze, nye ndwamambɔ ahorow nyina, sɛ wɔkyɛ mu ɔha a worunntum nnkyerɛw ne nyinara wɔ nwoma yi mu.

15 Mbom hwɛ, nwoma pii na kyerɛwsɛm horow pii wɔ hɔ, na Nephifo tsitsir na wɔdze siei.

16 Na Nephifo no dze maa fi ebusuasantsen kor kɔ kor so do kɛpeem dɛ wɔhwee ase wɔ mbrato mu ma wokum hɔn, wɔbɔɔ hɔn epoo, wɔbɔɔ hɔn atwee, wɔbɔɔ hɔn petsee asaase enyi, ma wɔkɔforaforaa Lamanfo no mu kesii dɛ woyii dzin a ɔda hɔn do dɛ wɔyɛ Nephifo no fii hɔ, na wɔbɛyɛɛ emumuyɛdze, yerɛyerɛw, na ndam, nyew, wɔdanee bɛyɛɛ dɛ Lamanfo mpo.

17 Na afei masan aba me nsɛm do bio; dɛm ntsi, dza mekãe a ɔfa hɔn wentwiwentwi nye basabasayɛ pii ho na akõkoekõ nye etuatsew a ɔbaa Nephi no dɔm mu no ebotwa mu kɔ.

18 Atsɛmbuafo no hɔn mfe eduanan esia no baa ewiei.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ nna wentwiwentwi pii da ho wɔ asaase no do, nyew, wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan esuon, na eduanan awɔtwe no so mpo mu.

20 Naaso iyi nyinara mu no nna Helaman tse atsɛmbu egua no do wɔ pɛrpɛrdzi na pɛrpɛryɛ mu; nyew, ɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen dzii Nyame n’ahyɛdze, n’atsɛmbu na ne mbrasɛm do dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ, na ɔyɛɛ dza oye wɔ Nyame enyim aber nyina; na ɔnantseew n’egya n’anamɔn mu ma dɛm ntsi ɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase no do.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ onyaa mbabanyin beenu. Ɔdze Nephi ne dzin too panyin no, na kakraba no so, ɔdze Lehi ne dzin too no. Na wɔhyɛɛ ase nyinii wɔ Ewuradze mu.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi no hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrobɔ adze kakra, wɔ Nephifo no mu, dze kɛpeem ber a afe eduanan awɔtwe rokɔ ewiei no, wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan akron wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn aber do no, nna asomdwee da ho wɔ asaase no nyinara do gyedɛ nsumaamu fɛkuw a Gadianton edwotwafo no atsetsew wɔ asaase ne mbea a nyimpa pii tsetsee nyinara a dɛm aber no nna hɔn a wɔyɛ ɔman no ne banodzifo no nnyim hɔn; dɛm ntsi wɔannsɛɛ hɔn wɔ asaase no do.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe yi ara mu no prɔmprɔmyɛ kɛse baa asɔr no mu ma dɔm mpempem kɔdɔɔm asɔr no, ma wonumaa hɔn kɔr nnuho mu.

25 Na asɔr no no prɔmprɔm a ɔyɛe, na nhyira a wohuee guu dɔm no do no yɛɛ kɛse araa ma asɔfo mpanyimfo nye akyerɛkyerɛfo no mpo hɔn ho boow hɔn kɛse.

26 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze n’edwuma yɛɛ prɔmprɔm ma akra pii nyaa enuma na wɔbɛkãa Nyankopɔn n’asɔr ho, nyew mpempem na wɔkɛkãa hɔnho.

27 Dɛm ma yehu dɛ Ewuradze yɛ mbɔbɔrhufo ma hɔn a wɔdze akoma a no mu tsew bɔ ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no.

28 Nyew, dɛm ma yehu dɛ wobue sor abobow ma obiara, nkanka hɔn a wɔbɛgye Jesus Christ a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba no ne dzin edzi.

29 Nyew, yehu dɛ obiara a ɔpɛ, na obosuo Nyankopɔn n’asɛm a ɔyɛ ndam na tum wɔ mu, dza obotum etwitwa abɔnsam ne ndabraba nye ne mfir a oesua na ne ndaadaa nyina mu, na ɔafa nyimpa a ɔwɔ Christ no edua kwan heaheaba na nkekãnkekã no mu etwa awerɛhow no bun no a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem a woesiesie ato hɔ ama emumuyɛfo no—

30 Na ɔagye hɔn akra, nyew hɔn akra a onnwu da no esi Nyankopɔn n’abanyimfa wɔ sor ahenman no mu, ma wɔnye Abraham, na Isaac, nye Jacob, nye hɛn egyanom ahotseweefo no nyina atsena ase, na worimmfi hɔ nnkɔ beebiara bio.

31 Na dɛm afe yi mu enyigye hyɛɛ Zarahemla asaase do mã nye mbea nyina a etwa ho ehyia, wɔ asaase nyina a ɔyɛ Nephifo dze mpo no do.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ nda a aka ma mfe eduanan akron aba ewiei no, wonyaa asomdwee nye enyigye mbordo; nyew, wonyaa asomdwee na enyigye kɛse wɔ afe a ɔbɔ do eduonum no so mu wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn aber do.

33 Na atsɛmbuafo hɔn afe a otsĩa eduonum-biako mu no nna asomdwee so wɔ hɔ, na mbom ahantanyɛ na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehɛn asɔr no mu—ɔannhɛn Nyankopɔn n’asɔr no mu, mbom ɔhɛɛn hɔn a wɔagye ato mu dɛ wɔdɔm Nyankopɔn n’asɔr no mu.

34 Na ahantanyɛ dodow ntsi wɔtseetsee hɔn enuanom no mu pii. Afei dɛm adze yi yɛ ebusudze kɛse, na iyi maa hɔn mu ahobrɛadzefo no tseetsee kɛsenara, na woduaa amandzehu pii mu.

35 Naaso iyi nyina mu no wɔfaa akɔnkye na wɔbɔɔ mpaa mpɛn pii, na wonyaa ahoɔdzen mu ahoɔdzen wɔ hɔn ahobrɛadze mu, na wonyaa gyedzi a otsim wɔ Christ mu, iyi maa dɛw na awerɛkyekyer hyɛɛ hɔn akra mã, nyew, ɔtseew hɔn akoma mu na ɔmaa hɔn ahosan so mpo, dɛm ahosan yi bae osiandɛ wogyaa hɔn akoma mu maa Nyankopɔn.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe eduonum ebien so baa ewiei asomdwee mu, mbom nna ahantanyɛ kɛse kɛse ahyɛ dɔm no mu binom akoma mu mã; osian hɔn ahonya dodow nye hɔn prɔmprɔm a wɔayɛ wɔ asaase no do ntsi; na onyinii wɔ hɔn mu fi ber to ber.

37 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduonum ebiasa mu wɔ atsɛmbuafo aber do no, Helaman wui, na ne babanyin panyin Nephi bɛhyɛɛ n’ananmu dzii adze. Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔdze pɛrpɛrdzi nye pɛrpɛryɛ tsenaa atsɛmbu egua no do; nyew, odzii Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do, na ɔnantseew n’egya n’akwan mu.
hel 4:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephifo etuatsewfo na Lamanfo kã nsordaafo bɔmu na wɔgye Zarahemla asaase—Ɔnam Nephifo hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi wodzi ɔkogu—Asɔr no wodow na no mu nyimpa bɛyɛ mberɛw tse dɛ Lamanfo. Bɛyɛ mfe 38–30 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduonum anan mu no etuatsew pii baa asɔr no mu, na wentwiwentwi so sii dɔm no mu araa ma wɔkãa bɔgya pii gui.

2 Na wokum etuatsewfo no na wɔpaam hɔn fii asaase no do, na wɔkɔr Lamanfo hɔn hen nkyɛn.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen nunuu Lamanfo no dɛ wɔnye Nephifo no nkɔkõ; mbom hwɛ, hu kɛsenara kãa Lamanfo no, dɛm ntsi woenntsie dza etuatsewfo no kekãa no.

4 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo hɔn afe a otsĩa eduonum esia no, etuatsewfo bi fii Nephifo mu kɔr Lamanfo nkyɛn; na wɔkɛkãa nkaa no ho ma wonunuu Lamanfo no ma hɔn bo fuuw Nephifo no; ntsi afe no nyina mu no nna wɔroboaboa hɔnho akɔkõ.

5 Na afe a ɔtɔ do eduonum esuon mu no, wɔbaa Nephifo do nye hɔn bɔkõe, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dzii ewu; nyew, wodzii ewu ara yie ma atsɛmbuafo hɔn afe a ɔtɔ do eduonum awɔtwe mu no hɔn nsa kãa Zarahemla asaase no; nyew, nye asaase nyina so a ɔbɛn Dzifuu asaase no.

6 Na wɔpaam Nephifo nye Moronihah nsordaafo no araa ma wokoguu Dzifuu asaase do.

7 Na Nephifo no bɔɔ hɔnho ban ara yie tsiaa Lamanfo no fitsi anee po afamu mpo dze kodur boka afamu; Nephinyi tum dze da kor twa dɛm kwan no, bea a wɔabɔ ho ban no, na wɔdze hɔn nsordaafo no guu hɔ ama wɔaabɔ hɔn nkurow a ɔwɔ etsifi afamu hɔ no ho ban.

8 Na dɛm na Nephifo etuatsewfo no yɛe nyaa Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo no hɔ mboa dze gyee Nephifo hɔn ndzɛmba nyina a wɔwɔ no wɔ anaafo afamu no. Na iyi nyina sii wɔ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn afe a ɔtɔ do eduonum awɔtwe nye akron no mu.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo no afe a otsĩa eduosia mu no, Moronihah nye no nsordaafo no tumii gyee asaase no mu pii; nyew, hɔn nsa kãa hɔn nkurow akɛse a Lamanfo fae no mu pii bio.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo no hɔn afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia biako mu no hɔn nsa kãa hɔn ahodze no mu bɛyɛ fã bio.

11 Afei Nephifo no hɔn ahodze pii a wɔyeew no, nye oku pii a osii hɔn mu no, sɛ nnyɛ hɔn emumuyɛdze nye ekyiwadze a wɔyɛe wɔ hɔn mu a nkyɛ ammba no dɛm; nyew, na iyi sii wɔ hɔn a wɔpaa mu kãa dɛ wɔdɔm Nyankopɔn n’asɔr no mu.

12 Na iyi sii osian ahantanyɛ a nna ahyɛ hɔn akoma mu mã ntsi, osian hɔn ahonya dodow, nyew, osian atseetsee a wɔdze tseetsee ehiafo, na wɔdze hɔn edziban kaam hɔn a ɔkɔm dze hɔn, na wɔdze hɔn atam kaam hɔn a wɔda adagyaw, na wɔbobɔɔ hɔn enuanom abɔbɔfo hɔn asomu, na wodzii dza no ho tsew ho fɛw, na wɔanngye nkɔnhyɛ sunsum nye nyikyerɛ enndzi, wodzii ewu, wɔbɔɔ epoo, wɔannka nokwar, wowiaa adze, wɔtõo awar, wɔdze wentwiwentwi pii bae, na wofii Nephi asaase do kɔr Lamanfo mu—

13 Na osian hɔn emumuyɛdze kɛse yi, na ahohyehyɛ kɛse ntsi, wogyaa hɔn maa hɔnankasa hɔn ahoɔdzen; dɛm ntsi wɔannyɛ prɔmprɔm, mbom wohun amandze na wɔhwee hɔn, na wɔpaam hɔn fii Lamanfo enyim kesii dɛ hɔn nsaase a wɔwɔ nyina fii hɔn nsa.

14 Mbom hwɛ, Moronihah kãa ndzɛmba pii ho asɛm kyerɛɛ dɔm no osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi, na Nephi nye Lehi a wɔyɛ Helaman ne mbabanyin no so kãa nsɛm pii kyerɛɛ dɔm no, nyew, na wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ ndzɛmba pii a ɔfa hɔn emumuyɛ ho, nye dza ɔbɛba hɔn do sɛ woennu hɔnho emmfi hɔn bɔn ho a.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ wonuu hɔnho, na susuampaaradɛ wonuu hɔnho no wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ prɔmprɔm.

16 Na ber a Moronihah hun dɛ woenu hɔnho no, ɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen dzii hɔn enyim kɔkõe fi bea kor do kɔr kor do, fi kurow kor kesii kor mu, kodur dɛ hɔn nsa kãa hɔn ahodze mu fã nye hɔn nsaase so mu fã.

17 Na dɛm na atsɛmbuafo hɔn afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia biako no baa ewiei.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo hɔn afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia ebien mu no, Moronihah enntum anngye ahodze biara bio emmfi Lamanfo no nkyɛn.

19 Dɛm ntsi wogyaa dɛ wɔbɛper agye hɔn nsaase a aka no, osiandɛ Lamanfo no dɔɔ sõ dodow ntsi nna ɔyɛ dzen ma Nephifo no dɛ wobenya tum wɔ hɔn do; dɛm ntsi Moronihah hyɛɛ no nsordaafo no dɛ wɔnhwɛ mbea a wɔagye no do yie.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ osian Lamanfo hɔn dodow ntsi Nephifo no suroo kɛse dɛ annhwɛ a wobotu abɛhyɛ hɔn do, na woetsiatsia hɔn do na woekuku hɔn, na wɔasɛɛ hɔn.

21 Nyew, wɔhyɛɛ ase kaakaa Alma no nkɔnhyɛ, nye Mosiah ne nsɛm so; na wohun dɛ wɔayɛ akɔnkyefo, na woebu Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm egyangyandze.

22 Na wɔadandan Mosiah mbra no na wɔdze hɔn anan etsiatsia do, anaadɛ dza Ewuradze hyɛɛ no ma ɔdze maa dɔm no; na wohun dɛ wɔasɛɛ hɔn mbra no wɔabɛyɛ emumuyɛfo kɛse dɛ mbrɛ Lamanfo no tse pɛpɛɛpɛr.

23 Na osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi asɔr no no mpontu hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrowodow; na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔregye kyim wɔ nkɔnhyɛ sunsum nye nyikyerɛ sunsum ho; na Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu no bɛba hɔn do.

24 Na wohun dɛ wɔabɛyɛ mberɛw, dɛ hɔn enuanom Lamanfo no, na dɛ Ewuradze no Sunsum nnkora hɔn do bio; nyew, ɔatwe no ho efi hɔnho osiandɛ Ewuradze no Sunsum nntsena temple a no mu nntsew mu.

25 Dɛm ntsi Ewuradze gyaa dɛ ɔdze no tum nwanwa a no bɔkora hɔn do, osiandɛ wɔayɛ ekyingyefo nye emumuyɛfo; na wohun dɛ Lamanfo no dɔɔ sõ koraa kyɛn hɔn, na gyedɛ wɔtakyer Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, annyɛ dɛm a ɔno wɔbɛhera koraa.

26 Na hwɛ, wohun dɛ Lamanfo no hɔn ahoɔdzen tse dɛ hɔn ankasa hɔndze, sɛ yɛdze banyin kor susu banyin kor so a. Na dɛm ntsi na ɔmaa wɔhwee mbrato mu; nyew, iyi ntsi na ɔama wɔayɛ mberɛw, osian hɔn mbrato a osii mfe kakraabi ntamu ntsi.
hel 5:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi na Lehi tu hɔnho si hɔ kã asɛmpa—Hɔn edzin kaa hɔn dɛ wɔnhwɛ hɔn edzikamfo ho mbɔ bra—Christ pon hɔn a wonu hɔnho—Nephi na Lehi sakyer nkorɔfo pii a wɔdze hɔn gu efiadze, na ogya twa hɔnho hyia—Fua kebii hyɛ nyimpa ahaebiasa do—Asaase wosow na ndze bi hyɛ hɔn dɛ wonnu hɔnho—Nephi na Lehi nye abɔfo twetwe nkɔmbɔ na ogya twa dɔmtutuw no ho hyia. Bɛyɛ mfe 30 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe yi ara mu, hwɛ, Nephi dze atsɛmbu egua no maa banyin bi a ne dzin dze Cezoram.

2 Na dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mbra nye hɔn ahendzi ne nhyehyɛɛ gyina dɔm no hɔn ndze do na hɔn a wɔpɛ bɔn no dɔɔ sõ koraa sen hɔn a wɔpɛ papa no, dɛm ntsi wonyinii maa ɔsɛɛ, osiandɛ mbra no asɛɛ.

3 Nyew, na nnyɛ iyi nye ne nyinara; wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔyɛɛ akɔnkye ara ma dɛ wonntum mmfa mbra anaadɛ pɛrpɛrdzi nnhwɛ hɔn do, gyedɛ wogyaa hɔn ma ɔsɛɛ.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi Nephi berɛe; na ogyaa atsɛmbu egua no mu mae, na ɔgyee too no do dɛ ɔbɛkã Nyame n’asɛm no nkwa nda a aka nyina, na no nua Lehi so no nkwa nda a aka nyina.

5 Na wɔkaa nsɛm a hɔn egya Helaman kãa kyerɛɛ hɔn no. Na nsɛm a ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn no nye iyi:

6 Hwɛ, me mbabanyin, mepɛ dɛ hom kaa dɛ hom bedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do; na mebɛpɛ dɛ hom bɛkã dɛm nsɛm yi akyerɛ dɔm no. Hwɛ medze hɛn awofo a wodzi kan no a wofi Jerusalem baa no edzin ama hom; na meyɛɛ iyi ama sɛ hom kaa hom edzin a hom aakaa hɔn; na sɛ hom kaa hɔn a hom akaa hɔn ndwuma; na sɛ hom kaa hɔn ndwuma a hom ehu dza wɔkãe, na wɔkyerɛwee so too hɔ dɛ woye.

7 Dɛm ntsi, me mbabanyin, mebɛpɛ dɛ hom bɛyɛ dza oye, ama wɔaakã wɔ hom ho na wɔakyerɛw so ato hɔ, dɛ mbrɛ wɔkãe na wɔkyerɛwee wɔ hɔn ho so mpo.

8 Na afei me mbabanyin, hwɛ mowɔ biribi so bio a mebɛpɛ dɛ hom yɛ, dza mepɛ nye dɛ, mma hom nnyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi, mma hom nhyehyɛ hom ho, mbom dɛ hom bɛyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi dze apɛ akoradze egu sor, nyew, dza ɔyɛ onnyiewiei, na ɔmmpa; nyew, ama hom eenya dɛm akyɛdze mapã no a ɔyɛ onnyiewiei nkwa no, dza yesusu na yɛgye to mu dɛ wɔdze ama hɛn egyanom no.

9 O hom nkaa, hom nkaa, me mbabanyin, nsɛm a ɔhen Benjamin kãa kyerɛɛ no nkorɔfo no; nyew, hom nkaa dɛ kwan fofor bi anaadɛ ndzeyɛɛ biara nnyi hɔ a wɔnam do bɛgye ɔdasanyi nkwã, gyedɛ wɔnam Jesus Christ a ɔbɛba no, no bɔgyaa a ɔbɔ werdam no do, nyew, hom nkaa dɛ ɔbɛba abɔpon wiadze mba.

10 Na hom nkaa nsɛm so a Amulek kaa kyerɛɛ Zeezrom wɔ Ammonihah kuropɔn mu no; na ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ Ewuradze bɛba nokwar mu abɔpon no nkorɔfo, na ɔremmba mmbɔpon hɔn wɔ hɔn bɔn mu, na mbom ɔbɔpon hɔn efi hɔn bɔn mu.

11 Na Egya no ama no tum, ɔmpon hɔn mfi hɔn bɔn ho osian nnuho ntsi; dɛm ntsi ɔasoma n’abɔfoe dɛ wɔmbɛkã nnuho ho nsɛm, dza ɔma Pomfo no tum dze nkwagye ma hɔn akra.

12 Na afei me mbabanyin, hom nkaa, hom nkaa dɛ hɛn Pomfo a ɔyɛ Christ, Nyame ne Ba no, no botan no do na ɔwɔ dɛ hom tow hom fapem; ama sɛ abɔnsam bɔ n’ehum dzendzen no a, nyew, n’egyen—menaba a ɔwɔ ekyinehyia ehum no mu no a, nyew, sɛ n’ɔsor-bo nyinara tɔ na n’ehum kɛse bɔ dzendzenndzen hwe hom a, orinnya tum wɔ hom do nntwe hom nnkɛhyɛ awerɛhow nye mbusu a onnyi ewiei no bun ase, osian ɔbotan a hom atow hom adan wɔ do ntsi, dza ɔyɛ fapem tsim, fapem a sɛ adasamba si hɔn adan wɔ do a wɔnkɔhwe ase.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm nsɛm yi na Helaman dze kyerɛkyerɛɛ ne mbabanyin; nyew, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn ndzɛmba pii a wɔannkyerɛw, nye ndzɛmba pii so a wɔakyerɛw.

14 Na wɔkaa ne nsɛm; na dɛm ntsi wɔkɔr do dzii Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do, dɛ wɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ Nephi dɔm no nyina Nyankopɔn n’asɛm, wɔhyɛɛ ase fi Dzifuu kurow kɛse no mu;

15 Na wofii hɔ no wɔkɔr Gid kurow kɛse no mu, na wofii Gid kurow kɛse no mu kɔr Mulek kurow kɛse no mu;

16 Na wofii kurow kor mu kɔr kor so mu araa kesii dɛ wɔkɔr Nephi dɔm nyina a wɔwɔ anaafo asaase afamu no do; na wofii hɔ no wɔkɔr Lamanfo a wɔwɔ Zarahemla asaase do no mu.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔdze tum kɛse kãa asɛmpa no araa ma wɔhyɛɛ hɔn a wɔtseew etua fii Nephifo mu kɔree no mu pii fɛr, ma wɔbaa bɛkãa hɔn bɔn na wonumaa hɔn kɔr nnuho mu, na wɔsaan hɔn ekyir ntsɛmara kɔr Nephifo nkyɛn na wɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen siesiee bɔn a wɔdze yɛɛ hɔn nyina yie.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi nye Lehi duaa tum a woenya no do dze tum kɛse kãa nsɛmpa kyerɛɛ Lamanfo no, osiandɛ nna wɔdze tum nye tumdzi no ama hɔn ama woeetum akasa, na dza ɔwɔ dɛ wɔkã no so wɔdze maa hɔn—

19 Dɛm ntsi wɔkasaa ma ahobow kɛse kãa Lamanfo no, na wɔgyee dzii ara yie ma Lamanfo mpemawɔtwe a wɔwɔ Zarahemla asaase nye ne nkyɛn nyina do na wonumaa hɔn kɔr nnuho mu, na wɔgyee too mu dɛ hɔn egyanom amambra no yɛ emumuyɛdze.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi nye Lehi fii hɔ toaa do kɔr Nephi asaase do.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no mu nsordaafo bi kyeer hɔn dze hɔn koguu efiadze; nyew, dɛm efiadze kor noara a Limhi no nkowaa dze Ammon nye no nuanom kogui no.

22 Na wɔnye hɔn guu efiadze nda pii a wɔamma hɔn edziban, na hwɛ ekyir no wɔkɔr efiadze hɔ dɛ wɔrekɛfa hɔn na woeku hɔn.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ wohun dɛ gya etwa Nephi nye Lehi ho ehyia ma dɛm ntsi woenntum ammfa hɔn nsa annka hɔn, nna wosuroo dɛ bɛyɛ na wɔahyew. Naaso Nephi nye Lehi annhyew; na ɔyɛ dɛ wogyina gya finimfin naaso wɔnnhyew.

24 Na ber a wohun dɛ ogya fadum etwa hɔnho ehyia na ɔnnhyew hɔn no, wonyaa akokodur.

25 Na wohun dɛ Lamanfo no nntum mmfa hɔn nsa nnkã hɔn; nna wonntum mmbɛn hɔn so, mbom wogyinaa hɔ dɛ ma ahobow ama wɔatɔ mmum.

26 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi nye Lehi gyinaa hɔ na wɔhyɛɛ ase kasaa kyerɛ hɔn dɛ: Mma hom nnsuro, na hwɛ, Nyankopɔn na ɔayɛ dɛm anwanwadze yi dze akyerɛ hom, na iyi mu na oeyi akyerɛ hom dɛ hom runntum mmfa hom nsa nnkã hɛn na hom nnku hɛn.

27 Na hwɛ, ber a wɔkãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, asaase wosoow kɛsenara, na efiadze dan n’afasu no wosoow dɛ mbrɛ worubu egu famu; mbom hwɛ, emmbu enngu famu. Na hwɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ efiadze hɔ no yɛ Lamanfo nye Nephifo etuatsewfo no.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ fua kebii hyɛɛ hɔn do, na suro kɛse baa hɔn do.

29 Na ɔbaa dɛ ndze bi bae a ɔyɛ dɛ ofi fua kebii no sor rekã dɛ: Hom nnu homho, hom nnu homho, na mma hom mmper bio dɛ hom bɛsɛɛ mo nkowaa a masoma hɔn wɔ hom nkyɛn dɛ wɔmbɛkã nsɛmpa no.

30 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔtsee ndze yi no, wohun dɛ ɔnnyɛ wimu mpaapaamu anaadɛ dede kɛse dzendzen bi na mbom hwɛ, ɔyɛ ndze tseabaa bɔkɔɔ a ɔtse dɛ ma ɔrowasa gu asowa mu a ohwira kɔ ɔkra mu.

31 Na ndze no yɛ bɔkɔɔ dze, naaso hwɛ, asaase wosoow kɛsenara, na efiadze adan n’afasu no wosoow bio, dɛ mbrɛ worubu egu famu; na hwɛ fua kebii a ɔahyɛ hɔn do no annhwetse—

32 Na hwɛ ndze no baa bio, dɛ: Hom nnu homho, hom nnu homho, na sor ahenman no abɛn; na mma hom mmper bio dɛ hom bɛsɛɛ mo nkowaa. Na ɔbaa dɛ asaase wosoow bio, na afasu no wosowee.

33 Na ndze no baa bio ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebiasa so, na ɔkãa anwanwasɛm a ɔdasanyi runntum nnkã kyerɛɛ hɔn; na afasu no wosoow bio, na asaase wosoow dɛ mbrɛ no mu repaapaa.

34 Na ɔbaa dɛ nna Lamanfo no nntum nnguan osian fua kebii a ɔakata hɔn do no ntsi; nyew, nna wonntum so nnkekã hɔnho osian suro a ahyɛ hɔn do no ntsi.

35 Afei nna hɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ no mu kor yɛ Nephinyi wɔ awoo mu, nna nkyɛ ɔdɔm Nyame n’asɔr no na mbom ɔatsew etua noho efi hɔn mu.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔdaan no ho, na hwɛ, ohun Nephi na Lehi hɔn enyim wɔ fua kebii no mu; na hwɛ wɔahyerɛn mbordo, dɛ mbrɛ abɔfo enyim tse ara pɛr. Na ohun dɛ wɔama hɔn enyiwa do wɔ sor; na ɔyɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔrekasa anaadɛ wɔrema hɔn ndze do dze kyerɛ nyimpa bi a woehu no.

37 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm banyin yi tseaa mu see dɔmtutuw no dɛ hom ndan homho nhwɛ. Na hwɛ, wonyaa tum ma wɔdaan hɔnho na wɔhwɛe; na wohun Nephi na Lehi hɔn enyim.

38 Na wobisaa dɛm banyin no dɛ: Hwɛ, iyinom nyina ase nye dɛn, na woana na dɛm mbanyin yi nye no rekasa yi?

39 Afei dɛm banyin no ne dzin dze Aminadab. Na Aminadab see hɔn dɛ: Wɔnye Nyankopɔn n’abɔfoe na wɔnye hɔn rekasa no.

40 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no see no dɛ: Ebɛnadze na yɛnyɛ, ama dɛm fua kebii yi eefi hɛn do?

41 Nna Aminadab see hɔn dɛ: Ɔsɛ dɛ hom nu homho, na hom sũ mfrɛ ndze no, kesi dɛ hom benya gyedzi wɔ Christ mu, nyia Alma na Amulek, nye Zeezrom kãa no ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ hom no; na sɛ hom yɛ iyi a, wobeyi fua kebii no efi hom do.

42 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn nyinara hyɛɛ ase sũi frɛɛ nyia ne ndze awosow asaase no; nyew wosũi frɛɛ araa kesii dɛ fua kebii no hwetsee.

43 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a wɔdze hɔn enyi kɔr aprɔw na wohun dɛ fua kebii no ahwetse efi hɔn do no, hwɛ, wohun dɛ ogya fadum etwa ɔkra biara ho ehyia.

44 Na Nephi na Lehi gyina hɔn finimfin; nyew, woetwa hɔnho ehyia; nyew ɔyɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔwɔ gyatanaa a ɔredzɛw ne finimfin, naaso ɔnnhyew hɔn, nna onnsuo efiadze dan no mu; na dɛw na enyimnyam kɛse a onnyi kabea hyɛɛ hɔn mã.

45 Na hwɛ, Nyankopɔn no Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn fi sor bae, na ɔbɛhyɛɛ hɔn akoma mã, na ɔyɛɛ dɛ ogya ahyɛ hɔn mã, na wotumii kasaa kasa nwanwa bi.

46 Na ɔbaa dɛ ndze bi baa hɔn hɔ, nyew, ndze nwanwa bi tse dɛ dza ɔrowasa, se dɛ:

47 Asomdwee, asomdwee nkã hom, osian hom gyedzi a hom wɔ no wɔ mo Dɔba a Modɔ no yie no mu, nyia ɔwɔ hɔ fitsi wiadze ne fapem no ntsi.

48 Na afei, ber a wɔtsee iyi no wɔmaa hɔn enyiwa do wɔ sor dɛ mbrɛ wɔpɛ dɛ wohu bea a ndze no fi reba; na hwɛ, wohun dɛ sorsor ebue, na abɔfo fi sor sianee bɔsoom hɔn.

49 Na akra bɛyɛ ahaebiasa na wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔtsee na wohun dɛm ndzɛmba yi; na wɔsee hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ na mma ɔnnyɛ hɔn nwanwa na mma wɔnngye kyim so.

50 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔkɔree, na wɔkɔsoom dɔm no, na wokyiin nkurow a ɔwɔ hɔ nyina do paa mu kãa ndzɛmba nyina a wɔtsee na wohunii, wɔkãe araa ma Lamanfo hɔn mu dodowara gyee hɔn dzii osiandɛ dza wohunii no sõ.

51 Na dodowara a wɔgyee dzii no gyaa hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze mu guu hɔ, nye tan a wɔdze tan hɔn egyanom na hɔn amambra so.

52 Na ɔbaa dɛ wogyaa Nephifo no hɔn nsaase no mu maa hɔn.
hel 6:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfo atseneneefo no kã asɛmpa no kyerɛ Nephifo emumuyɛfo no—Hɔn beenu nyina yɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ ber a nna wɔtse asomdwee na ndɔbaa pii mu—Lucifer, bɔn ne farbaa no, nunu emumuyɛfo no na Gadianton edwotwafo no akoma ma wodzi ewu na wɔyɛ emumuyɛdze pii—Edwotwafo no tu Nephi aban no gu. Bɛyɛ mfe 29–23 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo hɔn afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia ebien no baa ewiei no nna dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina esisi, na Lamanfo no mu kɛsenara bɛyɛɛ atseneneefo araa ma hɔn tseneneeyɛ bɛkyɛɛn Nephifo no mpo osiandɛ nna hɔn gyedzi yɛ dzen.

2 Na hwɛ, Nephifo no mu pii bɛyɛɛ asoɔdzenfo, a wonnyi nnuho biara na emumuyɛfo ara yie, dɛm ntsi wɔpoow Nyame n’asɛm nye nkyerɛkyerɛ na nkɔnhyɛ a ɔbaa hɔn mu no.

3 Naaso iyi ekyir nyina, dɔm a wɔwɔ asɔr mu no nyaa enyigye kɛse osian Lamanfo a woenya nsakyer no ntsi, nyew, osian Nyame n’asɔr a wɔakyekyer wɔ hɔn mu no ntsi. Na wɔnye hɔnho dzii nkitaho nkorkor na wonyaa enyigye wɔ hɔn mu nkorkor na wonyaa enyigye mbordo.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no hɔn mu pii baa Zarahemla asaase do bɛkãa mbrɛ wɔyɛɛ nyaa nsakyer dze kyerɛɛ Nephifo no, na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn nkuran ama woeenya gyedzi nye nnuho.

5 Nyew, na dodowara dze tum nye tumdzi kɛse kãa nsɛmpa no ma dodowara ara baa ahobrɛadze no bun mu; maa wɔbɛyɛɛ Nyankopɔn nye Eguambaa no hɔn akãdofo ahobrɛadzefo.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no mu dodowara kɔr etsifi mantam asaase afamu; na Nephi na Lehi so kɔr etsifi asaase afamu kɛkãa nsɛmpa no kyerɛɛ dɔm no. Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia ebiasa no dze baa ewiei.

7 Na hwɛ, asomdwee baa asaase nyina do ara yie ma Nephifo kɔr asaase n’afã beebiara a wɔpɛ, wɔ Nephifo anaa Lamanfo hɔn mu.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no so kɔr beebiara a wɔpɛ, dɛ wɔ yɛ Lamanfo o anaa Nephifo mu o; na dɛm na ɔmaa wɔnye hɔnho dzii afora dzii gua; wɔtɔ na wɔtɔn, ama woeenya mfaso dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔbɛyɛɛ esikafo mbordo, Lamanfo nye Nephifo nyina; na wonyaa sika pii, nye dwetɛ, na boran a ɔsom bo horow nyina, wɔ anaafo asaase nye etsifi asaase afamu.

10 Afei asaase a ɔwɔ anaafo afamu hɔ no wɔfrɛɛ no Lehi, na asaase a ɔwɔ etsifi afamu no so wɔfrɛɛ no Mulek, wɔdze too Zedekiah ne babanyin; osiandɛ Ewuradze dze Mulek baa asaase a ɔwɔ etsifi no do na ɔdze Lehi so baa asaase a ɔwɔ anaafo no do.

11 Na hwɛ, sika a ogu ahorow pii wɔ dɛm nsaase ebien yi do, nye dwetɛ na abo ahorow pii a ɔsom bo; na mbanyin so a wodzi edwin soronko wɔ hɔ a wɔdze abo dzii edwin ahorow pii na wɔbeer ho fɛɛfɛw; na dɛm na ɔmaa wɔbɛyɛɛ esikafo.

12 Woduaa eburow pii, wɔ etsifi nye anaafo nyina; na wɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm mbordo, wɔ etsifi nye anaafo asaase nyina do. Na wɔdɔree na hɔn ho yɛɛ dzen wɔ asaase no do. Na wɔnyɛɛn nguankuw, na anantwikuw, nyew, wɔnyɛɛn mbowa pii.

13 Hwɛ hɔn mbaa yɛɛ edwumadzen na wɔtoow yɛɛ atam asorɔtow pii, wɔwen atam a ɔyɛ fɛw ahorow pii, dze kataa hɔn adagyaw do. Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia anan dze baa ewiei wɔ asomdwee mu.

14 Na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia enum mu no, wonyaa enyigye na asomdwee, nyew, nsɛmpa ne kã nye nkɔnhyɛ pii a ɔfa dza ɔbɛba nyina ho no kɔr do ara yie. Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia enum twaa mu kɔree.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo hɔn afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia esia mu no, hwɛ obi kum Cezoram wɔ atsɛmbu egua no do a woennhu onyia kor no. Na ɔbaa dɛ afe kor noara mu so ne babanyin a dɔm no dze no sii n’ananmu no so wokum no. Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia esia dze baa ewiei.

16 Na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia esuon n’ahyɛse no, dɔm no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ emumuyɛdze mbordo bio.

17 Na hwɛ, osiandɛ nna Ewuradze dze wiadze ahonya hyira hɔn mber pii ntsi ebufuw ennkenyan hɔn mma wɔannkõ, anaadɛ wɔannkã bɔgya enngu; dɛm ntsi, wɔhyɛɛ ase dze hɔn akoma dzii hɔn ahonya ekyir; nyew, wɔhyɛɛ ase peree hwehwɛɛ ahonyadze ama ankorankor eetum amema noho do wɔ binom do; dɛm ntsi wɔhyɛɛ ase dzii nsumaamu ewudzi, na wotwa edwoo na wɔbɔ epoo, ama woeenya ahonyadze.

18 Na afei hwɛ, dɛm ewudzifo nye epoobɔfo fɛkuw yi, Kishkumen nye Gadianton na wɔ tsewee. Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no hɔn mu pii kɔdɔɔm Gadianton no kuw no. Na mbom hwɛ, nna wɔdɔɔ sõ wɔ Lamanfo a nna wɔyɛ emumuyɛfo no mu. Na wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Gadianton n’edwotwafo nye n’ewudzifo.

19 Na hɔn na wokum atsɛmbuafo hɔn panyin Cezoram na ne babanyin no wɔ ber a wɔtse atsɛmbu egua no do; na hwɛ, woennhu hɔn.

20 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ aber a Lamanfo no hun dɛ edwotwafo aba hɔn mu no, hɔn werɛ hoow mbordo; na wɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen biara a wobotum dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn efi asaase n’enyi do.

21 Mbom hwɛ, Satan nunuu Nephifo dodowara akoma ma wɔdze hɔn ho kɔbɔɔ dɛm edwotwafo yi ho, na wɔnye hɔn bɔɔ mu dzii ahyɛmu na nsew, dɛ wɔbɔbɔ hɔn ho ban na woetwitwa agye ankorankor biara wɔ kwan biara wɔdze hɔn bodua mu no amma woennhu amandze wɔ hɔn ewudzi, nye epoobɔ, na adzewia ho.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ wonyaa hɔn nsɛnkyerɛdze bi, nyew, hɔn nsumaamu nsɛnkyerɛdze, nye nsumaa mu nsɛm bi; na iyi boae ama woeetum ehu onua a ɔwɔ ahyɛmudzi no mu ama emumuyɛdze biara a onua bi bɛyɛ no aannhaw no nua bi anaa enuanom no a wɔkã hɔn kuw no ho no a, wɔabɛhyɛ dɛm ahyɛmudzi yi mu.

23 Na dɛm no ɔbɛma woetum edzi ewu, na wɔabɔ epoo, na woewia adze, na wɔabɔ ndwamambra, ayɛ emumuyɛdze ahorow pii a ɔnye hɔn man ne mbra nye hɔn Nyankopɔn so ne mbra bɔ ebira.

24 Na wɔhyehyɛɛ dɛ hɔn mu biara a ɔkã hɔn kuw noho na ɔbɛda hɔn emumuyɛdze nye hɔn ebusudze edzi no, nnyɛ hɔn man ne mbra kwan do na wɔbɛfa do nye hɔn edzi, na mbom wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn emumuyɛ mbra kwan do, dɛ mbrɛ Gadianton nnye Kishkumen ahyehyɛ ato hɔ no.

25 Afei hwɛ, dɛm nsumaamu nsewdzi nye ahyɛmudzi yi nna Alma hyɛɛ ne babanyin dɛ ɔnnsɛ dɛ ɔkɔ wiadzefo mu amma wɔannyɛ biribi a ɔdze dɔm no bɛba ɔsɛɛ mu.

26 Afei hwɛ, dɛm nsumaamu nsewdzi nye ahyɛmudzi no mmfir kyerɛwsɛm a wɔdze maa Helaman no mu; mbom hwɛ, onyia noara a ɔdaadaa hɛn awofo a wodzii kan no ma wodzii eduaba a nkyɛ ɔnnsɛ dɛ wodzi no na ɔdze hyɛɛ Gadianton n’akoma mu—

27 Nyew, onyia noara so nye Cain hyehyɛɛ dɛ sɛ oku no nuabanyin Abel a wiadzefo runnhu no no. Na ɔnye Cain nye n’akãdofo hyehyɛe fitsi dɛm aber no dze ba.

28 Na onyia noara so na ɔdze hyɛɛ dɔm no akoma mu dɛ wonsi abantsentsen ma ɔnkɔ sor ara yie ama woeetum akɔ sor. Na onyia noara na odzii dɔm no ne kan dze hɔn fii abantsentsen no ho baa asaase yi do; ɔno na ɔdze sum mu ndwuma nye ebusudze kataa asaase nyina enyido kesi dɛ ɔbɔtwe nyimpa nyina akɔ ɔsɛɛ mu, na ɔnye hɔn akɔ hɛl a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no mu.

29 Nyew, onyia yi ara so na ɔdze bɔn ahyɛ Gadianton n’akoma mu ma ɔrokɔ do yɛ sum mu ndwuma, nye nsumaamu ewudzi; na ɔdaa no edzi fi ɔdasanyi n’ahyɛse dze besi dɛm aber yi mu mpo.

30 Na hwɛ, ɔno nye bɔn nyina ne farbaa. Na hwɛ, ɔno na ɔyɛ sum mu ndwuma nye nsumaamu ewudzi, na ɔdze hɔn nhyehyɛɛ, nye hɔn nsewdzi, na ahyɛmudzi na hɔn emumuyɛdze ho nsusui a ɔyɛ hu brɛ hɔn, fi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen dɛ mbrɛ obotum esuo adasamba hɔn akoma mu.

31 Na afei hwɛ, ne nsa esuo Nephifo hɔn akoma mu yie; nyew, ma wɔabɛyɛ emumuyɛfo mbordo; nyew, hɔn mu dodowara adan efi tsenenee kwan no ho, na woetsiatsia Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do, na wɔadan afa hɔnankasa hɔn akwan do, na wɔdze hɔn sika na dwetɛ ayeyɛ abosom ama hɔnho.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm emumuyɛ yi nyina baa hɔn do mfe kakraabi ntamu, na ne kɛse baa hɔn do wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia esuon no mu, wɔ aber a nna atsɛmbuafo no hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo no do no.

33 Na wonyinii wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ mu wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia awɔtwe so mu, na ɔmaa awerɛhow kɛse kãa atseneneefo no na wotwaa kwadwom.

34 Na dɛm na yehu dɛ Nephifo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrowodow wɔ gyedzi mu, na wonyinii wɔ emumuyɛdze nye ebusudze ne yɛ mu, wɔ aber a nna Lamanfo no hyɛɛ ase nyiin mbordo wɔ hɔn Nyankopɔn ho nyimdzee mu; nyew, wɔhyɛɛ ase dzii n’ahyɛdze nye ne mbrasɛm do, na wɔnantseew nokwar nye tseneneeyɛ mu wɔ n’enyim.

35 Na dɛm na yehu dɛ Ewuradze no Sunsum hyɛɛ ase twee no ho fii Nephifo nkyɛn, osian hɔn emumuyɛdze nye hɔn akomadzen ntsi.

36 Na dɛm na yehu dɛ Ewuradze hyɛɛ ase huee no Sunsum guu Lamanfo no do, osiandɛ nna wɔayɛ krado na woenya pɛ dɛ wɔbɛgye ne nsɛm edzi.

37 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no hwehwɛɛ Gadianton n’edwotwafo kuw no; na wɔkãa Nyame n’asɛm no wɔ hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛfo kɛse no mu araa ma dɛm edwotwafo kuw no wɔsɛɛ hɔn koraa wɔ Lamanfo no mu.

38 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no mbom gyinae na wɔboaa hɔn, wɔhyɛɛ ase wɔ hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛfo kɛse no mu kesii dɛ wɔpetsee Nephifo hɔn nsaase nyina do, na wɔdaadaa atseneneefo no mu dodowara ma wɔgyee hɔn ndwuma no dzii na wɔnye hɔn kyɛɛ hɔn asadze, na wɔkɛkãa hɔnho wɔ hɔn nsumaamu ewudzi nye mfɛkuw.

39 Na dɛm a wɔyɛe no maa hɔn nsa kãa tum wɔ amambu mu ma wɔnam do tsiatsiaa hɔn do na wɔhwee hɔn na wɔkekaa mu guu hɔn do na wɔdaan hɔn ekyir maa ehiafo na hɔn a wɔdwe na Nyankopɔn n’akãdofo ahobrɛadzefo.
