40 Dɛm ntsi yehu dɛ wɔwɔ tsebew a ɔyɛ hu mu, na worinyin ma daapem ɔsɛɛ.

41 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia awɔtwe dze baa ewiei wɔ atsɛmbuafo no mber a wɔdze hwɛɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no.
hel 7:
Nephi, Helaman ne Babanyin no Nkɔnhyɛ—Nyankopɔn puw Nephi no nkorɔfo no dɛ ɔnam n’ebufuw mu rebɛsera hɔn, dze asɛɛ hɔn gyedɛ wonu hɔnho wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ ho korakora. Nyankopɔn dze ɔyardɔm ba Nephi no nkorɔfo do; wonu hɔnho na wɔsan ba ne nkyɛn. Samuel, Lamannyi, no hyɛ nkɔm kyerɛ Nephifo no.

Ofitsi etsir 7 dze kesi 16.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ etsifi afamu no pow Nephi na ɔsan n’ekyir ba Zarahemla—okegyina abantsentsen a ɔwɔ no ture mu do bɔ mpaa na ɔse nkorɔfo no dɛ wonnu hɔnho annyɛ dɛm a wɔbɛhera. Bɛyɛ mfe 23–21 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduosia akron no mu wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no dɔm do no, Nephi a ɔyɛ Helaman ne babanyin no saan n’ekyir fi etsifi mantam asaase no do baa Zarahemla asaase do.

2 Na ɔkɔr dɔm a wɔwɔ etsifi mantam asaase do kɛkãa Nyame n’asɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn, na ɔhyɛɛ ndzɛmba pii ho nkɔm kyerɛɛ hɔn;

3 Na wɔpoow ne nsɛm no nyina ma dɛm ntsi nna onntum nntsena hɔn mu, dɛm ntsi ɔsaan n’ekyir bio baa asaase a wɔwoo no wɔ do no do.

4 Na ohun dɔm no dɛ wɔwɔ emumuyɛdze a ɔyɛ hu gyinabew mu, na Gadianton edwotwafo no tsetse atsɛmbu-ngua no do, na wɔagye tum nye asaase no do tumdzi; na wɔdze Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm ato nkyɛn, na wɔnntsen koraa wɔ n’enyim; na wonndzi pɛrpɛr mma adasamba;

5 Na wobu atseneneefo fɔ osian hɔn tseneneeyɛ ntsi; na wogyaa afɔdzifo nye emumuyɛfo ma wɔfa hɔnho dzi osian hɔn sika ntsi; na mbrɛ ɔbor ne nyinara do nye dɛ wɔtsetse dzibew mu dɛ aban no ne tsir, na wɔhwɛ hɔn do na wɔyɛ hɔn apɛdze ama woeenya ahodze nye wiadze enyimnyam, kor so nye dɛ ama woenya ho kwan na wɔaato awar, na woeewia adze, na woeedzi ewu, na wɔaayɛ hɔnankasa hɔn apɛdze.

6 Afei dɛm emumuyɛ kɛse yi baa Nephifo do no, nna onndzii mfe dodow biara; na ber a Nephi hun dɛm no, awerɛhow hyɛɛ n’akoma mu mã; na ɔdze awerɛhow kɛse tseaa mu dɛ:

7 O, nkyɛ masan akɔ nda no a m’egya Nephi fii Jerusalem bae no mu, na nkyɛ menye no edzi dɛw wɔ anohoba asaase no do; dɛm aber no nna nkyerɛkyerɛ nnyɛ dzen, nna wodzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do ketsee, na wɔyɛ nyaa wɔ emumuyɛ ne yɛ ho; na hɔn ho yɛ har wɔ Ewuradze ne nsɛm ne ntsiei mu—

8 Nyew, sɛ midzii me mber wɔ dɛm aber no mu a, nkyɛ me kra nyaa enyigye wɔ m’enuanom hɔn tseneneeyɛ mu.

9 Mbom hwɛ, wɔahyehyɛ ama me dɛ mo nkwa nda nyɛ mber yi mu, ama awerɛhow aahyɛ me kra mã osian m’enuanom hɔn emumuyɛdze yi ntsi.

10 Na hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ nna ogyina abantsentsen a ɔwɔ Nephi no ture no a ɔbɛn kwan a wɔfa do kɔ gua kɛse no a ɔwɔ Zarahemla kuropɔn mu no do, nna Nephi abɔ no mu adze wɔ abantsentsen no a ɔwɔ no ture no mu no do, dɛm abantsentsen no so bɛn ture n’abobowano bea a odzi kɔ kwan n’ano.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ mbarimba bi resen hɔ no wohun dɛ Nephi rowora n’akoma mu nsɛm kyerɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ abantsentsen no do hɔ; na wotuu enguan na wɔkɛkãa dza woehu kyerɛɛ dɔm no, na dɔmtutuw no baa bɔboaa hɔn ano wɔ hɔ dɛ wɔrobɔhwɛ siantsir a orisi nkrum kɛse wɔ dɔm no hɔn emumuyɛ ho.

12 Na afei, aber a Nephi soɛree no ohun dɔmtutuw a wɔaboa hɔn ano wɔ hɔ.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ obuee n’ano na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, dɛn ntsi na hom aboa hom ano wɔ ha yi? Ama maakã hom emumuyɛ akyerɛ hom anaa?

14 Nyew, osiandɛ maba m’abantsentsen do ha ama meetum mawora me kra mu nsɛm akyerɛ me Nyankopɔn, osiandɛ awerɛhow ahyɛ m’akoma mu mã, osian hom emumuyɛ ntsi!

15 Na osian mo nkrumsi na mo kwadwom ntsi na ɔyɛ hom nwanwa ma hom aboa hom ano wɔ ha yi; nyew, na ohia kɛse ma hom dɛ hom bɔ mbubuw; nyew, hom mbɔ mbubuw osiandɛ hom egyaa hom ho ama abɔnsam ma ne nsa esuo hom akoma mu yie.

16 Nyew, ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom egyaa homho ama ndaadaa a ofir onyia a ɔrohwehwɛ atwe hom akra akɔ daapem awerɛhow nye mbusu mu a onnyi ewiei yi?

17 O hom nnu homho, hom nnu homho! Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom bowu? Hom nsan, hom nsan mbra Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn nkyɛn. Ebɛnadze ntsi na ɔapa hom?

18 Osiandɛ hom epirim hom akoma; nyew, hom rinntsie oguanhwɛfo pa no ne ndze; nyew, hom hyɛ no ma no bo efuw hom.

19 Na hwɛ, nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ ɔboaboa hom ano no, ɔbɔbɔ hom apetse ma hom abɛyɛ afonam ama mbɔdɔm nye mbowa abɔyafo, gyedɛ hom nu homho.

20 O, ɔyɛ dɛn na hom werɛ fir hom Nyankopɔn a ɔgyee hom wɔ da yi mu ara yi?

21 Mbom hwɛ, ama hom eenya homho na adasa eyi hom ayɛw, nyew, ama hom eenya sika nye dwetɛ. Na hom dze hom akoma esi hom ahodze nye wiadze yi mu egyangyandze do, na iyi ntsi na hom dzi ewu, na hom bɔ epoo, na hom wia adze, na hom gye dasewia tsia hom anyɛnkofo, na hom yɛ emumuyɛ ahorow pii.

22 Na iyi ho ntsi mbusu bɛba hom do gyedɛ hom nu homho. Na sɛ hom ennu homho a, hwɛ, dɛm kurow kɛse yi, nye nkurow akɛse a ɔwɔ hɛn egyanom asaase yi do ha nyina, wɔbɛgye efi hɛn nsamu dɛ hom rennya kwan biara wɔ mu; na hwɛ, Ewuradze remma hom ahoɔdzen dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze maa hom ma hom tumii nye hom atamfo dzii esi no.

23 Na hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze se: Merennda m’ahoɔdzen edzi nnkyerɛ omumuyɛnyi kor nngyaa no nua, gyedɛ hɔn a wonu hɔnho, na wotsie m’asɛm. Afei, dɛm ntsi, mepɛ dɛ hom hu, m’enuanom, dɛ obeye koraa ama Lamanfo no asen hom, gyedɛ hom nu homho.

24 Na hwɛ, wɔyɛ atseneneefo koraa sen hom, osiandɛ wɔnnyɛɛ bɔn nntsiaa dɛm nyimdzee kɛse no a hom enya no; dɛm ntsi Ewuradze bohu hɔn mbɔbɔr; ɔbɛma hɔn nda awar na ɔama hɔn asefo adɔr, wɔ ber a wɔbɛsɛɛ hom koraa no mpo, gyedɛ hom nu homho.

25 Nyew, hom ndue osian dɛm ebusudze kɛse a ɔaba hom mu no ntsi; na hom dze homho afam ho, nyew dɛm nsumaamu fɛkuw a Gadianton twetwee no!

26 Nyew, mpaa bɛba hom do osiandɛ hom ama kwan ma dɛm ahantanyɛ no ahɛn hom akoma mu, ɔno na ɔama hom do wɔ sor ma ɔabor dza oye do, osian hom ahonyadze mbordo ntsi!

27 Nyew, hom ndue osian hom emumuyɛdze nye hom ebusudze ntsi!

28 Na gyedɛ hom nu homho annyɛ dɛm a, hom bɛhera; nyew, hom asaase mpo wɔbɛgye efi hom nsamu, na wɔbɛsɛɛ hom efi asaase enyi do.

29 Afei hwɛ, nnyɛ mankasa na merekã dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi bɛyɛ hɔ, osiandɛ nnyɛ mankasa na muhun dɛm ndzɛmba yi; mbom hwɛ minyim dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi yɛ nokwar osiandɛ Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔdaa no edzi kyerɛɛ me, dɛm ntsi megye dase dɛ ɔbɛyɛ hɔ.
hel 8:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Atsɛmbuafo esisifo per nunu nkorɔfo no ma wotsia Nephi—Abraham, Moses, Zenos, Zenock, Ezias, Isaiah, Jeremiah, Lehi na Nephi nyina gye Christ ho dase—Nephi nam nkenyan do bɔ ɔtsɛmbuafopanyin no ku ho nkaabɔ. Bɛyɛ mfe 23–21 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Nephi kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, hwɛ nna mbarimba wɔ hɔ a wɔyɛ atsɛmbuafo, na wɔdɔm Gadianton no nsumaamu fɛkuw no so, ntsi hɔn bo fuwii, na wɔkasaa tsiaa no, see dɔm no dɛ: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom nnkyer banyin yi na hom mmfa no mmba ma wommbu no fɔ wɔ bɔn a ɔayɛ yi ho?

2 Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom hwɛ banyin yi na hom tsie no ma ɔkasa bɔn tsia dɔm yi nye hɛn mbra?

3 Na hwɛ, Nephi akasa akyerɛ hɔn dɛ wɔasɛɛ hɔn mbra no; nyew Nephi kãa nsɛm pii a worunntum nnkyerɛw; na biribiara nnyi hɔ a ɔkãe a otsia Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm.

4 Na dɛm atsɛmbuafo no bo fuuw no osiandɛ ɔkasaa pefee tsiaa hɔn nsumaamu sum ndwuma no; naaso, woenntum ammfa hɔn nsa annkã no, osiandɛ nna wosuro dɔm no dɛ bɛyɛ na wɔakasa etsia hɔn.

5 Dɛm ntsi wɔkasaa kyerɛɛ dɔm no see dɛ: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom ma banyin yi kasa tsia bɔn hɛn? Na hwɛ orubu dɔm yi nyina fɔ, na dɛ wɔbɔkɔ ɔsɛɛ mu mpo; nyew, na dɛ hɛn nkurow akɛse nyina befi hɛn nsa a yerinnya no mu biara.

6 Na afei yenyim dɛ iyi runntum nnsi, na hwɛ, hɛnho yɛ dzen, na hɛn nkurow soso, dɛm ntsi hɛn atamfo runntum hɛn da.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm na wɔyɛe ama dɔm no hɔn bo eefuw Nephi, na ɔdze wentwiwentwi aba hɔn mu; osiandɛ hɔn mu binom wɔ hɔ a wɔtsẽatsẽaa mu dɛ: Hom ngyaa nyimpa yi, na ɔyɛ nyimpa papa, na nsɛm a ɔakã nyina bɛba mu ampa, gyedɛ yenu hɛnho;

8 Nyew, hwɛ, atsɛmbu nyina bɛba hɛn do dɛ mbrɛ ɔagye ho dase akyerɛ hɛn no; na yenyim dɛ hɛn emumuyɛdze ho dase a ɔyɛ nokwar na ɔagye akyerɛ hɛn no. Na hwɛ ɔdɔɔ sõ, na onyim ndzɛmba nyina a ɔbɛba hɛn do dɛ mbrɛ onyim hɛn emumuyɛdze nyina so;

9 Nyew, na hwɛ, sɛ ɔnnyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi a nkyɛ orunntum nngye dase mmfa dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm dɔm no a wɔhwehwɛ asɛɛ Nephi no suroi ntsi woenntum ammfa hɔn nsa annkã no; na ber a ohun dɛ binom enyi agye no ho no, ɔhyɛɛ ase bio kasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn ara yie ma hɔn a wɔaka no so suroi.

11 Dɛm ntsi biribi kenyaan no ma ɔsɔɔw do kasaa pii kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, m’enuanom, ana hom nnkenkaan dɛ Nyankopɔn dze tum maa nyimpa kor bi, Moses mpo ma ɔpaa Po Memen mu ma oguu ha na ha, ma Israelmba a wɔyɛ hɛn awofo duaa mu wɔ asaase kɛsɛɛ do, na nsu no kãa bɔɔ mu kataa Egypt nsordaafo do meen hɔn!

12 Na afei hwɛ, sɛ Nyankopɔn maa dɛm nyimpa yi tum a ɔtse dɛm a, nna ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom gye hom mu kyim, na hom kã dɛ ɔmaa me tum biara a menam do botum ehu atsɛmbu a ɔbɛba hom do gyedɛ hom nu homho?

13 Mbom, hwɛ, hom mmpoow mo nko me nsɛm, mbom hom apow nsɛm nyina so a hɛn egyanom akã no, nye nsɛm so a dɛm Moses yi a wɔdze tum kɛse a ɔtse dɛm maa no no kãe, nyew, nsɛm a ɔkãe a ɔfa Messiah ne mbae ho.

14 Nyew, ana ɔannkã dɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba no bɛba? Na dɛ mbrɛ ɔmaa boran abowatsena no do sɛɛn sor wɔ sar no do no, dɛmara so mpo na wɔbɛma nyia ɔbɛba no do asɛn sor.

15 Na dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mu dodowara a wɔhwɛɛ dɛm abowatsena no nyaa nkwa no, dɛmara so mpo na dodow biara a wɔbɔhwɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba no wɔ gyedzi mu na wɔwɔ sunsum a abotow no benya nkwa, dze akɔ dɛm nkwa no mpo a ɔyɛ onnyiewiei no.

16 Na afei hwɛ, Moses anngye dase wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yi nko ho, mbom ɔgyee dase so wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn nyinara ho, fi no nkwa nda do dze kesi Abraham no nkwa nda mu mpo.

17 Nyew, na hwɛ, Abraham hun ne mbaa, na enyigye hyɛɛ no mã na odzii dɛw.

18 Nyew, na hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, nnyɛ Abraham nko na ohun dɛm ndzɛmba yi, mbom ansaana wɔrobɔwo Abraham koraa no nna pii wɔ hɔ a Nyankopɔn nam ne nhyehyɛɛ do afrɛ hɔn; nyew, wɔ ne Ba no tum do; na ɔyɛɛ iyi dze kyerɛɛ dɔm no mfe mpempem ekyir koraa ansaana ne mbae no mpo bɛba ma ɔdze ɔpon abrɛ hɔn.

19 Na afei mepɛ dɛ hom hu dɛ ansaana wɔrobɔwo Abraham koraa no nna nkɔnhyɛfo pii abɛsen kɔ a wɔgyee dase wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho; nyew, hwɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi Zenos gyee ho dase akokodur mu; na ɔno ho ntsi na wokum no.

20 Na hwɛ, Zenock so, nna Ezias so, nye Isaiah so, na Jeremiah. (Jeremiah nye dɛm nkɔnhyɛnyi kor noara so a ɔgyee dase dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ Jerusalem no) na afei yenyim dɛ wɔsɛɛ Jerusalem dɛ mbrɛ Jeremiah kãe ara pɛr. O ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na Nyankopɔn ne Ba no remmba dɛ mbrɛ no nkɔnhyɛ se?

21 Na afei ana hom bɛgye kyim dɛ wɔannsɛɛ Jerusalem? Ana hom bɛkã dɛ woennkum Zedekiah ne mbabanyin no nyinara ma ɔkaa Mulek nko? Nyew, ana hom nnhu dɛ Zedekiah n’asefo kã hɛnho, na hɔnso wɔpaam hɔn fii Jerusalem asaase do? Mbom hwɛ, nnyɛ ne nyinara nye iyi—

22 Wɔpaam hɛn egya Lehi fii Jerusalem osiandɛ ɔgyee dase wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho. Nephi so gyee dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho dase, nye hɛn egyanom nyinara so dze besi aber yi mu mpo; nyew, wɔgyee Christ ne mbae ho dase, na wɔhwɛɛ no kwan, na wodzii dɛw wɔ ne da a ɔdze bɛba no mu.

23 Na hwɛ, ɔyɛ Nyame, na ɔnye hɔn wɔ hɔ, na ɔdaa noho edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn, na ɔpoon hɔn; na wɔhyɛɛ no enyimnyam, wɔ dza ɔbɛba no ho.

24 Na afei, hom ehu dɛ hom nyim dɛm ndzɛmba yi na hom runntum nngye ho kyim gyedɛ hom dzi ator, dɛm ntsi hom ayɛ bɔn wɔ iyi ho, osiandɛ dasegye pii a hom ehu nyina ekyir no hom apow dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina; nyew, hom agye ndzɛmba nyina mpo dza ɔwɔ sor nye ndzɛmba nyina a ɔwɔ asaase do, yɛ dasegye dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar.

25 Mbom hwɛ, hom apow nokwar no, na hom atsew etũa wɔ hom Krɔnkrɔn Nyankopɔn no do; na mber yi mu ara mpo a ɔsɛ dɛ hom pɛ ahonyadze ma homho wɔ sor, bea a biribiara mmprɔw na biribiara a no ho nntsew runntum nnkɔ hɔ no, hom roboaboa ebufuhyew ano ma homho ma atsɛmbu da no.

26 Nyew, mber yi mpo mu na hom reber, osiandɛ hom ewudzi nye hom ndwamanbɔ na emumuyɛdze wɔ hɔ ma daapem ɔsɛɛ; nyew, na gyedɛ hom nu homho annyɛ dɛm a ɔrennkyɛr na ɔaba hom do.

27 Nyew, hwɛ dɛ oedu hom mbobowano mpo; nyew, hom nkɔ atsɛmbu egua no ho nkɔhwɛ; na hwɛ, hom ɔtsɛmbuafo no, wo edzi no ewu, na ɔda no bɔgyaa mu; na no nuabanyin na okum no, nyia ɔrohwehwɛ ɔakɔko atsɛmbu egua no do.

28 Na hwɛ, hɔn beenu nyinara dɔm hom nsumaamu fɛkuw nyia ne farbaa nye Gadianton nye abɔnsam no a ɔrohwehwɛ asɛɛ adasa hɔn akra no.
hel 9:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Asomafo kohu dɛ ɔtsɛmbuafopanyin no ewu da atsɛmbu egua no enyim—Wɔdze hɔn gu efiadze na ekyir no woyi hɔn—Nephi nam nkenyan do hu dɛ Seantum nye owudzifo no—Binom gye Nephi to mu dɛ ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi. Bɛyɛ mfe 23–21 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Nephi kãa dɛm nsɛm no, nkorɔfo bi a wɔwɔ hɔn mu hɔ no tuu enguan kɔr atsɛmbu egua no ho; nyew, wɔyɛ beenum, na wɔkɔree, na ber a wɔrokɔ no nna wɔrekã wɔ hɔn mu dɛ:

2 Hwɛ, afei na yebohu nokwar no dɛ dɛm nyimpa yi yɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi, na Nyankopɔn na ɔahyɛ no dɛ ɔnhyɛ nkɔm a ɔyɛ nwanwa dɛm nkyerɛ hɛn. Hwɛ, yɛnngye no nndzi dɛ ɔwɔ; nyew, yɛnngye nndzi dɛ ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi; naaso, sɛ dza ɔakã a ɔfa ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin ho dɛ oewu yi yɛ nokwar a, yɛbɛgye edzi dɛ nsɛm nkaa a ɔkãe no nyinara yɛ nokwar.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ wotuu enguan ahoɔdzen mu ara baa atsɛmbu egua no ho: na hwɛ, ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no ahwe famu, na ɔda no bɔgyaa mu.

4 Na afei hwɛ, ber a wohun iyi no hɔn ho boow hɔn mbordo ma wɔhwee famu; osiandɛ ahyɛse no wɔanngye nsɛm no a Nephi kãe a ɔfa ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no ho no enndzi.

5 Mbom afei, ber a wohunii no wɔgyee dzii, na wosuroo dɛ atsɛmbu nyina a Nephi akã no bɛba hɔn do; dɛm ntsi hɔnho popoe na wɔhwee famu.

6 Afei, ber a ɔtsɛmbuafo no wui no—ɔnoara no nua no a ɔnam nsumaamu dze pea wɔɔ no na oguaan ntsɛmara, na nkowaa no tutuu enguan kɛkãa kyerɛɛ dɔm no na wɔtseatseaa mu dɛ woedzi ewu wɔ hɔn mu;

7 Na hwɛ dɔm no kɔboaa hɔn ano wɔ atsɛmbu egua no ho—na hwɛ hɔn ho boow hɔn ber a wohun dɛm nkorɔfo beenum no dɛ wogugu famu no.

8 Na afei hwɛ, nkorɔfo no nnyim biribiara a ɔfa dɔmtutuw no a wɔaboa hɔn ano wɔ Nephi no ture no mu no ho: dɛm ntsi wɔsee hɔnho dɛ: dɛm nkorɔfo yi na wokum ɔtsɛmbuafo no, na Nyankopɔn na ɔatsea hɔn ma woenntum ennguan hɛn.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ wosuoo hɔn mu, na wɔkyekyeer hɔn na wɔdze hɔn guu efiadze. Na wɔsomaa ma wɔkɔbɔɔ dawur dɛ woeku ɔtsɛmbuafo no, na wɔakyer ewudzifo no dze hɔn egu efiadze.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no dɔm no kɔboaa hɔn ano dɛ worukosũ na wɔafa akɔnkye dze akɛpɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin, okunyin no a woekum no no korabew.

11 Na dɛm atsɛmbuafo no so a nna wɔwɔ Nephi no ture mu hɔ no tsee nsɛm no, hɔn so boaa hɔn ano wɔ eyiadze hɔ.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ wobisabisaa hɔnho dɛ: Na nkorɔfo beenum no a wɔsomaa hɔn dɛ wonkebisa dɛ sɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no ewu no wɔ hen? Na wobuaa dɛ: Ɔfa no nkorɔfo beenum no a hom se hom somaa hɔn no, yennyim hɔn; mbom beenum bi na wɔyɛ ewudzifo, hɔn dze yɛdze hɔn egu efiadze.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo no pɛɛ dɛ wɔkɛfa hɔn ba; na wɔkɛfaa hɔn bae, na hwɛ wɔyɛ nkorɔfo beenum no a wɔsomaa hɔn no; na atsɛmbuafo no bisaa hɔn dza ɔfa dɛm asɛm no ho, na wɔkãa dza wɔyɛe nyina dɛ:

14 Yetuu enguan baa atsɛmbu bea hɔ, na ber a yehun ndzɛmba nyina a Nephi gyee ho dase no, hɛn ho boow hɛn araa ma yɛhwehwee famu; na ber a hɛn enyi do tsetseew hɛn no, hwɛ nna wɔdze hɛn egu efiadze.

15 Afei, ɔfa no nyimpa yi no wu ho no dze, yennyim ho hwee; na dza yenyim ara nye dɛ, yetuu enguan bae dɛ mbrɛ hom rohwehwɛ no ara, hwɛ nna oewu dɛ mbrɛ Nephi n’asɛm se no ara pɛr.

16 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo no kãa asɛm no kyerɛɛ dɔm no, na wɔtseatsea mu guu Nephi do see dɛ: Hwɛ, yenyim dɛ dɛm Nephi yi ara na ɔnye obi hyehyɛe ma okokum ɔtsɛmbuafo no, ama oeetum akã akyerɛ hɛn, na ɔatwee hɛn akɔ ne gyedzi ho, ama oeetuw noho dɛ ɔyɛ nyimpa kɛse, nkɔnhyɛnyi a Nyankopɔn na ɔasan mu eyi no.

17 Na afei hwɛ, yɛbɛyɛ nyimpa yi mpɛnsampɛnsamu, ma ɔakã no mfomdo na ɔama yehu nyia a okum ɔtsɛmbuafo yi.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ wogyaa dɛm nkorɔfo beenum no da a worikesie fun no. Na, wɔkãa atsɛmbuafo no hɔn enyim wɔ nsɛm a wɔkãa tsiaa Nephi no, na wɔnye hɔn yiyii nsɛm ano nkorkor araa kɛpem aber a hɔn enyim guu ase.

19 Naaso, wɔmaa wɔfaa Nephi na wɔkyekyeer no na wɔnye no baa dɔmtutuw no enyim, na wɔhyɛɛ ase bisabisaa no nsɛm pii ama hɔn nsa aakã no na woebu no fɔ na woeku no—

20 Wɔkãa kyerɛɛ no dɛ: Ɔwo nye binom ahyehyɛ; Woana nye dɛm nyimpa a odzii dɛm ewu yi? Afei kã kyerɛ hɛn, na gye wo mfomdo to mu; kã, Hwɛ sika nye yi; na yɛdze wo nkwa so bɛkyɛ wo sɛ ekã nhyehyɛɛ so a enye no yɛe no kyerɛ hɛn a.

21 Mbom Nephi see hɔn dɛ: O nkwaseafo, hom a hom nntwaa hom akoma twatsia, hom efurafo, nye akɔnkyefo, ana hom nyim mber dodow a Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn dze bɛma hom ma hom akɔ do wɔ dɛm bɔn yi ne nyɛe mu?

22 O ɔsɛ dɛ hom hyɛ ase keka mu na hom sũ, osiandɛ mber yi mu ɔsɛɛ kɛse bi da hɔ rotweɔn hom, gyedɛ hom nu homho.

23 Hwɛ hom se dɛ emi menye nyimpa bi hyehyɛɛ dɛ onkoku Seezoram, hɛn ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin no. Mbom hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, osiandɛ magye dase wɔ dɛm adze yi ho ntsi; nyew, ama aayɛ dasedzi ama hom dɛ, minyim hom emumuyɛdze nye ebusudze a ɔwɔ hom mu.

24 Na osiandɛ mayɛ dɛm adze yi ntsi, hom rekã dɛ menye nyimpa bi hyehyɛɛ dɛ ɔnkɛyɛ dɛm adze yi; nyew, osiandɛ medaa dɛm nsɛnkyerɛdze yi edzi kyerɛɛ hom ntsi na hom bo efuw me, na hom rohwehwɛ asɛɛ mo nkwa.

25 Na afei hwɛ, mibeyi nsɛnkyerɛdze fofor bi so akyerɛ hom, na hom nhwɛ dɛ dɛm adze yi mu so hom bɛper dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ me a.

26 Hwɛ mese hom dɛ: Hom nkɔ Seantum a ɔyɛ Seezoram no nuabanyin no ne fie, na hom nkã nkyerɛ no dɛ—

27 Ana Nephi a oepetuw dɛ ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi no, nyia a ɔahyɛ mbusu nkɔm a ɔfa dɛm dɔm yi ho no nye wo hyehyɛɛ, dɛ koku Seezoram a, ɔyɛ wo nuabanyin no?

28 Na hwɛ, ɔbɛkã akyerɛ hom dɛ, Oho.

29 Na hom mbisa no dɛ: Ana eku wo nuabanyin?

30 Na ɔdze suro begyina hɔ a orunnhu dza ɔnkã. Na hwɛ, ɔrennkã nokwar no nnkyerɛ hom; na ɔbɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ahobow akã no; naaso, ɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ hom dɛ onnyim ho hwee.

31 Mbom hwɛ, hom nhwehwɛ no ho, na hom bohu bɔgya wɔ n’atar n’ase.

32 Na sɛ hom hu iyi a, hom nkã dɛ: Bɔgya yi fi hen bae? Ana yennyim dɛ ɔyɛ wo nuabanyin no bɔgyaa?

33 Na afei noho bɔpopo, na n’enyim atow sakoo dɛ owufo.

34 Na afei hom nkã dɛ: Osian dɛm suro yi nye w’enyim a ayɛ sakoo yi ntsi, hwɛ, yehu dɛ idzi fɔ.

35 Na afei suro kɛse bi bɛba no do; na hwɛ ɔbɛkã nokwar no akyerɛ hom, na ɔrenngye kyim bio dɛ nnyɛ ɔno na ɔyɛɛ dɛm ewudzidze yi.

36 Na afei ɔbɛkã akyerɛ hom dɛ, emi Nephi minnyim biribiara a ɔfa dɛm adze yi ho na Nyankopɔn no tum na oeyi akyerɛ me. Na afei na hom bohu dɛ meyɛ nyimpa a midzi nokwar, na Nyankopɔn na ɔasoma me wɔ hom nkyɛn.

37 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔkɔree kɛyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Nephi see hɔn no. Na hwɛ, nsɛm a ɔkãa no yɛ nokwar; na dɛ mbrɛ nsɛm no kyerɛ no, ɔgyee kyim; na dɛ mbrɛ nsɛm no kyerɛ no, ɔkãa nokwar no.

38 Na wɔdze no bae ma nankasa bedzii dase kyerɛ hɔn dɛ ɔnoara ankasa nye wudzifo no, na dɛm ntsi wogyaa mbanyin beenum no ahotɔ mu, na Nephi so.

39 Na Nephifo binom wɔ hɔ a wɔgyee Nephi ne nsɛm no dzii; na binom so wɔ hɔ a wɔgyee dzii osian beenum no hɔn dasee a wɔgyee no ntsi, osiandɛ wonyaa nsakyer wɔ ber a wɔda efiadze hɔ no.

40 Na afei binom so wɔ dɔm no mu a wɔkãa dɛ Nephi yɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi.

41 Na binom so kãa dɛ ɔyɛ bosom, na sɛ ɔnnyɛ bosom a nkyɛ orunntum nnhu ndzɛmba nyina. Na hwɛ, ɔakã hɛn akoma mu nsɛm akyerɛ hɛn, na ɔakã hɛn nsɛm so, na ɔama yehu nyia okum hɛn ɔtsɛmbuanyi panyin no.
hel 10:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ewuradze dze nsɔwano tum ma Nephi—Wɔma no tum dɛ biribiara a ɔbɛkyekyer na obesan wɔ asaase do no wɔbɛyɛ no dɛmara wɔ sor—Ɔhyɛ nkorɔfo no dɛ wonnu hɔnho, annyɛ dɛm a wɔbɛhera—Sunsum no soa no fi nyimpadodow mu kɔ nyimpadodow mu. Bɛyɛ mfe 21–20 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ mpaapaamu baa dɔm no mu, na ɔyɛɛ dzen araa ma wɔkyɛɛ hɔn mu ebien na kor kɔr afã na kor so kɔr afã na ɔkaa Nephi nko gyina finimfin.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi so faa no kwan kɔr ne fie, nna ɔrodwendwen ndzɛmba a Ewuradze eyi akyerɛ no no ho.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔrodwendwen ho no—nna no werɛ ahow osian Nephifo no hɔn emumuyɛdze, nye hɔn nsumaamu sum ndwuma, nye hɔn ewudzi, na hɔn epoobɔ, nye emumuyɛ ahorow nyina ntsi—na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔrodwendwen dɛm ho wɔ n’akoma mu no, hwɛ, ndze bi baa no hɔ bɛsee no dɛ:

4 Nhyira akã wo, Nephi, wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba a ayɛ yi ntsi; na mehu mbrɛ esi edze enyimpi ada nsɛm a medze maa wo no edzi akyerɛ dɔm yi. Na ennsuro hɔn, na ammper wankasa wo nkwa, na mbom aper ahwehwɛ me pɛ na edzi me mbrasɛm do.

5 Na afei, osiandɛ edze enyimpi ayɛ dɛm adze yi ntsi, hwɛ, mibehyira wo afebɔɔ; na mebɛyɛ wo ɔkɛse wɔ kasa nye nyɛe mu, wɔ gyedzi nye ndwuma mu; nyew, na dza ibebisa biara wɔbɛyɛ ama wo dɛ mbrɛ w’asɛm se, osiandɛ irimmbisa dza otsia me pɛ.

6 Hwɛ, ɔwo nye Nephi, na emi so nye Nyankopɔn. Hwɛ, meda no edzi kyerɛ wo wɔ m’abɔfoe enyim dɛ ibenya tum wɔ dɔm yi do, na ibotum ama ɔkɔm, na ɔyardɔm, nye ɔsɛɛ aba asaase yi do dɛ mbrɛ dɔm yi hɔn emumuyɛdze tse.

7 Hwɛ, mema wo tum, dɛ biribiara a ebɔsɔw ano wɔ asaase yi do no, wɔbɔsɔw ano wɔ sor; na biribiara a ibesan wɔ asaase yi do no, wobesan wɔ sor; na dɛm na edze benya tum wɔ dɔm yi mu.

8 Na dɛm ntsi, sɛ ekã kyerɛ temple yi dɛ no mu mpaa ebien a, ɔbɛyɛ hɔ.

9 Na sɛ ekã kyerɛ bepɔw yi dɛ, ontutu ngu famu ma hɔ nyɛ dzɛfɛɛ a, ɔbɛyɛ hɔ.

10 Na hwɛ, sɛ ekã dɛ Nyankopɔn ntsea dɔm yi a, ɔbɛyɛ hɔ.

11 Na afei hwɛ, mehyɛ wo dɛ, kɔ kɛkã kyerɛ dɔm yi dɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn Otumfo no se: sɛ hom ennu homho a wɔbɔhwe hom, dze asɛɛ hom so mpo.

12 Na hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Ewuradze kãa dɛm nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Nephi wiei no, ogyinaa hɔ ara, na ɔannkɔ nankasa ne fie, mbom ɔsanee kɔr dɔmtutuw a wɔabɔ apetse wɔ asaase n’enyi do no hɔ na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔreda Ewuradze n’asɛm a ɔkãa kyerɛɛ no a ɔfa ɔsɛɛ a sɛ woennu hɔnho a wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn no edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn.

13 Afei hwɛ, etumdze kɛse a Nephi yɛe dɛ ɔkãa mbrɛ wosii kum ɔtsɛmbuanyi panyin no nyina ekyir no annyɛ dɔm no hwee, na wɔdaa ho piriim hɔn akoma na woenntsie Ewuradze ne nsɛm no.

14 Dɛm ntsi Nephi daa Ewuradze n’asɛm edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ: Gyedɛ hom nu homho, annyɛ dɛm a, wɔbɛtsẽa hom na wɔasɛɛ hom so mpo, dɛm na Ewuradze se.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Nephi daa asɛm no edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn no, hwɛ, wɔdaa ho piriim hɔn akoma na woenntsie ne nsɛm; dɛm ntsi wɔkãa kasa bɔn dze tsiaa no, na wɔpɛɛ dɛ wobosuo no mu na wɔdze no ato efiadze.

16 Mbom hwɛ, Nyankopɔn no tum kã noho, na woenntum ennsuo no mu ammfa no annto efiadze, na Sunsum no twee no fii hɔn finimfin kɔree.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔtsenaa Sunsum no mu dɛmara dze fitsi dɔmtutuw kor mu kɔr kor so mu kãa Nyankopɔn n’asɛm no kesii dɛ ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn nyina, anaadɛ ɔdze asɛm no kɔr dɔm no nyinara do.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ woenntsie ne nsɛm; na wentwiwentwi hyɛɛ ase baa hɔn mu, na wɔkyekyɛɛ hɔn mu na wotsiatsia hɔnho, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dze afõwa kukuu hɔnho.

19 Na dɛm na afe eduosuon biako wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no kɔr ewiei.
hel 11:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi sũ frɛ Ewuradze dɛ ɔmfa ɔkɔm mbɛhyɛ hɔn akodzi no ananmu—Nyimpa pii hera—Wonu hɔnho na Nephi serɛ Ewuradze dɛ ɔmma nsu ntɔ—Nephi na Lehi nya nyikyerɛ pii—Gadianton edwotwafo no gyee ndwow wɔ asaase no do. Bɛyɛ mfe 20–6 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo no afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon ebien mu no wentwiwentwi no yɛɛ kɛsenara, ma akõkoekõ sii asaase nyina do wɔ Nephifo no mu.

2 Na ɔyɛ dɛm nsumaamu fɛkuw mu yi edwotwafo yi na wɔdze dɛm ɔsɛɛ na emumuyɛdze yi bae. Na ɔkõ yi kɔr do wɔ afe no nyinara mu; dze koduu afe eduosuon ebiasa mu.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe yi mu no Nephi sũi frɛɛ Ewuradze dɛ:

4 O Ewuradze ma mma kwan mma wɔmmfa afõwa nnsɛɛ dɔm yi; mbom, O Ewuradze, ma ɔkɔm mbom mbra asaase yi do, ama woekenyan hɔn ma wɔaakaa hɔn Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, na annhwɛ a woeenu hɔnho na wɔadan aba wo nkyɛn.

5 Na ɔyɛɛ hɔ so, dɛ mbrɛ Nephi kãe no ara pɛr. Na ɔkɔm kɛse sii Nephi no dɔm no nyinara mu wɔ asaase no do. Na ɔkɔm no kɔr do wɔ afe eduosuon anan no nyinara mu, na afõwa ɔsɛɛ no bɔɔ adze, na mbom ɔkɔm dze ɔsɛɛ a ano yɛ dzen ara yie baa.

6 Na dɛm ɔsɛɛ yi kɔr do kɛpeem afe eduosuon enum no mu. Na asaase no bɛyɛɛ kɛsɛɛ na oennyi ndɔbaa amma wɔ buber mu; na asaase no nyinara sɛe wɔ Lamanfo no so mpo mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ Nephifo mu no ara pɛr, na asaase ne mbea a emumuyɛfo kɛse wɔ no sɛɛ araa ma mpempem wuwii.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɔm no hun dɛ ɔkɔm no robokum hɔn ntsi wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrekaa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn; na wɔhyɛɛ ase so dɛ wɔrekaakaa Nephi ne nsɛm.

8 Na dɔm no hyɛɛ ase paa hɔn atsɛmbuafo mpanyimfo no nye hɔn ahwɛdofo no kyɛw dɛ wɔnkã nkyerɛ Nephi dɛ: Hwɛ yenyim dɛ eyɛ Nyame ne nyimpa, dɛm ntsi sũ frɛ Ewuradze hɛn Nyankopɔn no, dɛ onyi ɔkɔm yi mfi hɛn do, annyɛ dɛm a nsɛm a ɔkãe nyinara a ɔfa hɛn ɔsɛɛ ho no bɛba mu.

9 Ma ɔbaa dɛ atsɛmbuafo no kãa nsɛm a dɔm no se wɔnkã no nyinara kyerɛɛ Nephi. Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Nephi hun dɛ dɔm no enu hɔnho na wɔabrɛ hɔnho adze na woefura ewir no, osũu bio frɛɛ Ewuradze see dɛ:

10 O Ewuradze, hwɛ, dɔm yi enu hɔnho; na wɔapam Gadianton ne fɛkuw bɔn no efi hɔn mu ma hɔn ase ahyew, na wɔdze hɔn nsumaamu nhyehyɛɛ no ahyɛ famu.

11 Afei, O Ewuradze, osian hɔn ahobrɛadze yi ntsi nkyɛ eyi w’ebufuhyew no fi hɔn do, na ma hɔn a osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi asɛɛ hɔn dada no nyɛ mpatadze mma wo.

12 O Ewuradze, nkyɛ eyi w’ebufuw no efi hɔ; nyew, w’ebufuw a ɔyɛ hu no, na ma ɔkɔm yi ano ntwa wɔ asaase yi do.

13 O Ewuradze, nkyɛ tsie me, na ma ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛ mbrɛ m’anomu nsɛm tse, na ma nsu ntɔ ngu asaase yi enyi do ama oeeyi n’eduaba, na ewifua wɔ ewifua ne hyɛber mu.

14 O Ewuradze, ɔwo itsiee m’asɛm wɔ ber a mekãa dɛ, ma ɔkɔm mbra, na ma afõwa ano ɔsɛɛ no mbɔ adze no; na minyim dɛ aber yi mu so mpo ibetsie me nsɛm, osiandɛ ɔwoara na akã dɛ: Sɛ dɔm yi nu hɔnho a merennsɛɛ hɔn.

15 Nyew, O Ewuradze, ehu dɛ woenu hɔnho, osian ɔkɔm na ɔyardɔm nye ɔsɛɛ a aba hɔn do ntsi.

16 Na afei, O Ewuradze ana ibeyi w’ebufuw no efi hɔ, na ahwɛ hɔn bio dɛ wɔbɔsom wo? Na sɛ ɔba no dɛm a, O Ewuradze, ibotum ehyira hɔn dɛ mbrɛ w’anomusɛm no tse.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon esia no mu no, Ewuradze yii n’ebufuw fii dɔm no do, na ɔmaa nsu tɔree guu asaase no do, ara ma oyii n’eduaba wɔ eduaba ne hyɛber mu. Na ɔbaa dɛ oyii n’ewifua wɔ ewifua ne hyɛber mu.

18 Na hwɛ, dɔm no dzii ehurusi, na wɔtontoon Nyankopɔn, na enyigye hyɛɛ asaase n’enyi do mã; na wɔammper bio dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ Nephi, mbom wosusuu no dɛ ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi kɛse na Nyankopɔn ne nyimpa a oenya tum nye tumdzi kɛse efi Nyankopɔn hɔ.

19 Na hwɛ, no nuabanyin Lehi so annka ekyir koraa wɔ tsenenee ndwuma ho.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi no dɔm no hyɛɛ ase yɛɛ prɔmprɔm bio wɔ asaase no do, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worisiesie mbeambea a ayeyɛ amamfo no, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɔree na wɔtserɛwee araa kesii dɛ wɔkataa asaase nyina enyi, wɔ etsifi nye anaafo mantam nyinara do, fi po mu atɔree afamu dze kɛpem po mu epuei afamu.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon esia baa ewiei wɔ asomdwee mu. Na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon esuon hyɛɛ ase asomdwee mu; na asɔr no petsee wɔ asaase n’enyi nyina do; na dɔm no hɔn mu dodowara a wɔyɛ Nephifo nye Lamanfo no nyinara bɔdɔɔm asɔr no; na wonyaa asomdwee mbordo wɔ asaase do; na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon esuon no so dze baa ewiei.

22 Na wonyaa asomdwee wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon awɔtwe no so mu, gyama wentwiwentwi kakraabi na osii a ɔfa no nkyerɛkyerɛ ho botae a nkɔnhyɛfo ahyehyɛ ato hɔ no ho.

23 Na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon akron no mu no aperdzi pii hyɛɛ ase. Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi na Lehi, nye hɔn enuanom mu pii a wonyim a ɔfa no nkyerɛkyerɛ ho nokwar botae no nyaa nyikyerɛ da biara, dɛm ntsi wɔkãa nsɛmpa no kyerɛɛ dɔm no araa ma wogyaa hɔn aperdzi no wɔ dɛm afe noara mu.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe mu wɔ ber a atsɛmbuafo hwɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no, nna etuatsewfo bi a wofi Nephi no dɔm mu a aber bi, wofii hɔn mu dze hɔnho kɔbɔɔ Lamanfo ho na wɔdze Laman ne dzin too hɔn do no hyɛɛ ase nunuu Lamanfo no a wɔkɛkãa hɔnho na wɔyɛ Lamanfo asefo ankasa na, wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ebufuw, anaa dɛm etuatsewfo no, dɛm ntsi wɔhyɛɛ ase nye hɔn enuanom no kõe.

25 Na wodzii ewu na wɔbɔɔ epoo adze na afei wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kosumaa mbepɔw no nye sar no do nye nsumae mbea do amma woennhu hɔn, na mber dodowara dɛ etuatsewfo wɔ hɔ no a wɔkɔr hɔn hɔ no, daa wonyaa bi kã hɔn dodow ho.

26 Na dɛm ntsi annkyɛr, nyew, enndzi mfe dodow biara, na wɔbɛyɛɛ edwotwafokuw kɛsenara; na wɔpeer dɛ wɔbɔhwehwɛ Gadianton ne nsumaamu nhyehyɛɛ nyina; na dɛm ntsi wɔbɛyɛɛ Gadianton edwotwafokuw kɛse.

27 Afei hwɛ, dɛm edwotwafo yi sɛɛ adze kɛsenara, nyew, wɔsɛɛ adze kɛsenara wɔ Nephi no dɔm no mu, nye Lamanfo dɔm no so mu.

28 Na okehiaa dɛ wosiw dɛm adzesɛɛ kɛse yi ano; dɛm ntsi wotuu nsordaafo ahoɔdzenfo ma wɔkɔr sar no do dɛ wɔrokɔhwehwɛ dɛm edwotwafokuw yi na wɔnye hɔn akõ asɛɛ hɔn.

29 Mbom hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe noara mu wɔpaam hɔn ma wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɔr hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do mpo. Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do wɔ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei.

30 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe biako ahyɛse no, wɔkɔr edwotwafokuw no do bio, na wɔsɛɛ hɔn mu pii; na hɔn so ɔsɛɛ pii baa hɔn do.

31 Na okehiaa dɛ wɔsan hɔn ekyir bio fi sar nye akoko no do kɔ hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do, osian dɛm edwotwafo no a wɔakɛhyehyɛ sar no nye akoko no do no a hɔn dodow adɔr mbordo no ntsi.

32 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm na afe yi so dze baa ewiei. Na edwotwafo no kɔr do dɔree na hɔnho so yɛɛ dzen araa ma wɔgyee Nephifo nye Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo nyina taferbanyinmbɔmu na dɛm maa suro kɛse baa dɔm a wɔwɔ asaase n’enyi do no nyinara do.

33 Nyew, osiandɛ wokyiin asaase no nyinara do, na wɔsɛɛ hɔn dodow; nyew, wokunkum hɔn mu pii, na wɔfaa hɔn mu binom so ndɔmmum dze hɔn kɔr sar no do, nyew, nkanka hɔn mbaa nye hɔn mba.

34 Afei osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi na dɛm mbusu a ɔtse dɛm yi baa hɔn do, dze ekenyan hɔn ama wɔakaa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn.

35 Na dɛm na atsɛmbuafo no hɔn afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe biako no dze baa ewiei.

36 Na afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe ebien mu no, wɔhyɛɛ ase bio dɛ hɔn werɛ rifir Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn. Na afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe ebiasa mu no hɔn emumuyɛ kɔr do yɛɛ kɛse. Na afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe anan mu no so wɔannsakyer hɔn akwan.

37 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe enum no mu no hɔn ahantanyɛ nye hɔn emumuyɛ no yɛɛ kɛse na dɛm na ɔmaa wonyinii maa ɔsɛɛ.

38 Na afe eduowɔtwe enum baa ewiei.
hel 12:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nyimpa nnsi pi na wɔyɛ nkwaseadze na wɔnnkyɛr bɔn yɛ—Ewuradze tsẽa No nkorɔfo—Wɔdze adasamba a wɔnnsɛ hwee to Nyankopɔn no tum ho—Atsɛmbu da no nyimpa benya daapem nkwa anaa daapem afɔbu. Bɛyɛ mfe 6 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na dɛm na yebohu dza ɔnnyɛ nokwar, nye adasamba hɔn akoma a onnsi pi; nyew, yebotum ehu dɛ Ewuradze nam ne papayɛ kɛse a ɔmmbɔadze da no do hyira na ɔyɛ hɔn a wɔtwer no no prɔmprɔm.

2 Nyew, na yetum hu dɛ aber yi ara ɔreyɛ no dɔm prɔmprɔm, nyew, hɔn kwã, nye hɔn nguankuw na anantwikuw, nye sika na dwetɛ, nye ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo ahorow nyina rodɔr; ɔdze hɔn nkwa akyɛ hɔn, na ɔregye hɔn so fi hɔn atamfo nsa; ɔagow hɔn atamfo akoma amma wɔanndwen ɔkõ ho; nyew, sɛ yetwa no tsia a, ɔayɛ ndzɛmba a oye ama no nkorɔfo eenya ahomka; nyew, dɛm aber yi ara so mu na oepirim hɔn akoma ama hɔn werɛ eefir Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, na woetsiatsia Krɔnkrɔnnyi no do wɔ hɔn ananadze—nyew, wɔbɔ dɛm bra yi osian hɔn ahotɔ nye hɔn ahonyadze mbordo no ntsi.

3 Na dɛm na ɔma yehu dɛ sɛ Ewuradze ammfa amandzehu pii anntsẽa no dɔm, nyew, sɛ ɔammfa owu na hu, nye ɔkɔm, nye ɔyardɔm ahorow ammba hɔn do a nkyɛ wɔrennkaa no.

4 O hwɛ mbrɛ adasamba dua yɛ nkwaseadze, hwɛ mbrɛ wosi pɛ egyangyandze, hwɛ mbrɛ wosi pɛ emumuyɛ, hwɛ mbrɛ wosi pɛ mbɔnsamdze, hwɛ mbrɛ hɔn anan si yɛ har wɔ bɔn ne yɛ ho, na hwɛ mbrɛ wosi yɛ nyaa wɔ papayɛ ho; hwɛ mbrɛ wosi yɛ aso ma abɔnsam na wɔdze hɔn akoma dzi wiadze egyangyandze ekyir!

5 Nyew, hwɛ mbrɛ wodua mema hɔnho do wɔ ahantanyɛ mu ho; nyew, hwɛ mbrɛ wodua tuw hɔnho na wɔyɛ emumuyɛ horow; na hwɛ mbrɛ wodua yɛ nyaa dɛ wɔbɛkaa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, na woetsie n’afotusɛm, nyew, mbrɛ wodua yɛ nyaa dɛ wɔbɛnantsew nyansa akwan mu a!

6 Hwɛ, ne papayɛ kɛse na n’ehumbɔbɔr a ɔkyerɛ wɔ hɔn do nyina ekyir no, wɔmmpɛ dɛ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn a ɔbɔɔ hɔn no bɔhwɛ hɔn na oedzi hɔn do hen; wobu ne nsɛm egyangyandze, na wɔmmpɛ dɛ ɔbɛyɛ hɔn kwankyerɛnyi.

7 O adasamba nnsɛ hwee koraa; nyew, wɔnnsɛ asaase do huntuma mpo.

8 Na hwɛ asaase huntuma huw Nyankopɔn gu ha na ha ma nkyekyɛmu ba, sɛ hɛn kokoroko nye daapem Nyankopɔn no tsẽa mu a.

9 Nyew, hwɛ ne ndze ma akoko na mbepɔw ho popo na wɔwosow.

10 Na no tum ndze no ma hɔn mu paapaa na wɔyɛ tromtrom, nyew, wɔyɛ dɛ mbɔnsa mpo.

11 Nyew, no tum ndze no ma asaase nyina wosow;

12 Nyew, no tum ndze no ma ɔbotantsim ase hihim, kɔ ne finfinim mpo.

13 Nyew, sɛ ɔkã kyerɛ asaase dɛ—Tutu a—otutu.

14 Nyew, sɛ ɔkã kyerɛ asaase dɛ—Ɔwo twe kɔ ekyir, na ma ndɔnhwer dodow a ɔwɔ da no mu nwar a—ɔba mu.

15 Na mbrɛ n’asɛm tse no, asaase kɔ ekyir, na nyimpa dɛ ewia egyina fakor; nyew, na hwɛ, ɔtse dɛm, na nokwar asaase na okyin na nnyɛ ewia.

16 Na hwɛ, sɛ ɔkã kyerɛ esu a no mu dɔ yie so dɛ—Ɔwo wew a—ɔwew.

17 Hwɛ, sɛ ɔkã kyerɛ bepɔw dɛ—Ɔwo ma wo mu do kɔ sor na bra bɔhwe kurow kɛse yi do ma ɔmem nkɔ asaase tsir mu a—hwɛ ɔyɛ hɔ.

18 Na hwɛ, sɛ ɔdasanyi bi dze egudze sie asaase tsir mu, na sɛ Ewuradze kã dɛ—Ma mpaa nkã no, osian nyia ɔdze siei no no emumuyɛ ntsi a—hwɛ, mpaa bɛka no.

19 Na sɛ Ewuradze kã dɛ—Mpaa nkã wo, mma nyimpa biara nnhu wo fi dɛm aber yi na afebɔɔ a—hwɛ, ɔdasanyi biara ne nsa rennkã fi mber yi na afebɔɔ.

20 Na hwɛ, sɛ Ewuradze kã kyerɛ ɔdasanyi bi dɛ—Osian wo emumuyɛ ntsi mpaa nkã wo afebɔɔ a—ɔbɛyɛ hɔ.

21 Na sɛ Ewuradze kã dɛ—Osian wo emumuyɛ ntsi wobotwa wo efi m’enyim akyen a—ɔbɛma aba mu.

22 Na nyia a ɔbɛkã iyi akyerɛ no ndue, na dɛm na ɔbɛba nyia ɔbɛyɛ emumuyɛ do, na wɔrenngye no nkwa; dɛm ntsi, osian iyi ntsi na wɔada nnuho edzi akyerɛ, ama wɔaagye adasa nkwa.

23 Dɛm ntsi, nhyira akã hɔn a wobonu hɔnho na woetsie Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ne ndze; na dɛm nkorɔfo yi na wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa.

24 Na ma Nyankopɔn ndua no tumdzi kɛse no do, na ɔmma adasamba nya nnuho na wɔnyɛ ndwuma pa, ama wɔdze adom asan egu hɔn adom do, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse.

25 Na nkyɛ mebɛpɛ dɛ wɔbɛgye adasa nyina nkwa. Mbom yɛakenkan dɛ da kɛse a odzi ewiei no mu no, binom wɔ hɔ a wobotwa hɔn akyen, nyew, wobotwa hɔn efi Ewuradze n’enyim;

26 Nyew, wobegya hɔn akɔ tsebew a awerɛhow nnyi ewiei, na ɔhyɛ dɛm nsɛm yi mã dɛ: Hɔn a wɔayɛ papa no benya daapem nkwa; na hɔn a wɔayɛ bɔn no benya daapem afɔbu. Na dɛm na ɔtse. Amen.
hel 13:
Samuel, Lamannyi no no nkɔm a ɔdze hyɛɛ Nephifo no.

Ofitsi etsir 13 dze kesi 15.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Samuel, Lamannyi no hyɛ nkɔm dɛ sɛ Nephifo no ennu hɔnho a wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn—Ndom kã hɔn nye hɔn ahodze—Wɔpow nkɔnhyɛfo no na wosiw hɔn abo, mbɔnsam twa hɔnho hyia na hɔn enyi gye emumuyɛdze ho. Bɛyɛ mfe 6 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe esia no mu no, Nephifo no kɔr do tsenaa emumuyɛ mu, nyew, emumuyɛdze kɛse na wɔyɛe, wɔ aber a nna Lamanfo no esi nketse dɛ wobedzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do pɛpɛɛpɛr dɛ mbrɛ Moses mbra no tse.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe yi mu, Samuel bi a ɔyɛ Lamannyi baa Zarahemla asaase do, na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekã asɛmpa no kyerɛ nkorɔfo no. Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkãa nnuho ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no nda pii no, wɔpaam no, dɛm ntsi ɔyɛɛ dɛ nkyɛ ɔresan akɔ nankasa n’asaase do.

3 Mbom hwɛ, Ewuradze ne ndze baa no hɔ dɛ, ɔnsan bio, na dza ɔbɛba n’akoma mu biara no ɔnhyɛ ho nkɔm nkyerɛ nkorɔfo no.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔamma no kwan ma ɔannhɛn kurow no mu; dɛm ntsi ɔkɔree kɔfowee gyinaa fasu a ɔwɔ hɔ no do, na ɔtseen ne nsa na ɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu hyɛɛ hɔn nkɔm wɔ biribiara a Ewuradze dze hyɛɛ n’akoma mu no ho.

5 Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ emi Samuel, Lamannyi, merekã Ewuradze ne nsɛm a ɔdze ahyɛ m’akoma mu no akyerɛ hom; na hwɛ ɔdze ahyɛ m’akoma mu dɛ menkã nkyerɛ nkorɔfo yi dɛ pɛrpɛrdzi nkrantsee sensɛn hɔn do; na ansaana afe ahaanan botwa mu no nna pɛrpɛrdzi nkrantsee atɔ hɔn do.

6 Nyew, ɔsɛɛ a ɔyɛ dur rotweɔn nkorɔfo yi, na biribiara runntum nngye nkorɔfo yi gyedɛ wonya nnuho na gyedzi wɔ Ewuradze Jesus Christ mu, nyia ɔbɛba wiadze ebohu amandze wɔ ndzɛmba pii mu, na woboku no ama no nkorɔfo no.

7 Na hwɛ, Ewuradze no bɔfoe na ɔdaa no edzi kyerɛɛ me, na ɔdze enyigyesɛm abrɛ me kra. Na hwɛ, wɔasoma me dɛ membra mbɛkã nkyerɛ hom so, ama hom aatse enyigyesɛm; mbom hwɛ, hom mmpɛ dɛ hom gye me.

8 Dɛm ntsi, dɛm na Ewuradze se: Osian Nephifo hɔn akomadzen ntsi, gyedɛ wonu hɔnho annyɛ dɛm a wobeyi m’asɛm efi hɔn nkyɛn, na matwe mo Sunsum efi hɔn nkyɛn, na merennhaw moho wɔ hɔnho bio, na mebɛdan hɔn enuanom hɔn akoma etsia hɔn.

9 Na ansaana afe ahaanan botwa mu no nna mama wɔahwe hɔn; nyew, medze nkrantsee nye ɔkɔm nye ɔyardɔm bɛba abɛsera hɔn.

10 Nyew, medze ebufuw a ɔyɛ dzen bɛba abɛsera hɔn, na hom atamfo hɔn ebusuasantsen a otsĩa anan no na wɔbɛtsena ase na wɔahwɛ ɔsɛɛ kɛse a ɔbɛba hom do no; na dɛm besi gyedɛ hom nu homho, Ewuradze na ɔse; na ebusuasantsen no a otsia anan no na wɔdze hom ɔsɛɛ bɛba.

11 Mbom sɛ hom nu homho na hom san ba Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn nkyɛn a, mibeyi m’ebufuw efi hɔ, Ewuradze na ɔse; nyew, dɛm na Ewuradze se, nhyiranyi nye nyia onu noho na ɔsan ba me nkyɛn, na mbom nyia onnu noho ndue.

12 Nyew, Zarahemla kurow kɛse yi ndue; na hwɛ, osian hɔn a wɔyɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee ntsi na wɔagye no; nyew, kurow kɛse yi ndue, osiandɛ muhu, Ewuradze na ɔse, dɛ dodowara wɔ hɔ, nyew, kurow kɛse yi mu nkorɔfo dodowara na wobepirim hɔn akoma etsia me, Ewuradze na ɔse.

13 Mbom nhyiranyi nye hɔn a wobonu hɔnho, na hɔn na mebɛgye hɔn nkwa. Mbom hwɛ; sɛ nnyɛ atseneneefo a wɔwɔ kurow kɛse yi mu a, hwɛ, nkyɛ mebɛma ogya efi sor aba abɛsɛɛ no.

14 Mbom hwɛ, osian atseneneefo no ntsi na wɔdze noho akyɛ no. Na hwɛ, mber bɛba a, Ewuradze na ɔse, hom beyi atseneneefo no efi hom mu, aber no na hom benyin ama ɔsɛɛ; nyew, dɛm kurow kɛse yi ndue, osian emumuyɛdze nye ebusudze a ɔwɔ mu no ntsi.

15 Nyew, Gideon kurow ndue, osian emumuyɛdze nye ebusudze a ɔwɔ mu no ntsi.

16 Nyew, nkurow nyina a ɔwɔ asaase a abɔ ho aprɔw wondue, dza ɔyɛ Nephifo dze no, osian emumuyɛdze nye ebusudze a ɔwɔ mu no ntsi.

17 Na hwɛ, ndom bɛba asaase no do, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse, osian nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asaase no do no ntsi, nyew, osian hɔn emumuyɛdze nye hɔn ebusudze no ntsi.

18 Na ɔbɛba dɛ, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse, nyew, hɛn Nyame kɛse nokwafo no, obiara a ɔdze egudze besie asaase tsir mu no runnhu bio, osian ndom kɛse a wɔdze adom asaase no ntsi, gyedɛ onyia no yɛ ɔtseneneenyi na ɔdze sie ma Ewuradze.

19 Na mepɛ, Ewuradze na ɔse, dɛ wɔdze hɔn akoradze besie ama me; na ndom akã hɔn a wɔmmfa hɔn akoradze nnsie mma me; osiandɛ hɔn mu biara mmfa n’akoradze nnsie mma me, gyedɛ ɔtseneneenyi; na obiara a ɔmmfa n’akoradze nnsie mma me no, ndom akã no, nye akoradze no so, na obiara ne nsa rennkã osiandɛ wɔadom asaase no.

20 Na da bɛba a wɔdze hɔn akoradze besie, osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn akoma etsim ahonya do; na osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn akoma etsim hɔn ahonya do ntsi sɛ woruguan efi hɔn atamfo enyim a wɔdze hɔn akoradze bosuma; osiandɛ wɔremmfa nnsie mma me, ndom akã hɔn nye hɔn akoradze no so; na dɛm da no mu na wɔbɛhaw hɔn, Ewuradze na ɔse.

21 Hom nhwɛ, nkorɔfo a hom wɔ kurow kɛse yi mu, hom ntsie me nsɛm; nyew, hom ntsie nsɛm a Ewuradze akã; na hwɛ ɔse ɔadom hom osian hom ahonya ntsi, na ɔadom hom ahonya so, osiandɛ hom dze hom akoma etsim do, na hom enntsie nyia ɔdze maa hom no ne nsɛm.

22 Hom nnkaa Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn wɔ ndzɛmba a ɔdze ehyira hom no mu, na mbom aber nyina hom kaa hom ahonya, na hom nnda Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn ase wɔ ho; nyew, hom akoma nntwe mmbɛn Ewuradze na mbom ahantanyɛ kɛse ahyɛ no mã dze hom akɔ ntsɛn, ahomemado, enyiber, aperdzi, ahoɔyaw atseetsee nye ewudzi, nye emumuyɛ ahorow nyina ne yɛ mu.

23 Na dɛm ntsi na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn bɛma ndom aba asaase no do, na hom ahonya so do, na iyi osian hom emumuyɛ ntsi.

24 Nyew, dɛm nkorɔfo yi wondue, osian dɛm mber yi asõ, ma hom yi nkɔnhyɛfo edzi, na hom si hɔn atwetwe, na hom tow abo bɔ hɔn, na hom kum hɔn, na hom yɛ hɔn emumuyɛ ahorow nyina, dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛɛ no tsetseber do ara pɛr no.

25 Na afei hom kasa a, hom kã dɛ: Sɛ hɛn aber do nye hɛn tsetse egyanom aber do a, nkyɛ yennkum nkɔnhyɛfo no; na yennsiw hɔn abo, na yennyi hɔn edzi.

26 Hwɛ hom muo kyɛn hɔn koraa; na dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi, sɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi bi ba hom mu na ɔkã Ewuradze n’asɛm kyerɛ hom, dza ɔfa hom bɔn na hom emumuyɛ ho a, nna hom bo efuw no, na hom eyi no edzi, na hom dua akwan horow nyina do per dɛ hom bɛsɛɛ no; nyew, hom kã dɛ ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi torfo, na dɛ ɔyɛ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi, na ɔyɛ abɔnsam nyimpa, osiandɛ ɔagye hom ndzeyɛbɔn ho dase ntsi.

27 Mbom, hwɛ, sɛ nyimpa bi ba hom mu na ɔbɛkã dɛ: Hom nyɛ iyi, na emumuyɛ biara nnyi mu; hom nyɛ dɛm na hom runnhu amandze; nyew, ɔbɛkã dɛ: Hom ndzi hom akoma ne ntsɛnyɛ ekyir; nyew, hom nhwɛ dza hom enyi tua ho no ho nyɛ ntsɛn, na hom nyɛ adze biara a hom akoma pɛ—na sɛ nyimpa bi ba hom mu na ɔkã iyi a, hom bɛgye no, na hom akã dɛ ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi.

28 Nyew, hom bɛma no do wɔ sor na hom dze hom ahodze ama no; hom dze hom sika, na hom dwetɛ bɛma no, na hom dze atar a ɔsombo ahyɛ no; osiandɛ ɔkã ndaadaasɛm kyerɛ hom ntsi, na ɔse dɛ hom nyina ye, ntsi hom rinnya mfom biara wɔ no ho.

29 O hom emumuyɛfo ebusuasantsen a wɔaman afa homankasa hom kwan do; hom a asokyew na akɔnkye ahyɛ hom mã, hom susu dɛ Ewuradze benya hom ho abotar ekodu dabɛn? Nyew, hom begyaa homho ama akwankyerɛfo efurafo na nkwaseafo ekodu dabɛn? Nyew, hom bɛpɛ sum asen kan ekodu dabɛn?

30 Nyew, hwɛ, Ewuradze n’ebufuw aba hom do dada; hwɛ, osian hom emumuyɛ ntsi ɔadom asaase no.

31 Na hwɛ, mber bɛba a wɔbɔdom hom sika, ma no ho ayɛ tor, ma hom runntum nnsuo mu; na hom ahohia nda mu no hom nsa rennkã.

32 Na hom hia nda mu no, hom bosũ afrɛ Ewuradze; na hom sũ bɛyɛ kwa, osiandɛ ɔsɛɛ no enya aba hom do dada, na hom nsɛɛ no enya esi pi; na hom bosũ na hom atseatsea mu wɔ da no mu, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse. Na hom etwa kwadwom; na hom ase dɛ:

33 O nkyɛ munuu moho, na mennkunkum nkɔnhyɛfo no na mennsiw hɔn abo, na mennyi hɔn edzi. Nyew, da no mu hom bɛse dɛ: O nkyɛ yɛnkaa Ewuradze hɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ da a ɔdze hɛn ahonya maa hɛn no mu, nkyɛ ɔannyɛ tortor ma yɛannyew no; na hwɛ, hɛn sika efi hɛn nkyɛn kɔ.

34 Hwɛ, yɛdze edwindadze to ha ndɛ a, adze kyee na ayew; na hwɛ, da a yɛrohwehwɛ hɛn nkrantsee akɔ ɔkõ no nna wɔagye efi hɛn nsamu.

35 Nyew, sɛ yɛdze hɛn akoradze sie a nna wɔatserew efi hɛn nsa osiandɛ ɔadom asaase no.

36 O, kɛtseankyɛ yenuu hɛnho wɔ da no a Ewuradze n’asɛm baa hɛn nkyɛn no; na hwɛ ɔadom asaase no, ma ndzɛmba nyina ho ayɛ tortor, ma yenntum nnsuo mu.

37 Hwɛ, mbɔnsam etwa hɛnho ehyia, nyew, nyia oesi nketse dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ hɛn akra n’abɔfoe abɔ hɛnho aprɔw. Hwɛ, hɛn emumuyɛ ayɛ kɛse. O Ewuradze, ana innkotum adan w’ebufuw no efi hɛn do? Na dɛm bɛyɛ hom kasaa wɔ nda no mu.

38 Mbom hwɛ, hom nsɔhwɛber no kɔ; hom tutuu hom nkwagyeber no hyehyɛɛ da kesii dɛ ɔpaa homho daapem, na hom nsɛɛ enya esi pi; nyew, na hom dze hom nkwa nda nyina peree hwehwɛɛ dza hom runntum nnya; na hom hwehwɛɛ enyigye wɔ emumuyɛ ne nyɛe mu; dza ɔnye tsenenee su a ɔwɔ hɛn Onnyiewiei na Tsir kokoroko no mu bɔ ebira.

39 O nkorɔfo a hom wɔ asaase yi do, nkyɛ hom etsie me nsɛm! Na mobɔ mpaa dɛ Ewuradze n’ebufuw ndan mfi hom do, ama hom eenu homho ma wɔagye hom nkwa.
hel 14:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Samuel hyɛ nkɔm dɛ wɔ Christ n’awoo no anafua no bɛyɛ kan na woraba fofor bopue—Christ pon adasamba fi honam na sunsum mu owu mu—No wu ho nsɛnkyerɛdze no mu bi nye sum kebii ndaansa, mbotan mpaapaae, na nsakyer kɛse a ɔbɛba asaase do awerɛfir mu. Bɛyɛ mfe 6 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Samuel Lamannyi no hyɛɛ nkɔm akɛse pii a woenntum annkyerɛw.

2 Na hwɛ, ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, mema hom asɛnkyerɛdze; na mfe enum bio bɛba no, na hwɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba bɛba abɔpon hɔn a wɔbɛgye ne dzin edzi no.

3 Na hwɛ, iyi nye ne mbae ber mu asɛnkyerɛdze a medze rema hom; na hwɛ, kan kɛse bi bɛhyerɛn wimu na ansaana ɔbɛba no sum biara rennhyɛ dɛm anafua no araa ma aayɛ nyimpa dɛ gyama ɔyɛ adzekyee.

4 Dɛm ntsi, adzekyee na adzesaa na adzekyee bio bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛ da kor na adzesaa nnyi hɔ; na iyi na ɔbɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze dze ama hom; na hom bohu dɛ ewia epue na ɔakɔtɔ so; dɛm ntsi wobohu ampaara dɛ ɔyɛ nda ebien na adzesaa; naaso adzesaa no rennyɛ sum; na dɛm adzesaa no ekyir na wɔbɔwo no.

5 Na hwɛ, nworaba fofor bi bopue a hom nnhun ne saso da; na iyi so bɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama hom.

6 Na hwɛ, nnyɛ ne nyinara nye iyi, na asɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze pii bopue wimu.

7 Na ɔbɛba dɛ homho bɔbow hom, na ayɛ hom nwanwa araa ekesi dɛ hom bɔhwehwe famu.

8 Na ɔbɛba dɛ obiara a ɔbɛgye Nyankopɔn ne Ba no edzi no, obenya daapem nkwa.

9 Na hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze maa no bɔfoe bɛhyɛɛ me dɛ membra mebɛkã nkyerɛ hom; nyew ɔhyɛɛ me dɛ membɛhyɛ nkɔm wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho nkyerɛ hom; nyew, ɔsee me dɛ: Tsẽa mu kã kyerɛ nkorɔfo yi dɛ, hom nnu homho na hom nsiesie Ewuradze no kwan no mu.

10 Na hwɛ, osiandɛ meyɛ Lamannyi na makã nsɛm a Ewuradze ahyɛ me dɛ menkã, na osiandɛ otsia hom kɛse ntsi, hom bo efuw me na hom rohwehwɛ asɛɛ me, na hom eyi me edzi efi hom mu.

11 Na hom bɛtse me nsɛm, osiandɛ, iyi ho ntsi na mibegyinaa kurow yi n’afasu yi do, ama hom aatse na hom eehu Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu no a ɔrotweɔn hom osian hom emumuyɛ ntsi, na bio ama hom eehu nnuho ne ngyinado.

12 Na bio, ama hom eehu Jesus Christ, Nyankopɔn ne Ba no, sor nye asaase Egya, adze nyina Bɔadze fitsi ahyɛse no ne mbae; nye ne mbae ho asɛnkyerɛdze, ama hom aagye ne dzin no edzi.

13 Na sɛ hom gye ne dzin dzi a hom bonu homho wɔ hom bɔn nyina ho, na hom nam ne ndwuma pa do enya bɔnfakyɛ.

14 Na hwɛ, nsɛnkyerɛdze bio so a medze rema hom nye dza ɔfa no wu ho.

15 Na hwɛ, ɔsɛ dɛ owu ama nkwagye aaba; nyew, otwar dɛ ɔba no dɛm, naaso ohia dɛ owu, ama wusoɛr aaba, ama wɔnam dɛm kwan no do wɔdze adasa aaba Ewuradze enyim.

16 Nyew, hwɛ, dɛm owu yi na ɔdze owusoɛr bɛba, na ɔbɔpon adasamba nyina efi owu a odzi kan no mu—dɛm sunsum mu owu no a ɔwɔ hɔ ma adasamba nyina no, wɔnam Adam n’asehwe no do etwa hɔn efi Ewuradze enyim akyen, na iyi na wɔfa no dɛ ɔyɛ owu dze ma honam mu ndzɛmba na sunsum mu ndzɛmba so.

17 Mbom hwɛ, Christ no wusoɛr no bɔpon adasamba, nyew, adasamba nyina mpo, na ɔdze hɔn asan aba Ewuradze enyim.

18 Nyew, na ɔdze nnuho nhyehyɛɛ aba, dɛ obiara a obonu noho no, worunntwa no na wɔnntow no nnkyen ogya mu; na mbom obiara a onnu noho no wobotwa no na wɔatow no akyen ogya mu; na sunsum mu owu aba hɔn do bio, nyew, owu mprɛnu, na woetwa hɔn akyen bio dɛ ɔyɛ ndzɛmba a ɔfa tsenenee ho.

19 Dɛm ntsi hom nnu homho, hom nnu homho, na sɛ hom nyim dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina na sɛ hom annyɛ a, hom dze homho bɛba abɛhyɛ afɔbu ase, na wɔdze hom aba owu mprɛnu mu.

20 Mbom hwɛ, dɛ mbrɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ hom a ɔyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze kor so, dza ɔyɛ no wu ho asɛnkyerɛdze no, hwɛ, da no a obowu no ewia bɛhyɛ sum na ɔbɔpow dɛ ɔdze ne kan ma hom; bosoom nye nworaba so dɛmara; na kan remmba asaase yi enyi do, fitsi ber a obowu dze kesi nda ebiasa ntamu mpo, dze ekesi aber a ɔbɔsoɛr efi owu mu bio.

21 Nyew, aber a obegyaa no sunsum mu no, wimu bɔbobɔmu na enyinam atsetsew wɔ ndɔnhwer pii mu, na asaase bɔwosow na oehihim; na mbotan a ɔwɔ asaase enyi do, dza ɔwɔ asaase do nye n’ase nyina a hom nyim aber yi mu dɛ ɔyɛ dzen, anaa dɛ ɔyɛ botantsim kor bɛpaapaa;

22 Nyew, hɔn mu bɛpaapaa ebien, ebien, na ofi dɛm aber no rokɔ no wobohu hɔn esinesin na mpaapae, mpaapae wɔ asaase nyina enyi do, nyew, yebohu bi wɔ asaase n’enyi do na bi so wɔ asaase ase.

23 Na hwɛ, ehum akɛse botutu, na akoko pii botutu efi hɔ ma hɔn ananmu ayɛ dɛ mbɔnsa, na mbea pii a hɔ yɛ mbɔnsa aber yi mu no bɛyɛ akoko a ɔyɛ atsentsen ara yie.

24 Na akwan akɛse pii bɛpaapaa, na nkuropɔn pii adan amamfo.

25 Na nda pii do bobuebue, na woeyi hɔn ewufo ama; na ahotseweefo pii bɛda hɔnho edzi akyerɛ dodowara.

26 Na hwɛ, dɛm na ɔbɔfo no kãa kyerɛɛ me; na ɔsee me dɛ wimu bɔbobɔmu na enyinam atsetsew wɔ ndɔnhwer pii mu.

27 Na ɔsee me dɛ aber a wimu mbobɔmu nye enyinam nye ehum no ano bɔbɔ adze no na ndzɛmba yinom wɔ dɛ ɔba no, sum bɛkata asaase nyinara enyi do bɛyɛ nda ebiasa ntamu.

28 Na ɔbɔfo no see me dɛ, dodowara bohu ndzɛmba akɛse sen iyinom, ama wɔaagye edzi dɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze yinom besi asaase nyinara enyi do, ama woeehu dɛ siantsir biara nnyi hɔ dɛ adasamba bɛgye kyim.

29 Na iyi na ɔbɛma hɔn a wɔbɛgye edzi no wɔagye hɔn nkwa, na hɔn a wɔnnkɛgye edzi no atsɛmbu tsenenee aba hɔn do; na sɛ wobu hɔn fɔ so a nna hɔnankasa na wɔatwe afɔbu aba hɔn do.

30 Na afei, mo nuanom, hom nkaa, hom nkaa, dɛ hom mu biara a ɔbɔhwer no nkwa no, ɔhwer no ma noara noho; na hom mu biara so a ɔyɛ emumuyɛ no, ɔyɛ ma noara noho; na hwɛ, hom wɔ fahodzi; na ɔama hom kwan dɛ hom nyɛ dza hom pɛ; na hwɛ, Nyankopɔn ama hom nyimdzee na ɔama hom fahodzi so.

31 Ɔdze ama hom ama hom dze eehu dza oye efi bɔn ho, na ɔdze ama hom ama hom asan mu aafa nkwa anaa owu; na hom botum ayɛ dza oye na wɔdze hom asan aba dza oye ho, anaadɛ wɔdze dza oye bɛsan ama hom; anaadɛ hom botum ayɛ bɔn, na wɔdze dza ɔyɛ bɔn so asan ama hom.
hel 15:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ewuradze tsẽaa Nephifo osiandɛ Ɔdɔ hɔn—Lamanfo a wɔsakyeree no gyina pintsinn wɔ gyedzi mu—Ewuradze bohu Lamanfo mbɔbɔr wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu. Bɛyɛ mfe 6 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, m’enuanom adɔfo, hwɛ, meda no edzi kyerɛ hom dɛ gyedɛ hom nu homho annyɛ dɛm a hom efiefi bɛyɛ afõ.

2 Nyew, gyedɛ hom nu homho, annyɛ dɛm a hom mbaa bosũ kɛse ber a wɔrema hɔn mba enumfo wɔ dɛm da no mu; osiandɛ hom bɔbɔ mbɔdzen dɛ hom boguan na sumabew biara nnyi hɔ mma hom; nyew, na hɔn a wonyinsen wondue, osiandɛ hɔnho ayɛ hɔn dur ntsi worunntum nnguan; dɛm ntsi, wobetsiatsia hɔn do wɔ famu na woegya hɔn hɔ ma wɔahwer hɔn nkwa.

3 Nyew, nkorɔfo a wɔfrɛ hɔn Nephi no nkorɔfo no wondue, gyedɛ wonu hɔnho, ber a wobohu dɛm nsɛnkyerɛdze yi nyina nye anwanwadze a wobeyi akyerɛ hɔn no; na hwɛ, wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a Ewuradze asan mu eyi hɔn; nyew, Nephi no nkorɔfo no na Ewuradze dɔ hɔn, na ɔtsẽa hɔn so; nyew, hɔn emumuyɛ nda mu no ɔtsea hɔn osiandɛ ɔdɔ hɔn.

4 Mbom hwɛ m’enuanom, Lamanfo no na okyir hɔn osiandɛ wɔakɔ do ayɛ bɔn mber pii, osian hɔn egyanom hɔn amambra n’emumuyɛ ntsi. Mbom hwɛ, ɔnam Nyame ne nsɛm a Nephifo bɛkãa ntsi nkwagye aba hɔn nkyɛn; na iyi ho ntsi Ewuradze maa hɔn nda waree no.

5 Na mebɛpɛ dɛ hom bohu dɛ hɔn mu dodowara afa hɔn dwumadzi kwan do, na wɔnantsew yie wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim, na wɔpen dɛ wobedzi ne mbrasɛm na ne nhyehyɛɛ nye n’atsɛmbu do dɛ mbrɛ Moses ne mbra se.

6 Nyew, mese hom dɛ, hɔn mu dodowara na wɔreyɛ iyi, na wɔreper enyiberdo dɛ wɔbɔtwe hɔn enuanom a wɔaka no aba nokwar nyimdzee no ho; dɛm ntsi wɔtwe dodowara ma wɔbɛkã hɔn ho dabaa.

7 Na hwɛ, homankasa hom nyim, na hom gye ho dase dɛ hɔn mu dodowara na wɔatwe hɔn aba nokwar nyimdzee no ho, ma woehu hɔn egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ nye ekyiwadze amambra, na wɔama wɔagye kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no edzi, nyew, nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no hɔn nkɔnhyɛ, dza wɔakyerɛw a ɔgye hɔn ma wonya gyedzi wɔ Ewuradze mu, dze hɔn kɔ nnuho mu, gyedzi na nnuho a ɔma hɔn akoma mu nsakyer—

8 Dɛm ntsi, hɔn mu dodowara a wɔabɛkã ho yi, homankasa hom nyim dɛ wosi pi na wogyina pintsinn wɔ gyedzi mu, nye adze kor a ɔama woenya fahodzi no mu.

9 Na hom nyim so dɛ wɔdze hɔn ɔkõ ho akodze esie famu, na wosuro dɛ wobotu osiandɛ annyɛ a kwan biara do no wɔbɛyɛ bɔn; nyew, hom tum hu dɛ wosuro dɛ wɔbɛyɛ bɔn—na hwɛ wɔbɛpɛ dɛ wogyaa hɔnho ma hɔn atamfo ma wotsiatsia hɔn do wɔ famu na wokunkum hɔn, na wɔremma hɔn nkrantsee do nnkõ nntsia hɔn, na iyi tse dɛm osian hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ Christ mu ntsi.

10 Na afei, osiandɛ wogyina pintsinn ntsi sɛ wɔgye adze bi dzi a nna wɔagye edzi, na osiandɛ wosi pi ntsi ber a woenya ntsease yi, hwɛ, Ewuradze behyira hɔn na ɔato hɔn nda mu a ɔronnhwɛ hɔn emumuyɛ ho.

11 Nyew, sɛ wɔwodow wɔ gyedzi mu mpo a Ewuradze bɔto hɔn nda mu, ekesi dɛ mber no bɛba, dɛ mbrɛ hɛn egyanom na nkɔnhyɛnyi Zenos, nye wɔnkɔnhyɛfo pii so kãa faa hɛn nuanom Lamanfo dze hɔn bɛsananan mu aba nokwar nyimdzee no ho bio no—

12 Nyew, mese hom dɛ nda a odzi ekyir yi Ewuradze n’anohoba no asõ hɛn nuanom Lamanfo so do; na ɔmmfa ho dɛ wobohu amandze pii, na ɔmmfa ho so dɛ wɔbɛma woedzi akɔnaaba wɔ asaase enyi do, na woetsiw hɔn, na wɔahwe hɔn na wɔabɔ hɔn apetse a wonnya sumabew biara, Ewuradze bohu hɔn mbɔbɔr.

13 Na iyi besi dɛ mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛ no tse no, dɛ wɔdze hɔn bɛba nokwar nyimdzee no ho bio, dza ɔyɛ hɔn Pomfo, na hɔn guanhwɛfo kɛse nokwafo no ho nyimdzee no, na wɔbɛkan hɔn afora no nguan.

14 Dɛm ntsi mese hom dɛ, obeye ama hɔn asen hom, nna gyedɛ hom nu homho.

15 Na hwɛ, sɛ etumdze ndwuma a wɔayɛ akyerɛ hom yi, sɛ wɔyɛɛ kyerɛɛ hɔn, nyew, dze kyerɛɛ hɔn a osian hɔn egyanom hɔn amambra ntsi wɔwodowee wɔ gyedzi mu no a, nkyɛ homara hom bohu dɛ wɔronnwodow wɔ gyedzi mu bio ara da.

16 Dɛm ntsi, Ewuradze se: Merennsɛɛ hɔn korakora, mbom me nyansaa nda no mu no mebɛma wɔasan aba me nkyɛn bio, Ewuradze na ɔse.

17 Na afei hwɛ, ɔfa Nephifo no, Ewuradze na ɔse: Sɛ worunnu hɔnho, na wɔnnkɔ do nnyɛ me pɛ a, mebɛsɛɛ hɔn korakora, Ewuradze na ɔse, osian hɔn ekyingye ntsi, etumdze pii a mayɛ nyina mmfa hɔnho; na nokwar, dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyinara bɛyɛ hɔ, Ewuradze na ɔse.
hel 16:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi numa Nephifo a wɔgye Samuel dzi no—Nephifo no a wonnuu hɔnho no nntum mmfa hɔn egyen na abo nnku Samuel—Binom pirim hɔn akoma na binom so hu abɔfo—Ekyingyefo no se dɛ onnkehia dɛ wɔbɛgye Christ nye Ne Jerusalem mbaa no edzi. Bɛyɛ mfe 6–1 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.[/i]

1 Na afei, ɔbaa dɛ dodowara na wɔtsee Samuel, Lamannyi no, ne nsɛm no a ɔkãa wɔ afasu no do no. Na dodowara a wɔgyee n’asɛm no dzii no kɔree kɔhwehwɛɛ Nephi; na aber a wohun no no, wɔkãa hɔn bɔn kyerɛɛ no na wɔammfa ennsuma, na wɔpɛɛ dɛ wobonuma hɔn esu ama Ewuradze.

2 Mbom dodowara a wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔanngye Samuel ne nsɛm enndzi no, hɔn bo fuuw no; na wɔtotoow no abo wɔ afasu no do, na dodowara so totoow no egyen ber a ogyina afasu no do no; mbom nna Ewuradze no Sunsum kã no ho ma dɛm ntsi hɔn abo nye egyen no mu biara annka no.

3 Afei ber a wohun dɛ wonntum ntow mbɔ no no, hɔn mu dodowara a wɔwɔ hɔ no gyee ne nsɛm dzii, na wɔkɔr Nephi hɔ ama oeenuma hɔn.

4 Na hwɛ, nna Nephi runuma, na ɔrehyɛ nkɔm, na ɔrekã asɛmpa no, na ɔrekã nnuho ho asɛm kyerɛ nkorɔfo no, na ɔreyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze na anwanwadze kyerɛɛ hɔn, na ɔreyɛ etumdze wɔ nkorɔfo no mu, ama woeehu dɛ ɔnnkɛkyɛr na Christ aba—

5 Nna ɔrekã ndzɛmba a ɔnnkɛkyɛr na aba ho asɛm, ama woeehu na wɔakaa wɔ aber a ɔbɛba no ama woeehu dɛ ɔakã akyerɛ hɔn dada, na dɛm bɛma wɔagye edzi; dɛm ntsi dodowara a wɔgyee Samuel ne nsɛm dzii no kɔr no hɔ ama oeenuma hɔn, na wɔbaa dɛ woenu hɔnho na wɔkãa hɔn bɔn.

6 Mbom hɔn mu dodowara so anngye Samuel ne nsɛm no enndzi; dɛm ntsi ber a wohun dɛ hɔn abo nye hɔn egyen-menaba no nntum nnkã no no, wɔtseatseaa mu frɛɛ hɔn nsordaafo mpanyimfo no see dɛ: Hom mfa dɛm nyimpa yi na wɔnkyekyer no, osiandɛ ɔwɔ sunsum bɔn; na osian abɔnsam no tum a ɔwɔ no mu ntsi na hɛn abo nye hɔn egyen-menaba nntum nnkã no no; dɛm ntsi hom mfa no na wɔnkyekyer no na hom mfa no nkɔ.

7 Na aber a wɔkɔree dɛ wɔdze hɔn nsa rekɛkã no ara, nna hwɛ, ɔtoow noho san famu fii afasu no do, na oguanee fii hɔn asaase no do kɔr nankasa no kurow mu, na ɔhyɛɛ ase kãa nsɛmpa no na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ nankasa no nkorɔfo mu.

8 Na hwɛ, wɔanntse ne nkã bio wɔ Nephifo no mu; na dɛm na nkorɔfo no hɔn asetsena mu nsɛm tse.

9 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe esia wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do wɔ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei.

10 Na dɛm ara so na afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe esuon wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do no dze baa ewiei a dɔm no hɔn mu dodowara kɔr do tsenaa hɔn ntsɛnyɛ nye emumuyɛ mu, na hɔn mu kumaabi na wɔnantseew ahwɛyie mu wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim.

11 Na dɛmara so na asetsena bɛyɛɛ wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe awɔtwe no mu wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do.

12 Na mbom nsakyer kakraabi na ɔbaa nkorɔfo no hɔn asetsena mu, dza ɔbae ara nye dɛ nkorɔfo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ emumuyɛ kɛse, na wɔkɔr do yɛɛ dza ɔnye Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm bɔ ebira pii, wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do, wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduowɔtwe akron no mu.

13 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do no, woyii nsɛnkyerɛdze akɛse nye anwanwadze kyerɛɛ dɔm no; na nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn nsɛm no hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehyɛ mã.

14 Na abɔfo yii hɔnho kyerɛɛ nyimpa, enyansafo, na wɔdaa nsɛmpa a ɔyɛ dɛw kɛse no edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn; dɛm afe yi mu na kyerɛwsɛm no hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehyɛ mã.

15 Naaso iyi nyina ekyir no, nkorɔfo hyɛɛ ase piriim hɔn akoma. Hɔn nyina kɔree ma ɔkaa agyedzifo mapã no nko, Nephifo nye Lamanfo so, na wɔhyɛɛ ase tweer hɔnankasa hɔn ahoɔdzen nye hɔnankasa hɔn nyansaa na wɔsee dɛ:

16 Ndzɛmba bi wɔ hɔ a wɔbɔɔ hɔn tsirmu kãe na ɔbaa mu; mbom hwɛ, yenyim dɛ dɛm ndwuma akɛse na ɔyɛ nwanwa yi nyina a wɔakã ho nsɛm no orunntum nnsi.

17 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrodwen ho na wɔregye kyim wɔ hɔn mu se dɛ:

18 Onnkehia dɛ nyimpa a ɔtse dɛ Christ bi bɛba; sɛ dɛm so a, nna ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na Nyankopɔn ne Ba no, sor nye asaase Egya, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakã no, nnda noho edzi nnkyerɛ hɛn so dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛda noho edzi akyerɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no?

19 Nyew, ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔrennda noho edzi wɔ asaase yi do dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ wɔ Jerusalem asaase do no?

20 Mbom hwɛ, yenyim dɛ iyi yɛ emumuyɛ amambra a hɛn egyanom dze akyerɛkyerɛ hɛn, ama yɛaagye edzi dɛ anwanwadze kɛse bi bɛba, mbom nnyɛ hɛn mu, na mbom wɔ asaase bi a ɔwɔ ekyirekyir do, asaase bi a yennyim do; ama dɛm ntsi woeetum woefura hɛn adwen, osiandɛ yerunntum mmfa hɛn enyiwa nngye ho dase dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar ntsi.

21 Na wɔnam hɔn ndaadaa nye abɔnsam no ndwuma a ɔyɛ hu do, edzi dwuma akɛse a ɔyɛ hu a yerunntum nntse ase, dza ɔbɛbrɛ hɛn ase ma yɛabɛyɛ nkowaa ama hɔn nsɛm, na yɛayɛ nkowaa ama hɔnankasa so, osiandɛ hɔn na wɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɛn asɛm no; na dɛm na sɛ yegyaa hɛnho ma hɔn a wobofura hɛn adwen mu wɔ hɛn nkwa nda nyina mu.

22 Na ndzɛmba pii na nkorɔfo no susui wɔ hɔn akoma mu, dza ɔyɛ nkwaseadze nye egyangyandze; na wɔtseetsee pii, osiandɛ Satan nunuu hɔn ma wɔkɔr do yɛɛ emumuyɛ; nyew, okyinii dze dza ɔnnyɛ nokwar nye wentwiwentwi tahyee asaase n’enyi nyina do, ama oepirim nkorɔfo no hɔn akoma ma woeetsia dza oye na woeetsia dza ɔbɛba no.

23 Naaso nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze a wɔyɛe wɔ Ewuradze no nkorɔfo no mu nyinara ekyir no nye etumdze pii a wɔyɛɛ no; Satan nyaa kwan suoo nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asaase n’enyi nyinara do no hɔn akoma mu.

24 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron wɔ atsɛmbuafo no aber do wɔ Nephi no nkorɔfo do no dze baa ewiei.

25 Na dɛm na Helaman nwoma no a nankasa nye ne mbabanyin kyerɛwee no wɔdze baa ewiei.
3-ne 1:
[center][font_size=26]Nephi a Otsĩa Ebiasa[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Nephi Nwoma No Nephi ne Babanyin, Ɔno a Ɔyɛ Helaman ne Babanyin[/font_size][/center]

Na Helaman yɛ Helaman ne babanyin, ɔno a ɔyɛ Alma ne babanyin, a ɔyɛ Alma ne babanyin, nyia ɔyɛ Nephi n’asenyi no a ɔyɛ Lehi a ofii Jerusalem bae wɔ afe a odzi kan a nna Zedekiah dzi hen wɔ Judah no ne babanyin.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephi, Helaman ne babanyin no, fi asaase no do kɔ na ne babanyin Nephi dze nkyerɛwee no sie—Ɔwɔ mu dɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze sisi, eso emumuyɛfo no hyehyɛ dɛ woboku atseneneefo no—Anafua no a wɔbɔwo Christ wɔ mu no du—Woyi asɛnkyerɛdze kyerɛ na woraba fofor pue—Atorsɛm na ndaadaa kɔ do pii, na Gadianton n’edwotwafo no ku nyimpa pii. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 1–4.[/i]

1 Afei ɔbaa dɛ nna afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron biako ebotwa mu kɔ ma mber a Lehi dze fii Jerusalem no abɛyɛ mfe ahaesia; aber no na Lachoneus na ɔyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin nye ambrado wɔ asaase no do.

2 Na Nephi, Helaman ne ba no efi Zarahemla asaase no do na, ɔdze ayewa mprɛtse nye nkyerɛwee nyinara a wɔdze esie nye ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn nyinara a wɔdze esie fitsi ber a Lehi fii Jerusalem no, ahyɛ ne babanyin Nephi ne nsa, a ɔyɛ n’abakan no.

3 Afei ofii asaase no do kɔree, na beebi a ɔkɔree no, nyimpa biara nnyim; na ne ba Nephi dze kyerɛwsɛm no siei maa no, nyew, dɛm nkorɔfo yi ho nsɛm no.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron ebien n’ahyɛse no, hwɛ, nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn nkɔnhyɛ hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehyɛ mã; na nsɛnkyerɛdze akɛse nye etumdze akɛse hyɛɛ ase sisii nkorɔfo no mu.

5 Mbom nna binom wɔ hɔ a wɔahyɛ ase rekã dɛ nsɛm a Samuel, Lamannyi kãe dɛ ɔbɛba mu no ne ber apa ho.

6 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ woridzi ehurusi wɔ hɔn enuanom do rese dɛ: Hwɛ mber no apa ho, na Samuel ne nsɛm no ammba mu; dɛm ntsi, hom enyigye nye hom gyedzi a ɔwɔ dɛm nsɛm yi ho no ayɛ gyan.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔyɛɛ dede kɛsenara wɔ asaase no do; na dodowara a wɔgyee dzii no hɔn werɛ hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrohow papanara, dɛ annyɛ a dɛm ndzɛmba a wɔakã ho asɛm no remmba mu.

8 Mbom hwɛ, wosii nketse weɔnee wɔ dɛm da no nye dɛm anafua no na dɛm da kor bi no ɔyɛɛ dɛ gyama anafua bi nnyi hɔ, ama woeehu dɛ hɔn gyedzi annyɛ gyan.

9 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ekyingyefo no dze da bi sii hɔ dɛ sɛ asɛnkyerɛdze no a nkɔnhyɛnyi Samuel kãa no ammba mu a wobokuku hɔn a wɔgyee dɛm amambra yi dzii no.

10 Afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Nephi ne ba, Nephi hun no nkorɔfo no hɔn etsirmɔdzendze yi no, n’akoma dzii yaw mbordo.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkɔree na ɔdze noho kɔtoo famu, na osũu dzendzenndzen frɛɛ Nyankopɔn dze maa no nkorɔfo no, nyew, wɔ hɔn a worubokuku hɔn no ho, osian hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ hɔn egyanom hɔn amambra mu no ntsi.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ osũu dzendzenndzen frɛɛ Ewuradze da no nyina; na hwɛ, Ewuradze ne ndze baa ne nkyɛn see dɛ:

13 Ma wo tsir do na hyɛ dzen; na hwɛ, ber no abɛn, na anafua yi wɔbɛda asɛnkyerɛdze no edzi akyerɛ, na adzekyee no mebɛba wiadze yi mu abɛma wiadzemba ehu dɛ dza mama mo nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn dze hɔn ano akã nyina ahyɛ mã.

14 Hwɛ, mereba mankasa medze hɔ abɛma ndzɛmba nyina ahyɛ mã, dza mada no edzi akyerɛ adasamba fitsi wiadze ne fapem, na mabɛyɛ Egya nye Ɔba hɔn pɛ—Egya no osian emi ntsi, na Ɔba no osian mo honam ntsi. Na hwɛ, aber no abɛn, na anafua yi na wɔbɛda asɛnkyerɛdze no edzi akyerɛ.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ nsɛm a ɔbaa Nephi nkyɛn no hyɛɛ ma, dɛ mbrɛ wɔkãa no ara; na hwɛ, ber a wi kɔtɔree no nna sum nnyi hɔ; na ahobow hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekã dɔm no osiandɛ sum annhyɛ ber a adzesaa bae no.

16 Na dodowara wɔ hɔ a wɔanngye nkɔnhyɛfo no nsɛm no enndzi, na wɔhwehwee famu na wɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ woewuwu, osiandɛ wonyim dɛ ɔsɛɛ ho nhyehyɛɛ kɛse no a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ ama hɔn a wɔgyee nkɔnhyɛfo no nsɛm dzii no asɛɛ koraa; osiandɛ asɛnkyerɛdze no a wɔdze mae no reba mu.

17 Na wohun dɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba ne mbaa no abɛn; nyew, ne sin ara nye dɛ, nyimpa a wɔwɔ asaase n’enyi do, fitsi anee kɛpem boka, nye etsifi kɛpem anaafo nyina ho boow hɔn mbordo ma wɔhwehwee ase.

18 Na wonyim dɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no agye dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho dase mfe pii, na asɛnkyerɛdze no a wɔdze mae no reba mu; na wɔhyɛɛ ase suroi osian hɔn emumuyɛ nye hɔn ekyingye ntsi.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ sum annhyɛ anafua no nyina, mbom ɔyɛɛ kann dɛ ewiaber. Na ɔbaa dɛ adzekyee no ewia puee bio, dɛ mbrɛ opue dabaa no; na wohun dɛ dɛm da no nye da a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔwo Ewuradze, osian asɛnkyerɛdze a wɔdze ama no ntsi.

20 Na ndzɛmba nyina baa mu, nyew, biribiara, dɛ mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn nsɛm no se.

21 Na ɔbaa so dɛ nworaba fofor bi puei, dɛ mbrɛ asɛm no se.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ ofi dɛm aber yi dze kɔ no, Satan hyɛɛ ase dze ndaadaa bɛhyɛɛ dɔm no mu, ama woeepirim hɔn akoma, amma wɔanngye dɛm nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze a woehu no enndzi; mbom dɛm atorsɛm nye ndaadaa yi nyina ekyir no nkorɔfo no mu dodowara gyee dzii na wɔ sakyeree baa Ewuradze nkyɛn.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi kɔr nkorɔfo no mu konumaa hɔn kɔr nnuho mu, ma wonyaa bɔnfakyɛ pii. Na dɛm maa nkorɔfo no hyɛɛ ase bio dɛ worinya asomdwee wɔ asaase no do.

24 Na wentwiwentwi biara nnyi hɔ gyedɛ hɔn mu kakraabi a wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔnam kyerɛwsɛm no do rekã dɛ onnhia bio dɛ wobedzi Moses mbra do no. Afei woyinom fomee, na wɔanntse kyerɛwsɛm no ase yie.

25 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ annkyɛr na hɔn nyina nyaa nsakyer, na wohun mfom a nna wɔwɔ mu, osiandɛ wɔmaa wohun dɛ mbrasɛm no nnyaa nnhyɛɛ mã, na otwar dɛ ne nyina hyɛ mã; nyew, asɛm no baa hɔn nkyɛn dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ ɔhyɛ mã; nyew, no mu ketseketse kor anaadɛ nsensanee kor mpo nnkotwa mu kesi dɛ ne nyina bɛhyɛ mã; dɛm ntsi dɛm afe yi ara mu na wɔmaa wohun hɔn mfom ma dɛm ntsi wɔkãa hɔn mfom ho kyerɛɛ.

26 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron ebien no twaa mu kɔree, na ɔdze enyigyesɛm brɛɛ nkorɔfo no osian nsɛnkyerɛdze a nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn nyinara hyɛɛ ho nkɔm no a osisii no ntsi.

27 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron ebiasa so botwaa mu kɔree wɔ asomdwee mu, gyedɛ Gadianton edwotwafo no a wɔtsetse akoko do no nko, hɔn na wɔakɛhyehyɛ asaase no do; osiandɛ nna kwan a wɔafa do abɔ hɔn ho ban nye hɔn nsumaamu mbea no so yɛ dzen araa ma dɔm no nntum hɔn; dɛm ntsi ɔmaa wodzii ewu pii, na wokum nkorɔfo no mu pii.

28 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe eduokron anan mu no, wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrodɔr ara yie, osiandɛ Nephifo etuatsewfo no mu dodowara guanee kɛkãa hɔnho, iyi maa awerɛhow kɛsenara kãa Nephifo a wɔkaa asaase no do no.

29 Na awerɛhow kɛsenara so sii Lamanfo no mu; na hwɛ, wonyaa mba pii a wonyinii na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worudu ber a wobu hɔn ara hɔn amansin, na Zoramfo dze atordzi nye ndaadaa bɔtwee hɔn ma wɔkɔdɔɔm dɛm Gadianton edwotwafo no.

30 Na dɛm maa Lamanfo so hun amandze, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ hɔn gyedzi nye hɔn tseneneeyɛ rowodow, osian ebusuasantsen a wɔreba do no hɔn emumuyɛdze no ntsi.
3-ne 2:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Emumuyɛdze na ebusudze pii soɛr wɔ nkorɔfo no mu—Nephifo nye Lamanfo yɛ kor dze tsia Gadiaton edwotwafo no—Lamanfo a wɔasakyer hɔn no bɛyɛ fitaa na wɔfrɛ hɔn Nephifo. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 5–16.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛmara so na afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron enum so dze twaa mu kɔree, na dɔm no hyɛɛ ase dɛ hɔn werɛ rifir dɛm nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze no a wohunii no, na nkakrankakra sor asɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze hyɛɛ ase dɛ origyaa hɔn ahobow yɛ araa ma wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ woripirim hɔn akoma, na hɔn adwen rufura, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔregye kyim wɔ dza wɔtsee na wohunii nyinara ho—

2 Wosusuu ndzɛmba hun bi wɔ hɔn akoma mu, dɛ nyimpa na wɔdze abɔnsam no tum yɛe dze daadaa dɔm no ama wɔaatwe hɔn akɔ; na dɛm na Satan kɔr do yɛe dze nyaa dɔm no hɔn akoma bio, ɔyɛe araa dze furaa hɔn enyiwa ma wɔgyee dzii dɛ Christ ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛ nkwaseasɛm na adzehun.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɔm no hyɛɛ ase dɛ worimia hɔn ho ayɛ emumuyɛdze na wɔrobɔ mbusu; na wɔanngye enndzi dɛ wobeyi nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze bi so bio akyerɛ; na Satan kɔr do twee dɔm no akoma, daadaa hɔn ama wɔaayɛ emumuyɛdze akɛse wɔ asaase no do.

4 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron esia dze twaa mu kɔree; na afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron esuon no so dɛmara; na afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron awɔtwe so dɛmara; nye afe a ɔtɔ do eduokron akron no so;

5 Na mfe ɔha so botwaa mu kɔree fi Mosiah n’aber do, nyia nna odzi hen wɔ Nephifo do no.

6 Na mfe ahaesia nye akron na ebotwa mu kɔ fi ber a Lehi dze fii Jerusalem.

7 Na mfe akron na ebotwa mu kɔ fitsi aber a woyii asɛnkyerɛdze no kyerɛe, dza nna nkɔnhyɛfo no akã dɛ Christ bɛba wiadze yi mu no.

8 Afei, Nephifo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrekan hɔn da fi ber a woyii asɛnkyerɛdze no kyerɛe no, anaadɛ fitsi ber a Christ dze bae no; dɛm ntsi nna mfe akron ebotwa mu kɔ.

9 Na Nephi a ɔyɛ Nephi n’egya no, nyia nna kyerɛwsɛm no wɔ no hɔ no annsan n’ekyir ammba Zarahemla asaase no do bio, na woennhu no wɔ asaase nyina do.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɔm no daa ho tsenaa hɔn emumuyɛdze mu, ammfa hɔn ho koraa dɛ wɔkãa nsɛmpa na wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm pii wɔ hɔn mu; na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do du no so twaa mu kɔree; na afe a ɔtɔ do dubiako no so twaa mu kɔree wɔ emumuyɛ mu.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do duebiasa no mu no, akõkoekõ na wentwiwentwi hyɛɛ ase wɔ asaase no nyina do; osiandɛ nna Gadianton edwotwafo no adɔɔ sõ na wokum dɔm no hɔn mu pii, na wɔmaa nkurow pii mu tɔɔ pan, na wɔmaa ewuwuiwu nye enyinyandze pii sii wɔ asaase no do, ma okehiaa dɛ nyimpa nyinara, Nephifo nye Lamanfo nyinara, bɔmu fa akodze kõ tsia hɔn.

12 Dɛm ntsi, Lamanfo a woenu hɔnho, asakyer wɔ Ewuradze mu no dze hɔnho kɔbɔɔ hɔn nuanom Nephifo no ho, na osian hɔn nkwa nye hɔn mbaa nye hɔn mba so ntsi okehiaa dɛ wɔfa akodze na wɔkõ tsia Gadianton edwotwafo no; nyew, okehiaa dɛ wɔkõ hwehwɛ hɔn kyɛfa nye hɔn asɔr ne ndzinoa, hɔn fahodzi na ahotɔ.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ ansaana dɛm afe a ɔtɔ do duebiasa yi rutwa mu akɔ no nna Nephifo no hɔn ɔsɛɛ abɛn koraa ɔnam ɔko no ntsi, nna wɔayɛ dzendzenndzen.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔkaan Lamanfo no a wɔakɔdɔm Nephifo no foraa Nephifo no.

15 Na woyii hɔn ndom no fii hɔn do, na hɔn wer bɛyɛɛ fitaa dɛ Nephifo ara pɛr.

16 Na hɔn mbabanyin nye hɔn mbabaa no ho bɛyɛɛ fɛw mbordo, na wɔkaan hɔn foraa Nephifo na wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Nephifo. Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do duebiasa dze baa ewiei.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do duanan n’ahyɛse no, nna ɔkõ a ɔda edwotwafo no nye Nephi no nkorɔfo no ntamu no yɛɛ dzen mbordo; naaso Nephi no nkorɔfo no nsa daa edwotwafo no do ma wɔpaam hɔn fii hɔn nsaase no do ma wokoguu mbepɔw nye bea a wosuma hɔn ho wɔ no.

18 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do duanan no dze baa ewiei. Na mfe duenum no mu no, wotuu Nephi no nkorɔfo no do sa; na osian Nephi no nkorɔfo no hɔn emumuyɛdze na wentwiwentwi na etuatsew ntsi, Gadianton edwotwafo no nsa daa hɔn do.

19 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do duenum no dze baa ewiei; na dɛm na ɔmaa dɔm no kɔr amandzehu mu, na osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi ɔsɛɛ afõwa bɛsensɛɛn hɔn do araa ma nkyɛ orutwitwa hɔn egu famu.
3-ne 3:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Giddianhi, Gadianton ɔkandzifo no hwehwɛ dɛ Lachoneus na Nephifo no begyaa hɔnho nye hɔn nsaase mu ama—Lachoneus yɛ Gidgiddoni nsodaafo no hɔn ɔsahen—Nephifo no hyia Zarahemla na Dzifuu dɛ worobɔkõ dze abɔ hɔnho ban. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 16–18.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do duesia fitsi aber a Christ bae no, Lachoneus a ɔyɛ asaase no do ambrado no, ne nsa kãa krataa fii edwotwafo no hɔn panyin nye ambrado no hɔ; na dɛm nsɛm yi na ɔakyerɛw:

2 Lachoneus, ɔwo a eyɛ onyimnyamfo mapa nye asaase yi do ambrado panyin, hwɛ, merekyerɛw krataa yi dze abrɛ wo, dze ebeyi wo ayɛw osian wo pintsinnyɛ ntsi, na wo nkorɔfo so hɔn pinstinnyɛ na wɔbɔ hom kyɛfa nye hom ahotɔ ho ban; nyew, hom tum gyina pintsinn, tse dɛ mbrɛ nyame bi nsa kora hom do na ɔhwɛ hom ahotɔ, nye hom ahodze, nye hom man do, anaa biribi a hom bɛfrɛ no dɛm.

3 Na ɔyɛ me awerɛhow dɛ onyimnyamfo mapa a ɔtse dɛ ɔwo Lachoneus, ebɛyɛ ɔkwasea dɛm na esusu dɛ ibotum egyina mbarimba ahoɔdzemfo pii a wɔtse dɛm a wɔhyɛ mo tum ase enyim, hɔn a aber yi mu ara wokitsa hɔn akodze ayɛ krado rotweɔn m’anomusɛm dɛ—Hom nkɔ Nephifo do na hom nkɛsɛɛ hɔn.

4 Na emi, minyim mbrɛ hɔn sunsum ne dzen tse, masɔ hɔn ahwɛ wɔ akõ mu, na minyim daapem ɔtan a wɔdze tan hom osian ndzebɔn pii a hom dze ayɛ hɔn ntsi, dɛm ntsi sɛ ɔba dɛ wɔreba hom do a, wɔbɛsɛɛ hom koraa.

5 Dɛm ntsi makyerɛw krataa yi, na medze mankasa me nsa asɔw ano, modwen wo yieyɛ ho osian pintsinn a igyina dze ma dza egye dzi dɛ oye, nye nyimdzee sunsum a ewɔ no wɔ akõ mu ntsi.

6 Dɛm ntsi na merekyerɛw wo, na mepɛ dɛ igyaa wo nkurow, wo nsaase, nye w’ahodze mu ma mo nkorɔfo yi sen dɛ wɔdze mfõwa bɛba wo do ma ɔsɛɛ aba wo do.

7 Dza morohwehwɛ akã nye dɛ, hom ngyaa homho mma hɛn, na hom nye hɛn mbɛyɛ kor na hom mbohu hɛn nsumaamu ndwuma, na hom mbɛyɛ hɛn enuanom ama hom nye hɛn aayɛ kor—nnyɛ hɛn nkowaa, mbom hɛn enuanom na hom nye hɛn akyɛ hɛn ahonyadze.

8 Na hwɛ, mekã ntam kyerɛ wo dɛ, sɛ hom dzi nsew dze yɛ dɛm adze yi a, wɔrennsɛɛ hom; na mbom sɛ hom annyɛ dɛm a, mekã ntam dze dzi nsew kyerɛ hom dɛ ɔkyena bosoom a ɔreba no mu mebɛma mo nsordaafo aba hom do, na wɔremmfa homho nnkyɛ hom, mbom wobokuku hom, na wɔbɔtwe mfõwa egu hom do ekesi dɛ hom nyina hom ase bokrum koraa mpo.

9 Na hwɛ, emi nye Gaddianhi; na emi nye Gadianton nsumaamu fɛkuw no n’ambrado; na minyim dɛ dɛm fɛkuw yi na no mu dwumadzi nyinara ye; na wɔhyɛɛ ase tsetseberdo na wɔdze egya hɛn.

10 Na merekyerɛw krataa yi abrɛ ɔwo Lachoneus, na mowɔ enyidado dɛ ibegyaa wo nsaase nye w’ahodze nyina mu ama a bɔgyagu biara remmba mu, ama mo nkorɔfo yi nsa aakã hɔn ndzinoa wɔ hɔn aban mu, hɔn a wɔtseew etua fii hom mu osian hom emumuyɛdze a hom dze yɛɛ hɔn gyee hɔn kyɛfa na aban fii hɔn nsamu ntsi, na gyedɛ hom yɛ dza makã akyerɛ hom yi, sɛ annyɛ dɛm a, mebɛyɛ hom dɛm bɔn yi bi ahyɛ ananmu. Emi nye Giddianhi.

11 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Lachoneus ne nsa kãa krataa yi no, noho boow no kɛsenara, osian akokodur a Giddianhi enya ma ɔdze regye Nephifo asaase do ahodze, na mpuw a ɔdze rupuw dɔm no, na oridzi hɔn a wɔnnyɛɛ hɔn bɔn no ekyir na mbom hɔnara na wɔayɛ hɔnho bɔn dɛ wɔatsew etua efi hɔn mu akɔ dɛm emumuyɛfo na ebusufo edwotwafo no nkyɛn.

12 Afei hwɛ, Lachoneus yi a ɔyɛ ambrado yi, yɛ ɔbarimba bi a odzi pɛrpɛr ntsi edwotwanyi no mpuw no enntu n’akoma; dɛm ntsi ɔannkasa edwotwafo hɔn ambrado Giddianhi ne krataa no ho, mbom ɔkãa kyerɛɛ no nkorɔfo no dɛ wonsũ mfrɛ Ewuradze ma ɔmma hɔn ahoɔdzen wɔ mber a edwotwafo no bɛba hɔn do no.

13 Nyew, ɔmaa wɔbɔɔ dawur see dɔm no nyinara dɛ wɔmboaboa hɔn mbaa, nye hɔn mbabanyin, hɔn nguankuw nye hɔn anantwikuw, nye hɔn ndzɛmba nyina ano mfa ngu bea kor do gyedɛ asaase nko.

14 Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ wɔngye ban a no mu yɛ dzen papanara ntwa hɔnho nhyia. Na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ Nephifo nye Lamanfo no a wɔakan hɔn afora Nephifo no ho no nyi hɔn nsordaafo ma wɔmbɔ hɔn ho aprɔw, nyɛ hɔn anweɔnfo adzekyee nye adzesaa wɔ edwotwafo no ntsi.

15 Nyew, ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ: Dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi, gyedɛ hom nu homho fi hom emumuyɛ nyina ho, na hom sũ frɛ Ewuradze, annyɛ dɛm a wɔrenngye hom mmfi Gadianton edwotwafo no nsa.

16 Na Lachoneus ne nsɛm nye no nkɔnhyɛ no yɛɛ kɛse na nwanwa ara ma suro hyɛɛ dɔm no nyinara do; na iyi maa womiaa hɔnho yɛɛ dza Lachoneus see hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ no nyina.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lachoneus yii nsordaafo asahen ekunyin dze hɔn sisii Nephi nsordaafo nyina do, ama sɛ edwotwafo no fi sar no do ba hɔn do a wɔahwɛ hɔn do ma wɔnye hɔn akɔkõ.

18 Afei nsordaafo asahen ekunyin nyina hɔn mu ɔsahen panyin kese a woyii no na wɔmaa no tum kɛse wɔ Nephi nsordaafo do no ne dzin dze Gidgiddoni.

19 Afei ɔyɛ mbra wɔ Nephifo mu dɛ sordaanyi ɔsahen ekunyin biara a wobeyi no no, (gyedɛ hɔn emumuyɛ mber mu) yɛ obi a ɔwɔ nyikyerɛ sunsum na ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi so dɛm ntsi dɛm Gidgiddoni yi yɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi kɛse wɔ hɔn mu, nna noara kor yi ara so yɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo panyin.

20 Afei dɔm no see Gidgiddoni dɛ: Bɔ mpaa ma Ewuradze, na ma yɛnkɔ mbepɔw nye sar no do, na yɛnye edwotwafo no nkɔkõ na yɛnsɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn nsaase do.

21 Mbom Gidgiddoni see hɔn dɛ: Ewuradze mpa ngu; osiandɛ sɛ yɛkɔ hɔ nye hɔn kɔkõ a Ewuradze beyi hɛn ahyɛ hɔn nsa; dɛm ntsi yebesiesie hɛnho wɔ hɛnankasa hɛn nsaase finimfin; na yɛaboaboa hɛn nsordaafo nyina ano, na yɛronnkɔ nye hɔn nnkɔkõ, mbom yɛbɔtweɔn ekesi dɛ hɔnankasa bɛba hɛn do; dɛm ntsi dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi, sɛ yɛyɛ dɛm a ɔdze hɔn bɛhyɛ hɛn nsa.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do duesuon dze rokɔ n’ewiei no, nna Lachoneus ne dawurbɔ no ekodu asaase nyina enyi do, ma wɔasosõ hɔn mpɔnkɔ, nye hɔn atseaseanam, nye hɔn anantwi, nye hɔn nguankuw nyina, nye hɔn anantwikuw, nye hɔn eburow, nye hɔn ndzɛmba nyina, na wɔnam hɔn mpempem nye ɔpedu ɔpedu do, kesii dɛ hɔn nyinara kɔr bea a wɔakyerɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔboa hɔn ano wɔ hɔ mfa mbɔ hɔnho ban mfi hɔn atamfo nsa no.

23 Na bea a woyii no nye Zarahemla asaase do nye Dzifuu asaase do, nyew, nye asaase tseabaa bi a ɔda Dzifuu asaase nye Amamfo asaase ntamu no.

24 Na nkorɔfo a wɔfrɛ hɔn Nephifo no, dɔm mpempem na wɔkɔboaa hɔn ano wɔ dɛm asaase yi do. Afei Lachoneus maa wɔboaa hɔn ano wɔ asaase a ɔda po mu afamu no do osian ndom kɛse a ɔwɔ asaase a ɔwɔ etsifi afamu no do ntsi.

25 Na wɔgyee ban dze bɔɔ hɔnho aprɔw osian hɔn atamfo ntsi. Na wɔtsenaa asaase kor do, na wɔkãa hɔnho bɔɔ mu bɛyɛɛ fɛkuw kor, na wonyaa suro wɔ nsɛm a Lachoneus kãa no ho araa ma wonuu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn nyina ho; na wɔbɔɔ mpaa maa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, ama sɛ hɔn atamfo ba hɔn do dɛ wɔnye hɔn robɔkõ a ɔagye hɔn efi hɔn nsa.

26 Na wodzii awerɛhow mbordo osian hɔn atamfo ntsi. Na Gidgiddoni maa wɔyɛɛ ɔkõ ho akodze biara bi, na akotar, nye kokyɛm, nye akata enyim, wɔ dza ɔkyerɛɛ hɔn no no su do ma wɔayɛ dzen.
3-ne 4:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephifo nsordaafo dzi Gadianton edwotwafo no do konyim—Woku Giddianhi, nye n’abadziekyir, Zemnarihah a, wɔsɛn no—Nephifo yi Ewuradze ayɛw wɔ hɔn konyimdzi ntsi. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 19–22.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔdze rokɔ afe a ɔtɔ do duawɔtwe n’ewiei no nna edwotwafo hɔn nsordaafo no siesiee hɔnho dɛ wɔrobɔkõ, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worifi akoko nye mbepɔw nye sar no do, nye hɔn nsumabea no do risian ase, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrefa nsaase a ɔwɔ po mu afamu nye nsaase a ɔda etsifi afamu nye mbea a Nephifo no adan egya no nye nkuropɔn a woegya no afõ no.

2 Mbom hwɛ, mbowa abɔyafo anaa mbowa a wodzi biara nnyi nsaase no a Nephifo no fii do kɔree no do, na mbowa biara nnyi hɔ dze ma edwotwafo no, gyedɛ sar no do.

3 Na edwotwafo no enntum anntsena hɔ, gyedɛ wɔkɔ sar no do kɔhwehwɛ edziban; osiandɛ Nephifo no gyaa hɔn nsaase no too hɔ pan, na wɔafa hɔn nguankuw nye hɔn anantwikuw, nye hɔn ndzɛmba nyina, na wɔabɛyɛ nyimpa kor.

4 Dɛm ntsi, edwotwafo no ennya biribiara ammbɔ epoo, na woennya edziban so wɔ hɔ ammfa, ntsi na dza ɔwɔ hɔ ara nye dɛ wɔba na wɔnye Nephifo no bɔkõ; na ɔnam dɛ Nephifo no nyina ayɛ kor, ma hɔn dodow ayɛ kɛse, na woesie edziban, nye mpɔnkɔ na anantwi, nye nyɛmbowa ahorow nyina ama hɔnho a ɔbɔboa hɔn bɛyɛ mfe esuon ntamu ntsi wonyaa enyidado dɛ dɛm aber yi nna wɔasɛɛ edwotwafo no efi asaase no enyido; na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do duawɔtwe no dze twaa mu kɔree.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do duakron no mu no, Giddianhi hun dɛ ohia dɛ ɔkɔ nye Nephifo no kɔ kõ, osiandɛ kwan biara nnyi hɔ a wɔbɛfa do dze edzidzi, gyedɛ wɔbɔ epoo na wotwa edwoo na wodzi ewu.

6 Na worunntum so mmpetse asaase n’enyi do dɛ worubodua ewifua, bɛyɛ na Nephifo no aba hɔn do ebokuku hɔn; dɛm ntsi Giddianhi hyɛɛ no nsordaafo no mbra dɛ wɔnye Nephifo no nkɔkõ.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔbae na wɔnye hɔn bɔkõe; na iyi sii wɔ bosoom a otsĩa esia no mu; na hwɛ, da no a wɔbaa dɛ wɔnye hɔn robɔkõ no yɛɛ da a ɔyɛɛ hu papanara; na hɔn afadze a wɔfae no yɛ edwotwafo afadze; wɔdze nguannwoma bɔɔ hɔn asen, na wɔdze bɔgya ayɛ ho, na woyii hɔn tsir do nhwi nyina, na wɔdze dadzekyɛw hyehyɛɛ hɔn tsir; na osian akodze nye bɔgya a Giddianhi no nsordaafo no dze ayɛ ho no ntsi, ɔmaa hɔnho yɛɛ hu ara yie.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Nephifo nsordaafo no hun Giddianhi no nsordaafo hɔn afadze no, wotwae hwee famu na wosũi frɛɛ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, dɛ ɔngye hɔn mfi hɔn atamfo nsamu.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Giddianhi no nsordaafo hun dɛm no, wɔhyɛɛ ase dze ndze kɛse tseatseaa mu enyigye mu, osiandɛ wɔdween dɛ hɔn nsordaafo no ho suro ntsi na Nephifo no ahwehwe famu no.

10 Mbom iyi bɛyɛɛ awerɛhosɛm maa hɔn, osiandɛ Nephifo no ennsuro hɔn; mbom wosuroo hɔn Nyankopɔn ntsi na wosũi frɛɛ no dɛ ɔmbɔ hɔn ho ban; dɛm ntsi, ber a Giddianhi no nsordaafo no tui hyɛɛ hɔn do no nna woesiesie hɔnho rotweɔn hɔn; nyew, Ewuradze n’ahoɔdzen mu na wohyiaa hɔn kwan.

11 Na ɔkõ no hyɛɛ ase wɔ bosoom esia no mu; na ɔyɛɛ ɔkõ kɛse a ɔyɛ hu so, nyew, na ekukuuku a osii hɔ no yɛ hu na ɔdɔɔ sõ ara yie, dɛm ekukuuku yi ne saso nnsii dɔm no mu pɛn fitsi ber a Lehi dze fii Jerusalem no.

12 Na Giddianhi no mpuw nye ne nsew a odzii no nyina ekyir no, hwɛ, Nephifo no hwee hɔn araa ma woguanee fii hɔ kɔr hɔn ekyir.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ Gidgiddoni hyɛɛ no nsordaafo no dɛ wontsiw hɔn araa nkodu sar no ano noho, na mma wɔmmfa obiara a hɔn nsa bɛkã no wɔ kwan mu noho nnkyɛ no; dɛm ntsi wotsiiw hɔn na wokunkum hɔn araa dze kodur sar no ano, kesii dɛ mbrasɛm a Gidgoddoni dze maa hɔn no mpo hyɛɛ mã.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ Giddianhi a ogyinaa kõo akokodur mu, ruguan no wotsiiw no; na osiandɛ ɔkõo dodow ntsi nna ɔatɔ bahaw na iyi maa nsa kãa no na wokum no. Na dɛm na Giddianhi odwotwanyi no n’ewiei baa.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo hɔn nsordaafo no saan hɔn ekyir kɔr hɔn banbɔbea hɔ. Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe a ɔtɔ do duakron yi twaa mu kɔree, na edwotwafo no ammba nye hɔn ammbɔkõ bio, na wɔammba bio wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduonu no so mu.

16 Na afe a ɔtɔ do eduonu biako no mu no so wɔammba nye hɔn ammbɔkõ, mbom wɔbaa botwaa Nephi no dɔm no ho hyiae wɔ afã na afã nyina bɔɔ hɔn ntua; na wosusuu dɛ sɛ wotwa Nephi no dɔm no ho hyia, na wosiw hɔn kwan fi hɔn asaase do, na wosiw hɔn akwan nyina ma wonnya mpue kwan ndzinoa a, wobegyaa hɔnho mu ama hɔn dɛ mbrɛ wɔrohwehwɛ no ara.

17 Afei woyii obi a ne dzin dze Zemnarihah ma ɔbɛyɛɛ hɔn panyin; na dɛm Zemnarihah yi na ɔmaa ntuabɔ yi baa do no.

18 Mbom hwɛ, dɛm mpo boaa Nephifo no; osiandɛ ɔyɛɛ dzen maa edwotwafo no dɛ wobotum abɔ ntua akyɛr ma ahaw Nephifo no, osian edziban pii a nna wɔdze esie hɔnho ntsi.
