19 Na edwotwafo no dze hɔn edziban no suar dodow; na hwɛ, wonnyi hwee kã nam nko a wonya fi sar no do dzi no ho.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ hamu mbowa so ho bɛyɛɛ na wɔ sar no do hɔnho yɛɛ na araa ma ɔkɔm hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehyew edwotwafo no.

21 Na Nephifo no fii edzi adzekyee nye adzesaa biara bɛkyɛɛ guu hɔn nsordaafo no do kum hɔn wɔ mpempem nye ɔpedu ɔpedu mu.

22 Na dɛm maa Zemnarihah no nkorɔfo no nyaa pɛ dɛ wɔbɛsan hɔn ekyir akɔ, osian ɔsɛɛ kɛse a ɔbaa hɔn do adzekyee nye adzesaa no ntsi.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ Zemnarihah hyɛɛ no nkorɔfo no dɛ wɔntwe hɔnho mfi ntuabɔ no mu na wɔnkɔ asaase a ɔda etsifi afamu ekyirekyir no ho.

24 Na afei, nna Gidgiddoni ehu hɔn nhyehyɛɛ no, na onyim dɛ wɔayɛ mberɛw osiandɛ wonnyi edziban, na woekum hɔn mu pii so, dɛm ntsi ɔsomaa no nsordaafo adzesaaber no ma wokotwaa hɔn kwan kedzii hɔn enyim, na ɔdze no nsordaafo no bi so dzii hɔn ekyir.

25 Na wɔyɛɛ iyi wɔ adzesaaber, ma wokedzii edwotwafo no enyim, dɛm ntsi adze kyee ma edwotwafo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrokɔ no wohun Nephifo nsordaafo no wɔ hɔn enyim nye hɔn ekyir nyina.

26 Na wosii edwotwafo a wɔwɔ anaafo afamu no so wotwaa hɔn fii mbea a nna wɔresan hɔn ekyir. Na dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina Gidgiddoni na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn ma wɔyɛe.

27 Na hɔn mu mpempem na wogyaa hɔnho mu maa Nephifo dɛ wɔmfa hɔn ndɔmmum, na hɔn a wɔkae no dze wokum hɔn.

28 Na wɔfaa hɔn panyin Zemnarihah na wɔsɛɛn no wɔ dua do, nyew, ɔsɛɛn sor hɔ mpo kesii dɛ owui. Na ber a ɔsɛɛn hɔ kesii dɛ owui no, wotwaa dua no too famu, na wɔdze ndze kɛse tsẽaa mu see dɛ:

29 Ewuradze nkora no dɔm do wɔ tsenenee nye akoma krɔnkrɔn mu, ama hɔn a wɔwɔ tum nye hɔn a wɔwɔ nsumaamu fɛkuw mu nyinara a wɔbɛper ahwehwɛ ekuku hɔn no aahwe ase dɛ mbrɛ ɔbarimba yi ahwe ase yi.

30 Na wodzii ehurusi na wɔdze ndze kor tseaa mu bio see dɛ: Abraham ne Nyankopɔn, nye Isaac ne Nyankopɔn, nye Jacob ne Nyankopɔn no mbɔ dɔm yi ho ban wɔ tsenenee mu mber dodow biara a wɔbɔbɔ hɔn Nyankopɔn ne dzin aserɛ dɛ ɔmbɔ hɔn ho ban no.

31 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn nyina bɔɔ mu kor maa hɔn ndze do toow ndwom na woyii hɔn Nyankopɔn ayɛw wɔ adze kɛse a ɔayɛ ama hɔn, dɛ ɔawowaw hɔn ma hɔn atamfo nsa annkã hɔn.

32 Nyew, wɔtseatseaa mu see dɛ: Hosanna nkã Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn. Na wɔtseatseaa mu see dɛ: Nhyira nkã Ewuradze Nyankopɔn Tumfo, Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn no.

33 Na enyigye hyɛɛ hɔn akoma mã, ma wosũi, osian Nyankopɔn ne papayɛ kɛse no ntsi, dɛ ɔagye hɔn efi hɔn atamfo nsa; na wonyim dɛ osian hɔn nnuho nye hɔn ahobrɛadze ntsi na ɔama wɔagye hɔn efi ɔsɛɛ a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem mu no.
3-ne 5:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephifo no nu hɔnho na woyi hɔn bɔn akwa—Mormon kyerɛw no nkorɔfo no ho abakɔsɛm na ɔbɔ daapem asɛm no ho dawur kyerɛ hɔn—Wɔbɛkã Israel mba a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse mber pii no aboa ano. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 22–26.[/i]

1 Na afei hwɛ, ɔkra tseasefo biara nnyi Nephifo no mu a ɔgyee kyim ketseketse mpo wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no hɔn nsɛm a wɔkãe no ho; na wonyim dɛ ɔwɔ so dɛ ɔhyɛ mã.

2 Na wonyim dɛ oye dɛ Christ aba, na osian nsɛnkyerɛdze pii a woeyi akyerɛ a ɔfa no mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛfo hɔn nsɛm tse nye ndzɛmba a etwa mu kɔ dada ntsi wonyim dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ ndzɛmba nyina ba mu dɛ mbrɛ wɔakã ho nsɛm no.

3 Dɛm ntsi wogyaa hɔn bɔn nye hɔn ebusudze, nye hɔn ndwamambɔ nyina yɛ, na wɔdze hɔn ahoɔdzen nyina soom Nyame adzekyee nye adzesaa.

4 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔfaa edwotwafo no nyina adaduafo no, hɔn a wɔaka no so mu biara emmfi nsa a woennku no, na wɔdze hɔn adaduafo no guu efiadze, na wɔmaa wɔkãa Nyankopɔn n’asɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn; na dodow a wonuu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn ho na wodzii ahyɛmu dɛ worinndzi ewu bio no, wogyaa hɔn ma wonyaa ahotɔ.

5 Mbom hɔn mu dodowara a wɔwɔ hɔ a woenndzi ahyɛmu no, na wohun dɛ ewudzisɛm da ho suma hɔn akoma mu, nyew, dodowara a wohun hɔn dɛ worupuw hɔn nuanom no, wobuu hɔn fɔ na wɔtwee hɔn aso dɛ mbrɛ mbra no se.

6 Na dɛm maa wɔdze dɛm emumuyɛdze nye nsumaamu fɛkuwbɔ no a ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ emumuyɛdze na wodzii ewu pii no baa ewiei.

7 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduonu ebien dze bɛsenee na afe a ɔtɔ do eduonu ebiasa so dɛmara, na afe a ɔtɔ do eduonu anan, nye eduonu enum so dɛmara na ɔbɛsenee.

8 Na ndzɛmba pii sisii a ɔyɛ akɛse na ɔyɛ nwanwa so wɔ binom enyido; naaso woenntum annkyerɛw ne nyina wɔ nwoma yi mu, nyew, dza wɔyɛɛ wɔ dɛm dɔm yi mu wɔ mfe eduonu enum ntamu no, sɛ wɔkyɛ mu ɔha a no mu kor mpo ronnkɔ nwoma yi mu.

9 Mbom hwɛ nwoma bi wɔ hɔ a wɔakyerɛw dɛm ndzɛmba yi a ɔfa dɔm yi ho wɔ mu; Nephi akyerɛw dza oesi a ɔyɛ nokwar no nyina na mbom oetwitwa no ntsiantsia.

10 Dɛm ntsi makyerɛw dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina dɛ mbrɛ Nephi ne kyerɛwsɛm no tse, dza nna woekrukye wɔ mprɛtse a wɔfrɛ no Nephi mprɛtse no do no.

11 Na hwɛ, merekyerɛw abakɔsɛm no wɔ mprɛtse a medze mankasa me nsa yɛɛ yi do.

12 Na hwɛ, wɔfrɛ me Mormon, asaase Mormon dzin no nna wɔdze frɛ me, asaase no a Alma kyekyeer asɔr wɔ do dze maa dɔm no, nyew, asɔr a odzi kan a wɔkyekyeree wɔ hɔn mu wɔ hɔn mbrato ekyir no.

13 Hwɛ, meyɛ Jesus Christ, Nyankopɔn ne Ba no no suanyi. Ɔafrɛ me dɛ menda n’asɛm no edzi wɔ no nkorɔfo mu, ama woeenya daapem nkwa.

14 Na oye dɛ emi, dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn ne pɛ tse no, mebɛma hɔn a woewu kɔ no, hɔn a nna wɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no, hɔn mpaabɔ a wɔnam gyedzi do bɔe dɛ wɔnkyerɛw ndzɛmba a obesi nyina nto hɔ no ahyɛ mã—

15 Nyew, wɔnkyerɛw biribi kakra a ɔfa ndzɛmba a esisi fitsi ber a Lehi fii Jerusalem bae no dze besi ndɛ.

16 Dɛm ntsi, merekyerɛw efi abakɔsɛm a hɔn a woedzi m’enyim kan kɔ no akyerɛw ato hɔ dze kesi da a mo so me mber hyɛɛ ase no.

17 Na hwɛ merekyerɛw ndzɛmba a mankasa medze m’enyiwa ehu.

18 Na minyim dɛ nsɛm a merekyerɛw yi si pi na ɔyɛ nokwar so; naaso ndzɛmba pii wɔ hɔ a, dɛ mbrɛ hɛn kasaa tse no ntsi, yerunntum nnkyerɛw.

19 Na afei medze me nsɛm aba ewiei; dza ɔfa mankasa moho no, na afei merebɛkã dza ɔfa ndzɛmba a osii ansaana wɔrowo me.

20 Emi nye Mormon, meyɛ Lehi n’asenyi mapã. Na mowɔ siantsir a ɔsɛ dɛ motonton me Nyame nye m’Agyenkwa Jesus Christ, dɛ ɔno na oyii hɛn egyanom fii Jerusalem asaase do bae, (na obiara nnyim gyedɛ ɔnoara nko nye hɔn a oyii hɔn fii asaase no do bae no) na dɛ ɔama emi nye mo nkorɔfo dɛm nyimdzee a ɔfa hɛn akra no nkwagye ho.

21 Nokwar, oehyira Jacob ne fifo, na oehu Joseph n’asefo mbɔbɔr.

22 Na mber dodow biara a Lehi ne mba no dzii ne mbrasɛm do no, ohyiraa hɔn na ɔyɛɛ hɔn prɔmprɔm dɛ mbrɛ n’asɛm se.

23 Nyew, na nokwar ɔdze Joseph n’asefo nkaa bɛba bio ma woeebenya Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn noho nyimdzee.

24 Na nokwar dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi, ɔbɛtase Jacob n’asefo a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse wɔ asaase nyina enyi do no efi asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyina aboa ano.

25 Na dɛ mbrɛ ɔnye Jacob ne fifo dzii ahyɛmu no, dɛmara so mpo na ahyɛmu a ɔnye Jacob n’asefo edzi no bɛhyɛ mã wɔ nankasa ne ber mu, ama Jacob fifo do asan eenya ahyɛmu a ɔnye hɔn dzii no ho nyimdzee.

26 Na nkyii wobohu hɔn Pomfo no a ɔyɛ Jesus Christ, Nyankopɔn ne Ba no; na nkyii wɔbɛtase hɔn efi asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyina aboa ano wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do, bea a wɔwɔ ma wɔabɔ hɔn apetse no; nyew, dɛ Ewuradze tse ase yi ɔbɛyɛ hɔ. Amen.
3-ne 6:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephifo no yɛ prɔmprɔm—Ahantan, ahonya na nyimpa mu nyiyimu soɛr—Etuatsew paapaa Asɔr no mu—Satan dzi nkorɔfo no enyim ma wɔtsew etua wɔ bagua mu—Nkɔnhyɛfo pii kã nnuho ho asɛm na woku hɔn—Hɔn ewudzifo no yɛ kor dɛ wobotu aban no egu. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 26–30.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no nyina saan hɔn ekyir kɔr hɔnankasa hɔn nsaase do wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduonu esia no mu, ɔbarimba biara nye n’ebusua, ne nguankuw nye ne anantwikuw, ne mpɔnkɔ nye n’anantwi nye biribiara a ɔyɛ hɔndze.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ nna wonndzii hɔn edziban nyina, dɛm ntsi wɔfaa dza woenndzi no nyina, hɔn nduaba ahorow nyina, nye hɔn sika, nye hɔn dwetɛ, nye hɔn ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo nyina, na wɔsaan hɔn ekyir dze hɔn ahonyadze kɔr hɔnankasa hɔn nsaase do, wɔ etsifi, nye anaafo afamu nsaase nyina do.

3 Na wɔmaa dɛm edwotwafo no a wɔnye hɔn edzi ahyɛmu dɛ wɔbɛma asomdwee aba nye hɔn so a wɔapen dɛ wɔbɛda ho ayɛ Lamanfo no nsaase dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse nye dza wɔbɛyɛ do edwuma dze edzidzi; na dɛm na wɔyɛe ma asomdwee baa asaase no do.

4 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase yɛɛ prɔmprɔm na wɔyɛɛ akɛse; na mfe eduonu esia nye esuon twaa mu kɔree, na mbra akɛse baa asaase no do, na wɔhyehyɛɛ hɔn mbra no wɔ pɛrpɛryɛ nye pɛrpɛrdzi mu.

5 Na afei biribiara nnyi asaase nyina do a osiw dɔm no hɔn prɔmprɔmyɛ kwan, gyedɛ wɔhwe ase wɔ mbrato mu.

6 Na afei Gidgiddoni nye ɔtsɛmbuafo Lachoneus, nye hɔn a woyii hɔn mpanyimfo no na wɔhwɛɛ ma dɛm asomdwee kɛse yi baa asaase no do.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ nkuropɔn pii wɔ hɔ a wɔdaan no afofor, na nkuropɔn adadaw pii so wɔ hɔ a wosiesiee no yie.

8 Na wɔpaapaa atsempɔnkwan na akwan pa pii so a ɔmaa wotumii fii kurow kor do kɔr kor so do, fi asaase kor do kɔr kor so do, fi bea kor do kɔr kor so do.

9 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduonu awɔtwe dze twaa mu kɔree, na dɔm no nyaa asomdwee ntaado.

10 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduonu akron no mu no nna mansotwe hyɛɛ ase wɔ dɔm no mu; na binom memaa hɔnho do wɔ ahantanyɛ na ahotuw mu osian sika pii a woenya ma abor do ntsi, nyew, iyi maa wɔtseetsee binom so ara yie.

11 Na eguadzifo pii wɔ asaase no do, mbranyimfo nye dzibewdzifo pii so.

12 Na dɔm no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrekyekyɛ hɔn mu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn sika nye hɔn nwomasũa tse, nyew, binom nnyim hwee osian hɔn hia ntsi, na binom so suaa nwoma akɛse akɛse osian hɔn sika ntsi.

13 Binom memaa hɔnho do wɔ ahantanyɛ mu, na binom so brɛɛ hɔnho adze kɛsenara; binom kasaa tsiaa hɔn a wɔkasaa tsiaa hɔn, wɔ ber a binom so, sɛ wɔkasa bɔn tsia hɔn na wɔtseetsee hɔn wɔ akwan nyina mu na amandzehu ahorow pii a, wɔnnkã hwee na mbom wɔyɛɛ ahobrɛadze na wonyaa nnuho wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim.

14 Na dɛm na ɔmaa soronko bɛdaa dɔm no ntamu wɔ asaase no do, na ɔyɛɛ dɛmara ma asɔr no hyɛɛ ase dɛ no mu retsetsew, nyew, na iyi kɔr do araa ma asɔr no mu paapae wɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa no mu wɔ asaase no nyinara do ma ɔkaa Lamanfo kakraabi a wɔsakyeer hɔn baa nokwar gyedzi no ho no; na woemmfi ho, osiandɛ nna wɔyɛ dzen ntsi wogyinaa pintsinn na woennhihim, na wosii nketse dɛ wobedzi Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm no do.

15 Afei siantsir a ɔmaa dɔm no yɛɛ dɛm emumuyɛ no nye iyi—Satan wɔ tum kɛse, dɛ onunuu dɔm no araa ma wɔyɛɛ emumuyɛ ahorow pii, ɔmaa ntsɛn hyɛɛ hɔn ma na wɔperee hwehwɛɛ tum nye tumdzi na sika nye wiadze egyangyandze.

16 Na dɛm na Satan dze twee dɔm no hɔn akoma ma wɔyɛɛ emumuyɛ ahorow pii; dɛm ntsi wonyaa asomdwee na mbom wɔ mfe kakraabi mu.

17 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa n’ahyɛse no wogyaa dɔm no mu mber pii maa abɔnsam ma ɔdze ne ndaadaa twee hɔn kɔr ne nsɔhwɛ a ɔpɛ ma wɔyɛɛ emumuyɛ biara a ɔpɛ dɛ wɔyɛ—dɛm ntsi afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa yi n’ahyɛse no mu no nna wogyina emumuyɛdze a ɔyɛ hu tsebew mu.

18 Afei dze, wɔannyɛ bɔn wɔ ber a nna wonnyim hwee osiandɛ wonyim dza Nyankopɔn pɛ dɛ wɔyɛ, osiandɛ nna wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn, dɛm ntsi hɔn enyi da hɔ ber a wɔtseew Nyankopɔn do etua no.

19 Na afei Lachoneus ne ba Lachoneus na ɔtsenaa n’egya n’egua no do rohwɛ dɔm no do wɔ dɛm afe no mu.

20 Na nyimpa bi hyɛɛ ase nyaa nkenyan fii sor a wɔsomaa hɔn wɔ dɔm no mu wɔ asaase nyina do kɛkãa Nyame n’asɛm na wɔgyee dase akokodur mu wɔ dɔm no hɔn bɔn na emumuyɛ ho na wɔgyee dase wɔ ɔpon a Ewuradze rebɛyɛ ama no nkorɔfo, anaaso dza yɛbɛkã dɛ Christ no wusoɛr no; na wɔgyee dase akokodur mu wɔ no wu nye n’amandzehu ho.

21 Afei dɔm no mu pii wɔ hɔ a hɔn bo fuuw mbordo osian hɔn a wɔregye dase wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho no ntsi; na hɔn a hɔn bo fuuw kɛse no nye atsɛmbuafo mpanyimfo nye hɔn a wɔyɛ asɔfompanyimfo nye mbranyimfo no; nyew, hɔn a wɔyɛ mbranyimfo nyina bo fuuw hɔn a wɔgyee dase wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho no.

22 Afei mbranyimfo anaa ɔtsɛmbuafo anaa ɔsɔfopanyin biara nnyi hɔ a onyaa tum a ɔdze bobu obiara okumfɔ gyedɛ ambrado no a ɔwɔ asaase no do no dze ne nsa ahyɛ afɔbu ase ana.

23 Afei hɔn a wɔgyee dase wɔ Christ ho akokodur mu no mu pii wɔ hɔ a atsɛmbuafo no nam nsumaamu faa hɔn kokum hɔn a nna ambrado a ɔwɔ asaase no do no nnyim hɔn wu no ho hwee kesii hɔn wu ekyir.

24 Afei hwɛ, iyi yɛɛ adze a otsia mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do dɛ ansaana woboku obiara no ɔwɔ dɛ wonya tum fi ambrado no a ɔwɔ asaase no do no nkyɛn.

25 Dɛm ntsi wɔkɛkãa kyerɛɛ ambrado no a ɔwɔ Zarahemla asaase do no dɛ atsɛmbuafo no ebu Ewuradze no nkɔnhyɛfo no okumfɔ a otsia mbra.

26 Afei ɔbaa dɛ wɔfaa hɔn dze hɔn baa ɔtsɛmbuafo no enyim dɛ ombu hɔn atsɛn wɔ dza wɔayɛ no ho, dɛ mbrɛ mbra a dɔm no ahyehyɛ ato hɔ no tse.

27 Afei ɔbaa dɛ dɛm atsɛmbuafo no wɔ anyɛnkofo nye ebusuafo pii; na hɔn a wɔaka no, nyew, mbranyimfo nye asɔfompanyimfo no nyinara so mpo na wɔboaa hɔn ano na wɔkɛkãa dɛm atsɛmbuafo no a woribedzi hɔn asɛm wɔ mbra kwan do no hɔn ebusuafo ho.

28 Na wɔnye hɔnho dzii ahyɛmu, nyew, ahyɛmu a tsetsebaadofo dze maa no, ɔyɛ ahyɛmu no a abɔnsam hyehyɛe dze maa no, dɛ ɔdze reyɛ kuw akõ etsia tseneneeyɛ no.

29 Dɛm wɔyɛɛ kuw tsiaa Ewuradze no nkorɔfo no na wodzii ahyɛmu dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn, na wɔagye ewudzifo no efi pɛrpɛrdzi nsamu, dza a wɔdze rubobu hɔn atsɛn no dɛ ma mbra no se.

30 Na wɔyɛɛ asokyew maa mbra na dza odzi wɔ hɔn man no mu no; na wodzii ahyɛmu dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ ambrado no, na woesi ɔhen wɔ asaase no do amma asaase no ennya ahotɔ bio na mbom ɔabɛhyɛ ahemfo ase.
3-ne 7:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Woku ɔtsɛmbuafopanyin no, wotu aban no na nkorɔfo no kyekyɛ hɔn mu mbusuakuw—Jacob, Christ ne tsiafo no, bɛyɛ nsumaamu fɛkuw bi do hɔn hen—Nephi kã nnuho nye gyedzi a ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa nya wɔ Christ mu ho asɛm—Abɔfo bɔsom no dabiara, na onyan no nua fi ewufo mu—Pii nu hɔnho na wonuma hɔn. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 30–33.[/i]

1 Afei hwɛ, mebɛkyerɛ wo dɛ woenntum ennsi ɔmanhen wɔ asaase no do; mbom dɛm afe yi ara mu, nyew, afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa no mu, woguu atsɛmbu egua no ho fi, nyew, wokum ɔtsɛmbufopanyin a ɔwɔ asaase no do no.

2 Na dɔm no kyekyɛɛ hɔn mu, tsiatsiaa hɔnho nkorkor; na wɔpaapaa hɔn mu ebusuakuw, na ɔbarimba biara dɛ mbrɛ n’ebusua tse nye n’ebusuafo, nye n’anyɛnkofo; na dɛm na wɔyɛe dze sɛɛ asaase no do aban no.

3 Na ebusuakuw biara yii ɔhen anaa panyin bi ma ɔhwɛɛ hɔn do; na dɛm na ɔmaa wɔbɛyɛɛ mbusuakuw nye mbusuakuw do mpanyimfo.

4 Afei hwɛ, obiara nnyi nyimpa no mu a onnyi ebusua, ebusuafo nye anyɛnkofo pii; dɛm ntsi hɔn mbusuakuw no bɛyɛɛ akɛse.

5 Afei wɔyɛɛ iyinom nyina no nna akõkoekõ biara nnsii hɔn mu; na dɛm emumuyɛ yi nyina baa dɔm no do osian Satan a wogyaa hɔnho mu maa no tum no tsi.

6 Na wɔsɛɛ aban ne nhyehyɛɛ no, osian dɛm anyɛnkofo nye ebusuafo no a wokuum nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn nsumaamu fɛkuwbɔ ntsi.

7 Na wɔdze wentwiwentwi pii baa asaase no do araa ma hɔn a wɔyɛ atseneneefo wɔ dɔm no mu no mu dodowara bɛyɛɛ emumuyɛfo; nyew, atseneneefo kumaabi na wɔkaa hɔn mu.

8 Na mfe esia annso mpo na dɔm no hɔn kɛse fii hɔn tseneneeyɛ ho, tse dɛ ɔkraman a ɔasan akɔ ne fe ho, anaadɛ ɔtse prekober a ɔasan akɛhyɛ ne dɛtse mu.

9 Afei dɛm nsumaamu fɛkuwbɔfo yi a wɔdze emumuyɛ pii aba dɔm yi do yi boaboaa hɔn ano na wɔdze ɔbarimba bi a wɔfrɛ no Jacob sii hɔ dɛ ɔnhwɛ hɔn do;

10 Na wɔfrɛɛ no hɔn ɔmanhen; dɛm ntsi ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔmanhen wɔ dɛm fɛkuw yi do; na ɔno nyia ɔgyee n’enyim kasaa tsiaa nkɔnhyɛfo no a wɔgyee Jesus ho dase no.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ nna hɔn dodow nnyɛ kɛse dɛ nkorɔfo no mbusuakuw no a wɔakã hɔnho abɔmu a hɔn mpanyimfo na wɔhyehyɛ hɔn mbra biara dɛ mbrɛ n’ebusuakuw no tse; naaso wɔyɛ atamfo; ɔwɔ mu dɛ wɔnnyɛ atseneneefo, naaso wɔnye hɔn yɛɛ kor tsiaa hɔn a wodzii ahyɛmu dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ aban no.

12 Dɛm ntsi, Jacob hun dɛ hɔn atamfo dɔɔ sõ sen hɔn, na ɔno na ɔyɛ kuw no hɔn do ɔhen dɛm ntsi ɔhyɛɛ no nkorɔfo no dɛ wonguan nkɔ asaase n’etsifi afamu no ho na wɔnkɛkyekyer ahenman mfa mma hɔnho, nkesi dɛ etuatsewfo bɛba abɛkã hɔnho, (na ɔdaadaa hɔn dɛ etuatsewfo no bɔdɔɔ so) ama woeenya ahoɔdzen ara yie nye nkorɔfo no mbusuakuw no eedzi esi; na wɔyɛɛ no dɛm ara.

13 Na hɔn nantsew mu yɛɛ hyew ara yie ma woenntum ennsiw hɔn kwan araa kesii dɛ wofii bea a dɔm no wɔ koraa. Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa dze baa n’ewiei; na dɛm na Nephi no nkorɔfo hɔn ndzeyɛɛ tse.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa biako mu no, wɔkyekyɛɛ hɔn mu mbusuakuw, ɔbarimba biara na ne yer na n’ebusua, nye n’ebusuafo, nye n’anyɛnkofo; naaso nna wɔayɛ nhyehyɛɛ bi dɛ obiara nye no nua nnkedzi akõ; na mbom wɔannyɛ kor wɔ hɔn mbrahyɛ nye amambu ho, osiandɛ wɔhyehyɛɛ biribiara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ahemfo nye hɔn mpanyimfo hɔn adwen tse. Mbom wɔhyɛɛ mbra katsee dɛ mma ebusuakuw biara mmfi n’asaase do nnkɛfa kor ne dze do, iyi maa asomdwee kakraabi baa asaase no do; naaso nna wɔadan hɔn akoma efi Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ho, na wosiiw nkɔnhyɛfo abo na wɔpaam hɔn fii hɔn mu.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi, ɔnam dɛ abɔfo bɛseraa no na ɔtsee Ewuradze ne ndze, na ohun abɔfo na n’enyiwa gye ho dase na wɔmaa no tum a ɔdze bohu Christ no som dwumadzi, na bio ɔdze n’enyiwa gye ho dase mbrɛ ma wosii wɔdaan ntsɛntsɛm fii tseneneeyɛ ho baa hɔn emumuyɛ na mbusubɔ mu;

16 Dɛm ntsi, osiandɛ no werɛ howee wɔ hɔn akomadzen nye hɔn adwen a woefura ntsi—ɔkɔr hɔn mu dɛm afe noara mu, na ɔhyɛɛ ase gyee dase ndamyɛ mu faa nnuho nye bɔnfakyɛ a yenya fi gyedzi a yɛwɔ no wɔ Ewuradze Jesus Christ mu.

17 Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn ndzɛmba pii; na worunntum nnkyerɛw ne nyinara, na wɔkyerɛw ne fã so a ɔrennyɛ yie, dɛm ntsi wɔannkyerɛw no koraa wɔ nwoma yi mu. Na Nephi dze tum kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ tumdzi kɛse mu.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn bo fuuw no osian tum kɛse a ɔwɔ sen hɔn ntsi, osiandɛ nna ɔyɛ dzen ma hɔn dɛ wɔnnkɛgye ne nsɛm no edzi, osiandɛ ne gyedzi a ɔwɔ no wɔ Ewuradze Jesus Christ mu no sõ araa ma abɔfo bɔsoom no daa daa.

19 Na ɔnam Jesus dzin mu tuu mbɔnsam nye esunsum fĩ; na onyaan no nuabanyin mpo a dɔm no, siiw no abo ma owui.

20 Na dɔm no hunii na wɔgyee ho dase, na hɔn bo fuuw no osian no tum no ntsi; na ɔyɛɛ anwanwadze pii so wɔ Jesus dzin mu, wɔ dɔm no enyim.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa biako no twaa mu kɔree, na dɔm kumaabi na wonyaa nsakyer na wɔbaa Ewuradze nkyɛn; mbom dodowara a wonyaa nsakyer no gyee dase nokwar mu kyerɛɛ dɔm no dɛ Nyame no tum nye no Sunsum a ɔwɔ Jesus Christ a wɔgye no dzi no mu no aba hɔn nkyɛn.

22 Na dodowara a wotuu mbɔnsam fii hɔn mu, nye hɔn a wɔsaa hɔn yarba na honam yaw no daa no edzi nokwar mu kyerɛɛ dɔm no dɛ Nyame no Sunsum na ɔsaa hɔn yarba; na wɔkyerɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze so, na wɔyɛɛ anwanwadze so wɔ dɔm no mu.

23 Dɛm so na afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa ebien no so dze twaa mu kɔree. Na Nephi sũi frɛɛ dɔm no wɔ afe eduasa ebiasa n’ahyɛse no mu; na ɔkãa nsɛmpa a ɔfa nnuho nye bɔnfakyɛ ho asɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn.

24 Afei mepɛ dɛ hom kaa dɛ obiara nnyi hɔ a onyaa nnuho a wɔammfa nsu ennuma no.

25 Dɛm ntsi Nephi hyɛɛ mbanyin binom asɔfo wɔ ɔsomdwumadzi no mu, ama obiara a ɔbɛba hɔn nkyɛn no wɔdze nsu enuma no, na iyi bɛyɛ ahyɛnsew nye dasegye wɔ Nyankopɔn nye dɔm no enyim, dɛ woenu hɔnho na woenya bɔnfakyɛ.

26 Na dodowara wɔ hɔ a wonuu hɔnho na wonumaa hɔn kɔr nnuho mu wɔ dɛm afe yi n’ahyɛse mu; na dɛm na afe no dze kɔr n’ewiei.
3-ne 8:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ehum kɛse, asaasewosow, ogya, ekyinehyia mframa nye anwanwadze a osisi nyina gye Christ ne mbeamudua mu bɔ ho dase—Wɔsɛɛ nyimpa pii—Sum hyɛ asaase do ndaansa—Hɔn a wɔka no twa kwadwom wɔ hɔn nkrabea ho. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 33–34.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ mbrɛ hɛn kyerɛwsɛm se no, na yenyim dɛ hɛn kyerɛwsɛm no yɛ nokwar, na hwɛ, nokwafo na ɔdze nkyerɛwee no esie—na nokwar, ɔyɛɛ anwanwadze pii wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu; na ɔdasanyi biara nnyi hɔ a obotum ayɛ anwanwadze wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu, gyedɛ ɔatsew noho efi no emumuyɛ biara ho—

2 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ, sɛ dɛm nyimpa yi annyɛ mfomdo wɔ ber a ɔrekan hɛn mber yi a, nna ɔno afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa ebiasa ebotwa mu kɔ;

3 Na nkorɔfo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrohwɛ asɛnkyerɛdze a nkɔnhyɛnyi Samuel, Lamannyi no kãe no kwan dzendzenndzen, nyew, aber no a sum bɛhyɛ kebii, bɛyɛ ndaansa wɔ asaase enyi do no.

4 Na ekyingye kɛse na ɔhyɛɛ ase sii nkorɔfo no mu, ammfa hɔnho koraa dɛ woeyi nsɛnkyerɛdze pii akyerɛ hɔn.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa anan no mu, bosoom a odzi kan, nda a otsĩa anan no ehum kɛse bi tui, nna obiara nnhun dɛm bi pɛn wɔ asaase no nyina do.

6 Na ehum kɛse huhu bi so bɔe; na sor paapaa mu kɛsenara ma ɔwosoow asaase nyina tse dɛ mbrɛ no mu repaapaa.

7 Na enyinam dzendzen bi a wonnhu ne saso bi da wɔ asaase yi do tsewee.

8 Na ogya tɔɔ Zarahemla kuropɔn no mu.

9 Na Moroni kuropɔn no memee kɔr po ase, na no mu nyimpa nyinara po faa hɔn.

10 Na dɛtse tui kataa Moronihah kuropɔn do ma kurow no n’ananmu bɛyɛɛ bepɔw kɛsenara.

11 Na ɔsɛɛ kɛse a ɔyɛ hu sii asaase n’anaafo afamu.

12 Mbom hwɛ, ɔsɛɛ kɛse a ɔyɛ hu pii sii etsifi mantam mu hɔ; na hwɛ, asaase mu nyina enyi danee, osian mframa dzendzen nye ehum na sor mpaapaamu nye enyinam, nye asaasewosow kɛse a osii asaase nyina do no ntsi;

13 Na atsɛmpɔnkwan nyina mu tutui, na akwan a ɔda hɔ petee nyina mu sɛɛ, na mbea a ɔyɛ tromm nyina bɛyɛɛ krann.

14 Na nkuropɔn akɛse pii a ɔyɛ atsenkã memee kɛhyɛɛ asaase tsir mu, na dodowara so hyewee, na dodowara so wosowee araa kesii dɛ no do adan nyina bubui guu famu, na no mu nyimpa nyina wuwui, na dɛm mbea no bɛyɛɛ amamfõ.

15 Na nkuropɔn binom so wɔ hɔ a ɔkae, na mbom no mu ndzɛmba a ɔsɛe no dɔɔ sõ ara yie, na no mu nyimpa pii wuwui.

16 Na binom so ekyinehyia mframa hwiim hɔn kɔree; na bea a ɔnye hɔn kɔree dze, obiara nnyim, dza wonyim ara nye dɛ ohwiim hɔn kɔree.

17 Na dɛm maa asaase nyina enyi do bɛyɛɛ basabasa, osian mframa dzendzen nye sor mpaapaamu, nye enyinam, nye asaasewosow no ntsi.

18 Na hwɛ, mbotan no mu paapaa ebien ebien; hɔn mu paapae guu asaase enyi do ara ma ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbosabo, na ma mu akekã, na ma apaapaa wɔ asaase enyi do nyina.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ afei sor mpaapaamu, nye enyinam, nye ehum, nye mframa dzendzen, nye asaasewosow nyina bɔɔ adze—na hwɛ, iyi nyina kɔr do wɔ bɛyɛ dɔnhwer ebiasa ntamu; na binom see dɛ mber no kyɛree sen dɛm; naaso dɛm ndzɛmba akɛse huhu yi nyina sii wɔ bɛyɛ dɔnhwer ebiasa ntamu—na afei hwɛ, sum hyɛɛ asaase n’enyi do mã.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ sum kebii hyɛɛ asaase nyina enyi do araa ma nyimpa a wɔwɔ hɔ a woennwu no tsee sum no n’ehubɔhubɔw nkã;

21 Na kan biara nnyi beebiara, osian sum no ntsi, kyɛndar, ogya anaa adze a ɔma kan biara nnyi hɔ a wobotum dze asɔ hɔn nyena papa ewui no, dɛm ntsi nna kan biara nnyi beebiara;

22 Na woennhu kan biara, anaa ogya biara, anaa ewia, anaa bosoom, anaa nworaba, osian sum kebii kɛse a ɔahyɛ asaase enyi do ntsi.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ bɛyɛ nda ebiasa tamu nna wonnhu kan biara; na dɛm aber no nyina mu no awerɛhow kɛse nye ntsẽatsẽamu nye osũ nko na osii wɔ nkorɔfo no nyina mu; nyew nkorɔfo no sũu pii, osian sum nye ɔsɛɛ kɛse a aba hɔn do no ntsi.

24 Na wɔtsee dɛ worusũ wɔ beebi dze rekã dɛ: O nkyɛ yenuu hɛnho ansaana dɛm da kɛse huhu yi aba, nkyɛ wɔdze hɛn enuanom hɔn nkwa kyɛɛ hɔn na wɔannhyew hɔn wɔ dɛm kuropɔn kɛse Zarahemla no mu.

25 Na wɔtsee dɛ worusũ na wɔdze awerɛhow rekã dɛ: O nkyɛ yenuu hɛnho ansaana dɛm da kɛse huhu yi asõ, na nkyɛ yennku na yennsiw nkɔnhyɛfo no abo, na yennyi hɔn edzi; nkyɛ wɔgyee hɛn nãnom, nye hɛn mbabaa fɛɛfɛw, nye hɛn mba nkwa na woennsie hɔn wɔ dɛm kurow kɛse Moronihah mu. Na dɛm na nkorɔfo no hɔn ntseatseamu ne kɛse nye no hu tse.
3-ne 9:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Christ ne ndze fi sum mu tsẽa mu kã nyimpa na nkuropɔn pii hɔn nsɛe ho asɛm osian emumuyɛdze ntsi—Ɔtsẽa mu kã No nyamesu ho asɛm, Ɔkã dɛ Moses mbra no ahyɛ mã, na Ɔto nsa frɛ nyimpa dɛ wɔmbra No hɔ ma ɔngye hɔn nkwa. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɔm a wɔwɔ asaase no do hɔ no tsee ndze bi wɔ asaase nyina yi enyi retseamu dɛ:

2 Nkorɔfo yi wondue, wondue, wondue; na asaase no do nyimpa nyina wondue, na gyedɛ wonu hɔnho; osiandɛ abɔnsam reserew, na n’abɔfoe so ridzi dɛw, osian mo nkorɔfo hɔn mbabanyin nye hɔn mbabaa ahoɔfɛfo a woekuku hɔn no ntsi; na osian hɔn emumuyɛ nye mbusubɔ ntsi na wɔatotɔ!

3 Hwɛ, medze ogya ahyew dɛm kuropɔn kɛse Zarahemla nye nyimpa a wɔwɔ mu nyina.

4 Na hwɛ, maama dɛm kuropɔn kɛse Moroni no amem akɔ po no bun ase, na po afa dɔm a wɔwɔ mu no.

5 Na hwɛ, medze dɛtse akata dɛm kuropɔn kɛse Moronihah, nye dɔm a wɔwɔ mu nyinara do, dze akata hɔn emumuyɛ nye hɔn ekyiwadze do wɔ m’enyido, amma nkɔnhyɛfo nye ahotseweefo no hɔn bɔgyaa ammba mo hɔ bio enntsia hɔn.

6 Na hwɛ, maama kuropɔn Gilgal amem, na dɔm a wɔwɔ mu nyinara woesie hɔn wɔ asaase tsir mu;

7 Nyew, maama esu akata kuropɔn Onihah nye nyimpa a wɔwɔ mu nyina do, nye kurow Mocum na no mu nyimpa nyina do, nye Jerusalem kurow na no mu nyimpa nyina do; dze akata hɔn emumuyɛ nye mbusubɔ do wɔ m’enyido, amma nkɔnhyɛfo nye ahotseweefo no hɔn bɔgyaa ammba mo hɔ bio enntsia hɔn.

8 Na hwɛ, Gadiandi kurow, nye Gaddiomnah kurow, nye Jacob kurow, nye Gimgimno kurow, nyinara maama amemem ma akoko nye mbɔnsa abɛhyɛ hɔn ananmu; na hɔn mu nyimpa nyinara mesie hɔn wɔ asaase tsir mu, dze akata hɔn emumuyɛ na mbusubɔ efi m’enyido, amma nkɔnhyɛfo nye ahotseweefo no hɔn bɔgyaa aammba mo hɔ bio enntsia hɔn.

9 Na hwɛ, dɛm kurow kɛse Jacobugath, dza ɔhen Jacob no nkorɔfo wɔ mu no, ɔno so maama ogya ahyew no osian hɔn emumuyɛdze a ɔbɔ emumuyɛdze a ɔwɔ asaase nyina do, osian hɔn nsumaamu ewudzi nye fɛkuwbɔ; na hɔn na wɔsɛɛ mo nkorɔfo hɔn asomdwee nye aban a ɔwɔ asaase no do no; dɛm ntsi memaa wɔhyewee, ama wɔasɛɛ hɔn efi m’enyido, amma nkɔnhyɛfo nye ahotseweefo hɔn bɔgyaa ammba mo hɔ bio enntsia hɔn.

10 Na hwɛ, maama wɔdze ogya ahyew Laman kuropɔn, nye Josh kurow, nye Gad kurow, nye Kishkumen kurow, nye dɔm a wɔwɔ mu nyinara, osian hɔn emumuyɛdze a wɔyɛe dɛ woyii nkɔnhyɛfo a mosomaa hɔn dɛ wɔmbɛda hɔn emumuyɛdze nye hɔn mbusubɔ edzi nkyerɛ hɔn na woyii hɔn edzi na wosiiw hɔn abo no ntsi.

11 Na osiandɛ woyii hɔn edzi, na ɔtseneneenyi biara nnyi hɔn mu ntsi, mosomaa ogya ma osianee ɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn, ama hɔn emumuyɛdze nye ekyiwadze esuma wɔ m’enyido, amma nkɔnhyɛfo nye ahotseweefo a mosomaa hɔn wɔ hɔn mu no hɔn bɔgyaa emmfi asaase mu ennsũ ammfrɛ me enntsia hɔn.

12 Na maama ɔsɛɛ kɛse pii aba asaase yi nye dɔm a wɔwɔ mu no do, osian hɔn emumuyɛdze nye hɔn ekyiwadze ntsi.

13 O hom a wɔdze hom nkwa akyɛ hom osiandɛ hom tsen sen hɔn ntsi, ana hom rennsan mmba me nkyɛn, na hom nnu homho wɔ hom bɔn ho ma wɔasakyer hom ama maasa hom yarba?

14 Nyew, nokwar mese hom dɛ, sɛ hom ba mo hɔ a hom benya onnyiewiei nkwa. Hwɛ, m’ehumbɔbɔr abasa no atsen wɔ hom do, na obiara a ɔbɛba no, ɔno na mebɛgye no; na nhyira akã hɔn a wɔba me nkyɛn.

15 Hwɛ, Emi nye Jesus Christ, Nyankopɔn ne Ba no. Emi na mobɔɔ sor nye asaase nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyina. Menye Egya no wɔ hɔ fitsi ahyɛse no. Mowɔ Egya no mu, na Egya no so wɔ mo mu; na mo mu na Egya no ahyɛ ne dzin enyimnyam.

16 Mebaa mankasa medze nkyɛn, na mankasa medze anngye me. Na kyerɛwsɛm no a ɔfa me mbaa ho no ahyɛ mã.

17 Na dodowara a wɔagye me no, hɔn na maama wɔabɛyɛ Nyame mba; na dɛmara so mpo na mebɛyɛ dodowara a wɔbɛgye me dzin edzi, na hwɛ, ɔnam mo do na ɔpon aba, na mo mu na Moses mbra no ahyɛ mã.

18 Emi nye wiadze ne kan na no nkwa no. Emi nye Alpha na Omega, ahyɛse nye ewiei no.

19 Na hom nnkã bɔgya nngu mmbɔ afɔr mma me bio; nyew, hom afɔrbɔ nye ɔhyew-afɔr nyina wobeyi no akwa, osiandɛ merenngye hom afɔrbɔ nye hom ɔhyew-afɔr bio.

20 Na afɔr a hom bɔbɔ ama me nye akoma a abobɔ nye sunsum a abotow. Na obiara a ɔdze akoma a abobɔ nye sunsum a abotow bɛba mo hɔ no, ɔno na medze ogya nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn bonuma no, dɛ Lamanfo no mpo, osian hɔn gyedzi a wonyaa wɔ mo mu wɔ ber a wonyaa nsakyer ntsi wɔdze ogya nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn numaa hɔn no, nna wonnyim.

21 Hwɛ, maba wiadze yi mu dze ɔpon rebrɛ wiadze, dze agye wiadze, efi bɔn mu.

22 Dɛm ntsi, obiara a obonu noho na ɔayɛ dɛ abofra na ɔaba me hɔ no, ɔno na mebɛgye no, na iyinom dɛm na Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no sɛ hɔn. Hwɛ, iyi ntsi na medze mo nkwa too hɔ, na masan afa no bio; dɛm ntsi hom nnu homho, na hom mbra me nkyɛn, hom a hom wɔ asaase n’ano n’ano, ma wɔngye hom nkwa.
3-ne 10:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Asaase do taa dzinn bɛyɛ ndɔnhwer pii ntamu—Christ Ne ndze bɔ anohoba dɛ Ɔbɔboaboa No nkorɔfo ano dɛ mbrɛ akokɔ baatan boaboa ne mba ano—Hɔn a wɔyɛ atseneneefo ara yie wɔ nkorɔfo no mu no na wɔakora hɔn do no. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34–35.[/i]

1 Na afei hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa nyinara a wɔwɔ asaase no do no tsee dɛm kasa yi, na wɔgyee ho dase. Na dɛm kasa yi ekyir no asaase no do taa dzinn bɛyɛ dɔnhwer pii ntamu;

2 Na ahobow kɛse tɔɔ dɔm no do ma dɛm ntsi wogyaa dɛ worutwa kwadwom nye ntseatseamu no a wɔdze regyam hɔn ebusuafo a woekuku hɔn no; dɛm ntsi asaase no do taa dzinn bɛyɛ dɔnhwer pii ntamu.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ ndze baa dɔm no nkyɛn bio, na nkorɔfo no nyinara tsee na wɔgyee ho dase, see dɛ:

4 O hom a hom fi nkuropɔn akɛse yi a wɔahwe ase yi mu, hom a hom yɛ Jacob n’asefo, nyew, hom a hom yɛ Israel fifo, mpɛn ahen na maboaboa hom ano dɛ mbrɛ akokɔ baatan boaboa ne mba ano hyɛ n’atsaban ase, na manyɛn hom.

5 Na mpɛn ahen bio na ɔwɔ dɛ moboaboa hom ano dɛ mbrɛ akokɔ baatan boaboa ne mba ano hyɛ n’atsaban ase, nyew, O hom nkorɔfo a hom yɛ Israel fifo a hom atotɔ; nyew, O hom a hom yɛ Israel fifo, hom a hom tse Jerusalem, dɛ hom atotɔ; nyew, mpɛn ahen na maboaboa hom ano dɛ mbrɛ akokɔ baatan boaboa ne mba ano, na hom mma ho kwan.

6 O hom Israel fifo a medze hom nkwa akyɛ hom, mpɛn ahen na mo mboaboa hom ano dɛ mbrɛ akokɔ baatan boaboa ne mba ano hyɛ n’atsaban ase, sɛ hom nu homho na hom dze akoma a odzi mu san ba me nkyɛn.

7 Mbom sɛ annyɛ dɛm a, O Israel fifo, ɔno mbea a hom tse bɛyɛ amamfõ ekesi dɛ hom egyanom hɔn ahyɛmu no bɛhyɛ mã.

8 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a dɔm no tsee dɛm nsɛm yi ekyir no, hwɛ, wɔhyɛɛ ase sũi na wɔtsẽatsẽaa mu bio osian hɔn ebusuafo nye anyɛnkofo a woewuwu no ntsi.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm na nda ebiasa no dze twaa mu kɔree. Na ɔyɛ anapa, na sum no hwetsee fii asaase no enyi do, na asaase no gyaa wosow, na mbepɔw no gyaa dɛ ɔpaapaa, na dede huhu no gyae, na begyabegya no so twaa mu kɔree.

10 Na asaase no kãa faam bio, ma ogyinaa hɔ; na dɔm a wɔdze hɔn nkwa kyɛɛ hɔn no hɔn nkrumsi nye hɔn sũ, nye ntsẽatsẽamu no bɔɔ adze; na hɔn sũ no daan enyigye, na hɔn awerɛhow no gyae ma wɔdze ayɛyi na ndaase maa Ewuradze Jesus Christ, hɔn Pomfo.

11 Na dɛm na ɔmaa kyerɛwsɛm no a nkɔnhyɛfo no kãe no hyɛɛ mã.

12 Na hɔn a wɔyɛ atseneneefo ara yie wɔ dɔm no mu no nna wɔgyee hɔn nkwa, na hɔn na wɔgyee nkɔnhyɛfo no na woennsiw hɔn abo; na hɔn a wɔannka ahotseweefo hɔn bɔgya enngu no, na wɔdze hɔn nkwa kyɛɛ hɔn—

13 Na wɔdze hɔn nkwa kyɛɛ hɔn na wɔammem annkɛhyɛ asaase mu; na wɔammem annkɛhyɛ po no bun ase; na ogya annhyew hɔn, anaa biribiara annhwe hɔn do annyam hɔn ma woennwu; na ekyinehyia mframa ennhwim hɔn annkɔ; anaadɛ sum n’ehubɔhubɔw no annhyɛ hɔn do.

14 Na afei, nyia ɔkenkan no, ma onya ho ntsease; nyia ɔwɔ kyerɛwsɛm no, ma ɔnhwehwɛ mu yie, na onhu na ɔnhwɛ sɛ dɛm owu nye ɔsɛɛ yi nyina a wɔdze ogya, nye wusiw, nye ekyinehyia mframa, nye ehum, nye asaase a no mu buei dze meen hɔn, ana dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina nnhyɛ nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no hɔn nkɔnhyɛ no mã.

15 Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, Nyew, dodowara gyee dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho dase wɔ Christ ne mbaa ho, na wokum hɔn osian dase a wɔgyee wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho ntsi.

16 Nyew, nkɔnhyɛnyi Zenos gyee dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho dase, na Zenock so kãa nsɛm a ɔfa ndzɛmba yi ho, osian dase a wɔgyee ne tsitsir a ɔfa hɛnho, hɛn a yɛyɛ hɔn asefo nkaa no.

17 Hwɛ, hɛn egya Jacob so gyee dase a ɔfa Joseph n’asefo nkaa ho. Na hwɛ, ana yɛnnyɛ Joseph n’asefo nkaa? Na ndzɛmba yi a ɔgyee dase wɔ ho yi ana wɔnnkyerɛwee wɔ ayewa mprɛtse no a hɛn egya Lehi dze fi Jerusalem bae no do?

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔdze rokɔ afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa anan n’ewiei no, hwɛ, mebɛma ehu dɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo a wɔdze hɔn nkwa kyɛɛ hɔn, nye hɔn so a wɔfrɛ hɔn Lamanfo a wɔdze hɔn nkwa kyɛɛ hɔn no, wɔyɛɛ hɔn ayamuyie kɛse, na wohuee nhyira kɛse guu hɔn etsifi araa ma Christ no sorkɔ ekyir no annkyɛr koraa, na nokwar, ɔdaa noho edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn—

19 Oyii ne nyimpadua kyerɛɛ hɔn, na odzii ɔsomdwuma wɔ hɔn mu; na no somdwumadzi ho nsɛm no wɔdze bɛma hom ekyir yi. Dɛm ntsi aber yi ara mu medze me kasaa aba ewiei.
3-ne 11:
Jesus Christ yi noho kyerɛ Nephifo wɔ ber a dɔmtutuw no ehyia wɔ Dzifuu asaase do, na ɔsom hɔn; na ɔnam dɛm kwan yi do yi noho kyerɛ hɔn.

Ofitsi etsir 11 dze kesi 26.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Egya no dzi Ne Dɔba no ho dase—Christ pue na Ɔbɔ No Werdambɔ no ho dawur—Nyimpadodow dze hɔn nsa kã epirakur a ɔwɔ Ne nsa na N’anan ho nye Ne mfemu no—Wɔtsẽatsẽa mu dɛ Hosanna—Ɔkyerɛ kwan na ma mbrɛ wonsi nnuma—Wentwiwentwi sunsum fi abɔnsam—Christ Ne nkyerɛkyerɛ nye dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ adasa nya gyedzi na wonuma hɔn na hɔn nsa kã Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ nna nyimpadodow kɛse a wɔyɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo no aboa hɔn ano, etwa temple no a ɔwɔ Dzifuu no ho ehyia; na nwanwa kɛse akã hɔn ma obiara nye no nua rodwendwen nwanwadze kɛse na wɔrekyerɛkyerɛ nsesa kɛse a esi bea no do.

2 Na wɔrotwetwe nkɔmbɔ so fa dɛm Jesus Christ yi a woeyi asɛnkyerɛdze a ɔfa no wu ho akyerɛ yi ho.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wogu do rotwetwe nkɔmbɔ no, wɔtsee ndze bi fi sor; na wɔdze hɔn enyiwa kɔr aprɔw, na ndze a wɔtsee no wɔanntse ase; na ɔnnyɛ ndze dzendzen, anaa ndze kɛse; ɔyɛ ndze tseabaa, naaso ɔwɔɔ hɔn ma wɔtsee no wɔ hɔn mu ma hɔnho beebiara nnyi hɔ a annwosow; nyew, ɔwɔɔ hɔn akra mu, na ɔmaa hɔn akoma dzɛwee.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔtsee ndze no bio, na wɔanntse ase.

5 Na wɔtsee ndze no bio ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebiasa, na wobuee hɔn asowa ama wɔaatse; na wɔmaa hɔn enyiwa do wɔ sor kyerɛɛ bea a ndze no fi; na wɔhwɛɛ sor hann wɔ bea a ndze no fi bae no.

6 Na hwɛ, ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebiasa no wɔtsee ndze no ase; na ɔsee hɔn dɛ:

7 Hom nhwɛ mo Dɔba a ɔsɔ m’enyi yie, no mu na mahyɛ me dzin enyimnyam—hom ntsie no.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ, ber a wɔtsee ase no wɔmaa hɔn enyiwa do kyerɛɛ sor bio; na hwɛ, wohun dɛ Ɔbarimba bi fi sor risian; na ɔhyɛ atar fitaa; na ɔbaa famu na obegyinaa hɔn finimfin, na nyimpadodow no nyinara daan hɔn enyiwa hwɛɛ no, na woenntum emmbue hɔn ano annkasa annkyerɛ hɔnho mpo, na woenntum anntse iyi ase, na wɔdween dɛ ɔbɔfo na oeyi noho akyerɛ hɔn.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔtseen ne nsa na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no see dɛ:

10 Hom nhwɛ, Emi nye Jesus Christ no a nkɔnhyɛfo gyee dase dɛ ɔbɛba wiadze no.

11 Na hwɛ, Emi nye wiadze kan nye nkwa no; na manom kuraba wenwen no a Egya no dze maa me no ano, na mahyɛ Egya no enyimnyam dɛ mefaa wiadze bɔn too mo do, na no mu na fitsi ahyɛse no maayɛ Egya ne pɛ wɔ adze nyinara mu.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi no nyimpadodow no nyinara hwee famu; osiandɛ wɔkaa dɛ wɔahyɛ ho nkɔm wɔ hɔn mu dɛ Christ beyi noho akyerɛ hɔn ber a ɔafow akɔ sor n’ekyir no.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze kasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn see dɛ:

14 Hom nsoɛr mbra me hɔ, ama hom eetum dze hom nsa akã me mfemu, na hom ehu mprɛgow n’ananmu wɔ me nsa nye m’anan ho, ama hom eehu dɛ Emi nye Israel Nyankopɔn no, nye asaase nyinara do Nyankopɔn a woeku no apata wiadze bɔn no.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpadodow no kɔree, na wɔdze hɔn nsa kãa ne mfemu, na wohun mprɛgow n’ananmu wɔ ne nsa nye n’anan ho, na dɛm na hɔn nyinara yɛɛ, wɔkɔr no nkorkor kesii dɛ hɔn nyinara kɔree, na wɔdze hɔn enyiwa hunii, na wɔdze hɔn nsa so kãa hwɛe hun nokwar no na wɔgyee ho dase, dɛ ɔyɛ ɔno, nyia nkɔnhyɛfo no kyerɛɛw noho nsɛm dɛ ɔbɛba no.

16 Na ber a hɔn nyinara kɔree na hɔnankasa gyee ho dase no, wɔdze ndze kor tsẽaa mu see dɛ:

17 Hosanna! Nhyira nkã Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn ne dzin! Na wotwae hwee Jesus n’ananadze, na wɔsɔɔr no.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Nephi (na Nephi kã nyimpadodow no ho) na ɔsee no dɛ ɔmbra kan.

19 Na Nephi soɛree na ɔkɔr kan, na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ Ewuradze enyim na ofeew n’anan ho.

20 Na Ewuradze see no dɛ ɔnsoɛr. Na ɔsoɛree gyinaa n’enyim.

21 Na Ewuradze see no dɛ: Merema wo tum ma sɛ mofow kɔ sor bio a edze enuma nkorɔfo yi.

22 Na Ewuradze frɛɛ binom so bio, na ɔkãa dɛmara so kyerɛɛ hɔn; na ɔmaa hɔn tum dɛ wonnuma. Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Dɛm kwan yi na hom mfa do nnuma; na mma hom mma ekyingye biara mmba hom mu.

23 Nokwar mese hom dɛ, obiara a ɔnam hom nsɛm do bonu noho wɔ no bɔn ho na ɔbɛpɛ dɛ wonuma no wɔ me dzin mu no, hom mfa dɛm kwan yi do nnuma no—Hwɛ, hom bɔkɔ ekegyina nsu no mu, na hom enuma no wɔ me dzin mu.

24 Na afei hwɛ, dɛm nsɛm yi na hom nkã, hom mbɔ ne dzin, nse dɛ:

25 Ɔnam tumdzi a Jesus Christ dze ama me no do, munuma wo wɔ Egya, nye Ɔba, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ne dzin mu. Amen.

26 Na afei hom mfa no nhyɛ nsu no mu, na hom nyi no bio mfi nsu no mu.

27 Na dɛm kwan yi do na hom mfa nnuma wɔ me dzin mu; na hwɛ, nokwar mese hom dɛ, Egya nye Ɔba, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no yɛ kor; na mowɔ Egya no mu, na Egya no so wɔ mo mu, na Egya nye Ɔba no yɛ kor.

28 Na dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hom no, dɛmara na hom mfa nnuma. Na mma hom mma ekyingye biara mmba hom mu, dɛ mbrɛ esi pɛn no; eso mma hom mma ekyingye biara mmba hom mu a ɔfa me nkyerɛkyerɛ ho botae ho, dɛ mbrɛ esi hom mu pɛn no.

29 Na nokwar, nokwar mese hom dɛ, obiara a wentwiwentwi sunsum wɔ no mu no nnyɛ medze, mbom ɔyɛ abɔnsam dze, ɔno nye wentwiwentwi n’egya, na onunu nyimpa hɔn akoma ma wɔdze ebufuw dzi aper.

30 Hwɛ, iyi nnyɛ me nkyerɛkyerɛ, dɛ medze ebufuw bonunu adasa hɔn akoma ma woetsia hɔnho; mbom iyi nye me nkyerɛkyerɛ, dɛ hom nyi dɛm ndzɛmba yi akwa.

31 Hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mebɛda me nkyerɛkyerɛ edzi akyerɛ hom.

32 Na iyi nye me nkyerɛkyerɛ, na ɔyɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ a Egya no dze ama me; na megye Egya no ho dase, na Egya no so gye moho dase, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no so gye Egya no nye emi so ho dase; na megye dase dɛ Egya no ahyɛ adasa nyinara a wɔwɔ mbea nyinara do dɛ wonnu hɔnho na wɔngye me ndzi.

33 Na obiara a ɔgye me dzi, na wonuma no no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa; na hɔn na wobenya Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no ayɛ hɔndze.

34 Na obiara a ɔnnkɛgye me edzi na woennuma no no wobobu no fɔ.

35 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, iyi nye me nkyerɛkyerɛ, na megye ho dase dɛ ofi Egya no hɔ; na obiara a ɔgye me dzi no gye Egya no so dzi; na Egya no bɛgye moho dase akyerɛ no, na ɔdze ogya nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛba abɛsera no.

36 Na dɛm na Egya no dze bɛgye moho dase, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛgye Emi nye Egya no ho dase akyerɛ no; na Emi, na Egya no, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no yɛ kor.

37 Na mese hom bio dɛ, hom nnu homho, na hom nyɛ dɛ abofra kakraba, na wonnuma hom wɔ me dzin mu, annyɛ dɛm a hom nsa rennkã dɛm ndzɛmba yi.

38 Na mese hom bio dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ hom nu homho, na wonuma hom wɔ me dzin mu, na hom bɛyɛ dɛ mbofra, annyɛ dɛm a hom rinnya Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no nnyɛ homdze.

39 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, iyi nye me nkyerɛkyerɛ, na nyia osi ne dan wɔ iyi do no si ne dan wɔ ɔbotan do, na hɛl mbobow rinndzi no do konyim.

40 Na nyia ɔdze bi bɛkã iyi ho anaa obeyi bi efi mu, na ɔdze ato hɔ dɛ iyi yɛ me nkyerɛkyerɛ no, dɛm nyimpa no fi abɔnsam na onnsii dan no wɔ mo botan do; mbom osi dan no wɔ anhwea fapem do na sɛ nsuyirii ba na ehum tu no a hɛl mbobow no bobue agye no.

41 Dɛm ntsi, hom nkɔ nkorɔfo yi hɔ, na hom nkɛda nsɛm a makã yi edzi nkyerɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ asaase n’ano n’ano.
3-ne 12:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus frɛ esuafo duebien na ɔkyerɛ hɔn dwuma a ɔsɛ dɛ wodzi—Ɔkã kasa a ɔtse dɛ Bepɔw do Asɛmpa no kyerɛ Nephifo no—Ɔkã Nhyira nsɛm no—Ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no tra na onya gyinabew sen Moses mbra no—Ɔhyɛ adasa dɛ wondzi mu tse dɛ mbrɛ Ɔno na N’Egya dzi mu no—Fa to Matthew tsir 5 ho. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Nephi nye hɔn a ɔfrɛɛ hɔn no, (nna hɔn a ɔafrɛ hɔn na hɔn nsa akã tum nye tumdzi dɛ wonuma no hɔn dodow yɛ duebien) na hwɛ, ɔtseen ne nsa wɔ dɔmtutuw no do, na ɔtseaa mu see hɔn dɛ: Nhyira bɛkã hom sɛ hom tsie duebien yi a masan mu eyi hɔn dɛ wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ hom, na wɔnsom hom yi nsɛm a; na hɔn na mama hɔn tum dɛ wɔmfa nsu nnuma hom; na sɛ wɔdze nsu numa hom wie a, hwɛ, medze ogya nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn bonuma hom; dɛm ntsi nhyira akã hom sɛ hom bɛgye me edzi na woenuma hom, ber a hom ehu me na hom ehu dɛ me tse ase yi.

2 Na misi do bio, dɛ nhyira pii akã hɔn a wɔbɛgye hom nsɛm edzi osiandɛ hom bɛgye dase dɛ hom ehu me na hom nyim dɛ mowɔ hɔ. Nyew, nhyira akã hɔn a wɔbɛgye hom nsɛm edzi, na wɔahɛn ahobrɛadze no bun mu ma woenuma hɔn na wɔdze ogya nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛba abɛsera hɔn, na wobenya bɔnfakyɛ.

3 Nyew, nhyira akã sunsum mu abɔbɔfo a wɔba mo hɔ, na hɔn na ɔsor ahenman no yɛ hɔndze.

4 Na bio nhyira akã hɔn a hɔn werɛ ahow, na hɔn na wɔbɛkyekye hɔn werɛ.

5 Na nhyira akã hɔn a wɔdwe, na hɔn na wobenya asaase no edzi.

6 Na nhyira akã hɔn a tsenenee ho ɔkɔm nye nsukɔm dze hɔn, na wɔdze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛmee hɔn.

7 Na nhyira akã mbɔbɔrhufo, na hɔn na wobohu hɔn mbɔbɔr.

8 Na nhyira akã hɔn a hɔn akoma mu tsew, na hɔn na wobohu Nyankopɔn.

9 Na nhyira akã esiesiefo, na hɔn na wɔbɛfrɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn mba.

10 Na nhyira akã hɔn a me dzin ntsi wɔtseetsee hɔn, na hɔn na ɔsor ahenman no yɛ hɔndze.

11 Na nhyira akã hom ber a wɔbɛkã nsɛm bɔn etsia hom, na wɔatseetsee hom, na wɔakã nsɛmbɔn nyina ato hom do akɔhwi mu, wɔ me ntsi;

12 Na hom ndzi dɛw, na hom nya enyigye mbordo, na hom akatua sõ wɔ sor; na dɛmara na wɔhaaw nkɔnhyɛfo a wodzii hom kan no.

13 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom bɛyɛ asaase do nkyen; na sɛ nkyen no yew ne dɛw a, wɔdze ebɛnadze bɛhyɛ asaase no nkyen? Onnye mma hwee bio, na mbom dɛ wɔbɔtow egu ma nyimpa anan etsiatsia do.

14 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mayɛ hom kan ama nkorɔfo yi. Kurow a ɔda koko do nntum nnsuma.

15 Hwɛ, ana nyimpa sɔ kandzea dze hyɛ kuruw ase? Oho, mbom wɔdze si kandzeadua do, ma ɔhyerɛn ma hɔn a wɔwɔ fie nyina.

16 Dɛm ntsi hom mma hom kan nhyerɛn wɔ nkorɔfo yi enyim, ama woeehu hom ndwuma pa na wɔahyɛ hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor enyimnyam.

17 Mma hom nndwen dɛ mebaa bɛsɛɛ mbra no anaa nkɔnhyɛfo no, mammbɛsɛɛ no, na mebɛhyɛɛ no mã;

18 Na nokwar mese hom dɛ sor nye asaase nnyae nntwaa mu yi iota kor anaadɛ nsensanee kor nnkefi mbra no mu etwa mu, mbom wɔ mo mu na ne nyinara hyɛ mã.

19 Na hwɛ, medze m’Egya ne mbra nye ne mbrasɛm no ama hom, dɛ hom ngye me ndzi, na dɛ hom nnu homho wɔ hom bɔn ho, na hom mfa akoma a abobɔ nye sunsum a abotow mbra mo hɔ. Hwɛ hom wɔ mbrasɛm no da hom enyim, na mbra no so ahyɛ mã.

20 Dɛm ntsi hom mbra mo hɔ na hom nya nkwa; na nokwar mese hom dɛ gyedɛ hom dzi me mbrasɛm a medze ama hom mber yi mu do, annyɛ dɛm a hom rennhɛn sor ahenman no mu da.

21 Hom atse dɛ wɔkãa kyerɛɛ tsetsemba, wɔ tsetseberdo, na wɔakyerɛw so ato hom enyim dɛ, mma hom nndzi ewu, na obiara a obedzi ewu no, obedzi fɔ wɔ Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu no mu;

22 Mbom mese hom dɛ, obiara a no bo fuw no nua no, obedzi fɔ wɔ n’atsɛmbu no mu. Na obiara a ɔbɛse no nua, Raca, obedzi fɔ wɔ mpanyimfo bagua mu; na obiara a ɔbɛse Ɔkwasea, obedzi fɔ wɔ hɛl ogya no mu.

23 Dɛm ntsi, sɛ erebɛba mo hɔ anaadɛ isusu dɛ ereba mo hɔ, na sɛ ekaa dɛ wo nua wɔ asɛm bi tsia wo a—

24 Dzi kan kɔ enye wo nua no nkɔbɔ mu, na afei fa akoma a odzi mu bra me nkyɛn, na mebɛgye wo.

25 Enye wo tamfo mbɔ mu ntsɛm ber a enye no wɔ kwan mu no; annyɛ dɛm a da bi ne nsa bɛkã wo ma wɔdze wo akɔto efiadze.

26 Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, innkefi hɔ aba gyedɛ etua senine a aka ekyir no ana. Na ber a eda efiadze no, ana ibotum etua senine kor mpo? Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, Oho.

27 Hwɛ, wɔakyerɛw ato hɔ dɛ mma nntõ awar;

28 Mbom mese hom dɛ, obiara a ɔhwɛ ɔbaa dɛ no kɔn dɔ no no, ɔafa no dada wɔ n’akoma mu.

29 Hwɛ, me ma hom mbrasɛm dɛ mma hom mma kwan ma dɛm ndzɛmba yi mu biara nnhɛn hom akoma mu;

30 Na obeye dɛ hom beyi homho efi dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho ber a hom bɛfa hom mbeamudua no, sen dɛ wɔbɔtow hom akyen hɛl.

31 Wɔakyerɛw so dɛ obiara a ɔbɔkõ ne yer no, ma ɔmma no ɔkõnwoma;

32 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, obiara a ɔbɔkõ ne yer, na sɛ nnyɛ ndwamanyɛ ntsi a, ɔma ɔtõ awar; na obiara a ɔbɔwar nyia wɔakõ no no, ɔtõ awar.

33 Bio, wɔakyerɛw dɛ, mma nnkã ntanhun, na hom nyɛ ntam a hom akã ama Ewuradze;

34 Mbom nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mma hom nnkã ntam koraa; mma hom nnkã ɔsor osiandɛ ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn n’ahengua;

35 Mma hom nnkã asaase, osiandɛ ɔyɛ n’ananadzegua;

36 Eso mma nnkã wo tsir ntam, osiandɛ irunntum nnyɛ nhwi kor tuntum anaa fufuw;

37 Mbom hom mma hom kasaa nyɛ Nyew, nyew, Oho, oho; na biribiara a ɔkyɛn yinom no fi ɔbɔn no mu.

38 Na hwɛ, wɔakyerɛw dɛ, enyiwa nsi enyiwa ananmu, na esẽ nsi esẽ ananmu;

39 Mbom mese hom dɛ, mma hom nnye ɔbɔn no ndzi esi, na obiara a ɔbɛpaa w’aso nyimfa mu no, dan kor no so ma no;

40 Na sɛ obi pɛ dɛ ɔnye wo dzi asɛm, na ɔgye w’asetar a, ma ɔmfa w’akatado no so;

41 Na obiara a ɔbɛhyɛ wo dɛ enye no nkɔ ɔkwansin kor no, enye no nkɔ ebien.

42 Nyia ɔserɛ wo no, ma no; nyia ɔpɛ dɛ ɔfɛm wɔ wo hɔ no, mma nndan woho mmfi noho.

43 Na hwɛ, wɔakyerɛw so dɛ, dɔ wo nyɛnko na tan wo tamfo;

44 Mbom hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom ndodɔ hom atamfo, hom nhyira hɔn a wɔkã hom ndom, hom nyɛ papa mma hɔn a wɔtan hom, na hom nsɔr mma hɔn a wobu hom enyimtsia na wɔtseetsee hom.

45 Ama hom aayɛ hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor no ne mba; na ɔma n’ewia fir wɔ nyimpa bɔn nye nyimpa pa do.

46 Dɛm ntsi ndzɛmba a tsetse no nna ɔhyɛ mbra no ase no, nyina ahyɛ mã wɔ mo mu.

47 Ndzɛmba dadaw no, woeyi hɔn akwa, na ndzɛmba nyina abɛyɛ fofor.

48 Dɛm ntsi mepɛ dɛ hom ndzi mu, dɛ mbrɛ Emi, anaa hom sor Egya no dzi mu no.
3-ne 13:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus kyerɛkyerɛ Nephifo no Ewuradze Asɔr no—Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔpɛ hɔn akoradze gu sor—Wɔhyɛ esuafo duebien no dɛ mma wɔnndwendwen honam afamu ndzɛmba ho wɔ hɔn somdwuma mu—Fa to Matthew tsir 6 ho. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Nokwar, nokwar, mese dɛ mepɛ dɛ hom yɛ ayɛ ma ehiafo; na mbom hom nhwɛ yie ma hom annyɛ hom tsenenee wɔ nyimpa enyim dɛ wonhu; ɔyɛ dɛm a hom nnyi akatua wɔ hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor no nkyɛn.

2 Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ereyɛ ayɛ yɛdze a, mma nnhɛn totorobɛnto wɔ w’enyim, dɛ mbrɛ enyisomakyerɛfo no yɛ wɔ nhyiamudan mu nye abrɔn mu, ma woenya nyimpa hɔ enyimnyam. Nokwar mese hom dɛ, woenya hɔn akatua dada.

3 Mbom sɛ ereyɛ ayɛ yɛdze a, mma wo nsa bankum nnhu dza wo nsa nyimfa reyɛ;

4 Ama w’ayɛ aka nsumaamu, na w’Egya a ohu nsumaamu no, obotua wo kaw wɔ gua do.

5 Na sɛ hom rosɔr a, mma hom nnyɛ dɛ enyisomakyerɛfo no; osiandɛ wɔpɛ dɛ wogyina nhyiamudan mu nye abɔntsen ntoaado sɔr, ma nyimpa eehu. Nokwar mese hom dɛ, woenya hɔn akatua dada.

6 Mbom ɔwo dze, sɛ erosɔr a, hɛn wo pia mu, na atow w’abow mu no, sɔr ma w’Egya a ɔwɔ nsumaamu no, na w’Egya a ohu nsumaamu no, obotua wo kaw wɔ guado.

7 Mbom hom rosɔr a, mma hom nnyɛ kasansanmu gyan dɛ amanamamfo no, osiandɛ wɔdwen dɛ wobetsie hɔn wɔ hɔn kasa dodow ntsi.

8 Dɛm ntsi mma hom nye hɔn nnsɛ, na hom Egya nyim ndzɛmba a ohia hom ansaana hom ribisa no.

9 Dɛm ntsi hom nsɔr kwan iyi do: Hɛn Egya a ewɔ sor, wo dzin ho ntsew.

10 Wɔnyɛ wo pɛ wɔ asaase do dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛ no wɔ sor,

11 Na fa hɛn akaw kyɛ hɛn, dɛ mbrɛ hɛn so yɛdze akyɛ hɛn akafo.

12 Na mma mmfa hɛn nnkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu, na mbom yi hɛn fi ɔbɔn no mu.

13 Na ɔwo na ahendzi, nye tum, nye enyimnyam, yɛ wodze afebɔɔ. Amen.

14 Na sɛ hom dze nyimpa hɔn mfom kyɛ hɔn a, hom sor Egya so dze bɛkyɛ hom.

15 Mbom sɛ hom ammfa nyimpa hɔn mfom annkyɛ hɔn a, hom Egya so remmfa hom mfom nnkyɛ hom.

16 Na eso sɛ hom refa akɔnkye a, mma hom nnyɛ dɛ enyisomakyerɛfo no, mmunamuna hom enyim, na wɔsɛɛ hɔn enyim ma nyimpa eehu dɛ wɔrefa akɔnkye. Nokwar mese hom dɛ, woenya hɔn akatua.

17 Mbom ɔwodze sɛ erefa akɔnkye a, sera wo tsirmu na hohor w’enyim;

18 Amma eennyi woho annkyerɛ nyimpa dɛ erefa akɔnkye, na mbom wɔ w’Egya a ɔwɔ nsumaamu no enyim, na w’Egya a ohu nsumaamu no, obotua wo kaw wɔ gua do.

19 Mma hom mmpɛ akoradze nngu asaase do, mbrɛ awembowa nye nkandar sɛɛ no, na ewifo bubu mu kowia;

20 Mbom hom mpɛ akoradze ngu sor, bea a mboaba nye nkandar nnsɛɛ no, na ewifo mmbubu mu nnkowia.

21 Na mbrɛ w’akoradze wɔ no, hɔ na w’akoma so wɔ.

22 Nyimpadua ne kandzea nye enyiwa; dɛm ntsi sɛ w’enyiwa yɛ kor a, wo nyimpadua nyina bɛyɛ kann.

23 Mbom sɛ w’enyiwa muo a, wo nyimpadua nyina bɛyɛ kusuww. Dɛm ntsi sɛ kan a ɔwɔ wo mu no yɛ sum a, sum no ne kɛse tse dɛn?

24 Obiara nntum nnsom wuranom beenu; na obekyir baako na ɔadɔ baako, anaadɛ obosuo baako mu na oebu baako enyimtsia. Hom runntum nnsom Nyankopɔn nye Mammon.

25 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔhwɛɛ duebien no a ɔasan mu eyi hɔn no, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hom nkaa nsɛm a makã yi. Na hwɛ, hom nye hɔn a masan mu eyi dɛ hom nkɔsom nkorɔfo yi. Dɛm ntsi mese hom dɛ mma hom nndwendwen hom nkwa ho, dɛ ebɛnadze na hom bedzi anaa ebɛnadze na hom bɔnom, anaaso hom nyimpadua ho, dɛ ebɛnadze na hom bɛhyɛ. Ana nkwa nnkyɛn edziban, na nyimpadua so nnkyɛn atar?

26 Hom nhwɛ wimu nnoma dɛ wonndua, na wommbu, eso wɔmmboaboa ano nnhyɛ san do; naaso hom sor Egya nyɛn hɔn. Ana hom nnsom bo pii nkyɛn hɔn?

27 Na hom mu woana na ɔdwendwen a, obotum dze basafa kor ato ne tsentsen do?

28 Na ɔyɛ dɛn na hom dwendwen wɔ ntar ho? Hom nhwɛ nsũa kwã mu nsukookoo mbrɛ wonyin; wɔnnyɛ edwuma, eso wɔnntow asaaba;

29 Naaso mese hom dɛ Solomon n’enyimnyam nyina mu mpo ɔannhyehyɛ noho dɛ yinom mu kor.

30 Na sɛ Nyankopɔn ma kwã mu efuw a ɔwɔ ha ndɛ na ɔkyena wɔdze gu fononoo mu efuradze dɛm a, dɛmara so na ɔbɛma hom efuradze, sɛ hom gyedzi nnsuar a.

31 Dɛm ntsi mma hom nndwendwen dɛ, Ebɛnadze na yebedzi? anaa, Ebɛnadze na yɛbɔnom? anaa, Ebɛnadze na yebofura?

32 Na hom sor Egya nyim dɛ yinom nyina hia hom.

33 Mbom hom ndzi kan nhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn n’ahenman nye ne tsenenee, na wɔdze yinom nyina bɛkã hom ho.

34 Dɛm ntsi mma hom nndwendwen adze kyee ho, na adze kyee no bɔdwendwen nankasa ne ndzɛmba ho. Da kor no mu bɔn dɔɔ sõ ma no.
3-ne 14:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus se: Mma hom mmbu atsɛn, hom mbisa Nyame, hom nhwɛ yie wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo ho—Ɔdze nkwagye bɔ hɔn a wɔyɛ Egya ne pɛ no anohoba—Fa to Matthew tsir 7 ho. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no ɔdaan noho bio hwɛɛ nyimpadodow no na obuee n’ano kasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn bio dɛ: Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, Mma hom mmbu atsɛn, amma woemmbu hom atsɛn.

2 Na atsɛmbu kor a hom dze bobu no, wɔdze bobu hom; na esusudze kor a hom dze susu no, wɔdze bosusu ama hom.

3 Na ɔyɛ dɛn na ehwɛ duaba a ɔwɔ wo nua enyiwa mu, na enndwen mpuna a ɔwɔ w’ankasa w’enyiwa mu ho?

4 Anaaso dɛ ebɛyɛ dɛn ase wo nua dɛ: Ma minyi duaba mfi w’enyiwa mu, na hwɛ, mpuna wɔ w’ankasa w’enyiwa mu?

5 Ɔwo onyisomkyerɛnyi, dzi kan yi mpuna fi w’ankasa w’enyiwa mu; nna ibohu yie eyi duaba no efi wo nua enyiwa mu.

6 Mma hom mmfa dza no ho tsew no mma nkraman, eso mma hom nntow hom bota nngu mpreko enyim, amma wɔammfa hɔn anan enntsiatsia do, na wɔannsan bio ammbɛtsetsew hom mu.

7 Hom mbisa na wɔbɛma hom; hom nhwehwɛ na hom bohu; hom mbɔ mu na wobobue hom.

8 Na obiara a obisa no onya; na nyia ɔhwehwɛ no ohu; na nyia ɔbɔ mu no wobobue no.

9 Anaaso dɛ hom mu woana, na sɛ ne ba bisa no paanoo a, ɔbɛma no ɔbo?

10 Anaaso sɛ obisa no esunam a ɔbɛma no ɔwɔ?

11 Sɛ hom a hom muo yi nyim mbrɛ hom si dze akyɛdze pa ma hom mba a, mpɛn ahen ara na hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor no nnkɛfa ndzɛmba pa ama hɔn a wobisa no?

12 Dɛm ntsi, adze biara a hom pɛ dɛ nyimpa yɛ ma hom no, hom nyɛ dɛmara so mma hɔn, na iyi nye mbra no nye nkɔnhyɛfo no.

13 Hom nhɛn abow tseaba no mu, na abow a ɔtsɛw, na ɔkwan a ɔyɛ tɛtɛr nye dza wɔdze kɔ ɔsɛɛ mu, na piinara wɔ hɔ a wɔfa mu.

14 Osiandɛ abow a ɔyɛ tseaba na ɔkwan a ɔyɛ heaheaba nye dza wɔdze kɔ nkwa mu, na kumaabi na wohu.

15 Hom nhwɛ yie wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo ho, na wɔba hom nkyɛn wɔ nguannwoma akataho mu, na hɔn mu dze, wɔyɛ mpataku edzifodzipɛfo.

16 Hɔn aba na hom dze bohu hɔn. Ana nyimpa tsetsew wenyin aba wɔ nsoɛ do, anaaso adɔmba wɔ kɔkrɔ do?

17 Dɛmara na dua pa ɔsow eduaba pa; na dua a ɔaprɔw dze, ɔsow eduaba bɔn.

18 Dua pa nntum nnsow eduaba bɔn, na eso dua a ɔaprɔw nntum nnsow eduaba pa.

19 Dua biara a ɔnnsow eduaba pa no, wotwa, na wɔtow kyen gya mu.

20 Dɛm ntsi hom dze hɔn eduaba bohu hɔn.

21 Nnyɛ obiara a ɔse me dɛ, Ewuradze, Ewuradze, na ɔbɔkɔ sor ahenman no mu; na nyia ɔbɛyɛ m’Egya a ɔwɔ sor no ne pɛ a.

22 Da no mu no dodowara bɛse me dɛ Ewuradze, Ewuradze, ana yɛammfa wo dzin annhyɛ nkɔm, na yɛammfa wo dzin enntu mbɔnsam, na yɛammfa wo dzin annyɛ tum ndwuma pii?

23 Na aber no, mebɛpaa mu makã akyerɛ hɔn dɛ: Minnyin hom da; hom mfi me nkyɛn nkɔ, hom a hom yɛ emumuyɛ ndwuma.

24 Dɛm ntsi, obiara a otsie me nsɛm yi na ɔyɛ no, medze no bosusu badwembanyi a osii ne dan wɔ ɔbotan do no—

25 Na nsu tɔree, na nsuyirii bae, na ehum tui, ma wɔboor dan no, na ɔannhwe ase, osiandɛ wɔtoow ne fapem wɔ ɔbotan do.

26 Na obiara a otsie me nsɛm yi na ɔnnyɛ no, wɔdze no bosusu kotobonyi a osii ne dan wɔ anhwea do—

27 Na nsu tɔree, na nsuyirii bae, na ehum tui boor dan no, na ɔhwee ase, na n’asehwe no sõ.
3-ne 15:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus kã dɛ Moses mbra no ahyɛ mã wɔ No mu—Nephifo nye nguan nkaa no a Ɔkãa ho asɛm wɔ Jerusalem no—Osian emumuyɛ ntsi Ewuradze No nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no nnyim Israel nguan a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse no. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus dze ne kasaa yi baa ewiei no, ɔdze n’enyiwa kɔr aprɔw wɔ nyimpadodow no do, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ hom atse ndzɛmba a mekyerɛkyerɛe ansaana morofow akɔ m’Egya nkyɛn; dɛm ntsi nyia ɔbɛkaa dɛm nsɛm yi na ɔayɛ no, ɔno na mebɛma no do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ohun dɛ binom wɔ hɔn mu a hɔnho nwanwa hɔn na wɔrodwen dza ɔbɛyɛ wɔ Moses mbra no ho; osiandɛ wɔanntse dza ɔkãa dɛ ndzɛmba adadaw etwa mu kɔ, na ndzɛmba nyina abɛyɛ fofor no ase.

3 Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Mma ɔnnyɛ hom nwanwa dɛ mesee hom dɛ ndzɛmba adadaw etwa mu kɔ, na dɛ ndzɛmba nyina abɛyɛ fofor.

4 Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ mbra a wɔdze maa Moses no ahyɛ mã.

5 Hwɛ, Emi nye nyia ɔdze mbra no mae, na Emi nye nyia menye mo nkorɔfo Israelmba dzii ahyɛmu; dɛm ntsi, mbra no ahyɛ mã wɔ mo mu, na maba rebɛhyɛ mbra no mã; dɛm ntsi ɔwɔ ewiei.

6 Hwɛ, merennsɛɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no, na mbom dodowara a ɔnnhyɛɛ mã wɔ mo mu no, nokwar mese hom dɛ, ne nyina bɛhyɛ mã.

7 Na osiandɛ mesee hom dɛ ndzɛmba adadaw etwa mu kɔ no nnkyerɛ dɛ meresɛɛ dza wɔakã a ɔfa ndzɛmba a ɔrebɛba no ho.

8 Na hwɛ, ahyɛmu a menye mo nkorɔfo dzii no ne nyina nnhyɛɛ mã; na mbom mbra a wɔdze maa Moses no aba ewiei wɔ mo mu.

9 Hwɛ, Emi nye mbra no, nye kan no. Hom nhwɛ me, na hom ntsim nkodu ewiei, na hom bɛtsena nkwa mu, na nyia otsim kodu ewiei no mebɛma no onnyiewiei nkwa.

10 Hwɛ, medze mbrasɛm no ama hom; dɛm ntsi hom ndzi me mbrasɛm do. Na iyi nye mbra no nye nkɔnhyɛfo no, osiandɛ wodzii mo ho dase nokwar mu.

11 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi no, ɔsee duebien no a ɔsaan mu yii hɔn no dɛ:

12 Hom yɛ m’esuafo; na hom yɛ kandzea dze ma dɛm nkorɔfo yi, hɔn a wɔyɛ Joseph fifo asefo nkaa.

13 Na hwɛ, iyi nye hom egyapadze asaase; na Egya no dze ama hom.

14 Na ber biara nnyi hɔ a Egya no ama me mbrasɛm dɛ menkã nkyerɛ hom enuanom a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no.

15 Nna ber biara nnyi hɔ a Egya no ama me mbrasɛm dɛ menkã nkyerɛ Israel ebusuakuw nkaa no a Egya no eyi hɔn efi asaase no do no.

16 Na iyi dze Egya no hyɛ me dɛ menkã nkyerɛ hɔn.

17 Dɛ nguan binom so wɔ hɔ a mowɔ a wonnyi nguanbuw yi mu; hɔn so ɔwɔ dɛ medze hɔn ba, na wɔbɛtse me ndze; na wɔbɛyɛ nguanbuw kor, nye oguanhwɛfo kor.

18 Na afei, osian hɔn akɔnkye na hɔn ekyingye ntsi wɔanntse m’asɛm no ase; dɛm ntsi wɔhyɛɛ me dɛ mma mennkã biribiara bio wɔ Egya no ho a ɔfa dɛm adze yi ho no nnkyerɛ hɔn.

19 Mbom, nokwar, mese hom dɛ Egya no ahyɛ me, na mese hom dɛ wɔtseew hom fii hɔnho osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi; dɛm ntsi osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi na wonnyim hom no.

20 Na nokwar, mese hom bio dɛ Egya no eyi mbusuakuw bi so efi hɔn mu; na osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi wonnyim hɔn.

21 Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ hom nye hɔn a mekãa dɛ: Nguan binom so wɔ hɔ a mowɔ a wonnyi nguanbuw yi mu no; hɔn so ɔwɔ dɛ medze hɔn ba, na wɔbɛtse me ndze; na wɔbɛyɛ nguanbuw kor nye oguanhwɛfo kor.

22 Na wɔanntse me ase, na wosusuu dɛ ɔbɛyɛ Amanamamfo no; osiandɛ wɔanntse ase dɛ wɔnam hɔn nsɛmpa kã do bɛsakyer Amanamamfo no.

23 Na wɔanntse me ase dɛ mekãa dɛ wɔbɛtse me ndze; na wɔanntse me ase dɛ Amanamamfo no nnsɛ dɛ wɔtse me ndze dabiarada—na merennda mo ho edzi so nnkyerɛ hɔn gyedɛ ɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no do.

24 Mbom hwɛ, hom atse me ndze, na hom ehu me; na hom yɛ mo nguan, na wɔdze hom akã hɔn a Egya no dze ama me no ho.
3-ne 16:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus bɔkɔ akɛsera Israel nguan binom a wɔayew no—Nda a odzi ekyir no asɛmpa no bɔkɔ Amanamamfo na nkyii Israel fifo hɔ—Ewuradze No nkorɔfo bohu; enyiwa tua enyiwa ber a Ɔdze Zion bɛba bio no. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ mowɔ nguankuw binom so a wommfi asaase yi do, anaa Jerusalem asaase do, anaa asaase a ɔbɛn beebiara a maakɔsom do.

2 Na hɔn a merekã hɔnho asɛm yi nye hɔn a wonnyaa nntsee me ndze; anaa menndaa moho edzi nnkyerɛɛ hɔn pɛn.

3 Mbom Egya no ama me mbrasɛm dɛ monkɔ hɔn hɔ, ama hɔn so wɔaatse me ndze, na wɔakan hɔn afora mo nguan, ama wɔaabɛyɛ nguanbuw kor nye oguanhwɛfo kor; dɛm ntsi morokɔ ekeyi moho akyerɛ hɔn.

4 Na mehyɛ hom dɛ mokɔ ekyir no, hom nkyerɛw nsɛm yinom, ama sɛ ɔba dɛ mo nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Jerusalem, hɔn a woehu me na wɔkãa moho wɔ me somdwumadzi mu no no emmbisa Egya no wɔ me dzin mu, dɛ wɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no do benya hom hɔ nyimdzee, nye mbusuakuw nkaa no so a hom nnyim hɔn no, dɛ dɛm nsɛm yi a hom bɛkyerɛw yi wɔdze besie na wɔada no edzi akyerɛ Amanamamfo no, dɛ wɔnam Amanamamfo no hɔn mãhyɛ do, hɔn asefo nkaa no a osian hɔn ekyingye ntsi wɔbɔbɔ hɔn apetse asaase enyi do no, wɔdze hɔn bɛba, anaadɛ wɔdze hɔn bɛba ma woebenya moho nyimdzee, hɔn Pomfo yi.

5 Na afei mebɛkã hɔn efi asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyina do aboa ano; na mama ahyɛmu a Egya no nye nkorɔfo nyina a wɔyɛ Israel fifo no dzii no aahyɛ mã.

6 Na nhyira akã Amanamamfo, osian hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ mo mu, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no mu, ɔno na ɔgye dase wɔ emi nye Egya no ho kyerɛ hɔn.

7 Hwɛ, osian hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ mo mu ntsi, Egya no na ɔse, na osian hom ekyingye ntsi, O Israel fifo, da a odzi ewiei no mu no, nokwar no bɛba Amanamamfo no hɔ, ama wɔaada dɛm ndzɛmba yi ne mãhyɛ edzi akyerɛ hɔn.

8 Mbom, Egya no na ɔse, Amanamamfo ekyingyefo ndue—na ɔmmfa ho dɛ wɔaba asaase yi enyi do na wɔabɔ mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo apetse; na woeyi mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo tokyen na woetsiatsia hɔn do wɔ hɔn ananadze;

9 Na osian Egya no n’ehumbɔbɔr a ɔwɔ Amanamamfo do, na Egya no n’atsɛmbu so a ɔwɔ mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo do ntsi, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, iyi nyina ekyir no, mahyɛ mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo no dɛ wɔnhwe hɔn, ma wonhu amandze, na wonkunkum hɔn, na wonyi hɔn mfi hɔn mu, na wonkyir hɔn, na wɔmbɛyɛ dɛ nkorɔfo a wɔbɔ hɔn nhwiroma na wodzi hɔho fen—

10 Na iyi na Egya no ahyɛ me dɛ menkã nkyerɛ hom: Dɛm da no a Amanamamfo no bɛyɛ bɔn etsia m’asɛmpa, na wɔbɔpow m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ na wɔbɛma hɔn akoma do wɔ ahantanyɛ mu wɔ aman nyina do, nye nyimpa a wɔwɔ asaase nyina do, na atorsɛm horow nyina bɛhyɛ hɔn mã, nye ndaadaa, nye ewurkadze, nye ndabraba horow nyina, nye ewudzi, nye asofoɔtorsom na ndwamambɔ, nye nsumaamu ndzeyɛbɔn; na sɛ wɔyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina, na wɔpow m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ a, hwɛ, Egya no na ɔse, mibeyi m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no efi hɔn mu.

11 Na afei mebɛkaa ahyɛmu a medzi akyerɛ mo nkorɔfo, O Israel fifo, na medze m’asɛmpa no bɛbrɛ hɔn.

12 Na mibeyi akyerɛ hom, O Israel fifo, dɛ Amanamamfo no rinnya tum wɔ hom do; mbom mebɛkaa m’ahyɛmu a medzi akyerɛ hom, O Israel fifo, na hom benya m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ ho nyimdzee.

13 Mbom sɛ Amanamamfo no nu hɔnho na wɔsan ba mo hɔ a, Egya no na ɔse, hwɛ wɔbɛkan hɔn afora mo nkorɔfo, O Israel fifo.

14 Na meremma mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo no nnkoduadua hɔn mu, mma wonntsiatsia hɔn do, Egya no na ɔse.

15 Mbom sɛ wɔannsan ammba mo hɔ, na woenntsie me ndze a, mebɛma hɔn kwan, nyew, mebɛma mo nkorɔfo, O Israel fifo, ma woekoduadua hɔn mu, na woetsiatsia hɔn do, na wɔbɛyɛ dɛ nkyen a ɔayew ne dɛw ma ho nnyi mfaso biara na mbom wɔtow gu, ma mo nkorɔfo, O Israel fifo dze hɔn anan etsiatsia do.

16 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dɛm na Egya no ahyɛ me dɛ menkã dɛ memfa asaase yi mma dɛm nkorɔfo yi ma ɔnyɛ hɔn egyapadze.

17 Na nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaiah ne nsɛm no bɛhyɛ mã, dza ɔkãa dɛ:

18 Hom aweɔmfo bɛma ndze do; wɔbɔbɔmu dze ndze atow ndwom, na wɔdze hɔn enyiwa tua enyiwa ber a Ewuradze dze Zion bɛba bio.

19 Hom ndzi dɛw, hom mbɔmu ntow ndwom, hom Jerusalem ne mbea a ayeyɛ afõ; osiandɛ Ewuradze akyekye no nkorɔfo hɔn werɛ, ɔapon Jerusalem.

20 Ewuradze eyi n’abasa krɔnkrɔn no hɔ wɔ amanaman nyinara enyim; na asaase n’ano n’ano nyina bohu Nyankopɔn no nkwagye.
3-ne 17:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 17[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus se no nkorɔfo dɛ wɔndwendwen Ne nsɛm ho na wɔmbɔ mpaa mbisa ntseasee—Ɔsa hɔn ayarfo yarba—Ɔdze kasa a obiara nntum nnkyerɛw bɔ mpaa ma nkorɔfo no—Abɔfo bɔsom hɔn na ogya twa hɔn mbofra ho hyia. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Hwɛ, afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔdze n’enyiwa kɔr aprɔw bio hwɛɛ nyimpadodow no, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hom nhwɛ, me mber asõ.

2 Muhu dɛ hom ayɛ mberɛw, ntsi hom runntum nntse me nsɛm nyina a Egya no hyɛɛ me dɛ menkã nkyerɛ hom no ase dɛm aber yi.

3 Dɛm ntsi, hom nkɔ hom efiefi na hom nkɔdwendwen dza makã no ho, na hom mbisa Egya no wɔ me dzin mu, ama hom aatse ase, na hom nsiesie hom adwen mu yie mfa mma adze kyee, na mebɛba hom nkyɛn bio.

4 Mbom afei morokɔ Egya no nkyɛn, na medze moho so akyerɛ Israel ebusuakuw a wɔayew no, osiandɛ wɔnnyewee mmaa Egya no, na onyim bea a ɔdze hɔn kɔ.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm wiei no, ɔdze n’enyiwa kɔr aprɔw bio wɔ nyimpadodow no do, na ohun dɛ nyinsuwa eguraa hɔn, na wɔhwɛɛ no hann tse dɛ ma wɔrohwehwɛ akã akyerɛ no ma oetsintsim wɔ hɔn nkyɛn kakra.

6 Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, ayamuhyehye ahyɛ m’abadaa mu mã wɔ homho.

7 Ana hom wɔ ayarfo bi wɔ hom mu? Hom mfa hɔn mbra. Ana hom wɔ ebubuafo, anaa efurafo, anaa mpakye, anaa hɔn a woedzi dzɛm, anaa akwatafo, anaa hɔn a wɔadwedwe, anaa etsitsifo, anaa hɔn a biribi rehaw hɔn? Hom mfa hɔn mbra na mebɛsa hɔn yarba, osiandɛ me yamu hyehye me wɔ hom ho; ehumbɔbɔr ahyɛ m’abadaa mu mã.

8 Na muhu dɛ hom pɛ dɛ meyɛ dza mayɛ ama hom enuanom a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no osiandɛ muhu dɛ hom wɔ gyedzi a ɔsõ dɛ mesa hom yarba.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔkãa dɛm wiei no, nyimpadodow no nyina tuu punkum kɔree kɛfaa hɔn ayarfo nye hɔn nkorɔfo a woruhu amandze, nye hɔn ebubuafo, nye hɔn efurafo, nye hɔn a wɔatotɔ mmum, nye hɔn a woruhu amandze wɔ kwan biara do nyina bae; na ɔsaa obiara a wɔdze no brɛɛ no no yarba.

10 Na hɔn nyina, hɔn a wɔasa hɔn yarba nye hɔn a wodzi mu nyina bɔɔ mu twae hwee n’ananadze, na wɔsɔɔr no; na nyimpadodow no mu dodow biara a wobotum no feew n’ananho, na wɔyɛɛ no dɛm araa ma wɔdze hɔn nyinsua guaar n’ananho.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmfa hɔn mbofra nkakraba mbra.

12 Dɛm ntsi wɔdze hɔn mbofraba bae bɛtsenatsenaa famu twaa noho hyiae, na Jesus gyinaa finimfin; na nyimpadodow no maa kwan kesii dɛ wɔdze hɔn nyina brɛɛ no.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔdze hɔn nyina bae no, Jesus gyinaa finimfin, na ɔhyɛɛ nyimpadodow no dɛ wombu ntwɛr wɔ famu.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wobuu ntwɛr no, Jesus no werɛ howee wɔ no mu, na ɔsee dɛ: Egya, midzi yaw osian Israel fifo hɔn emumuyɛdze ntsi.

15 Na ber a ɔkãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔnoara so buu ntwɛr; na hwɛ ɔbɔɔ mpaa maa Egya no, na mpaa a ɔbɔe no worunntum nnkyerɛw, na nyimpadodow no a wɔtsee no gyee ho dase.

16 Na dɛm na wɔfaa do gyee dase: Enyiwa nnhun, nna asowa so nntsee dɛm anwanwadze akɛse a ɔtse dɛm a yehunii na yɛtsee dɛ Jesus rekã kyerɛ Egya no bi da;

17 Na tɛkyerɛma biara runntum nnkã, anaadɛ ɔdasanyi biara runntum nnkyerɛw, nna adasamba hɔn akoma runntum mmfa anwanwadze akɛse a ɔtse dɛm a yehunii na yɛtsee dɛ Jesus rekã no obiara nnkotum esusu ho na obiara runntum nsusu dɛw a ɔhyɛɛ hɛn akoma mu dɛm aber no a yɛtsee dɛ ɔrobɔ mpaa serɛ Egya no dze ama hɛn no.

18 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus bɔɔ mpaa maa Egya no wiei no, ɔsoɛree; na mbom nyimpadodow no hɔn enyigye yɛɛ kɛse ara ma hyɛɛ hɔn do.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ Jesus kasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn na ɔsee hɔn dɛ wɔnsoɛr.

20 Na wɔsoɛree, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Nhyira akã hom osian hom gyedzi ntsi. Na afei hwɛ, m’enyigye ahyɛ mã.

21 Na ɔkãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, osũi, na nyimpadodow no gyee ho dase, na ɔfaa hɔn mbofraba no nkorkor, na ohyiraa hɔn, na ɔbɔɔ mpaa serɛɛ Egya no dze maa hɔn.

22 Na ber a ɔyɛɛ dɛm wiei no osũu bio.

23 Na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ nyimpadodow no see dɛ: Hom nhwɛ hom mbofraba nye yi.

24 Na ber a wɔrohwɛ hɔn no, wɔtoo hɔn enyiwa wɔ sor, na wohun dɛ sor ebue, na wohun abɔfo dɛ wofi sor risian na ɔyɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔwɔ ogya ne finimfin; na wɔbae botwaa dɛm mbofraba noho hyiae, na ogya bɔɔ hɔnho aprɔw; na abɔfo bɔsoom hɔn.

25 Na nyimpadodow no hunii na wɔtsee na wɔgyee ho dase; na wonyim dɛ hɔn dasegye no yɛ nokwar osiandɛ hɔn nyinara hunii na wɔtsee, na nyimpa biara dze maa nankasa noho; na hɔn dodow bɛyɛ akra mpemebien na ahaenum; na wɔyɛ mbarimba, mbaa na mbofra.
3-ne 18:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 18[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus dze sacrament no bɔbɔ adze wɔ Nephifo mu—Ɔhyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbɔ mpaa daa wɔ Ne dzin mu—Wobobu hɔn a hɔnho nntsew na wodzi No honam na wɔnom No bɔgyaa no fɔ—Wɔma esuafo no tum dɛ wɔmfa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no mma. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ Jesus hyɛɛ n’esuafo no dɛ wɔmfa paanoo nye wenyin mbrɛ no.

2 Na ber a wɔkɔr dɛ wɔrekɛfa paanoo nye wenyin no, ɔsee nyimpadodow no dɛ wɔntsena ase.

3 Na ber a esuafo no dze paanoo na wenyin no bae no, ɔfaa paanoo no na obubuu mu na ohyiraa do; na ɔhyɛɛ n’esuafo no dɛ wondzi.

4 Na ber a wodzidzii na wɔmee wiei no, ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmfa mma dɔmtutuw no.

5 Na ber a nyimpadodow no dzidzii na wɔmee no, ɔsee esuafo no dɛ: Hwɛ hom mu kor na meeyi no na mibehyira no, na ɔno na mebɛma no tum dɛ ombubu paanoo na onhyira do na ɔmfa mma nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ m’asɔr mu, nye hɔn a wɔbɛgye me edzi na woenuma hɔn wɔ me dzin mu.

6 Na hom nhwɛ nyɛ iyi daadaa, dɛ mbrɛ mayɛ yi mpo, dɛ mbrɛ mebubu paanoo na mehyira do na medze ama hom yi mpo.

7 Na iyi na hom nyɛ mfa nkaa mo honandua a medze akyerɛ hom yi. Na ɔbɛyɛ dasegye dze ama Egya no dɛ hom kaa me daa. Na sɛ hom kaa me daa a hom benya mo Sunsum ma ɔnye hom abɛtsena.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a ɔkãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔhyɛɛ n’esuafo no dɛ wɔmfa wenyin kuraba no na wɔnnom, na wɔmfa mma nyimpadodow no so ma wɔnnom.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔyɛɛ dɛm, na wɔnomee na wɔmee; na wɔdze maa nyimpadodow no so na wɔnomee na wɔmee.

10 Na ber a esuafo no yɛɛ iyi no, Jesus see hɔn dɛ: Nhyira akã hom wɔ adze yi a hom ayɛ yi ntsi, na iyi rehyɛ me mbrasɛm no mã, na iyi yɛ dase dze ma Egya no dɛ hom pɛ dɛ hom yɛ dza mahyɛ hom no.

11 Na hom nyɛ iyi daa mfa mma hɔn a wonu hɔnho na wonuma hɔn wɔ me dzin mu no; na hom bɛyɛ iyi dze akaa mo bɔgyaa a mikyii maa hom, ama hom aagye dase akyerɛ Egya no dɛ hom kaa me daa. Na sɛ hom kaa me daa a hom benya mo Sunsum ma ɔnye hom abɛtsena.

12 Na me ma hom mbrasɛm dɛ hom nyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi. Na sɛ hom yɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi daa a nhyira akã hom, osiandɛ wɔdze hom esi mo botan do.

13 Mbom hom mu biara a ɔbɛyɛ dza ɔbor iyinom do anaa dza ɔtɔ sin wɔ iyinom ho no woennsi no wɔ mo botan no do, mbom woesi wɔ anhwea do; na ber a nsu bɔtɔ, na nsuyirii bɛba, na mframa bɔbɔ ahwe no no, ɔbɔhwe ase, na hɛl mbobow no eebue ayɛ krado dɛ ɔbɛgye no.

14 Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom dzi me mbrasɛm a Egya no hyɛɛ me dɛ memfa mma hom no do a nhyira akã hom.

15 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom weɔn na hom nsɔr daa nyina, amma abɔnsam no annsɔ hom annhwɛ, na ɔammfa hom annkɔ ndɔmmum mu.

16 Na dɛ mbrɛ mabɔ mpaa wɔ hom mu yi, dɛmara so na hom so hom mbɔ mpaa wɔ m’asɔrfi mu, wɔ mo nkorɔfo a woenu hɔnho na woenuma hɔn wɔ me dzin mu no mu. Hwɛ Emi nye kan no; mayɛ fasusu ama hom.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ n’esuafo wiei no, ɔdaan noho bio wɔ nyimpadodow no do na ɔsee hɔn dɛ:

18 Hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ hom weɔn na hom nsɔr daa nyina amma hom annkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu; osiandɛ Satan pɛ dɛ onya hom, ama ɔaapo hom dɛ isam.

19 Dɛm ntsi otwar dɛ hom sɔr ma Egya no daa nyina wɔ me dzin mu;

20 Na biribiara a hom bebisa Egya no wɔ me dzin mu, na oye, na hom gye dzi dɛ hom nsa bɛkã no, hwɛ wɔdze bɛma hom.

21 Hom nye hom ebusua ebusua nsɔr mma Egya no daa nyina wɔ me dzin mu, ama woeehyira hom yernom nye hom mba.

22 Na hwɛ, hom ntaa nhyia mu; na mma hom nnsiw nyimpa biara kwan dɛ mma ɔmmba hom nkyɛn ber a hom ehyia, mbom hom mma wɔmbra hom nkyɛn na mma hom nnsiw hɔn kwan;

23 Mbom hom mbɔ mpaa mma hɔn, na mma hom nnyi hɔn tokyen; na sɛ ɔba dɛ wɔtaa ba hom nkyɛn a, hom mbɔ mpaa mma Egya no wɔ me dzin mu mfa mma hɔn.

24 Dɛm ntsi, hom mma hom kandzea do ama ɔaahyerɛn ama wiadzemba. Hwɛ Emi nye kandzea a hom bɛma do no—dza hom hun me dɛ meyɛɛ no. Hwɛ hom hun dɛ mabɔ mpaa ama Egya no, na hom nyinara agye ho dase.

25 Na hom ehu dɛ mahyɛ hom dɛ mma hom mu biara nnkɔ, na mbom mahyɛ hom dɛ hom mbra mo hɔ, ama hom eetum dze hom nsa aakã me na hom atse na hom eehu; dɛmara so na hom nyɛ mma wiadze; na obiara a obu mbrasɛm yi do no ma noho kwan ma wɔdze no kɔ nsɔhwɛ mu.

26 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔdaan n’enyiwa bio wɔ n’esuafo no a ɔasan mu eyi hɔn no do, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ:

27 Hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ merema hom mbrasɛm bi so ansaana makɔ m’Egya no hɔ na makɛhyɛ mbrasɛm nkaa no so a ɔdze ama me no mã.

28 Na afei hwɛ, mbrasɛm a medze rema hom no nye yi, dɛ sɛ hom dze mo honam nye mo bɔgyaa rema a, mma hom mma kwan ma obiara a hom nyim dɛ onndzi mu no nndzi bi.

29 Na nyia onndzi mu na odzi mo honam na ɔnom mo bɔgyaa no odzi na ɔnom afɔbu ma ne kra; dɛm ntsi sɛ hom nyim dɛ obi mmfata dɛ odzi mo honam na ɔnom mo bɔgyaa a hom nsiw no kwan.

30 Naaso, mma hom nnyi no edzi wɔ hom mu, na mbom hom nsom no na hom mbɔ mpaa mma Egya no wɔ me dzin mu mfa mma no; na sɛ ɔba dɛ onu noho na wonuma no wɔ me dzin mu a, hom ngye no, na hom mma no mo honam nye mo bɔgyaa no.

31 Mbom sɛ oennu noho a mma hom nnkan no mmfora mo nkorɔfo no, amma hom annsɛɛ mo nkorɔfo, na hwɛ minyim mo nguan, na wɔakan hɔn.

32 Naaso, mma hom mmpam no mmfi hom nhyiamudan mu, anaa mbea a hom sɔr wɔ, na oyi na ɔwɔ dɛ hom kɔ do som no; na hom nnyim, bɛyɛ na ɔasan enu noho, na ɔdze akoma a odzi mu aba me nkyɛn, na mebɛsa no yarba; na hom na wobodua hom do dze nkwagye bɛbrɛ hɔn.

33 Dɛm ntsi, hom ndzi nsɛm a mahyɛ hom yi do amma hom ammba afɔbu ase; na nyia Egya no bu no fɔ no ndue.

34 Na medze dɛm mbrasɛm yi ma hom osian ekyingye a aba hom mu no ntsi. Na sɛ ekyingye biara nnyi hom mu a nhyira akã hom.

35 Na afei morokɔ Egya no nkyɛn, na osian hom ntsi ohia dɛ mokɔ Egya no hɔ.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus dze dɛm kasa yi baa ewiei no, ɔdze ne nsa kãa esuafo no a ɔasan mu eyi hɔn no nkorkor kesii dɛ ɔdze ne nsa kãa hɔn nyinara mpo, na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn ber a ɔdze ne nsa kekãa hɔn no.

37 Na nyimpadodow no anntse nsɛm a ɔkãe no, dɛm ntsi wɔanngye ho dase; na mbom esuafo no gyee dase dɛ ɔmaa hɔn tum dɛ wɔmfa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no mma. Na ekyir yi mebɛma hom ehu dɛ dɛm kyerɛwsɛm yi yɛ nokwar.

38 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus dze ne nsa kãa hɔn nyinara wiei no, fua bɛkataa nyimpadodow no do ma woennhu Jesus.

39 Na ber a fua no bɛkataa hɔn do no, ofii hɔn nkyɛn, na ɔfowee kɔr sor. Na esuafo no hunii na wɔgyee dase dɛ ɔfoow bio kɔr sor.
3-ne 19:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 19[/font_size][/center]

[i]Esuafo duebien no som nkorɔfo no na wɔbɔ mpaa dze bisa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no—Wonuma esuafo duebien no na hɔn nsa kã Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no, na abɔfo hɔn som—Jesus dze kasa bi bɔ mpaa a wonntum nnkyerɛw—Ɔgye dase wɔ Nephifo hɔn gyedzi kese ho. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus fowee kɔr sor no, nyimpadodow no petsee, na ɔbarimba biara faa ne yer na ne mba na ɔsanee kɔr nankasa ne fie.

2 Na wɔbɔɔ no dawur ntsɛmara wɔ nkorɔfo no mu ansaana adze resa dɛ, nyimpadodow no ehu Jesus, na ɔasom hɔn, na n’adze kyee no so obeyi noho bio akyerɛ nyimpadodow no.

3 Nyew, na anafua no nyina mpo wɔbɔɔ Jesus ho dawur kyerɛɛ nkorɔfo pii, na wɔkɔr nyimpa a wɔdɔɔ sõ no hɔn hɔ nyew dɔm dodow ara yie dzii dwuma anafua no nyina, ama adze kye a woeetum aba bea a Jesus beyi noho akyerɛ nyimpadodow no do.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no, ber a nyimpadodow no boaa hɔn ano no, hwɛ, Nephi nye no nuabanyin no a onyaan no fii ewufo mu no a ne dzin dze Timothy no nye ne ba so a ne dzin dze Jonas, nye Mathoni so, nye Mathonihah a ɔyɛ no nuabanyin no, nye Kumen, nye Kumenonhi, nye Jeremiah nye Shemnon, nye Jonas, nye Zedekiah, nye Isaiah—afei woyinom nye esuafo no a Jesus saan mu yii hɔn no—na ɔbaa dɛ wɔkɔr na wokegyinaa nyimpadodow no finimfin.

5 Na hwɛ, dɔm no sõ ara ma ɔmaa wɔkyekyɛɛ hɔn mu ekuw duebien.

6 Na duebien no kyerɛkyerɛɛ nyimpadodow no; na hwɛ, wɔsee nyimpadodow no dɛ wombu ntwɛr wɔ asaase n’enyi do na wɔmbɔ mpaa mma Egya no wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu.

7 Na esuafo no so bɔɔ mpaa maa Egya no wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu. Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔsoɛree na wɔkyerɛkyerɛe.

8 Na ber a wɔkãa nsɛm no ara a Jesus kãa kyerɛɛ hɔn no—wɔannsesa biribiara wɔ nsɛm a Jesus akã no mu—hwɛ, wɔkotoow bio na wɔbɔɔ mpaa maa Egya no wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu.

9 Na wɔbɔɔ mpaa bisaa dza wohia; na wɔserɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no mma hɔn.

10 Na ber a wɔbɔɔ dɛm mpaa yi wiei no wɔkɔr nsu no nkyɛn, na nyimpadodow no kãa hɔn do.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi kɔr nsu no mu na wonumaa no.

12 Na ofii nsu no mu bae no, ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ orunuma. Na onumaa hɔn a Jesus saan mu yii hɔn no nyinara.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wonumaa hɔn nyinara na wofii nsu no mu bae no, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no baa hɔn do, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no nye ogya hyɛɛ hɔn mã.

14 Na hwɛ, biribi twaa hɔnho hyiae a ɔtse dɛ ogya; na ofi sor bae, na nyimpadodow no hunii, na wɔgyee ho dase; na abɔfo fi sor sianee bɔsoom hɔn.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a abɔfo no rosom esuafo no, hwɛ, Jesus baa begyinaa hɔn finimfin na ɔsoom hɔn.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ nyimpadodow no, na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wombu ntwɛr bio, na ɔsee n’esuafo no so dɛ wombu ntwɛr.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a hɔn nyina buu ntwɛr no, ɔhyɛɛ n’esuafo no dɛ wɔmbɔ mpaa.

18 Na hwɛ, wɔhyɛɛ ase bɔɔ mpaa; na wɔbɔɔ mpaa maa Jesus, na wɔfrɛɛ no hɔn Ewuradze nye hɔn Nyankopɔn.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ Jesus fii hɔn finimfin na ɔtwee noho fii hɔn finimfin kɔr ekyir kakra na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ famu na ɔsee dɛ:

20 Egya, meda wo ase dɛ edze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ama woyinom a m’asan mu eyi hɔn yi; na osian gyedzi a wɔwɔ no wɔ mo mu ntsi na meyi hɔn efi wiadze.

21 Egya, meserɛ wo ma edze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ama obiara a ɔbɛgye hɔn nsɛm edzi.

22 Egya, ɔwo edze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ama hɔn osiandɛ wɔgye me dzi; na ihu dɛ wɔgye me dzi osiandɛ etse dɛ wɔrobɔ mpaa ma me; na wɔbɔ mpaa ma me osiandɛ mowɔ hɔn nkyɛn.

23 Na afei Egya, mobɔ mpaa ma wo dze ma hɔn, nye hɔn so a wɔbɛgye hɔn nsɛm edzi, ama wɔaagye me edzi, ama maatsena hɔn mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔwo, Egya, etse mo mu, ama yɛaayɛ kor.

24 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus bɔɔ dɛm mpaa yi maa Egya no wiei no, ɔbaa n’esuafo no nkyɛn, na hwɛ, nna wɔda ho robɔ mpaa; na wɔronntoa nsɛm pii, osiandɛ wɔakyerɛ hɔn mpaa a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔbɔ; na woenya pɛ mbordo.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ Jesus hyiraa hɔn ber a wɔrobɔ mpaa ma no no; na ɔyerɛɛw n’ano kyerɛɛ hɔn, na kan a ɔwɔ n’enyim no hyerɛɛn hɔn do, na hwɛ wɔyɛɛ fitaa dɛ mbrɛ Jesus n’enyim tse na dɛ mbrɛ n’atar ne hyerɛn so tse; na hwɛ wɔhyerɛnee kyɛn adze fitaa biara, nyew, na biribiara nnyi asaase so do a ɔyɛ fitaa dɛ mbrɛ hɔ hyerɛnee yɛe.

26 Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ: Hom nkɔ do mbɔ mpaa; dɛm ntsi woenngyaa mpaa bɔ.

27 Na ofii hɔn nkyɛn bio na ɔkɔr ekyir kakra na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ famu; na ɔbɔɔ mpaa bio maa Egya no see dɛ:

28 Egya, meda wo ase dɛ atsew hɔn a m’asan mu eyi hɔn yi hɔnho, osian hɔn gyedzi ntsi, na mobɔ mpaa dze ma hɔn, nye hɔn so a wɔbɛgye hɔn nsɛm edzi, ama ɔnam gyedzi a ɔwɔ hɔn nsɛm mu no ntsi wɔaatsew hɔnho wɔ mo mu, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn so hɔnho atsew wɔ mo mu no.

29 Egya, mommbɔ mpaa mma wiadzemba, na mbom mobɔ mpaa ma hɔn a eyi hɔn efi wiadze yi mu dze hɔn ama me no, osian hɔn gyedzi ntsi ama hɔnho aatsew wɔ mo mu, ama maatsena hɔn mu, dɛ mbrɛ ɔwo, Egya, etse mo mu, ama yɛaayɛ kor, ama wɔaahyɛ me enyimnyam wɔ hɔn mu.

30 Na ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔbaa n’esuafo no nkyɛn bio; na hwɛ wɔkɔr do bɔɔ mpaa enyiberdo maa no; na ɔyerɛɛw n’ano kyerɛɛ hɔn bio; na hwɛ wɔyɛɛ fitaa dɛ Jesus ankasa mpo.

31 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkɔr ekyir kakra bio na ɔbɔɔ mpaa maa Egya no;

32 Na tɛkyerɛma runntum nnkã nsɛm a ɔbɔɔ mpaa kãe no, nna ɔdasanyi so runntum nnkyerɛw nsɛm a ɔbɔɔ mpaa kãe no.

33 Na nyimpadodow no tsee na wɔgyee ho dase; na hɔn akoma mu buei ma wɔtsee nsɛm a ɔbɔɔ mpaa kãe no ase wɔ hɔn akoma mu.

34 Naaso nsɛm a ɔbɔɔ mpaa kãe no mu dɔ na ɔyɛ nwanwa kɛse araa ma worunntum nnkyerɛw, eso ɔdasanyi runntum mmfa n’ano nnkã.

35 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus wiee mpaa bɔ no, ɔbaa n’esuafo no nkyɛn bio bɛsee hɔn dɛ: Gyedzi kɛse a ɔtse dɛm yi munnhun bi da wɔ Jewfo nyinara mu pɛn; osian hɔn ekyingye ntsi menntum annyɛ etumdze akɛse annkyerɛ hɔn.

36 Nokwar mese hom dɛ, hɔn mu biara nnyi hɔ a ohun dɛm ndzɛmba akɛse yi a hom ehu yi; eso wɔanntse nsɛm akɛse a hom atse yi.
3-ne 20:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 20[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus ma paanoo nye wenyin puee hɔ nwanwa mu ara na ohyira no sacrament no do ma nkorɔfo—Jacob n’asefo bɛba ebenya Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn noho nyimdzee na wɔbɛtsena America asaase tɔw no do—Jesus yɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi tse dɛ Moses, na Nephifo yɛ nkɔnhyɛfo hɔn mba—Wɔbɔboaboa Ewuradze no nkorɔfo nkaafo no ano dze hɔn akɔ Jerusalem. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhyɛɛ nyimpadodow no nye n’esuafo no so dɛ wongyaa mpaa bɔ. Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wonngyaa mpaa bɔ wɔ hɔn akoma mu.

2 Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnsoɛr ngyina hɔn anan do. Na wɔsoɛree gyinaa hɔn anan do.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ obubuu paanoo mu bio na ohyiraa do na ɔdze maa n’esuafo no ma wodzii.

4 Na ber a wodzii wiei no, ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wombubu paanoo mu na wɔmfa mma nyimpadodow no.

5 Na ber a wɔdze maa nyimpadodow no, ɔmaa hɔn wenyin so dɛ wɔnnom, na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmfa mma nyimpadodow no.

6 Afei, esuafo no anaa nyimpadodow no mu biara ammfa paanoo anaa wenyin ammba hɔ;

7 Mbom ɔyɛ nokwar dɛ ɔmaa hɔn paanoo ma wodzii, nye wenyin so ma wɔnomee.

8 Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Nyia odzi paanoo yi no, odzi mo honandua ma ne kra; na nyia ɔnom wenyin yi nom mo bɔgyaa ma ne kra; na ɔkɔm nye nsukɔm renndze no da, mbom ɔbɛmee.

9 Afei, ber a nyimpadodow no nyinara dzidzii na wɔnomee wiei no, hwɛ, Sunsum no bɛhyɛɛ hɔn mã; na wɔdze ndze kor kaa mu, na wɔhyɛɛ Jesus a wohun no na wotsiee no no so enyimnyam.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a hɔn nyinara hyɛɛ Jesus enyimnyam wiei no, ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ afei mewie dza Egya no maa me ho mbrasɛm dɛ menyɛ wɔ dɔm yi ho no, hɔn a wɔyɛ Israel fifo nkaa no.

11 Hom kaa dɛ mekasaa kyerɛɛ hom, na mekãa ber a Isaiah ne nsɛm no bɛhyɛ mã—hwɛ wɔakyerɛw, na ɔda hom enyim, dɛm ntsi hom nhwehwɛ—

12 Na nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ber a ɔbɛhyɛ mã no nna ahyɛmu a Egya no nye no nkorɔfo edzi no bɛhyɛ mã, O Israel fifo.

13 Ber no nna asefo a wɔaka no a wɔbɔbɔ hɔn apetse asaase n’enyi do no wɔbɔboaboa hɔn ano fi boka, nye anee, fi anaafo nye etsifi, na wɔdze hɔn bɛba hɔn Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, a ɔapon hɔn no noho nyimdzee ho.

14 Na Egya no ahyɛ me dɛ memfa asaase yi mma hom, ma ɔnyɛ hom egyapadze.

15 Na mese hom dɛ, sɛ Amanamamfo no ennu hɔnho a, ekyir yi a wɔabɔ mo nkorɔfo apetse na hɔn nsa akã nhyira no—

16 Nna hom a hom yɛ Jacob fifo nkaa a hom aka no bɔfora hɔn mu; na hom bɛhyɛ hɔn a wɔdɔɔ sõ pii no hɔn finimfin; na hom bɛhyɛ hɔn mu tse dɛ awendadze a ɔfora hamu mbowa akɛse mu; na tse dɛ awendadze kakraba a ɔhyɛ nguankuw mu a, sɛ ɔnam hɔn mu a otsiatsia hɔn do na ɔtsetsew hɔn mu esinesin, na obiara runntum nngye hɔn.

17 Hom bɛma hom nsa do wɔ hom atamfo do, na hom botwa hom atamfo nyina egu.

18 Na mobɔboaboa mo nkorɔfo ano dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa boaboa efi-efi ano kɔ ewuporoweebea.

19 Na mebɛma mo nkorɔfo a Egya no nye hɔn edzi ahyɛmu no, nyew, mebɛyɛ hɔn ambɛn dadze, na mayɛ hɔn anansɔba ayewa. Na hom bɛtsetsew nyimpa pii hɔn mu esinesin; na mebɛtsew hɔn ahonyadze do dze ama Ewuradze, na hɔn ahodze ama asaase nyina Ewuradze. Na hwɛ, emi na meyɛ iyi.

20 Na ɔbɛba dɛ, Egya no na ɔse, dɛ me pɛrpɛrdzi nkrantsee bɛsensɛn hɔn do wɔ dɛm da no mu; na gyedɛ wonu hɔnho annyɛ dɛm a ɔbɔtɔ hɔn do, Egya no na ɔse, nyew, ɔbɔtɔ Amanamamfo hɔn aman nyina mpo do.

21 Na ɔbɛba dɛ mebɛma mo nkorɔfo etsim, O Israel fifo.

22 Na hwɛ, dɛm nkorɔfo yi na mebɛma woetsim wɔ asaase yi do, ama ahyɛmu a menye hom egya Jacob dzii no aahyɛ mã; na wɔbɛyɛ Jerusalem Fofor. Na sor tum nyina bɛba nkorɔfo yi hɔn finimfin; nyew, emi so mpo mebɛtsena hɔn finimfin.

23 Hwɛ, Emi nye nyia Moses kãa noho asɛm dɛ: Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn beyi nkɔnhyɛnyi ama hom efi hom enuanom mu, a ɔtse dɛ emi; ɔno na dza ɔbɛse hom biara no hom ntsie. Na ɔbɛba dɛ ɔkra biara a onnketsie dɛm nkɔnhyɛnyi no, wobotwa no efi nkorɔfo no mu akyen.
