24 Nokwar mese hom dɛ nyew, nkɔnhyɛnyi nyina a wofi Samuel n’aber do nye hɔn a wodzi n’ekyir, nye dodowara a wɔkasaa no, gyee moho dase.

25 Na hwɛ, hom nye nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn mba; na hom nye Israel fifo no; na hom nye ahyɛmu no a Egya no nye hom egyanom dzii no, na ɔsee Abraham dɛ: W’asefo mu na wɔbehyira asaase ebusuafo nyinara.

26 Na Egya no enyan me edzi kan aba hom hɔ, na ɔasoma me dɛ mebehyira hom na memma hom mu biara ndan mfi no emumuyɛ ho; osiandɛ hom nye ahyɛmu mba no—

27 Na nhyira a wɔdze ehyira hom yi na ɔhyɛ ahyɛmu a Egya no nye Abraham dzii dɛ: W’asefo mu na wobehyira asaase ebusuafo nyina—ekesi dɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no nam mo do bohue egu Amanamamfo do, dɛm nhyira a obogu Amanamamfo do no bɛma woenya ahoɔdzen akyɛn obiara, ma wɔabɔ mo nkorɔfo apetse, O Israel fifo.

28 Na wɔbɛhaw nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asaase yi do. Naaso sɛ hɔn nsa kã m’asɛmpa no ne mãhyɛ na sɛ wopirim hɔn akoma wɔ moho a, medze hɔn emumuyɛ bɛsan egu hɔnankasa hɔn etsifi, Egya no na ɔse.

29 Na mebɛkaa ahyɛmu a menye mo nkorɔfo no dzii; na menye hɔn edzi ahyɛmu dɛ mebɛkã hɔn aboa ano wɔ mankasa me ber mu, ama medze hɔn egyanom asaase aasan ama hɔn bio ma aabɛyɛ hɔn egyapadze, dza ɔyɛ Jerusalem asaase no, dza ɔyɛ anohoba asaase ma hɔn afebɔɔ no, Egya no na ɔse.

30 Na mber bi reba a wɔbɛkã hɔn m’asɛmpa no ne mãhyɛ no akyerɛ hom;

31 Na wɔbɛgye me edzi, dɛ emi nye Jesus Christ, Nyankopɔn ne Ba no, na wɔabɔ mpaa wɔ me dzin mu.

32 Nna hɔn aweɔmfo bɛma hɔn ndze do, na wɔdze ndze kor bɔtow ndwom; na wobohu; enyiwa tua enyiwa.

33 Nna Egya no bɛkã hɔn aboa ano bio, na ɔdze Jerusalem bɛma hɔn ma ɔabɛyɛ hɔn egyapadze asaase.

34 Nna wobedzi dɛw—Hom mbɔmu ntow ndwom, Jerusalem mbea a ayeyɛ afõ; na Egya no akyekye no nkorɔfo hɔn werɛ, ɔapon Jerusalem.

35 Egya no eyi n’abasa krɔnkrɔn no ho wɔ amanaman nyina enyim; na asaase n’ano n’ano nyina bohu Egya no nkwagye; na Egya no nye emi yɛ kor.

36 Nna afei dza wɔakyerɛw no bɛba mu; Soɛr, soɛr bio, na fa w’ahoɔdzen hyɛ, O Zion; fa wo ntar fɛɛfɛw hyɛ, O Jerusalem kuropɔn Krɔnkrɔn, na ofi ndɛ dze kɔ, nyia wonntwaa no twatsia na no ho nntsew biara rennhɛn wo mu bio.

37 Popo woho fi huntuma mu; soɛr, tsena ase, O Jerusalem; yi woho fi nkyehoma a ɔda wo kɔn mu noho, O Zion babaa ndɔmmumnyi.

38 Na dɛm na Ewuradze se: Atɔn woho kwa, na wɔbɔpon wo a worunntua sika.

39 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mo nkorɔfo bohu me dzin; nyew, da no mu na wobohu dɛ emi nye nyia ɔrekasa yi.

40 Nna afei wɔbɛse dɛ: Mbrɛ nyia ogyina mbepɔw do dze nsɛmpa brɛ hɔn ma no n’anan ho dua yɛ fɛw a; nyia ɔdze asomdwee tahye; nyia ɔdze papa ho nsɛmpa brɛ hɔn, nyia ɔdze nkwagye tahye; nyia ɔse Zion dɛ, Wo Nyame dzi hen!

41 Nna afei ndze bi betsea mu dɛ: Hom mfi hɔ, hom mfi hɔ, hom mfi hɔ nkɔ, mma hom mmfa hom nsa nnkã adze a noho nntsew; hom mfi ne finimfin nkɔ; hom ntsew homho, hom a hom soso Ewuradze no nkuraba.

42 Na mma hom nnkɔ ntsɛntsɛm anaadɛ mma hom nnguan; na Ewuradze bedzi hom enyim, na Israel Nyankopɔn no bedzi hom okyidzifo.

43 Hwɛ, m’akowaa no bɛyɛ n’adze nyansa mu; na wɔbɔkrɔn no na wɔama no do wɔ sorsor.

44 Dɛ mbrɛ dodowara hɔn ho boow hɔn wɔ woho no—n’enyim sɛɛ dodow, koraa seen nyimpa biara, na no honandua so seen adasamba dze—

45 Na ɔbɛpetse aman pii ho; ahemfo no bɔtow hɔn anomu wɔ no ho, na dza wɔnnkãa nnkyerɛɛ hɔn no na wobohu; na dza wɔnntsee da no na wobosusu ho.

46 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina bɛba mu ampa, dɛ mbrɛ Egya no ahyɛ me no. Afei na dɛm ahyɛmu a Egya no nye no nkorɔfo dzii no bɛhyɛ mã; na afei mo nkorɔfo bɔkɔ akɛtsena Jerusalem bio, na ɔbɛyɛ hɔn egyapadze asaase.
3-ne 21:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 21[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sɛ Mormon Nwoma no pue a wɔbɔboaboa Israel ano—Amanamamfo betsim wɔ America dɛ fahodzifo—Sɛ wɔgye dzi na wɔyɛ setsie a wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa; annyɛ dɛm a wobotwa hɔn akyen na wɔasɛɛ hɔn—Israel bɛkyekyer Jerusalem fofor no, na ebusuakuw a wɔayew no bɛsan aba. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na nokwar mese hom dɛ, mebɛma hom asɛnkyerɛdze bi, ama hom eetum ehu mber a dɛm ndzɛmba yi besisi—na mebɛkã mo nkorɔfo a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse akyɛr no aboa ano, O Israel fifo, na mebɛkyekyer me Zion bio wɔ hɔn mu;

2 Na hwɛ, iyi na medze bɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama hom—na nokwar mese hom dɛ ber a dɛm ndzɛmba yi a mebɛda no edzi akyerɛ hom nye dza ekyir yi obefi mankasa, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum a Egya no dze bɛma hom no, wɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ Amanamamfo no ma woehu biribi a ɔfa dɛm nkorɔfo yi a wɔyɛ Jacob fifo nkaa, nye mo nkorɔfo yi a wɔbɔbɔ hɔn apetse no ho;

3 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ber a Egya no bɛda ndzɛmba yinom edzi akyerɛ hɔn no, na obefi Egya no hɔ edua hɔn do aba hom hɔ;

4 Na ɔyɛ Egya no ne pɛ dɛ wobetsim wɔ asaase yi do, ama Egya no nam no tum do ayɛ hɔn fahodzifo, ama ndzɛmba yinom eefi hɔn hɔ aba hom asefo nkaa no hɔ, ama ahyɛmu a Egya no nye no nkorɔfo no edzi no aahyɛ mã, O Israel fifo;

5 Dɛm ntsi dɛm ndwuma yi nye dza wobedzi no wɔ hom mu ofi ber yi dze kɔ befi Amanamamfo hɔ aba hom asefo no a osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi wɔbɔwodow wɔ gyedzi mu no hɔ.

6 Na dɛm na Egya no ahyehyɛ ato hɔ dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ ofi Amanamamfo hɔ ba, ama ɔaakyerɛ no tum akyerɛ Amanamamfo no, na iyi ntsi, sɛ Amanamamfo no emmpirim hɔn akoma, na wonu hɔnho na wɔba mo hɔ na wonuma hɔn wɔ me dzin mu na wohu me nkyerɛkyerɛ ho nokwar botae no a, wɔbɛkan hɔn afora mo nkorɔfo, O, Israel fifo;

7 Na ber a dɛm ndzɛmba yi bɛba mu ma hom asefo bɛhyɛ ase dɛ woruhu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom no—ɔbɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama hɔn, ma woeetum ehu dɛ Egya no ndwuma no ahyɛ ase dada rehyɛ ahyɛmu a ɔnye nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo no dzii no mã.

8 Na sɛ, dɛm da no nya ba a, ɔbɛba dɛ ahemfo bomua hɔn ano; na dza wɔnnkãa nnkyerɛɛ hɔn no, wobohu; na dza wɔnntsee no, wɔbɛtse.

9 Na dɛm da no mu, emi ntsi Egya no bɛyɛ edwuma bi a ɔyɛ nwanwa kɛse bi wɔ hɔn mu; na ɔbarimba bi bɛda no edzi akyerɛ hɔn, naaso binom wɔ hɔn mu a wɔrenngye nndzi.

10 Mbom hwɛ, m’akowaa no nkwa bekitsa me nsamu; dɛm ntsi worimmpira no, ɔwɔ mu dɛ osian hɔn ntsi wobedzi no dzɛm. Na mebɛsa no yarba, na mebɛkyerɛ ma woeehu dɛ me nyansaa sõ sen abɔnsam ne ndaadaa.

11 Dɛm ntsi ɔbɛba dɛ obiara a ɔnnkɛgye me nsɛm edzi, dɛ emi nye Jesus Christ no, a Egya no bɛma ɔdze aba Amanamamfo no hɔ, na ɔdze tum bɛma no ma ɔdze ama Amanamamfo no, (wɔbɛyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ Moses kãe no) wobotwa hɔn efi mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ ahyɛmu mba no mu akyen.

12 Na mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Jacob nkaa no bɔfora Amanamamfo no mu, nyew, wɔbɛtsena hɔn mu dɛ awendadze a ɔfora mbowa akɛse mu, dɛ awendadze kakraba a ɔhyɛ nguankuw mu, na odua hɔn mu, tsiatsia hɔn do na ɔtsetsew hɔn mu esinesin, na obiara runntum nngye hɔn.

13 Wɔbɛma hɔn nsa do wɔ hɔn atamfo do, na wobotwa hɔn atamfo akyen.

14 Nyew, Amanamamfo no wondue, na gyedɛ wonu hɔnho; na ɔbɛba dɛ dɛm da no, Egya no na ɔse, mobotwa hom mpɔnkɔ efi hom mu na mebɛsɛɛ hom ntseaseanam;

15 Na mobotwa hom nkuropɔn a ɔwɔ hom asaase do akyen na mobubu hom aban nyina egu famu;

16 Na mobotwa abayifo a wɔwɔ hom asaase do akyen, na hom rinnya ɔsebramufo bio.

17 Hom ehonyi a woegu no mobotwa no so akyen, nye hom ehonyi a osisi hom finimfin so nyina, na hom ronnsom hom nsaano edwindze bio;

18 Na mobotutu hom abosom efi hom finimfin; na mebɛsɛɛ hom nkurow.

19 Na ɔbɛba dɛ wobeyi atorsɛm, nye ndaadaa, nye enyikaber, nye aperdzi, nye asɔfoɔtorsom, nye ndwamambɔ efi hɔ.

20 Na ɔbɛba dɛ, Egya no na ɔse, da no hɔn a wonnkonu hɔnho na wɔaba mo Dɔba no hɔ no, mobotwa hɔn efi mo nkorɔfo mu, O Israel fifo.

21 Na medze awerdzi nye ebufuhyew bɛba hɔn do, dɛ mbrɛ medze bɛba abosonsomfo mpo so do, dza wɔnntsee bi da.

22 Mbom sɛ wonu hɔnho na wotsie me nsɛm, na woemmpirim hɔn akoma a, mebɛkyekyer m’asɔr wɔ hɔn mu, na wɔbɛba abɛhyɛ ahyɛmu no mu na wɔakan hɔn afora Jacob n’asefo nkaa no, hɔn a medze asaase yi ama hɔn dɛ ɔyɛ hɔn egyapadze no;

23 Na wɔbɔboa mo nkorɔfo, Jacob nkaa no, nye Israel fifo dodow biara so a wɔbɛba no, ma wɔakyekyer kurow a wɔbɛfrɛ no Jerusalem Fofor.

24 Na afei na wɔbɔboa mo nkorɔfo ma wɔaboa hɔn ano, hɔn a wɔapetse asaase nyina enyi do no, ma wɔaba Jerusalem Fofor no mu.

25 Na nkyii ɔsor tum no bɛba hɔn do; na mo so mobɔwɔ hɔn finimfin.

26 Na afei Egya no n’edwuma no bɛhyɛ ase wɔ dɛm da no mu, ber a wɔbɛkã asɛmpa yi wɔ dɛm nkorɔfo nkaa yi mu no. Nokwar mese hom dɛ, da no na Egya no n’edwuma bɛhyɛ ase wɔ nkorɔfo nyinara a wɔapetse no mu, nyew, mbusuakuw mpo a wɔayew no, ma Egya no yii hɔn fii Jerusalem no.

27 Nyew, dwumadzi no bɛhyɛ ase wɔ mo nkorɔfo nyinara a wɔapetse no mu, na Egya no besiesie kwan a wɔbɛfa do aba me nkyɛn, ama woeetum afrɛ Egya no wɔ me dzin mu.

28 Nyew, na afei dwumadzi no nye Egya no bɛhyɛ ase wɔ aman nyina mu, dze esiesie kwan a mo nkorɔfo bɛfa do aboa hɔn ano aba hɔn egyapadze asaase no do.

29 Na wobefi aman nyina mu akɔ; na wɔronnkɔ no ntsɛntsɛm, nna wɔronnkɔ no akomatu mu; osiandɛ mibedzi hɔn enyim, Egya no na ɔse, na mebɛyɛ hɔn okyidzifo.
3-ne 22:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wɔbɛkyekyer Zion nye ne stake nyina wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu, na wɔnam ehumbɔbɔr na tsema do bɔboaboa Israel ano—Wobedzi konyim—Fa to Isaiah 54 ho. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na afei dza wɔakyerɛw no bɛba mu: Tow ndwom, O ɔbɔnyin, ɔwo a annwo; ɔwo a ennkyeem ɔba da, fa ehurusi ndwom na tsẽa mu ɔwo a annkɔ awokõ; na osigyanyi no ne mba adɔɔ sõ asen ɔbaa ɔwarfo no ne mba, Ewuradze na ɔse.

2 Tserɛw wo ntamadan bea no mu, na ma wɔntserɛtserɛw wo tsenabea ho nkataho tam no mu; mma nnkom do, twetwe wo ntampehoma no mu, na tsintsim wo stake horow no.

3 Na ebɛtserɛw akɔ enyimfa na abankum, na w’asefo bɛfa Amanamamfo no ayɛ hɔndze, na wɔama wɔatsenatsena ekurofõ no do.

4 Mma nnsuro, na w’enyi ronnto; eso w’enyim runngu ase, na wɔrennhyɛ wo enyito; na wo werɛ befir wo mbafobermu adapaabɔ, na erennkaa wo mbafobermu enyito, na ennkɛkaakaa w’ekunayɛ mu adapaabɔ ara bio.

5 Na wo yɛfo, wo kun, ne dzin dze Dɔm Ewuradze; na wo Pomfo no nye Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no—wɔbɛfrɛ no asaase nyinara Nyankopɔn.

6 Na Ewuradze afrɛ wo dɛ ɔbaa a wɔapow no na ɔyaw ekitsa no wɔ sunsum mu, mekyerɛ mbafobermu yer, aber a wɔatow no akyen, wo Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

7 Mber tsia kakrabaabi na madan wo egya, na mbom ehumbɔbɔr kɛse na medze bɔboa w’ano.

8 Ebufuw kakra mu na medze m’enyim huntsaa wo mber tsiaba mu, na daapem ayamuyie na medze mubohu wo mbɔbɔr, wo Pomfo Ewuradze na ɔse.

9 Na iyi yɛ me dɛ Noah esu no, na dɛ mbrɛ mekã ntam dɛ Noah esu no remmpram asaase do bio no, dɛmara so na makã ntam dɛ mo bo nnkofuw wo.

10 Na mbepɔw botutu akɔ, na akoko atwetwe hɔnho, na mbom m’ayamuyie dze orunntutu mmfi wo nkyɛn, eso m’asomdwee ahyɛmu no ronntwe no ho. Ewuradze a ohu wo mbɔbɔr no na ɔse.

11 O ɔwo amandzehunyi a ehum etu wo, na wɔnnkyekyee wo werɛ! Hwɛ, medze w’abo mibesisi wo ntɔnka dubir mu, na medze sapphire atow wo fapem.

12 Na medze bɔgyaabo mayɛ wo ntokura, na medze carbuncle mayɛ w’aponkɛse, na medze abo fɛɛfɛw mayɛ wo kurotsia nyina.

13 Na wo mba nyinara Ewuradze bɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn; na wo mba hɔn asomdwee bɔdɔɔ sõ.

14 Ndzeyɛtsenenee mu na wobetsim wo; enye nhyɛdo ntamu bɔtwe, osiandɛ innkosuro, enye ehuyi ntamu sõ, osiandɛ ɔnnkɛbɛn wo.

15 Hwɛ, wɔbɛkã hɔnho aboa ano etsia wo, na ɔnnam mo do; na obiara a ɔbɔboaboa ano etsia wo no, wɔbɔhwe ase wɔ wo ntsi.

16 Hwɛ, emi na mabɔ ɔtomfo a ohuntsa ogyabiriw mu, na oyi n’edwuma ho dadze pue; na emi na mabɔ ɔsɛɛfo dɛ ɔnsɛɛ adze.

17 Akõdze biara a wɔbɔ tsia wo no, ɔrennsaa; na tɛkyerɛma biara a ɔbɛkasa bɔn etsia wo atsɛmbu mu no, ibobu no fɔ. Iyi nye Ewuradze nkowaa hɔn egyapadze, na hɔn tsenenee a ofi emi mara, Ewuradze na ɔse.
3-ne 23:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 23[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus gye Isaiah ne nsɛm no to mu—Ɔhyɛ nkorɔfo no dɛ wɔnhwehwɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no—Wɔdze Samuel, Lamannyi no ne nsɛm a ɔfa Owusoɛr ho no kã hɔn nkyerɛwee ho. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na afei, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ hom nhwehwɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi mu yie. Nyew, me ma hom mbrasɛm dɛ hom mfa enyimpi nhwehwɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi mu yie; osiandɛ Isaiah ne nsɛm no mu yɛ dur.

2 Na ampa ɔkãa nsɛm nyina a ɔfa mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo yi ho; dɛm ntsi ohia dɛ ɔkasa kyerɛ Amanamamfo so.

3 Na ndzɛmba a ɔkãa ho nsɛm nyina ayɛ hɔ, na ɔbɛyɛ hɔ so, mpo dɛ mbrɛ nsɛm a ɔkãa no tse.

4 Dɛm ntsi hom ntsie me nsɛm; hom nkyerɛw dza makã akyerɛ hom no; na ɔbɔkɔ Amanamamfo hɔ wɔ Egya noara n’aber a ɔahyehyɛ na ne pɛ do.

5 Na obiara a obetsie me nsɛm na obonu noho na wobonuma no no, ɔnoara so na wɔbɛgye no nkwa. Hom nhwehwɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no mu, na hɔn mu dodowara na wɔgyee dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho dase.

6 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ aber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔsee hɔn bio dɛ, ekyir yi a oesiansian kyerɛwsɛm a hom nsa akã yi mu akyerɛ hɔn no, ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, kyerɛwsɛm binom so wɔ hɔ a mepɛ dɛ hom kyerɛw a hom nnyɛe.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔsee Nephi dɛ: Fa kyerɛwsɛm a edze esie no bra.

8 Na ber a Nephi dze kyerɛwsɛm no bae, na ɔdze bɔtoo n’enyim no, ɔtoo n’enyi hwɛe na ɔsee dɛ:

9 Nokwar mese hom dɛ, mehyɛɛ m’akowaa Samuel, Lamannyi no dɛ ɔngye dase nkyerɛ dɛm nkorɔfo yi dɛ da no a Egya no bɛhyɛ ne dzin enyimnyam wɔ mo mu no, ahotseweefo pii wɔ hɔ a wɔbɔsoɛr efi owu mu, na wobeyi hɔnho akyerɛ dodowara, na wɔbɔsom hɔn. Na obisaa hɔn dɛ: Ana ɔnntse dɛm?

10 Na n’esuafo no buaa no see dɛ: Nyew, Ewuradze, Samuel hyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ wo nsɛm yi ho, na ne nyinara hyɛɛ mã.

11 Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom annkyerɛw dɛm adze yi, dɛ ahotseweefo pii soɛree na woyii hɔnho kyerɛɛ dodowara na wɔsoom hɔn?

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi kaa dɛ dɛm adze yi wɔnnkyerɛwee.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ Jesus hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkyerɛw; dɛm ntsi wɔkyerɛwee dɛ mbrɛ ɔsee hɔn no ara.

14 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus siansian kyerɛwsɛm no a wɔakyerɛw dɛ adze kor mu wiei no, ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkɛkyerɛkyerɛ ndzɛmba a oesiansian mu akyerɛ hɔn no.
3-ne 24:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 24[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ewuradze no bɔfoe besiesie kwan no dze ama Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no—Christ bɛtsena atsɛmbu mu—Wɔhyɛ Israel dɛ ontua ebupɛn du na ɔmbɔ afɔr—Wɔkyerɛɛw nkaa nwoma to hɔ—Fa to Malachi 3 ho. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkyerɛw nsɛm a Egya no dze ama Malachi no, dza ɔse ɔnkã nkyerɛ hɔn no. Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔkyerɛwee wiei no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ mu kyerɛɛ hɔn. Na iyi nye nsɛm a ɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn: Dɛm na Egya no see Malachi—Hwɛ morosoma mo bɔfoe, na obesiesie kwan edzi m’enyim, na Ewuradze a hom rohwehwɛ no no, ɔbɛba ne temple mu mpofirmu, ahyɛmu bɔfo no mpo a, ɔno a hom enyi gye noho no; hwɛ, ɔbɛba, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse.

2 Mbom woana botum egyina ne mbaa da no enyim? na sɛ opue a, woana begyina? na ɔtse dɛ namfo gya, na ɔtanhofo semina.

3 Na ɔbɛtsena ase dɛ dwetɛ namfo na yiyimufo; na ɔbɛtsew Levi mbabanyin ho, na ɔapɔw hɔnho dɛ sika na dwetɛ, na wɔdze ayɛyɛdze bɛma Ewuradze wɔ tsenenee mu.

4 Nna Judah na Jerusalem ayɛyɛdze bɔsɔ Ewuradze enyi dɛ ndadaber no, na tsetse mfe no.

5 Na mebɛbɛn hom, mobobu atsɛn; na mebɛyɛ ɔdasefo a noho yɛ har meetsia abayifo, na awartofo, na ntanhunkafo, na hɔn a wodzi ɔpaanyi emim wɔ n’apaadze mu, na wosisi okunafo, na egyankaba, na wɔbɔ ɔhɔho enyi, na wonnsuro me, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse.

6 Na emi nye Ewuradze, mennsakyer; dɛm ntsi hom, Jacob mba, hom nnsãe.

7 Ofitsi hom egyanom nda do na hom adan efi m’ahyɛdze ho, na hom enndzi do. Hom nsan mbra me nkyɛn, na mebɛsan maba hom nkyɛn, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse. Mbom hom kã dɛ: Ebɛnadze mu na yɛnsan?

8 Aso nyimpa botwa Nyame edwoo? Naaso hom etwa me edwoo. Mbom hom kã dɛ: Ebɛnadze mu na yetwa wo edwoo? Ebupɛn du na ayɛyɛdze mu a.

9 Wɔdze ndom adom hom, osiandɛ hom twa me edwoo, ɔman yi nyinara a.

10 Hom mfa ebupɛn du no nyina mbra adzekoradan no mu, ma edziban mbra me fie; na hom mfa iyi nsɔ me nhwɛ, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse, sɛ munnkobue ɔsor ntokura ama hom, na mehue nhyira ama hom a hom rinnya bea a ɔsõ a wɔdze bɛgye.

11 Na mubotwuw ɔsɛɛfo no enyim wɔ hom ntsi, na ɔnnkɛsɛɛ hom asaase do eduadzewa; eso hom wenyindua rommpo no nsowee nngu famu ansaana ne ber edu wɔ kwã no mu, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse.

12 Na amanaman nyina bɛfrɛ hom ahomkafo osiandɛ hom bɛyɛ enyika asaase, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse.

13 Hom akasa dzendzen wɔ mo do, Ewuradze na ɔse. Naaso hom kã dɛ: Ebɛnadze mu na yɛakasa etsia wo?

14 Hom akã dɛ Nyame som yɛ kwa, na ebɛn mfaso na ɔyɛ dɛ yeedzi n’ahyɛdze do, na yɛanantsew awerɛhodzi mu wɔ Dɔm Ewuradze enyim?

15 Na afei yɛfrɛ ɔhopɔwnyi ɔhomkanyi; nyew, hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛ no esi hɔn yie; nyew, hɔn a wɔsɔ Nyankopɔn hwɛ no, na wofi mu fir mpo.

16 Nna hɔn a wosuroo Ewuradze no kasaa kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔnho, na Ewuradze yɛɛ aso na otsiei; na wɔkyerɛɛw nkaa nwoma wɔ n’enyim maa hɔn a wosuroo Ewuradze, na wɔdwendween ne dzin ho no.

17 Na wɔbɛyɛ me dze, Dɔm Ewuradze no na ɔse, wɔ da a mebɛyɛ m’egudze na mebɛkam hɔn do dɛ nyimpa rekam nankasa ne ba a ɔsom no do.

18 Nkyii na hom bɛsan ebohu nsonsonee a ɔda tseneneenyi na mumuyɛnyi ntamu, nyia ɔsom Nyame na nyia ɔnnsom no no ntamu.
3-ne 25:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 25[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no wɔbɛhyew ahopɔwfo nye emumuyɛfo dɛ eburonan—Elijah bɛsan aba ansaana dɛm da kɛse a ɔyɛ hu no aba—Fa to Malachi 4 ho. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na hwɛ, da no reba, na ɔbɛhyew dɛ fononoo; na ahopɔwfo nyina, nyew, na hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛ nyina bɛyɛ dɛ mburonan; na da a ɔreba no bɛhyew hɔn, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse, dɛ orinngya hɔn ndwow anaa abaw.

2 Mbom hom a hom suro me dzin no dze, Tsenenee Ɔba no bɔsoɛr dze ayarsa wɔ ne ntsaban mu epue ama hom; na hom befir edzi kan na hom enyin dɛ anantwiban mu anantwifɔr.

3 Na hom betsiatsia emumuyɛfo do; na wɔbɛyɛ nso wɔ hom ananadze wɔ da a mebɛyɛ iyi no mu, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse.

4 Hom nkaa m’akowaa Moses mbra a mehyɛɛ no wɔ Horeb dze maa Israel nyinara no, nye ahyɛdze na atsɛmbu no.

5 Hwɛ, mobɔsoma nkɔnhyɛnyi Elijah ma brɛ hom ansaana Ewuradze ne da kɛse no a ɔyɛ hu no edu;

6 Na ɔno na ɔbɛdandan egyanom hɔn akoma aba mba do, na mba hɔn akoma aba hɔn egyanom do, amma maammfa ndom mammbɔbɔ asaase no.
3-ne 26:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 26[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus siansian ndzɛmba nyina mu fi ahyɛse kesi ewiei—Mbɔdomaba na mbofra kã anwanwasɛm bi a obiara nntum nnkyerɛw—Hɔn a wɔwɔ Christ N’Asɔr mu no ndzɛmba nyina bɛyɛ kwasafodze. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ aber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ mu kyerɛɛ nyimpadodow no; na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ ndzɛmba akɛse nye nkakraba nyina mu kyerɛɛ hɔn.

2 Na ɔsee dɛ: Kyerɛwsɛm yinom no a hom nsa nkãa no, Egya no ahyɛ me dɛ memfa mma hom; osiandɛ ohu dɛ oye dɛ wɔdze ma ndaamba ebusuasantsen.

3 Na osiansian ndzɛmba nyina mu, fitsi ahyɛse dze kesi ber a ɔbɛba wɔ n’enyimnyam mu—nyew, dza ɔfa ndzɛmba nyina a ɔsɛ dɛ ɔba asaase enyi do dze kesi dɛ ɔhyew dzendzen bɛnan ndzɛmba nyina, na asaase bɔbobɔw dɛ nwoma, na sor nye asaase botwa mu akɔ;

4 Dze ekesi da kɛse a odzi ewiei no mpo, aber a nyimpa nyinara, na ebusuafo nyinara, nye aman nyinara, na kasa horow nyinara begyina Nyankopɔn enyim, ma woebu hɔn atsɛn wɔ hɔn ndwuma ho, dɛ woye anaadɛ womuo—

5 Sɛ woye a, wɔbɔsoɛr efi owu mu akɔ daapem nkwa mu; sɛ womuo a wɔbɔkɔ afɔbu wusoɛr mu; dɛ mbrɛ kor biara no su tse, kor wɔ fã na kor so wɔ fã a, wonnhyia da no, dɛ mbrɛ ehumbɔbɔr, nye pɛrpɛryɛ, nye krɔnkrɔnyɛ a ɔwɔ Christ mu no tse, nyia ɔwɔ hɔ ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze.

6 Na afei Jesus ne nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɔdze kyerɛkyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no, sɛ wɔkyɛ mu ɔha a no mu kor mpo worunntum nnkyerɛw.

7 Mbom hwɛ wɔakyerɛw dza Jesus dze kyerɛkyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no mu pii wɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse no do.

8 Na dza makyerɛw yi yɛ dza ɔdze kyerɛkyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no mu kumaabi; na makyerɛw ama wɔdze efi Amanamamfo no hɔ asan abrɛ dɛm nkorɔfo yi bio, dɛ mbrɛ nsɛm a Jesus akã no tse.

9 Na ber a hɔn nsa akã iyi, dza ohia dɛ hɔn nsa kã no kan dze sɔ hɔn gyedzi hwɛ, na sɛ ɔba dɛ wonya gyedzi wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho a, nna afei wɔbɛda ndzɛmba akɛse edzi akyerɛ hɔn.

10 Na sɛ ɔba no dɛ wɔanngye dɛm ndzɛmba yi enndzi a, ɔno wɔdze ndzɛmba akɛse no bosuma hɔn, ma wɔakɔ afɔbu mu.

11 Hwɛ, nna nkyɛ merebɛkyerɛw dza woekrukye wɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse do no, na mbom Ewuradze amma ho kwan, ɔse: Mobɔsɔ mo nkorɔfo hɔn gyedzi ahwɛ.

12 Dɛm ntsi emi, Mormon, merekyerɛw dza Ewuradze ahyɛ me dɛ menkyerɛw no. Na afei emi, Mormon, medze me kasaa aba ewiei, na morokɔ do akyerɛw dza wɔahyɛ me dɛ menkyerɛw no.

13 Dɛm ntsi mepɛ dɛ hom hu dɛ Ewuradze kyerɛkyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no bɛyɛ nda ebiasa ntamu na iyi ekyir no oyii noho kyerɛɛ hɔn mpɛn pii, na obubuu paanoo mu mpɛn pii, na ohyiraa do, na ɔdze maa hɔn.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛe na ɔsoom nkorɔfo no hɔn mbofra no a wɔakã hɔnho asɛm no, na ɔtseew hɔn ano ma wɔkãa anwanwasɛm akɛse a ɔkyɛn dza ɔdaa no edzi kyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no dze kyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom; na ɔtseew hɔn ano ma wotumii kasae.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔfowee kɔr ɔsor n’ekyir no, ne mpɛn ebien na oyii noho kyerɛɛ hɔn, na ɔsaa hɔn ayarfo nyinara yarba, nye hɔn ebubuafo so, na obuee hɔn efurafo enyi na obuee hɔn etsitsifo aso; na ɔyɛɛ hɔn ayarfo edur wiei no, na onyaan nyimpa bi fii ewufo mu, na ɔdaa no tum edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn no, ɔfowee kɔr Egya no nkyɛn—

16 Hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no nyimpadodow no boaa hɔn ano, na hɔn nyinara hunii na wɔtsee so dɛ dɛm mbofraba yi; nyew, mbɔdomaba mpo bue hɔn ano kã anwanwasɛm; na nsɛm a wɔkãe no ɔbraa dɛ mma nyimpa biara nnkyerɛw.

17 Na ɔbaa dɛ esuafo no a Jesus san mu yii hɔn no hyɛɛ ase fitsi dɛm aber no dze kɔ no dɛ worunuma na wɔrekyerɛkyerɛ dodowara a wɔbaa hɔn nkyɛn; na dodowara a wonumaa hɔn wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu no, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no hyɛɛ hɔn mã.

18 Na hɔn mu pii hunii na wɔtsee nsɛm a worunntum nnkã na mbra mma ho kwan dɛ wɔnkyerɛw.

19 Na wɔkyerɛkyerɛe, na wɔsoom hɔnho; na ndzɛmba a wonyae nyina bɛyɛɛ kwasafodze, na nyimpa biara nye no nua dzii no pɛrpɛr mu.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔyɛɛ ndzɛmba nyina a Jesus hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ no.

21 Na hɔn a wonumaa hɔn wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu no wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Christ n’asɔrmba.
3-ne 27:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Jesus hyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmfa Ne dzin mfrɛ Asɔr no—Ne dwumadzi na ne werdam afɔrbɔ no na wɔbɔmu yɛ N’asɛmpa no—Wɔhyɛ adasamba dɛ wonnu hɔnho na wonuma hɔn ama Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no aatsew hɔnho—Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ dɛ mbrɛ Jesus noara tse. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34–35.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Jesus n’esuafo no worututu akwan na wɔrekekã dza wɔatse nye ndzɛmba so a woehu, na worunuma wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu no, ɔbaa dɛ esuafo no boaa hɔn ano wɔ fakor na wɔbɔɔ mu faa akɔnkye na wɔbɔɔ mpaa enyiberdo.

2 Na Jesus yii noho kyerɛɛ hɔn bio, osiandɛ nna wɔrobɔ mpaa ma Egya no wɔ ne dzin mu; na Jesus baa begyinaa hɔn finimfin, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Ebɛnadze na hom pɛ dɛ meyɛ ma hom?

3 Na wɔsee no dɛ: Ewuradze yɛpɛ dɛ ekyerɛ hɛn dzin a yɛmfa mfrɛ asɔr yi; osiandɛ ekyingye esi nkorɔfo no mu a ɔfa dɛm adze yi ho.

4 Na Ewuradze see hɔn dɛ: Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na nkorɔfo no hwinhwin na wɔgye kyim wɔ dɛm adze yi ntsi?

5 Ana wɔnnkenkaan kyerɛwsɛm no, dza ɔkã dɛ hom mfa Christ ne dzin nto hom do no ? Osiandɛ dzin yi na wɔdze bɛfrɛ hom wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

6 Na obiara a ɔbɛfa me dzin ato no do, na obetsim ekodu ewiei no, dɛm nyimpa no na wɔbɛgye no nkwa wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

7 Dɛm ntsi, biribiara a hom bɛyɛ no, hom nyɛ no wɔ me dzin mu; dɛm ntsi hom mfa me dzin mfrɛ asɔr no; na hom mfrɛ Egya no wɔ me dzin mu ama oeehyira asɔr no wɔ emi ntsi.

8 Na ɔyɛ dɛn yɛ m’asɔr, sɛ wɔammfa me dzin ammfrɛ no a? Osiandɛ sɛ wɔdze Moses ne dzin to asɔr do a nna ɔyɛ Moses n’asɔr; anaadɛ sɛ wɔdze nyimpa ne dzin to do a nna ɔyɛ nyimpa n’asɔr; na mbom sɛ wɔdze me dzin frɛ no a nna ɔyɛ m’asɔr, sɛ ɔwɔ mu dɛ wɔnam m’asɛmpa do kyekyeree a.

9 Nokwar mese hom dɛ, wɔnam m’asɛmpa ne nkyekyeree do si hom pi; dɛm ntsi biribiara a hom bɛfrɛ no, hom mfrɛ no wɔ me dzin mu; dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom frɛ Egya no wɔ asɔr no ntsi, wɔ me dzin mu a, Egya no betsie hom,

10 Na sɛ ɔwɔ mu dɛ m’asɛmpa do na wɔnam kyekyeer asɔr no a, Egya no bɛda nankasa no ndwuma edzi wɔ mu.

11 Mbom ɔwɔ mu dɛ sɛ wɔnnam m’asɛmpa do kyekyeree na wɔnam nyimpa no ndwuma do yɛɛ anaa wɔnam abɔnsam no ndwuma do yɛɛ a, nokwar, mese hom dɛ wɔwɔ enyigye wɔ hɔn ndwuma mu mber tsiabaa mu, na ewiei no bɛba, na wobotwa egu na wɔatow akyen gya mu a ɔnnkɛsan aba bio.

12 Osiandɛ hɔn ndwuma dzi hɔn ekyir, na osian hɔn ndwuma ntsi na woetwa hɔn akyen no; dɛm ntsi hom nkaa dza makã akyerɛ hom no.

13 Hwɛ medze m’asɛmpa no ama hom, na iyi nye asɛmpa a medze ama hom no—dɛ mebaa wiadze bɛyɛɛ m’Egya ne pɛ, osiandɛ m’Egya na ɔsomaa me.

14 Na m’Egya somaa me ama wɔaama mo do asɛn mbeamudua no do wɔ sor; na wɔaama mo do wɔ mbeamudua no do wɔ sor ekyir no, ɔbɛma maatwe adasa nyinara ama moho, dɛ mbrɛ adasa na wɔmaa mo do wɔ sor no, dɛmara so mpo na Egya no bɛma adasa do wɔ sor, na woebegyina m’enyim, na woebu hɔn atsɛn wɔ hɔn ndwuma ho, dɛ oye anaa omuo—

15 Na iyi ho ntsi na wɔmaa mo do sɛɛn sor; dɛm ntsi, ɔnam Egya no tum do mobɔtwe adasa nyina ama moho, ama woeebu hɔn atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse.

16 Na ɔbɛba dɛ obiara a obonu noho na oenuma no wɔ me dzin mu no wɔbɛhyɛ no mã; na sɛ otsim kodu ewiei a, hwɛ, sɛ mosoɛr gyina dɛ murubobu wiadze atsɛn a murummbu no fɔ wɔ m’Egya n’enyim wɔ da no mu.

17 Na nyia ɔannsɔw ennkodu ewiei no, dɛm nyimpa no wobotwa no egu na wɔatow no akyen gya mu, na orimmfi mu mmpue bio, osian Egya no ne pɛrpɛrdzi no ntsi.

18 Na iyi nye asɛm a ɔdze ama adasamba. Na iyi ma ɔhyɛ ne nsɛm a ɔdze ama no mã, na onndzi ator, mbom ɔhyɛ ne nsɛm nyina mã.

19 Na adze biara a no ho nntsew no rennhɛn n’ahenman mu; dɛm ntsi obiara rennhɛn n’ahomgye mu gyedɛ hɔn a osian hɔn gyedzi ntsi, wonuu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn ho, na wodzii nokwar dze kɔr ewiei ma wɔahor hɔn ntar wɔ mo bɔgyaa mu no.

20 Afei iyi nye mbrasɛm no: Hom nnu hom ho, hom a hom wɔ asaase n’ano n’ano nyina, na hom mbra me nkyɛn ma wonnuma hom wɔ me dzin mu, ama Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a hom benya no aatsew homho, ma hom eetum egyina m’enyin wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu dɛ nkekãa biara nnyi homho.

21 Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, iyi nye m’asɛmpa no; na hom nyim ndzɛmba a ɔsɛ dɛ hom yɛ wɔ m’asɔrfi mu; na ndwuma a hom ehu me dɛ meyɛ no ɔnoara na hom so hom nyɛ; na dza hom ehu me dɛ meyɛ no, ɔnoara mpo na hom nyɛ;

22 Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom yɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a nna nhyira akã hom, na wɔbɛma hom do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

23 Hom nkyerɛw ndzɛmba a hom ehu na hom atse yi, na nnyɛ dza wɔabra hom wɔ ho no bi a.

24 Hom nkyerɛw dza dɛm nkorɔfo yi bɛyɛ, mpo dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw dza wɔayɛ ma ɔabɛsen no.

25 Na hwɛ, nwoma no mu dza wɔakyerɛw, nye dza wɔbɛkyerɛw no na wɔdze bobu dɛm nkorɔfo yi atsɛn, na ɔno do na adasa dze bohu hɔn ndwuma.

26 Na hwɛ, ndzɛmba nyina Egya no akyerɛw; dɛm ntsi dza wɔbɛkyerɛw wɔ nwoma no mu no na wɔdze bobu wiadze atsɛn.

27 Na hom nhu dɛ hom bɛyɛ dɛm nkorɔfo yi hɔn atsɛmbuafo, dɛ mbrɛ atsɛmbu a medze bɛma hom no tse, dza ɔyɛ pɛrpɛr no. Dɛm ntsi, ebɛn nyimpa ne saso na ɔsɛ dɛ hom yɛ? Nokwar mese hom dɛ, dɛ ma metse mpo.

28 Na afei morokɔ Egya no nkyɛn. Na nokwar mese hom dɛ biribiara a hom bebisa Egya no wɔ me dzin mu no, wɔdze bɛma hom.

29 Dɛm ntsi, hom mbisa, na hom nsa bɛkã; hom mbɔ mu, na wobobue ama hom; na nyia obisa no, ne nsa kã; na nyia ɔbɔ mu no, wobue ma no.

30 Na afei, hwɛ, midzi dɛw kɛse, ma ɔrehyɛ mã mpo, osian hom nye dɛm ebusuasantsen yi so ntsi; nyew, na Egya no so mpo dzi dɛw, na abɔfo krɔnkrɔn no nyinara so, osian hom nye dɛm ebusuasantsen yi ntsi, osiandɛ hɔn mu biara nnyewee.

31 Hwɛ, mepɛ dɛ hom tse ase dɛ ebusuasantsen yi a wɔtse nkwa mu seseiara yi hɔn mu biara nnyewee; na hɔn mu na menya enyigye ne mãhyɛ.

32 Mbom hwɛ, midzi yaw wɔ ebusuasantsen a otsĩa anan a wodzi ebusuasantsen yi ekyir no ho, osiandɛ ɔdze hɔn kɔ ndɔmmum mu dɛ ɔsɛɛ ba no mpo; na wɔbɔtɔn me dze agye dwetɛ na sika, nye dza awebowa tum sɛɛ no na ewifo tum bubu mu kowia. Na da no mu na mebɛba abɛsera hɔn, na medze hɔn ndwuma bobua hɔnankasa hɔn etsifi.

33 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Jesus wiee dɛm nsɛm yinom kã no, ɔsee n’esuafo no dɛ: Hom nhɛn abow tseabaa no mu; na abow a ɔyɛ tseabaa, na ɔkwan a ɔyɛ heaheaba nye dza wɔdze kɔ nkwa mu, na kumaabi na wohu; na mbom abow a ɔtserɛw, na kwan a ɔyɛ tɛtɛr nye dza wɔdze kɔ owu mu, na dodowara wɔ hɔ a wɔfa mu, kesi dɛ adzesaa no bɛba a nyimpa biara nntum nnyɛ edwuma.
3-ne 28:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 28[/font_size][/center]

[i]Esuafo duebien no mu baakron pɛ na wɔbɔ hɔn anohoba dɛ sɛ wowu a wobenya egyapadze wɔ Christ n’ahenman no mu—Nephifo Baasa no pɛ na wɔma hɔn tum wɔ owu do ama wɔaatsena asaase yi do ekodu dɛ Jesus bɛba bio—Wɔmaa hɔn do kɔr sor hɔ ma wohu ndzɛmba a ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔdze ano kã, na seseiara wɔrosom wɔ adasa mu. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34–35.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ n’esuafo no nkorkor, see dɛ: Sɛ mokɔ m’Egya ne nkyɛn a ebɛnadze na hom pɛ dɛ meyɛ ma hom?

2 Na hɔn nyinara kasae, ma ɔkaa baasa, na wɔsee dɛ: Yɛpɛ dɛ sɛ yenyin araa kodu mber a ɔsɛ dɛ nyimpa nyin kodu, na yɛdze somdwuma yi a afrɛ hɛn dɛ yendzi yi ba ewiei a, nkyɛ hɛnho ayɛ ntsɛm aba wo nkyɛn hɔ wɔ w’ahenman mu.

3 Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Osiandɛ hom ebisa iyi ntsi nhyira akã hom; dɛm ntsi sɛ hom dzi mfe eduosuon ebien a hom bɛba me nkyɛn wɔ m’ahenman mu; na hom benya ahomgye wɔ me nkyɛn.

4 Na aber a ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn wiei no, ɔdaan noho wɔ baasa no do na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Sɛ mokɔ m’Egya ne kyɛn a ebɛnadze na hom pɛ dɛ meyɛ ma hom?

5 Na wodzii yaw wɔ hɔn akoma mu, osiandɛ nna wonntum nnkã dza wɔpɛ.

6 Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ, minyim hom adwen, na hom pɛ dza John, nyia modɔɔ no no a nkyɛ ɔkã moho wɔ me somdwumadzi no mu, ansaana Jewfo no rema mo do asɛn sor no, pɛɛ dɛ meyɛ ma no no.

7 Dɛm ntsi, nhyira kɛse akã hom, na hom ronnsɔ owu nnhwɛ da; mbom hom bɛtsena nkwa mu na hom ehu dwuma a Egya no bedzi ama adasamba, ekesi dɛ ndzɛmba nyina bɛhyɛ mã dɛ mbrɛ Egya no ne pɛ tse, wɔ ber a medze sor tum nyina bɛba wɔ m’enyimnyam mu.

8 Na hom ronnsɔ owu ne yaayaw nnhwɛ; mbom ber a mebɛba wɔ m’enyimnyam mu no, hom bɛsakyer amon mu hɔ ara efi dza ɔnnkyebo mu akɔ bɛkyebo mu; na wobehyira hom wɔ m’Egya n’ahenman no mu.

9 Na bio, hom renntse honam ne yaw wɔ ber a hom tse honam mu yi, anaadɛ hom rinndzi yaw, gyedɛ dza ɔyɛ bɔn wɔ wiadze mu; na mebɛyɛ iyinom nyina osian dza hom ebisa efi mo hɔ ntsi, osiandɛ hom apen dɛ hom dze adasa hɔn akra bɛbrɛ me, ber a wiadze wɔ hɔ yi.

10 Na iyi ntsi hom benya enyigye ne mãhyɛ; na hom bɛtsena ase wɔ m’Egya n’ahenman no mu; nyew, hom enyigye bɔdɔɔ sõ, mpo dɛ mbrɛ Egya no ama me enyigye mbordo yi; na hom bɛyɛ dɛ emi na mo so mpo mayɛ dɛ Egya no; na Egya no na Emi yɛ kor;

11 Na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no gye Egya no nye moho dase; na Egya no dze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ma adasamba, osian emi ntsi.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ɔdze ne nsatseaba kãa hɔn mu biara ma ɔkaa baasa no a ɔwɔ dɛ wɔtweɔn no, na ofii hɔn nkyɛn kɔree.

13 Na hwɛ, sor buei, na wohwiim hɔn do kɔr sor, na wohunii na wɔtsee ndzɛmba a wonntum nnkã.

14 Na wɔbraa hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnkã; nna wɔamma hɔn tum so a ɔbɛma woetum akã ndzɛmba a wohunii na wɔtsee no;

15 Na dɛ wɔwɔ nyimpadua mu anaa wonnyi nyimpadua mu no, wonntum nnkã; na ɔyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔasakyer hɔn, ma woefi honam nyimpadua yi mu akɛhɛn bɛkyebo tsebew mu, ama woeetum ehu Nyame n’edwuma mu.

16 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ wɔbɔsoom bio wɔ asaase yi enyi do; naaso wɔammbɔsom wɔ ndzɛmba a wɔtsee na wohunii ho, osian mbra a wɔdze maa hɔn wɔ sor hɔ no tsi.

17 Na afei, wɔsakyeer hɔn ekyir no, dɛ wɔnnkyebo anaa wɔayɛ bɛkyebo no, minnyim.

18 Mbom iyi dze minyim, ɔnam kyerɛwsɛm a wɔdze ama no ntsi—dɛ wokyimaa asaase yi enyi do, na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ nkorɔfo nyinara, dze dodowara a wɔgyee hɔn nkyerɛkyerɛ no dzii no bɛkãa asɔrmba no ho; wonumaa hɔn, na dodowara a wonumaa hɔn no, nyaa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no.

19 Na hɔn a wɔannkã asɔr no ho no dze hɔn guu efiadze. Na efiadze no enntum annkora hɔn, osiandɛ no mu paa ebien.

20 Na wɔtoow hɔn guu amona mu; na mbom wɔkãa Nyame n’asɛm no araa ma ɔnam no tum do woyii hɔn fii asaase tsir mu; na dɛm ntsi woenntum enntu amona a no mu dɔ yie ammfa hɔn enngu mu.

21 Na wɔtoow hɔn guu ogyatanaa mu mpɛn ebiasa, na hwee annyɛ hɔn.

22 Na wɔtoow hɔn kyeen mbowa abɔyafo buw mu mpɛn ebien; na hwɛ wɔnye mbowa no dzii agor tse dɛ dza abofraba nye eguambaa a ɔda enumfoano bɛyɛ, na hwee annyɛ hɔn.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm na wɔnantsewee wɔ Nephi no nkorɔfo no nyinara mu, na wɔkãa Christ n’asɛmpa kyerɛɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asaase enyi nyinara do na wɔsakyeer hɔn maa Ewuradze, na wɔdze hɔn baa Christ n’asɔr mu, na dɛm maa wohyiraa nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ dɛm ebusuasantsen no mu no, dɛ mbrɛ Jesus n’asɛm no se.

24 Na afei, emi Mormon, medze dza merekã wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho no aba ewiei ana.

25 Hwɛ, nkyɛ merebɛkyerɛw hɔn a wɔronnsɔ owu nnhwɛ da no edzin, na mbom Ewuradze braa me wɔ ho; dɛm ntsi merennkyerɛw, na wɔdze esuma wiadze.

26 Mbom hwɛ, mehu hɔn na wɔasom me.

27 Na hwɛ, wɔbɔkɔ Amanamamfo mu, na Amanamamfo no runnhu hɔn.

28 Wɔbɔkɔ Jewfo so mu, na Jewfo no runnhu hɔn.

29 Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ oye wɔ Ewuradze enyi do a wɔbɔsom Israel ebusuakuw nyinara a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse no, nye aman nyinara, nye ebusuafo, nye kasa horow nye nyimpa, na wɔdze akra pii abrɛ Jesus, ama hɔn pɛ nye Nyame no tum a ɔsakyer nyimpa a ɔwɔ hɔn mu no so aahyɛ mã.

30 Na wɔtse dɛ Nyankopɔn n’abɔfoe, na sɛ wɔbɔ mpaa ma Egya no wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu a wobotum eyi hɔnho akyerɛ ɔdasanyi biara a wohu dɛ oye.

31 Dɛm ntsi ndwuma akɛse a ɔyɛ nwanwa na wɔbɛyɛ ansaana da kɛse no a ɔreba no asõ, ber a nyimpa nyina bɛba ebegyina Christ n’atsɛmbu egua no enyim no;

32 Nyew, Amanamamfo mu mpo na wɔbɛyɛ anwanwa dwuma akɛse ansaana atsɛmbu da no edu.

33 Na sɛ hom wɔ kyerɛwsɛm a ɔkã Christ n’anwanwadwuma nyina a nkyɛ hom bohu dɛ Christ ne nsɛm no ma ɔda edzi pefee dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi otwar dɛ ɔba mu ampa.

34 Na nyia ɔnnkɛyɛ setsie ama Jesus no ndue, nye hɔn a oyii hɔn na ɔsomaa hɔn wɔ hɔn mu no nsɛm; na obiara a ɔnnkɛgye Jesus ne nsɛm, nye hɔn a ɔasoma hɔn no nsɛm no edzi no; no so renngye hɔn wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu;

35 Na sɛ wɔannwo hɔn mpo a nkyɛ oye. Ana hom susu dɛ hom botum eyi Nyankopɔn a wɔafom no no ne pɛrpɛryɛ no akwa, ɔno a adasa dze hɔn anan etsiatsia no do, na nkwagye nam no do bɛba no?

36 Na afei hwɛ, dɛm nkorɔfo no a Ewuradze yii hɔn no, nyew, baasa no a wɔfaa hɔn kɔr sor no, sɛ wɔtseew hɔnho fii ɔnnkyebo mu kɔr bɛkyebo mu a minnyim—

37 Mbom hwɛ, ofitsi ber a mekyerɛwee no, mebisa Ewuradze, na ɔada no edzi akyerɛ me dɛ otwar dɛ wɔsakyer hɔn nyimpadua no, osiandɛ sɛ ammba no dɛm a otwar dɛ wɔsɔ owu hwɛ;

38 Dɛm ntsi, ma ɔbɛyɛ a wɔnnkɔsɔ owu ahwɛ no, ɔsɛ dɛ nsakyer bi ba hɔn nyimpadua mu, amma wɔanntse yaw anaadɛ awerɛhow biara kã wɔ wiadze bɔn ho.

39 Afei dɛm nsakyer yi nye dza obesi wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu no nnyɛ pɛr; na mbom nsakyer bi baa hɔn do, dza ɔbɛma Satan nnkotum enya tum wɔ hɔn do, dɛ orunntum nnsɔ hɔn nnhwɛ; na wɔtseew hɔn honam ho, ma wɔbɛyɛɛ krɔnkrɔn ama asaase no tum mpo enntum ennya tum wɔ hɔn do.

40 Na dɛm tsebew yi mu na wɔbɔwɔ ekesi Christ n’atsɛmbu da no; na dɛm da no wobenya nsakyer kɛse, na wɔagye hɔn akɔ Egya n’ahenman no mu a wɔrennsan mmfi hɔ bio, na wɔnye Nyankopɔn atsena ɔsorsor afebɔɔ.
3-ne 29:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 29[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon Nwoma no mpuei no yɛ asɛnkyerɛdze a ɔkyerɛ dɛ Ewuradze ahyɛ ase roboaboa Israel ano na N’Ahyɛmu so rehyɛ mã—Wɔdze ndom bɛkã hɔn a wɔpow Ne nda a odzi ekyir mu nyikyerɛ na akyɛdze no. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34–35.[/i]

1 Na afei hwɛ, mese hom dɛ ber a ɔfata a Ewuradze bohu dɛ oye dɛ dɛm nsɛm yi bɛba Amanamamfo hɔ dɛ mbrɛ n’asɛm se no, aber no na hom bohu dɛ ahyɛmu a Egya no nye Israelmba no dzii a ɔfa mbrɛ wɔbɛyɛ a wɔdze hɔn egyapadze asaase no bɛsan ama hɔn no, ahyɛ ase dada dɛ ɔrehyɛ mã.

2 Na hom bohu dɛ Ewuradze ne nsɛm a nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no akã nyina bɛhyɛ mã; na onnhia dɛ hom kã dɛ Ewuradze rekyɛr dɛ ɔbɛba Israelmba nkyɛn.

3 Na onnhia dɛ hom bosusu wɔ hom akoma mu dɛ nsɛm a wɔakã no yɛ kwa, na hwɛ, Ewuradze bɛkaa n’ahyɛmu a ɔnye no nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo dzii no.

4 Na sɛ hom hu dɛ wɔdze dɛm nsɛm yi reba hom mu a, nna onnhia dɛ hom pow Ewuradze no ndwuma bio, osiandɛ ne pɛrpɛr nkrantsee no kitsa ne nsa nyimfa mu; na hwɛ, da no sɛ hom poow no ndwuma a ɔrennkyɛr na ɔato hom.

5 Nyia ɔpow Ewuradze no ndwuma ndue; nyew, nyia ɔbɔpow Christ no na no ndwuma no ndue!

6 Nyew, nyia ɔbɔpow Ewuradze ne nyikyerɛ, na ɔbɛkã dɛ Ewuradze nnda ho nndua nyikyerɛ do, anaa nkɔnhyɛ do, anaa akyɛdze do, anaa kasa horow do, anaa ayarsa do, anaa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum do nndzi dwuma ndue!

7 Nyew, nyia ɔbɛkã wɔ da no mu, dze enya mfaso, dɛ etumdze biara nnyi hɔ a Jesus Christ botum ayɛ no ndue; na nyia ɔyɛ iyi no bɛyɛ dɛ ɔsɛɛ babanyin no a ehumbɔbɔr biara nnyi hɔ ma no no, dɛ mbrɛ Christ n’asɛm no se!

8 Nyew, na onnkehia dɛ hom bɔbɔ mbubur, anaa hom bɔpow, anaa hom bedzi Jewfo anaa Israel fifo nkaasefo biara ho fɛw; na hwɛ, Ewuradze kaa n’ahyɛmu a ɔnye hɔn edzi, na ɔbɛyɛ dza oedzi ho nsew no ama hɔn.

9 Dɛm ntsi mma hom nndwen dɛ hom botum adan Ewuradze ne nsa nyimfa akɔ bankum, ma onnkotum ebu atsɛn ma ahyɛmu a ɔnye Israel fifo edzi no ahyɛ mã.
3-ne 30:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 30[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wɔhyɛ Amanamamfo a wɔwɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu dɛ wonnu hɔnho na wɔmbra Christ hɔ na wɔnkan hɔn mfora Israel fifo. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34–35.[/i]

1 Hom nyɛ aso, O hom Amanamamfo, na hom ntsie Jesus Christ, Tseasefo Nyankopɔn ne Ba no ne nsɛm a ɔahyɛ me dɛ menkã a ɔfa homho no, na hwɛ ɔse menkyerɛw dɛ:

2 Hom Amanamamfo nyinara, hom ndan homho mfi hom emumuyɛdze akwan do; na hom nnu homho wɔ hom ndzeyɛbɔn ho, nye hom atordzi na ndaadaa, nye hom ndwamambɔ, nye hom nsumaamu ebusudze, nye hom abosonsom, nye hom ewudzi, nye hom asɔfoɔtorsom, na enyiber, nye hom aperdzi, nye hom emumuyɛdze na ekyiwadze nyinara ho na hom mbra me nkyɛn, na wonnuma hom wɔ me dzin mu, ama hom enya hom bɔnfakyɛ, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no aahyɛ hom mã, ama wɔaakan hom afora mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo no.
4-ne 1:
[center][font_size=26]Nephi a Otsĩa Anan[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Nephi Nwoma No Ɔno a Ɔyɛ Nephi ne ba—Jesus Christ n’Esuafo no mu Kor[/font_size][/center]

Nephi no nkorɔfo ho abakɔsɛm, dɛ mbrɛ ne kyerɛwsɛm tse.

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephifo nye Lamanfo nyina nya nsakyer ba Ewuradze hɔ—Hɔn ndzɛmba nyina bɛyɛ kwasafodze, wɔyɛ anwanwadze na wɔyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ asaase no do—Mfe ahaebien ekyir no mpaapaamu, ndzeyɛbɔn, asɔrasɔr atorfo na atseetsee soɛr—Mfe ahaebiasa ekyir no Nephifo nye Lamanfo nyina bɛyɛ emumuyɛfo—Ammaron dze kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no sie. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 35–321.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa nye anan twaa mu kɔree, nna eduasa nye enum so, na hwɛ nna Jesus n’esuafo no akyekyer Christ n’asɔr wɔ asaase a ɔabɔ hɔn ho aprɔw no nyinara do. Na dodowara a wɔbaa hɔn nkyɛn, na wonuu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn ho nokwar mu no, wonumaa hɔn wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu; na hɔn so nyaa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa esia mu no, wɔsakyeer nkorɔfo no nyina maa Ewuradze, wɔ asaase no nyina enyi do, Nephifo na Lamanfo, na wentwiwentwi nye aperdzi biara ennsi hɔn ntamu, na obiara nye no nua dzii no pɛpɛɛpɛr.

3 Na hɔn ndzɛmba nyina bɛyɛɛ kwasafodze, dɛm ntsi nna wonnyi ahonyafo na ehiafo, ndɔnkɔfo nye adehye, hɔn nyina nyaa fahodzi, na wonyaa adom akyɛdze kor.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa nye esuon so botwaa mu kɔree a nna asomdwee da ho wɔ asaase no do.

5 Na anwanwadze ndwuma akɛse akɛse na Jesus n’esuafo no yɛɛ, wɔsaa yarba, na wonyaan ewufo, na wɔmaa ebubuafo nantsewee, na enyifurafo hun adze, na etsitsifo tsee asɛm; na wɔyɛɛ etumdze ahorow pii wɔ adasamba mu; na etumdze biara nnyi hɔ a wɔyɛe a wɔannyɛ no wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu.

6 Na dɛm na afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa awɔtwe twaa mu kɔree, na afe a ɔtɔ do eduasa akron, na afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan biako, nye afe a ɔtɔ do eduanan ebien so dɛmara, nyew, kesii dɛ mfe eduanan akron mpo so twaa mu kɔree na afe a ɔtɔ do eduonum biako so dɛmara, na afe a ɔtɔ do eduonum ebien; nyew, na ɔkɛpem afe a ɔtɔ do eduonum akron mpo twaa mu kɔree.

7 Na Ewuradze maa wɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm mbordo wɔ asaase no do; nyew, araa ma wɔkyekyeer nkurow bio wɔ mbea a hɔ nkuropɔn ahyew no do.

8 Nyew, wɔmaa wɔkyekyeer kuropɔn kɛse Zarahemla mpo bio.

9 Mbom nkurow pii wɔ hɔ a nna wɔamemem, ma nsu abɛtaataa hɔn ananmu; dɛm ntsi woenntum annyɛ dɛm nkurow yi afofor.

10 Na afei, hwɛ, ɔbaa dɛ Nephi no nkorɔfo no hɔnho yɛɛ dzen, na wɔdɔɔr mbordo, na wɔbɛyɛɛ nkorɔfo a hɔnho yɛ fɛw mbordo na hɔn ho yɛ enyika kɛse.

11 Na wɔwarwaree, na wɔdze hɔn memaa awar, na wohyiraa hɔn dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze n’anohoba a ɔdze bɔɔ hɔn no tse.

12 Na woenndzi Moses mbra nye ne nhyehyɛɛ nye n’ayɛdze do bio; mbom wodzii mbrasɛm a hɔn nsa kãa fii hɔn Ewuradze nye hɔn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn no do, wɔ akɔnkye nye mpaabɔ mu, na wohyiaa mu mpɛn pii wɔ mpaabɔ nye Ewuradze n’asɛm ne ntsiei mu.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ wentwiwentwi biara ennsisi nkorɔfo no nyinara mu, wɔ asaase no nyinara do; na mbom anwanwadze pii na wɔyɛɛ wɔ Jesus n’esuafo no mu.

14 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon biako twaa mu kɔree, na afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon ebien no so dɛmara, nyew na yetwa no sin a, nna afe a ɔtɔ do eduosuon esuon so etwa mu; nyew, mfe ɔha so mpo twaa mu kɔree, na Jesus n’esuafo no, hɔn a ɔsaan mu yii hɔn no, nna hɔn nyina kɔ Nyankopɔn ne paradise do, gyedɛ baasa no a ɔsee hɔn dɛ wɔbɛka no nko; na wɔhyɛɛ esuafo afofor dze hyɛɛ hɔn ananmu; na dɛm ebusuasantsen no so mu dodowara twaa mu kɔree.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ wentwiwentwi biara ammba asaase no do, osian Nyankopɔn no ho dɔ a ɔtse nkorɔfo no hɔn akoma mu no ntsi.

16 Na enyiber, anaa aperdzi, anaa wentwiwentwi, anaa ndwamambɔ, anaa ndaadaa, anaa ewudzi, anaa ntantan bra ahorow biara ennsi; na nokwar, nyimpa biara nnyi hɔ a Nyankopɔn dze ne nsa abɔ hɔn a wonyaa ahomka tse dɛ dɛm nyimpa yi.

17 Edwotwafo, anaa ewudzifo biara nnyi hɔn mu, nna Lamanfo, anaa nkyerɛkyerɛmu biara nnyi hɔn mu; mbom hɔn nyina yɛɛ adze kor, Christ ne mba, Nyankopɔn n’ahendzi mu adzedzifo.

18 Na mbrɛ woduaa sii hyiraa hɔn a! Ewuradze hyiraa hɔn wɔ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ nyinara mu; nyew, wohyiraa hɔn na wɔyɛɛ hɔn prɔmprɔm kesii dɛ mfe ɔha nye du mpo twaa mu kɔree; na ebusuasantsen a odzi kan wɔ Christ ne mbaa ekyir no so twaa mu kɔree a nna wentwiwentwi biara nnyi asaase no do.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephi, nyia ɔdze kyerɛwsɛm a odzi ewiei yi siei no, (na ɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse no do) wui, na ne babanyin Amos hyɛɛ n’ananmu; na no so kyerɛɛw no wɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse no so do.

20 Na ɔdze siee mfe eduowɔtwe anan, nna asomdwee da ho wɔ asaase no do, gyedɛ dɔm kumaabi a wɔtseew etua fii asɔr no mu, na wɔfrɛɛ hɔnho Lamanfo; dɛm ntsi Lamanfo hyɛɛ ase baa asaase no do bio.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ Amos so wui, (nna Christ bae kɔree no mfe ɔha eduokron anan nye no) na ne babanyin Amos hyɛɛ n’ananmu dze kyerɛwsɛm no siei; na no so kyerɛɛw no wɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse no do; na wɔkyerɛwee so wɔ Nephi nwoma no mu, ɔno nye dɛm nwoma yi.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe ahaebien so twaa mu kɔree, na ebusuasantsen a otsĩa ebien so twaa mu kɔree ma ɔkaa hɔn mu kumaabi.

23 Na afei emi, Mormon, mepɛ dɛ hom hu dɛ nkorɔfo no dɔree araa ma wɔkataa asaase no nyinara enyi do na wɔbɛyɛɛ esikafo mbordo, osian hɔn mpontu wɔ Christ mu ntsi.

24 Na afei afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebien nye kor mu na hɔn mu binom hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔremema hɔnho do wɔ ahantanyɛ mu, tse dɛ wɔrehyehyɛ ntar a ɔsom bo, nye bota ahorow a ɔyɛ fɛw, na wɔdze wiadze yi mu afɛɛfɛdze reyɛ hɔnho.

25 Na ofi dɛm aber no dze kɔ no wɔammfa hɔn ndzɛmba nye hɔn ahodze ammbɔmu annyɛ hɔn adze dɛ kwasafodze bio.

26 Na wɔhyɛɛ ase kyekyɛɛ hɔn mu etsipɛn etsipɛn mu; na wɔhyɛɛ ase sisii asɔrasɔr maa hɔnho dze pɛɛ adze, na wɔhyɛɛ ase poow Christ no nokwar asɔr no.

27 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a mfe ahaebien nye du twaa mu kɔree no nna asɔrasɔr pii aba asaase no do; nyew, asɔrasɔr pii gyee too mu dɛ wonyim Christ, naaso wɔpoow n’asɛmpa n’afã mu bi na wɔgyee emumuyɛdze ahorow pii too mu, na wodzii dwuma a no ho tsew maa hɔn a wɔabra hɔn dɛ mma wonndzi mma hɔn osiandɛ wonndzi mu ntsi.

28 Na dɛm asɔr yi mu nyimpa dɔree ara yie osian emumuyɛ nye Satan no tum a ɔdze akã hɔn akoma ntsi.

29 Na asɔr bi so wɔ hɔ bio a no mu nyimpa no anngye Christ annto mu; na wɔtseetsee Christ no nokwar asɔr no, osian no mu mba no hɔn ahobrɛadze nye hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ Christ mu ntsi, na wokyiir hɔn osian anwanwadze pii a wɔyɛɛ wɔ hɔn mu no ntsi.

30 Dɛm ntsi wɔkyerɛɛ tum na etumdze wɔ Christ n’esuafo no a wɔnye hɔn wɔ hɔ no do na wɔdze hɔn guu efiadze; mbom osian Nyankopɔn n’asɛm no tum a ɔwɔ hɔn mu ntsi, efiadze adan no mu paa ebien, ma wofii mu puei kɔree kɛyɛɛ anwanwadze wɔ hɔn mu.

31 Naaso, anwanwadze yi nyinara ekyir no nkorɔfo no piriim hɔn akoma, na wɔpeer dɛ woboku hɔn, dɛ mbrɛ Jewfo a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no peree dɛ woboku Jesus, wɔ n’asɛm no ntsi.

32 Na wɔtoow hɔn guu gyatanaa mfononoo mu, na wofii mu puei a hwee annyɛ hɔn.

33 Na wɔtoow hɔn so guu mbowa abɔyafo buw mu, na wɔnye mbowa abɔyafo no dzii agor mpo dɛ mbrɛ abofraba dze bɛyɛ eguambaa; na wofii mu puei a hwee annyɛ hɔn.

34 Naaso, nkorɔfo no piriim hɔn akoma, na asɔfo pii nye nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo boaa hɔn ma wokyekyeer asɔr asɔr pii, na wɔyɛɛ emumuyɛ ahorow pii. Na wɔhwee Jesus no nkorɔfo no; na mbom Jesus no nkorɔfo no annhwe hɔn bi. Na dɛm na ɔmaa wɔwodowee wɔ gyedzi mu nye ewurkadze ne yɛ mu, fi afe to afe, dze kesii dɛ mfe ahaebien eduasa twaa mu kɔree.

35 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe no mu, nyew, afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebien eduasa biako no mu, mpaapaamu kɛse bi baa nkorɔfo no mu.

36 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe no mu, nkorɔfo bi soɛree a wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Nephifo, na wɔyɛ agyedzifo mapa wɔ Christ mu; na binom so wɔ hɔn mu a wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Lamanfo—Jacobfo, na Josephfo nye Zoramfo;

37 Dɛm ntsi Christ mu agyedzifo mapa nye Christ asomfo nokwafo no (hɔn mu na Jesus n’esuafo baasa no a ɔsee hɔn dɛ wɔntse nkwa mu no fi) wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Nephifo, na Jacobfo, na Josephfo, nye Zoramfo.

38 Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn a wɔpoow asɛmpa no wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Lamanfo, nye Lemuelfo, nye Ishmaelfo; na woyinom dze wɔannwodow wɔ gyedzi mu, na mbom wɔdze enyidaho tseew etua wɔ Christ n’asɛmpa no; na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn mba so dɛ mma wɔnngye nndzi, dɛ mbrɛ ofitsi ahyɛse no hɔn egyanom so mpo wodowee no.

39 Na iyi tse dɛm osian hɔn egyanom hɔn emumuyɛdze nye hɔn ekyiwadze a wɔdze fi ahyɛse no ntsi. Na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔntan Nyankopɔn ne mba, dɛ mbrɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ Lamanfo dɛ wɔntan Nephi ne mba fi ahyɛse no.

40 Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe ahaebien eduanan anan twaa mu kɔree, nna dɛmara na nkorɔfo no hɔn abrabɔ tse. Na hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛfo kɛse wɔ nkorɔfo no mu no nyaa ahoɔdzen na wɔdɔree ara yie seen Nyankopɔn no nkorɔfo no.

41 Na wɔkɔr do ara sisii asɔrdan memaa hɔnho, na wɔdze ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo ahorow pii siesiee mu. Na dɛm na mfe ahaebien eduonum twaa mu kɔree, na mfe ahaebien eduosia so twaa mu kɔree.

42 Na ɔbaa dɛ nkorɔfo no hɔn mu emumuyɛfo no hyɛɛ ase tseew Gadianton ne nsumaamu nsewdzi na fɛkuwbɔ no bio.

43 Na nkorɔfo a wɔfrɛɛ hɔn Nephi no nkorɔfo no so hyɛɛ ase yɛɛ ahopɔw wɔ hɔn akoma mu, osian hɔn sika pii no ntsi, na wɔyɛɛ ahantan tse dɛ hɔn nuanom, Lamanfo no ara pɛr.

44 Na ofitsi aber yi dze kɔ no esuafo no hyɛɛ ase dzii yaw maa wiadze bɔn no.

45 Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a mfe ahaebiasa twaa mu kɔree no, Nephi no dɔm nye Lamanfo no bɛyɛɛ emumuyɛfo mbordo, kor tse dɛ ne kor so ara pɛr.

46 Na ɔbaa dɛ Gadianton edwotwafo no petsee asaase n’enyi nyinara do; na obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ tseneneenyi kã Jesus n’esuafo no ho. Na sika nye dwetɛ na wɔpɛɛ no mbordo dze siei, na wodzii gua bɔn ahorow nyina.

47 Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe ahaebiasa na enum twaa mu kɔree ekyir no, (nna nkorɔfo no da ho tse hɔn emumuyɛdze mu) Amos wui; na no nua Ammaron hyɛɛ n’ananmu dze kyerɛwsɛm no siei.

48 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a mfe ahaebiasa eduonu twaa mu kɔree no, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no hyɛɛ Ammaron ma ɔdze nkyerɛwee a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no siei—nyew, kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no nyinara a wɔdze egya no, fi ebusuasantsen kodu ebusuasantsen, dza ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no—mpo dze kesi afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduonu, fi aber a Christ dze bae no mu.

49 Na ɔdze siei maa Ewuradze ama oeeyi epue bio dze ama Jacob fifo nkaa dɛ mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛ nye Ewuradze n’anohoba se. Na iyi nye Ammaron ne kyerɛwsɛm no n’ewiei.
morm 1:
[center][font_size=26]Mormon Nwoma No[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Tsir 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ammaron kã nkyerɛwee krɔnkrɔn no ho asɛm kyerɛ Mormon—Ɔkõ si Nephifo na Lamanfo no ntamu—Woyi Nephifo baasa no kɔ—Emumuyɛ, ekyingye, nkɔngyaayi nye abayisɛm tahye. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 321–326.[/i]

1 Na afei emi, Mormon, merekyerɛw dza ɔfa ndzɛmba a mehu na matse nyinara ho nsɛm na moto no dzin Mormon Nwoma no.

2 Na aber a Ammaron dze kyerɛwsɛm no siei maa Ewuradze no mu no, ɔbaa me nkyɛn, (aber no nna medzi mfe du, na mehyɛɛ ase dɛ murusũa nwoma dɛ mbrɛ mo nkorɔfo hɔn nwomasũa tse ho) na Ammaron see me dɛ: Muhu dɛ eyɛ abofra a edwe na ehyɛ adze so nsew;

3 Dɛm ntsi, aber a ibedzi bɛyɛ mfe eduonu anan no, mebɛpɛ dɛ ebɛkaakaa ndzɛmba a ahyɛ no nsew a ɔfa dɛm nkorɔfo yi ho; na sɛ idzi dɛm mfe no a kɔ Antum asaase do, na kɔ koko bi a wɔfrɛ no Shim do; na hɔ na medze kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn a woekrukye a ɔfa dɛm nkorɔfo yi ho esie ama Ewuradze.

4 Na hwɛ, ebɛfa Nephi mprɛtse no ama woho; na egyaa dza aka no wɔ n’ananmu hɔ; na ibokrukye ndzɛmba nyina a ehu wɔ nkorɔfo yi ho wɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse no do.

5 Na emi, Mormon, meyɛ Nephi n’asenyi, (na m’egya ne dzin dze Mormon) na mekaa ndzɛmba a Ammaron hyɛɛ me dɛ menkã no.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ midzii mfe dubiako no, m’egya tuur me dze me kɔr anaafo afamu asaase do, Zarahemla asaase mpo do.

7 Adan akata asaase no n’enyi nyinara do, na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ do no dɔɔ sõ ara yie, hɔn dodow tse dɛ mpoano anhwea.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe yi mu ɔkõ hyɛɛ ase wɔ Nephifo no mu, dɛm nkorɔfo no nye Nephifo na Jacobfo nye Josephfo na Zoramfo; na ɔkõ yi so sii Nephifo, na Lamanfo nye Lemuelfo na Ishmaelfo mu.

9 Afei Lamanfo na Lemuelfo nye Ishmaelfo no wɔfrɛɛ hɔn nyinara Lamanfo, na ekuw ebien no nye Nephifo nye Lamanfo.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkõ no hyɛɛ ase wɔ hɔn mu wɔ Zarahemla kurow ne nkyɛn wɔ Sidon esu ho.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no boaboaa hɔn mbanyin ano, na hɔn dodow twa mu mpemeduasa. Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe yi mu wodzii akõ ara yie na Nephifo dzii Lamanfo no do konyim na wokunkum hɔn mu pii.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no sesaa hɔn akwan, na wonyaa asomdwee wɔ asaase no do, na wonyaa asomdwee bɛyɛ mfe anan ntamu a bɔgya biara enngu.

13 Mbom emumuyɛdze kɔr do wɔ asaase n’enyi nyinara do araa ma Ewuradze faa n’esuafo adɔfo hɔn no kɔree, na anwanwadze ne yɛ nye ayarsa twaa wɔ asaase no do osian nkorɔfo no hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi.

14 Na akyɛdze biara emmfi Ewuradze nkyɛn ammba, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ammba obiara do, osian hɔn emumuyɛ nye hɔn ekyingye ntsi.

15 Na emi, nna medzi mfe duenum na modwe kakra, dɛm ntsi Ewuradze baa me nkyɛn, na mosɔe hwɛɛ na muhun Jesus ne papayɛ.

16 Na mobɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ mebɛkã nsɛmpa no akyerɛ dɔm yi, na mbom wɔtoow m’anomu, na wɔbraa me dɛ mma mennkã nsɛmpa no nnkyerɛ hɔn; na hwɛ, wɔdze enyidaho atsew etua wɔ hɔn Nyankopɔn do; na woyii esuafo adɔfo no fii asaase no do kɔree, osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi.

17 Mbom mokɔr do tsenaa hɔn mu, na wɔbraa me dɛ mma mennkã nsɛmpa no nnkyerɛ hɔn, osian hɔn akomadzen ntsi; na osian hɔn akomadzen ntsi wɔdze ndom kãa asaase no maa hɔn.

18 Na dɛm Gadianton edwotwafo yi a wɔafora Lamanfo mu no dɔree wɔ asaase no do na dɔm a wɔwɔ hɔ no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔdze hɔn egudze rusuma asaase no mu; na no ho yɛɛ tor, osiandɛ Ewuradze adom asaase no, dɛm ntsi woenntum ennsuo mu, anaadɛ hɔn nsa annkã bio.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ ebisatsirfo, nye abayifo, nye nkɔngyaayifo soɛree dze abɔnsam no tum yɛɛ edwuma wɔ asaase n’enyi nyinara do, mpo ma Abinadi ne nsɛm a ɔkãe nyina nye Samuel, Lamannyi no so nedze nyina baa mu.
morm 2:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon yɛ Nephi nsordaafo no hɔn banodzifo—Bɔgya na ewudzi twuuw fa asaase no do—Nephifo twa kwadwom na wosi nkrum dɛ afɔdzifo hɔn awerɛhodzi—Hɔn adom nda etwa mu—Mormon nya Nephi ne mprɛtse no—Akõkoekõ toa do. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 327–350.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe noara mu no ɔkõ hyɛɛ ase bio wɔ Nephifo na Lamanfo mu. Na ɔwɔ mu dɛ nna minnyinii dze, naaso nna mo sõ; dɛm ntsi Nephi no nkorɔfo no faa me dɛ menyɛ hɔn sahen, anaadɛ mindzi hɔn nsordaafo no enyim.

2 Dɛm ntsi, ɔbaa dɛ midzii mfe duesia no na midzii Nephifo no hɔn nsordaafo enyim nye Lamanfo kɔkõe; aber no nna mfe ahaebiasa eduonu-esia etwa mu kɔ.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduonu-esuon mu no, Lamanfo no dze tum kɛse baa hɛn do araa ma wɔbɔɔ mo nsordaafo no hu; dɛm ntsi wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔbɔkõ, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔresan hɔn ekyir akɔ aman a wɔda etsifi afamu no mu.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛbaa Angola kuropɔn pɔn no mu, na yɛfaa kurow no, na yɛyɛɛ ahoboa dɛ yɛnye Lamanfo no rikedzi esi. Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛdze hɛn ahoɔdzen bɔɔ kurow no ho ban; na mbom hɛn bambɔ nyina ekyir no, Lamanfo no baa hɛn do na wɔpaam hɛn fii kurow no mu.

5 Na wɔpaam hɛn so fii David asaase do.

6 Na yɛnantsewee baa Joshua asaase a ɔda anee afamu wɔ mpoano no do.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛboaboaa hɛn nkorɔfo no ano ntsɛmara dɛ mbrɛ yebotum, ama yeetum ama wɔabɛyɛ kuw kor.

8 Mbom hwɛ, edwotwafo na Lamanfo ahyɛ asaase no do mã; na ammfa mo nkorɔfo no ho dɛ ɔsɛɛ kɛse sensɛn hɛn do, woennu hɔnho wɔ hɔn ndzebɔn ho; dɛm ntsi bɔgya na ewudzi yɛɛ kɛse wɔ asaase no nyina do, wɔ Nephifo nye Lamanfo nyina afamu; na ɔsesaa biribiara a ɔwɔ asaase no n’enyi do nyina.

9 Na afei, Lamanfo no nyaa ɔhen na ne dzin dze Aaron; na ɔdze nsordaafo mpem eduanan-anan baa hɛn do. Na hwɛ, medze nsordaafo mpem eduanan-ebien kegyinaa hɔn enyim. Na ɔbaa dɛ menye me nsordaafo no kãa hɔn gui ma woguanee fii m’enyim. Na hwɛ, iyi nyina sii no, nna mfe ahaebiasa eduasa etwa mu kɔ.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no hyɛɛ ase dɛ worunu hɔnho wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ ho, na wɔhyɛɛ ase sũi tse dɛ mbrɛ Samuel nkɔnhyɛnyi no hyɛɛ ho nkɔm no, na hwɛ obiara enntum annkora dza ɔyɛ nankasa nedze do, osian ewifo na edwotwafo, na ewudzifo, na nkɔngyaayifo na abayifo a wɔwɔ asaase no do ntsi.

11 Na nkrumsi na kwadwomtwa hyɛɛ ase wɔ asaase no nyina do osian dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ntsi, nkanka wɔ Nephifo no mu.

12 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a emi, Mormon, muhun hɔn kwadwomtwa na hɔn nkrumsi na hɔn sũ wɔ Ewuradze enyim no, m’akoma hyɛɛ ase dzii dɛw wɔ mo mu, na minyim Ewuradze n’ehumbɔbɔr na ne penkyɛr, dɛm ntsi mususuu dɛ obohu hɔn mbɔbɔr ama wɔaasan abɛyɛ atseneneefo bio.

13 Mbom hwɛ, enyigye a minyae no yɛɛ kwa, osiandɛ hɔn awerɛhodzi no anngye hɔn annkɔ nnuho mu, osian Nyankopɔn ne papayɛ ntsi, mbom ɔyɛ afɔdzifo hɔn awerɛhowdzi, osiandɛ Ewuradze remma kwan mma wonnya ahomka wɔ bɔn mu daa.

14 Na wɔammfa akoma a abobɔ nye sunsum a abotow ammba Jesus hɔ, mbom wɔpaa Nyame, na wɔpɛɛ dɛ wobowu. Mbom, wɔdze nkrantsee bedzi aper wɔ hɔn nkwa ntsi.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ mo werɛ sanee hoow bio, na muhun dɛ adom da no apa hɔnho kɔ, wɔ honam nye sunsum afamu nyina; osiandɛ muhun hɔn mu mpempem a woetwa hɔn egu na wɔaboaboa hɔn ano egu hɔ dɛ nwura wɔ asaase enyi do, osiandɛ wɔatsew etua wɔ hɔn Nyankopɔn do. Na dɛm na mfe ahaebiasa eduanan-anan twaa mu.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduanan-enum mu no Nephifo hyɛɛ ase dɛ woruguan fi Lamanfo enyim; na wotsiiw hɔn araa kodur dɛ wɔbaa Jashon asaase do mpo ansaana worutum esianka hɔn.

17 Na afei, Jashon kurow no bɛn asaase a Ammaron dze kyerɛwsɛm no esie ama Ewuradze, amma wɔannsɛɛ no no. Na hwɛ, mokɔr Ammaron hɔ dɛ mbrɛ n’asɛm se, na mekɛfaa Nephi ne mprɛtse no, na mekyerɛɛw nsɛm dɛ mbrɛ Ammaron n’asɛm se.

18 Na Nephi ne mprɛtse no do na mekyerɛɛw emumuyɛdze na ekyiwadze a wɔyɛɛ nyina, na mbom dɛm prɛtse yi do no me sankaa dɛ mebɛkyerɛw hɔn emumuyɛdze na ebusudze a osii nyina, osiandɛ hwɛ, wɔkɔr do yɛɛ emumuyɛdze na mbusudze ofi mber a menyi buei wɔ nyimpa n’akwan mu no.

19 Na mundue osian hɔn emumuyɛdze ntsi; na yaw ahyɛ m’akoma mu mã osian hɔn emumuyɛdze ntsi, mo nkwa nda nyina; naaso, minyim dɛ wɔbɛma mo do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

20 Na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe yi mu wɔhaaw Nephi no nkorɔfo no bio na wɔpaam hɔn. Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔpaam hɛn araa kɛpeem dɛ yedur etsifi afamu asaase bi a wɔfrɛ no Shem no do.

21 Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛbɔɔ Shem kurow no ho ban ara yie, na yɛboaboaa hɛn nkorɔfo ano dɛ mbrɛ yebotum, dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a wɔnnkɛsɛɛ hɔn.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduanan-esia mu no, wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreba hɛn do bio.

23 Na ɔbaa dɛ mekasaa kyerɛɛ mo nkorɔfo no na mehyɛɛ hɔn nkuran kɛsenara dɛ wongyina akokodur mu wɔ Lamanfo no enyim na wɔnkõ ngye hɔn yernom, nye hɔn mba, nye hɔn adan, nye hɔn efiefi.

24 Na me nsɛm no hyɛɛ hɔn dzen araa ma woennguan emmfi Lamanfo no enyim, na mbom wogyinaa pintsinn nye hɔn dzii esi.

25 Na ɔbaa dɛ menye nsordaafo mpem eduasa kegyinaa nsordaafo mpem eduonum enyim kõe. Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛnye hɔn kõo akokodur mu araa ma woguanee fii hɛn enyim.

26 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a woguanee no, yɛnye hɛn nsordaafo no tsiiw hɔn, na yehyiaa hɔn bio, na yɛhwee hɔn, naaso, nna Ewuradze n’ahoɔdzen nnkã hɛnho; nyew, wogyaa hɛn bra mu hyɛɛ hɛnankasa hɛn nsa, amma Ewuradze ne Sunsum no anntsena hɛn mu; dɛm ntsi yɛbɛyɛɛ mberɛw tse dɛ hɛn enuanom no.

27 Na m’akoma dzii yaw osian mo nkorɔfo hɔn esian kɛse yi ntsi, osian hɔn emumuyɛdze nye ekyiwadze a wɔyɛe ntsi. Mbom hwɛ, yɛnye Lamanfo na Gadianton edwotwafo no kõe araa kesii dɛ yɛgyee hɛn egyapadze nsaase no bio.

28 Na afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduanan-akron ebotwa mu. Na afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduonum mu no, yɛnye Lamanfo na Gadianton edwotwafo no yɛɛ nhyehyɛɛ bi ma yɛkyɛɛ hɛn egyapadze asaase no.

29 Na Lamanfo no dze asaase a ɔda etsifi mantam mu no maa hɛn, nyew, dze kesi kwan tseaba a odzi kɔ anaafo afamu hɔ no. Na yɛdze asaase a ɔda anaafo afamu nyina maa Lamanfo no.
morm 3:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon bɔ nnuho ho dawur kyerɛ Nephifo no—Wodzi konyim kɛsenara na wɔhyɛ hɔnho enyimnyam wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn mbɔdzembɔ do—Mormon pow dɛ ɔbɛyɛ hɔn banodzifo, ɔbɔ mpaa a gyedzi nnyi mu ma hɔn—Mormon Nwoma no to nsa frɛ Israel ebusuakuw duebien no dɛ wɔngye asɛmpa no ndzi. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 360–362.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no nye hɛn ammbɔkõ bio kɛpeem dɛ mfe du bɛsenee. Na hwɛ, memaa mo nkorɔfo Nephifo no siesiee hɔn nsaase na wɔyɛɛ hɔn akodze so dze tweɔn ɔkõber.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze see me dɛ: Kã kyerɛ nkorɔfo no dɛ wonnu hɔnho, na wɔmbra mo hɔ, na wonnuma hɔn na wɔnkyekyer m’asɔr bio, na wɔdze hɔn nkwa bɛkyɛ hɔn.

3 Na metsẽaa mu kãa kyerɛɛ dɔm no, na mbom ne nyina ennkesi hwee, na woennhu dɛ Ewuradze na ɔdze hɔn nkwa akyɛ hɔn, na ɔama hɔn mber dɛ wɔmfa nnu hɔnho. Na hwɛ, wopiriim hɔn akoma wɔ Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn do.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a afe a ɔtɔ do du twaa mu no, nna sɛ wɔkã bɔmu a, ɔyɛ mfe ahaebiasa eduosia fi Christ ne mbaa ekyir no, Lamanfo hɔn hen no somaa ma wɔdze krataa bi brɛɛ me, nsɛm a ɔwɔ mu no kyerɛ dɛ, ɔpɛ dɛ metse ase dɛ wɔroboaboa hɔnho nye hɛn abɔkõ.

5 Na ɔbaa dɛ, mesee mo nkorɔfo no dɛ wɔmboa hɔn ano wɔ Amamfo asaase do wɔ kurow a ɔda ahe do, wɔ kwan tseatseaba no a ɔdze kɔ anaafo afamu no do.

6 Na hɔ na yɛnye hɛn nsordaafo no kogui, ama yeesiw Lamanfo no kwan mma wɔammbɛfa hɛn asaase no mu biara; dɛm ntsi yɛdze hɛn ahoɔdzen nyina bɔɔ ho ban.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ, afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduosiabiako mu no, Lamanfo no baa Amamfo kurow no do dɛ wɔnye hɛn robɔkõ; na ɔbaa dɛ dɛm afe no mu yɛhwee hɔn araa ma wɔsanee kɔr hɔnankasa hɔn nsaase do bio.

8 Na afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduosia-ebien mu no wɔbaa bio dɛ wɔnye hɛn robɔkõ, na yedzii hɔn do nkõnyim bio na yekum hɔn mu pii, na yɛtoow hɔn efun guu po mu.

9 Na afei, osian dɛm adze kɛse yi a mo nkorɔfo Nephifo yɛɛ ntsi, wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worutuw hɔnho wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn ahoɔdzen mu, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔdze sor rekã ntam dɛ wobedzi hɔn enuanom a hɔn atamfo ekum hɔn no hɔn bɔgyaa ho wer.

10 Na wɔdze ɔsorsor kãa ntam, nye Nyankopɔn n’ahengua so dɛ wɔbɔkɔ na wɔnye hɔn atamfo akɔkõ, na wobotwa hɔn efi asaase enyi do akyen.

11 Na ɔbaa dɛ emi Mormon mopoow dɛ mebɛyɛ dɛm nkorɔfo yi hɔn sahen na banodzifo ofi dɛm da yi dze kɔ, osian hɔn emumuyɛdze na ekyiwadze nyɛɛ ntsi.

12 Hwɛ, mannhwɛ hɔn emumuyɛdze ho na meyɛɛ hɔn banodzifo. Medzi hɔn enyim mpɛn pii nye hɔn akɔ ɔkõ, na madɔ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ Nyame no dɔ a ɔwɔ mo mu no tse, medze m’akoma nyina; na medze me kra nyina abɔ mpaa ama Nyankopɔn mbertsentsen nyina dze ama hɔn; naaso gyedzi nnyi mu, osian hɔn akomadzen ntsi.

13 Na mpɛn ebiasa na magye hɔn efi hɔn atamfo nsamu, na woennu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn ho.

14 Na ber a wɔdze dza hɛn Ewuradze na hɛn Agyenkwa Jesus Christ abra hɛn ho nyina kãa ntam dɛ wɔbɔkɔ na wɔnye hɔn atamfo akɔkõ, na woedzi hɔn enuanom hɔn bɔgyaa ho wer no, hwɛ, Ewuradze ne ndze baa mo hɔ dɛ:

15 Awerdzi yɛ medze, na mubotua kaw; na osiandɛ dɛm nkorɔfo yi ennu hɔnho wɔ ber a megyee hɔn ekyir no, hwɛ, wobotwa hɔn efi asaase enyi do akyen.

16 Na ɔbaa dɛ mopoow koraa dɛ mobɔkɔ nye m’atamfo akɔkõ; na meyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze hyɛɛ me no pɛpɛɛpɛr; motwee moho sii nkyɛn hwɛɛ hɔn, ama maagye ndzɛmba a muhunii na metsee ho dase akyerɛ wiadzemba dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum no a ɔgye ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba ho dase kyerɛ no bɛda no edzi.

17 Dɛm ntsi mekyerɛw dze ma hom Amanamamfo, nye hom Israelfifo so, sɛ dwumadzi no hyɛ ase a, hom nhyɛ ase mboaboa homho dɛ hom bɛsan hom ekyir akɔ hom egyapadze asaase do.

18 Nyew, hwɛ, mekyerɛw dze ma asaase n’ano n’ano nyina, nyew, dze ma hom Israel ebusuakuw duebien no; hom na duebien a Jesus faa hɔn yɛɛ n’esuafo no bobu hom atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hom ndwuma tse.

19 Na mekyerɛw so dze ma nkorɔfo nkaa yi, hɔn so duebien no a Jesus faa hɔn wɔ asaase yi do no na wobobu hɔn atsɛn; na duebien no so a Jesus san mu yii hɔn wɔ Jerusalem asaase do no bobu hɔn atsɛn.

20 Na dɛm ndzɛmba yinom na Sunsum no daa no edzi kyerɛɛ me; dɛm ntsi mekyerɛw ma hom nyinara. Na iyi ntsi na mekyerɛw ma hom ama hom eehu dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ hom nyina gyina Christ n’atsɛmbu egua no enyim, nyew, ɔkra biara a ɔkã Adam n’ebusuasantsen nyina ho no; na ɔsɛ dɛ hom gyina hɔ ma wobu hom atsɛn wɔ hom ndwuma ho, dɛ oye anaa omuo.

21 Na ama hom aagye Jesus Christ n’asɛmpa no so a hom nsa bɛkã no edzi; na dɛ Jewfo so, Ewuradze n’ahyɛmu mba no benya dasegyefo bi akã hɔn a wohunii na wɔtsee dɛ Jesus a wokum no no, noara na ɔyɛ Christ na ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn kor noara so.

22 Na mebɛpɛ dɛ mekasa dze asakyer asaase n’ano n’ano nyina ma woenu hɔnho na woesiesie hɔnho dze egyina Christ n’atsɛmbu egua no enyim.
morm 4:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ɔkõ nye ewudzi kɔ do—Emumuyɛfo twe emumuyɛfo aso—Emumuyɛdze kɛse tahye sen dza esi pɛn wɔ Israel mu nyinara—Wɔdze mbaa na mbofra bɔ afɔr ma abosom—Lamanfo no hyɛ ase dɛ wɔrepra Nephifo no efi hɔn enyim. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 363–375.[/i]

1 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduosia ebiasa mu no Nephifo nye hɔn nsordaafo no, kɔree nye Lamanfo no kɔkõe, wɔ Amamfo asaase nkyɛn.

2 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔpaam Nephifo hɔn nsordaafo no ma wɔsaan hɔn ekyir kɔr Amamfo asaase do. Na ber a nna wɔafonafona no, Lamanfo hɔn nsordaafo afofor baa hɔn do; na ɔkõ no mu yɛɛ dzen ara yie ma Lamanfo no gyee Amamfo kurow no, na wokunkum Nephifo no pii, na wɔfaa pii so ndɔmmum.

3 Na hɔn mu dza wɔkae no so guanee na wɔkɔforaa nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Teancum kuropɔn mu no mu. Afei, Teancum kurow no da mpoano afamu; na ɔbɛn Amamfo kuropɔn no so.

4 Na osiandɛ Nephifo hɔn nsordaafo no hɔnankasa na wɔkɔr Lamanfo do no ntsi ɔmaa wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrohwe hɔn; na sɛ annyɛ dɛm a nkyɛ Lamanfo no ennya tum wɔ hɔn do.

5 Mbom, hwɛ, Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu no bɛba emumuyɛfo do; na ɔnam emumuyɛfo do na wɔtwe emumuyɛfo aso osiandɛ emumuyɛfo na wonunu adasamba hɔn akoma ma wɔkã bɔgya gu.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no siesiee hɔnho dɛ wɔreba Teancum kurow no do.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduosia anan mu no, Lamanfo no baa Teancum kurow no do dɛ wɔrebɛgye Teancum kurow no so afa.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no paam hɔn ma wɔsaan hɔn ekyir. Na ber a Nephifo no hun dɛ woetum apam Lamanfo no, wɔhyɛɛ ase tuuw hɔnho wɔ hɔn ahoɔdzen ho; na wɔnam hɔnankasa hɔn ahoɔdzen do kɔree kɛfaa Amamfo kurow no bio.

9 Na afei wɔyɛɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina, na afã na afã nyina wokum nyimpa mpempem, Nephifo nye Lamanfo mu nyina.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduosia esia bɛsenee, na Lamanfo no baa Nephifo no do bio nye hɔn bɔkõe; naaso Nephifo no ennu hɔnho wɔ emumuyɛdze a wɔyɛɛ no ho, mbom wɔkɔr do ara yɛɛ hɔn emumuyɛdze no.

11 Na ɔyɛ dzen ma ano dɛ obotum akã anaa ɔdasanyi dɛ obotum akyerɛkyerɛ bɔgya nye ewudzi a osii nkorɔfo no mu no mu yie, wɔ Nephifo nye Lamanfo nyina mu; nna akoma biara epirim, ntsi wɔpɛɛ dɛ daa nyina wɔbɛkã bɔgya egu.

12 Nna emumuyɛdze kɛse a ɔtse dɛm nnsii Lehi ne mba mu pɛn anaadɛ bi nnsii wɔ Israel fifo mu mpo da, tse dɛ dza osii dɛm nkorɔfo yi mu no, dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze ne nsɛm se.

13 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no gyee Amamfo kuropɔn no, na ɔbaa no dɛm osiandɛ nna hɔn dodow sõ sen Nephifo hɔn dodow.

14 Na wɔtoow santsen so kɔr Teancum kurow mu, na wɔpaam no mu nyimpa nyina fii hɔ, na wɔfaa hɔn mu pii ndɔmmum, mbaa nye mbofra, na wɔdze hɔn bɔɔ afɔr maa hɔn ehonyi enyame.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe ahaebiasa eduosia esuon mu no, Nephifo no bo fuwii osiandɛ Lamanfo no dze hɔn mbaa nye mbofra abɔ afɔr, dɛm ntsi wɔdze ebufuw kɛse kɔr Lamanfo no do, ebufuw no yɛɛ dzen araa ma dɛm ntsi wɔhwee Lamanfo no bio, na wɔpaam hɔn fii hɔn nsaase do.

16 Na Lamanfo no ammba Nephifo no do bio kesii afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduosuon enum mu.

17 Na dɛm afe yi mu no, wɔdze hɔn ahoɔdzen nyina baa Nephifo no do; na wɔannkan hɔn osiandɛ wɔdɔɔ sõ ara yie.

18 Na ofi dɛm aber yi dze kɔ no, Nephifo no ennya tum wɔ Lamanfo do bio, mbom wɔhyɛɛ ase praa hɔn dɛ mbrɛ bɔw fi ewia enyim.

19 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no baa Amamfo kurow do; na ɔkõ a ɔyɛ dzen papanara sii Amamfo asaase do, na wɔhwee Nephifo.

20 Na woguanee fii hɔn enyim, na wɔbaa Boaz kurow mu na wotumii nye Lamanfo no dzii akõ akokodur mu ma Lamanfo no enntum annhwe hɔn kesii dɛ wɔbaa hɔn do mpɛn a otsĩa ebien so.

21 Na ber a wɔbaa hɔn do mpɛn a otsĩa ebien no, wɔpaam Nephifo no na wokunkum hɔn ara yie; na wɔdze hɔn mbaa nye mbofra bɔɔ afɔr bio ma hɔn abosom.

22 Na ɔbaa dɛ Nephifo no guanee fii hɔn enyim bio a wɔfaa nyimpa a wɔwɔ nkurow nkurow nye nkuraase nkuraase mu nyina kãa hɔnho.

23 Na afei emi, Mormon, muhun dɛ Lamanfo no rubobutuw asaase no, dɛm ntsi mokɔr koko Shim do, na mikeyii nkyerɛwee no a Ammaron dze siei maa Ewuradze no.
morm 5:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon dzi Nephifo hɔn nsordaafo no enyim kɔ akõ dzendzen bi mu bio a wɔkã bɔgyagu na ewudzi kɛse—Mormon Nwoma no bopue na ɔbɛma Israelfo nyina agye edzi dɛ Jesus nye Christ no—Osian Lamanfo no hɔn enkyingye ntsi, wɔbɔbɔ hɔn apetse, na Sunsum no begyaa dɛ ɔnye hɔn ridzi aper—Hɔn nsa bɛkã asɛmpa no efi Amanamamfo hɔ wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 375–384.[/i]

1 Na ɔbaa dɛ mokɔr Nephifo no mu, na munuu moho wɔ nsew a midzii dɛ morommboa hɔn bio no ho; na wɔdze hɔn nsordaafo no hyɛɛ me nsa bio, osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn enyi too mo do dɛ emi na mubotum agye hɔn efi hɔn amandzehu mu.

2 Mbom hwɛ, nna minnyi enyidado biara, osiandɛ minyim Ewuradze n’atsɛmbu a ɔbɛba hɔn do, osiandɛ woennu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn ho, mbom wɔperee maa hɔn nkwa na woennsu ammfrɛ Nyia Ɔbɔɔ hɔn no.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo no baa hɛn do ber a yeguanee kɔr Jordan kurow mu no; mbom hwɛ wɔpaam hɔn na woenntum ammfa kurow no dɛm aber no.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔbaa hɛn do bio, na yɛbɔɔ kurow no ho ban. Na nkuropɔn binom so wɔ hɔ a Nephifo no bɔɔ ho ban, na kwan a wɔfaa do bɔɔ ho ban no ntsi woenntum ammba kurow a ɔda hɛn enyim no mu ammbɛsɛɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ hɛn asaase no do no.

5 Mbom ɔbaa dɛ asaase a yɛfaa do a no mu nyimpa no mmboaa hɔn ano no, Lamanfo no sɛɛ hɔn, nye hɔn nkurow nye hɔn nkuraase, na wɔdze gya hyeew hɔn nkuropɔn nyina, na dɛm na mfe ahaebiasa eduosuon-akron twaa mu kɔree.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a ɔtɔ do ahaebiasa eduowɔtwe mu no Lamanfo no baa bio dɛ wɔnye hɛn robɔkõ, na yɛdze akokodur gyinaa hɔn enyim; na mbom ne nyina yɛɛ gyan osiandɛ wɔdɔɔ sõ araa ma wotwuwii faa Nephifo no do tsiatsiaa hɔn do.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ yeguaan bio fii Lamanfo no hɔn enyim, na hɔn a hɔnho yɛɛ har no fii nsa, na hɔn a hɔnho annyɛ har no wɔsɛɛ hɔn.

8 Na afei hwɛ, emi Mormon memmpɛ dɛ mekã awerɛhosɛm kɛse na ewurkadze a medze m’enyiwa hunii kyerɛ dze how nyimpa hɔn werɛ; mbom emi minyim dɛ ndzɛmba yinom wɔ dɛ ɔda edzi, na dɛ ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ nsumaamu nyina wɔbɛ da no edzi wɔ adan-etsifi—

9 Na dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho nyimdzee so wɔ dɛ ɔba dɛm nkorɔfo nkaa yinom hɔ, nye Amanamamfo so hɔ, hɔn a Ewuradze akã dɛ wɔbɔbɔ nkorɔfo yi apetse, na dɛm nkorɔfo yi worummbu hɔn bi wɔ hɔn mu—dɛm ntsi merekyerɛw biribi oetwa no tsia, memmpɛ dɛ mekyerɛw ndzɛmba nyinara a muhunii no, osian mbrasɛm a me nsa akã ntsi, amma hom enndzi awerɛhow kɛse so osian dɛm nkorɔfo yi hɔn emumuyɛdze ntsi.

10 Na afei hwɛ, iyi mekã kyerɛ hɔn asefo, nye Amanamamfo so a wɔbɔhwɛ Israel fifo do, na wosusu na wohu bea a hɔn nhyira fi ba no.

11 Na minyim dɛ nkorɔfo a wɔbɛtse dɛm no bedzi awerɛhow wɔ Israel fifo hɔn haw ho; nyew, wobedzi awerɛhow wɔ dɛm nkorɔfo yi hɔn nsɛɛ ho; wobedzi awerɛhow dɛ nkorɔfo yi ennu hɔnho na wɔammfa hɔnho annto Jesus n’abaw mu.

12 Afei wɔakyerɛw ndzɛmba yinom dze ama Jacob fifo nkaa; na wɔakyerɛw no wɔ dɛm kwan yi do, osiandɛ Nyame nyim dɛ emumuyɛdze runntum mmfa iyinom mmbrɛ hɔn; na wɔdze besie ama Ewuradze akɛpem dɛ ɔbɛda no edzi wɔ nankasa ne mber do.

13 Na iyi nye mbrasɛm a me nsa akã, na hwɛ, wobeyi epue dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm kyerɛ, ber a obohu dɛ oye, wɔ ne nyansaa mu.

14 Na hwɛ, wɔbɔkɔ Jewfo a wɔnngye nndzi no hɔ; na iyi ntsi na wɔbɔkɔ ama wɔama woehu dɛ Jesus nye Christ no, Nyame tseasefo ne Ba no; ama Egya no eedua no Dɔba kɛse no do ama ne onnyiewiei nhyehyɛɛ kɛse no aaba mu, ama woeekenyan Jewfo no, anaadɛ Israel fifo nyina, dze hɔn aba hɔn egyapadze asaase no do, dza hɔn Ewuradze Nyankopɔn dze ama hɔn no, dze ahyɛ n’ahyɛmu no mã;

15 Na ama nkorɔfo yi hɔn asefo aagye n’asɛmpa no edzi yie, dza obefi Amanamamfo hɔ akɔ hɔn hɔ no; na dɛm nkorɔfo yi wɔbɔbɔ hɔn apetse, na wɔbebir, wɔayɛ efĩfĩfo na nkorɔfo a wɔmmpɛ hɔn asɛm koraa, nkorɔfo a hɔn saso mmpuee hɛn mu pɛn, nyew, nnyɛ Lamanfo no mu mpo, osian hɔn ekyingye na abosonsom ntsi.

16 Na hwɛ, Ewuradze no Sunsum egyaa dɛ ɔnye hɔn egyanom dzi aper dada; na wonnyi Christ na Nyankopɔn wɔ wiadze yi mu; na wɔabɔ hɔn apetse dɛ ntsɛw wɔ mframa enyim.

17 Nkyɛ wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a hɔnho yɛ enyigye, nna Christ nye hɔn guanhwɛfo; nyew, nna Egya Nyankopɔn nye hɔn kandzifo.

18 Mbom afei, hwɛ, seseiara Satan na odzi hɔn kan, tse dɛ ma wɔbɔ ntsɛw wɔ mframa enyim, anaa tse dɛ mbrɛ asorɛkye bɔ wusihɛn a onnyi abradaa anaa sekyɛ anaa biribiara a ɔdze bɛdandan noho no; na dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse no, dɛmara na wɔtse.

19 Na hwɛ, Ewuradze atwe hɔn nhyira a ɔwɔ dɛ hɔn nsa kã wɔ asaase no do no asensɛn, dze ama Amanamamfo a wɔbɛfa asaase no.

20 Mbom hwɛ, ɔbɛba dɛ Amanamamfo no bɛpam hɔn na wɔabɔ hɔn apetse; na Amanamamfo no apam hɔn na wɔabɔ hɔn apetse ekyir no, hwɛ, nna Ewuradze bɛkaa ahyɛmu a ɔnye Abraham nye Israel fifo dzii no.

21 Na Ewuradze so bɛkaa atseneneefo hɔn mpaabɔ a wɔdze ato n’enyim ama hɔn.

22 Na afei, O Amanamamfo, hom besi dɛn egyina Nyame no tum ano, gyedɛ hom nu homho na hom dan fi hom ndzebɔn kwan do?

23 Ana hom nnyim dɛ hom wɔ Nyame ne nsamu? Ana hom nnyim dɛ tum nyina yɛ nedze, na sɛ ɔhɛn mu kɛse a asaase bɔbobɔw dɛ nwoma?

24 Dɛm ntsi, hom nnu homho, na hom mbrɛ homho adze wɔ n’enyim, amma ɔammfa pɛrpɛrdzi enntsia hom—amma Jacob n’asenyi nkaase bi ammba hom mu dɛ awendadze, na ɔammbɛtsetsew hom mu esinesin; na obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛgye hom.
morm 6:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nephifo no boa hɔn ano wɔ Cumorah asaase do dɛ wɔrobɔkɔ sa a odzi ewiei—Mormon dze nkyerɛwee krɔnkrɔn no suma koko Cumorah mu—Lamanfo no dzi konyim, na wɔsɛɛ Nephifo hɔn man no—Hɔn mu mpempem na wɔdze nkrantsee kum hɔn. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 385.[/i]

1 Na afei mewie me nkyerɛwee a ɔfa mo nkorɔfo Nephifo hɔn nsɛe ho no. Na ɔbaa dɛ yetuu ntsen wɔ Lamanfo no hɔn enyim.

2 Na emi, Mormon, mekyerɛɛw nwoma dze kɛmaa Lamanfo hɔn hen dɛ mepɛ dɛ ɔma hɛn kwan ma yɛboaboa hɛn nkorɔfo ano dze hɔn kɔ Cumorah asaase a ɔwɔ koko bi a wɔfrɛ no Cumorah ne nkyɛn, na hɔ na yɛnye hɔn bɔkõ.

3 Na ɔbaa dɛ Lamanfo hɔn hen no maa me kwan dɛ dza mepɛ no menyɛ.

4 Na ɔbaa dɛ yetuu ntsen wɔ Cumorah asaase do, na yesisii hɛn ntamadan dze bɔɔ Cumorah koko no ho aprɔw; na ɔwɔ asaase a esu pii, esutsen nye nsunyiwa pii wɔ do; na ha na yenyaa enyidado dɛ hɛn nsa bɛda Lamanfo do.

5 Na ber a mfe ahaebiasa eduowɔtwe twaa mu no, yɛboaboaa hɛn nkorɔfo nyina a wɔaka no ano dze hɔn kɔr Cumorah asaase do.

6 Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a yɛboaboaa hɛn nkorɔfo nyina ano kɔr Cumorah asaase do no, hwɛ emi, Mormon, mehyɛɛ ase dɛ mereyɛ akɔdaa; na minyim dɛ iyi nye mo nkorɔfo hɔn kõ a odzi ewiei, na minyim so dɛ Ewuradze ahyɛ me dɛ mma memma kyerɛwsɛm no a hɛn egyanom adan egya no a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no nnkedzi Lamanfo nsamu, (osiandɛ Lamanfo no bɛsɛɛ no) dɛm ntsi mefaa nkyerɛwee yi fii Nephi ne mprɛtse no do, na medze kyerɛwsɛm a Ewuradze dze hyɛɛ me nsa nyina no sumaa Cumorah koko no mu, gyedɛ mprɛtse kakra yinom nko na medze maa me ba Moroni.

7 Na ɔbaa dɛ mo nkorɔfo nye hɔn yernom na hɔn mba hun dɛ afei Lamanfo nsordaafo no etu ntsen wɔ hɔn do; na wɔdze owu ho suro kɛse a ɔhyɛ emumuyɛfo nyina kra do no dze tweɔn hɔn.

8 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔbae nye hɛn bɔkõe, na hu hyɛɛ ɔkra biara mã osian hɔn dodow ntsi.

9 Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔdze afõwa, nye egyen, nye egyen-menaba, nye ekuma, nye ɔkõ ho akodze ahorow nyina tui hyɛɛ mo nkorɔfo no do.

10 Na ɔbaa dɛ wotwitwaa mo nkorɔfo no guu famu, nyew, me mpem du mpo a wɔkã mo ho no, na mutwae hwee hɔn finimfin; a nna mepira; na wɔpaa moho kɔree a woennku me.

11 Na ber a wotwaa mu kɔree na wotwitwaa mo nkorɔfo nyinara guu famu no, ɔkaa hɛn mu eduonu anan, (nna me ba Moroni kã ho) na hɛn na yɛkaa a yeennwu wɔ mo nkorɔfo mu no, hwɛ adze kyee no a Lamanfo no fii Cumorah koko no n’etsifi saan hɔn ekyir kɔr hɔn nseraban hɔ no, yehun mo nkorɔfo mpem du no a nna midzi hɔn enyim no dɛ woetwitwa hɔn egu famu.

12 Na yehun mpem du no so a me ba Moroni dzii hɔn enyim no.

13 Na hwɛ, Gidgiddonah ne mpem du atotɔ, na ɔnoara so fora hɔn mu.

14 Na Lamah nye ne mpem du atotɔ; na Gilgal nye ne mpem du atotɔ, na Limhah nye ne mpem du atotɔ; na Jeneum nye ne mpem du atotɔ; na Cumenihah, nye Moronihah, nye Antionum, nye Shiblom, nye Shem, nye Josh, hɔn mu biara nye ne mpem du atotɔ.

15 Na ɔbaa dɛ du bio so kã ho a hɔn mu biara nye ne mpem du totɔree, wɔ afõwa ano; nyew, mo nkorɔfo no nyina wui, gyedɛ eduonu anan no a wɔkã moho no, nye kumaabi so a wofii nsa guanee kɔr anaafo nkurow mu no, nye kumaabi a woguanee kɛkãa Lamanfo ho no nko na wɔkae; na hɔn honam nye hɔn mbiew, na bɔgya gu asaase no n’enyi do, hɔn a wokum hɔn no woeegya egu hɔ ma wɔabɔ etur wɔ asaase no do, na wɔadworow na wɔasan akɔ dɛtse mu.

16 Na yaw bubuu me kra osian oku a wɔdze kunkum mo nkorɔfo ntsi; na metseaa mu dɛ:

17 O hom ahoɔfɛfo, ebɛnadze ntsi na hom fii Ewuradze n’akwan mu? O hom ahoɔfɛfo, ebɛnadze ntsi na hom poow Jesus a nna ogyina hɔ ebue n’abasa mu regye hom yi?

18 Hwɛ, sɛ hom annyɛ dɛm adze yi a, nkyɛ hom anntotɔ. Mbom hwɛ, hom atotɔ, na musũ ma hom.

19 O hom mbabanyin nye mbabaa ahoɔfɛfo, hom egyanom nye nãnom, hom kunnom nye yernom, hom ahoɔfɛfo, ebɛnadze ntsi na nkyɛ hom bɔtotɔ?

20 Mbom hwɛ, hom kɔ, na m’awerɛhow runntum mma hom nnsan mmba.

21 Na da no reba a hom dza ɔnnkyebo yi bɛfa bɛkyebo ahyɛ, na dɛm nyimpadua yi a sesei ɔroprɔw wɔ prɔwee mu yi, ɔrennkyɛr na ɔabɛyɛ nyimpadua a ɔmmprɔw; na nkyii hom begyina Christ n’atsɛmbu egua no enyim ma woebu hom atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hom ndwuma tse; na sɛ ɔba no dɛ hom yɛ atseneneefo a, nna oehyira hom nye hom egyanom a woedzi hom enyim kɔ no.

22 O nkyɛ hom nyaa nnuho ansaana dɛm ɔsɛɛ kɛse yi aba hom do. Mbom hwɛ, hom kɔ dada, na Egya no, nyew Onnyiewiei sor Egya no, nyim hom gyinabew; na ɔnye hom bedzi no dɛ mbrɛ ne pɛrpɛrdzi nye n’ehumbɔbɔr no tse.
morm 7:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon to nsa frɛɛ Lamanfo a wɔwɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu no dɛ wɔngye Christ ndzi, wɔngye N’asɛmpa no nto mu na wɔngye hɔn nkwa—Hɔn a wɔgye Bible dzi nyina bɛgye Mormon Nwoma no so edzi. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 385.[/i]

1 Na afei, hwɛ, mebɛkã biribi akyerɛ nkorɔfo nkaa yi a woefi owu nsa no, sɛ ɔba dɛ Nyankopɔn bɛma wɔatse me nsɛm a, ama woeehu ndzɛmba a ɔfa hɔn egyanom ho; nyew, mekasa kyerɛ hom, hom a hom yɛ Israel fifo nkaa; na iyinom nye nsɛm a merekã:

2 Hom nhu dɛ hom yɛ Israel fifo.

3 Hom nhu dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ hom nu homho, annyɛ dɛm a wɔrenngye hom nkwa.

4 Hom nhu dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ hom dze ɔkõ ho akodze gu famu, na hom enyi nngye dɛ hombɛkã bɔgya egu bio, na hom nnsan mmfa akodze bio, gyedɛ Nyankopɔn noara hyɛ hom ana.

5 Hom nhu dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ hom nya hom egyanom ho nyimdzee, na hom nu homho wɔ hom bɔn nye hom emumuyɛ nyina ho, na hom gye Jesus Christ dzi, dɛ ɔno nye Nyankopɔn ne Ba no, no na Jewfo na wokum no, na ɔnam Egya no tum do ɔasoɛr bio, dɛm ntsi oedzi nkonyim wɔ owumaa do; na no mu so na owu no bɔr ammen.

6 Na ɔdze owusoɛr abɔbɔ adze, dɛm ntsi wobenyan nyimpa ma oekegyina n’atsɛmbu egua no enyim.

7 Na ɔama ɔpon aba wiadze, dɛm ntsi obiara a afɔdze biara nnyi noho wɔ n’enyim wɔ atsɛmbu da no mu no wɔbɛma no kwan dɛ ɔnkɛtsena Nyankopɔn nkyɛn wɔ n’ahenman mu, na ɔnye sor adwontokuw no atow ayɛyi ndwom a ɔmmbɔadze da dze ama Egya no, nye Ɔba no, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a wɔbɔmu yɛ Nyame kor, wɔ tsebew ahomka mu a onnyi ewiei mu.

8 Dɛm ntsi hom nnu homho, na wonnuma hom wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu, na hom nsuo Christ n’asɛmpa no mu yie, dza wɔdze robɔto hom enyim, nnyɛ dza ɔwɔ kyerɛwsɛm yi mu nko na mbom kyerɛwsɛm so a obefi Jewfo hɔ aba Amanamamfo hɔ no, dɛm kyerɛwsɛm no a obefi Amanamamfo so hɔ aba hom hɔ no.

9 Na hwɛ, wɔakyerɛw iyi ama hom aagye ɔno so edzi; na sɛ hom gye ɔno dzi a hom bɛgye iyi so edzi; na sɛ hom gye iyi dzi a hom bohu dza ɔfa hom egyanom ho, nye anwanwadze pii a wɔnam Nyankopɔn no tum do yɛɛ wɔ hɔn mu.

10 Na hom bohu so dɛ hom yɛ Jacob n’asefo nkaa; dɛm ntsi wɔakan hom afora edzikamfo a wɔyɛ ahyɛmu mba no; na sɛ ɔba dɛ hom gye Christ dzi, na wonuma hom, wodzi kan dze nsu, na nkyii wɔdze ogya nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, dɛ mbrɛ Agyenkwa no yɛɛ dze yɛ fasusu no, dɛ mbrɛ ɔahyɛ hɛn no a, obesi hom yie wɔ atsɛmbu da no mu. Amen.
morm 8:
[center][font_size=26]Tsir 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfo no per hwehwɛ na wɔsɛɛ Nephifo no—Wɔnam Nyankopɔn no tum do beyi Mormon Nwoma no epue—Mpaa bɛba hɔn a wɔnam ebufuhyew na aperdzi do tsia Ewuradze n’edwuma no—Nephifo hɔn kyerɛwsɛm no bopue wɔ da a emumuyɛdze, ɔsɛɛ na gyedzi ho asehwe bɛba. Christ N’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 400–421.[/i]

1 Hwɛ emi, Moroni, mewie m’egya Mormon ne nkyerɛwee no. Hwɛ, mbom mowɔ nsɛm kakraabi so kyerɛw, ndzɛmba bi a m’egya hyɛɛ me no.

2 Na afei ɔbaa dɛ Cumorah ɔkõ kɛse a ɔsõ yie ekyir no, hwɛ, Nephifo no a wofii nsa kɛhyɛɛ nkurow a ɔwɔ anaafo afamu hɔ no, Lamanfo no tsiiw hɔn kodu dɛ wɔsɛɛ hɔn nyinara.

3 Na m’egya so wokum no, na emi nkotsee na mekae ma merekyerɛw mo nkorɔfo hɔn nsɛe yaayaw ho nsɛm yi. Mbom hwɛ, wɔkɔ, na merehyɛ m’egya ne mbrasɛm no mã. Na sɛ woboku me a, minnyim.

4 Dɛm ntsi mebɛkyerɛw na medze kyerɛwsɛm no esuma asaase mu; na beebi a mobɔkɔ dze onnhia.

5 Hwɛ, m’egya na ɔakyerɛw dɛm nsɛm yi, na ɔakyerɛ ne siantsir so. Na hwɛ, sɛ kwan wɔ mprɛtse no do a nkyɛ mo so mebɛkyerɛw, na mbom kwan nnyi do; na adze a wɔdze yɛ no so minnyi bi osiandɛ aka mo nko. Woeku m’egya wɔ ɔkõ no mu, nye mo nkorɔfo nyinara, na minnyi anyɛnkofo anaa beebi a mobɔkɔ; na minnyim mbertsentsen a Ewuradze bɛma medze atsena ase.

6 Hwɛ, mfe ahaanan na etwa mu kɔ fitsi aber a hɛn Ewuradze nye hɛn Agyenkwa dze baa no.

7 Na hwɛ, Lamanfo no etsiw mo nkorɔfo, Nephifo no, fi kuropɔn kor mu kɔ kuropɔn kor so mu; fi bea kor do kɔ bea kor so do, ekesi dɛ hɔn mu biara mpo annka; na hɔn asehwe no sõ yie; nyew, mo nkorɔfo Nephifo no hɔn nsɛe no sõ na ɔyɛ nwanwa.

8 Na hwɛ, Ewuradze ne nsa na ɔayɛ iyi. Na hwɛ so dɛ Lamanfo no nye hɔnho ridzi akõ; na ewudzi na bɔgyaka rokɔ aprɔw wɔ asaase no enyi do; na obiara nnyim ber a ɔkõ no bɔbɔ adze.

9 Na afei, hwɛ, merennkã biribiara a ɔfa hɔnho bio, osiandɛ hɔn mu biara nnyi hɔ bio kã Lamanfo nye edwotwafo no nko ho na wɔtse nkwa mu wɔ asaase n’enyi do.

10 Na obiara nnyi hɔ a onyim Nyame nokwafo no kã Jesus n’esuafo no ho, hɔn a nna wɔwɔ asaase no do kesii dɛ nkorɔfo no hɔn emumuyɛdze yɛɛ kɛse ma Ewuradze ammpɛ dɛ wɔnye nkorɔfo no bɛtsena; na sɛ wɔwɔ asaase yi enyi do dze a, ɔdasanyi biara nnyim.

11 Mbom hwɛ, m’egya na emi dze yehun hɔn na wɔasoom hɛn.

12 Na obiara a ne nsa bɛkã kyerɛwsɛm yi, na ɔronnhwɛ no mu esintɔ ho na orummbu no enyimtsia no, onyia no bohu ndzɛmba akɛse sen iyinom. Hwɛ, emi nye Moroni, na sɛ ɔbɛyɛ yie a nkyɛ mebɛda ndzɛmba nyina edzi akyerɛ hom.

13 Hwɛ, dza merekã a ɔfa nkorɔfo yi ho no, medze aba ewiei. Meyɛ Mormon ne ba, na m’egya yɛ Nephi n’asenyi.
